[\[60b.6\]]sho kA ya klu/_/ka dam+pa dang srid sgrub nyid/_/ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas/_/me tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya/_/rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jig dang /_/kha 'dzag skyes ma brtse ma ni/_/'khor lo lnga yi mchog rim pas/_/'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya/_/sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi nyid/_/
[\[60b.7\]]dkyil 'khor lnga yi bsgoms pa yis/_/'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur/_/ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya/_/rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang /_/gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang /_/pad+ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang /_/lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang /_/tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dang /_/khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang /_/thong ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang /_/zla ba nyi ma gdon gzhan dang /_/sa ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /_/lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang /_/chos rgyal dang ni klu dang ni/_/dri za lha min mi'am ci/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha/_/
[\[61a.2\]]'og min du ni gnas pa dang /_/gang zhig rgyal tshan gnas pa dang /_/gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni/_/'phrul dga' yi ni rnams dang /_/gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang /_/'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang /_/mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang /_/gling bzhir 
[\[61a.3\]]gnas pa'i sems can dang /_/gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang /_/snod ldan sems can 'jig rten dang /_/lcug ma'i tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang /_/gang zhig rab dga'i sar gnas dang /_/pha rol dri med gang phyin dang /_/'od 'phro can du gnas pa dang /_/mi g.yo'i gnas su byas 
[\[61a.4\]]pa dang /_/gang zhig chos sprin rjes song dang /_/gang zhig sbyang dkar son pa dang /_/gang zhig ring song thob pa dang /_/'od byed du ni gnas pa ste/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang /_/'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyan/_/rwa ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang /_/
[\[61a.5\]]rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag_/shAkya seng ge mnyes byas nas/_/dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song dang /_/lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/_/sbyin sreg cho gas dgyes pa nyid/_/de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtsho rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 
[\[61a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_dam tshig la gsol ba gdab pa 'di gsungs so/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i bsgom pa ste/_/de yi mgo bo'i 
[\[61a.7\]]sna rtse la/_/phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/sbu gu'i nang du phaT kyis ni/_/ye shes ma lhung yang dag gnas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dgyes par mdzod/_/'di ni phyag rgya'i cho ga las/_/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' snyems byas nas/_/gnas ni 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas/_/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag_/shAkya seng ge snyems byas nas/_/rgyal po thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas 'dug nas/_/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag_/kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[61b.2\]]rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin ldan/_/dam tshig phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/_/gnas gsum po yang bsgrub par bya/_/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug bdag_/chos kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/_/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/_/rta mchog 
[\[61b.3\]]rim pas gnas nas ni/_/dam tshig phyag rgyar sbyor ba yis/_/sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rdo rje gar mdzad pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/g.yon pa brkyang ba dang 
[\[61b.4\]]g.yas pa brkyang ba dang /_mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang /_rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_sna tshogs thams cad dang /_rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang /_bung ba'i dra ba dang /_rgya mtsho'i bskyod pa dang /_ri bo'i mchog dang /_mdzes pa'i gom pa dang /_khro bo'i gom pa 
[\[61b.5\]]ste/_rkang stabs kyi dgod pa'o/_/ral gri'i lugs dang /_'khor lo'i tshul dang /_rin po che'i tshul dang /_pad+ma'i lag pa dang /_ral gri'i tshul dang /_mdung gi tshul dang /_gzhu'i tshul dang /_dbyug pa'i tshul dang /_dbyug to'i tshul dang /_gtun shing gi tshul dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang /_/
[\[61b.6\]]kha bcu pa'i tshul dang /_ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang /_sna tshogs dbyug pa'i tshul dang /_mdung thung gi tshul dang /_gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang /_'phan gnyis pa dang /_'phan gsum pa dang /_me tog gi tshul dang /_bdug spos kyi tshul dang /_mar me'i tshul dang /_dri'i tshul dang /_lA 
[\[61b.7\]]s+ya'i lag pa dang /_phreng ba'i lag pa dang /_glu'i lag pa dang /_gar gyi lag pa dang /_gling bu'i lag pa dang /_pi wang gi lag pa dang /_rdza rnga'i lag pa dang /_ku muN+Da'i lag pa ste/_lag pa'i dgod pa'o/_/rdo rje skyil krung dang /_pad+ma'i skyil krung dang /_pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang /_bzang 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]po'i 'dug stangs dang /_skyil krung phyed pa dang /_bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o/_/sgeg pa'i nga ro dang /_dpa' bo'i nga ro dang /_mi sdug pa'i nga ro dang /_dgod pa'i nga ro dang /_drag po'i nga ro dang /_'jigs su rung ba'i nga ro dang /_zhi ba'i nga ro dang /_rngam 
[\[62a.2\]]pa'i nga ro dang /_snying rje'i nga ro dang /_drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang /_drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang /_dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang /_bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang /_lnga ba'i rjes kyi glu dang /_blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang /_'khor nyan pa'i glu'o/_/nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang /_sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang /_
[\[62a.3\]]'jig pa'i dbye ba dang /_gang ba dang /_phyed phyi ba dang /_rnam par 'dre ba dang /_'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang /_'dod chags gsum mtshungs par byed pa dang /_lkog ma nyed pa dang /_rkan nyed pa dang /_lce nyed pa dang /_so nyed pa ste glu dgod pa'o/_/sa gzhi yongs bzung 
[\[62a.4\]]dus su ni/_/dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul pa/_/ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/_/'di ni dam tshig rim pa'i mchog_/me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/_/dag pa'i skye gnas las dge ba/_/bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/_/bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/tshal dag ro yi 
[\[62a.5\]]phan pa dang /_/gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog_/bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/_/bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa/_/dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba/_/bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/_/bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par 
[\[62a.6\]]mdzod/_/'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste/_/dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa/_/bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/_/bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/_/oM badzra g+haN+De aH/_dril bu blang ba'i sngags so/_/oM ma hA badzro hU~M/_rdo rje gzung ba'i sngags so/_/dngos po sna tshogs rnam par phye 
[\[62a.7\]]pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje'i gur/_/sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la/_/tshig ni 'di dag bka' stsal pa/_/phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/_/rdo rje las skyes rang bzhin can/_/lag par thod pa kha T+wAM ga/_/bsams nas spro 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]zhing bzlas pa'o/_/phyag bzhi pa ni nyid dang yang /_/zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba/_/dkar po dmar po de bzhin sngo/_/phag mo lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba'o/_/phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag_/lcags sgrog ma dang lhan cig sbyor/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa can/_/zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar 
[\[62b.2\]]bya/_/mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang /_/zhal gcig me dang dbang byed ma/_/rdo rje chos kyi gnas mnan ma/_/'di ni ku ru kul+ler brjod/_/'di ni sngags brjod pa'o/_/btsun mo chos la gnas pa ni/_/khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni/_/dus gcig pa yi dus su ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos 
[\[62b.3\]]nas/_/rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste/_/dus gcig dus ni gcig na'o/_/bdag gis bcom ldan spyan sngar te/_/btsun mo'i chos su rnam rgyas pas/_/lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang /_/don byed dus dang char sogs dang /_/lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa/_/thub pa 
[\[62b.4\]]chen po 'jig rten mgon/_/phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/_/mchog sbyin dang ni pad+mas brgyan/_/pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas/_/dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan/_/ma~M gyi de nyid las skyes pa/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni ser po ste/_/yan lag mchog sbyin ut+pal brgyan/_/mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 
[\[62b.5\]]'dzin/_/hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/_/lag pa ral gri sdigs mdzub nyid/_/ma he chen po'i rgyab tu ni/_/dpa' bo g.yon brkyang pa yis gnas/_/khro bo'i gzugs can 'jigs byed pa/_/kha sbyar mdun du mi bskyod 'dzin/_/hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje can/_/rdo rje dril 
[\[62b.6\]]bu'i sbyor ba yis/_/lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcing /_/rkang pa g.yon nyid brkyang ba yis/_/'jigs byed mnan pa yi ni lus/_/spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal dran par bya/_/twA~M gi yi ge las byung ba/_/mchog sbyin dbang mchog mtshon cha ste/_/lha mo lnga 
[\[62b.7\]]pa lta bu nyid/_/rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/_/sna tshogs pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/_/spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po/_/sgeg mo chen mo skal bzang ma/_/sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya/_/ma~M gyi yi ge las byung ba/_/mchog sbyin a sho ka 'dzin ma/_/nyi ma shar ba lta bu ste/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes/_/g.yon brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis/_/'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shing rta mnan/_/yan lag sgeg pa'i ro yis brgyan/_/'od zer can ni bsgom par bya/_/tsu~M gyi yi ge las byung ba'i/_/ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od/_/snying gar rin chen snyim par 
[\[63a.2\]]gnas/_/mdzes pa'i tshul gyis yang dag bzhugs/_/lha mo sna tshogs pad gdan can/_/phan pas mgo bo mnan pa ste/_/byang chub sems ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i/_/lha mo stobs dang bral ba bsgom/_/baM gyi yi ge las byung ba/_/nor 'dzin shin tu kha dog ser/_/lag pa mchog sbyin 'bras snye ma/_/
[\[63a.3\]]rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba las/_/yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas brgyan/_/spyan ni shin tu sgeg par ni/_/gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya/_/nor gyi bdag po mtshungs par 'gyur/_/dza~M gi yi ge las byung ba/_/nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba bsgom/_/kha dog ser zhing g.yas pa na/_/
[\[63a.4\]]mchog sbyin rin chen ne'u le ste/_/rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje yis/_/spyi bor dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan/_/rin chen char ni bsam par bya/_/skyor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya/_/pra~M gyi yi ge las skyes pa/_/lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/_/lha mo ral gri'i 'khor lo 'dzin/_/spyi 
[\[63a.5\]]bor phan pas mnan pa'o/_/rang gi ming po'i dus lta bur/_/dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug_/nam mkha'i gnas nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya 
[\[63a.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad pa/_oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM many+dzu ya muHswA hA/_oM hrIHSh+k+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_oM hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_oM mA re ts+yai ma~M swA hA/_oM tsa le tsu le tsun de 
[\[63a.7\]]swA hA/_oM bA su d+hA re ma hA bA su pr-iSh+Ti pA ha ni bA su swA hA/_oM dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/_oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_'jig rten mgon gyis nad rnams zhi/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis blo gros bzang /_/gshin rje gshed kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bsrung /_/lha dang lha min hUM mdzad 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]kyis/_/sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du byed/_/'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig_/tsun+dA sems can thams cad ni/_/dgug pa yi ni cho gar brjod/_/dzam+b+ha la dang nor sbyin bdag_/nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod/_/bud med gang zhig bu shi bas/_/so sor 'brang ma rtag dran bya/_/
[\[63b.2\]]rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa'o/_/sngags kyi rkang pas thams cad 'grub/_/bzlas pa'i 'bum gyi sbyor ba yis/_/las rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub/_/snying gi bde ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs 'di nyid kyi 
[\[63b.3\]]sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/hU~M gi yi ge las skyes pa/_/phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig ldan/_/kha dog nag cing cher 'bar ba/_/gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa'o/_/mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/_/mche ba chen pos 'jigs par byed/_/gzugs thung gzi brjid chen po nyid/_/
[\[63b.4\]]kha nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste/_/slob dpon la rtag gang sdang dang /_/gang zhig dkon mchog gsum khro dang /_/sems can du ma gsod byed pa/_/nag po chen pos za bar byed/_/rang gi lag g.yas sha gcod byed/_/khrag gi rgyun ni 'thung bar byed/_/de nas spyi bor 'di 'dug nas/_/de 
[\[63b.5\]]ni ti la tsam gcod par byed/_/mon sran gre dang dza~M bu Ti/_/me tog bdug pa byug pa chang /_/sha lnga nyid dang bdud rtsi yis/_/nag po che la gtor ma sbyin/_/sngags ni/_oM shrI ma hA kA lA ya/_shA sa no pa hA ri Ne e Sha a pa sh+tsi ma kA lo a ya mi da~M rat+na tra yA pa kA ri Na yang di pra ti dz+nyA~M smar si ta dA 
[\[63b.6\]]i daM duSh+TaM kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_mA ra mA ra/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_di na me ke na hU~M phaT hU~M/_tsha ba gsum gyis gzugs brnyan ni/_/byas nas lus la tsher mas dgang /_/dug dang ske tshe yis bris nas/_/de ni gang gi ming gis ni/_/de nas me la 
[\[63b.7\]]gdung bar bya/_/de yi dus na mi snang 'gyur/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub bsgom pa nyid/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub dngos grub che/_/dngos grub kun gyi spyod yul min/_/de dus de yi lus 'thob cing /_/skad cig na ni bde chen tshul/_/skad cig na ni de 'khor ldan/_/
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bsgom pa dang ni sngags nyid dang /_/skad cig sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/_/spyan gyis 'phrag nas 'khyud pa'o/_/skad cig la ni gnyis med ldan/_/dga' ba chen po mchog tu dga'/_/rdo rje 'dzin rgyal skad cig gis/_/mA ma kI dang bde ba sdom/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas/_/skad cig 
[\[64a.2\]]gis ni gnyis med ldan/_/rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyar bas/_/rdo rje gus pa'i pha rol son/_/rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing /_/pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya/_/bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni/_/rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/_/rdo rje bu mo cher grags pa/_/rdo rje nag po lta bu mchod/_/rang rig skyes bu bsams nas ni/_/rdo 
[\[64a.3\]]rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas/_/bu mo de bzhin gshegs ma mchog_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod/_/rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsam/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas/_/gdol pa chen po las byung ba/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod/_/phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs 
[\[64a.4\]]rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/nyi ma gnyis kyi cho ga dang /_/nyi ma gsum gyi sbyor ba dang /_/de bzhin du ni nyi ma bzhi/_/nyi ma lnga pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/me tog la sogs mchod byas nas/_/bsam gtan gnas su 
[\[64a.5\]]'dug pa dang /_/phyag rgya lhan cig zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam/_/rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na/_/sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag brtsam/_/nyi ma shar pa'i dus su ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pas/_/'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin las/_/chags 
[\[64a.6\]]chen ting 'dzin gnas nas ni/_/phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa/_/shin tu dga' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/pad+mar rdo rje can bcug nas/_/rang gi rig ma bdag mar byas/_/de dang lhan cig 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod/_/mi yi phyag rgya blangs nas ni/_/de la 'khor 
[\[64a.7\]]lo rab tu dbye/_/dri dang me tog mthun byas nas/_/'khor lo goms par yang dag brtsam/_/spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang /_/dkar mo shin tu yid 'phrog ma/_/me tog dri yis mthun byas nas/_/rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam/_/sngags pas phan par 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/phyag na rdo 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]rje 'grub pa dang /_/rdo rje nyi ma 'grub pa dang /_/dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang /_/bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa dang /_/thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/chu yi dbang ni dang po ste/_/cod pan dbang la gnyis pa'o/_/rdo rje dbang gis gsum pa ste/_/rang gi bdag po bzhi ba nyid/_/ming gi 
[\[64b.2\]]dbang bskur lnga pa ste/_/drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/_/bdun pa bum pa'i dbang gis te/_/gsang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pa'o/_/shes rab dbang las dgu pa ste/_/de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod/_/ston pa rang gis lung bstan te/_/de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o/_/
[\[64b.3\]]slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/_/bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/_/spun la smad pa nyid mi bya/_/sems can rnams la gdug byams dang /_/byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/_/bdag gzhan chos la smad mi bya/_/skal med de nyid gtam mi bya/_/skal ldan sems can smad mi bya/_/bdag gi 
[\[64b.4\]]lus la'ang smad mi bya/_/chos la yid gnyis mi bya zhing /_/gdug la byams pa nyid mi bya/_/chos nyid tshad ni bzung mi bya/_/dam tshig rtag tu bskyang ba dang /_/gzhan gyi chos la smad mi bya/_/bud med nyid la'ang smad mi bya/_/rtsa ba'i ltung ba rab tu spang ba mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[64b.5\]]to/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya/_/rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'ang gzung bar bya/_/gtsug tor rtag tu gzung bar bya/_/rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya/_/rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/_/rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya/_/
[\[64b.6\]]'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin/_/phyag rgya bcing ba rnam spang zhing /_/mchod rten las ni mi bya ste/_/rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las/_/rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing /_/slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya/_/bla ma'i rgan rabs phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtag par rgyun du sngags 
[\[64b.7\]]bzla zhing /_/bsam gtan nyid kyang 'bral mi bya/_/rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing /_/rtag pa ru ni bshad par gyis/_/rtag tu sems can bskyang bar bya/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas cher mnyes bya/_/dzam b+ha la la chu sbyin zhing /_/las rnams thams cad yang dag spyad/_/bye ma'i mchod rten las la yang /_/
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang pho nya mo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di thos nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/_sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod/_/sdig pa thams 
[\[65a.2\]]cad rnam sbyong ba/_/chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtogs/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/_/gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir/_/rgyal ba mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'gro ba bud med 'dul 
[\[65a.3\]]gzigs nas/_/bdag med rnal 'byor mar gyur gang /_/phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub la/_/sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal bstod/_/gti mug mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/_/gti mug thams cad zad mdzad pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/_/
[\[65a.4\]]nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/_/nga rgyal thams cad zad mdzad pa'i/_/rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che/_/'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/_/chags pas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/_/'dod chags thams cad zad mdzad pa/_/rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/_/ser sna rdo rje phyag 
[\[65a.5\]]'tshal bstod/_/'gro ba phrag dog mnan gzigs nas/_/phrag dog thams cad zad mdzad pa/_/bdun gyi rgyal po rgyal po che/_/thams cad gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol 
[\[65a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_/slob dpon ston par gyur pa ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/_/bdag cag rnams kyi pha dang ma/_/
[\[65a.7\]]'di nyid yid la bsam par bya/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /_/rdo rje chos dang gzi brjid dang /_/bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub rnams/_/gang phyir de yis dka' ba med/_/mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang /_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]ral gri rkang 'og bsgrub pa dang /_/ril bu dang ni mkha' spyod dang /_/mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len/_/gang phyir ye shes rdo rje ni/_/mnyes pas myur du thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir slob dpon drung gshegs te/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag mdzad do/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba/_/
[\[65b.2\]]de ltar slob dpon gzugs 'dzin to/_/sems can rjes su gzung dmigs nas/_/phal pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o/_/slob dpon gyis ni mthar dus su/_/shi ba 'jig rten mi gnas pa/_/skyes pa glen zhing rmongs pa gang /_/de 'di shi zhes smra bar byed/_/'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam 
[\[65b.3\]]rtog gis/_/dag pa'i gnas su khyer bar byed/_/yang na bde ba can du nges/_/'dod pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_/me tog sna tshogs lag thogs shing /_/sna tshogs rgyal mtshan byug pa dang /_/glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/_/sangs rgyas sras dang rdo rjer bcas/_/sna 
[\[65b.4\]]tshogs sgra dang sil snyan che/_/bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs dang /_/dbang gi gnas rnams nyid kyis ni/_/lus las lus gzhan 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje dril bu lag byin te/_/mgo bo'i gtsug tor mnan nas ni/_/rdo rje'i sdom pa byin nas su/_/bum pa'i dbang ni 
[\[65b.5\]]bskur nas ni/_/mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/_/rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/_/rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor bas/_/sbyang bar yang dag bstan pa'o/_/nyi ma dag ni gsum la ni/_/rus pa'i phreng ba bsdu bar bya/_/'o ma dri bzang bsang gtor nas/_/de yi mchod 
[\[65b.6\]]rten yang dag brtsam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//_//
[\[65b.7\]]'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa rdzogs so/_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]{D420}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA mu drA ti la kaM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza a d+hi pa ti/_bod skad du/_dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan mkha' 'gro 
[\[66a.2\]]ye shes nyid/_/gsang pad snying po'i kha 'byed pa/_/gsang pad lte ba'i nang na bzhugs/_/bdag gis zhu ba khyod gson cig_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i kye rdo rje/_/'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid rgyud/_/gang zhig khyod kyis de nyid gsungs/_/sbyor drug rnal 'byor ma yi gzhung /_/thams cad 
[\[66a.3\]]mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog_/de ni dpa' bo bdag gis shes/_/don dam pa ni ji lta bu/_/de ru bdag ni the tshom skyes/_/char dang thig le tshul dang ni/_/tshul tsam mchog gi mchog gzhan yin/_/sbyor ba drug gis rnam par shes/_/de yi gnas ni gang na yod/_/srog ni gang nas 'byung ba yin/_/
[\[66a.4\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa gang du brlag_/rdo rje mtshan mo gang nyid ci/_/mtshams gang shar ba gang zhig lags/_/gang du nub pa'i dus dang rtsa/_/mchog gi dbang phyug du tsam mchis/_/dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs/_/de yi dus kyis don ci byed/_/A li kA li bya ba gang /_/mnga' bdag gang 
[\[66a.5\]]nas 'byung ba lags/_/ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan/_/dga' ba yang ni de bzhin no/_/gang gi dus kyi dga' ba rnams/_/rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba gsungs/_/chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar bshad/_/rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan/_/bdag gi sgra ni ji ltar gsungs/_/gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar 
[\[66a.6\]]lags/_/mchog ces bgyi pa ji ltar bshad/_/dgyes pa'i don ni gsal bar mdzod/_/rigs kyi bye brag tu tsam bstan/_/phung po la sogs skye mched ci/_/tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang /_/dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang /_/gang nas 'byung zhing gang du gnas/_/chen po'i chen po 
[\[66a.7\]]de ji ltar/_/phyag rgya'i bye brag du zhig bshad/_/phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags/_/mgon po mchod pa'i bye brag ci/_/de ru me tog ji ltar yin/_/mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni/_/ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags/_/mchog gi dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/bcom ldan 'das de ji lta bu/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]de ru lha mo ci 'dra ba/_/lha mo bgyi ba gang la gsungs/_/bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis/_/de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad/_/dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni/_/rgyal ba'i dbang phyug de dag gsungs/_/mgon po nang gi sbyin sreg dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga dang /_/rnal 'byor ma yi 'dus 
[\[66b.2\]]gnas dang /_/de ru skad ni ji lta bu/_/bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo/_/mgon po chen po khyod kyis gsungs/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rgyud thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dris pa yang dag gting dpag dka'/_/snying 
[\[66b.3\]]po yi ni snying po mchog_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/_/mchog las mchog gi yang dag mchog_/lha chen po ni la sogs dang /_/bzang mo de ru byol song yin/_/don dam de ni khyod gcig pu/_/zhal bzang mo ni snod yin no/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dgar ba/_/nyon cig yang dag 
[\[66b.4\]]bdag gis bshad/_/dang po re zhig slob ma la/_/dbang rnams lan cig bskur ba yis/_/de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi/_/nges par snod du gyur pa'o/_/dbang med na ni dngos grub med/_/bye ma btsir yang mar med ltar/_/gang zhig rgyud lung nga rgyal gyis/_/dbang bskur med la gsal 
[\[66b.5\]]byed pa/_/slob dpon slob ma shi ma thag_/dngos grub thob kyang dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/bla ma la ni dbang don zhu/_/dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes/_/ye shes dang ni thugs rje che/_/yang dag rlabs che dpa' bo dang /_/ser sna med dang rang bzhin bzang /_/skal 
[\[66b.6\]]ldan mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs/_/phrag dog yul ni rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa/_/'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid/_/sdom pa de ni shes pa na/_/bla ma de lta bu la bya/_/de lta bu yi bla ma yis/_/'bad pas slob ma brtag par bya/_/ji ltar bsregs la sogs pas 
[\[66b.7\]]gser/_/ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che/_/ji ltar bde ldan bu mo ni/_/de ltar slob ma brtag par bya/_/de bas thams cad rab 'bad de/_/phan tshun so sor brtag par bya/_/de lta min na skyon du 'gyur/_/nam yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar dug la rab sngags kyis/_/dag pa byas na 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bdud rtser 'gyur/_/de bzhin slob ma dbang sogs kyis/_/lus ni dri ma med par 'gyur/_/gang zhig dbang bskur sbyin byed pa/_/de ni rdor sems lta bur blta/_/bla ma sprul rgyal lta bur blta/_/dpal ldan bla ma me 'drar blta/_/bla ma ston pa bas lhag blta/_/yid bzhin rin 
[\[67a.2\]]chen mnyam par blta/_/ji ltar rab sbyor dang sngags kyis/_/sprul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las/_/tshad med pa yi rin chen rnyed/_/dbul ba thams cad med par byed/_/rab sbyor log dang sngags log gis/_/dga' mo nges par tshig par byed/_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/khrims la sogs 
[\[67a.3\]]pa'i spyod pa yis/_/dpal zhal de nyid rin dbang phyug_/tshe 'di nyid kyis rnyed par 'gyur/_/de ltar min te ma gus na/_/gsung gi me yis nges tshig byed/_/ji ltar me yis shing tshig pa/_/skad cig gis ni thal bar byed/_/gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma/_/mnyes na skad cig gis sdig 
[\[67a.4\]]tshig_/rgyud 'di la ni mchog gi ni/_/bcom ldan dbang bskur du zhig mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dbang bskur bzhi yi rim pa la/_/'bras bu yis ni gsum du bstan/_/dang por slob dpon dbang dang gcig_/gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang ni mchog_/gsum pa 
[\[67a.5\]]shes rab ye shes dbang /_/de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o/_/slob dpon dbang la bcu gcig dbye/_/gsang ba'i dbang dang bcu gnyis mchog_/shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa/_/de ltar de bzhin bcu bzhi'o/_/dbang re la ni sa re ste/_/de rnams sa yi dbang phyug bdag_/rgyu rtsa gsum gyis 
[\[67a.6\]]shes par bya/_/de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa'o/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bral/_/yang na bdag nyid gsum po yin/_/dga' ba'i bye brag shes par bya/_/'khor lo rnams kyi rim pas so/_/yar ngo yi ni gsum pa'i tshe/_/slob ma rab la dbang bskur bya/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mig gi dkyus ring ba/_/
[\[67a.7\]]gzugs bzang lang chos brgyan pa yis/_/bcu gnyis yang na bcu drug gam/_/ma rnyed nyi shu lon pa'ang rung /_/nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya gzhan/_/des ni dngos grub thag ring byed/_/sring mo yang na bu mo 'am/_/chung ma bla ma la dbul bya/_/de nas sna tshogs rdzas kyis ni/_/bla ma dad pas mchod 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]par bya/_/sna tshogs rab ni brgya sogs dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog_/mu tig phreng ba rin thang med/_/grangs med gser gyis mchod bya'o/_/de ring phan chad bdag ni 'bangs/_/chen po'i chen po mchod pa bzhis/_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/'bad de bla ma mchod par bya/_/
[\[67b.2\]]bla ma'i gzugs ni bdag rang yin/_/bdag mchod byas na dngos grub 'thob/_/de yis skad cig phyag rgya che/_/mchod pa byas nas bsnyen par bya/_/bsnyen pa las ni gang zhig 'byung /_/slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya/_/sbom po mtha' ltag sbyar ba yis/_/longs spyod nang du gzhug par bya/_/de 
[\[67b.3\]]tshe yang dag ye shes skye/_/bu mo'i bde ba ji lta bu/_/srog dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas/_/shin tu legs dgyes kyis mchod bya/_/rin chen kha la hUM phaT sngags/_/bkod nas mda' la bskyon par bya/_/de yi dus su dga' skad cig_/ji ltar rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur/_/de ltar phyag rgya 
[\[67b.4\]]la bshad bya/_/'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de nas slob ma'i lag tu ni/_/byin nas 'di skad smra bar bya/_/nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas/_/pad+ma'i don la ji bzhin gyis/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus na ni/_/rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni bzhugs/_/de ma rnyed pa'i bar du ni/_/thabs 
[\[67b.5\]]gzhan la ni byang chub med/_/de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs/_/phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang /_yon dbul ba dang /_dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba bshad 
[\[67b.6\]]par bya/_/mchog dang rab mchog mchog gi mchog_/phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku/_/legs dgyes dbang po'i 'khor lo drug_/zla phyed byad gzugs char yang ni/_/rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs/_/phyed min gang ba yang ma yin/_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/sgyu 'phrul chen po 'gro ba'i ma/_/
[\[67b.7\]]char yang grangs med bsten pa yin/_/de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra/_/skye med gnyis med bsam du med/_/rlung gi 'khor lo skyed byed ma/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba'o/_/me yi 'khor lo'i nang na ni/_/thig le gcig pa yi ge med/_/thams cad nang yod yig kun yin/_/thams cad khyab 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dang bde ba 'byung /_/bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/dbyangs dang dpe byad dang bral lo/_/grangs med pa yi khams gsum ni/_/rgyu dang skye bar byed pa'o/_/tshul ni glo bur ba yi gnas/_/rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba/_/dngos po sbrul lce 'dra ba yin/_/mtho ris sa ni skyed pa'o/_/
[\[68a.2\]]yi ge ma yin khams kyang med/_/zla tshes thig le rgyan dang bral/_/skye med grangs med mi zad pa/_/de ni don dam tshul yin no/_/sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas/_/lte ba'i snyoms pa zhes su grags/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni/_/dri ma med pa sprul mig 'dra/_/dri med ma bcos 
[\[68a.3\]]pa yi gnas/_/gnas med rnam pa med pa'o/_/g.yo ba med dang brjod du med/_/dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o/_/mchog gi ye shes tshul can ni/_/bcu gsum dbang phyug gis mi shes/_/mchog gi longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/_/mchog gi rnam pa bdud rtsi mchog_/theg pa mchog gi 
[\[68a.4\]]mtha' na yod/_/ji ltar chang gi mthu bzhin no/_/thams cad bdag nyid byad gzugs bral/_/gzugs med bdag nyid kyis bzhugs so/_/gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo la/_/thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs/_/lta bar byed dang blta bya med/_/mtshan ngan thams cad med pa'o/_/
[\[68a.5\]]brjod med mi zad zhi bste/_/rang dga' nyams myong rnam pa'o/_/bla ma yi ni bka' drin gyis/_/legs dgyes dbang po rnyed par 'gyur/_/de lta bu yi ye shes che/_/rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can/_/'khor lo drug gi dbus su ni/_/don dam par ni bshad pa'o/_/steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[68a.6\]]kha sbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod/_/bcu gnyis phyed dang drug gi phyed/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad/_/brgyad gnyis dang ni brgyad bzhi ni/_/'di ni 'khor lo chu skyes dug_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang 'khor lo drug gi rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum 
[\[68a.7\]]pa'o//_//nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/_/rtsa rnams kyi ni rigs bshad do/_/rigs chen po yi rgyud chen por/_/rgyas par bdag gis gsal bar byas/_/'di ru 'khor lo drug gi grangs/_/mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]bya/_/rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa drug ni/_/g.yo ba nam mkha' me dang sbubs/_/rab bskor dang ni 'jigs chen po/_/rtsa de rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas/_/'dzin ma dang ni ro ma dang /_/rtog med ma ni gru gsum gnas/_/me yi 'khor lo'i nang du ni/_/rtsa yi dbang po lngar shes bya/_/
[\[68b.2\]]mgyogs ma dang ni yang dag mgyogs/_/shin tu bzang dang bzang 'gro dang /_/stobs chen mdang 'jigs chen ma/_/nga rgyal che dang 'jigs byed che/_/mthus myur ma dang mthu yi cha/_/mthu yi chu dang mthu dri dang /_/mthu ma dang ni mthus 'bab ma/_/gtsub dang nur dang mthu 
[\[68b.3\]]du ma/_/rngam pa za ba nam mkhar 'gro/_/bya yi yan lag bya 'gro ma/_/phyug mo 'jigs ma nga ro dang /_/brtul ma mchod ma myos ma dang /_/sgra ma sgra 'byung sdig can ma/_/pad+ma'i sdong bu ma sngon mo/_/zil pa zil 'byung skra ma dang /_/phyin phyogs kha dang dbyug pa dang /_/dbyug pa'i nga 
[\[68b.4\]]rgyal dang po ma/_/tshe'u lto ma dang tshe'u grug ma/_/tshe'u bdun ma dang brtson 'grus ma/_/tshe'u khyim ma dang tshe'u kha ma/_/tshe'u 'od ma dang tshe'u lug rgyud/_/'bud ma bdag ma 'od ma dang /_/dri med dang ni dri sreg dang /_/thag lto ma dang thag dga' ma/_/thag mo dang ni tha ga dus ma/_/phug 
[\[68b.5\]]ron phum skye phra ma dang /_/lo ma dang ni tshar lo dang /_/gos gyon ma dang gsal byed ma/_/rtsa 'di brgyad po brgyad du dran/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i chu skyes ni/_/lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/_/rin chen ma dang pad chen mo/_/gshe chen ma dang stobs chen mo/_/mgo chen ma dang myos chen 
[\[68b.6\]]ma/_/dga' chen ma dang mi dga' che/_/de brgyad chos 'khor 'dam skyes ni/_/zhal bzang snying ga'i rgya mtshor ro/_/chags ma longs spyod longs spyod min/_/nyi 'od 'od ma b+ha ga dang /_/lu ma dang ni thal gdong ma/_/bza' ster rang za ltogs ma dang /_/ra sa ya na ro skyur ma/_/ro 'dzag dang ni 
[\[68b.7\]]ro ma dang /_/sgur ma longs spyod 'khor lo'i gnas/_/brgyad gnyis 'dam skyes 'dab ma ni/_/mgrin pa yi ni rim pa'i rigs/_/'dod ma 'dod spyod tshe'u lus ma/_/zla 'thung zla lto mdzod ma dang /_/skad snyan lkugs ma dur ba ma/_/ce skyang brgya ma skams pa ma/_/me ma rngon ma zla ba ma/_/gang ba 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]gnyid ma gnyid skyes ma/_/chang 'tshong chang ster bdud rtsi ma/_/dung ma dang ni dung rna ma/_/dung mig ma dang dung sna ma/_/mthus phyug ma dang mthu ser ma/_/mthu rmongs ma dang mthu rngam ma/_/'gying ma dang ni ri rten ma/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis thod pa'i gnas/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyal po 'di/_/
[\[69a.2\]]des ni 'khor lo rnams la khyab/_/thams cad phra mo reg bya med/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/bde chen bde ba'i rnam pa can/_/bde chen la sogs sbyin par byed/_/de yi rtsa ba'i 'byung ba yi/_/yang dag thar 'dod pas shes bya/_/lha mo rtsa byung med gyur na/_/phung po'i 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[69a.3\]]phung po med na ye shes che/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyis ji ltar rnyed/_/phung po lnga ni bdag nyid sku/_/mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags/_/mkha' 'gro lnga ni ye shes lnga/_/'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can/_/rtsa nyid 'byung ba med 'gyur na/_/phung po rnams ni 'byung ba med/_/phung po med na dngos grub ni/_/
[\[69a.4\]]rnal 'byor chen pos rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal bar bya/_/ji ltar sprin gyi char gyis ni/_/rtag par de ni che bar 'phel/_/'bras bu mang zhing mtha' yas ni/_/the tshom med par sbyin par byed/_/de ltar phung po'i shing zhes bya/_/rtsa yi chu yis che bar 'phel/_/
[\[69a.5\]]cher gyur 'bras bu thar pa ni/_/the tshom med par sbyin par byed/_/lha mo'i dngos po gzugs su ni/_/rtsa yi byad gzugs yin par 'gyur/_/reg khams rgyal mtshan sbyor ba yis/_/me 'khor nang du chu skyes ni/_/gang tshe rdo rjes skyod par byed/_/de tshe me ni khong du chud/_/'khor lo chu skyes 
[\[69a.6\]]thams cad ni/_/je gsal je gsal kha 'byar 'gyur/_/de nas rtsa kun 'dzag 'gyur te/_/snod 'dzag pa yi chu thigs bzhin/_/de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni/_/'dus nas gcig tu gyur pa'o/_/rtsa gnyis kha yi rtse mo las/_/zla ba dang ni nyi ma 'dzag_/mngal gyi dbus na rtsa gnas pa/_/thag 
[\[69a.7\]]pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs su yod/_/de ni gcig tu rgyu zhes bya/_/'bras bu'i bye brag gnyis su 'gyur/_/g.yon nas khu ba 'byung ba dang /_/g.yas nas khrag ni 'byung ba'o/_/gang tshe g.yas phyogs nyi ma ni/_/de tshe bde ba dmar por 'gyur/_/g.yon nas zla ba 'byung ba'i phyir/_/de ni bde ba dkar 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]por 'gyur/_/de gnyis nang na me gnas pa/_/sgong skyes gnyis log ji bzhin no/_/sngon gyi las rlung rnam shes ni/_/gang tshe 'khor bar gyur pa na/_/de yi tshe na b+ha ga'i nang /_/'dod chags chen pos yid 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe ma yi zla mtshan 'byung /_/me dang nyi ma gsal bar 'byung /_/de tshe 'dod 
[\[69b.2\]]chags chen po'i yid/_/reg bya bdun pa mchog tu 'gyur/_/bol+la kak+ko la zhugs nas/_/ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin/_/de tshe sa bon 'byung ba yin/_/sa bon las ni gong bu 'byung /_/lha mo de las rtsa rnams 'byung /_/'bras bu nges par 'byung ba'o/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las 
[\[69b.3\]]'khor lo drug gi rtsa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//srog ni 'byung bar thim pa'i tshul/_/nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad/_/ma skyes pa yi char yang ni/_/gsang ba'i mjal gyi nang du bzhugs/_/de ni rnam shes med pa dang /_/bdag nyid med pa'i ye shes sku/_/de yi gnas nas 
[\[69b.4\]]srog 'byung ste/_/srog can rnams kyi srog ni mchog_/rtag tu bdag nyid srog chen po/_/gnas lnga'i gnas na bzhugs pa'o/_/nam mkha' lnga zhes bya bar grags/_/nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi po ni/_/srog gi rten du shes par bya/_/yang na srog ni de rnams rten/_/
[\[69b.5\]]legs dgyes dbang mo shes par 'gyur/_/rnam shes las ni rlung skye'o/_/de las me ni skye bar 'gyur/_/de las chu ni skye 'gyur te/_/de las sa ni skye ba'o/_/de rnams kun las phung por 'byung /_/de nas skye mched 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas ye shes rang bzhin skye/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rim pas so/_/rdo 
[\[69b.6\]]rje phreng ba'i rgyud chen las/_/sngar ni bdag gis bstan pa'o/_/mtshan mo gang yin nyin gang yin/_/mtshan mo bdag gis bshad par bya/_/mtshan mo shes rab tu ni grags/_/shes rab mtshan mo yin par 'gyur/_/mtshan me'i rnam pa zla bar 'gyur/_/zla ba mya ngan 'das rang bzhin/_/kun 
[\[69b.7\]]rdzob dang ni don dam par/_/shes rab gnyis kyis shes par bya/_/kun rdzob reg byar shes par bya/_/gang zhig reg bya med par bde/_/blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/de ni bdag gis mtshan mor bshad/_/nyin mo thabs su grags pa ste/_/thabs 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur/_/b+ha ga'i 'byung ba nyi ma yin/_/nyi ma b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur/_/srid pa'i rnam pa nyi ma yin/_/zla ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs/_/srid pa de ni rigs zhes bstan/_/nyi las 'byung ba zla ba'i rigs/_/dri ma med phyir nyi ma ste/_/rtog pa'i dra ba med pa'o/_/
[\[70a.2\]]dri ma med pa mchog phra ba/_/shin tu gsal ba stong sku'o/_/yang dag dri med gnas zhi ba/_/thams cad kun na bzhugs pa'o/_/rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa yi/_/de lta'i nyin mo bdag gis bshad/_/mtshams ni gnyis ka phrad pa ste/_/rdo rje pad+ma nyi zla 'byung /_/lte ba gnyis ka phrad pa ni/_/phra ltar 
[\[70a.3\]]skad cig mtshan nyid do/_/nyon mongs las grol mtshams yin te/_/rnam pa med pa mchog gi mchog_/sbyor gnyis dbus na yod pa ste/_/byug pa dang ni sred pa med/_/de mtshams sems can thams cad kyi/_/'khor ba'i lam rab dag par byed/_/shar ni mchog tu grags pa ste/_/dga' bral la 
[\[70a.4\]]sogs dang bral ba/_/mdud pa'i rtse mo mchog gi gnas/_/tsa na ka yi rus rnams gzugs/_/de yi kha ni gnyis yod do/_/shar ni zla ba'i bdag por shes/_/zla ba gyen du 'gro ba'i phyir/_/zla ba'i thig le mnyam par grags/_/thig le bzhir gyes bstan pa'o/_/thog ma tha ma'i dbus gnas na/_/
[\[70a.5\]]bzhi ba gang na'ang med pa'o/_/rang rig pa yi bdag nyid phyir/_/de bas brjod du med pa'o/_/de ni gsang bar bstan pa ste/_/shar ba'i don ni 'dus pa'o/_/nyon cig lha mo bde sbyin ma/_/nub pa'i yang dag bdag gis bstan/_/gang tshe sems ni nub pa na/_/sngar ni zla ba'i rnam par 'gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[70a.6\]]nub pa'i gnas su 'gro/_/mi 'gro ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe thog ma tha mar 'gro/_/de tshe nub par bstan pa'o/_/tha ma nub par bstan pa ni/_/rten pa'i gnas la rten med gnas/_/rten pa yis ni mchog bde la/_/rten med bde ba ga la yod/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las srog dang mtshan 
[\[70a.7\]]mo dang /_nyin mo dang mtshams dang /_shar ba dang nub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//rtsa yi 'byung ba thog mar bstan/_/dus ni nyon cig bdag gis bshad/_/dus ni tshod ces bstan pa ste/_/dus la bye brag gnyis su dbye/_/dus ni bsam du med pa dang /_/shin tu'i dus ni dus yin no/_/shin 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]tu dus dang ngan dus dang /_/sna yi 'phar ma bu ga gnyis/_/'ong ba de ni bzang dus bstan/_/'gro ba bzang min dus su bshad/_/bzang ba min dus chad ces bya/_/bzang ba de ni mchog tu dran/_/gnyi ga dang bral de kho nyid/_/de ni sngar med 'di ru 'dus/_/lta ba med dang blta ru med/_/mtshan 
[\[70b.2\]]ngan thams cad dang bral lo/_/de lta'i dus ni bdag gis gzhan/_/zhal bzang yang dag bshad pa yin/_/de yi dus su gzhan du yid/_/rnal 'byor pa de mi bgyid na/_/dam tshig dbang mo bdag ji ltar/_/gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/_/A li kA li gang nas 'byung /_/nyon 
[\[70b.3\]]cig de ni bdag gis bshad/_/yang dag dri med gnas nas 'byung /_/snang ba mched pa'i gzugs can no/_/dpe byad sum cu gsum dang ldan/_/kA li'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal/_/snang ba mched pa'i gnas nas te/_/snang ba de ni gsal bar 'byung /_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ldan/_/rgyas 
[\[70b.4\]]pa A li'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yis/_/dal bus ro chen skye bar 'gyur/_/mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam pa ni/_/bde ba chen po'i bde ba'i gnas/_/rig ma'i sna rtse'i gnas na bzhugs/_/chu skye 'khor lo drug gsal byed/_/de yi reg bya bde sbyin pa/_/ro chen brgyad ni shes par 
[\[70b.5\]]bya/_/'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs/_/skad 'gag pa dang mdog gsal dang /_/kha dog 'gyur zhing mchi ma myos/_/de ni snying po'i ro brgyad do/_/ro yis dgug byas dga' ba rnams/_/shin tu bzang po skye bar 'gyur/_/dga' dang mchog gi dga' ba dang /_/dga' bral lhan skyes de bzhin no/_/
[\[70b.6\]]dga' ba zhes bya snang ba yin/_/mchog dga' snang ba mched par bstan/_/dga' bral snang ba thob ces bya/_/lhan skyes de ni yang dag 'od/_/de yi dus na skad cig skye/_/sna tshogs la sogs mtshan nyid do/_/snang ba zla ba zhes su bstan/_/snang ba mched pa nyi ma'o/_/mtshams ni snang ba thob par 
[\[70b.7\]]grags/_/gsum dang bral ba yang dag 'od/_/gang che mdud pa'i nang du sems/_/de tshe dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mdud pa'i mtshams nas nas gsum tsam/_/mchog gi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gsum gyi gnas nas gsum du 'gro/_/dga' bral 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gang zhig 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gsum dang gsum spangs pa/_/de kho na nyid rang bzhin shar/_/de ni gsang ba chen po'i mchog_/gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag mchog_/'dus pa la sogs rgyud rnams su/_/legs dgyes dbang mo sbas pa bya/_/sdom pa'am ni kye'i rdo rje/_/der yang gsal bar ma byas so/_/
[\[71a.2\]]khyod kyi ngor mdzad mchog de ni/_/gsang chen bdag gis gsal bar byas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/gzhan ma shi med kun nyon mongs/_/de lta'i mchog gi de kho na/_/bdag min na ni de mi shes/_/gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings grags pa/_/de nyid nyon cig bdag gis bshad/_/
[\[71a.3\]]nam mkha' chos kyi dbyings yin te/_/dbyings ni sa bon zhes su dran/_/chos rnams kun gyi nang na yod/_/rgyu dang mchog gi gnas yin no/_/ji ltar til la mar yod dang /_/ji ltar shing la me yod pa/_/de bzhin chos rnams kun la yang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab par ni/_/yod na yar ni 
[\[71a.4\]]mthong mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi dbyings ni b+ha gar grags/_/b+ha ga rin chen snod yin no/_/dbang phyug la sogs yon tan ldan/_/de ni b+ha gar kun tu grags/_/chos ni b+ha ga zhes byar bstan/_/dbyings ni sems su shes par dran/_/khams gsum gyi ni mtha' yas la/_/sems ni de yi 
[\[71a.5\]]rgyu yin no/_/kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni/_/chu zla lta bu mthong bar 'gyur/_/don dam de ni mthong ba med/_/mthong med ma yin dngos med min/_/rang rig pa ni mchog zhi ba/_/dngos dang dngos med dang bral ba/_/de ni mchog gi de kho na/_/chos kyi dbyings bdag zhi ba'o/_/dpal 
[\[71a.6\]]phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las A li kA li 'byung ba dang dus kyi mtshan nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//gzhan yang nyon cig bdag gis bshad/_/ji bzhin rdo rje'i mtshan nyid can/_/mi phyed rdo rje zhes su bstan/_/ye shes lnga yi bdag 
[\[71a.7\]]nyid mchog_/nam mkha' lnga yi dbus su thim/_/nam mkha' lnga yi bdag nyid do/_/pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang na bzhugs/_/thig le gcig pu yi ge med/_/rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/_/de ni rdo rjer kun tu grags/_/bdag gi sgra yi nges pa'i don/_/nyon cig bdag gis de nyid bshad/_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]a ni yig 'bru gzugs kyi mchog_/thams cad kun gyi lus nang yod/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ni rdzogs/_/kun yod ma skyes thams cad mkhyen/_/rtag tu stong pa thams cad khyab/_/thams cad sun gcig byed pa'i rgyu/_/srid pa srid mchog nyin mo ni/_/sprul pa'i sku yi bde ba'o/_/
[\[71b.2\]]lus ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs sbyin/_/thams cad don ni byed nus pa'o/_/ha~M gi yig 'bru gzugs dang bral/_/lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o/_/rnam pa kun las rnam par grol/_/byad gzugs dpe byad kun dang bral/_/dngos po dngos min rnam par grol/_/skye dang 'jig pa'i byed pa 
[\[71b.3\]]po/_/dngos po thams cad nub pa po/_/chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin can/_/sems ni rdo rje 'dzin skyabs sbyin/_/yi ge thams cad dang bral la/_/stong pa'i rnam pa mya ngan 'das/_/ye shes sku yi rang bzhin can/_/dri med brjod med zhi ba ste/_/de ni ha~M du kun tu grub/_/bdag ni thams cad kun gyi 
[\[71b.4\]]nang /_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid la/_/de ni khyab par yod pa ste/_/bdag ni med na 'gro ba kun/_/ji ltar rtsa bcad shing bzhin no/_/ha~M gi yig 'bru mtshams kyi mthar/_/a ni yig 'bru mgo bo'i rtser/_/a ni yig 'bru zla ba dag_/ha~M gi yig 'bru 
[\[71b.5\]]nyi ma'i 'od/_/a ni yig 'bru rten yin te/_/ha~M gi yig 'bru brten pa'o/_/a yi yig 'bru srog ces bshad/_/ha~M gi yig 'bru rtsol par dran/_/gang zhig gnas su de gnyis sbyar/_/de ni bdag nyid gsal bar 'gyur/_/rgyud rnams kun las rnyed dka' ba/_/de ni yang dag bdag sgrar bshad/_/
[\[71b.6\]]dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rdo rje'i mtshan nyid dang /_bdag sgra'i nges pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//gsang ba'i don ni bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba zhes bya ci zhes brjod/_/gsang ba zhes bya dga' bar bstan/_/mchog ces bya ba mchog yin no/_/dgyes pa zhes bya dga' 
[\[71b.7\]]bral bstan/_/thams cad bdag nyid lhan skyes dran/_/gsang ba nyid ni gsang ba yin/_/gsang ba khu bar bstan pa'o/_/khu ba srog ces bstan pa ste/_/srog ni rten du dran pa'o/_/rten ni sar ni shes par bya/_/khams gsum kun ni 'byung ba'o/_/mchog ni chu zhes bstan pa ste/_/chu ni srog 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]gi tshe yin no/_/chad la de ni 'od ces bstan/_/'od ni rnam par dag ces dran/_/rnam par dag pa bde chen dngos/_/de ni rang bzhin bstan pa'o/_/rnam par dag pa 'byung min gnas/_/babs pa rnam dag brjod pa yin/_/babs pa dngos min zhes byar bstan/_/dngos min rnam dag 
[\[72a.2\]]brjod ma yin/_/rnam dag phra ba'i phra mo ste/_/phra mo'i rnam dag gzhan na gnas/_/phra mo'i rang bzhin zhes byar bstan/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/rang dngos bde ba chen po ni/_/ye shes rlung du rab tu grags/_/de ni nam mkha' zhes su bshad/_/nam mkha' stong par bstan pa'o/_/stong pa 
[\[72a.3\]]las ni thams cad 'byung /_/stong pa'i nang du thams cad thim/_/stong pa yang dag dri med gnas/_/rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba/_/mchog gi rnam pa skye med dag_/rang dga' nyams su myong ba dngos/_/de ni rang bzhin zhes su bshad/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/rigs 
[\[72a.4\]]lnga yi ni mtshan nyid de/_/nyon cig bdag gis bshad par bya/_/rigs ni ka pA la zhes brjod/_/ka pA la ni ka ru bshad/_/ka ni rtsa ba zhes byar grags/_/rtsa ba bye brag lnga ru dran/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi sku/_/de ni phung po lnga zhes dran/_/phung po lnga ni grub pa'i sku/_/'byung ba lnga yi 
[\[72a.5\]]rang bzhin can/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang /_/dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba la/_/lnga la khyab pa gcig pu ste/_/bdag ni don dam pa yi pha/_/thams cad khyab pa'i stong chen po/_/bdag ni 'pho med ma skyes pa'o/_/ka ni gang zhig thugs rje 'thung /_/pA ni dam tshig skyong ba yin/_/la ni 
[\[72a.6\]]ngan 'gro'i pha rol phyin/_/de ni ka pA la ru bshad/_/ka yi sgra ni rang bzhin yin/_/ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o/_/dngos po thams cad khyab pa'o/_/de ni ka zhes bstan pa'o/_/de bdag he ru ka yi dngos/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas na bzhugs/_/rtag tu zhi ba longs spyod 'khor/_/dbang 
[\[72a.7\]]phyug bde chen 'khor lo'o/_/drag po lte ba'i 'khor lor gnas/_/khyab 'jug me yi 'khor lo'o/_/tshangs pa rlung gi 'khor lor te/_/rlung ni thams cad nang yod tshe/_/bdag ni 'khor lo drug gi dbus/_/kun la de ni khyab par bzhugs/_/stong nyid gzhan mchog stong pa nyid/_/bdag dpal 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]he ru ka yi mchog_/mkha' 'gro lnga yi gtso bo ste/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag_/'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can/_/mkha' 'gro ma yis kun du bskor/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las/_gsang ba dang dga' ba bzhi dang /_rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste 
[\[72b.2\]]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i brda ni rab yin te/_/rna cha gdu bu 'khor lo dang /_/mgul do de bzhin thal ba dang /_/tshangs pa'i skud pa phyag rgya drug_/pha rol phyin drug dran pa'o/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/bsam gtan shes 
[\[72b.3\]]rab drug yin no/_/sbyin pa chos zhes bstan pa ste/_/tshul khrims las zhes dran pa'o/_/bzod pa dam tshig ces su dran/_/brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes par bya/_/bsam gtan ye shes zhes byar dran/_/shes rab ces bya phyag rgya che/_/don dam par ni shes par bya/_/skye mched drug ni dag 
[\[72b.4\]]par bya/_/phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/_/rigs drug rim par shes par bya/_/lha mo'i bdag nyid phyag rgya drug_/ya~M ra~M la~M ba~M a~M ha~M ste/_/lha mo yi ni rim pas so/_/de ru mchod pa rab tu bya/_/mchod pa ro mnyam rim pa'o/_/thim dang longs spyod dbang gis ni/_/gnas kun gyi ni de bzhin no/_/
[\[72b.5\]]gtum mo btso blag Do ma bi dang /_/gar mkhan thod pa bram ze mo/_/gtum mo pad+ma'i rigs yin te/_/btso blag rin chen rigs su dran/_/Dom bi rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya/_/gar mkhan ral gri'i rigs su dran/_/thod pa can ni 'khor lo'i rigs/_/de lnga dag pa phyag rgya'o/_/ye shes phyag rgya bram 
[\[72b.6\]]ze mo/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su dran/_/bram ze mo ni ma yin te/_/thod pa ma ni sring mor dran/_/gar mkhan bu mor shes par bya/_/Dom bi chung mar rab tu grags/_/btso blag mkhan ni mna' ma yin/_/gtum mo sgyug mor dran pa'o/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/rtog pa med pas mchod 
[\[72b.7\]]par bya/_rnam rtog med pas dngos grub 'grub/_/ji ltar bsnyen pa skad cig gis/_/ma ni sems zhes bstan pa ste/_/gsung ni 'di ru sring mor dran/_/bu mo sku ru rnam par grags/_/chung ma srog ces bya bar dran/_/mna' ma rtsol bar dran pa ste/_/sgyug mo mnyam par dran pa'o/_/ma ni mthu yi rtsa 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]yin te/_/sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod/_/sring mo khu ba'i rtsa yin te/_/mchog ma'i gnas na yod pa'o/_/bu mo khrag gi rtsa yin te/_/khu ba'i rtsa yi 'og na yod/_/chung ma dri chu'i rtsa yin te/_/gnyis kyi bar na yod pa'o/_/mna' ma mchi ma'i rtsa yin te/_/mgrin pa'i gnas na yod 
[\[73a.2\]]pa'o/_/sgyug mo snabs kyi rtsa yin te/_/dpral ba'i gnas na yod pa'o/_/ma ni sa ru shes par bya/_/sring mo chu ru dran pa'o/_/bu mo me ni yin par dran/_/chung ma rlung du rab tu grags/_/mna' ma de ni nam mkha' ste/_/sgyug mo nam mkha' ma yin no/_/ma ni mngar ba yin par 'gyur/_/sring mo de ni 
[\[73a.3\]]skyur bar dran/_/bu mo kha bar shes bya ste/_/chung ma lan tshwar 'di ru dran/_/tsha ba de ni mna' ma ste/_/sgyug mo bska bar dran pa'o/_/de rnams 'bad pas mchod par bya/_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba/_/phyag rgya'i rigs su bdag gis bshad/_/dpal 
[\[73a.4\]]phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las phyag rgya'i brda dang mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni/_/phyi dang nang ni bdag gis bstan/_/sa rdo la sogs mchod rten la/_/nam yang de la phyag mi bya/_/rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rnams/_/nam yang de 
[\[73a.5\]]ni mi bya'o/_/dri chen rdor chu sa bon sogs/_/rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/'gro dang mi 'gro gang zhig ni/_/de ni thams cad sems yin no/_/de yi gzugs grub sems ma yin/_/sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin no/_/ngo bo nyid bral stong pa ste/_/de bas 'gro ba sems su grub/_/de lta bu yi 
[\[73a.6\]]dag byas na/_/rtsa sogs la yang mchod pa bya/_/nyid ni mnga' bdag rdo rje sems/_/sems ni bdag nyid dran pa'o/_/sems ma yin pa lha yi dngos/_/phyi rol gzhan ma med pa'o/_/de ltar shes nas bdag nyid ni/_/dang po de nyid mchod par bya/_/rigs lnga dag tu kun spyod pa/_/rigs gcig 
[\[73a.7\]]tu ni rnam par brtag_/byams dang sdang ba'i bye brag dang /_/btung dang mi btung spang bar bya/_/bud med gang yang snod min med/_/dge dang mi dge smra mi bya/_/dngos grub rnal 'byor med pa dang /_/sngags med sngags pa med par ni/_/dngos grub chen po thob 'dod na/_/de lta bu yi sems mi 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bya/_/rlabs che gting ring yang dag pa'i/_/skyes bu chen pos sems de bya/_/nyan thos rnams dang mnyam pa'i sems/_/nam yang de ltar mi bya'o/_/brtan med nyan thos skal ldan min/_/log pa'i mun pas ye shes g.yogs/_/de rnams la ni gtam tsam yang /_/skyes bu chen 
[\[73b.2\]]pos mi sbyin no/_/smad par yang ni yong mi bya/_/de la nam yang phyag mi bya/_/phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yi/_/'di ru gnas ni bdag gis bshad/_/rdo rje'i gnas ni u rgyan dang /_/gnas ni dzA lan d+har ra dran/_/gnas ni pUl+li ra ma dang /_/gnas ne kA ma rU pa'o/_/nye ba'i gnas ni mA la ra bstan/_/sin 
[\[73b.3\]]d+hu na gar sing g+ha la/_/zhing ni mu~M mu ni ru grags/_/de bzhin de wi koT dang /_/nye ba'i zhing ni ku lu ta/_/ar bu dar ni de bzhin dran/_/ha re ke la ts+tshan do har/_/go dA ba ri de bzhin no/_/lam pa ka dang kI tsiste/_/nye ba'i ts+tshan dong bstan pa'o/_/'dus pa de ni kar mar te/_/de bzhin du ni gser 
[\[73b.4\]]gling ngo /_/kong ka dang ni bin d+ha ste/_/nye ba'i 'dus par dran pa'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dus pa'i dur khrod dang /_/dur khrod rgya mtsho'i ngogs su'o/_/nye ba'i dur khrod tsa ri tra/_/de bzhin kau mAr pa ra'o/_/ka smIr pi la wa ru grags/_/de bzhin ke rad yul yin no/_/nye ba'i pi la ne pa la/_/nye ba'i pi la 
[\[73b.5\]]kar no ja/_/u Di yan spyi bo'i gnas/_/dzA lan d+ha ra sbyi gdug dran/_/pUl+lir ni mtshog ma ste/_/kA ma rU ni smin phrag dbus/_/mA la ba ni sna rtse ste/_/sin d+hu mig gnyis yin par grags/_/na gar rna ba gnyis su dran/_/sing g+ha mkha' yi pad mar gnas/_/mumU ni ni ko sko'o/_/de bI ko Ta 
[\[73b.6\]]mgrin gling du/_/ku lu ta ni rgyab gling du/_/ar bu da ni nu gnyis su/_/ha ri ke la snying ga'o/_/gong dA ba ri lte ba'i gnas/_/lam pa ka ni gsang bar ro/_/kA~M tsi ling ga'i dbus su gnas/_/kar ma ling ka'i rtse mor ro/_/gser gling gzhang kha'i gnas su ste/_/kong ka na ni brla gnyis dran/_/pin 
[\[73b.7\]]d+ha pus mo gnyis yin no/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dus pa byin pa ste/_/rkang bo la gnyis su rgya mtsho ngogs/_/kau mA rI ni mthe bong ste/_/tsA ri tra ni sor mor ro/_/kha che'i yul ni lus rnams kun/_/ker ta ni rkang mthil lo/_/ne pa la ni ltag pa ste/_/ka pi dzi ni rked pa'o/_/de ni don dam pa yi gnas/_/ri bong can 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'od me tog dang /_/me tog dmar po nyi mnyam gyis/_/mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya/_/srog gcod pa yi mchod sbyin ni/_/'bad pas de ru dbul bar bya/_/pad ma chen po'i mtsho gnas su/_/srog ni gcad par bya ba'o/_/chad pa nam yang mi bya ste/_/de la brtson 'grus 
[\[74a.2\]]chen po bya/_/srog gcod pa yi bsod nams bya/_/mchog gi mchog ni yang dag rnyed/_/gru gsum dri med dag par ni/_/de ru dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gnyis/_/nang gi 'phar mar dpal bcom ldan/_/byang chub sems nyid ldan pa'o/_/phyi rol rigs gsum rnal 'byor ma/_/'dzin ma la 
[\[74a.3\]]sogs mchog chen no/_/lus kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i phyir/_/de ni lha mo zhes su bstan/_/dkyil 'khor lus su bstan pa dang /_/b+hag dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/_/dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi ni sems/_/dkyil 'khor gsum ni rtogs pa'o/_/dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus gnas 
[\[74a.4\]]su/_/dkyil 'khor gsum ni bsgom pa'o/_/dbugs 'byung dur khrod ces su bshad/_/sgo dgu dang ni ldan pa'o/_/yang dag nyon cig zhal bzang mo/_/de yi 'byung ba bdag gis bshad/_/gtum drag gzhang kha'i dbyibs can ni/_/gsang ba'i tshang tshing kha ru'o/_/'bar ba zhes bya'i 
[\[74a.5\]]dur khrod ni/_/sna yi bu ga gnyis na gnas/_/dmyal sogs de bzhin mi bzad pa/_/mig gnyis la ni gnas pa'o/_/ha ha rgod dang g.yer kha can/_/rna ba gnyis la gnas pa'o/_/dur khrod re re'i shing re ni/_/dbang byed pa ni de na yod/_/gtum drag pa ta la yi shing /_/dbyibs can nang na shi 
[\[74a.6\]]ka ra'o/_/tshang tshing sa li shing yin no/_/'bar ba zhes bya so ri sha'o/_/dmyal sogs u dum bA ra ste/_/mi bzad pa ni pa ta'i shing /_/ha ha rgod na a shwat+tha/_/g.yer kha'i nang na ge sar shing /_/shing gi rnam pa brtsa brgyad ni/_/yan lag mang po yod pa'o/_/gzhang mthu rtse me mthus byed 
[\[74a.7\]]ma/_/ri yi rtse mo ro lus ma/_/nam mkha' ma dang char sbyin ma/_/rul pa ma dang ltogs ma ste/_/bye brag brgyad du gyes par dran/_/shing gi sgra ni rtsa yin te/_/shing ni me tog yod phyir ro/_/mchog gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/me tog med na ji ltar mchod/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]thig le las/_dkyil 'khor dang /_lha mo dang /_gnas dang /_dur khrod dang /_shing dang /_mchod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//nyon mongs thams cad med byed pa/_/nyon cig sbyin sreg bdag gis bshad/_/lte ba'i gnas na tshul yod pa/_/tshul gyis mtha' na gsang pad do/_/de ru rang 
[\[74b.2\]]'bar gyi ni rlung /_/bskor ba byas nas ngal so ste/_/dbang po gnyis shing sbyor ba yis/_/rlung gis me ni sbar ba'o/_/mar yod pa ni steng 'khor lo/_/de ni mar snod ces su dran/_/ha ni blugs gzar zhes su bshad/_/dgang gzar 'di ru rdo rjer bstan/_/ho ma khung b+ha ga zhes su bshad/_/'bru ni dbang po 
[\[74b.3\]]lnga ru dran/_/yam shing phung po zhes byar bstan/_/byang chub sems ni mar du bsreg_/mar ngo yi ni man chad du/_/nya la thug nas gshegs su gsol/_/thig pa phyed tsam dgang gzar las/_/hom khung phyi rol yang mi bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/lha dang lha min srin po dang /_/
[\[74b.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba brgyad rnams la/_/bsreg bya yis ni rab tshim bya/_/mchod pa gang zhig rdor sems la/_/bsreg rdzas gang bas dbul bar bya/_/hU~M phaT rnam pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/mkhas pas bsreg rdzas sbyin par bya/_/de yis mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang /_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma mo mnyes/_/
[\[74b.5\]]gang zhig yid la ci bsams pa/_/dngos grub chen po mtha' yas ster/_/re ba thams cad 'grub byed pa/_/de lta'i sbyin sreg bdag gis bshad/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las don dam pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga'i rab/_/
[\[74b.6\]]mdor bsdus pa ni bdag gis bshad/_/rnam snang mi bskyod don yod grub/_/dpag med rin 'byung zhes lngar bstan/_/rin chen 'byung ldan khrag ces bstan/_/snang ba mtha' yas khu par brjod/_/don yod grub pa sha chen te/_/mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje chu'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad dri chen bshad/_/de ni 
[\[74b.7\]]bdud rtsi lnga yin no/_/dben dang mi med dgyes pa yi/_/gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i/_/de ru khang pa rab tu bya/_/nyis brtsegs dang ni sgo dang ldan/_/gcig ni sa yi 'og tu bya/_/de yi steng ni gnyis pa'o/_/'jig rten pa yis gcig tu shes/_/de ltar mkhas pas khang par bya/_/re zhig bsgrub 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]dbang skal ldan pa/_/thos pa che zhing ser sna med/_/snying rje chen po'i rlan dang ldan/_/zhe sdang phrag dog bral ba dang /_/dpa' ba che dang rlabs che ba/_/sgrub pa'i grogs dang de bzhin te/_/'dod chags dang bral gnyis med pa/_/ser sna med cing brtson 'grus ldan/_/khro ba med cing 
[\[75a.2\]]dpa' chen po/_/bla ma la gus thos pa che/_/'bras bu gsum la sogs pas lus/_/dang por yang dag des dag bya/_/de nas sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig_/sum b+ha'i sngags ni gsal bar bzlas/_/oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM gr-i h+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM gr-ih+NA ba ya gr-i h+NA pa ya 
[\[75a.3\]]hUM hUM phaT/_oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ban badzra bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/_de nas yi ge gsum gyi sngags/_/sgrub pa'i dbang pos yid kyis bzlas/_/rmi lam na ni 'di ltar mthong /_/rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi 'dus/_/de yi gsung gi sbyin pa ni/_/yid 'phrog ma yi bu mo khyer/_/sems can don 
[\[75a.4\]]ni tshad med kyis/_/ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pas mdzad/_/mig mdzes bu mo rnyed pa ni/_/gzugs dang lang tsho rgyan dang ldan/_/'dod chags chen pos rgyags pa dang /_/legs dgyes rings par g.yo ba dang /_/sngo bsangs nu sra dpa' mo dang /_/rtog med pa dang thos pa che/_/de 'dra'i bu 
[\[75a.5\]]mo chen mo la/_/gang tshe zla mtshan 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de la grong pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bya/_/gang tshe ro ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de tsam de tsam rab tu bya/_/de tshe kha yi pad+ma yis/_/zhag bdun par du blang bar bya/_/shin tu gsal ba'i pad snod du/_/rin chen 'dra ba'i 
[\[75a.6\]]rak+ta bzhag_/nyi ma gsum du kha yis ni/_/dag pa'i pad rgyal gzhib bar bya/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga ni/_/yang ni rnal 'byor ba yis brtsam/_/de ru chang ni btung bar bya/_/stobs kyi sA lu bza' bar bya/_/yang na ra yi 'o ma 'am/_/yang na nam mkha'i stobs bza'o/_/mtshan 
[\[75a.7\]]mo nyin mo sbyor ba yis/_/bsrub thabs chen po dpyad par bya/_/gang tshe khu chen 'ong 'gyur bas/_/bu mo myos par gyur pa na/_/de tshe kha yis blang bar bya/_/lce la sogs pa'i gtsags bu yis/_/skyon med pa yi gnas su ni/_/pad+ma'i snod du gzhag par bya/_/brgyad dang yang na bcu bzhi 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]dang /_/yang na bcu ni mar gyi ngo /_/mdung rtse yang na ral gris bsad/_/rigs lnga'i nang na rigs gcig go/_/na tsha med dang bde ba 'grub/_/gzugs dang lang tsho ldan pa dang /_/skye ba bdun nam yang na gsum/_/sgrub pa'i grogs kyis khyer nas 'ong /_/sna tshogs mchod sbyin mchod pa yis/_/rtse 
[\[75b.2\]]gcig gis ni mchod par bya/_/de yi yan lag rab ni blang /_/pad+ma'i snod ni de la bya/_/shes rab dang ldan thabs kyis ni/_/de yi snod du chang btung bya/_/stobs chen rang nyid cung zad tsam/_/dngos grub 'grub phyir bza' bar bya/_/pad+ma'i snod du bsrubs pa las/_/cung zad 'bad de gzhag par bya/_/
[\[75b.3\]]gzhan ma sman gyis 'bad de ni/_/grogs kyi dbang pos btso bar bya/_/ra yi 'o ma ti la mar dang /_/mar ni sha ka ra dang bcas/_/kha ra la sogs mnyam pa'i cha/_/stobs ni lnga ru gyur dran pa'o/_/kha ru tsha dang tsha ba gsum/_/sug smel nA ga ge sar dang /_/dzA ti pha la dwa tsha dang /_/ga bur rim 
[\[75b.4\]]par che bar bya/_/shin tu 'jam pa'i dri med snod/_/a ga ru sogs kyis bdug bya/_/'bad de gzhan gyi snod du btso/_/bdug pa byas par gzhag par bya/_/nyi ma bdun gyi bar du ni/_/stobs chen sA lu bza' bar bya/_/de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/gang zhig mi bskyod sngar 'ong 'gyur/_/de ni 
[\[75b.5\]]pad+ma'i snod du blang /_/steng dang 'og ni mkhas pas bor/_/tho rangs cung zad tsam ni btung /_/cung zad tsam ni snod du bzhag_/shes rab thabs kyi gnyis 'byung ba/_/de yi snang mdzad 'dus pa ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis rtse gcig bya/_/rnal 'byor grogs po'i sgrub pa'o/_/'bras bu ur shing man 
[\[75b.6\]]shing dang /_/ti kar ku ta pus kar ma/_/'o ma dang ni chang ror ldan/_/rtse gcig gis ni btso ba ni/_/lcags kyi snod du btso bar bya/_/ma rnyed na ni rdza snod du/_/dag pa'i rigs kyi me tog gis/_/nyi ma bdun du bdug par bya/_/de nas snying po'i sman de ni/_/rim pas che bar blug par bya/_/li shi ga bur 
[\[75b.7\]]la ta dang /_/gla rtsi tsan+dan dzA ti dang /_/dzA ti pha la sug smel dang /_/dwa tsha tsha ba gsum dang ro/_/dkar po'i sha kar dang ldan pa'i/_/mar dang bcas nas btso bar bya/_/me ni 'jam par smin pa yis/_/grogs kyi dbang pos btso bar bya/_/a ga ru sogs kyis bdug gis/_/rdo yi snod du gzhag par 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bya/_/nyin re zhing ni zho gnyis ni/_/zhu ba yin na bza' bar bya/_/zhu ba yin na zho bzhi dang /_/de nas zho drug rtag tu bza'/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga de/_/gsang chen bdag gis bshad pa'o/_/gzhan yang yan lag lnga yi sman/_/mkhas pas de la ril bu bya/_/skyu ru ra tsam du byas te/_/
[\[76a.2\]]grib ma la ni bskam par bya/_/ras dang yan lag bkru byas nas/_/de bzhin thig le bya ba'o/_/'bad de kha la gzhag par bya/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sbos kyang bya/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang byed dang /_/drag po dregs la sogs pa yin/_/ril bu yis ni byas tsam na/_/the tshom med par 'grub 
[\[76a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las bdud rtsi lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//au rgyan gnas la sogs par ni/_/rnal 'byor ma ni 'dus pa'o/_/de yi gnas su skad smra ba/_/gsang ba'i sgra ni yod pa'o/_/nyon cig sems ni rtse gcig 
[\[76a.4\]]gis/_/de ni yang dag bdag gis bshad/_/ma da na chang ba la sha/_/ma la a tsa 'dus par dran/_/'gro ba khe Ta ro shrA ba/_/ni ra~M shu ka rus pa'i rgyan/_/phreng kha na ni 'ong ba yin/_/kun tu ru ni dbang po sbyor/_/du dur skal ldan min par bshad/_/ka lin dza ra skal ldan gzhug_/Di Na Di reg 
[\[76a.5\]]bya min par bstan/_/thod pa pad+ma b+hany+dza na/_/dri chen bzhi mnyam yin par bstan/_/dri chu gla rtsi dran pa'o/_/khu ba ga bur bstan pa ste/_/sha chen sA li dza ru dran/_/b+ha ha ka ni chu zhes bya/_/sgro ni yan lag ces byar dran/_/sha ka bzang po zhes su bshad/_/ho zhes bya ba 'grangs 
[\[76a.6\]]par bshad/_/dzeg+h+re k+Sha ba laM kar bkres/_/dbyung ma g+ha na tshogs 'khor lo/_/ka pe la ma ni gyis su gyur/_/na ga raM ni bdag byin bshad/_/b+ha ta ka ni khyod khyer 'gyur/_/a ga ni bor ba zhes su bstan/_/gsang ba rin chen zhes su dran/_/bza' ba dud du shes par bya/_/sha dag 
[\[76a.7\]]bza' ba min du dran/_/dag pa zhes bya sngags su bshad/_/dag pa min pa nyi mar brjod/_/ra pa tshangs pa grags pa ste/_/rgyal rigs lus su bstan pa'o/_/chags bral rje zhes bstan pa ste/_/chags pa dmangs rigs zhes byar dran/_/tsaN+Da lI ni gzhu zhes bshad/_/shwa pa tsa na 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mda' ru bshad/_/tsar ma ka ra srid 'khor lo/_/puk+ka sI ni ral grir bstan/_/'da' ba ka ni stong zhes bshad/_/ha ri ka ni tha la bar bshad/_/ra tsa rgya mtsho zhes su bshad/_/mi na~M shi bar bstan pa'o/_/rgyas pa phag ces bya bar dran/_/phag ni bram zer bstan pa'o/_/nya ni pa la sha zhes bstan/_/
[\[76b.2\]]ra ni nyin mor bstan pa'o/_/lug ni mtshan mor shes par bya/_/bya la sogs pa nyi ma phyed/_/me tog gser ni zhes su bstan/_/spos ni shar du la ru brjod/_/dri ni ma la ti ru bshad/_/me mar sha ko ni kar dran/_/gos ni ka shi ka ru bshad/_/bde ba kA ma la ru bstan/_/dpral ba chu zhes bya bar 
[\[76b.3\]]brjod/_/smin ma phreng ba zhes su dran/_/mig ni ut+pal shes par bya/_/so ni a da na ru bstan/_/mchu ni pa la wa ru shes/_/mgrin pa gling bur bstan pa'o/_/phung po nga ba zhes su bstan/_/lag ngar myu gur bstan pa'o/_/lag pa mtsho skyes bstan par grags/_/nu ma dpal 'bras brjod pa'o/_/
[\[76b.4\]]dbus ni ri 'byung shes par bya/_/lte ba ma da na ru bstan/_/brla ni ka tam pa ru grags/_/pad+ma ja ga na ru dran/_/byin pa dza na bi ru brjod/_/rkang pa a tsa shi rar dran/_/sen mo yan lag ge sar rab/_/sna ni ma da sha ba ri/_/stan ni sha ta ku sum ste/_/nus pa bu ni zhes su dran/_/mi nus 
[\[76b.5\]]pa ni pad+ma'i sdong /_/thams cad ming gis rdza mar dran/_/gzhon nu rdzing zhes bya bar grags/_/'bar ma mtsho zhes bya bar dran/_/rgan po rgya mtsho zhes par dran/_/myong ba mi smra zhes su 'gyur/_/myong ba ma yin gsal bar dran/_/mi smra [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhes su brjod/_/glu ni bag chags zhes su 
[\[76b.6\]]bshad/_/gar ni grogs po zhes par dran/_/sgra ni tshul 'chos zhes su bshad/_/reg bya zhags pa zhes su dran/_/ro ni sgeg po zhes su bstan/_/gzugs ni ri zhes brjod pa'o/_/gsod pa sgra ni zhes su brjod/_/tshe ni phug ron dran pa'o/_/grong ni tA la'i me tog ste/_/grong khyer 'bras bu yin 
[\[76b.7\]]par brjod/_/ljongs ni 'dod pa zhes byar bstan/_/'dod pa srog ces bya bar dran/_/mi shes de ni 'dul bar dran/_/shes pa spang bar shes par bya/_/rgod pa zhes bya byis par bstan/_/du ba khrag tu dran pa'o/_/nyin mo gzhon nur shes par bya/_/mtshan mo bu mor rab tu grags/_/mtshams ni 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bud med shes par bya/_/nyin phyed bran du bstan pa'o/_/'dus pa yi ni dbus gnas su/_/rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu brjod/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa'i gnas su gsang ba'i skad bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[77a.2\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/yan lag phyag rgya sogs mtshan nyid/_/gang zhig sor mo gcig ni ston/_/bsnyun rmed pa zhes spyan 'dren no/_/sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/_/legs par bsnyun lan ljon pa yin/_/gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/_/de la srin lag bstan par bya/_/gang 
[\[77a.3\]]zhig srin lag ston byed pa/_/de la lce ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig gzhibs pa ston byed pa/_/de la rtse gsum bstan par bya/_/gang zhig gtsug phud ston byed pa/_/de la mtshog ma bstan par bya/_/gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/_/de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya/_/gang zhig 
[\[77a.4\]]ltag khung ston byed pa/_/de la sa gzhi bstan par bya/_/gang zhig lag gnyis ston byed pa/_/de la lag ngar bstan par bya/_/gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/_/de la lto ba bstan par bya/_/gang zhig ma mchu ston byed pa/_/de la kos ko bstan par bya/_/gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/_/
[\[77a.5\]]de la lce ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/_/de la kos khur bstan par bya/_/gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa/_/de la lte ba bstan par bya/_/gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/_/de la ling ga bstan par bya/_/gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/_/de la gzhang ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig 
[\[77a.6\]]rkang pa ston byed pa/_/de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/_/gang zhig sor mo ston byed pa/_/de la sen mo bstan par bya/_/gang zhig gtsang po ston byed pa/_/de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/_/gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/_/de la nyi ma bstan par bya/_/gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/_/de la nam 
[\[77a.7\]]mkha' bstan par bya/_/gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/_/de la mtshams ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/_/de la mchu ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/_/de la kha ni bstan par bya/_/gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/_/de la rgyab ni bstan par bya/_/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'di ni thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i/_/yan lag rgya sogs mtshan nyid do/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi yan lag gi phyag rgya la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gzugs dang rtags sogs mtshan nyid 
[\[77b.2\]]ni/_/dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang /_/pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong /_/lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang /_/zhen pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/_/sen mo dmar po pad+ma 'dra/_/mig ni nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan/_/de la khyim na pad+ma yod/_/rtag tu mchod pa'i cho ga byed/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang 
[\[77b.3\]]phyug rigs/_/pad+ma'i gtso mor de shes bya/_/smin mtshams bar na rtse gsum yod/_/lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang /_/de yi khyim na rdo rje yod/_/tang ku dmar pos mchod par bya/_/he ru ka dpal rigs 'byung ba'i/_/kun gyi ma mor shes par bya/_/rtse gsum gang gi dpral ba'am/_/yang 
[\[77b.4\]]na shag ti gsal 'gyur ba/_/mig dmar gdong ni dmar ba dang /_/de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/_/rtag tu phug ron la rtsed rtse/_/de bzhin khyi dang khyim bya'o/_/de yi khyim du rdo rje'i mtshan/_/rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa/_/dpal ldan rdo rje'i rigs su byung /_/mkha' 'gro ma yin dpa' 
[\[77b.5\]]bo'i gces/_/sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni/_/rtag tu bar thod yod pa/_/khyim du 'khor lo 'di byed cing /_/rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/_/rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs/_/mig sman nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog_/so ni mtho ba drag mo dang /_/
[\[77b.6\]]rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang /_/mang du smra bar mi byed cing /_/khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang /_/mtshan mo byed na mchod par byed/_/rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i/_/dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/btso ma gser dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/mig mi g.yo zhing ba spu mang /_/rdo rje gang gi dpral 
[\[77b.7\]]ba'am/_/khyim du yang ni gsal 'gyur ba/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo rtag tu sgeg_/skal ldan mchog ni bden smra dang /_/mA li kA yi dri 'byung zhing /_/khyim du rdo rje mchod byed pa/_/khaN+Da ro ha'i rigs 'byung ba'i/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni ye shes rgyal/_/shin tu sha la dga' ba dang /_/mig 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]sman nag po'am nam mkha' 'dra/_/rtse gsum rnam pa phra ba ru/_/gdug pa'i las la rtag tu dga'/_/dur khrod rtag tu 'gro ba dang /_/'jigs pa med cing snying brtse med/_/de la khyim du mchod pa ni/_/chang la sogs pas mchod byed pa/_/he ru ka dpal rigs 'byung ba'i/_/
[\[78a.2\]]mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/_/sar pa sprin gyi mdog 'dra ba/_/g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dag_/de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/_/'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa/_/he ru ka dpal rigs 'byung ba'i/_/mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi/_/mdog dang mtshan ma 
[\[78a.3\]]rigs 'byung ba/_/mdor bsdus pa ni 'di ru bshad/_/rgyas par ye shes snying por ro/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_rigs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//gang zhig gzhan min bdag nyid bzhugs/_/
[\[78a.4\]]nyon cig dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang ba/_/hU~M gi rnam pa'i rnam pa can/_/bdag nyid hU~M gi dngos po yin/_/hU~M gi rnam pa las gzugs 'byung /_/mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa dag_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na bzhugs/_/nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/_/khyod dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[78a.5\]]chu skyes sngon po'i gzugs dang ldan/_/zhal bzhi spyan gsum phyag brgyad de/_/g.yas brkyang bas ni gnas na bzhugs/_/rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dang /_/mda' gzhu dag ni 'gengs pa dang /_/kha T+wA~M ga dang ka pA la/_/khrag chen po yis gang ba'o/_/bde ba'i gnas su bdag dang khyed/_/
[\[78a.6\]]legs dgyes dgyes par rol bgyid de/_/de nas dang po'i ro las ni/_/spros nas rdo rje ro langs ma/_/gzugs gnag pa la phyag bzhi ba/_/mda' gzhu lag na 'gengs pa dang /_/chu srin g.yas na thogs pa dang /_/ka pA la dang kha T+wA~M ga/_/g.yon gyi lag na thogs pa ste/_/shar 
[\[78a.7\]]gyi sgo na gnas pa ste/_/yang ni bsrub thabs sbyor ba yis/_/gnyis pa yi ni ro las ni/_/rdo rje dra ba 'phros pa ni/_/gcer bu dang ni spyan gsum pa/_/mdog dmar lag na nya thogs te/_/byang gi sgo yi gnas na bzhugs/_/yang ni ro ni gsum pa las/_/rdo rje rtse mo spros pa ni/_/
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]mdog ser lag na seng ge thogs/_/nub sgo yi ni gnas na bzhugs/_/yang ni ro ni bzhi pa las/_/rdo rje zlum po 'phros pa ni/_/mdog dkar lag na bya khyung ste/_/lho yi sgo na bzhugs pa'o/_/ro lnga de ni rnyed pa yis/_/rdo rje ska rags ma ni spros/_/rdza rnga gling bu lag na thogs/_/shar lho 
[\[78b.2\]]mtshams na gzugs gnyis pa'o/_/yang na drug pa'i 'byung ba las/_/rdo rje sor mo spro ba ni/_/rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnga chen lag na thogs/_/lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa'o/_/yang dag bdun pas rnyed pa ni/_/rdo rje rgod ma 'phro ba ste/_/rdza rnga dang ni cha lang thogs/_/nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa'o/_/ro 
[\[78b.3\]]brgyad pa ni rnyed pa yis/_/rdo rje nyi ma spros pa ni/_/ta myu ra dang ka ra thogs/_/phyag gnyis rtag tu 'dzin pa las/_/spros nas byang shar mtshams su ni/_/bdud kun bcom nas bzhugs pa'o/_/yang ni bsrub dang bsrub thabs las/_/dang po dga' ba 'byung ba yis/_/rdo rje legs dgyes 
[\[78b.4\]]'phros pa ni/_/ro yi snod ni lag na 'dzin/_/spros nas shar gyi phyogs kyi grwar/_/chos 'byung gi ni grwa na bzhugs/_/b+ha ga'i phyag rgya spyi bor ni/_/mdzub mo tshangs pa'i bu ga'i gnas/_/yang na mchog gi dga' ba las/_/rdo rje mtsho ma 'phros pa ni/_/khrag gi snod ni lag na brel/_/lho nub 
[\[78b.5\]]grwa na bzhugs pa'o/_/yang na dga' bral 'byung ba las/_/rdo rje glang chen ma 'phros pa/_/khu ba'i snod ni lag na thogs/_/nub byang phyogs kyi grwa na bzhugs/_/de rnams gnag dang ser dang dmar/_/g.yon brkyang pas ni bzhugs pa'o/_/yang ni yang dag bsrub thabs las/_/lhan cig skyes 
[\[78b.6\]]dga' 'byung ba ste/_/lhan cig skyes dga' 'dod chags che/_/me chen rab tu 'bar pa'o/_/khyo dang lhan cig de ru bdag_/rang bzhin gyis ni yongs su 'gyur/_/dngos po med par bdag mi 'gyur/_/bdag ni rang bzhin gnas su bzhugs/_/bdag gi ngo bo brjod mi nus/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis 
[\[78b.7\]]kyang rnyed dka'/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/gal te kun rdzob gzugs su rnyed/_/'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa/_/gzhan ni ma yin bdag gis khyab/_/khyod dang lhan cig kun rdzob tu/_/'byung ba'i rgyu phyir rol pa byed/_/bdag ni rol pa mi byed na/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]cad 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'di ni thams cad mi g.yo bar/_/'gro 'gyur bar ni the tshom med/_/rang bzhin las ni mchog gnas su/_/de dus bdag ni cang mi smra/_/bde chen legs dgyes mgon po bzhengs/_/rdo rje bzang dgyes bdag dga' mdzod/_/mgon po khyod min bdag ro 'dra/_/
[\[79a.2\]]thugs rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod/_/kye mgon chad pa'i stong pa'i min/_/mgon po stong pa'i rang bzhin min/_/rdo rje mtsho ma bdag dga' mdzod/_/pad+ma kha phye rol cig rol/_/a la la la a la la/_/ma la la la legs dgyes mgon/_/rdo rje glang chen ma dga' mdzod/_/khyed rang gis gsungs 
[\[79a.3\]]bdag min na/_/sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ye shes sku las oM hU~M 'dir/_/bdag dang khyod ni lhan cig bzhengs/_/'khor lo dang bcas khro sku mchog_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yan lag ldan/_/bde ba'i gnas su bdag dang khyod/_/dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su ni/_/skye ba'i rgyu yi 
[\[79a.4\]]don phyir rol/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs/_/mdog gnag pa la 'od che ba/_/dbu skra me bzhin 'bar ba dang /_/zhal ni bcu drug spyan gsum pa/_/phyag ni bcu drug ldan pa dang /_/zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi yis ni/_/bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs/_/legs dgyes dbang phyug ma 
[\[79a.5\]]khyod bcas/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag_/khyod kyang nga yi gzugs dang mnyam/_/'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa'i steng /_/gru gsum dbus su nyi ma'i gdan/_/gyen du zhabs ni gar dang ldan/_/'jigs ma dpa' mo chang 'thung ma/_/'jigs byed pho nya stobs ma dang /_/
[\[79a.6\]]rta mgrin ma dang rta rna ma/_/glang chen sna dang lto ba ma/_/me ma dang ni chu rgyun ma/_/zla ba ma dang nyi 'od ma/_/dung sna ma dang dung gtsug ma/_/dung lte ma dang stobs chen ma/_/bya rgod rgod kha hor pa ma/_/hor mig ma dang hor mgo ma/_/mig dmar skra dmar rin chen ma/_/phug ron dmar mo nag 
[\[79a.7\]]mo ma/_/ri bong ri [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]ra ma mo/_/phyag bzhi ma la sna tshogs gzugs/_/spyan gsum pa la bzhin yang 'jigs/_/phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs par ldan/_/gzhan gyis gri dang thod pa 'dzin/_/rdo rje phreng ba dpral ba ru/_/phyag rgya lnga yis yan lag brgyan/_/de lta bu yi 'khor lo 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]che/_/khyod dang bcas pa bdag gi gnas/_/gang zhig nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas/_/de ni tshogs kyi gnas su dran/_/rdor dril rin chen 'khor lo dang /_/ral gri rtse gsum mda' nyi ma/_/zla ba dgra sta Dam ru/_/gzhu dang tho ba ka pA la/_/b+hU ti'i pags pa gyen du 'phyar/_/gshin rje'i 
[\[79b.2\]]pags pa rked la dkris/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/_/khyod kyang bdag gi mdog yin no/_/thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/_/de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/_/rtsa yi 'byung ba rim pa mchog_/lha mo re re rtse re ste/_/
[\[79b.3\]]de yi bde ba bdag dang khyod/_/'dzums pa dang ni 'byed pa yis/_/rlung gis me ni khong du chud/_/yang dag pa yi dbang po'i shing /_/de yis gtum mo 'bar ba'o/_/rnam par rtog pa'i phung po'i gzugs/_/thams cad lus ni sreg pa'o/_/de yi me 'bar yang dag gis/_/bde chen 'khor lo bzhu 
[\[79b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/bzhu bas rtsa ni thams cad las/_/mchog gi bdud rtsi 'jag pa'o/_/yang ni lus ni sos 'gyur te/_/lha yi sku ni thob par 'gyur/_/de ni goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rtse gcig gis ni goms par bya/_/phyi yi phyag rgya med na yang /_/bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba yod/_/
[\[79b.5\]]blta ba tsam ni dgos pa ste/_/de bzhin thams cad thams cad min/_/phyi nas rnam par rtog pa skye/_/de la dngos grub med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mun pa'i snod rnams ni/_/mar me med na mthong mi 'gyur/_/mar mes mthong bar gyur tsam na/_/phyi nas mar me dor bar bya/_/snod 
[\[79b.6\]]ni 'bad de bsrung bya ste/_/mar mes don bya mi dgos so/_/mar me'i mtshan nyid 'di ru rtsa/_/rtsa ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/thabs ni bde ba zhes su bstan/_/bde ba ye shes zhes byar dran/_/bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin ni/_/gang zhig shes rab ma las rnyed/_/de ni shes rab ye shes 
[\[79b.7\]]dbang /_/de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/de dngos bde chen ye shes ni/_/dkyil 'khor nang du yang dag bzhugs/_/bde ba chen po gnyis su gyis/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo/_/dga' ba la sogs nyid las ni/_/bde ba gnyis gyes shes par bya/_/de yi rim pa yang dag 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]gnyis/_/dad pas nyon cig bdag gis bshad/_/snang ba reg bya sbyor ba dang /_/'gro ba de ni bzhi pa'o/_/rim pa yis ni shes par bya/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi ni/_/shes rab ma yi lta ba yis/_/gnyis ka'i 'dod chags 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[80a.2\]]dga' ba 'byung ba ste/_/rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ldan/_/gang tshe de dang lhan cig tu/_/dad pas reg bya yod gyur na/_/de tshe mchog gi dga' ba ni/_/dri ma med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yang ni dbang po gnyis phrad las/_/gang tshe de dang lhan cig sbyor/_/de yi tshe na dga' bral ni/_/
[\[80a.3\]]gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gang tshe dbang po gnyis shing las/_/yang dag pa yi me 'bar na/_/de tshe lhan cig skyes dga' ni/_/srid pa med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nu mas reg pas blta ba ni/_/'dod pa de ni dang por dga'/_/phyi nas de dngos rgyas pa ni/_/gang tshe nges par yin
