[\[80a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de tshe skad cig gis de rgyas/_/mchog gis dga' ba byed pa'o/_/gang tshe de nyid shin tu yis/_/'dod chags me ni 'bar 'gyur na/_/de tshe 'bar ba'i thig le ni/_/dga' bral dga' ba 'bab pa'o/_/rdo rje pad+ma rol byed pa/_/de bzhin dga' bral dga' ba'o/_/de ni 
[\[80a.5\]]bskyed pa'i rim pa yin/_/u ta'i ye shes dang bral lo/_/yang ni gang tshe u ta ni/_/skad cig nyid las gcig tu 'gro/_/de tshe u ta'i thig le ni/_/gsum gyi rnam par dag par 'gro/_/de nas der ni lhan cig skyes/_/rdo rje lta bu'i bde ba byed/_/de ni bcom ldan shes rab ma/_/
[\[80a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no/_/u ta'i sgras ni bde bar bstan/_/legs dgyes dbang mo de ni bdag_/de ru sbyor ba bzhi rnams ni/_/rgyas par bdag gis bshad par bya/_/'dod dang 'dar dang 'gro ba dang /_/dga' ba dang ni bzhi yin te/_/de ni dang po'i sbyor ba yin/_/de ni 
[\[80a.7\]]dga' ba'i don yin no/_/rgyas dang 'dang 'dun twa dang 'byung ba dang /_/mchog gi dga' ba bzhi yin te/_/de ni sbyor ba gnyis pa yin/_/mchog gi dga' ba'i don yin no/_/'bar dang thig le myos pa dang /_/dga' bral dang ni bzhi yin te/_/de ni sbyor ba gsum pa yin/_/dga' bral 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dga' ba'i don yin no/_/u ta dang ni tshul dang gnyid/_/lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi pa'o/_/de ni sbyor ba bzhi ba yin/_/dga' ba'i bye brag bcu drug go/_/bzhi rnams gzhan min 'di ru ni/_/rab kyi don ni 'di ltar 'gyur/_/'dod pa 'dun pa yin par bshad/_/dpal ldan shes 
[\[80b.2\]]rab mas sbul lo/_/de ni 'dun pa las ni dkrug_/rang gi yid kyis byed pa'o/_/'dod pa'i sgras ni dga' ba yin/_/mthong ba las ni byed pa'o/_/de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma/_/'dod chags chen pos rgyas pa na/_/de tshe rgyas pa yin par 'gyur/_/mchog gi dga' ba 
[\[80b.3\]]gnyis pa'o/_/rgyas pa'i dus su phyi dang nang /_/gang tshe shin tu 'bar 'gyur na/_/de tshe yan lag rab de ni/_/skad cig gis ni zhu bar 'gyur/_/da ni 'bar ba'i thig les ni/_/ming ni gsal bar gyur pa'o/_/de ni dga' bral dga' ba ste/_/gsum pa zhes bya bshad pa'o/_/yang 
[\[80b.4\]]na de nyid gtso mo ni/_/mchog gi rnam pa rab bde ba/_/de tshe u ta'i dgug pa ni/_/srid pa dang bral byed pa'o/_/de ni bzhi ba yang dag mchog_/lhan cig skyes dga' bstan pa'o/_/de ni u ta'i dgug pa ni/_/thig le'i thar pa gsum gyi mthar/_/lhan skyes kyi ni gnas su'o/_/dga' 
[\[80b.5\]]ba la sogs bye brag gis/_/lhan cig skyes rim shes par bya/_/bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas/_/smin phrag 'khor lo'i dbus yan chad/_/de tsam dga' ba'i gnas yin te/_/thig le gcig pu'i mtshan nyid do/_/smin phrag 'khor los mgrin 'khor lo/_/de tsam mchog gi dga' 
[\[80b.6\]]ba'o/_/mgrin pa'i gnas nas snying 'khor lo/_/de tsam dga' bral dga' ba'o/_/de nas yang ni rim pa yis/_/rim pa'i gnas ni rab tu bshad/_/lte ba'i 'khor nas rgyu zhabs su/_/de tsam du ni dga' ba yin/_/rgyu zhabs su ni mdud pa'i rtsar/_/de tsam mchog gi dga' ba'o/_/mdud 
[\[80b.7\]]pa'i gnas nas rin chen mkhar/_/de tsam dga' bral dga' ba'o/_/rdo rje rin chen rtse nang yod/_/lhan skyes de ni don dam pa'o/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dkyil 'khor dang /_dga' ba'i bye brag dang /_thig le'i mtshan nyid dang /_bskyed pa dang /_rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//ye shes mkha' 'gro bcom ldan 'das/_/bdag ni the tshom cung zad skyes/_/char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul/_/ye shes gang nas shes par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/tshul ni dpral ba'i 
[\[81a.2\]]gnas su ste/_/thig le mgrin pa'i gnas su bzhugs/_/char yang snying ga'i gnas su shes/_/ye shes lte ba'i gnas su bzhugs/_/rtog pa las ni rtog pa med/_/gang du phyin nas 'gro ba na/_/de ni de rnams rang bzhin gnas/_/lte ba'i gnas su rab tu grags/_/gang tshe bdud 
[\[81a.3\]]rtsi gnas su 'gro/_/de tshe ye shes zhes su dran/_/bdud rtsi byang chub sems su grags/_/tshul la sogs pa'i thig le bzhi/_/de yi gnas ni bzhi yin te/_/dga' ba'i bye brag 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dpral bar dga' ba'i thig le dang /_/mgrin par mchog tu dran pa'o/_/snying ga ru ni dga' 
[\[81a.4\]]bral te/_/lte ba ru ni lhan cig skyes/_/rtsa yi kun spyod sbyor ba yis/_/dga' ba la sogs rnyed par 'gyur/_/dpral ba'i steng na pad+ma yod/_/de yi steng na gtsug tor ro/_/de ni gsang chen ye shes te/_/rgyal ba yis kyang mi shes so/_/lte ba'i 'og gi gsum gnas su/_/de yi steng du rgyu 
[\[81a.5\]]zhabs so/_/gsum dngos 'og gi lte ba'i dbyibs/_/de ru rdo rje byad gzugs gsal/_/gsum dngos gnas na rtsa rnams kyi/_/yang dag mchog gi gnas yin no/_/ro ma 'dzin ma gnyis yin te/_/gsum pa de ni rtog med na/_/rtog med de ni gcig pu ste/_/kun rdzob tu ni gsum du 'gyur/_/
[\[81a.6\]]de ni gcig tu lu gu rgyud/_/ji ltar sbrul 'khyil bzhin du'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/rtsa ni bye brag gsum du 'gyur/_/rdo rje rtse mo thugs rdo rje/_/gsum gyi dngos po gsung yin no/_/lte ba sku zhes bya bar grags/_/de ni rdo rje gsum nges don/_/snying gar thugs kyi rdo rje ste/_/
[\[81a.7\]]mgrin pa gsung gi rdo rje'o/_/dpal bskru yi rdo rje ste/_/rgyas par bdag gis rab tu gsal/_/de yi dbus su srog yod pa/_/de bzhin du ni nye ba'i srog_/snying ga'i steng las srog gi rlung /_/lte ba'i 'og las gso ba'i rlung /_/gang tshe rkang mthil las gso rlung /_/gal te 'byung ba 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]yin par 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na srog gi rlung /_/gyen du lam du 'gro ba'o/_/gso rlung lte ba'i gnas su ni/_/nges pa yi ni gnas byed do/_/yang na gang tshe srog gi rlung /_/gtsug tor las ni phyir 'gro na/_/de tshe gso ba'i rlung de ni/_/rang gi gnas su 'gro ba'o/_/de ni srog gi rlung 
[\[81b.2\]]yin te/_/lte ba'i gnas su 'dug sa byed/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las tshul dang /_char yang dang /_thig le dang /_ye shes kyi gnas dang /_rtsa'i kun spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//bcom ldan de ru bdag zhu ste/_/de yi bsam gtan ji lta bu/_/kha sbyar 
[\[81b.3\]]rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/pad rnams 'dug sa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rim pa gang gis sems de ni/_/'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dris pa yang dag gsang ba ste/_/'di ni sus kyang mi shes so/_/gang gis khyod kyis gsal bar shes/_/
[\[81b.4\]]nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad/_/gang tshe legs dgyes shin tu bde/_/shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba las/_/de tshe rtog pa med pa'i lam/_/byang chub sems ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lte ba'i rtsa bar srog rlung ni/_/skad cig tsam yang mi byed na/_/gang zhig pad+ma khas sbub 
[\[81b.5\]]'di/_/skad cig gis ni gyen du 'gyur/_/de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/_/sems ni brtan par 'gyur ba'o/_/de tshe thur du 'gro mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar ma rdol snod du ni/_/chu ni 'dzag pa med par gnas/_/de bzhin nges par sems 'gyur ro/_/de ni skad cig sgom byed do/_/sangs 
[\[81b.6\]]rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'as byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan brtan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//dbang bskur ye shes mtshan nyid ni/_/bcom ldan de nyid don ni gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[81b.7\]]stsal pa/_/dbang bskur ba yi ye shes don/_/nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad/_/gzugs bzang bcu drug lon pa dang /_/sih+la ga bur yod pa yi/_/phyag rgya gcer bur byas nas ni/_/lags dgyes kyis ni mchod par bya/_/pad+ma kha sbyar sbyor bya yis/_/yang dang yang du 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'dod pa bya/_/rim pa yis ni bskyod par bya/_/khu ba ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba/_/thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa na/_/pad+ma'i nang du spang bar bya/_/legs dgyes kyi ni dbang phyug ma/_/'di ni slob dpon dbang gi rab/_/yang ni gsang ba'i dbang 'di ni/_/dad pas nyon 
[\[82a.2\]]cig bdag gis bshad/_/gang tshe gsang gnas na sems yod/_/de ni gsang bar rab tu grags/_/gsang ba pad+ma'i khu ba yin/_/mdud pa'i nang du gsang ba'o/_/de yi gnas su brtan par bya/_/sems ni nam mkha'i pad+mar min/_/thams cad rgyud las rnyed dka' ba'i/_/
[\[82a.3\]]shes rab ye shes bdag gis bshad/_/shes rab mya ngan 'das zhes bshad/_/ye shes srid pa zhes byar dran/_/'khor ba de ni mchog dga' ba/_/mya ngan 'das pa dga' bral dran/_/yang na mya ngan 'das grags pa/_/sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma'i snod/_/bud med b+ha ga'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[82a.4\]]de ni shes rab ces byar dran/_/ye shes snod ni yin par grags/_/thams cad bde ba'i mchog gi gnas/_/khu ba shes rab ces su shes/_/ye shes bde ba zhes su dran/_/dbang bskur 'od du zhu bar 'gyur/_/ye shes dus las gzhan pa'o/_/de ni 'gog pa bzhi pa ste/_/rang 
[\[82a.5\]]bzhin ye shes mtshan nyid do/_/'od dang stobs dang sprin dang tshul/_/dbugs dang ut+pal sa dang lid/_/snying po zla nyi mun pa dang /_/mchog dang sgra dang ro dang glog_/de ni bcu drug shes par bya/_/bde ba'i thig le dri med do/_/tshangs bug nas ni mgrin gnas su/_/de tsam du ni 
[\[82a.6\]]thig le bzhi/_/de yi gnas su dga' ba bzhi/_/ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o/_/mgrin pa nas ni snying gar gnas/_/yang ni de tsam bzhi yin no/_/mchog gi dga' ba'i bzhi yin te/_/ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o/_/snying ga'i gnas nas rin chen sker/_/yang ni de tsam bzhi yin no/_/
[\[82a.7\]]dga' bral dga' ba'i bzhi yin te/_/ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o/_/rin chen ske nas steng gi gnas/_/yang ni de tsam bzhi yin no/_/lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi yin te/_/ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o/_/dga' ba bcu drug thig le ste/_/zla ba'i cha ru rab tu dran/_/A li thig ler shes par 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bya/_/'khor lo bzhi yi rim pas so/_/tshangs pa yi ni zhal dang bral/_/ro dang bcas pa bdag gi zhal/_/bcu gnyis de ni nyi zhes shes/_/kA li thig ler rab tu grags/_/bcu gnyis phyed ni bde thig le/_/dga' dang mchog gi dga' bar dran/_/dga' bral dga' ba'i thig le 
[\[82b.2\]]gsum/_/rang bzhin gsum dang bral ba'o/_/yang ni thams cad bdag nyid nyid/_/bzhi po'i don ni bdag gis bshad/_/gnas bzhi la ni dbang bzhi ste/_/legs dgyes dbang mor shes par bya/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa yis/_/mdor bsdus pa ni bzhi yin te/_/sprul dang 
[\[82b.3\]]chos dang longs spyod dang /_/bde ba chen po bzhi ba'o/_/de dag sku ni bzhi yin te/_/don dam par ni shes bya'o/_/sum cu gnyis phyed rtsa nang du/_/A li thig le bcu drug go/_/gzhan byed kA li thig le ste/_/rtag tu lam nas 'bab pa'o/_/A li ye shes sems su 'gyur/_/kA 
[\[82b.4\]]li ye shes sems las 'byung /_/bde ba chen po gcig pu ste/_/kun rdzob gnyis su 'byed par 'gyur/_/shes rab rang bzhin zla ba ste/_/thabs ni nyi ma'i rang bzhin no/_/zla rgyu A li 'bras bu ste/_/A li rgyu ste zla 'bras bu/_/nyi ma rgyu ste kA li 'bras/_/kA li rgyu ste nyi 'bras bu/_/
[\[82b.5\]]nyi ma'i dbus las zla 'byung ste/_/khu ba'i gzugs ni bde chen po/_/kA li bde ba'i gsang ba'i dbang /_/A li shes rab ye shes dang /_/de gnyis dbus su bde chen po/_/rang bzhin de ltar dran pa'o/_/reg bya 'khyud pa la sogs pas/_/slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro/_/
[\[82b.6\]]dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dbang gi ye shes dang /_/A li kA li'i rgyu 'bras dang /_/zla ba 'byung ba dang /_rtsa dang /_thig le dang /_dga' ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod pa ni/_/yang ni bcom ldan bka' stsol cig_/
[\[82b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod pa ni/_/skal ba ldan ma khyod nyon cig_/zla ba gcig tu gsang ba spyod/_/yul gyi mtha' 'am yang na tshal/_/thams cad don 'grub 'gyur ba yis/_/sngags 'di rtag tu bzlas par bya/_/hA swA ka ro ro rata ta~M ba de 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rod+han lam t+ta tsi ko rad+hA ta mre rga lA na dzrA ba oM/_de nas mkha' la rnal 'byor ma/_/'dus nas bka' stsal sbyin par bya/_/bu kye bu mo 'di khyod khyer/_/spyod pa rab ni khyod kyis gyis/_/bu mo bcu drug lon pa dang /_/sih+la ga bur yod pa dang /_/ut+pal sngon po'i 
[\[83a.2\]]mdog 'dra ba/_/tsan+da nas ra ba'i dri yod cing /_/sgeg pa yi ni rgyan dang ldan/_/las rnams kun la mkhas pa'o/_/'bad de gsang ba'i gzugs su ni/_/de dang lhan cig bde bar song /_/don zin nas ni so sor ni/_/sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs nyid kyis/_/la lar 
[\[83a.3\]]'dod chags spyod pa dang /_/la lar 'dod chags bral ba'i yid/_/la lar zhi ba'i gzugs dang ni/_/la lar nga rgyal ldan pa'i yid/_/la lar na bas zos pa dang /_/la lar bde ba'i lus ni rab/_/la lar slongs mo byed pa dang /_/la lar rgyal po chen po rgyal/_/la 
[\[83a.4\]]lar gcer bu dri ma can/_/la lar dag pa gtsang sbra can/_/la lar cung zad tsam gyis 'grangs/_/la lar mang pos 'grangs par byed/_/la lar ngo tshar byed pa dang /_/la lar ngo tsha med pa'i yid/_/la lar lkugs par 'dug pa dang /_/la lar sgra chen sgrogs pa dang /_/
[\[83a.5\]]la lar dri chen za ba dang /_/la lar 'o ma 'thung bar byed/_/la lar sdig pa byed pa dang /_/la lar bsod nams chen por byed/_/la lar ngu bar byed pa dang /_/la lar dgod la gcig tu dga'/_/la lar cho long rtse ba dang /_/la lar gar ni gcig pu byed/_/la lar chang 
[\[83a.6\]]gis ra ro dang /_/la lar bram ze'i spyod pa dang /_/la lar thod pa'i spyod pa dang /_/la lar gtum pa'i bran byed dang /_/la lar chos ni ston pa dang /_/la lar chos ni nyan pa dang /_/la lar sgyu ma byed pa dang /_/la lar sgyu ma bral ba dang /_/la lar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni smra ba dang /_/la lar 
[\[83a.7\]]byis pa'i gzugs ni ston/_/la lar rgan po lo mang dang /_/la lar smad 'tshong ma yi gzugs/_/la lar 'dod pa mchog spyod dang /_/la lar ser sna yis ni 'gugs/_/la lar ser sna dang bral yid/_/la lar byol song yan lag nyid/_/la lar rnam shes med pa dang /_/la 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]lar brjod du med pa dang /_/la lar yang dag gzugs can ston/_/de ltar rnal 'byor dbang phyug ni/_/rang dbang gis ni kun tu spyod/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//bcom 
[\[83b.2\]]ldan ye shes rgya mtsho khyed/_/bdag la the tshom skyes pa mchis/_/sngar gsungs pa yi 'khor lo drug_/de yi sa bon ji lta bu/_/gang gi sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga'i/_/bza' ba dang ni spyod pa'o/_/khyod dang bdag gi snying po ni/_/ji ltar de ni nges par yod/_/sems can 
[\[83b.3\]]rnams ni bsrung don du/_/'dus pa'i gnas kyi dbus su ni/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig lha mo spyan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mo/_/'khor lo drug gi sa bon ni/_/k+Sh+liM m+la~M p+la~M dz+la~M rla~M h+la~M ni/_/dbus su re re dgod par bya/_/kha~M ra~M sha~M 
[\[83b.4\]]ba~M sa~M na~M ba~M ni/_/rlung gi 'khor lo'i sa bon drug_/bliM kliM dz+liM me 'khor lo/_/mkhas pas gru gsum dgod par bya/_/ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa/_sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/_/gnyis 
[\[83b.5\]]su byas pa'i sa bon gdab/_/trA~M hrIM U~M kha~M dang /_lA~M mA~M pA~M tA~M/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i sa bon brgyad/_/a A/_a I/_u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_a~M AH/_longs spyod 'khor lo brgyad gnyis 'di/_/g.yon skor du ni bri bar bya/_/de ni gnyis su 
[\[83b.6\]]byas pa ni/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i sa bon no/_/mnyam pa yi ni sa yi cha/_/chang la sogs pas byug pa bya/_/tsan+dan dang ni gur gum mchog_/sna tshogs mchog gi me tog dang /_/sna tshogs mchod pa la sogs kyis/_/mkhas pas sa la mchod par bya/_/bu mo 
[\[83b.7\]]yid 'phrog lha yi gzugs/_/nyi shu lon pa g.yo ba med/_/gnas ni gang du sngags rgyal btu/_/re zhig dang po de ru gzhug_/mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/rtse gcig gis ni bsnyen par bya/_/bsnyen pa'i las ni rdzogs pa dang /_/de nas sa la bsang gtor 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bya/_/slob ma de yi thig le ba/_/bu mo la yang de ltar ro/_/sha chen la sogs kyis gang ba'i/_/gtor ma phyogs bzhir gtang bar bya/_/tshogs la 'bad de mchod pa bya/_/med na yang ni 'bad pas so/_/sngags btub yi dus su na/_/'bad de bla ma mchod 
[\[84a.2\]]par bya/_/bla ma dgyes na sngags rgyal ni/_/the tshom med par thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar min na skyon yod de/_/sngags kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba yis/_/'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma bri/_/dbus su k+Sha yi sa bon ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin 
[\[84a.3\]]can/_/A li kA li mnyam sbyar nas/_/thub pa bdun ni btu bar bya/_/dang por rnam par snang mdzad bri/_/lnga ba yi ni lnga pa dang /_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/bcu drug pa yi gnyis par ldan/_/dang po yi ni dang po dang /_/me yis 'og tu brgyan pa'o/_/dbyangs yig 
[\[84a.4\]]bcu gsum pa dang ldan/_/gti mug thams cad mtshon cha'o/_/bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan/_/uSh+ma sha yi dang po dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi par ldan/_/de nas me yi sa bon dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi 
[\[84a.5\]]dang po dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa/_/thams cad kyi ni snying po bcom/_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/de nas brgyad pa'i dang po dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/yi ge mchog nyid gnas yin no/_/gsum 
[\[84a.6\]]pa yi ni dang po dang /_/de nyid kyi ni 'og tu brgyan/_/yang na de nyid bri bar bya/_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can/_/uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig 
[\[84a.7\]]gnyis pas brgyan pa'o/_/dang po yi ni dang po dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi gsum pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni dang po dang /_/dbyangs ni gnyis pas brgyan pa'o/_/dang po yi ni gsum pa dang /_/nyi shu ba yis brgyan pa'o/_/dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa/_/khro bo yi ni 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]gzugs chen che/_/uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang /_/bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/de nyid 'og tu ldan par bya/_/dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa ste/_/lha rnams kun gyi byed pa'o/_/lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan pa'o/_/brgyad pa yi ni dang 
[\[84b.2\]]po dang /_/thams cad kun gyi pha yin no/_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan pa ni/_/zla tshes thig le dang ldan pa/_/sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog_/de nyid yang ni bri bar bya/_/de nas lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang /_/gsum pa yi ni dang po 
[\[84b.3\]]dang /_/uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi par ldan/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan pa'o/_/ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/thams cad don grub mchog yin te/_/bdag gi snying po'i sngags rgyal lo/_/dbang po 
[\[84b.4\]]gzugs kyi bdag po dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/me yis 'og tu brgyan pa'o/_/bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang /_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa/_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum pas brgyan 
[\[84b.5\]]pa/_/dang po yi ni gsum pa dang /_/me yis 'og tu brgyan ldan pa/_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/ri yig 'og tu brgyan pa ni/_/dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa/_/sems can thams cad dbang du byed/_/yang na de nyid bri bar bya/_/de bzhin lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang /_/
[\[84b.6\]]gsum pa yi ni dang po dang /_/nye ba'i snying po mchog gi sngags/_/dang por rnam par snang mdzad dang /_/de nas uSh+ma'i gsum pa dang /_/dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa/_/lha rnams kyi sems gti mug byed/_/de nas me yi sa bon dang /_/de nas bzhi pa'i dang po dang /_/
[\[84b.7\]]uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang /_/de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/_/de nas rlung gi sa bon bri/_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan/_/gzhan gyi phyag rgya rab tu 'joms/_/uSh+ma yi ni dang po dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi bar ldan/_/de nas nyi ma'i sa bon dang /_/dbyangs yig gsum 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pas brgyan pa'o/_/uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa/_/zla tshes thig les brgyan pa'o/_/yang na de nyid bris pa ni/_/gzhan gyi sngags ni 'joms pa'o/_/lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/de nas gsum pa'i dang po dang /_/
[\[85a.2\]]uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi par ldan/_/dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/_/sdug bsngal thams cad med byed pa/_/ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste/_/khyod kyi 
[\[85a.3\]]snying po'i sngags rgyal lo/_/dang po lha yi bdag po dang /_/de nas dang po'i dang po dang /_/'og tu sa yig dang ldan pa/_/dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pas brgyan/_/zla tshes thig le yis ni brgyan/_/thams cad kun gyi byed pa po/_/an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa dang /_/sa yi 'og 
[\[85a.4\]]tu ldan pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pa ldan/_/zla tshes thig le yis ni brgyan/_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/sa yi yi ge 'og tu ldan/_/dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa/_/zla tshes thig les brgyan pa'o/_/lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/gsum pa 
[\[85a.5\]]yi ni dang po dang /_/swA hA tha mar ldan pa ni/_/khyod kyi nye ba'i snying po'o/_/de ni sngags kyi gsang chen po/_/su la yang ni mi sbyin te/_/lha mo de bzhin man ngag 'di/_/su la yang ni mi sbyin no/_/bye ba 'bum gyi nang nas gcig_/de ni man ngag gi ni snod/_/sngags 
[\[85a.6\]]sam yang na man ngag 'di/_/brtag par byas te de nas sbyin/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang /_/de ltar min na 'grub pa med/_/bla ma'i kha las man ngag 'di/_/legs dgyes dbang mo rnyed par 'gyur/_/bstan bcos lung las yang dag ni/_/nam yang rnyed 
[\[85a.7\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/man ngag don du bla ma mchog_/yang dang yang du zhu mi bya/_/bla ma mnyeg na yang dag nyid/_/man ngag de la sbyin par byed/_/ji ltar bu mo lang tsho bab/_/pha la zhu bar mi byed na/_/pha rang nyid kyis shes nas ni/_/da ni bu mo sbyin dus snyam/_/
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]trA~M hrIHkha~M gi sngags rgyal gyis/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni spyad par bya/_/sa chu me rlung rnams kyi ni/_/sa bon gyis ni bza' bar bya/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las 'khor lo drug gi sa bon dang /_sngags btung dang /_bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba dang /_/spyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 
[\[85b.2\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//'byung po rnams ni bsrung don du/_/nyon cig gtor ma bdag gis bshad/_/dur khrod yang na chu ngogs sam/_/yul gyi mtha' 'am yang na ni/_/shing gcig dang ni khang stong du/_/gtor ma 'bad de sbyin par bya/_/tshangs pa ma dang /_drag 
[\[85b.3\]]mo dang /_dbang phyug chen mo dang /_khyab 'jug ma dang /_phag mo dang /_mi'i seng ge mo dang /_brgya byin mo dang /_me mo dang /_chu lha mo dang /_rlung lha mo dang /_gzhon nu mo dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_mkha' lding mo dang /_sprul mo dang /_glang chen mo dang /_gshin 
[\[85b.4\]]rje mo dang /_nor sbyin mo dang /_nyi ma mo dang /_gtum mo dang /_de lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rnal 'byor bas 'dir phyag rgya 'dis dgug par bya'o/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu bsnol bar bya/_/mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel 
[\[85b.5\]]mdzub mo drang por bsgreng byas te/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis ni/_/cung zad tsam ni dgug par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_drag po chen po dang /_brjed byed rnams tshur 
[\[85b.6\]]shog tshur shog_/nya dang /_sha dang /_khrag chen po dang /_bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_mar me dang /_dri dang /_bdud rtsi lnga dang /_chang dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rngul yab kyis brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di snoms 
[\[85b.7\]]shig_/dam tshig 'di srungs shig_/bdag gi don thams cad kyi grogs gyis shig_/rgyud 'di la gang zhig dad pa yod pa de rnams bsrung ba'i don du gsol cig_/'thung shig_/rol cig_/hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_b+ha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca'/_/phyag rgya 'di yis gtor 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ma sbyin/_/rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta/_/ha ha'i sgra ni sgrogs byed cing /_/rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi/_/he ru kar ni bdag nyid bsam/_/brgya byin 'dra ba'i lha ma yin/_/mdun du byung bar gyur na yang /_/de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/_/gzhan rnams 
[\[86a.2\]]smos kyang ci zhig dgos/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las gtor ma'i las zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga ni/_/nyon cig lha mo spyan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mo/_/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa yi/_/de ru 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/
[\[86a.3\]]thams cad dam tshig gcig pa dang /_/thams cad rtog pa med pa dang /_/ser sna nga rgyal spangs pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang bral ba dang /_/bla ma la gus bsam gtan ldan/_/phrag dog med cing rtse gcig pa/_/de ltar dgyes pa tshogs 'khor lo/_/mkhas pas 
[\[86a.4\]]'bad de gzhug par bya/_/de ltar min na skyon yod de/_/'khor lo yang ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/thabs dang mnyam pa'i shes rab ma/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga yan chad spangs/_/thabs re shes rab re rer ldan/_/kun la gcig ni mi mdzes so/_/dang po yid 'phrog dgyes pa yis/_/me 
[\[86a.5\]]tog dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/de ru sna tshogs mchod pa ni/_/rtse gcig gis ni legs par bya/_/bla ma dngos po thams cad kyis/_/dad pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/tshogs pa la yang 'bad de mchod/_/mnyam nyid blta ba sems kyis so/_/ji ltar bla mas phyag rgya 'dzin/_/
[\[86a.6\]]tshogs kyis kyang ni de ltar ro/_/rtse gsum yang na ral gris bsad/_/nam phyed na ni blang bar bya/_/sna tshogs mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/_/mchod nas bla ma'i gdan bya'o/_/dbus su bdag nyid he ru kar/_/phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_/de ni bla ma zhes su bstan/_/legs 
[\[86a.7\]]dgyes dbang mo bdag nyid do/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/_/mchil ma la sogs dor mi bya/_/gtam kyang smra bar mi bya ste/_/rkang pa la sogs [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}\u0f72] bya/_/phyag rgya'i brda dang gsang ba'i skad/_/de la 'bad pas bya ba'o/_/bka' lung med na gar dang glu/_/nam 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]yang tshogs kyis mi bya'o/_/dum bu gcig pa'i mtshan ldan snod/_/bla ma'i mdun du gzhag par bya/_/yang na dum bu gsum pa ni/_/lha yi chang gis bkang bar bya/_/sna tshogs mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/_/snod de la ni mchod par bya/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lor snod gzhan 
[\[86b.2\]]ni/_/me tog rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i/_/dang por gtor ma chen po ni/_/ji ltar dga' ba med mi 'gyur/_/je mang je mang btung bar bya/_/yang dang yang du phyag bya zhing /_/phyag rgya bcings la btung bar bya/_/de nas bza' ba thams cad kun/_/dag par 
[\[86b.3\]]byas nas bza' bar bya/_/lte ba'i ri bong 'dzin dkar dang /_/rta mgrin mchog dang ldan pa dang /_/hu~M gis rdo rje dkar legs spyad/_/aHyis rab tu rtogs byas shing /_/oM kyi 'od kyis 'bar 'gyur bar/_/byin gyis brlabs nas mngon par bza'/_/rang lce pad 'dab dbus ma ru/_/hu~M byung rdo rje 
[\[86b.4\]]dkar po dgod/_/phyi nang bdag nyid thams cad kun/_/'khor lo de yis rab tshim bya/_/'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/_/'khor lo ma lus kun sbyang bya/_/dpa' bo'i lce la dpa' bo ni/_/dpa' bo'i dpa' bo dbus su'o/_/dpa' bo'i kha la dpa' bo ni/_/mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya/_/lte ba 
[\[86b.5\]]gnyis kyi dbus su ni/_/dpa' bo kun gyi mchog gi gnas/_/dpa' bo rnams kyi mchog gi don/_/dpa' bo de kun mi shes na/_/de yis tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/_/nam yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang ci de lta'i rim pa yis/_/phyi dang nang gi bya ba'o/_/de ltar byas na dngos grub 'thob/_/
[\[86b.6\]]mkha' 'gro ma yang lhan cig 'dus/_/gal te gzhan ma'i rnal 'byor ma/_/brtag pa'i don du 'ong 'gyur na/_/de la re zhig the tshom ni/_/mkhas pas nam yang mi bya'o/_/gtam ni smra bar mi bya ste/_/phyag rgyas bsnyun ni gsol bar bya/_/gang zhig de ru bla ma yis/_/gsung ba dang ni mdzad 
[\[86b.7\]]pa'ang de/_/yang na las kyi rdo rje ni/_/thams cad don kun byed pa'ang rung /_/ji ltar rdo rje sems dpas rol/_/las kyi rdo rjes de ltar ro/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ma/_/yang dang yang ni 'ong 'gyur na/_/de ru re zhig 'jigs mi bya/_/dpa' bo yi ni gzugs su spyod/_/bsdams 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa la lar byed pa na/_de la chad par ba rtogs bya/_/yang dag dga' ba byung gyur na/_/thar pa'i rgyu phyir gar bya'o/_/'on kyang rdo rje rkang pa'i gar/_/ji ltar rnal 'byor ma mnyes 'od/_/ma'am sring mo chung ma dang /_/sgyug mo dang ni mna' ma la/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/'bad 
[\[87a.2\]]de de la mchod par bya/_/de rnams mchod pas dngos grub ni/_/gang zhig sems la bsams pa yod/_/lhag ma'i gtor ma bzung nas ni/_/dgon pa chen por gtang bar bya/_/gal te de ru rnal 'byor ma/_/blta ba de ni ston byed na/_/de rnams mtshan nyid 'di lta bu/_/mkhas pas 'bad pas shes 
[\[87a.3\]]par bya/_/gang zhig bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/kun du zlum por snang 'gyur zhing /_/kha ni sma ra rtag par yod/_/spu dang smin ma ring ba dang /_/gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang /_/mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang /_/rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/_/dpa' bo'i sring mo de ni dran/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par 
[\[87a.4\]]bya/_/de bzhin rus sbal phyag rgya'o/_/pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid/_/phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya/_/de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/_/khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur/_/lA ma yi ni bud med kyi/_/mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di nyid ni/_/ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig dkyus ring /_/mig ni dmar zhing ser 
[\[87a.5\]]skya gnas/_/phyug cing skal bzang yon tan can/_/ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang /_/shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min/_/sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/_/dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing /_/mtshan ngan gyen du bltas pa las/_/rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang /_/lam ni rnam par mnan 
[\[87a.6\]]cing gnas/_/g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni/_/gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/_/de ltar rab dregs mthong na ni/_/rtse gsum phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa yis/_/gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/_/g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa/_/phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/_/
[\[87a.7\]]tshes bcu dang ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_/de yi dus tshigs yin par bstan/_/khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang /_/bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod/_/'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi/_/mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/_/gang gi ma khur tshos dag tu ni/_/khung bur snang bar gnas gyur cing /_/de bzhin 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]dmar ser lag pa dmar/_/mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang /_/skra ni de bzhin 'khyil pa dang /_/mgo la dar ni bcings pa dang /_/dpral ba la ni gsal bar ni/_/gzhu yi dngos por rab tu gnas/_/de bzhin mgrin ring sna ring ba/_/rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing /_/rgod cing glu ni len pa dang /_/lan 
[\[87b.2\]]'ga' zhig ni khro ba dang /_/sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang /_/rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/_/'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/_/shag ti'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/_/dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog pa ni/_/phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bstan/_/
[\[87b.3\]]thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang /_/rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing /_/phrag pa dag nas gos kyang 'phyang /_/de 'dra'i bud med mthong nas ni/_/'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing /_/'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang /_/dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/_/phyag rgya'i lan ni 
[\[87b.4\]]yin par bshad/_/bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te/_/de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dra/_/he ru ka dpal lA ma yi/_/mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/_/lus kun la ni ba spu yod/_/mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang /_/sbom zhing rnam 'gyur mi bzad pa/_/bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la/_/mchu ni 'phyang zhing kha 
[\[87b.5\]]dog gnag_/mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang /_/rtag tu glu dang gar la mkhas/_/sprin gyi gzugs can gsus pa che/_/'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/_/glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/_/mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/g.yon nas yongs su bzlog na ni/_/
[\[87b.6\]]phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/_/tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus/_/khyim du mche bar 'dri byed pa/_/rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/_/mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/_/mtshan mo'i dus su lam du ni/_/de ltar 'bad de shes par bya/_/de kun 'jigs par yong mi bya/_/phyag rgya rnams kyis mnyes 
[\[87b.7\]]par bya/_/ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du ni/_/mnyes nas dngos grub ster pa'o/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/de ru las 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ni rab yin te/_/gang zhig bsten pa tsam gyis ni/_/myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa/_/yan lag dri zhim shin tu 'jam/_/rdul ni dri zhim gyur pa dang /_/ngo tsha che zhing bden par smra/_/yun ring mig ni mi 'dzums pa/_/khro ba med cing snying rje che/_/skad cig 'jam par smra 
[\[88a.2\]]ba dang /_/skye ba bdun nam yang na gsum/_/'bad pa yis ni btsal bar bya/_/bsod nams dang ldan sems pa yi/_/des ni lag tu rnyed par 'gyur/_/de yang zos par byas nas ni/_/de yi snying gar ro tsa na/_/rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni/_/he ru ka yi sngags lan bdun/_/bzlas 
[\[88a.3\]]nas 'bad pas thig le bya/_/'phral du steng du lding 'gyur zhing /_/dpag tshad bye bar 'gro ba'o/_/de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/khams gsum ye shes can du 'gyur/_/dpag tshad bye ba lnga bcur ni/_/nyin mtshan kun tu 'gro ba'o/_/lha yi lus kyang thob 'gyur te/_/bskal pa stong du gnas 
[\[88a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/brgya byin gyi ni stobs 'dra'o/_/bud med bltas pa tsam gyis ni/_/ji ltar me yis mar bzhu ltar/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las las kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//bcom ldan ye shes rgyal dbang po/_/bdag la the tshom skyes pa mchis/_/
[\[88a.5\]]sngags pas sngags rnams 'grub don du/_/bzlas brjod de ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyis bzlas dang bsgom/_/nyon cig lha mo 'gro ba ma/_/srog dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas/_/srog dang rtsol ba bza' bar bya/_/srog dang 
[\[88a.6\]]rtsol ba 'gog byas te/_/srog dang rtsol ba la blta'o/_/pad+ma'i kha sbyar sbyor ba las/_/shes rab thabs ni spyad par bya/_/lte ba gnyis kyi nam mkha' las/_/khab rtse dbye ba med pa yi/_/yi ge shel gyi 'od ldan pa/_/A li'i phreng ba dran par bya/_/yi ge re re yid kyis 
[\[88a.7\]]ni/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/_/'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba'i nang /_/bzlos pa byas nas drang bar bya/_/ha ha'i sgra ni 'jam pa yis/_/mgrin pa ya rkan 'gul med pas/_/nang gi reg bya 'jam pa yi/_/snying ga kho na'i gnas su bya/_/shes rab gtum 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]mo'i gzugs su grags/_/rnam pa dang bral bde sbyin ma/_/reg bya med pa'i reg skyed ma/_/de lta'i shes rab dang lhan cig_/rdo rje skyil krung sems kyis ni/_/sems ni g.yo ba med par bya/_/thig tshul char yang ngang bral ba/_/thig tshul char yang dag 
[\[88b.2\]]nyid dang /_/thig le tshul dang char yang nang /_/rnal 'byor gyis ni der sems bya/_/char yang gi ni nang du sems/_/yang ni tshul gyi nang du sems/_/tshul ni thig ler 'gro bar bsgom/_/thig le yang ni stong par 'gro/_/stong pa rang bzhin zhes su bstan/_/
[\[88b.3\]]gsum dang bral ba ma skyes mchog_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/'di yi cho ga'i thabs kyis ni/_/gang zhig rtse gcig gis ni bzlas/_/des ni dngos grub chen po 'thob/_/zla ba gcig gis gdon mi za/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rang bzhin gyi 
[\[88b.4\]]bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//bcom ldan dpa' bo dpa' dbang phyug_/sngar ni khyod kyis dus bka' stsal/_/thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug_/de yi don ni bshad du gsol/_/de yi dus kyi don 'di ni/_/spyan ring lha 
[\[88b.5\]]mo khyod nyon cig_/dus ni char yang zhes su bshad/_/de rnams kyi ni sbyor ba'i don/_/sbyor ba bzhi yang bzhi bzhir gyis/_/yan lag gcig ni spangs pa'o/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba/_/de yi skye ba bdag gis bshad/_/rten gyi srog gi dbyug pa la/_/
[\[88b.6\]]de ru sbyor ba bstan pa'o/_/srog gi dbyug pa dbus na gnas/_/phra ba'i phra ba yang dag mchog_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mdud dang ldan/_/de ni phyi rol nang du min/_/mdud pa yi ni gnas su sbyor/_/de ni char yang rnams kyi don/_/char yang sbyor ba nang du min/_/nang du de ni 
[\[88b.7\]]rtog med ma/_/mdud pa'i nang du g.yas dang g.yon/_/ro ma dang ni [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]gnas/_/mdud pa gnyis dbus gcig gcig ste/_/sum cu gnyis kyis bcu drug dran/_/bde chen 'khor lo mgrin pa gnas/_/lte ba'i steng ni yan chad do/_/sor bcu gnyis kyi skud pa ni/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]mdud pa med pa gcig pu'o/_/de 'og mdud pa dang ldan pa/_/rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad do/_/spyi bo nas ni mgrin yan chad/_/de tsam sbyor ba bzhi yin no/_/mgrin pa'i 'og nas snying ga'i gnas/_/de tsam gzhan ni bzhi yin no/_/snying ga'i 
[\[89a.2\]]gnas nas lte ba'i bar/_/de tsam gzhan yang bzhi yin no/_/lte ba nas ni nor bu'i mgrin/_/de tsam gzhan ni bzhi yin no/_/de ni sbyor ba bzhi ru bshad/_/char yang dga' ba dang bral ba/_/'dod dang rdul dang 'dar dang stobs/_/'gro dang bdud rtsi yang yin te/_/dga' dang 
[\[89a.3\]]pad+ma de bzhin te/_/de ni dang po'i sbyor ba bzhi/_/rgyas dang rdul dang mdud dang myos/_/'byung ba dang ni mtshan mo dang /_/mchog gi dga' dang ro yin te/_/de ni gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/'bar dang zhi dang thig le gnas/_/myos dang 'og ma de bzhin no/_/dga' bral dga' ba 
[\[89a.4\]]'gug pa ste/_/de ni gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/u ta 'dab ma tshul rlung ma/_/gnyid dang me ma de bzhin no/_/lhan cig skyes dga' ma skyes pa/_/de ni sbyor ba bzhi pa'o/_/rin chen ske ru phyin tsam na/_/de ni zla ba gang bar dran/_/dga' ba yod pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/de ni shar 
[\[89a.5\]]bar shes par bya/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/bcu drug pa la rtog mi byed/_/skye dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_/de la sbyor ba med pa'o/_/char yang rnam skyed sbyor ba ni/_/rtse gcig gis ni khyod nyon cig_/bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma dang /_/gang du gnyig sbyor bar 
[\[89a.6\]]'gyur/_/de la ma skyes cha zhes bya/_/de rang ngo bo rang bzhin no/_/bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma dang /_/char yang 'gyur ba'i rgyun yin no/_/de ni 'byung ba kun gyi pha/_/thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/_/bcu drug pa ni shes rab yin/_/nyi ma thabs su bstan pa'o/_/
[\[89a.7\]]bcu drug phan chad shes par bya/_/nyi ma mchog tu dran pa'o/_/de gnyis dbus bzhugs rang bzhin ni/_/ngag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'/_/de lta bu yi dus kyi don/_/yang dag par ni bdag gis bshad/_/'di las gzhan mchog gsang ba ni/_/zhal 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bzang yang dag med pa'o/_/'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya/_/sku la yang ni mi sbyin no/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dus kyi don gyi rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//sngar sbas sngags kyis gsal ba de/_/nyon cig lnga mo bdag gis 
[\[89b.2\]]bshad/_/dad ldan rnams kyis shes don du/_/dad pa med la nam yang min/_/hA swA Ta pha hU~M hU~M ya b+hA n+ni sa g+ni pA la kA hA mas ha T+TA T+TA ya dza bi ya dza ra shwad+he kro hA ma oM/_gsang chen po yi sngags 'di ni/_/thams cad don kun grub byed pa/_/Tapha hrIM hrIM gri dzo te dzrab oM/_nye ba'i 
[\[89b.3\]]snying po'i sngags chen po/_/thams cad kun gyi dbang du byed/_/hA swA Tapha hU~M hU~M ri shwa ye mas ta ra gu oM/_khyod kyi snying po'i sngags dbang po/_/grangs med yon tan dang ldan no/_/sngags pa'i ye shes grub don du/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni gsal byas so/_/hA swA Tapha dz+liM bliM kliM 
[\[89b.4\]]oM/_khyod kyi nye ba'i snying po 'di/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba/_/bdag gis de yi sngags kyis ni/_/grangs med dbang du byas pa'o/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbas pa'i sngags gsal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//yang dam du 
[\[89b.5\]]'khyud pa byas nas skad snyan pa yis/_bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das ye shes mkha' 'gro nyi/_/mi shes mun pa 'jig byed pa/_/gsang ba kun ni gsungs pa las/_/phyag rgya chen po de ma gsungs/_/phyag rgya 
[\[89b.6\]]chen po ji ltar lags/_/rgyal ba'i dbang phyug yang dag gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa mchog_/nyon cig lha mo phyag rgya che/_/phyag rgya chen po gsang ba che/_/brjod med mi zad ma skyes pa/_/thams cad gzugs can gzugs dang 
[\[89b.7\]]bral/_/gzugs med gzugs kyi bdag nyid mchog_/sbom phra la sogs dang bral ba/_/gzhal du med pa'i rang bzhin no/_/yang dag dri med rnam pa'i 'od/_/gang du yang ni gnas med pa/_/shar ba ma yin nub pa min/_/rtag tu shar ba char yang mchog_/dus dang gnas 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]skabs grol ba ste/_/skye dang 'jig par byed pa'o/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mi dka'/_/rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba/_/thabs mchog gis ni rnyed 'gyur te/_/thabs mchog med na nam yang min/_/dpa' bo chen po bcom 
[\[90a.2\]]ldan 'das/_/de la thabs ni bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rtsa yi kun spyod sbyor ba yis/_/slob dpon kha las rnyed par 'gyur/_/rlung 'khor char yang gnas na ni/_/rlung ma gnyid ma yod pa'o/_/g.yas pa dang ni g.yon 
[\[90a.3\]]gyi cha/_/char yang la ni shin tu bskor/_/de gnyis khong du chud pa yis/_/de las mchog gi bde ba 'byung /_/bde ba'i nang nas phyag rgya che/_/the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur/_/char yang dbus na rtsa yi gnas/_/phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog_/rtsa yi gnas na 
[\[90a.4\]]rtsa yi gnas/_/de tsam la ni nges khyab bo/_/phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni/_/lha mo chen mo de ni khyod/_/nga yi 'od ni yang dag khyod/_/phyi dang nang ni yod pa'o/_/gang zhig phyag rgya che mi shes/_/sangs rgyas yin yang rnal 'byor min/_/phyag rgya chen 
[\[90a.5\]]po'i thig le 'di/_/gang zhig dri med shes pa min/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud/_/'bum gcig rnal 'byor nges shes kyang /_/de lta mod kyi 'bras rab nges/_/nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/thams cad chos kun rab shes na/_/de ni nges par 
[\[90a.6\]]sangs rgyas yin/_/phyag rgya chen po rab shes na/_/de ni dpal rdor sems dpar 'gyur/_/de yi rang bzhin ye shes ni/_/phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do/_/de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das ma bye ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas 
[\[90a.7\]]pas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te khrag dron mos mchod do/_/bcom ldan 'das la mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs te cang mi smra bar zhugs so/_/yang dam du 'khyud pa byas nas 'di skad ces 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan rnal 'byor ma yi bdag_/cung zad bdag la the tshom skyes/_/gang zhig dkyil 'khor cho ga ni/_/rtsa ba yi ni rgyud du bshad/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi gnas de ni/_/sngar ni bdag gis ma shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[90b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_/bdag gi gnas dang gzhan de bzhin/_/nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad/_/gzhan gyi gnas ni b+ha gar brjod/_/bdag gi gnas ni snying po'o/_/sgo yi phyi rol gzhan gyi gnas/_/bdag gi gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro/_/yang 
[\[90b.3\]]na gzhan gnas sbyor ba yin/_/nye ba'i sbyor ba bdag gnas so/_/sbyor ba mtho ris zhes su bstan/_/de bzhin du yang mi yul sbyor/_/nye ba'i sbyor ba sa 'og ste/_/mtho ris chos kyi snying pad+ma/_/nye ba'i sbyor ba ri rab rtse/_/mi yul lte ba'i lte ba'o/_/
[\[90b.4\]]sa 'og sprul pa'i snying po ste/_/ri rab rtse mo gsang sna'o/_/de ltar gzhan ni gsang chen po/_/yang dag gzhan du ngas ma bshad/_/'bad de de ni bsrung bya ste/_/su la yang ni mi sbyin no/_/rnal 'byor ma rgyud dbang phyug rgyal/_/rnal 'byor ma la bshad par bya/_/
[\[90b.5\]]yang na sems dpa' chen po 'di/_/legs par brtags nas gsal bar bya/_/dpal he ru ka chen po'i dang po'i dang po grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang bla las kyang ches gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen po'i 
[\[90b.6\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag_/thams cad mkhyen pas kyang rnyed par dka' ba/_rmad du byung ba'i rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/_nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag ces 
[\[90b.7\]]bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal sngar/_ka ma chos kyi ye shes dang /_phyug mtshams dgra bcom gyis dad cing gus pas zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]{D421}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrIdz+nyA na gar b+ha nA ma yo gi nI ma hA ta na tra ra dza ya ti rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[91a.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas yongs su bskor nas b+ha gu la chen po'i skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo legs dgyes dbang mo dang lhan cig 
[\[91a.3\]]tu rol pa mdzad pa'i tshe rje btsun la ba spu langs so/_/de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes kyi sbyor ba las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyid kyi sku 
[\[91a.4\]]la ba spu langs lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das ma de dgos pa ci zhig yod/_gang gi don gyi phyir nga'i sku la ba spu langs pa de ni gsang ba chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_gsang ba chen po lags mod kyang 
[\[91a.5\]]mchog gi dbang phyug bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga yis legs dgyes kyi bde ba nyams su myong zhing steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba'i skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa las ba spu langs so/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_steng dang 
[\[91a.6\]]'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' bskyed byed ma rnams la gang zhig 'dus pa de ci'i phyir mi shes/_bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du 
[\[91a.7\]]de ltar ni lags mod kyi/_'on kyang mi shes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag gis ni zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni so so rang gis nyams su myong ba yin mod kyang /_'on kyang khyod kyi ngo rangs bshad par bya ste/_dga' bral gyi dga' ba 'byung ba'i 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsa'i dra ba 'dar zhing g.yos pa tsam gyis tshul shar ro/_/tshul shar bas thig le'i rgyal po zhu'o/_/thig le'i rgyal po zhu ba las steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' bskyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa'o/_/de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 
[\[91b.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_dam du 'khyud pa byas nas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas dgyes par byas te phyi nas yang zhu ba mdzad do/_/kyai bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dus su 'dus pa lags na/_de la sbyor ba med pa gang gi dus lags/_bcom 
[\[91b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dris pa yang dag dgyes pa mchog_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba/_/dga' bral dus su sbyor ba med/_/de ni dga' bral dga' ba min/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_kyai bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba 
[\[91b.4\]]dang dga' bral la khyad par ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' mo khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/_dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang dga' bral gnyis la khyad par cher yod pa de brjod par bya'o/_/gang zhig dga' bral gyi dga' ba de zhu ba gnas pa ste 'pho 
[\[91b.5\]]ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/gang zhig dag 'bral de ni dga' ba dang bral ba zhu ba 'pho zhing 'jig pa'o/_/dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni zhu ba gnas pa ste/_'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang gis nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol 
[\[91b.6\]]ba/_rang gis nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i khyad par ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin/_gsang 
[\[91b.7\]]ba yang ma yin/_ye shes kyang ma yin/_ye shes las byung ba yang ma yin/_srid pa yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin/_char yang ma yin/_thig le yang ma yin/_tshul yang ma yin/_tshul tsam yang ma yin/_mchog kyang ma yin/_gzhan 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mchog kyang ma yin/_shar ba yang ma yin/_nub pa yang ma yin/_gzugs kyang ma yin/_sgra yang ma yin/_dri yang ma yin/_ro yang ma yin/_reg bya yang ma yin/_yi ge yang ma yin/_rten yang ma yin/_brten pa yang ma yin/_khams 
[\[92a.2\]]kyang ma yin/_shes rab kyang ma yin/_thabs kyang ma yin/_thim pa yang ma yin/_longs spyod kyang ma yin/_dbang yang ma yin/_sprul pa yang ma yin/_chos kyang ma yin/_longs spyod kyang ma yin/_lus kyang ma yin/_ngag kyang ma yin/_yid kyang ma yin 
[\[92a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba/_mi zad pa/_dri ma med pa/_skye ba med pa/_'gag pa med pa/_rtag tu shar ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang las rnyed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' 
[\[92a.4\]]bral gyis dga' ba nyams su myong ba las rnyed de/_de bzhin du bsam gtan la sogs pas ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de/_dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i nyams su myong ba'i rgyu lags sam 'bras bu lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[92a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin te 'bras bu ni ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_lhun gyis grub pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos pos dgos pa ci mchis/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar 
[\[92a.6\]]bsreg pa la dud pa bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de skad du smra ba ni tshad ma ma yin te/_dang por bsreg pa med par der dud pa 'byung ba gang las 'ong /_de lta bu'i rigs las lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_de ltar lags 
[\[92a.7\]]na lhan cig skyes pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin na/_'on kyang 'dir rgyu ni gnyis su dbye ba dang /_'bras bu yang gnyis su dbye ste/_gsal ba'i rgyu dang /_'byung ba'i rgyu'o/_/'bras bu yang de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ba/_kyai bcom ldan 'das gsal ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba dang /_'byung ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsal ba'i rgyu ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste/_ji ltar mar me bzhin no/_/'byung ba'i rgyu ni dga' ba las mchog gi dga' ba 
[\[92b.2\]]ste/_ji ltar sa bon las myu gu bzhin no/_/dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i rgyu ma yin te/_dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba yin no/_/dpal ye shes snying po las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang 
[\[92b.3\]]po'o//_//bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_gang zhig dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phyag rgya chen po'i don bstan pa de thob par bya ba'i don du de'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 
[\[92b.4\]]khyod kyis bdag la zhus pa gang /_nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad/_/phyag rgya chen po ni 'dir bzhir dbye ba ste/_las kyi phyag rgya dang /_dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/gang zhig las kyi phyag rgya ni snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' 
[\[92b.5\]]ba'i lo dang ldan pa'o/_/gang zhig dam tshig gi phyag rgya de ni snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'o/_/gang zhig ye shes kyi phyag rgya de ni snang ba thob pa'i rang bzhin khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'o/_/gang zhig chos kyi phyag rgya de ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no/_/
[\[92b.6\]]phyag rgya chen po de yang 'od gsal ma yin pa gzhan las mi rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_gang du gnas pa yin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od gsal ni nam mkha'i dbus 
[\[92b.7\]]su gnas pa'i thig le'i ngo bo ste de ni phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_re zhig 'od gsal ni ji ltar rnyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_las dang dam tshig dang ye shes dang chos kyi phyag rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'das mas gsol ba/_phyag rgya rnams nyid ni gang las rnyed par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbang bskur ba'i phyi'i phyag rgya la brten nas nang gi phyag rgya rnams rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_phyi dang 
[\[93a.2\]]nang gi phyag rgya de gnas gang du gnas par 'gyur/_mtshan ni ji lta bu/_rang gi ngo bo ni ji lta bu/_der dbang ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dir dbang ni bzhi ste/_slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang /_de ltar de bzhin 
[\[93a.3\]]bzhi pa'o/_/slob dpon gyi dbang ni dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa gzhon nu ma la rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par ldan pa yis nu ma dang 'dza' gu ni reg par byas pas so/_/gsang ba'i dbang ni skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la nang gi rkan yongs su 'jibs pa las so/_/shes rab ye shes 
[\[93a.4\]]ni khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la lhan cig srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs chen po las zhu ba 'pho ba'i dus su ye shes nyams su myong bas so/_/de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa ni shes rab ye shes de nyid brtan par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin zhes bstan pa yin no/_/brtan 
[\[93a.5\]]par byas pa tsam gyis drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i nang du phyag rgya bzhi mnyam par sbyor bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de yang 'jug pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_rten pa'i ngo bos so/_/'jug pa ni gtum mo'o/_/gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis rtog pa med pa'o/_/'gro ba ni 
[\[93a.6\]]bya gdong ma'i rtsa'o/_/rten pa'i ngo bos sgrog ma'i rtsa'o/_/don dam par phyag rgya chen po gcig pu ste/_'on kyang las kyi rang bzhin gyis bzhir dbye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de rnams la las kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ji ltar lags/_bcom 
[\[93a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang dang /_drag po ste/_las kyi bye brag gis phyag rgya chen pos thob pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang dang /_drag po rnams kyi ming dang spyod 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba ni rgod pa'o/_/rgyas pa ni blta ba'o/_/dbang ni lag pas 'khyud pas so/_/drag po ni gnyis kyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/de rnams la spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i spyod pa dang /_
[\[93b.2\]]brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa dang /_gos bral gyi brtul shugs kyi spyod pa dang /_rang dbang gi spyod pas so/_/dpal ye shes snying po las phyag rgya chen po dang /_dbang bskur ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das mas gsol 
[\[93b.3\]]ba/_dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu/_slob dpon ni ji lta bus bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/gsang ba'i dbang la bla ma la dbul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 
[\[93b.4\]]rang byung gi me tog dang ldan pa'i me tog gis so/_/shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i bzhi mnyam gyis so/_/bzhi pa'i dus su gzhan ma yin pa byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig dkyil 'khor gyis so/_/de la slob dpon ni mtshan thams cad kyis 
[\[93b.5\]]brgyan pa dang /_rgyud thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_dbang bskur ba la mkhas pa dang /_thugs rje dang ldan pa dang /_rgya che ba la mos pa dang /_sngags la sogs pa dang /_rab tu sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /_dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang /_
[\[93b.6\]]dngos grub thob pa'i bla ma'i bka'i gnang ba thob pa dang /_yang na rang nyid dngos grub thob pa des ni dkyil 'khor dang /_dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang /_sgrub thabs la sogs pa bya'o/_/de bzhin du rtog ge pa la sogs pas ni ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_
[\[93b.7\]]kyai bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor mtshan ma ji ltar lags/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshad ji tsam/_/gtso bo bdag po yang ni gang /_/ngo bo gang gis slob ma gzung /_/las kyi slob dpon ji lta bu/_/mchod pa rnams ni ji ltar lags/_/
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bla ma'i yon ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis bdag la gang zhus pa/_/lha mo nyon cig bdag gis bshad/_/mtshan ma'i slob ma'i mos pas so/_/yang na ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi yid dang 
[\[94a.2\]]'thad pa'o/_/de bzhin mthe bo'i sor gsum lhag pa'i khru phyed dang do'i dkyil 'khor bya'o/_/de ni re zhig mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yin te/_de'ang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi [{]go rims kyis [,]go rim gyis [}]bya'o/_/de yang yan lag thams cad tshang ba'o/_/de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[94a.3\]]'khor bri'o/_/de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje ste/_sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du hU~M gi rnam pa/_phyi rol du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa/_rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan par bya'o/_/de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la 'khor lo mdog dkar po dang /_
[\[94a.4\]]lhor rin po che mdog ser po dang /_nub tu pad+ma mdog dmar po dang /_byang du ral gri mdog ljang gu dang /_me'i mtshams su rin po che'i shing dang /_chu'i mtshams su se 'bru dang /_rlung gi mtshams su rgyal mtshan dang /_dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ka pA la'o/_/shar sgor rdo rje 
[\[94a.5\]]lcags kyu dang /_lhor rdo rje zhags pa dang /_nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_byang du rdo rje dril bu'o/_/mtshams rnams su me tog gi chun 'phyang dang /_bdug spos kyi reng bu dang /_mar me dang /_dri'i dung chos so/_/de'i phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba'o/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte 
[\[94a.6\]]ba'i nang du hU~M gi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhal gsum pa/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/_rang 'od kyi rig mas 'khyud pa/_nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog can/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_brgyad gnyis 
[\[94a.7\]]kyi lo dang ldan pa/_nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/_ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rdo rje dang /_dril bu dang /_rnge'u chung dang /_ka pA la dang /_kha TA~M ga 'dzin pa'i bdag po'o/_/mtshan ma'i skabs su dbus su rdo rje dang /_dril bus bya'o/_/de nas slob ma sta gon 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]byas la sman sna tshogs kyis khrus byas pa/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bos slob ma gzung bar bya'o/_/las kyi slob dpon ni bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa/_ser sna med pa/_mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'o/_/der mchod pa po rnams shin tu mkhas pa/_chags pa la 
[\[94b.2\]]sogs pa dang bral ba/_mtshan ma rnyed pa/_dbang gsum thob pa'o/_/slob dpon la dbang bskur ba'i dus su'am/_rgyud thos pa'i dus su shin tu gces pa'i chung ma dang /_bu mo dang /_gzhan yang gser dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bu dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_
[\[94b.3\]]zhing dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_na bza' du ma la sogs pa ci tsam nus pa dbul bar bya'o/_/nor la sogs pa yod nas gang zhig mi 'bul ba de ni bskal pa stong gi bar du dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod med par gyur pas kyang rang gi lus po dbul bar bya 
[\[94b.4\]]ste bran du bya'o/_/des ni tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid dam/_yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha mos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ram ci/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[94b.5\]]stsal pa/_lha mo sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam rdo rje 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/_'on kyang bla ma la mchod pas bsod nams chen po'i tshogs skye'o/_/bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa las sdig pa'i phung po zad de/_bla ma'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 
[\[94b.6\]]bzhin rang gi lha'i sku yang dag pa dang phrad pa thob bo/_/phrad pas yang dag pa'i man ngag gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/man ngag thob pa las brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin no/_/des tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas sam rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dpal ye shes snying po las dbang bskur 
[\[94b.7\]]ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das nas gsol pa/_khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/_/mnga' bdag chen po bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bdag gi dkyil 'khor dge ba ni/_/nyon 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]cig lha mo rab tu bshad/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/_/dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang dang /_/'dod yon rin chen la sogs brgyan/_/de yi dbus su gzhan min bdag_/zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod dang lhan cig go/_/phyag bzhi pa la 
[\[95a.2\]]zhal bzhi pa/_/spyan gsum ut+pal sngon po'i mdog_/phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dang /_/sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/zhi ba chen po'i rang bzhin can/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/_/'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan/_/rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs kyis 
[\[95a.3\]]ni bzhugs/_/rdo rje dril bu rnge'u chung dang /_/ka pA la dang kha T+wA~M bsnams/_/zhal gzhan ser dang dmar dang ljang /_/lha mo khyod kyang bdag gi mdog_/zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum pa/_/phyag gnyis gri gug pad snod 'dzin/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[95a.4\]]ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_'di yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/_/'khor ni gang lags grangs du mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig khyod kyis bdag la zhus/_/nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad/_/dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir 
[\[95a.5\]]dpa' chen po/_/shes rab yan lag mas 'khyud cing /_/mtshams su rdo rje ma mo bzhi/_/sgor ni khros pa'i lha mo bzhi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_de rnams la bskyed pa'i chog ni gang /_mdog dang phyag rgya dang bzhugs thabs la sogs pa ji ltar 
[\[95a.6\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod dang bdag rol pa mdzad cing /_srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs chen po'i sbyor ba'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po tshangs pa zhes bya ba phyag bzhi pa/_zhal gsum pa/_spyan gsum pa/_gser gyi mdog nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[95a.7\]]'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/_ral ba'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_shes rab ma'i yan lag gis 'khyud pa/_phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/rdo rje dang /_dril bu dang /_rde'u chung dang /_ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga bsnams 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]pa/_shar gyi 'dab mar ro/_/yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog gi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po khyab 'jug ces bya ba/_mar ka ta'i mdog lhag ma ni tshangs pa bzhin du byang du'o/_/yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' 
[\[95b.2\]]bo chen po drag po zhes bya ba mdog nag po khyab 'jug bzhin nub tu'o/_/yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po dbang phyug ces bya ba mdog dkar po khyab 'jug bzhin lho phyogs su'o/_/pad+ma'i mtshams su dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[95b.3\]]chus gang ba'i bum pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba'i ka pA la bzhi'o/_/yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi ro brgyad las me'i mtshams su dpa' mo chen mo mdog dkar mo'o/_/chu'i mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub ma bai DUr+ya'i mdog go/_/rlung gi mtshams su dus mtshan ma 
[\[95b.4\]]nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog go/_/dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gau rI mdog ser po'o/_/thams cad kyang shin tu lang tsho la bab pa zhal gcig pa/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs kyis bzhugs pa/_phyag rgya lnga 'dzin 
[\[95b.5\]]pa/_phyogs kyi gos can/_gri gug dang /_ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga dang /_rnge'u chung bsnams pa'o/_/shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje gtum mo ni nag mo chen mo'i mdog go/_/byang sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ser mo'i mdog go/_/nub sgor rdo rje sgra ma dmar mo chen mo'i mdog go/_/
[\[95b.6\]]lho sgor rdo rje tsa rtsi kA ljang gu'i mdog go/_/phyag bzhi pa/_zhal gcig pa/_spyan gsum pa/_g.yon brkyang ba/_na bza' spangs pa rim pa bzhin du nam mkha' lding dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_ma he'i steng na gnas pa'o/_/phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/_mgo chen po'i 
[\[95b.7\]]chun po 'phyang ba 'dzin pa/_'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/_ljags 'dril ba/_dbu skyes 'bar ba/_sgra chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/_ral gri dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga bsnams pa/_rang 'od kyi thabs dang 'khyud pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag ma ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dpa' bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag rang rang gi mdog dang mtshungs 
[\[96a.2\]]pa ste/_'on kyang khyod bzhin du zhal gcig pa'o/_/de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/_/rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed par dka'/_/dgyes pa thams cad grub byed cing /_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[96a.3\]]khyod dang bdag bskyed pa'i/_/sa bon gang lags snying po ci/_/nye pa'i snying po ji lta bu/_/'khor gyi sngags ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis bdag la gang zhig zhus/_/nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad/_/sa bon ya sde'i 
[\[96a.4\]]bdun pa ni/_/dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa/_/lha mo chen mo thig le ldan/_/khyod kyi sa bon rab mchog go/_/ya sde'i sa bon brgyad pa ni/_/dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa/_/dbu ni thig le yis ni brgyan/_/bdag gi sa bon rab mchog go/_/de ni sa bon gnyis 
[\[96a.5\]]ka rab/_/thams cad dbang du byed pa ni/_/lus can kun gyi snying la bzhugs/_/skye ba dang ni sdud byed do/_/drug pa brgyad pa bzhi pa dang /_/bcu gnyis pa dang bcu dang nyi/_/dang por oM dang hU~M phaT mthar/_/bdag gi snying po rab tu mchog_/nyi shu pa dang bcu gnyis 
[\[96a.6\]]mkha'/_/dang po dang ni bcu drug nyi/_/dbang po tshangs pa hU~M phaT mthar/_/khyod kyi snying po dgyes pa mchog_/dang por oM dang hU~M phaT mthar/_/dbus su ming dang spel ba ni/_/tshogs kun gyi ni srags yin te/_/mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya/_/oM sar+b+ba mA ra bi mar+d+da 
[\[96a.7\]]na ma hA pA ri rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_skal ldan mo de khyod kyi ni/_/nye ba'i snying po drag po che/_/oM ha~M ha~M ha~M ha~M ha~M/_ke le ke le sar+b+ba do sta pra b+ha dza ka hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_pad+ma'i zhal de bdag gi ni/_/'od chen nye ba'i snying po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_sngags 'di la nus pa'i 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mthu ci tsam zhig mchis lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grub pa tsam gyis khams gsum thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor pa khro bo'i lta bas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byed na/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po lta bu la 'bum phrag 
[\[96b.2\]]gcig gis gsod par byed do/_/zhi ba'i tshul gyis bzlas pa byas na grangs med pa'i nad dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_dbul po dang /_mdze dang /_phol mig 'jig par byed do/_/phra mo'i grub pa brgyad skad cig gis byed do/_/gzhan yang las du ma rjes su 'brang bar 
[\[96b.3\]]byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang mo stan las langs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis mchod pa byas te/_bcom 
[\[96b.4\]]ldan 'das mchog gi dbang phyug legs so legs so zhes brjod nas yang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs so/_/de'i dus su nam mkha' la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i char dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi char chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs par gyur to/_/
[\[96b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang rin po che de dag gi thog tu chibs te/_'khor dang bcas pa mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal ye shes snying po las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud 
[\[96b.6\]]kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba'o/_/dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma'i phyi ma'o//[ {D422}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI dz+nyA na ti la ka 
[\[96b.7\]]yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza pa ra ma ma hA ad+b+hu ta~M nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/_dpal ye shes thig le la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang /_dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor nas rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang /_shin tu stobs chen po dang /_lha'i dbang phyug 
[\[97a.2\]]dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_'od drag dang nyi dgra dang /_mchog dga' dang /_thams cad kyi byed pa po dang /_ut+pa la'i snying po dang /_zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang /_nag po 'dul ba dang /_rmad du byung ba'i dpa' bo dang /_dregs chen dang /_nag po chen po dregs 'joms dang /_
[\[97a.3\]]ri rab brtan pa dang /_nam mkha'i zhal lo/_/yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams la 'di lta ste/_zla ba mo dang /_g.yon pa ma dang /_mi mnyam ma dang /_rlung zab ma dang /_bsil sbyin ma dang /_snying po'i 'dab ma dang /_bag yod thor cog ma dang /_nyi ma 'dul 
[\[97a.4\]]ma dang /_zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang /_ljang brtson ma dang /_'od 'dun ma dang /_tshangs pa'i ma dang /_khyab 'jug gi ma dang /_thog kha ma dang /_thams cad skyed ma dang /_dpa' bo'i yum mo/_/yang ma mo'i btsun mo rnams la 'di lta ste/_skam ma dang /_'jigs ma dang /_'od 
[\[97a.5\]]ma dang /_mchu 'phyang ma dang /_ri rab so ma dang /_dus kyi bde byed ma dang /_nyi mig mdang /_me zhal mdang /_'dod pa'i ma dang /_lce ring ma dang /_chos dga' ma dang /_'dod bden ma dang /_mig stong ma dang /_stag ma dang /_gtum mo dang /_'dod gzugs ma'o/_/de lta 
[\[97a.6\]]bu'i rab zhal la sogs pa dpa' bo chen po dang /_dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang /_ma mo'i btsun mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su legs dgyes chen po'i sbyor ba la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la 
[\[97a.7\]]bos te/_kyai byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /_zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang /_de la rang gi ngo bo dang /_rnam pa dang /_tshad dag dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig_/bcom ldan 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sa la blta zhing cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/
[\[97b.2\]]de'i tshe nam mkha' la me tog man+dA ra ba dang /_man+dA ra ba chen po dang /_ut+pal dang /_nyi ma'i 'od mnyam pa dang /_chu skyes dang /_paN+Da rI ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ardzu na dang /_nA ga ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_rin 
[\[97b.3\]]po che'i char du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/_khyod ci zhig la ya mtshan du gyur/_lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid gsum gyi 
[\[97b.4\]]bdag nyid kyi dang /_zla ba bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang /_de la rang gi ngo bo dang /_tshad dang /_rnam pa yod dam ci lags zhes bdag ya mtshan du gyur lags so/_/dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/e 
[\[97b.5\]]ma ho/_/de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /_zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang /_rnam pa dang /_tshad med dam ci/_de ltar ma yin na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes/_mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i rten ni chos thams 
[\[97b.6\]]cad do/_/de ltar gla rtsi la brten nas dri 'byung ba gla rtsi'i dngos po med na dri ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur/_de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang /_chos kyi tshad dang /_rnam pa dag med par gyur na/_de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /_zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed 
[\[97b.7\]]pa med do/_/de bas na khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu/_/gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che/_/bde ba sku la brten pa'i phyir/_/bde ba bsten na de nyid 'gyur/_/bde sku rnam par shes yin na/_/thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos/_/drug gi bde ba ye shes mchog_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung /_/'khor lo drug gi dbus na bzhugs/_/de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog_/zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid/_/de nyid gsum bdag rgyu ru grags/_/lus brten srog gi dbyug pa la/_/sbyor ba drug gi ye shes 
[\[98a.2\]]bzhugs/_/'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus/_/phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug_/thig le dang bcas de rnams sbyor/_/srog gi dbyug ba'i nang du'o/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi/_/zla mo tshe dang ldan pa ste/_/de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin/_/zur gsum gyi ni rnam 
[\[98a.3\]]pa'i tshul/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte ba yi/_/lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni/_/de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ste/_/rigs kyi me tog dang 'dra ba/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la/_/nam mkha' ma ni ye shes ldan/_/de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i snying /_/ba yi mig gi rnam pa'i 
[\[98a.4\]]gzugs/_/lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang /_/'od mdang ni dus ldan ma/_/de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ste/_/pad+ma rgyas pa'i rnam pa bzhin/_/me yi 'khor lo'i snying ga yi/_/'dod pa dang ldan rab 'od ma/_/de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i mdoms/_/rdo rje'i rnam pa bzhin du gsal/_/
[\[98a.5\]]rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la/_/stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan/_/srog gi dbyug pa de yi mtha'/_/til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin/_/de ni sbyor drug gi rnam shes/_/rtsa dang thig le dang ldan no/_/rtog med mas ni 'khyung yin phyir/_/de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin/_/
[\[98a.6\]]de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad/_/shar dang nub pa rnam gnyis so/_/gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de/_de la lte ba'i 'og tu 'pho ba bcu drug_/steng du 'pho ba bcu drug_/byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir 'phro ba ste/_steng 'og 
[\[98a.7\]]gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo gcig pu'i rtog med bde legs yid mas tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la 'khyud nas/_bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde ba chen 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]po'i nor bu'i kha rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad/_ji ltar tsan+dan go shi rA'i shing la sprul chen po yod pa lta bu'o/_/lha'i dbang phyug de la ji ltar rang gi ngo bo bshad par bya ste/_tshangs pa'i rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang po zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[98b.2\]]kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rab ma'i lte bas zla ba yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du 'dod pa'i dga' ba shar ba'o/_/pad+ma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'dar ba nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi chu tshod gnyis kyi bar du stobs nub pa'o/_/drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro ba mnyam pa 
[\[98b.3\]]dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus su'o/_/rigs kyi me tog gi nu ma reg pa las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o/_/tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pa thur du byung 
[\[98b.4\]]ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tshod lnga'i bar du dbugs shar ba'i dus so/_/dung gi mig gis sen mo btab pa las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i tshes drug gi chu tshod drug gi bar du ut+pa la'i nub pa'i dus so/_/rna ba'i mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu 
[\[98b.5\]]tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la shar ba'i dus so/_/ba'i mig gis 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mchog gi dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa tshes brgyad kyi chu tshod brgyad kyi bar du yid nub pa'i dus so/_/dung gi lte ba'i nu ma dam por 'khyud pa las 'bar ba lhod pa dang ldan pa'i tshes dgu'i chu tshod dgu'i 
[\[98b.6\]]bar du snying po shar ba'i dus so/_/glang po che'i lte ba'i ske'i sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu'i chu tshod bcu'i bar du zla ba nub pa'i dus so/_/ut+pa la'i lte ba'i mig gi 'o las myos pa khrung khrung dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gcig gi chu tshod bcu gcig gi bar du nyi ma shar ba'i dus so/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[98b.7\]]lte ba'i sprug cing bsigs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro d+ha dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi chu tshod bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag po nub pa'i dus so/_/bung ba'i kha'i grong khyer las u nga mi rem pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar ba'i dus so/_/rma bya'i kha'i 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bskum pa las tshul 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i chu tshod bcu bzhi'i bar du sgra nub pa'i dus so/_/rdo rje'i kha ru mnyam par sbyor ba las gnyid 'on pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chu tshod [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du ro'i shar ba'i dus so/_/rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes 
[\[99a.2\]]bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gi bar du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so/_/thog ni sngags 'jigs byed pa ste/_/de la nub pa bcu drug yin/_/shar dang nub pa gang la lar/_/lhan cig skyes la de yod min/_/yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam pa yi/_/
[\[99a.3\]]rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang /_/dga' ba la sogs shar ba dang /_/de ni nub pa'i dus su'o/_/de lta'i bde chen rnam pa ni/_/'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad/_/dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed/_/ye shes dga' bral lhan rtag bzhugs/_/dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin/_/'dod 
[\[99a.4\]]pa chags pa'i rnam dag byed/_/'dus pa reg byed pa yi/_/dngos ni srid pa med par byed/_/'o dang 'khyud pa'i longs spyod rnams/_/dngos ni dngos po rab gcod byed/_/puN+Da rI ka'i 'byung sa yis/_/zur gsum la sogs brten pa yis/_/rten ni bsam du med pa ste/_/
[\[99a.5\]]chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin/_/steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten/_/mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed/_/bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten/_/rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi/_/ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub/_/'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'/_/ye shes shes pa lhun gyis 
[\[99a.6\]]grub/_/gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes/_/gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'/_/ye shes nga rgyal med par byed/_/chos kun rnam par shes pa ste/_/ye shes shes bya don grub byed/_/rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags/_/tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid/_/
[\[99a.7\]]rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun du/_/rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa thim/_/skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi/_/rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsod/_/'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la/_/'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed/_/rtsa yi snying po thams cad ni/_/bcom pa'i phyir na 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rnam par 'byed/_/ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'/_/rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin/_/ye shes shin tu bde byed phyir/_/rnam par 'byed par de phyir brjod/_/gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba/_/chags pa dang ni chags bral min/_/dri ma med pa bcos med pa/_/rgyud dang 
[\[99b.2\]]sngags dang rim pa bral/_/rang rig pa dang brjod du med/_/thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med/_/de lta bu ni don dam pa/_/lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi/_/thugs kar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o/_/rnam par 'byed la sgom pa med/_/phung po 
[\[99b.3\]]khams la sogs dang bral/_/sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong /_/stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang /_/dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang /_/de rnams kun gyi yab yin no/_/'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad 'byung /_/de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir/_/
[\[99b.4\]]mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go/_/'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa/_/sku lnga'i bdag nyid rab mchog yin/_/mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga bdag po/_/nam mkha' bdag nyid skye med do/_/nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/_/de lta'i gsang chen ye 
[\[99b.5\]]shes ni/_/ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba/_/ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis/_/ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sba/_/dpal ye shes thig le las 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba/_kyai bcom ldan 'das/_de nyid 
[\[99b.6\]]gsum bdag nga ro ci/_/de bzhin zla ba bde ba mchog_/phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci/_/de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs/_/rdo rje gsum ni ye shes mchog_/zla ba bde ba mchog ces pa/_/de yi phung po 
[\[99b.7\]]dbang po khams/_/phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po/_/de yi mtha' ni b+ha gar dran/_/mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes/_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med/_/snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung /_/skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med/_/yang dag 'od las thams cad 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'byung /_/de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o/_/de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa bsgom pa dang /_sngags dang bzlas pa dang /_/sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin dang /_gtor 
[\[100a.2\]]ma dang mchod pa dang /_gnas kyi brjod pa dang /_dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do/_/dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//lha'i 
[\[100a.3\]]dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi/_bcom 
[\[100a.4\]]ldan 'das rtsa gzhan rnams ci'i don gyi phyir 'dir ma gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcig pu rtog med bde legs yi dam de ni bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas/_sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi 
[\[100a.5\]]'byung gnas chen po'i sa stengs su 'byung zhing skye'i char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o/_/lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_de ltar lags mod kyis kyang /_rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[100a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang phyug sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig_/gsang ba dang /_zab pa dang /_sred pa dang /_phra mo dang /_bdud rtsi ma dang /_bdud rtsi khri ma dang /_dag pa ma dang /_bde ba ma dang /_stobs ma dang /_thabs ma dang /_hrud hrud ma dang /_ser ma 
[\[100a.7\]]dang /_'o rgyun ma dang /_dga' ma dang /_snum ma dang /_khro ma dang /_mngar ma dang /_skyur ma dang /_khab ma dang /_bska ma dang /_tsha ma dang /_lan tshwa ma dang /_rtsub ma dang /_dad ma dang /_stobs ma dang /_dga' byed ma dang /_dga' sbyin ma dang /_gnyid ma dang /_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bcad skyed ma dang /_khong chud ma dang /_tshe ma ste/_de dag ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste/_steng dang 'og tu 'phro ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o/_/de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad de/_ji lta yi ni [{]go rims su[,]go rim du[}]/_/dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang /_/
[\[100b.2\]]thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur/_/yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu/_/bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya/_/khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab/_/snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan/_/yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas/_/lha yi dbang phyug dbang bskur bya/_/dbang bskur
