[\[100b.3\]]las ni sangs rgyas sa/_/the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur/_/de bas kun tu rab 'bad de/_/dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya/_/dbang bskur bzhi ru phye pa ni/_/slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin/_/dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang /_/gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i 
[\[100b.4\]]dbang /_/gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang /_/de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o/_/bzhi gnyis rab dung bye ba ni/_/slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur/_/rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du/_/nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad/_/de gnyis la ni bcu gcig bya/_/
[\[100b.5\]]rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal po/_/dbang bskur de ni rin po che/_/khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/_/thar par 'gro ba 'grub don du/_/'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad/_/chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang /_/dril bu ming dang brtul zhugs dang /_/lung bstan pa dang 
[\[100b.6\]]skyabs sbyin dang /_/phyag rgya sngags dang ye shes so/_/rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la/_/dbang brgyad phye la sbyin par bya/_/rnal 'byor bla ma la mos la/_/bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams/_/gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o/_/gsang ba 
[\[100b.7\]]gnyis su dbye bar gsungs/_/de ni phyi dang nang gis so/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor bla ma'i phyir/_/dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya/_/nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud/_/gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu sbyin/_/de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye/_/skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sad/_/
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]shes rab rnam pa gnyis su dbye/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go/_/shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan/_/spyan [{]rings [,]ring [}]cha la mkhas pa dang /_/yan lag tsan+dan sar pa'i dri/_/shin tu 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim/_/gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma/_/'o 'dzin 
[\[101a.2\]]mkhrang zhing 'jam la mtho/_/bsam gtan sngags la dad cing zhi/_/dbang bskur dang ldan thugs rje grub/_/de lta'i rab grags 'bad de btsal/_/dbang gi don du bla ma zhu/_/de kun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/_/chung ma yang na sring mo'am/_/bu mo yang na mna' ma'am/_/mkhas 
[\[101a.3\]]pas 'bad de blang bar bya/_/rang gi rigs ni ji bzhin rnyed/_/khu ba dang bcas gzhon nu ma/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/_/mkhas pas bla ma la ni 'bul/_/dbang gi man ngag gsum du bzhugs/_/nang gi yis ni brda byed pa/_/bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor 
[\[101a.4\]]grags/_/gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid/_/dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu/_/rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal dbye/_/dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los sgyur/_/the tshom med par yin par 'gyur/_/dbang gis dri ma med par byed/_/chu la sogs pas ras bkrus 
[\[101a.5\]]bzhin/_/cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang /_/yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas/_/gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud/_/bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang /_/gzhan du rtog ge'i tshogs la mkhas/_/sgra yi bstan bcos rtag mos la/_/dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum/_/
[\[101a.6\]]blang bar mi bya sbyin mi bya/_/yang dag 'bras bu 'dod pa na/_/de ni ring du spang bar bya/_/de ltar yang bye ma du ma bsdus pa'i phung po la 'bad de rnam par btsir bas mar khu'i thigs pa phyed kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du rtog ge mang po dang /_ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa bstan pa'am/_nyan 
[\[101a.7\]]pa las ni de la nyon mongs pa 'ba' zhig las gzhan 'bras bu ni rnyed pa med do/_/de bas na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud de rnyed pa'i dbang shes pa de ni rdo rje slob dpon bla ma chen po'o/_/mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i sbyin/_/bla ma'i gzugs 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]so gzhan ma yin/_/bsod nams thams cad kyi ni gnas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug lha/_/de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os/_/ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin/_/de ltar shes nas sgrub pa pos/_/'bad 
[\[101b.2\]]pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/bla ma'i zhal snga mchod byas na/_/ci 'dod pa yi 'bras bu rnyed/_/rgyud kyi don nam dbang gi don/_/shes nas bla ma mi mchod pa/_/sa stengs nyi zla yod par du/_/de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro/_/de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis/_/gus pas bla ma 
[\[101b.3\]]mchod par bya/_/rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs/_/gser gyi pad+ma dri ma med/_/mu tig do shal rin thang med/_/sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos/_/gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas/_/glang chen rta dang bran la sogs/_/dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru/_/dad gus brtan 
[\[101b.4\]]pas dbul bar bya/_/dpal ye shes thig le las yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon/_/gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don/_/ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan/_/rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/rdo 
[\[101b.5\]]rje'i thig dang bla res ni/_/kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin/_/rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye/_/'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin/_/ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bzhin 
[\[101b.6\]]pa/_/rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog_/khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o/_/khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa/_/spyan gsum pa la phyag drug pa/_/g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa gsus pa rlob/_sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_ljags 'dril ba/_mche ba 'jigs 
[\[101b.7\]]pa gtsigs pa/_dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba/_ag tshom dang smin mche zhing ring ba ste/_shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje'i gshed sku mdog nag po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba dang dmar po/_phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa/_phyag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]g.yon gnyis na thod pa dang dbyug pa'o/_/lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g.yas kyi zhal dmar ba/_g.yon sngo ba/_phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri/_/phyag g.yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mgo bo'o/_/nub 
[\[102a.2\]]tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon sngon po/_g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_ri rab zur brgyad pa'o/_/byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis ni dkar po dang dmar po'o/_/g.yas 
[\[102a.3\]]dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram dang /_ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang dung ngo /_/me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis ni dkar ba dang dmar ba/_g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/_phyag g.yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo /_/
[\[102a.4\]]srin po'i mtshams su dbyug ba sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs/_g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ljang ba dang dmar ba/_phyag g.yas gnyis na rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri/_phyag g.yon gnyis na sA la'i shing chen po dang /_de bzhin du me'o/_/rlung mtshams su stobs po 
[\[102a.5\]]che du ba'i mdog_/g.yas pa dang /_g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba dang dmar po/_phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung dang dgra sta dang rnga ma'o/_/dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi g.yo mgon dkar nag zhal g.yon dmar po dang /_g.yas sngon po/_g.yas g.yon gyi phyag bzhi na 
[\[102a.6\]]ral gri dang lcags kyu dang pi wang dang rnge'u chung ngo /_/steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba sku mdog ser po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni sngo ba dang dkar ba/_phyag bzhi na 'khor lo dang /_ral gri dang /_ka pA la dang /_khwa T+wA~M ga'o/_/'og tu sum b+ha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam 
[\[102a.7\]]mkha' ltar sngo ba/_g.yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can/_g.yon pa ni nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can/_g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu/_g.yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o/_/thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang pad+ma bsnams pa/_rang gi 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/_/'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o/_/gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang sum b+ha'i rgyal po ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shes par bya'o/_/'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te ri bong can dkar po'i 
[\[102b.2\]]'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so/_/de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas/_rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte 
[\[102b.3\]]bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo A li dang kA li gnyis las byung ba/_ma~M hU~M las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa/_phyag brgyad g.yas brkyang ba/_zhal bzhi ni gnag pa dang ser ba/_
[\[102b.4\]]dmar ba dang ljang gu'o/_/gzhan bzhi ni ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'o/_/rdo rje dang /_dril bu dang /_rnge'u chung dang /_ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga dang /_ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu'o/_/sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba tshes pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan dang dpral bar tho pa'i steng du mi 
[\[102b.5\]]bskyod pa'i cod pan can no/_/phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa/_rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa/_tshangs pa'i pags pas rked pa'i sham thabs can gyi skur bzhengs shing ha ha'i gad rgyangs dang phe~M ka ra'i tshol ba'i sgra chen po'i nga ro bsgrags shing brjod pa 
[\[102b.6\]]tsam gyis tshangs pa'i yul sa bye ba'i grangs kyi thod pa'i lto brlag par mdzad pa/_mi bzad pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_ce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang /_sha za'i tshogs ha har rgod pa dang /_nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan 
[\[102b.7\]]pa'i gar byed pa'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba/_/sgrub pa po ni 'grub 'gyur ba/_/sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog_/sbrang rtsi ga bur gyis ni byug_/dri zhim pa yi me tog 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bkram/_/me tog gis ni chal bar dgram/_/chu ngogs yang na thang stong du/_/rdo rje skud pa yis ni bskor/_/mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma/_/zla ba nyi mas pad+ma khengs/_/lang tsho gsar la reg bya 'jam/_/dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya/_/sngags kyi 
[\[103a.2\]]gnas su lugs ji bzhin/_/legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya/_/de yi sbyor bas gang zhig 'byung /_/kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya/_/rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu/_/mkhas pas khro bo'i sngags kyis gdab/_/A li kA li mnyam byas nas/_/'dab 
[\[103a.3\]]ma kun la rim pas dgod/_/A li ye shes 'dab mar gcig_/kA li 'dab ma bdun du dran/_/'dab ma re re yi ge lnga/_/lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o/_/'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te/_/k+ShaHyi yig 'bru lte nang ngo /_/dbyangs yig gsal yig bye brag tu/_/A li kA li 
[\[103a.4\]]'du shes yin/_/gnyis kyi yi ge 'dab ma yis/_/sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid dran/_/dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i dbang /_/de nas 'dab gnyis kyi dang por/_/bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa/_/'og tu re pha yis ni brgyan/_/de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/_/'dab 
[\[103a.5\]]ma gnyis pa'i bzhi ba'o/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/khro ba'i ngan 'gro dag byed pa/_/'dab gnyis dang po bzhi pa yin/_/de nas gsal byed pa yis brgyan/_/'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yin/_/ldan pa thams cad rims 'grog byed/_/gsal byed 
[\[103a.6\]]pa la gsum pa ste/_/bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yis/_/lha yi dbang phyug brgyan pa'o/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang /_/de nas de yi dang po'o/_/bcu drug pa la gsum pas ldan/_/thams cad sngags kyi tshig gi gzhi/_/de nas sa ni dag pa 
[\[103a.7\]]dang /_/de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o/_/yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum/_/dbyangs yig drug pa yang dag ldan/_/thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi/_/zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan/_/de ni de dang nye bar gnas/_/sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog_/gang zhig 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang /_/gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa/_/mthar ni swA hA ldan pa ste/_/snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog_/dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog_/'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o/_/'og tu re ba yang dag ldan/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar/_/rig pa'i 
[\[103b.2\]]rgyal po'i yi ge mchog_/thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan/_/de rang du ni nye bar gnas/_/thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog_/thigs pas mnan pas sum cu gsum/_/bcu drug pa ni gnyis par ldan/_/yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog_/khams gsum mun pa sel bar byed/_/
[\[103b.3\]]hU~M phaT de ni gnyi ga sbyar/_/tha mar swA hA yis ni ldan/_/nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya/_/bcom ldan ye shes thig les so/_/dang por rnam par snang mdzad dag_/nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so/_/gsal byed pa ni bzhi gnyis pa/_/nyi shu rtsa bdun pas ni ldan/_/nyi shu rtsa 
[\[103b.4\]]gnyis pa yi gzhan/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas ldan/_/bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o/_/de dang nye bar rlung yin no/_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan/_/'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/ha yi yig 'bru de dang nye/_/lnga pa yi ni 
[\[103b.5\]]gsum pa dang /_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so/_/lnga pa yi ni dang po dang /_/nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so/_/dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan/_/khams gsum dgug par nus pa'o/_/gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang /_/nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ldan/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dag dang /_/
[\[103b.6\]]dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas ldan/_/nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig ldan/_/swA hA mtha' ru ldan pa ni/_/hU~M hU~M phaT kyis spel bar bya/_/de ni phyag rgya che snying po/_/yid bzhin rin chen mnyam pa'i 'od/_/dang po yi ni pra Na pa/_/de nas 
[\[103b.7\]]'dab gnyis pa yi gsum/_/ya yi sde tshan gnyis pa dang /_/nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa yis/_/snying la khong du chud par bya/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi phyed dag pa/_/ra yi yig 'bru de dang mnyam/_/tha mar swA hA dang ldan pa/_/hU~M hU~M phaT ni spel ba 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]yin/_/nye ba'i snying po sngags chen po/_/thams cad sngags kyi bdag po mchog_/o~M shrI ma hA kA ru Na kru ta/_ma tA be bed/_s+phA ra Na ma hA ka lpA n+tA g+ne/_sam pra b+ha dza ya bi dza ya/_aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/_ma hA g+ho ra g+ho re shwa ra ma hA bI ra bI re shwa ra ma hA ru d+hi rAM tra mA la d+ha ra/_
[\[104a.2\]]sau ma sUr+ya mag+ni lo tsa na/_A kA shod ra/_ma hA sA sa gang kog+go/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha/_bid+h+waMs ya bid+h+waMs ya/_Akar+Sha ya A ker+Sha ya/_b+hAny+dza ye b+hA+eMny+dza ya/_tsUr+N+Na ya tsUr+N+Na ya/_ha ha ha ha/_hi hi hi hi/_ma hA ru d+hi ra/_pA Ni mardA ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT 
[\[104a.3\]]phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA kro d+he shra rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA bai be De s+phA ra NA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA kalpAn+ta ag+nis ma pra b+hA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M dza ya bi dza ya aT+TAT+Ta hA sA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA g+ho ra g+ho re shA rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA bI re shwa rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA ru d+hi rAn+ta 
[\[104a.4\]]mA la d+ha rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M sau ma sUr+ya ag+ni lo tsa nA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M A kA shod rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA sA sa ga ra kok+ke ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ha na ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M da ha da ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M bi d+haMs ya bid+h+waM sa ya hU~M 
[\[104a.5\]]phaT swA hA/_o~M A kaR+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M b+hAny+dza ya b+hAny+dza ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M tsUr+N+Na ya tsUr+N+Na ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M hi hi hi hi hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA ru d+hir pA Ni marngA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M phaT phaT phaT phaT hU~M phaT 
[\[104a.6\]]swA hA/_/phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha/_/las thams cad ni rab grub byed/_/o~M ma hA kA ma rU pi NI ye sar sar/_bi sar bi sar/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_sar+b+bA r+thaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_sar+b+bA mA raM/_nir+m+ma tha nir+m+ma tha/_ma hA bI re bI re shwa ra sa p+ta pA tA la/_ba da re Ne/_sap+tasA ga ra/_shu Sha 
[\[104a.7\]]Ne ru Sha Ne mu ha Na/_dzaM b+ha ne/_staM b+ha ne/_tre lo kya b+ha yaM ka re/_haM haM hiM hiM hU~M hU~M/_ki li ki li/_si li si li/_hi li hi li/_Di li Di li/_ma hA kakh+bAg+ne sa ma pra b+hA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha/_/bcom ldan mo yi bdag gis bstan/_/ha d+hU~M d+hU~M/_kru~M kru~M/_g+h+rauM g+h+rauM/_
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]mro~M mro~M/_dzro~M dzro~M/_TA~M TA~M/_pra~M pra~M/_sro~M sro~M/_tro~M tro~M/_Tu~M Tu~M/_phro~M phro~M/_bro~M bro~M/_yo~M yo~M/_hro~M hro~M/_shro~M shro~M/_ku~M ku~M/_'khor lo'i sngags ni sngags chen po/_/dpa' bo rnams kyi snying po mchog_/a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au a~M aH_dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags/_/lha yi dbang 
[\[104b.2\]]phyug bdag gis bshad/_/dang por o~M dang mtha' hU~M phaT/_/bar du ming ni spel ba'o/_/gsang ba'i sngags kyi dgod pa ni/_/mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya/_/o~M nA da ni rma lA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ban+du+ir+tha ga me hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA kA lA grA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M na da ma tra swa rU pA ya hU~M hU~M/_
[\[104b.3\]]phaT/_o~M par shu rU pA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M a parA ma na bu~M gA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_ye shes drug gi mchog sngags dbang /_/'khor lo drug pa'i nang na bzhugs/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po/_'di yi sngags kyis mchod par bya/_/a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha sgra ni grags/_/sde tshan 
[\[104b.4\]]brgyad kyi gtso bo yin/_/rtsa ba'i sde tshan gtor ma gtang /_/brtag pa gnyis kyi ji bzhin no/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am snying po yis/_/mig mi 'dzums pa'i lta bas sbyin/_/bsrung 'khor yod pa'i khro bo yi/_/de yi sngags ni bdag gis bshad/_dzrem+b+ha dzrem+b+ha/_g+hu g+hu ro g+hu g+hu 
[\[104b.5\]]ro/_/d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/_Ta g+he Ta Ta g+he Ta/_s+pho liM gi s+pho liM gi/_a ta a ta hA sa/_aT+Ta maT+Ta hAs/_hU lu hU lu/_bikra ma bi kra ma/_hU~M phaT kyis ni mtha' mar ldan/_/bar du ming ni spel ba'o/_/rdo rje gsum pa ye shes rgyal/_/oM AHhU~M ni sngags kyi mchog_/dpal 
[\[104b.6\]]ye shes thig le las sngags btub zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas mchod sbyin rab bde ga bshad/_/gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyor/_/bskyed pa'i bye brag thigs pa gsum/_/rdzogs pa'i rim gsum de ltar ro/_/rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu/_/mchod 
[\[104b.7\]]sbyin tshangs pa'i yul sa che/_/rnam par shes ba longs spyod dang /_/snang dang nam mkha' ye shes bzhin/_/sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu/_/dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed/_/ji bzhin 'dod pa sdug pa ni/_/mchod sbyin rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor/_/au r+ya na la sogs gnas su 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]ni/_/legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo kun/_/kA li ye shes yig mchog sbyin/_/phyi dang nang du bya ba'o/_/mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che/_/'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye/_/sems can rnams kyis bye brag tu/_/sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad/_/kha cig 
[\[105a.2\]]rnams la 'bul ba'i thabs/_/kha cig rnams la mdo sde'o/_/la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam/_/kha cig la ni sngags kyi mchog_/rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag tu/_/thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no/_/blo gros che yang theg gzhan gyis/_/grangs med gsum gyis sangs rgyas 
[\[105a.3\]]yin/_/sngags kyi theg pa la mos na/_/tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so/_/yang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos/_/yang na lus ni spangs ma thag_/bla na med pa'i ye shes dag_/brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed/_/brtson 'grus ldan pas smos ci dgos/_/
[\[105a.4\]]brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad/_/'bad pa med kyang 'grub pa yin/_/don kun grub pa'i bsod nams can/_/rtog med nyon mongs med pa'o/_/gang zhig las ni ci byed pa/_/de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod/_/de kun mchod pa la 
[\[105a.5\]]sogs yin/_/de ni mchod sbyin 'phel ba yin/_/mchod las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed/_/de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa/_/rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba/_/'bras bu chen po thams cad sbyin/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gzhi yi mchog_/dpal ye shes thig le las mchod sbyin gyi cho ga 
[\[105a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/yid 'phrog lha yi me tog gis/_/zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan/_/me dang sgron ma rmad du byung /_/mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya/_/dbang ni mar ngo'i dang po yi/_/
[\[105a.7\]]bcu drug pa yi dang po yis/_/gnyis pa yi ni rab thim gsum/_/bcu drug dang po'i 'og ma yis/_/gsum pa yi ni longs spyod yin/_/bcu drug pa yi gsum pas so/_/bzhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung /_/gsum pa yi ni 'og mas so/_/lnga pa yi ni longs spyod yin/_/bcu drug 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa yi lnga pas so/_/drug pa yi ni thim pa 'byung /_/bcu drug pa yi drug pas so/_/'dun pa yi ni rab mchod dbang /_/mar ngo yi ni brgyad pa dang /_/dbyangs yig brgyad pos mchod par bya/_/dgu pa yi ni longs spyod 'byung /_/bcu drug pa yi dgu pas so/_/bcu ba yi ni thim pa 
[\[105b.2\]]'byung /_/dbyangs yig gi ni bcu pas so/_/bcu gcig pa yi dbang yin te/_/bcu gcig pa yis mchod par bya/_/bcu gnyis kyi ni thim pa 'byung /_/dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po yis so/_/bcu gsum pa yi longs spyod ni/_/de gnyis kyis ni mchod par bya/_/bcu bzhi 
[\[105b.3\]]yis ni thim par 'gyur/_/dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyis mchod/_/nya gang ba la dbang yin te/_/dbyangs yig [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis so/_/byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yin/_/yar ngo mar ngo bye brag tu/_/shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor/_/sku gsum ye shes dkyil 
[\[105b.4\]]'khor ni/_/tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su/_/ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/thig le'i nam mkha' 'gog pa yis/_/rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'/_/bdag gis bka' drin rang 
[\[105b.5\]]bzhin myur/_/the tshom med par rnyed pa yin/_/blun po gang gis bdag mi shes/_/bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa/_/de rnams kun ni grub pa med/_/lha yi dbang phyug bden pa'o/_/sa kun dbang phyug gis bdag po/_/sa kun dbang phyug mnga' bdag po/_/sa kun 
[\[105b.6\]]dbang phyug gi rgyal po/_/thams cad bdag nyid kun nang bdag_/thams cad khyab pa rtag tu stong /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/_/shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin grags/_/'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol/_/mchog gi nam mkha' mtha' med pa/_/mtshan nyid 
[\[105b.7\]]dang bral gzhi dang bral/_/lha yi dbang rnams thub dbang rnams/_/rdo rje can yang rnyed dka' ba/_/chos dang longs spyod bdag gis mtha'/_/ye shes rnam shes ngo bo dag_/rdo rje can dang sangs rgyas kun/_/lha yi dbang phyug rnyed par sla/_/rnam pa mchog gi ye shes sku/_/sus 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]kyang sla ba ma yin no/_/dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/_/sbyin sreg sdig pa 'jig byed pa/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin dbang dang drag po'o/_/zhi ba'i hom khung zlum 
[\[106a.2\]]po ste/_/rgyas pa yi ni gru bzhi'o/_/dbang ni gzhu yi rnam pa bzhin/_/drag po yi ni gru gsum mo/_/dkar po ser dang de bzhin dmar/_/nag po 'di ni rim pas so/_/rgya mtsho me dang mig zla ba/_/lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no/_/gzhan kun gyi ni rim pas gcig_/
[\[106a.3\]]sngar grub kyis ni gzhan ma 'grub/_/hom khung re rer snying gar pad/_/rigs kyi las kyi [{]go rims so[,]go rim mo[}]mo/_/de steng sna tshogs rdo rje ste/_/'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'o/_/lte ba'i nang du me lha ni/_/zhal gsum pa dang phyag bzhi pa/_/sku mdog ser po spyan zlum pa/_/ral ba'i 
[\[106a.4\]]cod pan gyis ni brgyan/_/'bar ba'i mche ba 'jigs pa che/_/rdo rje skyil krung du ni bzhugs/_/ba dan gsum dang bgrang phreng g.yas/_/g.yon na dbyig gu spyi blugs so/_/snying ga ru ni me yi lha/_/lce bdun 'od ldan gsal bar 'byung /_/cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan 
[\[106a.5\]]mgon/_/thig le'i dbus su me yin no/_/tshur gshegs 'od zer cher ldan pa/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub dbang po/_/o~M b+hUr b+hu ba swA hA/_rang byung chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa ster/_/me lha las kun sgrub byed pa/_/'dir ni bdag la 
[\[106a.6\]]nye bar bzhugs/_/me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/de nas mchod yon dang nye reg dang /_'thor 'thung ngo /_/o~M hriM hriM/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/o~M b+hI b+hI nye reg gi sngags so/_/a b+ho k+Sha a b+ho k+Sha 'thor 'thung gi sngags so/_/de nas gdan dbul ba ni/_mdzub 
[\[106a.7\]]mo lu gu rgyud byas nas/_/bar ma sbyar byed kyi ni gzugs/_/srin lag mig gi bye brag tu/_/mthe chung mthe bong zlum po ste/_/gdan dbul ba yi phyag rgya'o/_/mkhas pa yis ni yo byad kun/_/dang po nye ba nyid du bya/_/dka' ba med par ji ltar rnyed/_/de ni de nyid rab 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]grub bya/_/sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che/_/sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos/_/yid mi 'phrogs shing gsal ba'o/_/thig le tshul ni ye shes che/_/bye brag shes pa rin chen rigs/_/rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma yi lnga/_/yi [(]dag [,]d+w+wags [)]
[\[106b.2\]]khu ba yis ni tshim/_/spyan [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang dag pa ma/_/'o 'dzin sra zhing 'jam la mtho/_/sbyin sreg gnas su gar dang ldan/_/gcer bu dang ni skra grol ba/_/sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir/_/rigs lnga'i bu mo gzhug par bya/_/shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/_/bla ma nyid kyis 
[\[106b.3\]]dang por mchod/_/brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'i/_/'dzin pa 'dir ni mi bya'o/_/rtog pa'i 'byung pos zin pa la/_/sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan/_/don dam du ni phyi don med/_/nang gi ma yin par ma min/_/rdul med rnam par rdul med dag_/stong pa dang ni stong min 
[\[106b.4\]]bral/_/rang rig ngo bo rang rig bral/_/ngag gi lam gyis mi rnyed do/_/phung po khams ni rnam par rtog_/lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig sreg_/de ni me yi don dam par/_/lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o/_/thams cad rnam pa mchog gis rdzogs/_/chos kun gyi ni nang na bzhugs/_/
[\[106b.5\]]kun rdzob rnam pas gzugs su ni/_/lha yi dbang phyug kun brtags yin/_/kun brtags ye shes sbyor ba yis/_/rim pas gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog gi rgyur/_/rang dang gzhan gyi grub don du/_/mchod sbyin sbyin 
[\[106b.6\]]sreg gtor ma bya/_/bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel phyir dang /_/sems can phan don de dag bya/_/nas dang /_til dang /_'bras so ba dang /_gro dang /_'bras dang /_bo ka ling+ga dang /_yungs kar dang /_sman thams cad dang /_dzA ti pha la dang /_go yu'i 'bras bu dang /_dpal 'bras dang /_
[\[106b.7\]]nA ga ge sar dang /_gur kum dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ga pur dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_thug pa dang /_bska pa dang /_la du dang /_'khur ba la sogs pa dang /_gu gul dang /_si h+la dang /_gu gul dkar po dang /_yan lag bcu pa la sogs pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_mar me dang /_
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dri dang /_lha bshos dang /_mda' dang dar la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_me thab kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams kyi bye brag tu bum pa kun la sman sna tshogs dang /_kha rgyan gyis brgyan cing dri zhim pa'i chus lto ba bkang la/_dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa brgyan 
[\[107a.2\]]pa'o/_/zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad la bya'o/_/rgyas pa la ni gser gyi 'od/_/thams cad kun gyis rab tu brtag_/dbang la thams cad 'od dmar po/_/zho dang 'o ma gnyis spangs pa/_/yungs nag dang ni sbrul nag po'i/_/pags ba bya rog gi ni mchu/_/bya rog 
[\[107a.3\]]nag po yi ni snying /_/klad pa rgyu ma rkang mar mgo/_/thams cad nag po yi ni mdog_/khyi dag gi ni mjug ma'o/_/yungs nag mar khu mar khu che/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gzhi dang mar khu dang /_/phyed tshig yi dwags kyi ni ras/_/rus tshig bud shing tshig pa dang /_/tsher ma rno la bzang ba dang /_/
[\[107a.4\]]tsher ma'i me tog ba ru ra/_/thug pa nag po ma bsres pa/_/drag po la ni rab tu brtag_/gzhan min dpa' bo'i dbang phyug bsam/_/drag po la sogs su ni bya/_/rang gi de nyid zhi la sogs/_/phyag rgya la sogs rgyan dang ldan/_/mar sar dri ma med pa dang /_/skyon dang bral ba'i me tog 
[\[107a.5\]]shing /_/gsar pa skam zhing dri zhim pa/_/du ba med cing skyon dang bral/_/thams cad la ni khru re'i tshad/_/las la mkhas pas de ltar bya/_/yang ni yam shing rab tu bstan/_/ji ltar rnyed pa 'bad pas so/_/sha mi sha dang /_/sha mo ka dang /_/sham bag ka dad/_a shwat+tha dang /_bla k+Sha 
[\[107a.6\]]dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha dang /_dUr ba dang /_a pa ma rka dang /_pis pa la dang /_kha dir dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a sho ka de rnams sor brgyad pa'i tshad do/_/dgang gzar blugs gzar mar gyi snod/_/rin po che ru ji ltar bstan/_/lag pa yi ni dbyug pa tshad/_/'bad pa yis ni dgang gzar bya/_/
[\[107a.7\]]dgang gzar ji bzhin blugs gzar te/_/mar khu'i snod ni de dang ma nyam/_/gru gsum zlum po'i rnam pa dang /_/rdo rje yis ni rnam par brgyan/_/dgang gzar gyi ni kha zhes bya/_/sor drug pa yi tshad du ni/_/mgo bo yang ni de bzhin bya/_/thams cad kun du gru bzhi bya/_/sna tshogs rdo rje snying 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]ga ru/_/lte ba pad+ma yis ni brgyan/_/chu srin kha nas byung ba yi/_/rtse dgu pa yi rdo rje yis/_/dgang gzar gyi ni mtha' ru ldan/_/blugs gzar ba yi mig dang 'dra/_/yang na de ni pad+mas so/_/nang gi gting ring gsal ba dang /_/ha cang ring dang thung ma yin/_/rdo rje phra mos nang du 
[\[107b.2\]]brgyan/_/mar zhu'i snod ni zlum por grags/_/lte ba ring zhing dri ma med/_/rdo rje la sogs rgyan dang ldan/_/lci ba dang ni yang ba spang /_/zhi ba la sogs bye brag tu/_/bzhi ru dbye ba bdag gis bas bstan/_/drug po de ni dur khrod du/_/dbang ni chu yi ngogs su bya/_/rgyas pa 
[\[107b.3\]]zhing gi dbus su ste/_/yang na dgon pa chen po ru/_/zhi ba de ni grong khyer du/_/yang na rgyal po yi ni khab/_/rta dang glang po chen po dang /_/gzhon nu ma dang ba la sogs/_/sbyin sreg dus su 'bad pa yis/_/sngags pas slob dpon la dbul bya/_/zha bo 'on pa dman pa 
[\[107b.4\]]la'ang /_/ci nus kyis ni sbyin par bya/_/dpal ye shes thig le las sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma che/_/khyim ni sum thog gi ni gnas/_/chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi/_/phyi rol 
[\[107b.5\]]yul min nang gi min/_/slob dpon 'dus las brgyan pa dang /_/rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs/_/rdo rje skud la sogs pas bskor/_/de lta bu yi khang mchog ni/_/sna tshogs me tog la sogs kyis/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bya/_/si h+la ga bur gyis ni 
[\[107b.6\]]mdzes/_/de ru mchod sbyin don du ni/_/byol song gzugs ni rab tu blang /_/skye ba gcig gam gnyis pa 'am/_/yang na gsum pa lang tsho sar/_/nad kun med pa'i bde grub pa/_/dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can/_/gang zhig mig ni yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzums/_/mkhas pas 'bad 
[\[107b.7\]]de blang bar bya/_/sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis/_/gri gug rung bas brtag par bya/_/yan lag rab kyi pad+ma'i snod/_/btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun/_/phyed ni 'khor lo la bri ma ste/_/phyed ni gtor mar gtang bar bya/_/khrag chen dang ni sha chen po/_/ci rnyed pa ni brtag pa 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]yin/_/gzhan ni sna tshogs mchog bye brag_/nya dang sha la sogs par ldan/_/mi 'tshe ba dang skyon kun bral/_/sdig pa med dang ma bslangs pa'o/_/chang ni chen po dang ldan pa/_/glu dang rol mos rab tu mdzes/_/sgron ma lnga dang bsres pas ni/_/de bzhin 
[\[108a.2\]]gshegs pa lnga dang ldan/_/sna tshogs dbus su yan lag mchog_/gang bas dkyil 'khor mdun du bzhag_/ji ltar bla ma mchod dus su/_/ji bzhin pa yi phyag rgya bcing /_/de bzhin du ni sna tshogs kyis kyang /_/rtse gcig gis ni bcing bar bya/_/ldang ba'am ni 'dug pa'i 
[\[108a.3\]]tshe/_/tshogs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu dbyangs ni snyan pa yis/_/yid 'phrog pa yi glu blang bya/_/the tshom dang ni tshigs bcad min/_/ma gnang rdo rje gar mi bya/_/rkang pa rkyong dang gnyid log pa/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lor mi bya'o/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems ji 
[\[108a.4\]]bzhin/_/dpal ldan las kyi rdo rje'o/_/ci mdzad pa dang ci gsung ba/_/de ni mkhas pas 'bad de bsgrub/_/de ltar min na chad pa 'bab/_/ji tsam nus pa yod pa yis/_/de ru dam tshig dag pa ni/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bzhin bsrung bya/_/dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub 
[\[108a.5\]]pa ni/_/lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa'o/_/dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te/_/dad pa yis ni rtag tu bza'/_/dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su/_/'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim/_/rab tshim byas nas gtor ma dbul/_/nam phyed lam gyi bzhi mdor ro/_/yang na 
[\[108a.6\]]sum mdo gyes pa ru/_/dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su/_/lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud/_/de kun bsres te chu yis sbyang /_/gzhan rnams kun ni so sor bzhag_/rtsa ba ji bzhin rim pas bzhag_/rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni/_/'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag_/slob 
[\[108a.7\]]dpon la ni dum bu gcig_/'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya/_/rang gi tshogs la'ang sbyin mi bya/_/rang dbang bskur ba'ang de bzhin no/_/g.yon gyi yan lag phyag rgyas gar/_/g.yon gyi lag pas mchod pa'o/_/g.yon gyi rkang pas sdun byas nas/_/g.yon mig gis ni blta bya'o/_/
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]gal te re zhig de'i dus su rnal 'byor mas brtag pa'i don gyi phyir 'ongs na 'jigs par mi bya ste/_/seng ge lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su brtag go/_/de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs pa dang /_phyag rgya sna tshogs pa dang /_skad sna tshogs pa rab tu byed do/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[108b.2\]]dang por rgyang ring po nas ha har rgod pa de'i tshe khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya sbyin no/_/de'i dus su ha'i yig 'bru lnga sgra chen pos brjod par bya'o/_/cung zad nye bar 'ongs na a la la zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe phrad tsam na lag pa bskor na de'i tshe gyen du lag pa'i dbyug 
[\[108b.3\]]pa bsgreng ba'i mdzub mo sbyin no/_/gang gi tshe smin ma 'byed par byed na de'i tshe 'jigs par lce bsgril bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe steng du blta ba de'i tshe g.yon brkyang bas mnan par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyab nas blta ba de'i tshe g.yas brkyang bas mnan par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rnam par rgod pa 
[\[108b.4\]]de'i tshe pheM ka ra zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe ngu ba de'i tshe rgod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gar byed pa de'i tshe stong khengs bya'o/_/gang gi tshe skra bkrol ba de'i tshe gtsug pud dgrol lo/_/gang gi tshe gos bor bar byed pa de'i tshe langs te gci ba gtang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gci ba 
[\[108b.5\]]'thung ba de'i tshe rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong gis rtswa btog par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gtam 'dri ba de'i tshe smra bar mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe 'phrug pa de'i tshe ral pa mdud par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dpral bar reg pa de'i tshe steng gi mtshams kyi mthar reg go/_/gang gi tshe rna bar reg pa de'i tshe 
[\[108b.6\]]mgrin pa la reg par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe sna la reg pa de'i tshe lce phyir dbyung ngo /_/gang gi tshe mgrin pa ston pa de'i tshe lag pa brkyang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe nu ma ston pa de'i tshe mig bsrubs bskyod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe lte ba ston pa de'i tshe se gol sbyin par bya'o/_/gang gi 
[\[108b.7\]]tshe rked pa bsgul pa de'i tshe mtshan bstan par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rkang pa rkyong ba de'i tshe mthe'u chung gnyis kha gdang bar bya ba dang /_mdzub mos mig kyang de bzhin no/_/sna'i phur ma bar ma'i lce phyi rang byung bar bya zhing g.yas brkyang dang g.yon brkyang sbyin no/_/gang gi tshe sna 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan pa de'i tshe 'khor lo bcu'i sngags brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe yi ge'i don brjod pa de'i tshe yi ges lan brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe phyir brjod pa de'i tshe sha'i lan smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyal mtshan zhes smra ba de'i tshe 
[\[109a.2\]]mtshan zhes slar brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe pad+ma brjod pa de'i tshe mngal zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gshol zhes smra ba de'i tshe lag pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i len pa de'i tshe sha li zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe tsho na rtsi zhes brjod pa de'i tshe zan zhes brjod 
[\[109a.3\]]par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe srog ces brjod pa de'i tshe chu zla zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rnyed pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yid ces bstan no/_/gang gi tshe mi dga' ba brjod pa de'i tshe lam bstan no/_/gang gi tshe khro ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe chang btung zhing slar brjod do/_/gang gi tshe mod pa 
[\[109a.4\]]zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal so zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe brtan pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gnyid ces smra'o/_/gang gi tshe dus brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gos zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe nyi ma dran no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe skom zhes smra'o/_/gang 
[\[109a.5\]]gi tshe me zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grib ma zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe nya zhes brjod pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe glu'i sgra brjod pa de'i tshe gser zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshes le sbra ma zhes smra ba de'i tshe khyer zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sa zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe nga 
[\[109a.6\]]rgyal zhes brjod pa de'i tshe rlung zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe mtsho zhes smra ba de'i tshe legs zhes brjod do/_/gang gi tshe mda' zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrims 'chal zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe chags pa'i sgra byed pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe 'o ma sa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe song zhes smra'o/_/
[\[109a.7\]]gang gi tshe ser sna zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grub ces smra'o/_/gang gi tshe nyal zhes brjod pa de'i tshe med ces brjod do/_/gang gi tshe 'bru zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yang dge ces smra'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyas pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chu zhes brjod do/_/gang gi tshe ri bong zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chen zhes 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]brjod do/_/gang gi tshe gshol zhes brjod pa de'i tshe brag ces smra'o/_/gang gi tshe grang zhes smra ba de'i tshe khu ba zhes brjod do/_/gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba phrad ces smra'o/_/gang gi tshe pa la sha zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal zhes smra'o/_/gang gi tshe sin d+hu brjod 
[\[109b.2\]]pa de'i tshe mi khom zhes smra'o/_/gzhan na rang gi yi ge'i rtsa ba'i don shes par bya'o/_/bud med gang zhig rkang lag chen po de ni g.yon du gtang ngo /_/bud med gang zhig mig ser zhing sna nyams pa de dag g.yas kyi char btang /_bud med gang zhig sna ring la lag pa dang sor 
[\[109b.3\]]mo ring ba/_spu mang ba de dag gi mdun du se gol gsum sbyin par bya'o/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog gnag cing gsus khyim smad du 'phyang la nu ma 'jol zhing so che ba de dag gi mdun du gcib btang ngo /_/bud med gang zhig skra ser zhing mig zlum la/_sen mo ring ba mgrin pa ring 
[\[109b.4\]]ba de dag gi mdun du gad rgyangs chen po bya'o/_/bud med gang zhig tsam pa'i me tog ltar dkar zhing skad 'jam la mig ring ba so ri lta bu dri zhim po la dga' zhing bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/_zur mig lta ba mnyam par ma bzhag par de lta bu byed pa de'i mdun du cang mi smra bar sa la blta zhing 
[\[109b.5\]]myur ba myur bar g.yon ngos su 'gro bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i dus su snying po'i sngags zlos shing phreng ba bgrang bar bya'o/_/bud med gang zhig sor mo gcig ni mdzub mo brkyang ste/_gzugs sngon po dga' bar lta ba gos dpung pa'i ngos su 'phyang ba/_smin ma'i dbus na dngos su phyag rgya 
[\[109b.6\]]pad+ma'i dbyibs sam 'khril shing ngam/_yang na a sho ka mnyen po'i rtse mo dang 'dra ba mjug ma de dang lhan cig 'bad pas 'dus pa bya'o/_/des ni thams cad 'grub par byed pa dang /_'bras bu thams cad byed pa dga' ba chen po skyed par byed pas/_de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen 
[\[109b.7\]]po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du rgya chen po'i sems kyis rtog pa med par sbyin par bya'o/_/shin tu rgya che'i snod dag tu/_/cho ga yis ni dgod par bya/_/dbus su dpal ldan 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang bcas/_/khrag chen pos ni yang 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dag bkang /_/ka pA la ni phyag g.yas su'o/_/lha chen sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan/_/langs pa phyag ni g.yon pas so/_/nag po me yi drag po shar/_/nag po chen po lho phyogs su/_/nub kyi phyogs su 'jigs byed dang /_/drag po chen po byang gi 
[\[110a.2\]]phyogs/_/me yi mtshams drag ral ba can/_/chu bdag mtshams su dbyug nag po/_/rlung gi mtshams su ro langs drag_/dbang ldan he ru ka ni gnag/_/pags mgo ma dang /_sgra ma dang /_drag ma dang /_thod pa ma dang /_nag mo dang /_sha li dang /_gtum mo dang /_rigs 
[\[110a.3\]]ma dang /_skom ma dang /_phag mo dang /_sha ba ri dang /_bram ze mo dang /_ral pa gsum ma dang /_ral drag ma dang /_drag mig ma dang /_sdug ma dang /_g.yas skor g.yon skor sdud pa yis/_snod rlon par rim pas gzhag go/_/de'i phyi rol du 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad 
[\[110a.4\]]tshogs mang po dang bcas pas bskor ba'o/_/klu chen po brgyad/_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo dang /_tse ta dang /_tsi ti 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro dang /_mkha' 'gro ma du ma dang /_ma mo mang po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_
[\[110a.5\]]sha za dang /_un+mA da dang /_brjed byed dang /_gdug ngan can grangs med pa dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_gsol cig gsol cig_/dam tshig bskyang bar mdzod cig_/'thung shig_/bdag gi las thams cad grub par mdzod cig_/dam tshig zung shig_/hU~M hU~M 
[\[110a.6\]]phaT phaT swA hA/_dpal ye shes thig le las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang /_gtor ma chen po dang /_rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid dang /_gsang ba'i tshig dang /_phyag rgya'i brda zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang 
[\[110a.7\]]phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan ye shes rgyal dbang po/_/dkyil 'khor mdor ni bstan pa gsungs/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'di ru nges bstan ji ltar lags/_/mnga' bdag chen po nyid bka' stsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni nges bstan pa sten pa/_/ji bzhin de nyid dpa' bo nyon/_/sngar gsungs pa yi rgyud don las/_/A li kA li bde ba che/_ma~M hU~M 
[\[110b.2\]]gnyis las thig le'i tshul/_/de gnyis las ni gri gug pad/_/ye shes me 'od las ye shes/_/snying po'i bdag nyid zhu las byung /_/char sprin dang ni mnyam pa'i mdog_/phyag ni brgyad gnyis pa yis brgyan/_/bcu drug phyed kyi zhal 'jigs pa/_/zhabs bzhi 
[\[110b.3\]]yis ni rab tu mdzes/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi spyan gyis phyag_/gti mug gsum gyi mun nag 'joms/_/dkar po ser po dmar po'i zhal/_/steng zhal bung ba'i byad gzugs can/_/g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis ni/_/'jigs byed zla nyi shin tu mnan/_/'jigs 
[\[110b.4\]]byed ma ldan ka pA la/_/khrag gis bkang ba phyag na bsnams/_/zhi ba'i pags pa na bza' mchog_/phyag gnyis kyis ni gyen du brgyangs/_/tshangs pa'i pags pas sham thabs byas/_/phyag rgya drug gis sku la bcings/_/phyag rgya che dang gnyis med sbyor/_/gar dang 
[\[110b.5\]]ldan pa'i tshangs spyod bzhugs/_/tshangs pa'i yul sa bye ba gsol/_/tshangs pa'i yul sa'i zhal gyis brgyan/_/phyag rgya chen po nam mkha' sngo/_/phyag gnyis pa ni na bza' grol/_/gri gug snod bsnams zhi ba'i zhal/_/spyan gsum pa dang skra bkrol ba/_/
[\[110b.6\]]mgrin par 'khyud pa gsang ba mchog_/dpa' bo la ni rang bzhin bzhugs/_/dpa' bo mchog gi rnam pa dgyes/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i ral pas brgyan/_/mgon po sna tshogs zla cod pan/_/sna tshogs tshangs pa'i chang dang ldan/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/sna 
[\[110b.7\]]tshogs bdag nyid sna tshogs 'byung /_/sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/sna tshogs mgo bo'i phreng bas mdzes/_/sna tshogs gar gyi ro dang ldan/_/sna tshogs gti mug gcod par mdzad/_/sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid mgon/_/sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul 'joms par mdzad/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su ni/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis bskor/_/'jig rten skyong ba brgyad dang ldan/_/shing gi rgyal po brgyad kyis bskor/_/dkyil 'khor dgyes pa 'phar ma gnyis/_/lha yi dbang phyug 'dir bdag rol/_/dpa' bo rnal 
[\[111a.2\]]'byor ma dkyil 'khor/_/ji ltar bdag gis rol ba 'dir/_/de ru re zhig rim par dgyes/_/rtse gcig sems kyis khyod nyon cig_/dang por re zhig 'phar ma gcig_/sgo la sogs pa ka bas brgyan/_/gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kyi rim/_/lha yi dbang phyug 
[\[111a.3\]]bdag gis bshad/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i shar gyi auD+yan gyi gnas su nam mkha' dri med dang /_zla ba kha dog nag po'o/_/byang du dza lan d+ha rang shin du stobs chen dang g.yon pa ma dkar po'o/_/nub tu pu li rar lha'i dbang phyug dang nyi mnyam ma sku mdog dmar mo'o/_/
[\[111a.4\]]lhor kA ma rU par gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_rlung za ma ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog go/_/me mtshams su mA la war nye ba'i gnas su 'od drag dang bsil sbyin ma ljang khu'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi mtshams su sin d+hu'i yul du nyid gra dang /_snying po'i 'dab ma sku mdog pad+ma sngon po dang 
[\[111a.5\]]'dra ba'o/_/rlung gi mtshams su na gar ra mchod dga' dang /_bag yod thor cog ma zla ba ltar dkar mo'o/_/dbang ldan gyi mtshams su thams cad kyi byed pa po dang nyi 'dul ma nyi ma'i 'od lta bu'o/_/shar sgor mum+mu ni'i zhing du ut+pa la'i snying po dang /_zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya mo 
[\[111a.6\]]sngon mo chen mo'o/_/byang sgor de bi ko Tir zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang ljang brtson ma gur gum gyi mdog go/_/nub sgor nye zhing ku lu tar nag po 'dul ma dang 'od bdun ma dud pa nag po'i mdog go/_/lho sgor ar bu dar rmad du byung ba dpa' mo dang tshangs pa'i ma du ba'i mdog go/_/
[\[111a.7\]]shar lho'i mtshams su tshan+do ha ha ri ki la bar drag chen dang khyab 'jug ma sprin gyi mdog go/_/byang mtshams su ku ta bar dregs 'joms dang kham gser gyi mdog go/_/nub mtshams su nye ba'i tshan+do ha ra lA ma kar ri rab brtan ma dang thams cad skyed byed ma dmar nag go/_/lho 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]mtshams su kan+tsi kar nam mkha'i zhal dang dpa' bo'i yum gser gyi mdog go/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i 'khyud pa dang /_sku mdog dang bzhugs stabs 'dra ba'o/_/dpa' bo rnams ni zhal bzhi dang phyag bzhin kha T+wA~M ga dang /_ka pA la dang /_dril bu 
[\[111b.2\]]dang /_rnge'u chung bsnams pa'o/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan pad+ma'i steng du 'jigs byed kyi gdan la rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs kyis zla ba dang nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan pa/_me'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na nyi ma bye ba'i 'od pas gsal ba snang bar spro ba'o/_/'phar ma gnyis par sna 
[\[111b.3\]]tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /_sgo dang rta babs la sogs pa dang /_dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i shar gyi 'dab mar 'dus pa'i gnas las kyi yul du skam pa ma sprin mdog go/_/byang du gser gyi gling du 'jigs ma kha dog dmar mo chen mo'o/_/nub tu nye 
[\[111b.4\]]ba'i 'dus pa ku lu tar 'od ma dmar mo'o/_/lho rab ni dur mchu 'phyangs ma p+la k+sha'i mdog go/_/me'i mtshams su dur khrod du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dus par ri rab so ma zla ba'i mdog go/_/gnod sbyin gyi mtshams chu ngogs su dus kyi bde ba mar me'i 'od kyi mdog go/_/rlung mtshams 
[\[111b.5\]]nye ba'i dur khrod du tsa ri Tar nyi mig ma gser mdog go/_/dbang ldan gyi mtshams gzhon nu'i grong khyer du me'i zhal ma gser btso ma'i mdog go/_/shar sgor pi la ba ka smirar 'dod pa'i ma ser mo'o/_/byang sgor ki ra tar lce [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dkar mo'o/_/nub sgor nye ba'i pi la ba ne pA ler 
[\[111b.6\]]chos dkar ma zla ba ltar dkar mo'o/_/lho sgor kam+ba dzar ba dan mdog ma mar ka ta'i mdog go/_/shar mtshams lam gnas shar gyi lus 'phags su mig stong pa rdo rje sa la'i mdog go/_/byang mtshams su byang gi sgra mi snyan du stag mo baiDUR+Ya'i mdog go/_/nub mtshams su ba lang 
[\[111b.7\]]spyod du gtum mo mus ra ba'i mdog go/_/lho mtshams su nye ba'i lam 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dod pa'i gzugs ma sna tshogs mdog go/_/rnal 'byor ma thams cad zhal bzhi ma/_spyan gsum gsum phyag bzhi ma/_skra dang na bza' grol ba/_ral gri dang ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga dang /_
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rnge'u chung bsnams pa'o/_/ro'i steng du g.yon brkyang pas bzhugs pa'o/_/yang na rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs su rang 'od kyi thabs la 'khyud pa/_rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po/_/rgyud kun du ni rnyed pa dka'/_/
[\[112a.2\]]lus dang b+ha ga byang chub sems/_/dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go/_/yang na snying po dkyil 'khor bstan/_/rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir/_/ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod/_/Na yi yig 'bru lte bar dran/_/Da yi yig 'bru ge sar dag_/la yi yig 'bru de 
[\[112a.3\]]bde 'dra/_/ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags/_/Na yi yig 'bru mdud par brjod/_/Da yi yig 'bru ring po'i dngos/_/la yi yig 'bru khar brjod do/_/ma yi yig 'bru shu kra'i gzugs/_/Na yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i dngos/_/Da yi yig 'bru 'od dang ldan/_/la 
[\[112a.4\]]yi yig 'bru bde ba'i gzugs/_/ma ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags/_/Na ni yig 'bru snang ba mched/_/Da ni snang ba snang ba thob/_/la ni yang dag dri med mchog_/ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags/_/Na yi yig 'bru mchog tu dran/_/Da yi yig 'bru dga' 
[\[112a.5\]]bral dga'/_/la ni lhan cig skyes par dran/_/ma yi yig 'brus zhes bya/_/Na yi yig 'bru chu ru bstan/_/Da yi yig 'bru de ni me/_/la yi yig 'bru rlung gi gzugs/_/g.yo ba'i phyir ni rlung du brjod/_/yang na khyab pa'i phyir ni dran/_/ye shes rnyed pa yi 
[\[112a.6\]]ni phyir/_/bde ba yi ni chen po len/_/ye shes ngo bo bde ba che/_/dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso/_/thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral/_/rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/_/phyag rgya dang ni sngags dang bral/_/sngags chen 
[\[112a.7\]]kun dga' ra ba'i lam/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed dang bral ba/_/dri ma med pa bcos ma med/_/rgyu mtshan dang ni gzhi med pa/_/yang dag dri med gnas dag pa/_/rang bzhin grags pa skye med mkha'/_/dpa' bo'i ngo bor grags pa bdag_/rnam pa kun tu yang dag 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor pa dang bdag_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po bdag_/dpa' bo 'chang dang nyan pa bdag_/byed dang 'phrog dang mnga' bdag bdag_/chos kun gyi ni rang ngo bdag_/stong dang snying rje gnyis su med/_/stong pa chen po rang ngo grags/_/
[\[112b.2\]]gang du mi dmigs pa ni bdag_/dngos po ma yin bsam mi bya/_/dngos bdag de yang de nyid min/_/dngos dang dngos min rnam par grol/_/dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid bad bdag_/dngos dang dngos med gnyis las 'byung /_/dngos dang dngos med nang yod do/_/dur 
[\[112b.3\]]shing gi ni ro ji bzhin/_/ji ltar til gyi nang gi mar/_/ji ltar shing gi nang gi me/_/de bzhin thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs/_/'on kyang ye shes sems dpa' yis/_/bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/bdag 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs che/_/sems can don las nye 
[\[112b.4\]]bar nyams/_/sems can don las bsod nams gzhan/_/che ba gang na yang ni med/_/rang don sgrub la bsod nams min/_/skyes bu chen pos 'di lta bu/_/rang don ma rungs pa ni dor/_/gzhan la sdang nyams nyan thos sems/_/rang don gti mug 'dzin pas 
[\[112b.5\]]non/_/sems can don la rgyab kyis phyogs/_/grub pa chen po 'dod pa yis/_/de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya/_/de la gtam yang mi bya ste/_/thabs dang mi ldan 'jigs pa yis/_/mgo la nor bus brgyan kyang ni/_/sbrul nag bzhin du dor bar bya/_/nyan 
[\[112b.6\]]thos de dang nam yang min/_/de bas mu stegs 'dus pa mchog_/ji ltar [(]'thing [,]thang [)]shing snod chag pa/_/de ni gang du'ang dgos pa med/_/de bzhin nyan thos tshul khrims nyams/_/gang tshe rang gi chos kyi ni/_/lta ba bstan kyang dri ma can/_/de tshe de la dgos pa med/_/
[\[112b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' khrims nyams kyang /_/de la ltung ba 'byung ba min/_/yang dag lta dang gzhan don can/_/de 'dra'i thabs dang ldan pas na/_/nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur te/_/chu yis pad+ma ji bzhin no/_/mu stegs pa 'am nyan thos la/_/dman yang de la smad mi 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]bya/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pas/_/dad pas de dag mchod mi bya/_/phyi yi 'phar ma gcig gnas su/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs rnal 'byor ma/_/rtag tu me tog spos la sogs/_/sngags 'di yis ni mchod par bya/_/o~M ni dang por hU~M 
[\[113a.2\]]phaT mthar/_/bar du ming ni spel bar bya/_/sna tshogs lnga yi mchod sbyin gyis/_/dkyil 'khor sa la rab tu mchod/_/mchod na the tshom med par ni/_/grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/_/dpal ye shes thig le las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa zhes 
[\[113a.3\]]bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ye shes nyi ma bcom ldan 'das/_/snying ga'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa/_/gang zhig 
[\[113a.4\]]bdag ni ci zhu ba/_/bdag la thugs rje chen pos gsungs/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_mchod pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_gnas kyi mdor bstan pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_gtor ma chen po'i rim pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la nges pa'i 
[\[113a.5\]]don bstan pa bka' stsal du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa'i don/_/nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad/_/dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung /_/yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin/_/yang ni srub dang bsrubs pa'i sngags/_/
[\[113a.6\]]sngags ni bdud rtsir bstan pa'o/_/lam gyi thar pa de ni sngags/_/tshigs rgyas pa ni de bzhin no/_/phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas/_/de ni don dam pa yi sngags/_/sngags ni A li kA li yin/_/brjod pa de ni bzlas pa'o/_/bskyed dang rdzogs dang bye brag tu/_/sngags kyi 
[\[113a.7\]]bzlas pa rab tu grags/_/gang du rke dang rkan ni gnyis/_/bskyod pa gang du mi 'byung ba/_/srog gi rtsa ba'i nang yod pa/_/lugs dang lugs min rgyun mi 'chad/_/thig le gsum dang yig gsum dag_/rang 'od ma bcos brjod par bya/_/rkan gyi nang du lce 'jug pa/_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]ro ma yis ni mnan par bya/_/yang ni rtse mo'i cha yis reg_/mnyam sbyor rnam pa'i bsam gtan gyis/_/grags pa yod pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin/_/de nas tshul ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sprul pa'i rim pa'i bye brag tu/_/thig le drangs pa bde ba'i sku/_/mchod sbyin dkyil 
[\[113b.2\]]'khor gyis ni brgyan/_/de yi bskyed rim bdag gis bshad/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/dgyes pa'i gnas bsten mchod sbyin no/_/mchog dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin ni/_/rab kyi dkyil 'khor de ru bya/_/mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bstan/_/kA 
[\[113b.3\]]li ye shes mtshan nyid do/_/sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod sbyin ni/_/gnas brgyad par ni mchod par bya/_/ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma yi 'byung /_/de yi don ni bdag gis bshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yig gzugs kyis/_/kA li'i thig les gtso bo'i phyir/_/
[\[113b.4\]]sgom pa'i dbang pos gnas la sogs/_/lha mo bcas pas mchod par bya/_/lha mo kun dang gnas la sogs/_/lha yi dbang phyug skyabs yin no/_/lha mo 'di ru rtsa yin te/_/'byung ba dang ni gnas sa byed/_/skyabs las rnam par rdzogs pa yin/_/mtshan dang 
[\[113b.5\]]dpe byad ldan pa'o/_/gru gsum dbus su bcom ldan 'das/_/ut+pal sngon po'i mdog dang 'dra/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan dbus su/_/bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs/_/zhal ni bcu drug phyag bcu drug_/zhal ni so sor spyan gsum mo/_/ser po dmar po 
[\[113b.6\]]ljang khu'i zhal/_/ri bong can ni g.yon skor zhing /_/zhal gzhan kun ni bung ba bzhin/_/steng gi zhal ni 'jigs pa'o/_/gshin rje'i pags pas rnam dkris byas/_/dam bcas don phyir brtul zhugs don/_/sangs rgyas phreng ba'i do shal byas/_/mgo bo yi ni chun 
[\[113b.7\]]'phyang brgyan/_/gar dgu yi ni ro dang ldan/_/sku ni phyag rgya drug gis mdzes/_/sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/sna tshogs 'od kyi snang bas 'bar/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bde ba chen/_/legs dgyes dbang mo gnyis med sbyor/_/dur khrod kyi ni thal bas byugs/_/
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]steng du bgrad pas bde bar bzhugs/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi gar dang ldan/_/gsang ba'i don gnas brda byed pa/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis bskor/_/dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs/_/rdo rje dril bu gnyis med sbyor/_/tshangs pa yi ni 
[\[114a.2\]]pags pas khebs/_/mda' gzhu 'khor lo rin po che/_/ral gri rtse gsum rnge'u chung dang /_/zla ba nyi ma sta re snod/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma de dang 'dra/_/yang na phyag ni gnyis ma'o/_/rdo rje gri gug 'dzin pas 'khyud/_/zhi ba spyan ni 
[\[114a.3\]]gsum pa'o/_/nang gi 'phar ma dgyes pa ni/_/zla ba gang ba bzhin du dag_/sna tshogs pad+ma yi ni gzhi/_/'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes/_/phyi ma gru bzhi ru ni grags/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po'i phreng bas ldan/_/sna tshogs 
[\[114a.4\]]dpa' bos nye bar mdzes/_/sna tshogs pa yi shing gis bskor/_/sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ldan/_/de'i nang du gru gsum gyi phyag rgya'i grwa ni dpal au rgyan dang dza lan d+har dang /_pu lI ra ste/_mgo bo dang /_gtsug pud dang /_spyi bor legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang /_rdo rje 
[\[114a.5\]]'tshed ma dang /_rdo rje glang chen ma bcom ldan 'das la skul bar byed cing phyag gi 'phar ma 'bar bar ro mchog chen po'i snod kyis mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed cing tshangs pa'i bu gar rtse sbyar gyi phyag rgya byed pa ste mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel te lhag mas mthe bong mnan nas/_
[\[114a.6\]]mdzub mo sbyar ba 'og tu bcings pa'i sku [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po'i steng na g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/_spyan gsum pa/_skra grol zhing na bza' grol ba/_chu skyes rgyas pa/_bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing bzhugs pa'o/_/shar gyi phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad 
[\[114a.7\]]pa'i lte bar kAm rU pa ste/_smin ma'i dbus su 'jigs ma'o/_/de'i shar gyi 'dab mar mA la wa ste sna'i rtse mor dpa' mo'o/_/byang gi 'dab mar sin d+hu ste mig gnyis su chang 'thung ma'o/_/nub kyi 'dab mar nA ga ra ste rna ba gnyis su 'jigs byed ma'o/_/lho yi 'dab 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]mar sing ga la ste kha'i pad+mar pho nya ma'o/_/byang mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar mum+mu ni ste/_kos kor stobs chen ma'o/_/de'i shar gyi 'dab mar de bi ko Ti ste/_ske'i gling bur rta mgrin ma'o/_/byang gi 'dab mar ku lu ta ste/_rgyab kyi gling bur rta rna ma'o/_/
[\[114b.2\]]nub kyi 'dab ma'i ar bu tar nu ma gnyis su glang chen sna ma'o/_/lho'i 'dab mar ta li ki li ba ste/_snying gar glang chen lto ba ma'o/_/nub phyogs kyi sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar god pa ri ste/_lte ba'i gnas su me ma'o/_/de'i shar gyi 'dab mar lam pa ka ste/_gsang 
[\[114b.3\]]ba'i pad+mar chu rgyun ma'o/_/byang gi 'dab mar kany+tsi ka ste/_mtshan gyi dbus su ri bong can ma'o/_/nub kyi 'dab mar las kyi yul te/_mtshan rtser nyi ma'i 'od ma'o/_/lho yi 'dab mar gser gling ste/_bshang kha'i gnas su dung sna ma'o/_/lho phyogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad 
[\[114b.4\]]pa'i lte bar kong ka na ste/_brla gnyis su dung gtsug ma'o/_/shar gyi 'dab mar bin d+hu ste/_pus mo gnyis su dung lte ma'o/_/byang gi 'dab mar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dus pa ste/_rje ngar gnyis su stobs chen ma'o/_/nub kyi 'dab mar rgya mtsho'i ngogs te/_rkang pa gnyis su bya 
[\[114b.5\]]rgod ma'o/_/lho'i 'dab mar tsa ri Ta ste/_sor mo la rgod kha ma'o/_/de'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhi'i 'dab ma la dgod do/_/'dab ma lhag ma kun la khrag chen pos shin tu gang ba'i ka pA la dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs chen po'i bum pa kha rgyan btsugs pa/_bdud 
[\[114b.6\]]rtsi chen pos lto ba gang ba/_dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa mtho bar bskor ba'o/_/shar mtshams su ku mA ra pu ri dang /_kasmi ra ste mthe bong dang lus thams cad la hor pa ma dang hor mig ma'o/_/byang mtshams su ki ra ta dang /_ne pA la ste rkang pa gnyis la lhag par hor 
[\[114b.7\]]mgo ma dang de bzhin du dmar mo'o/_/nub mtshams su kam bu dza dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags te rked pa dang /_snying gar mig dmar dang srog ma'o/_/lho mtshams su byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ban lang spyod de lte ba'i lte ba dang /_sprul pa'i snying por 'dzin ma dang ro ma'o/_/
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa'i pad+ma'i snar bcom ldan 'das dang a bad+hU tI'o/_/de lta bu ni nang gi 'phar mas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag par phyi ma phyi mar rgyud kyi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang gi dag pa'o/_/
[\[115a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug phyi rol tu mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa rnam pa dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo'o/_/byad gzugs mdzes pa chen po'i sha rgyas pas dregs pa/_sgeg pa'i nga rgyal can phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/_sra zhing mtho ba'i 
[\[115a.3\]]nu ma dang /_rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/_g.yon brkyang bas ro'i steng na gnas pa/_ka pA la dang /_kha T+wA~M ga dang /_mda' gzhu khengs par 'gengs pa/_bdud grangs med pa 'joms pa kho na/_sku mdog sna tshogs pa mdzes pa'i gzugs 'dzin 
[\[115a.4\]]pa/_thugs rje chen pos sems can 'gugs ma/_sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa/_brel ba dang mi mkhyen pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/_/phyi'i 'phar ma shar dang byang dang nub dang lho mtshams re rer nang gi lha mo bzhin du lha mo gnyis gnyis te/_skra dmar ma dang /_
[\[115a.5\]]rin chen ma dang /_phug ron ma dang /_ser mo dang /_nag mo dang /_ri bong ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo dang /_ra ma mo'o/_shar dang /_byang dang /_nub dang /_lho'i sgo re rer sgo skyong ma gnyis gnyis te/_de dag kyang dregs pa chen po 'jigs pa chen mo mchog gi legs dgyes kyis 
[\[115a.6\]]rings pa/_sna tshogs kyi nyams kyis sku khyab pa'o/_/shar sgor rdo rje ro langs ma dang /_rdo rje dra ba ma sku mdog nag po/_phyag bzhi ma mda' gzhu 'gengs shing chu srin dang nya bsnams pa/_ka pA la dang kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/_gcer bu 
[\[115a.7\]]sgra grol ba/_mi'i rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_g.yon brkyang ba/_mgo bo'i chun 'phyang rgyu ma las brgyus pa 'chang ba'o/_/byang sgor rdo rje rtse mo ma dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje zlum pa ma sku mdog ser mo/_seng ge dang /_bya khyung bsnams pa'o/_/nub sgor rdo ra ske 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rags ma dang /_rdo rje ser mo ma sku mdog dmar mo/_gling bu dang /_rdza rnga chen po'i sgra kho na'o/_/lho sgor rdo rje dgod ma dang /_rdo rje nyi ma mo sku mdog ljang gu/_rdza rnga dang pi wang gi rol mo'i sgra kho na ste/_ji ltar shar sgor bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ltar thams cad kyang rus 
[\[115b.2\]]pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /_bzhugs stabs dang /_phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o/_/longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa'i rtsa brgyad gnyis kyi grangs ni de dag kun gyi rnam par dag pa'o/_/sku brgyad bdag nyid kyi ni mgon/_/mchod sbyin sgra yis kun tu brtags/_/mchod 
[\[115b.3\]]pa de ni mchod sbyin brjod/_/rtsa ni kun gyi gnas rab mchog_/gnas ni gdan la sogs pa'i dgyes/_/gnas kun gyi ni bla na med/_/gsang chen dag pa pad+ma yi/_/'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas/_/bde ba yi ni yangs pa'i sar/_/rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gyis 
[\[115b.4\]]brgyan no/_/gnas ni gdan la bya bar grags/_/gnas ni rten du brjod pa'o/_/bde ba 'byung ba'i ngal sos ni/_/de yi zhing ni don dam par/_/bde ba'i ye shes 'byung ba ste/_/tshan+do har ni 'di ru bshad/_/thig le gsum gyi ye shes bde/_/gcig byed pa yi gtan 
[\[115b.5\]]tshigs kyis/_/de yi 'dus sar bstan pa yin/_/rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed dka' ba/_/gang du tshor ba yod pa ste/_/bde ba 'byung ba'i thim de bzhin/_/de ni 'di ru dur khrod brjod/_/yang na bde ba'i rnam shes so/_/gang du bde ba yang dag rnyed/_/de ni pi la ba ru grags/_/
[\[115b.6\]]skye dang thim pa'i ye shes te/_/gang du bde ba'i zla ba skye/_/de ni lam rab tu ni bstan/_/'gro ba'i bdag nyid lam yin no/_/bde ba'i rgyal po gang zhig 'gog_/de ni sbyor ba'i ye shes rab/_/de ni gnas brgyad dgyes pa yin/_/sku brgyad rang gi ngo bo can/_/ye shes brgyad 
[\[115b.7\]]kyi bdag nyid dag_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba/_/rtsa kun gyi ni dag pa'i gzhi/_/de la yang ni rtsa kun gnas/_/nye ba'i gnas ni thams cad kun/_/lha yi dbang phyug rnam par smin/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/thig le drug ni rab tu grags/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]thig le'i dbus na ye shes yod/_/ngag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'/_/bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa med/_/drug min de bzhin gsum pa min/_/gsum dang bral ba gsum par grags/_/ye shes rang bzhin de skye med/_/nyi ma'i thig le'i ye shes shar/_/
[\[116a.2\]]'bad pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya/_/gang tshe mchog byung ma shar bar/_/de tshe nyi ma 'byung mi 'gyur/_/zla ba de ni dga' bral dga'/_/chags pa 'di ru thim par byed/_/nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung /_/zla ba'i dbus nas nyi ma 'char/_/dri ma med phyir yangs par 'gro/_/
[\[116a.3\]]shes rab bdag nyid gzugs kyi phyir/_/thams cad la ni tshim par byed/_/thams cad kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu/_/'bras bu byed pa'i bdag nyid zla/_/rgyu byed bdag nyid zla ba ste/_/'bras bu byed bdag nyi ma'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i/_/bde ba chags chen 
[\[116a.4\]]bdag nyid do/_/chags pa chen po dngos med na/_/ji ltar bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bde ba ye shes dri med grags/_/tha mal bde nyid bde ba min/_/byol song bag chags rab rmongs pa/_/dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar 'dod/_/bde ba mchog gi rang rig pa/_/
[\[116a.5\]]chags pa dang ni chags bral med/_/bde ba thig le'i nang du ni/_/char yang nang du bde ba che/_/de gnyis ye shes tshul gyi nang /_/rnam par shes pa'i tshul can dang /_/rnam par shes dang ye shes bral/_/gzhan dang gzhan min nang yod pa'o/_/sbyor drug gyes pa rnam 
[\[116a.6\]]par shes/_/char yang rtsa ba kun brtag bral/_/rtog pa spangs pa de nyid ni/_/bsam gtan 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/tshor bya tshor byed gnyis las grol/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das dag pa'i/_/de ni gsang chen de nyid do/_/gang du yang ni gsal ma byas/_/'bad pa yis ni 
[\[116a.7\]]sba bar bya/_/smra bar mi bya gang la lar/_/rnal 'byor rgyud du mos gyur pa/_/lha yi dbang phyug gsal mi bya/_/dpal ye shes thig le las sngags kyi bzlas pa'i rim pa dang /_mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i rim pa dang /_gnas kyi don dang /_rtsa'i 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]'khor lo 'byung ba dang /_de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di'i/_/nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad/_/thim dang longs spyod dag gis ni/_/yid 'phrog yang dag mchod pa'o/_/zla ba nyi ma me tog gis/_/
[\[116b.2\]]sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod/_/'dod pa 'di ni dpral ba ru/_/mar ngo tshes kyi dang po dbang /_/yid las de ru 'dod par 'gyur/_/nges par a yi thig le las/_/thim pa 'di yi tshes gnyis pa/_/bdud rtsi 'di ni smin phrag tu/_/dga' bas de las 'da' bar 'gyur/_/
[\[116b.3\]]A li'i thig le gnyis pas so/_/bde ba'i mkhur tshos gnyis nas su/_/tshes gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur/_/de la rnam par smin pas 'gro/_/A li'i thigs pa gsum pas so/_/bdud rtsi kos ko'i gnas su ni/_/tshes bzhi ba la thim par 'byung /_/de la mgu 
[\[116b.4\]]ba las dga' ba/_/bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so/_/bde ba yi ni mgrin gnas su/_/tshes lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung /_/de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur/_/thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so/_/'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni/_/tshes drug pa la tham par 'byung /_/
[\[116b.5\]]de la bsam gtan las drag po/_/thig le drug la gang bas so/_/bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni/_/tshes bdun pa la dbang ni 'byung /_/de la bdun pas 'byung ba yin/_/thigs pa bdun pas khengs pas so/_/'dod pa'i rtsi ba logs gnas su ni/_/tshes brgyad 
[\[116b.6\]]pa la thim pa 'byung /_/de la chags pas mchog gi dga'/_/thig le brgyad pa gang bas so/_/bde ba'i lte ba'i gnas su ni/_/tshes dgu pa la longs spyod 'byung /_/de la rnam smin las 'bar 'byung /_/thig le dgu pa khengs pas so/_/'dod pa'i mdoms kyi 
[\[116b.7\]]gnas su ni/_/tshes bcu pa la thim pa 'byung /_/de la brtan las thig ler 'gyur/_/thig le bcu pa gang bas so/_/bde ba'i spyi bo'i gnas su ni/_/bcu gcig pa la dbang ni 'byung /_/de yi stobs las myos par 'gyur/_/bcu gcig thig les khengs 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bas so/_/bde ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa gnas su/_/bcu gnyis tshes la thim pa 'byung /_/de la 'od las dga' bral dga'/_/bcu gnyis thig le gang bas so/_/rgyas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas su/_/bcu gsum tshes la longs spyod 'byung /_/de las mang 
[\[117a.2\]]pas ur tar 'gyur/_/A li'i bcu gsum thig les so/_/bde ba'i mdud pa'i gnas su ni/_/bcu bzhi bar thim pa shar/_/de la reg bya las chur 'gyur/_/bcu bzhi'i zla ba'i thig les so/_/bde ba'i nor bu'i dbus su ni/_/nya gang pa las dbang ni shar/_/de 
[\[117a.3\]]las phrad pas gnyid du 'gyur/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yi thig les so/_/dbang po bcu drug pa yi cha/_/gzhan ni gang du'ang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du ni so sor gzugs/_/rang bzhin de ni yod pa min/_/dga' ba'i bye brag lhan skyes dga'/_/bcu drug pa yi don du 
[\[117a.4\]]yod/_/char yang bcu drug 'di ru ni/_/yod pa ma yin med pa min/_/de bzhin du ni ye shes che/_/lha yi dbang phyug rang bzhin no/_/g.yas g.yon yan lag gnyis su ni/_/khu ba yi ni 'byung bar dran/_/mar ngo de bzhin yar ngo yi/_/'dod pa yis ni 'byung ba'i 
[\[117a.5\]]tshe/_/bcu dang lnga yis gnyis med sbyor/_/bde ba 'di yi 'byung ba min/_/de nyid gsum shes bcu dang lnga/_/shes rab dang bral bde ba che/_/bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/_/gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes/_/rtag tu mos pa yis ni shar/_/bsam gtan 
[\[117a.6\]]gyis ni shes pa'o/_/bcu drug gi ni yi ge'i gzugs/_/A li'i thig le rang ngo bo/_/a sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung /_/A li'i ye shes bde bdag nyid/_/kA sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung /_/kA li'i ye shes bde ba che/_/A li kA li gnyis sbyor las/_/
[\[117a.7\]]mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchod bya/_/mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te/_/gsang pa'i pad+ma'i snying gar ro/_/gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya/_/la la 'da' la gnyis sbyor las/_/mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchog bya/_/mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gar ro/_/gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya/_/thim dang longs spyod sogs bye brag_/thim pa dang ni longs spyod dbang /_/dga' ba gsum du bstan pa'o/_/de yi thig le gsum zhes bya/_/sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do/_/tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin 
[\[117b.2\]]mgrin/_/snying ga ru ni thig le gsum/_/de yis bskyed pa'i rim shes bya/_/mdud pa'i nang ni man chad do/_/bzlogs pa yi ni thig le gsum/_/gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin/_/rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu/_/thig le drug ni rab tu grags/_/dri med ye 
[\[117b.3\]]shes cher yang drug_/de ni rnam shes sbyor drug bshad/_/de yi dbus su de nyid bzhugs/_/lhan skyes dga' ba'i bde ba che/_/mchod pa'i las sbyor che ba yis/_/the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur/_/mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni/_/gsang ba'i sgra ni 'bad pa yis/_/
[\[117b.4\]]gang zhig 'dod pa grub pa che/_/dam tshig sems dpas brjod par bya/_/la la rdo rje la la pad/_/A li zla pa kA li nyi/_/ri bong can ni khu ba'o/_/nyi ma khrag tu rab tu grags/_/khu ba ga pur shes bya ste/_/khrag ni si h+la zhes su dran/_/sprul ni nag po gnyis ka yin/_/
[\[117b.5\]]'dus pa phung por brjod pa'o/_/nA ra ka pA la ru brjod/_/chags pa chang du rab tu grags/_/zhe sdang de ni sha yin te/_/gti mug tshod ma ru ni dran/_/nga rgyal 'di ru sha chen po/_/zan ni phrag dog nyid du dran/_/gci 'khor bshang ba mya ngan 'das/_/mtho ris gzugs 
[\[117b.6\]]zhes dran pa'o/_/mi yi yul ni sgra zhes bstan/_/sa 'og ro ru bshad pa'o/_/dri ni ri rab rtse mo'o/_/gling bzhi po ni reg bya'o/_/sa ni ba ru rab tu grags/_/chu ni sring mo yin par dran/_/me ni yum ste bu mo ni/_/rlung du rab tu grags pa'o/_/nam mkha' sgyug mor 
[\[117b.7\]]shes par bya/_/bcings pa med pa nam mkha' yin/_/skal ldan ma yin krung krung mo/_/skal ldan ngang pa 'on pa mtsho/_/'on pa min pa rgya mtshor brjod/_/dbang bskur grong khyer pa ru dran/_/dbang bskur min pa grong pa bzhin/_/gsang ba snying ga yin par brjod/_/khyer 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]shog dri ma med par brjod/_/gsal byed nam mkha' yin par dran/_/gzhang kha dgyes pa Da~M Di 'bras/_/ma rungs lcags su kun tu grags/_/stan ni pad+ma yin par brjod/_/sbyin pa ge sar dran pa'o/_/gzhon nu ma ni mtshe 'ur grags/_/rgan 
[\[118a.2\]]mo gtsang bar dran pa'o/_/gnas pa rna ba zhes su brjod/_/'gro ba 'di ni ar bu ta/_/dus ni dbyug pa bde ba nyid/_/thal ba min dga' dga' stobs so/_/de dag tshogs kyi mchod sbyin gyi/_/dus su 'bad pas brjod par bya/_/khrung khrung la sogs 'jug 
[\[118a.3\]]min phyir/_/gsang ba'i tshig ni smra bar bya/_/rnal 'byor ma'am rnal 'byor pa/_/shin tu dgyes pas gsang skad smra/_/dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa'i rim pa dang gsang ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//dbang bskur la sogs nges 
[\[118a.4\]]bstan ni/_/lha yi dbang phyug ngas 'dir bshad/_/rgyud gsum gyi ni rim pa yis/_/dbang drug dbye ba bstan pa'o/_/chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag_/bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags/_/rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming /_/spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal/_/phyir mi 
[\[118a.5\]]ldog pa yi ni dbang /_/rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar byas/_/de ni drug gi bye brag dbang /_/de ni slob dpon dbang zhes bya/_/rnal 'byor bla ma yi ni mtshan/_/gsang ba yi ni dbang rgyal bshad/_/shes rab ye shes bla na med/_/bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no/_/dgu yi 
[\[118a.6\]]bye brag dbang la sogs/_/'bras bu'i phyir na brgyad dbyer 'gyur/_/bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin brjod/_/shes rab ye shes de yi 'bras/_/dngos po so sor shes mi bya/_/de ltar zhes ni tshad med do/_/de bas 'bras bu'i tshig don ni/_/rigs pa ma yin pa yi sems/_/
[\[118a.7\]]de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i sems/_/de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i rim/_/ji lta bur ni yod par 'gyur/_/dga' ba lus su grags pa ste/_/mchog tu dga' ba 'di ru gang /_/yid ni dga' bral shes par bya/_/lhan skyes de ni gang na yod/_/kun na yod pa'i ye 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]shes sems/_/sems las gzhan ni yod pa min/_/gang zhig ci zhig 'di thams cad/_/de ni thams cad sems yin no/_/sems las thams cad 'byung ba ste/_/sems kyis longs su 'das pa'o/_/lus kyi mgo bo dga' ba'i gnas/_/ngag ni mgrin pa 
[\[118b.2\]]mchog tu dga'/_/sems ni snying gar shes bya ba/_/chags pa'i dga' brtag tu shar/_/lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag_/ngag ni rgyu ste 'bras bu yid/_/yid nyid yongs su shes pa ni/_/'bras bu de ni don dam par/_/de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang /_/rtsa gsum 
[\[118b.3\]]nang gi dbus na bzhugs/_/gnas gsum khyab pa skye ba med/_/'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral/_/'od rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog_/de ni bzhi pa mchog gi dbang /_/bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni yod/_/yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus la/_/chu yi dbang 
[\[118b.4\]]bskur dga' ba'o/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid mchog_/shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang /_/snying ga ru ni dga' bral dga'/_/gsang ba pad+ma'i lte ba ru/_/bzhi pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do/_/de ltar dbang 
[\[118b.5\]]ni bzhi ru dbye/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no/_/chu yi dbang ni mngoms su ste/_/sna tshogs 'bras bu sbyin pa'o/_/gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis pa ste/_/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ster/_/rdo rje yi ni rtsa ba'i gnas/_/rtsa ba dang ni mdoms kyi 
[\[118b.6\]]'og_/shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang /_/mdud pa'i gnas su rtag tu dran/_/dbang rnams kun gyi bla ma'i bla/_/rnam par 'joms pa'i 'bras bu ster/_/shes rab ye shes nor bu'i khar/_/shes rab pad+ma'i yid 'gro'i phyir/_/rlung ma dang ni gnyid skye'i rtsa/_/gnyi 
[\[118b.7\]]ga rgyas pa yis ni bde/_/gyen gyi lam gyis bzlog par bya/_/mdud pa'i nang gi gnas su 'gro/_/de ltar bzhi pa rab tu bstan/_/mtshan nyid dang bral 'bras bur grags/_/mdud pa'i gnas su rim pa yis/_/tshangs pa'i sprul pa snying man chad/_/de tsam du ni lhan 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]skyes dga'/_/rlabs dang bral ba dpe med do/_/de ni de kun don dam par/_/dbang gi ye shes nges bstan to/_/rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang /_/sdom dang bsdoms pa'i rgya mtsho dang /_/rigs chen ye shes snying po dang /_/kye rdor 'jigs byed rdo 
[\[119a.2\]]rje dang /_/mtshan dang gsang ba 'dus pa ru/_/lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis spas/_/khyod kyi ngor mdzad dbang gi don/_/rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal/_/rtog ge ba dang rgan po dang /_/dge slong mos par gnas pa la/_/yang dag lam shes slob dpon gyis/_/
[\[119a.3\]]de rnams de nyid bshad mi bya/_/a yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin/_/b+hi yi yig 'bru mchog tu dga'/_/She yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'/_/ka yi yig 'bru lhan skyes so/_/gang du yang ni mi dmigs shing /_/a ni skye med rang bzhin te/_/kun gyi rgyu ni yin phyir 
[\[119a.4\]]ro/_/She yi yig 'brur yang dag brjod/_/gtsug tor gsang ba'i pad+ma ra b+hi/_/bskur dang khrus ni byed pa'i phyir/_/ka ni rnam rtog dngos por grags/_/'gro ba chad pa'i bdag nyid do/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying ga a/_/rtsa kun gyi ni 'bigs pa gang /_/de phyir 
[\[119a.5\]]mngon par dga' ba mchog_/b+hi yi yig 'bru thig le 'bigs/_/She bde ye shes kun brtags bral/_/yang dag don gyis gsal bar byed/_/dang po'i dga' ba rgyu yi dngos/_/a yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas/_/mchog dga' dga' bral dga' bar 
[\[119a.6\]]grags/_/dbang bskur rab tu grags pa'o/_/de gnyis dbus su de nyid bzhugs/_/rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi dang bral/_/mngon par dga' dang dga' bral dga'i/_/gang zhig rang bzhin mi shes na/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[119a.7\]]yin yang mi bstod do/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_/thams cad khyab par mnga' bdag bdag_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal chen po/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yid ltar mgyogs/_/thams cad kun gyi dbang phyug bdag_/'byung ba kun gyi bdag nyid do/_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dpal ye shes thig le las dbang bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/_/nang gi mtshan nyid sbyin sreg go/_/kha ni hom khung dgang gzar lag_/tshul ni rang byung me yin no/_/nga rgyal phrag dog bsreg 
[\[119b.2\]]rdzas yin/_/bzlas pa de ni kham du brjod/_/sa 'og dang ni sring mo mar/_/de yi bsreg rdzas rab tu dbul/_/ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas/_/phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya/_/dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du/_/phrag dog bdud rtsis rab tu tshim/_/
[\[119b.3\]]rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis/_/dag byas dkar byas rim gyis so/_/rlung mas bskul byas 'bar bas byas/_/bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed/_/ha yi ma mo'i sngags kyis ni/_/'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya/_/ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas/_/phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim bya/_/
[\[119b.4\]]de lta'i sbyin sreg las kyis ni/_/lha yi sku ru nges par 'gyur/_/lha yi sku ni bde chen po/_/don dam par ni shes pa'o/_/lha yi yig 'bru yis 'byung gang /_/de ni don dam sbyin sreg go/_/dpa' bo gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba/_/dus kyi gang du bde dbang po/_/lte snying bde 
[\[119b.5\]]ba'i pad+ma yis/_/rtag par shes rab mas ni brjod/_/de ni sbyin sreg bsreg rdzas ldan/_/mngon par dga' las 'byung ba'o/_/kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni/_/shes rab thabs ni phrad pa las/_/sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras bu mchog_/myur ba ru ni rnyed pa'o/_/hom 
[\[119b.6\]]khung d+ha la dgyes pa che/_/la la 'di ru dgang gzar dran/_/blugs gzar gsang pad sna yi rtse/_/mar ni khu ba zla 'od mnyam/_/gsang pad zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin/_/mar gyi snod du rnam par grags/_/blugs gzar dgang gzar mar gyi snod/_/rtsa gsum du ni 
[\[119b.7\]]brjod pa'o/_/srub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma gnyis/_/gcig pu'i dngos po yang dag pas/_/ye shes me ni mchog tu 'bar/_/pad+ma'i 'khor lo drug rim pas/_/gzhan min bde chen man chad do/_/mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag_/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa/_/rtsa yi dra ba du ma yis/_/'khor lo drug snying khyab pa'o/_/sku gsum ye shes rdo rje mchog_/rtag tu bsreg rdzas mchod par bya/_/me yi kha ru dgang gzar ni/_/mar gyis bkang ba dbul bar bya/_/me ni mchog 
[\[120a.2\]]tu dga' ba ste/_/rnam rtog hom shing tshig par byed/_/mdud pa'i hom khung gi ni me/_/de ni mchog tu dga' rang bzhin/_/zhi ba'i zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin/_/longs spyod dang ni grol ba bzhin/_/sku yi rdo rje rin chen khar/_/gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil/_/thugs 
[\[120a.3\]]kyi rdo rje mdud snying po/_/dga' ba yis ni mchod par bya/_/gsung gi rdo rje blugs gzar mchog_/dga' bral dga' ba sku rdo rje/_/lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi/_/dgang blugs kyis ni mchod par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/_bye ba 
[\[120a.4\]]phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kun brgyal padang sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/_/de nas yun ring po zhig nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dir ye shes yod dam ci zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to/_/yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das mas 
[\[120a.5\]]phyag rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung ba'i bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te/_gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba bcings nas gus pas zhus pa/_sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon/_/ye shes zab mo dri ma med/_/ci yi don phyir 
[\[120a.6\]]de lta'i tshig_/'khor kun gyi ni nang du gsungs/_/lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang /_/dgang blugs kyi ni mchod pa la/_/bdag kyang 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das/_/the tsom chen po skyes par gyur/_/gsang ba yi ni gsang ba mchog_/rnal 'byor ma 
[\[120a.7\]]rgyud du ma ru/_/mgon pos gang du'ang ma gsungs so/_/de tsam yang ni brdar ma mdzad/_/lhan cig la ni ye shes yod/_/ma gsungs bdag gis thos ma lags/_/de ring de ltar the tshom dag_/mnga' bdag chen pos gcad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/a la la rab tu ngo mtshar to/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la ci'i phyir ye shes med/_dad pa chen po dang brtson 'grus can dang ye shes dang ldan pa yang rmongs par 'gyur na/_ye shes med pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ji ltar 
[\[120b.2\]]rnyed/_de bzhin du yang 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin pa'i dper nyon cig_/ji ltar/_du ba las ni mer shes te/_/chu skyar las ni chu yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/_/rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes/_/de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnyed pa'i 
[\[120b.3\]]don gyi phyir skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bo ye shes so/_/ye shes ni tshor bar yongs su shes pas dpyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni ye shes su bdag gis bshad do/_/de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni rin po che mar me ma yin pas rnyed par mi 'gyur 
[\[120b.4\]]bde bas na blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed la/_gal te de rnyed na de ci mar me las rin po che skye'am/_'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyis mthong ba dang rnyed pa de bzhin du ye shes kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po mthong 
[\[120b.5\]]zhing rnyed kyi ye shes las skye ba ni ma yin no/_/de bas na ye shes kyi sgra 'di ni don mi shes pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa dang nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de 
[\[120b.6\]]nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do/_/sems can thams cad bsrung don du/_/'bad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/_/b+ha yi yig 'bru b+ha gar brjod/_/ling gi yig 'bru ling gar bstan/_/ling ga b+ha gar mnyam sbyor bas/_/sems 
[\[120b.7\]]can thams cad kyi ni tshogs/_/de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_/lha mo de nyid shes bya ste/_/thams cad sgra ni dga' ba yin/_/sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur/_/tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dga'/_/gtor ma de yis bsrung ba'i don/_/dur khrod yang 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ni chu yi ngogs/_/ye shes ldan pas sbyin par bya/_/dur khrod dbugs byung gi ni gnas/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bya gdong ngo /_/sha yi yig 'bru pad+ma dag_/wa yi yig 'bru lte bar yin/_/sa yi yig 'bru bde ngo bo/_/na yi yig 'bru
