[\[121a.2\]]bcos pa med/_/dri med ma yi zhu ba'i dga'/_/thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral/_/dur khrod dbugs 'byung du ni grags/_/zhal bzang bdag gis bshad pa yin/_/chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha/_/yang na de ni rtog med ma/_/'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_
[\[121a.3\]]de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/'byung ba khu ba ru ni grags/_/khu ba sems can 'di ru bstan/_/sems can snying po ye shes bde/_/b+ha ga ling ga gnyis las 'byung /_/de la bsrung ba'i don du ni/_/gtor ma kun tu 'bad de sbyin/_/dpal ye shes 
[\[121a.4\]]thig le las 'byung ba bsrung ba'i don tu gtor ma chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/_kyai dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang 
[\[121a.5\]]phyug 'dir de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang /_zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad dang /_rnam pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du legs par zhus shig_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba/_mchog gi dbang phyug ma mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum/_sdig pa thams cad zad par byed ma/_bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma/_dga' ba thams cad dang /_
[\[121a.7\]]skad cig dang /_ro dang /_ye shes kyi mthar khyab pa lte ba'i pad+ma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bde ba chen po rab tu tshim mdzad ma/_bcom ldan 'das ma bzang mo mchog dri ma med pa'i sku nam mkha'i ngo bo legs so legs so/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das mas gsungs pa de khong du chud pas mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te/_rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de dag 
[\[121b.2\]]zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /_zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad dang /_rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[121b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ba shin tu zab las zab/_/thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba/_/ji ltar de nyid mtshan nyid ni/_/nyon cig nga yis bshad par bya/_/mtshan nyid las skyes de nyid ni/_/de lta min na mi mthun no/_/rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir/_/de bas brjod 
[\[121b.4\]]par mi nus so/_/de nyid gsum bdag de snang ba/_/mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/_/zla ba'i bde mchog snang ba mched/_/nyin mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/_/phyag rgya chen po snang ba thob/_/mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo/_/mtha' yi de ni 'od kyi rab/_/nyin mo 
[\[121b.5\]]mtshan mo sogs dang bral/_/de ni gnas mchog ye shes te/_/blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul/_/de nyid gsum bdag rjod pa'o/_/'khor lo gsum yod me rlung chu/_/dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/_/tshul tsam zla ba yi ni 
[\[121b.6\]]bde/_/sa yi 'khor lor bde ni mchog_/de ni rten gyi 'du shes can/_/lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya/_/phyag rgya chen po 'di ni mchog_/nam mkhar ye shes 'du shes so/_/de yi mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog_/bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro/_/de ni rnam 
[\[121b.7\]]'byed ngo bor grags/_/gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab/_/de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas/_/rnam shes drug gi rang ngo bo/_/dngos po rten la sogs bye brag_/bzhir ni dbye bar yod pa'o/_/de nyid gsum bdag bye brag gis/_/de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye/_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bral phyir/_/gcig pu yi ni bde ba che/_/rang bzhin bstan pa gang la lar/_/mchog gi nam mkha' gang la lar/_/la lar 'od rab kyis ni gnas/_/la lar dga' bar dran pa'o/_/la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste/_/la 
[\[122a.2\]]lar dga' bral dga' ba'o/_/sna tshogs du ma la sogs dbye/_/lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar/_/du mar smra bas ci zhig bya/_/'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes/_/kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/don dam pa yi rang bzhin 
[\[122a.3\]]ni/_/yang dag rtog pa'i gnas med do/_/thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/_/bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur/_/bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i bla/_/bla ma ye shes bla ma bde/_/bla ma ston pa bla ma mgon/_/bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin 
[\[122a.4\]]las/_/mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/tshe 'di yis ni phyag rgya che/_/dngos grub rnyed par the tshom med/_/sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag_/de yi bka' drin gyis ni sla/_/de bas bla ma las lhag gzhan/_/ston pa chen po ga la yod/_/gang zhig 
[\[122a.5\]]bla mas bstan bcos ni/_/mdzad dam bshad pa gang yin yang /_/de ni bstan bcos de tshad ma/_/de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med/_/slob dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras/_/de la bye brag mi dbye'o/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud shes/_/bla mas mdzad pa'i 
[\[122a.6\]]bstan bcos gang /_/de la sgra dang sgra ngan du/_/lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya/_/snyan dang gas zlos gar bstan bcos las/_/sgra dang sgra ngan brtag bya yi/_/sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab/_/ci yi phyir na brtag par bya/_/brtag par byed pas gti 
[\[122a.7\]]mug byed/_/rtsa ba'i don ni zad par 'ong /_/de phyir sgra dang rtog ge shes/_/de la de nyid bshad mi bya/_/de kun la ni dbang mi bskur/_/phyi yi don la mos pa'i phyir/_/thabs dang thabs las byung mtshan nyid/_/'bras bu sbyin pa gang zhig phyir/_/de ni thams 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]cad dngos rig pa/_/mchog gi don ni ster phyir ro/_/de ltar yang de lon nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /_zla ba dang bde ba mchog dang /_phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' red pa'i don du/_rnam pa dang /_tshad dang /_rang gi ngo bo ngas smras so/_/yang 'dir de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid 
[\[122b.2\]]ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ste rnam pa'o/_/zla ba bde ba mchog ni tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ste mtha'i tshad do/_/phyag rgya chen po ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa snang ba ste/_de ni rang gi ngo bo'i de'i mtha' la rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha'o/_/yang na sprul pa dang /_/
[\[122b.3\]]chos dang /_longs spyod dang /_bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i don khong du chud par bya'o/_/yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam pa la sogs par shes par bya'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya 
[\[122b.4\]]ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas lha mo rab dgyes nas/_/rang bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir/_/dam po ru ni 'khyud byas nas/_/pad+ma dam por rab tu bskor/_/dur khrod la sogs pa yi don/_/rdo rje rgyal po la ni zhus/_/srub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba 
[\[122b.5\]]pas/_/dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsal to/_/dur khrod la sogs pa yi don/_/skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig_/mi bzad 'di ru rnam khyab pa/_/lha mo kha la rab tu grags/_/g.yas pa'i sna yi bu ga ni/_/mi sdug pa ni shin tu tsig_/ce spyang tshogs 
[\[122b.6\]]ni phyed tshig pa/_/sna bug g.yon pa ru ni dran/_/rna ba g.yas pa 'jigs su rung /_/swa swa dang ni tsig tseg go/_/sha za'i kha ni rna ba g.yon/_/dum bu mgo bo la sogs rgyan/_/lha mo g.yas pa yi ni mig_/ha har rgod par rab tu grags/_/rnam pa dang 
[\[122b.7\]]bcas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ldan/_/'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs par byed/_/g.yon pa pho nya nag po me/_/me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/_/rdo rje'i kha ru 'jigs par byed/_/rus pa dkar pos rab khyab pa/_/khu ba gzhan min rus dkar 'di/_/nges par lha mo shes 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]par bya/_/de ni shin tu tsha ba skye/_/de tshe 'bar phreng khyad par che/_/byang chub sems ni bde ba che/_/mi brtan ma yin pa ru bzhugs/_/de tshe rnam bcas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis/_/ldan par rab tu grags pa'o/_/gsum dbye bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am/_/
[\[123a.2\]]mchog gi bdud rtsi gang du gshegs/_/de ni dum mgo la sogs bstan/_/gang tshe thim la longs spyod 'gro/_/de tshe swa swa tseg tseg go/_/gang gi tshe ni dbang ma 'grub/_/de phyed tshig ldan dran pa'o/_/srog gi rlung ni nub pa'i phyir/_/shin tu tshig par brtag pa'o/_/khu 
[\[123a.3\]]ba nye ba'i shar ma thag_/bkram par bdag gis bshad pa'o/_/lha mo shin tu gsang ba che/_/dur khrod brgyad ni rab mchog go/_/de ni shing brgyad dang ldan pa/_/nang gi bdag sbyor mtshan nyid do/_/dpal gyi me tog mig rtsi dang /_/nA ga ge sar wa rta dang /_/pa la shing 
[\[123a.4\]]dang shar shing /_/khang pa dang ni sha mi yo/_/yal ga du ma la sogs dang ldan brgyad/_/'bras bus dud pa'i gzugs kyis shin tu brgyan/_/'dod ma rgyas ma glu stobs ma dngas/_/mtsho skyes snying po 'dzin ma bya gdong ma/_/mgyogs dang bral mo zhig gnyis kun du brtags/_/
[\[123a.5\]]shing mchog chen po rtsa brgyad kyi ni gzugs/_/yang ni dur khrod chen po ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gsang ba chen po 'dus pa'i gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nas rnal 'byor ma re res shing re khyer nas song ngo /_/lha mos gsol 
[\[123a.6\]]ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/_shing rnams kyi ming ni ci lags/_ji ltar na sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes de kun gyi 'dus pa lags pa bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yan lag che ma dang /_drag mig 
[\[123a.7\]]ma dang /_'jigs ma dang /_khro gdong ma dang /_zlum mig ma dang /_sna nyams ma dang /_lce bskyod ma dang /_sprul gdong ma dang /_bya rgod gdong ma dang /_gser mig ma dang /_mche gtsigs ma dang /_so [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang /_nya gdong ma dang /_mgrin [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang /_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rna 'phyangs ma dang /_sgur mo dang /_byin chen ma dang /_spu ldan ma dang /_sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang /_yan lag gnag ma dang /_sngo ma dang /_yan lag dmar mo dang /_gur gum 'od mnyam ma dang /_rta gdong ma dang /_gdong chen ma dang /_ral gcig ma dang /_ral [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[123b.2\]]ma dang /_bong rna ma dang /_glang chen lte ba ma dang /_bung mig ma dang /_me tog dga' ma dang /_sna [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang /_rma bya'i mgrin ma dang /_sbrul lce ma dang /_ne'u le'i gdong ma dang /_nu 'phyangs ma dang /_gsus 'phyangs ma dang /_smad che ma dang /_gdong skam 
[\[123b.3\]]ma dang /_rlung mgyogs ma dang /_dal 'gro ma dang /_spyan [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma dang /_dgod gdong ma dang /_du ma dang /_'thab dga' ma dang /_gar ma dang /_dga' 'gro ma dang /_chog med ma dang /_mang za ma dang /_chang dga' ma dang /_sha dga' ma dang /_phar 'gro tshur 'gro 
[\[123b.4\]]ma dang /_bram ze mo dang /_rgyal po'i sras mo dang /_chang 'tshong ma dang /_thod pa ma dang /_lto bi dang /_gtum mo dang /_khrus mkhan mo dang /_tshos ma dang /_sha ba ri dang /_legs ma dang /_khrag dga' ma dang /_skyabs sbyin ma'o/_/de kun lha mo rnal 'byor ma/_/shin 
[\[123b.5\]]tu drag la yang dag 'jigs/_/de kun lag na gang zhig shing /_/khyer nas 'ong ba khyod nyon cig_/tsam pa ka dang /_pa tra li dang /_ka 'un tsa dang /_pa ta dang /_pad+ma dang /_sha ra dang /_shi mya dang /_pa la sha dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_sA la dang /_a ro d+ha ka dang /_g+ha na dang /_
[\[123b.6\]]pi sa la dang /_bung ba'i dra ba dang /_a shwat+tha dang /_a ta pu ta dang /_ha ya dang /_sa ha ka ra dang /_'o ma'i shing dang /_chu shing dang /_na li gi ra dang /_u dum bA ra dang /_e raN+Da dang /_ka pit+tha dang /_a mra dang /_dza ma ra dang /_kha dir dang /_tsan+dan dmar po dang /_bad+da 
[\[123b.7\]]ka dang /_tsan+dan dang /_li shi dang /_dzA ti shing dang /_gor+shir Sha dang /_bil pa dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_kha rdzu ra dang /_da ga ra dang /_kam+pi la dang /_ben+ti dkar dang /_go yu'i shing dang /_'dod pa'i mda' gzhu dang /_phra mo'i lo ma dang /_gu 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gul dang /_sa rdzar sa dang /_pa la ka dang /_ma da na'i shing dang /_kar+m+ma ri dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_tsher 'bras dang /_klu'i mgo shing dang /_su dar shan dang /_ta la'i shing dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_gshin rje'i gdugs dang /_a 
[\[124a.2\]]sho ka dang /_ar ga dang /_ka ra bIr dang /_ru drA k+Sha dang /_ardzu na dang /_rdo rje'i mig ste/_shing de dag kun ni chu zheng gab pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa ste/_'dus pa chen po'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs nas/_dam tshig gi spyod pa chen po byed 
[\[124a.3\]]do/_/'dus pa chen po'i gnas brgyad pa/_/brgyad kyi 'dab ma dang ldan no/_/'dab ma re re la rnal 'byor ma de dag dang gnyis pa ni shing ste/_de gnyis gcig la gcig mnyam par gnas so/_/de ltar shing gi rnam pa nyid kyi rtsal bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/rnal 
[\[124a.4\]]'byor ma dang shing gi sbras rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi khong du chud pa'o/_/'di la rtsa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar srog gi rtsa ba'i nang dang lhan cig rtsa gsum dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gsum gyi pad+ma'i g.yas ngos su ping ga la'o/_/g.yon ngos su i DA'o/_/dbus su bde legs yid 
[\[124a.5\]]'ong ma dang /_'jug pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gro ba 'grub par byed do/_/de dag gi dngos po dang /_rten dang /_ye shes dang /_rnam par 'byed pa las zhal bzang mo de ru shes par bya/_shar ba dang nub pa'i dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo'i 'byung ba thams cad 'bad 
[\[124a.6\]]pas btsal bar bya'o/_/gang gi phyir rtsa'i 'byung ba med par gyur na/_byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi bde ba'i ye shes 'di 'jug pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gro ba'i skye ba shes pa ma yin no/_/ma shes na ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de bas na 
[\[124a.7\]]phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'i don 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsam gtan la mi g.yeng bas brtson par bya'o/_/lha mos gsol ba/_bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/_/bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnal 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'byor dbang phyug bsam gtan ni/_/nyon cig lha mo ngas rab bshad/_/kun rdzob ye shes rten pa las/_/gnyis su med pa'i gnas rab rnyed/_/nyer 'gro bsam gtan mchog gis ni/_/grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/_/skyon ni thams cad bral ba yi/_/yid 
[\[124b.2\]]dang mthun pa'i rang gnas su/_/lus ni ma bsgrims pa yis ni/_/spros pa med par stan bder bsdad/_/lte ba'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul/_/hU~M gi yig 'bru grags chen grags/_/rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/_/bskal pa'i me yi 'od dang mnyam/_/langs nas 
[\[124b.3\]]chos kyi 'khor lo yi/_/mkha' 'gro bsregs nas smin mtshams kyi/_/dbus na gang zhig 'khor lo yod/_/rang gi ngo bo srog gi rlung /_/snying gar 'ongs nas de gnas su/_/rtag tu de ni bzhugs pa'o/_/de ni o~M yig ngo bor grags/_/sku yi rgyal po rnam par 
[\[124b.4\]]shes/_/srog dang rngub pa 'gog pa yis/_/srog dang rngub pa'i bza' ba gsol/_/srog dang rngub pa gnyis zos nas/_/des ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas de la rtags ni kun/_/mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung /_/'dar dang rngul dang ba spu langs/_/
[\[124b.5\]]dbyangs kyi bye brag de nas mdangs/_/kha dog 'gyur dang mchi ma dang /_/lha mo de las de nyid skye'o/_/de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas/_/rnam par shes pa'i yi ge mchog_/nang du lta ba byas pas na/_/steng mtshams rtse mo zab pa ru/_/mchog gi nam 
[\[124b.6\]]mkha' bde chen du/_/yi ge mchog ni shes byas nas/_/tshangs pa'i pad+mar byon te rgyas/_/chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/lha mo gnas der shes par bya/_/'di lta bu yi 'dus pa yis/_/sa yi dur khrod chen 
[\[124b.7\]]po ni/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi ni gzhir/_/grangs med pa yi rnal 'byor pa/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob/_/nye bar 'gro ba'i bsam gtan las/_/nges par 'grub pa'i dbang po mchog_/spros med 'od kyi gnas rnyed do/_/dpal ye shes thig le las 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]dur khrod kyi nges par bstan pa'i don dang /_nang gi bsam gtan gyi nye bar 'gro ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen por pad+ma'i mchog bskyed cing shin tu dga' bas yang zhus pa/_kyai bcom ldan 'das dpal ye 
[\[125a.2\]]shes thig le'i rgyud 'di'i tshad ni ci lags/_gnas ni gang lags/_mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig dri ba mchog byas pa/_/spyan bzang ma ni khyod nyon cig_/dpal ldan ye shes thig le yi/_/
[\[125a.3\]]de yi tshad ni don dam par/_/sus kyang smra bar nus ma yin/_/zhal bzang de ni bden ma yin/_/'on kyang cung zad skal ldan mo/_/gsang ba'i ye shes rab mchog ni/_/gang zhig rgyal bas yang mi shes/_/khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad/_/srog gi dbyug pa'i 
[\[125a.4\]]gang zhig ste/_/sor bcu gnyis ni mdud pa med/_/'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed/_/de bzhin sprul pa'i pad+mar ni/_/drug phyed pad+ma mig dang 'dra/_/rtsa ba dang bcas lte nang du/_/rtsa ba rtsa ba'i nang 'ongs nas/_/'dab ma'i ske ru bcar te gnas/_/dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i ngo 
[\[125a.5\]]bor grags/_/bu ga phra mos nang na ldan/_/de ni srog pa rtsa nyid yin/_/khams gsum gyi ni rten yin no/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med kyis/_/rtsa dang 'bras bu rgya yis btab/_/drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan ni/_/rtsa ba'i skud pa byad gzugs gsal/_/bcu drug phyed 
[\[125a.6\]]phyed bye brag tu/_/rtsa ba'i skud pa gcig pu'o/_/rtsa ba gsum dbye skal ldan mo/_/'bras bu yab ni de bzhin no/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu gnyis kyi gnas/_/bcu gnyis phyed kyi gcig pa'o/_/de ni shin tu phra mo 'jam/_/rin chen kha nang man chod do/_/de tsam ye shes thig 
[\[125a.7\]]skud yod/_/rnam shes drug po'i rten mchog go/_/char yang dang ni thig le tshul/_/tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog go/_/shrI ni gzhan min 'di ru char/_/thig le dz+nyA zhes su ni dran/_/tshul ni na yi yig 'bru yin/_/ti yi yi ge tshul tsam mo/_/mchog ni 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]la yi yig 'brur bstan/_/gzhan mchog ka ru dran pa'o/_/gug ma'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni/_/yungs kar che ba'i sbom po tsam/_/gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dpal/_/char yang du grags mchog dbang phyug_/de yi snying ga'i dbus su ni/_/ye shes thig le grub pa 
[\[125b.2\]]bzhugs/_/tshul ni mdud pa'i mgrin par gnas/_/na yi yi ge mtshan zhes mchog_/g.yon glo yi ni 'dab ma'i nang /_/ti ni thig le'i tshul tsam gnas/_/g.yas su la yi yig 'brur grags/_/lha mo mchog ni rtag tu bzhugs/_/steng du gzhan min kun gyi 
[\[125b.3\]]mchog_/kha yi gnas su rtse mo'i cha/_/de tshad yungs kar rus pa tsam/_/ga yi rnam pa'i yi ge mchog_/bde ba chen po'i rang ngor grags/_/rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can/_/dpal ldan ye shes thig le 'di/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur/_/nam mkhar 'gro ba 
[\[125b.4\]]yi ni phyir/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni rtsa kun dran/_/'jug pa'i gnas sa longs spyod yin/_/thim pa'i 'gro ba'i gnas su yod/_/'byung ba dbang gi gnas su ste/_/rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog_/g.yon gyi glo ru i DA'i rtsa/_/piM ga la ni g.yas su gnas/_/rtog 
[\[125b.5\]]med ma ni steng du gnas/_/phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/_/steng dang 'og gnas yod pa'i rtsa/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das dag byed/_/g.yon glo ru ni yod pas yang /_/de bzhin 'di ni dran pa'o/_/de rnams lte ba'i dbus su ni/_/skra rtse bye ba brgya yi cha/_/de yi tshad ni de 
[\[125b.6\]]bzhin gnas/_/zhal bzang ye shes thig le'o/_/rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes rab/_/gsang ba mchog ni bdag gis bshad/_/thos pa yis ni sdig pa zad/_/de nas de la dga' ba skye/_/dran pa yis ni bsod nams skye/_/de nas de la mchog dga' skye/_/lta ba yis ni 
[\[125b.7\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/dga' bral dga' ba rab tu skye/_/reg pa yis ni lhan skyes dga'/_/de nas yang dag rab 'od gnas/_/'od rab gnas las thams cad 'di/_/gnas la sogs pa'i dag kun no/_/lha mos gsol pa/_gnas la grangs ni ji tsam du/_/mchog 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]gi dbang phyug khyod dbang mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rtag tu sprul pa yi ni skus/_/sa ni bcu gcig pa ru dran/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku bcu gnyis pa/_/chos kyi skus ni bcu gsum mo/_/bde ba chen pos bcu bzhi pa/_/gang zhig 
[\[126a.2\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yi ni sa/_/de ni ye shes sa zhes bya/_/bcu drug pa ni brtags pa min/_/khyod dang lhan cig zhal bzang mo/_/de kun sa yi dbang phyug bdag_/gnas la sogs pa dga' ba'i gnas/_/sa yi sgra yis brjod pa yin/_/sa dang po mos pas spyod pa/_gnyis 
[\[126a.3\]]pa rab tu dga' ba/_gsum pa dri ma med pa/_bzhi pa 'od byed pa/_lnga pa 'od 'phro ba/_drug pa sbyang dka' ba/_bdun pa mngon du gyur pa/_brgyad pa ring du song ba/_dgu ba mi g.yo ba/_bcu pa legs pa'i blo gros/_de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/_/chos kyi sprin 
[\[126a.4\]]ni sangs rgyas kyis/_/kun tu 'od ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_kun du sdang ba mched pa'i 'od ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku'i sa/_kun du snang ba thob pa'i 'od ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sa/_/yang dag 'od rab chos kyi sku'i sa/_brjod 
[\[126a.5\]]du med pa tshad med pa ni bde ba chen po'i sa ste/_de kun dga' ba'i bye brag la/_/sar ni kun tu btags pa'o/_/lha mos gsol pa/_rdo rje sems dpa' mnga' bdag che/_/sku ni 'di ru ci ru grags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sku ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs 
[\[126a.6\]]sbyin/_/sems ni rdo rje 'dzin par dran/_/phung po lnga las grub pa'i sku/_/rigs lnga yi ni bdag nyid mchog_/rigs ni drug pa thugs rdo rje/_/grangs med rigs kyi gtso bo'o/_/'khor lo rin chen de bzhin pad/_/ral gri rdo rje lnga pa'o/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 
[\[126a.7\]]dang /_/'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no/_/gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad grags/_/gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid/_/tshor ba rin chen rgyal po ni/_/nga rgyal rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid/_/'du shes de ni snang mtha' yas/_/chags pa rdo rjer rab tu grags/_/'du byed don yod grub pa 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]ste/_/phrag dog rdo rje ru ni grags/_/rnam par shes 'dir mi bskyod pa/_/zhe sdang rdo rje rab tu bsgom/_/nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpar grags/_/rnam pa dang bral grub mnga' bdag_/gti mug me long ye shes lta/_/nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid du dran/_/so sor rtog pa 'dod 
[\[126b.2\]]chags yin/_/bya ba grub pa phrag dog che/_/zhe sdang chos dbyings rnam par dag_/bde chen gcig pu las ni 'dir/_/bye brag lnga ru gyur par grags/_/bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las/_/zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mo ni sra ba gang /_/de ni rnam par snang mdzad ces/_/gti mug 
[\[126b.3\]]chos kyi mtshan nyid can/_/bde ba nag po zhu ba'i gzugs/_/de ni mi bskyod pa ru dran/_/bde ba dmar po'i 'od kyi phyir/_/'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/_/rlung gis khyab phyir bde ba sngon/_/don yod grub pa de rab bstan/_/nga rgyal las ni 'dir bde ser/_/de ni 
[\[126b.4\]]rin chen 'byung ldan yin/_/nam mkha' dang bral grub mgon po/_/rdor sems rgyal ba kun mnga' bdag_/spyan [{]rings [,]ring [}]bzang mo de phyir sku/_/lha yi rnam pa rab tu mchog_/'bad pa yis ni de mchod bya/_/nam yang smad par mi bya'o/_/sha dang /_khrag dang /_
[\[126b.5\]]bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mig rngu dang /_snabs dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_skra dang /_spu dang /_rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_snying dang /_mkhris pa dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_dri ma dang /_tshil dang /_rnag dang /_ang khri ni dang /_gnye ma dang /_lto 
[\[126b.6\]]ba dang /_kha lbu dang /_bad kan dang /_rngul dang /_mchi ma dang /_klad pa dang /_rkang mar dang /_khu ba dang /_khrag dang /_sha ma 'di yang lha'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ste/_gzhan ma yin no/_/de bas na shing dang /_rdo ba dang /_sa las grub pa dang /_dngul dang /_zangs dang /_
[\[126b.7\]]'khar ba las grub pa'i lha dang /_mchod rten dang /_bris sku dang /_po ti la sogs pa rnams la phyag mi bya'o/_/gang gi phyir ye shes kyi sku spangs nas phyi'i don gyis ci'i phyir gnas/_phyi yi thams cad skad cig ma/_/dga' mo sems kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/_/de ltar sems las 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]gzhan pa yin/_/sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/gzugs sogs kha dog gnas pa'i phyir/_/tha mal pa yi lus su snang /_/rnam par dag pas lta nyid du/_/bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin no/_/lha mos gsol ba/_mgon po bla ma ji lta bu/_/slob ma 
[\[127a.2\]]yang ni ci 'dra ba/_/rgyud kyi rim pa ji ltar lags/_/re zhig rgyud ni ji ltar gsungs/_/dpal ye shes thig le las/_dpal ye shes thig le'i tshad dang /_gnas dang /_sa bstan pa'i don dang /_phung po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de 
[\[127a.3\]]nas yang ni bshad bya ba/_/bla ma slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni/_/bla ma tha ma pa dngos bral yon tan ldan/_/gzhan min mchog gi dbang gis dbang bskur sku/_/thugs rje dang ldan shin du rlabs che'i sems/_/de nyid shes pa log pa'i nga rgyal med/_/bla ma yul gyis ma 
[\[127a.4\]]gos dmu rgod ma yin pa/_/rgyud lung bstan bcos du ma'i pha rol phyin/_/yan lag mtshan mchog kun gyis shin tu brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor 'dri dang dbang gi rim la mkhas/_/bla ma yid thub srid pa'i 'jigs bral zhing /_/mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa'i yid dang 
[\[127a.5\]]bral/_/dngos po chu zla lta bur nyid kyis mthong /_/drug lhag bcu yis stong la gcig tu sems/_/bla mchog nyon mongs med cing skye ba med/_/phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral/_/mchog dang dga' bral gnyis ka'i dbus na bzhugs/_/de lta'i dpal 
[\[127a.6\]]bla rdo rje rgyal po nyid/_/slob ma khrims ldan dul zhing dad pa can/_/rlabs chen zab mo'i theg pa bsnyen par byed/_/rnam rtog 'dam gyis rtag tu ma gos shing /_/mkhas shing blo rno thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/_/spyan [{]rings [,]ring [}]bzang mo 'di lta bu dag gi/_/bla ma dang 
[\[127a.7\]]ni slob ma rnam gnyis kyi/_/mtshan nyid dang ni legs par brtag pa ni/_/ji lta'i don gyis rab tu gsal ba'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad/_/
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud/_/'bum bdun gyi ni mtshan zhes bya/_/de ni gtso bo rtsa ba'i rgyud/_/sku brgyad bdag nyid rab kyi mchog_/de brtag kye yi rdo rje ni/_/'bum lnga yi ni mtshan zhes bya/_/dpal ldan phyag rgya chen thig le/_/
[\[127b.2\]]de yi phyi ma'i rgyud du dran/_/ye shes snying por grags pa'i rgyud/_/de yi phyi ma'i phyi ma'o/_/dga' mo ye shes thig le'i sgra/_/bshad pa'i rgyud ni gsang ba che/_/grub pa'i nges bstan thig le ni/_/zhal bzang mo de snying po dang /_/de kho na nyid sgron ma'i mtshan/_/'bras bu'i 
[\[127b.3\]]rgyud grags 'chad par 'gyur/_/de bdun du ni bdag gis bshad/_/shin tu rmad du byung ba'i rgyud/_/lha mo brgyad pa sku dang bral/_/de phyir smra bar mi btub bo/_/de ltar rim pa thams cad ni/_/lha mo de nyid shes par bya/_/sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin/_/rgyud 
[\[127b.4\]]kun rim shes rim pas so/_/rgyud ni rim pas 'di ru grags/_/yang na ye shes 'khor lo rgyud/_/yang na don ni rgyud yin te/_/yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud/_/lha mo gang du skal ldan mo/_/shes rab thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa/_/de ni rgyud du bshad pa yin/_/
[\[127b.5\]]yang na ye shes las byung ba/_/ta yi yig 'bru sku ru grags/_/na ni de nyid dri ma med/_/ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab/_/ra ni yum ste khrag yin no/_/de gnyis 'dres pa thig le yin/_/gzhan min rnam shes ngo bo'o/_/de yi thig le a'i rnam pa/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[127b.6\]]'khor nya gang ngo /_/ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru/_/tshul tsam gyis ni gnyi ga ldan/_/de ni rab mchog a yig 'bru/_/rtsa dang dga' bdag nyid skye med/_/lha mo 'di ltar rgyud kyi rim/_/rgyud kyi don yang shin tu bshad/_/dpal ye shes thig le las rtsa ba'i 
[\[127b.7\]]rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa dang /_don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags/_/nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/_/bdag gi zhu ba gang zhig ci/_/rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag de bdag gsungs/_/mnga' bdag rang gi ngo bo nyid/_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gang las skyes shing ci las 'ongs/_/de ni mdor bsdus pa yi chig_/thub pa chen pos bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dri ba 'di ni shin tu zab/_/ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba'o/_/lha mo khyod ni 'byung ba min/_/
[\[128a.2\]]skye ba dang ni 'pho med rab/_/mchog gi rnam rtog rlabs dang bral/_/rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od/_/bdag rang gi ni ye shes sku'i/_/mchog gi dbang phyug ma khyod 'ong /_/gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' pa/_/khyod med na ni 
[\[128a.3\]]khams gsum kun/_/mgo bo chad pa'i mi bzhin du/_/grangs med 'jig rten gyi ni khams/_/khyod ni ye shes 'od byed pa/_/khyod ni thams cad dngos kun gyi/_/thams cad bdag nyid 'byung ba kun/_/chos kun yongs su shes nas ni/_/de ni thams cad 
[\[128a.4\]]mkhyen par grags/_/de yang lha mo khyod kyi drin/_/brjod par mi nus yang dag don/_/khyod kyi drin gyis grangs med pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnyed 'gyur/_/mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon/_/mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas su gshegs/_/mchog 
[\[128a.5\]]gi nam mkha' rang ngo khyod/_/mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal bso gnas/_/mchog gi nam mkhar rtag tu bzhugs/_/kun rdzob rnam pa'i mchog tu ni/_/pad+ma'i skud pa ji bzhin du/_/gsang ba'i sna rtse snying por gnas/_/langs nas bde ba'i pad+mar ni/_/thig le khong du 
[\[128a.6\]]chud pa'i phyir/_/gshegs nas brten pa thams cad sreg_/rgyas pas thig le khyer nas su/_/yang ni khyod 'dir byon pa'i don/_/lte ba sprul pa'i pad+ma yi/_/lha mo gang tshe khyod kyi gnas/_/de tshe khyod ni shes rab grags/_/legs dgyes rab mchog rmad du byung /_/
[\[128a.7\]]bdag dang lhan cig gnyis med sbyor/_/legs dgyes dbang mo khyod ni bzhugs/_/tshangs pa'i yul sa bye ba mthar/_/legs dgyes khyod kyi rgya yis btab/_/grangs med pa la rgyas btab ste/_/de phyir phyag rgya che khyod grags/_/dpal ye shes thig le las/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]dpal phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas 'byed pa/_/rdo rje nyi ma gzhan yang zhu/_/re zhig ci'i yang gsang ba gsungs/_/gnas ni gang na yod pa lags/_/bcom 
[\[128b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byang chub sems ni gsang ba yin/_/khu ba'i ngo bo chang dang bral/_/de yi gnas ni mngal yin te/_/phyag rgya dga' ba sbyin pa mo/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_byang chub sems ni khu ba'i gzugs/_/de ni ji ltar gsang 
[\[128b.3\]]bar brjod/_/gsang ba'i gnas ni mngal yin te/_/gzhung de bdag la 'thad ma lags/_/de lta na ni gang zag kun/_/nges par gsang ba shes par 'gyur/_/de yang dbang bskur la sogs ni/_/su la yang ni mi dgos lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[128b.4\]]stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yum khyod de ni bden/_/gang zhig khyod kyis nges par bzung ba'i don/_/'on kyang drang ba'i don gyi tshig gis ldan/_/rten gyi don phyir yang na nges pa'i don/_/rten med na ni 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur/_/lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di 
[\[128b.5\]]ru sems/_/ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang /_/drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min/_/dngos med yang min dngos po'i gzugs ma yin/_/bden rim 'byung ba thim rnams kyi ni gzhan/_/sku gzugs gang du de ni yod ma yin/_/khrag kyang yin par ji ltar 
[\[128b.6\]]yang ni min/_/mchog dga' dga' bral lhan skyes dga' ba min/_/gnas mngal de la nam yang yod ma yin/_/rdo rje rtsa ba bde chen la sogs min/_/drug phyed rtsa dang mtsho skyes snying po min/_/rig min yang min rig pa nam yang min/_/brjod med nam mkha'i rang 
[\[128b.7\]]gi ngo bo'o/_/'di lta bu ni don dam par/_/lha mo gsang bar rab tu gsal/_/yang ni 'bring gi don gyis su/_/bdag gis gsang bshad khyod nyon cig_/'bring don de ni don gyi mchog_/mchog gi dga' ba sbyin pa'o/_/'bad pas dga' bral srung bar byed/_/dga' 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bral dga' bas lhan skyes 'gyur/_/nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang /_/byang chub kyi ni sems dang ldan/_/de ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i don/_/shes rab ma yi de bzhin no/_/gsang ba shes rab dbang gnyis las/_/dga' mo gsang ba'i don shes so/_/
[\[129a.2\]]dpal ye shes thig le las gsang ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos 'jam pa'i dbyangs la yang zhu ba zhus pa/_mgon po thams cad gtan phab pa/_/rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs/_/bcom 
[\[129a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang cang mi gsung ba'i dngos pos skad cig tsam bzhugs te/_de nas mi snang ba'i rang gi ngo bor bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos bdag rang rten med par mthong nas zhus pas shin tu 'gyod nas cang mi smra bar 
[\[129a.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i dus su sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs rnams kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas stong par mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pas kun smre zhing brgyal bar gyur to/_/kyai byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i 
[\[129a.5\]]dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang na bzhugs/_gar gshegs/_kun du stong par bdag cag gis mthong lags so/_/lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_'khor chen po rnams nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la bcom ldan 
[\[129a.6\]]'das dpal phyag rgya chen pos 'di ltar zhus te/_mgon po thams cad gtan la phab/_/rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs/_/de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar mi snang bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin de ni brjod du med pa 
[\[129a.7\]]dang /_rtog ge med pa dang /_btsal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_rig pa med pa la dris pas/_de nyid smrar mi btub pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das snang ba med par gyur to/_/yang 'khor thams cad kyis gsol 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]pa/_kyai blo gros chen po chos kyi mdzod/_snang ba med cing dngos po med pa chad par mi 'gyur ram/_de'i don la shin tu 'jigs shing yang dag par yid zhum par gyur to/_/lha'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/_snang ba med par 'du shes gang /_/de ni dngos med shes mi bya/_/
[\[129b.2\]]nang gi rang ngor 'gro ba'i phyir/_/snang ba med par 'di ru brjod/_/de bas 'khor chen ma 'jigs shig_/yid skyo ba ni yongs su spongs/_/de la thabs ni gcig yod de/_/gang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/sngar ni khyod kyis mthong ba bzhin/_/pad+ma'i dbus bzhugs mthong bar 
[\[129b.3\]]'gyur/_/de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bya ba'i phyir thabs zhus pa/_kyai blo gros chen po dpa' bo chen po thabs ci yod pa bdag la bstan du 
[\[129b.4\]]gsol/_/dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/_dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis snyan pa'i glus mchod pa gyis shig_/de lta bu'i thabs kyi tshig thos nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs pas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs 
[\[129b.5\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de nas drug ldan la sogs pa'i glu thams cad len no/_/kyai sku rab mchog gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ni/_/gang na bzhugs pa mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/_/de nyid dang bral chad pa'i stong de ni/_/gnyis med bde bas mkhyen par mi 'gyur ram/_/rdo 
[\[129b.6\]]rje mtsho skyes mchog sbyor yongs su gzigs/_/gang zhig dngos med dngos de dpyad par mdzod/_/de nas rang bzhin las bcom ldan/_/chu las nya ni bzhin du bzhengs/_/mchog gi dga' ba'i gzugs bdag nyid/_/mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i bdag_/dngos 
[\[129b.7\]]dang dngos min gnyis kyi steng /_/gyen bltas pad+ma'i lte bar ni/_/zhal bzhi dang ni phyag bzhi pa/_/shin tu ngo mtshar sku dang ldan/_/rgyal po yi ni bzhugs stabs bzhugs/_/brgyad gnyis blo ldan byad gzugs can/_/spyan gsum mchog gi rnam pa can/_/zla ba nyi 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ma zhabs kyis mnan/_/rnge'u chung thod pa kha T+wA~M ga/_/rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams/_/de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mthong nas 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo langs nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/_dam por 
[\[130a.2\]]'khyud nas bstod pas bstod pa/_mchog tu rmad byung chen po'i sku ni rgyal gyur cig_/ye shes zab mo rgya mtsho'i snying po rgyal gyur cig_/brjod bral bltar med dngos med sku mi mnga'/_/gti mug chen po 'joms de rgyal gyur cig_/mchog dang gzhan mchog de ni mchog 
[\[130a.3\]]gzhan mchog_/mkha' mchog 'od mchog gi ye shes snang /_/mchog gi bdud rtsi'i snying po gang gA'i rgyun/_/mi 'chad rgyun 'bab byed pa rgyal gyur cig_/shin tu lkog gyur dbang pos bltar med pa/_/skye 'gag 'du byed mtshan med rgyal gyur cig_/de lta bu'i bstod pa'i 
[\[130a.4\]]rgyal po byas nas yang phyag rgya chen po lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la dad pas zhu ba zhus pa/_kyai bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ci'i phyir ma gsungs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/srub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las/_/lha rnams 'byung ba'i 
[\[130a.5\]]rim pa'o/_/dang po rtsom pa shin tu 'dar/_/rnam par shes pas lha mo skye/_/de ni grong las kha dog dkar/_/'dod pa'i gti mug rnam par thos/_/grong khyer las ni longs spyod yin/_/spyod lam lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od/_/bskum pa las ni snang ba mched/_/snang ba mched 
[\[130a.6\]]las ye shes 'od/_/bgrad pa la si ni skye ba sbyor/_/sbyor las dga' ba'i skye ma ste/_/mnyam sbyor las ni ye shes skye/_/ye shes las mi dngos zad ma/_/khyod las 'di ru dngos po ste/_/dngos las longs spyod zla ba ma/_/dkar po las ni rten shes bya/_/rten las pad+ma'i lte ba 
[\[130a.7\]]ma/_/brang brdabs las ni rnam par 'byed/_/rnam par 'byed las pad mig ma/_/nag dang ljang dang gur kum mdog_/dmar dang sngon po yi ni gzugs/_/zla ba dkar dang dmar gyi sngon/_/sgo la sogs dang mtshams na bzhugs/_/zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/_/
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/snod dang gri gug gis phyag brel/_/na bza' grol ba phyag gnyis pa/_/de ni nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/_/rus pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/_/khyod kyi bzhugs stabs ji lta bar/_/lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de rnams thabs ni bzhi 
[\[130b.2\]]gnyis kyi ni grangs/_/mnyam pa'i bzhugs stabs phyag dang zhabs la sogs/_/rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan zhi ba'i gzugs/_/rtag tu sems can don byed kho na brtson/_/lha mos gsol ba/_dpa' bo rnams kyi ming gi brda/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rjes gsungs/_/bcom 
[\[130b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis nga la gang zhus pa/_/skal ldan lha mo de ni nyon/_/'di yi rgyud la bdag la gzhan/_/mtshan ni yod pa gang la lar/_/na ni lte ba gsang ba'i pad/_/dga' bral dga' ba sbyin pa'o/_/ma zhes nor bu bsrubs pa ni/_/mchog 
[\[130b.4\]]gi dga' ba sbyin pa'o/_/gang zhig de yi dbus nas langs/_/de ni bdag gi rang bzhin mtshan/_/dpa' bo rnams ni bdag gis bshad/_/shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon/_/lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang /_/pad+ma'i lte ba shin tu blta/_/lha yi dbang dang 'dod pa'i lha/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[130b.5\]]mig dang gzhon nu ma/_/re zhig de ni dkyil 'khor pa/_/rang gi phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin/_/dpal ye shes thig le las bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das ma sa gsol pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 
[\[130b.6\]]'khor rnams ji lta bu lags/_cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing blang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su/_/rdul tshon la sogs dkyil 'khor mdzes/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur dus su ni/_/me tog sna tshogs mchog 
[\[130b.7\]]gis so/_/shes rab ye shes dbang bskur dus/_/sna tshogs dri zhim po yis brgyan/_/las dang po yi dang po la/_/nges pa'i don gyi chu la sogs/_/dbang bskur shes pas sbyin bya ste/_/de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur/_/shes rab can gyis drang don der/_/sbyin no de nas dam 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]tshig sbyin/_/nor bu mgrin par byang chub sems/_/bla ma nyid kyis rang rig byed/_/shes rab lhan cig gnas las langs/_/slob ma'i kha yi pad+ma ru/_/nyid kyi rdo rje rab tu sbyin/_/de nas bde ba'i bdud rtsis dkrol/_/mgrin pa'i dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/_/
[\[131a.2\]]g.yas dang g.yon na yod pa'o/_/sbom ma yangs mar 'di ru grags/_/srog dang nye ba'i rang ngo bo/_/g.yon ni srog tu shes par bya/_/nye ba'i srog ni g.yas na'o/_/de ru bde bar 'jug par bya/_/mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyis mnan/_/de nas ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[131a.3\]]bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin/_/reg bya chen pos dga' ba che/_/dga' ba chen pos bde ba che/_/bde ba chen pos byang chub sems/_/shes rab bya gdong ma yi khar/_/nor bu'i kha las thigs pa gcig_/shes rab ye shes zhal bzang mo/_/shes rab bya gdong 
[\[131a.4\]]las bde ba/_/rdo rje rin chen kha ru 'gro/_/de ni dbang gi mchog rab yin/_/sangs rgyas grub pa'i 'bras sbyin bdag_/shes rab gzugs bzang b+ha ga rab/_/shin tu lang tsho dbang bskur ldan/_/dga' sogs bye brag mgu bar byas/_/de nas slob ma la sbyin bya/_/
[\[131a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'di/_/yang dag ye shes rab tu ster/_/gang zhig bka' lung skyabs sbyin te/_/de ni bu khyod dad par bya/_/de yi mngal gyi g.yon logs na/_/i DA bya gdong ma ni bzhugs/_/de rnyed tsam gyis rang bzhin ni/_/shes rab bsnyen pas 
[\[131a.6\]]rnyed par 'gyur/_/de ni gzhan min yongs su shes/_/bzhi pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin/_/rang rig pa dang mchog ye shes/_/ngag gi lam gyis rnyed dang bral/_/de na lha mo skal ldan mo/_/gsang ba las ni shin tu gsang /_/rgyud kun du ni bdag gis sbas/_/mtha' 
[\[131a.7\]]yi mtha' ru rab tu gsal/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_mtha' dang mtha' yi don ni ci/_/mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes/_/rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i phyir/_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i mthar/_/rnam par 'byed pa mthar gsal 'gyur/_/rnam par 'byed mthar ye shes che/_/de rang ngo bo'i rang bzhin no/_/lha mos gsol pa/_dgyes pa rdul tshon dkyil 'khor ni/_/mnga' bdag ji lta'i rnam pas bri/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[131b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig khyod kyis yongs su zhus/_/nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/_/las la mkhas pas bri bar bya/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bya/_/pad+ma'i nang du char yang bya/_/char yang dang ldan sna tshogs 'dab/_/
[\[131b.3\]]char yang gi nang thig le ste/_/de yi steng du rdo rje bri/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru ldan/_/rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskor/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan pa/_/dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya/_/shar gyi 
[\[131b.4\]]'dab mar 'khor lo bri/_/byang du de bzhin pad+ma'o/_/nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che/_/lho ru ral gri bsgreng ba'o/_/pad+ma gzhan rnams thod pa ni/_/bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang /_/dung gzhu de bzhin ri rab dang /_/rab tu 'bar ba yi ni me/_/me mtshams la sogs rim 
[\[131b.5\]]bzhin bya/_/'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor/_/shar gyi sgor ni dpag bsam shing /_/byang du 'bras bu sa bon dang /_/nub tu rin chen sdong bu dang /_/lho ru sna tshogs rdo rje'o/_/sgo yi phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng /_/'od dang ldan pas bskor bar bya/_/lha mo chen mo de lta bu'i/_/
[\[131b.6\]]dkyil 'khor ye shes sbyin bdag po/_/dam tshig chen po dang ldan pas/_/rab tu 'bad pa yis ni bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po'i phyir/_/des na bdag ni rab tshim bya/_/dpal ye shes thig le las dbang bskur ba blang ba dang /_phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u 
[\[131b.7\]]ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_kyai bcom ldan 'das/_dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang /_/bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba/_/mchog dga' ba las dga' bral 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dga'/_/dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes/_/dga' ba kun gyi de nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_/de lta'i rig pa mgon chen po/_/rig pa sngar gyi gzhung ngam ci/_/mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag_/sa bon dang 'dra 'bras bu yin/_/kA+o 
[\[132a.2\]]Ta pa las hA lu ni/_/gang du yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/_/dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes/_/bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des/_/dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed/_/mchog gi dbang phyug dga' bral 'di/_/dga' ba kun dang mi mthun no/_/dga' ba las ni mchog 
[\[132a.3\]]dga' ba/_/mchog dga' ba las shin tu dgyes/_/bcom ldan mkha' 'gro de rigs lags/_/yang na mchog las lhan skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bde na/_/dga' bral las ni lhan skyes min/_/'on kyang de bsrungs ba 
[\[132a.4\]]las yod/_/de min lhan skyes gang du gnas/_/dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam ste/_/dga' ba kun ni 'joms byed pa/_/'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog_/don dam pa yi tshig yin no/_/dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu/_/yid 'phrog lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/sprin med snying ga'i 
[\[132a.5\]]nam mkha' ru/_/ye shes nyi mang pa mdzes shing /_/dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud/_/nam yang de ni thos ma yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog_/lha mo de ni gang las rnyed/_/rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu/_/du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang /_/de lta mod kyi 
[\[132a.6\]]rgyud 'di yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/de skad smra yi rgyud gzhan kun/_/dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yin/_/'di ru dad pa med gyur na/_/dmyal ba la sogs 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde la sogs gsung rab kun/_/dad cing gus pas kho na yin/_/gang phyir rgyud kun gyi 
[\[132a.7\]]snying po/_/de phyir rgyud 'di rab kyi mchog_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_sbas pa'i yi ge drang ba gang /_/snying bo ye shes 'bras bu ster/_/nye ba'i snying po de ni mgon/_/de ni de ring gsal bar mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngags ni shin tu 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]gsal ba mchog_/de lta na yang gsal bar byas/_/sngags kyi bzlas las 'grub par 'gyur/_/grub pa rnyed pas sangs rgyas sras/_/hA swA Ta pha hU~M hU~M ka la ti na dz+nyA dzra ba hA ma shrI o~M/_/hA swA Ta pha Ta pha haM haM hU~M hU~M hu~M hriM hriM oM/_/hA swA Ta pha hU~M hU~M yi mA k+Shar la ba hA ma yed ma dzre ba o~M/_/hA swA 
[\[132b.2\]]Ta pha hU~M hU~M ras bi ras o~M/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog rnam pa sna 
[\[132b.3\]]tshogs pa man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_sngon med pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyi chun po 'phyang ba dang /_rol mo sna tshogs dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_mchod pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pas byas pa rmad du byung ba'i chos gos dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[132b.4\]]gser dang /_nam mkha' las nor bu'i char bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar babs par gyur to/_/de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pas bstod pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pu/_/legs so 
[\[132b.5\]]legs so bcom ldan 'das/_/shin tu rmad byung ye shes che/_/mchog gi dbang phyug gtan la phab/_/'di yi 'khor ni dag byed dges/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/_/yang dag mchog gi gsang ba 'di/_/rnyed par dka' ba don dam pa/_/dpal ldan ye 
[\[132b.6\]]shes thig le'i rgyud/_/ye shes rgya mtsho gtan la phab/_/de lta bu'i tshogs kyi mchod pa byas nas/_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid kyi bsam gtan la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol ba/_kyai bcom ldan 
[\[132b.7\]]'das/_bde ba chen po gcig pu'i sku/_/tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don/_/mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/_/mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig lha mo gsang ba'i mchog_/rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba/_/gsang sna pad+ma'i snying po ni/_/tshogs kyi 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gnas su 'di ru brjod/_/rdo rje'i rtse mo kha phye'i phyir/_/de ni rgyas par brjod pa'o/_/yang na thams cad kyi ni tshogs/_/snying po bya yi gdong mar dran/_/de la rdo rje rtse mo yis/_/phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod/_/i DA ping ga la gnyis kyi dbus/_/rtog med ye 
[\[133a.2\]]shes ngo bo nyid/_/srub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje'i mthe chung rtse mo las/_/reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag_/zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyas pa'o/_/lte ba'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo/_/de nas gnas pa'i rna ba'o/_/spyi rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga ni/_/tshig rgyas 
[\[133a.3\]]pa ni gsum du dran/_/ma ni srub dang bsrubs pa ste/_/ra ni dga' ba yin par brjod/_/mu ni lha mo sgrol ma yin/_/da yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs/_/g+ha yi yig 'bru sgra ru grags/_/ta yi yig 'bru gsal bar byed/_/na ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i mthar/_/de yi dbus 
[\[133a.4\]]su rtag tu shar/_/zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal/_/nyi ma bye ba mnyam pa'i 'od/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/_/byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster/_/de ni gsang ba ye shes che/_/rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas/_/'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya/_/su la'ang sbyin par mi 
[\[133a.5\]]bya'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad/_/ye shes rab mchog gang gis smras/_/de kho na nyid bdag don zab/_/nges bstan la sogs bye brag tu/_/srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs 
[\[133a.6\]]thabs nas/_/rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug_/thig le'i shar ba nub pa dang /_/'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_/rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung bar dgyes/_/dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che/_/snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid/_/sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod 
[\[133a.7\]]sbyin dang /_/thim dang longs spyod dang ni dpang /_/rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku/_/gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no/_/srung ba'i dam tshig la sogs dang /_/dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par/_/srub dang bsrubs pa'i dgyes pa dang /_/sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang /_/gnas brgyad 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sku yi ngo bo dang /_/dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog_/dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags/_/chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang /_/snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes/_/dngos po la sogs bde ba che/_/thog ma tha ma dur khrod brgyad/_/zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang /_/rlung gi de 
[\[133b.2\]]nyid snying po'i don/_/'jug pa gnas pa 'gro ba dang /_/nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab mchog dang /_/nyid ni ye shes thig le dang /_/rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog_/sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang /_/rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa dang /_/phyag 
[\[133b.3\]]rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/_/gsang ba yi ni don dam par/_/de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang /_/shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs/_/zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa'o/_/gtor ma 'byung la phan don du/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig 
[\[133b.4\]]par byed/_/de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'/_/de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don/_/bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don/_/gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad/_/de nyid sum cu drug bdag po/_/char yang ye shes tshor byed do/_/thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor/_/de ni sum cu 
[\[133b.5\]]bdun dbang phyug_/tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor/_/de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug_/tshul tsam ye shes tshor byed pa/_/dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do/_/mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang /_/bzhi bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po'o/_/gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med/_/
[\[133b.6\]]rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog_/thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir/_/de bas bye brag mi bya'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//lha mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba/_/kun dga' 
[\[133b.7\]]ba yi rnam pa sku/_/de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i/_/rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag_/skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig_/zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/_/nang gi stong pa de nyid do/_/spyan ni nyi shu 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]rtsa bzhi ni/_/sa dang stobs dang ye shes so/_/phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag_/brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan sde dang ldan/_/thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye/_/
[\[134a.2\]]bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/_/zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa'o/_/chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni/_/legs dgyes zla nyi 'jigs byed do/_/gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs/_/zhal bzang de phyir g.yas brkyang ba/_/lha mo g.yon [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}\u0fb1] ngan 'das/_/ye shes sku nyid 
[\[134a.3\]]bzhugs pa'o/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir/_/lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa'o/_/gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis/_/sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/_/gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir/_/shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do/_/gar dgu'i ro dang ldan 
[\[134a.4\]]pa'i phyir/_/zhal bzang mo ni sna tshogs gzugs/_/lha mos gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug_/bcom ldan bdag gis rnam dag shes/_/gsang ba'i don gyis 'di ltar mgon/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[134a.5\]]stsal pa/_/gsang ba'i sgom pa rnam par dag_/lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon/_/zhal dang lhan cig pa yi spyan/_/zhal bzang gnas la sogs pa'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'i rtsa/_/bcu drug phyag ni bcu drug pa'o/_/A li thig le rnam dag pa'i/_/thod pa yin par 
[\[134a.6\]]'di ru bstan/_/'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed ma/_/legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go/_/skad cig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/_/zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa'o/_/g.yas brkyang ba ni mchog gi dga'/_/g.yon brkyang dga' ba dga' ba yin/_/bzhengs pa lhan skyes dga' ba'o/_/
[\[134a.7\]]phyag rgya pha rol phyin par dran/_/dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'o/_/thim pa smad kyi tshangs pa'i ras/_/longs spyod zhi ba'i pags pa'i gos/_/legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na gnas/_/bskyed pa tshangs pa'i pags par grags/_/bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs pa'i sgra/_/phyag rgya shes rab thabs 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ni che/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dran/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam dag pas/_/rus pa sna tshogs rgyan la sogs/_/nam mkha' ru ni 'gro ba'i phyir/_/gyen du 'bar ba'i dbu skyes so/_/rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir/_/sku mdog nag po mkha' dang mtshungs/_/dga' bral gyi 
[\[134b.2\]]ni bdud chen po/_/'jigs par byed phyir 'jigs pa che/_/dpal ye shes thig le las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul te/_/nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das rab tu 
[\[134b.3\]]tshim par mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kyai bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang ba'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do/_/bcom 
[\[134b.4\]]ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_ye shes bdud rtsi char ba che/_/mgon po khyod kyis rmad 'byung sbyin/_/phyag na rdo rje mgon po che/_/de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags/_/rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal/_/de ni tshig gcig bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[134b.5\]]pa/_/gang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/_/bcom ldan ma de yang dag nyon/_/phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag_/mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams/_/skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no/_/de las skye ba gang yang med/_/rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug 
[\[134b.6\]]go/_/de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni/_/ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med/_/thog ma yi ni rwa lnga las/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'byung ngo /_/mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga/_/dbus nas 'gro ba'i ris drug 'byung /_/lta ba kun ni bskung don phyir/_/sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su 
[\[134b.7\]]spyod/_/la lar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_/la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/_/la lar he ru ka yi gzugs/_/la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/la lar byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/_/la lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs/_/la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma/_/la 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni/_/mdzad pa dang ni la lar 'dzin/_/mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos/_/de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal/_/lha mos gsol pa/_dkyil 'khor dang ni 'khor la sogs/_/de la mdor bsdus ji 
[\[135a.2\]]ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod/_/gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa/_/dur khrod kyi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/_/shing brgyad kyis ni chal par bkram/_/rdzing brgyad kyis ni 
[\[135a.3\]]brgyan pa'o/_/de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni/_/'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas/_/de yi dgus su lha thod pa/_/dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi/_/rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings/_/bdud rtsi lngas ni shin tu gang /_/hU~M gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas/_/ye shes me yi 'od dang 
[\[135a.4\]]mnyam/_/zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/_/hU~M la sogs pa yongs gyur las/_/skad cig gcig gis rmad du byung /_/lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan pa/_/phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhengs/_/zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/_/char sprin gyi ni 
[\[135a.5\]]mdog dang mnyam/_/phyag bzhi pa ni rta la chibs/_/nyi ma'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i spyan/_/bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra/_/nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/_/gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad/_/snying rje'i rlan gyis brlan par mdzad/_/phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo che/_/ral ba'i dbu 
[\[135a.6\]]rgyan gyis ni brgyan/_/ral pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/_/sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pan/_/phyag g.yas pas ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro/_/g.yon ni thod pa kha T+wAM ga_/gzhan pas rdo rje'i mda' dang gzhu/_/rta ni 'di ru sngon po'i gzugs/_/spyan gsum 
[\[135a.7\]]pa la drag po'i 'od/_/zhi ba'i pags pas sga cha byas/_/dgod pa'i nga ro gshog pa can/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/_/shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang /_rdo rje drag mo dang /_rdo rje gtum mo dang /_rdo rje nag mo ste/_gnag pa dang /_dmar ba 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]dang /_ljang ba dang /_dkar po ste ngang pa la chibs pa'o/_/phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pa ni gtso bo bzhin no/_/mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang ba'i bum pa'i steng na thod pa'o/_/mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang /_rdo rje rtsags bu ma dang /_rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /_
[\[135b.2\]]rdo rje brtson ma rnams ni gzugs gnyis pa'i sku/_nam mkha' lding la chibs pa gtso bo lta bu'o/_/shar sgo la sogs par rdo rje sha ba ri dang /_rdo rje ro langs ma dang /_rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dang /_rdo rje Dom bi nI ste/_nam mkha' sngon po dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_me'i kha dog dang /_du ba'i 
[\[135b.3\]]mdog bya rgod la chibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_drag po dang /_mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i rgyal po rang rang gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o/_/lha mos gsol pa/_phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i gsang 
[\[135b.4\]]sngags ni gang /_sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug_/thams cad 'dod pa'i don grub byed/_/gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed cing /_/nang rnams kun ni zad par byed/_/dngos 
[\[135b.5\]]grub thams cad rab tu sbyin/_/thams cad mkhyen pas mi thub bo/_/oM badzra bA Ni hU~M/_rnal 'byor khro bo'i lta bas bzlas/_/skad cig gcig gis khams gsum gsod/_/yang na zhi ba'i lta bas bzlas/_/mtha' yas pa yi nad zhi byed/_/mchod sbyin yang dag cher 
[\[135b.6\]]byas na/_/sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya/_/zhi ba la sogs sbyin sreg bya/_/ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras/_/dur khrod yang na chu ngogs su/_/phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya/_/dung chen gyi ni phreng ba yis/_/'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba bzlas/_/zhi ba zhi ba'i sems kyis 
[\[135b.7\]]ni/_/drag po drag po sgrub par dka'/_/dbang bskur med pa'i sems can la/_/sngags 'di sbyin par mi bya ste/_/mkhas pas bris sku glegs bam ni/_/nam yang de la bstan mi bya/_/de lta min na 'grub mi 'gyur/_/kun nas kun du rab tu blta/_/gsang ba 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]yis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/kun nas kun du zhal bzang mo/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad gyes pa/_/'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis mdzes/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje rgyal/_/rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs kyis ni 
[\[136a.2\]]bzhugs/_/nam mkha'i mdog ltar sngo ba ste/_/phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/_/spyan gsum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis ni/_/rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga/_/chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i phyir/_/phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[136a.3\]]'dab ma bdun la sangs rgyas bdun/_/brgyad pa la na byams pa'o/_/pa ti la sogs shing la brten/_/thams cad zla ba'i gdan du dran/_/gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa bzhi/_/gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod/_/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bzhi/_/sgo yi 
[\[136a.4\]]mtshams su gnas pa'o/_/sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas/_/yang dag lha chen la sogs pa'o/_/rdo rje phreng bas kun du mchog_/mkhas pas yongs su bskor bya'o/_/dpal ye shes thig le las dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya 
[\[136a.5\]]ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/_/mgon khyod bka' drin 
[\[136a.6\]]gyis ni bdag cag dag_/gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed dka' ba/_/blta bar dka' ba shes dka' gzung bar dka'/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba mchog gi mchog rab nyid/_/dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod/_/log shes mun nag 'joms la 
[\[136a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas mchog char grags la 'dud/_/yig bral thig le skye med la phyag 'tshal/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin tshul grags la phyag 'tshal/_/gnyis su med pa'i tshul tsam la phyag 'tshal/_/mchog gi rang bzhin phyag 'tshal phyag 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]'tshal 'dud/_/gzhan ma ni gzhan mchog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ye shes thig le las bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma la bos te/_kyai 
[\[136b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gi grags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid/_dpal mchog gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas pad+ma btsal te/_bsam gtan la sogs pa yis yang dag par mthong ba zhes gtan la phab pa'o/_/dpal ye shes 
[\[136b.3\]]thig le las mchog tu gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' ba/_rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rmad du byung ba/_mchog chen po nang gi rnam par shes pa drug gi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//dpal ye shes thig 
[\[136b.4\]]le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI pradz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su zhu thig g.yar khral bgyis so//_//
[\[136b.5\]{D423}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tatwa pra dI paM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dzA/_bod skad du/_dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[136b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang /_dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas yang dag par bskor nas/_shes rab kyi b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas legs dgyes 
[\[136b.7\]]chen po'i rol pa sgeg pas nye bar longs spyod pa dang /_ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas bcom ldan 'das ma nyes par byas te/_kha sbyor gyi thabs kyi sbyor ba las langs nas/_ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pas lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan ye shes zla bar grags/_/lte ba'i ku mud kha 'byed pa/_/gang zhig bdag gi zhu ba kun/_/mnga' bdag chen pos bdag la gsungs/_/dpal 
[\[137a.2\]]ldan bla na med pa'i rgyud/_/rnal 'byor ma zhes rab grags pa/_/e ba~M ma yA la sogs sgra'i/_/don ni ji lta bur ni brjod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring /_/khyod kyis nga lag pa zhus pa/_/e ba~M ma yA sogs sgra 
[\[137a.3\]]yis/_/khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas/_/shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/thams cad rgyas btab gzhan gyis min/_/de kho na nyid sgron mar grags/_/dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs/_/e ba~M ma yA de nyid gsum/_/thog mar bdag 
[\[137a.4\]]bcas pa dang ni/_/rang bzhin bzhi yi bye brag tu/_/don dam par ni shes par bya/_/thos pa'i don ni zla ba bde/_/de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mchog_/gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog rab/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/_/dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste/_/bskyed 
[\[137a.5\]]pa dang ni rdzogs dang bral/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya/_/rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos/_/thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid/_/de nyid de nyid kyis ni spangs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam 'byed grags/_/dang po'i gnas ni rab grub byed/_/
[\[137a.6\]]sku ni dga' ba'i gzugs su grags/_/dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba/_/gsung ni mngon par dga' zhes bya/_/dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs/_/thugs ni dga' bral dga' zhes bya/_/ye shes las byung bde dang bral/_/rdo rje lhan skyes zhes su bstan/_/rang 
[\[137a.7\]]bzhin gyis ni spangs pa'o/_/lha mo dpal chen nyi ma skyes/_/zhu ba dga' bral dang bral lo/_/dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma bde rten/_/dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes so/_/yan lag kun gyis yang dag bskor/_/khyab pa srog gi pad+ma bzhin/_/shes rab tshangs pa'i sgo lnga'i khyim/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]tshangs pa'i ye shes 'dzin phyir ro/_/b+ha ga dngos po 'jig pa yis/_/yang na longs spyod myong bas so/_/bzhugs pa rang gi ngo bo la/_/gnas pa yang na gshegs pa'o/_/de lta bu ni don dam par/_/'di skad bdag la sogs par bshad/_/thams cad rnal 
[\[137b.2\]]'byor rgyud du sbas/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor bla mar yang /_/nges dang drang don bye brag tu/_/e ba~M ma yA la sogs gnas/_/rgyud shes pa yi don phyir te/_/gnyis su dbye ba'i rgyud rab bstan/_/'bras bu ye shes chen po'i ro/_/rang gis nyams myong ngo bo nyid/_/rang 
[\[137b.3\]]rig dag gis mi rnyed pas/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/lha mos gsol ba/_bcom ldan ye shes rgyal po nyid/_/log pa'i ye shes mun 'joms pa/_/de nyid nyi shu gnyis bdag nyid/_/gang zhig ye shes thig ler gsungs/_/de la yang ni nges pa'i 
[\[137b.4\]]don/_/mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig de nyid nges don du/_/zhal bzang de ni gsang ba'o/_/khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad/_/de lta min na sbas pa'o/_/e ba~M rnam pa'i dbus su ni gang zhig drug 
[\[137b.5\]]cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo de ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/de'i nang du gang du rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ut+pa la'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo de ni mtha' ste/_de la gang zhig zur brgyad pa'i rnam pa'i lte ba de ni snang ba'o/_/gang zhig lte ba'i 
[\[137b.6\]]dbus yangs pa de ni nam mkha'o/_/der ni lnga gnyis nas bzung ste/_bco lnga'i bar gyi sa'am/_dbang phyug gi mnga' bdag bzhugs so/_/der gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid de ni lan gsum 'bab pa'i phung pa'i rnam par shes pa sems dang sems las byung 
[\[137b.7\]]ba dang ma rig pa'i gzugs kyis gsum du dbye ba zur dang po la thun tshod gcig gi bar du 'bar ba'o/_/gang zhig srog gi dbyig pa de ni lu gu rgyud kyi rnam pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su slo ma ba dang phra ba'i thig le ro gcig pa'i gzugs kyis dbyig pa'i bdud rtsi zur gnyis pa la 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]thun tshod gnyis kyi bar du zhu ba'o/_/drug po de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i grags pa dga' ba drug zur gsum pa la thun tshod gsum gyi bar du 'dzag pa'o/_/gang zhig thig le shar ba dang nub pa de ni thim pa dang longs spyod du grags pa'i srog de ni zur bzhi pa la thun 
[\[138a.2\]]tshod bzhi'i bar du 'bar ba'o/_/gang zhig 'pho ba'i sbyor ba de ni steng dang 'og gi 'dab ma yod par byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i dbang ni zur lnga pa la thun tshod lnga'i bar du zhu ba'o/_/gang zhig rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba de ni yan lag thams cad la bdud rtsi rgyas pa zur drug pa 
[\[138a.3\]]la thun tshod drug gi bar du 'dzag pa'o/_/gang zhig dbang gi rim pa de ni gcig nyid srog gi kha ru srog la 'bab pa dang /_'phur ba dang khyab pa de yang zur bdun pa la thun tshod bdun pa'i bar du 'bar ba'o/_/gang zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo de ni mthe'u chung gi mdud 
[\[138a.4\]]pa'i nang du bdud rtsi la bskor ba zur brgyad pa la thun tshod brgyad kyi bar du zhu ba'o/_/de dag ni g.yon du bskor ba'i srog gi rlung la zhon pa nyi ma skye ba la mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bar du sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tsha rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na bcu drug bral ba'i 
[\[138a.5\]]mtshan nyid mi gsal ba dang /_dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gsal ba de'i don gyi phyir dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid A li'i rang gi ngo bo zla ba'o/_/phyi dang phyi'i don rnams kyis ni nang dang nang gi don gnas par shes par bya'o/_/de yang phyi'i tshes kyi grangs kyis 
[\[138a.6\]]so/_/nang srog gi rlung gi grangs kyis so/_/lha mos gsol pa/_sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu skyes kyi ut+pa la'i rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i kun du spyod pa nges pa'i don gyis gnas pa de mchog gi dbang phyug gi bka' drin bskyab tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[138a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig lha mo skal ldan mo/_/gsang ba chen po ye shes mchog_/gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/thams cad sa yi dbang phyug 'gyur/_/gang zhig snying po'i sngags ni nyid/_/de ni bdag nyid bcu drug bde/_/kun rdzob ri bong can gyi 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'od/_/don dam par ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/gang zhig sku brgyad mchog sbyin ni/_/de ni mtshan mo brgyad mchog go/_/lha mo yang na ye shes brgyad/_/mtshan mo nyin mo gnyis las 'byung /_/gang zhig thim dang longs spyod dbang /_/de ni nges par bskyed rim mo/_/
[\[138b.2\]]lha mo bskyed rim gsal ba ste/_/rim las byung ba'i bde ba che/_/skal ldan mo gang ye shes sku/_/de ni rim sogs yan lag spangs/_/yan lag bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/lha mo gang zhig gsang ba'i sgra/_/de ni ye shes gsum 
[\[138b.3\]]dang bral/_/yang na gzhan min bdag nyid gsum/_/mtshams kyi ye shes yod pa'i phyir/_/lha mo gang zhig dam tshig ni/_/srung ba la sogs nges par ro/_/de ni bde ba dbus gnas su/_/gzung bya yang na gang nang du/_/gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam par/_/
[\[138b.4\]]de ni ha zhes glo bur te/_/char yang dbus yod thig le ni/_/gang du skad cig gis thim mo/_/gang zhig srub dang bsrubs thabs ni/_/de ni thog ma'i dga' ba spangs/_/lha mo de bzhin tha ma'ang min/_/thog ma tha ma gnyis dang bral/_/skal ldan mo gang sngags 
[\[138b.5\]]kyi bzlas/_/de ni srid pa 'das pa'i yid/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas kyang min/_/gnyis kyi ngo bo gnyis dang bral/_/gang zhig gnas ni brgyad du bstan/_/de ni nyi skyes ma rgyas pa/_/gnas kyi dbang gis shar ba la/_/nye bas myur du rgyas pa'o/_/gang 
[\[138b.6\]]zhig dga' ba la sogs rim/_/de ni rim pa gnyis su dbye/_/rnam bcas las ni dang po pa/_/rnam bral bcu yi dbang phyug go/_/gang zhig dur khrod rnam rtog bral/_/dbugs dbyung la sogs rnam par spangs/_/byang chub kyi ni sems rol/_/rnam par zhu ba 
[\[138b.7\]]dam tshig phyir/_/lha mo gang zhig chu yi ngogs/_/de ni rtog med ma yi mthar/_/yang na de ru srog gi rtsa/_/bde ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shes/_/de ni dga' ba dang ldan yid/_/sa dang chu dang 'od kyi gzugs/_/de bzhin rlung gi ngo 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bo dang /_/gang zhig dngos po rten la sogs/_/de ni bde ba'i dang por rig_/rang gi rnam pa'i bye brag gam/_/rnam par dpyod pas nges par dpyod/_/lha mo gang zhig dur khrod brgyad/_/de ni bde ba la thim zhes/_/rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa'i 
[\[139a.2\]]sku/_/de la thim zhing thim pa'o/_/gang zhig shing la sogs pa'i don/_/de ni dang po'i bdud rtsi rgyu/_/rtsa de brten pa'i gzugs su grags/_/thams cad rnam pa'i bde sbyin ma/_/gang rlung de nyid snying po'i don/_/de ni rin chen gdu bu'i bde/_/'dzum pa yis ni 
[\[139a.3\]]yang dag par/_/pad+ma'i zhal de myong ba'o/_/lha mo gang zhig mdzub la sogs/_/de ni gyen du gzung ba'i rlung /_/yang na rtsa yi kun spyod las/_/'gro ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'o/_/gang zhig nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan sbyor/_/de ni zla ba gyen du byed/_/yang na tshangs bzhi 
[\[139a.4\]]rnam dbye byas/_/rnam par shes pa las gshegs gsol/_/gang nyid ye shes thig le ni/_/de ni drug phyed gsum dang bral/_/bcu dang lnga yi sa rnams ni/_/dbang phyug 'pho med skye med do/_/gang zhig bdag gi rang ngo mchog_/de ni nges par bzhi pa'i 'bras/_/
[\[139a.5\]]yang na tor ya nyams su myong /_/'bras bu'i sgras ni brjod pa'o/_/gang zhig sa yi dbang byed pa/_/de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin/_/de nyid drug las de nyid gsum/_/de nyid gsum las rang bzhin gcig_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/de ni mya ngan 
[\[139a.6\]]'das mtshan nyid/_/yang na dga' ba dang ni bral/_/dga' bral dga' min rang ngo bo/_/lha mo gang zhig rgyud bstan pa/_/de ni bde ba shin tu 'phel/_/bde dang bral ba'i bde ba ni/_/yang na de nyid rnyed pa'o/_/gang zhig phyag rgya che rang bzhin/_/de ni thim 
[\[139a.7\]]sogs yid las 'das/_/rang gis nyams myong rang ngo bo/_/bsam gtan 'dzin pa spangs pa'o/_/gang zhig gsang ba don dam par/_/de ni dga' ba dga' dang bral/_/yang na nang gi reg bya ste/_/reg bya dang bral rtog pa med/_/gang zhig bskul 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ba'i mchod pa'i don/_/de ni dri med bde ba 'byung /_/'das pa las ni yang skye ba/_/skye ba de la 'phel ba'o/_/lha mo shes rab ye shes gang /_/de ni kha la snying gar bde/_/kha ni rtag tu shes rab yin/_/snying ga ye shes brjod pa'o/_/gang zhig 
[\[139b.2\]]gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor/_/de ni khu ba 'pho med dge/_/yang na bde chen rang ngo bo/_/bde ba'i rnam par rtog dang bral/_/lha mo tshigs rgyas gang zhig ni/_/bya gdong ma de khong du chud/_/yang na tshigs ni zhu med khu/_/dga' mo rgyas pa mchog yin 
[\[139b.3\]]no/_/'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gang /_/de ni srog chags bsad pa'o/_/bcad pa de ni mchog gi gnas/_/'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'o/_/de dag ni mchog gi gsang ba chen po'i gsang chen bcom ldan 'das ma bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid bde ba 
[\[139b.4\]]chen po'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter la nges pa'i don to//_//lha mos gsol ba/_bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid ni/_/shin tu reg med gzung bar dka'/_/sa yi dbang phyug du tsam zhig_/mchog gi dbang phyug gis mkhyen lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[139b.5\]]pa/_/sna tshogs rnyed pa sum cu drug_/bcu gcig sa yi bdag po'o/_/dga' ba rnyed pa sum cu bdun/_/bcu gnyis sa yi bdag por brjod/_/mchog dga' rnyed pa sum cu brgyad/_/de ni bcu gsum pa yis/_/sum cu dgu lhag mthar thug pa/_/sa 
[\[139b.6\]]ni bcu bzhi rnyed pa'o/_/bzhi bcu de ni lhan skyes so/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga rnyed pa'i mnga' bdag go/_/gang zhig bcu drug pa yis/_/brjod du med pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/de la dbang phyug mchog gi mkha'/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed dka' ba/_/zag med 'pho med zhi 
[\[139b.7\]]ba ste/_/skye med rmad byung bas rmad byung /_/lha mos gsol pa/_kyai bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter de kho na nyid de la kun du spyod pa'i dus ni gang lags/_'dus pa ni ci zhig lags/_nyams 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]su myong ba de ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid la sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du srog dang rtsol pa'i rlung gnyis shar ba ni kun du spyod pa'o/_/rtsol pa'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su gang zhig yan lag thams cad la 
[\[140a.2\]]khyab pa'i srog de ni g.yon skor du 'byung ba yis ut+pa la'i rnam pa 'dzums shing nang gi lte ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i sdong bus 'jug pa'o/_/'jug pa tsam gyis zur brgyad pa'i nang na yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i srog gi rgyal po la gang zhig ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni 'dus pa'o/_/de'i 
[\[140a.3\]]dus su gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyis bye brag med pa gnyis su med pa'i sgros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad gzigs pa de ni nyams su myong ba'o/_/lha mos gsol pa/_gang zhig nyams myong las rnyed de/_/mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar lags/_/nyams su 
[\[140a.4\]]myong bas gang rnyed pa/_/de nyid mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dris pa de ni rmad byung mchog_/nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring /_/nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa/_/dga' ba'i dbang mo de brjod med/_/bla ma'i 
[\[140a.5\]]zhal nas nyams su myong /_/dbang bskur las ni rnyed pa'o/_/lha mos gsol ba/_dbang bskur ba ni du ma zhig_/rgyud rgyud nang bur ba tu gsal/_/'di ru bye brag ci 'dra ba/_/su la sbyin par bgyi ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[140a.6\]]dga' ba'i 'bras bu bye brag tu/_/dbang ni re zhig bzhi ru dbye/_/dang po dga' ba dang ldan pa/_/las dang po la sbyin par bya/_/gnyis pa mchog dga' dang ldan pa/_/snang ba gsum ni thob pa la/_/dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan pa/_/chos kyi sprin rnyed nges 
[\[140a.7\]]bas so/_/kun du bod sa zhes bya ba/_/rnyed pa bzhi la sbyin par bya/_/lha mos gsol ba/_kyai bcom ldan 'das snang ba la sogs pa dang chos kyi sbyin dang kun du 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi rim pa lags na/_sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la thog mar rang gi ngo bos so/_/sa la sogs pa rnyed pa rnams la mthar thug pa'i rang gi ngo bos so/_/gang gi phyir zhe na/_de rnams la brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shin tu bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bya ba la sogs 
[\[140b.2\]]pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo/_/ji ltar pad+ma yongs su smin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so/_/ma smin pa de bzhin du ma yin no/_/lha mos gsol pa/_ma smin pa rnams la yongs su smin pa'i dus gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[140b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_/sbyin sogs bsod nams bsags pa yis/_/mchog gi bla mas gtan la phab/_/skal ldan mo de smin pa'i dus/_/de las bla med byang chub ni/_/bla med gnas ni thob pa gang /_/phyi nas ci yang bslab mi dgos/_/bla med ye shes chen po'i gnas/_/
[\[140b.4\]]'bad min de ni mthong ba'o/_/ji ltar nyi ma shar tsam gyis/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni/_/ye shes chen po mthong bar 'gyur/_/ye shes chen po sku dang bral/_/gnyis su med pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/lus dang 
[\[140b.5\]]ngag dang yid gzugs min/_/sgra la sogs pa rnam par spangs/_/dpe med nam mkha' dang bral ba/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/_/sbom dang phra la sogs las 'das/_/char yang thig le dang bral ba/_/tshul dang tshul tsam ma yin te/_/mchog dang gzhan 
[\[140b.6\]]mchog gnas las grol/_/skye ba med dang 'chi med pa/_/rmad byung chen po'i 'du shes so/_/lha mos gsol pa/_kyai bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub rnyed pa la ye shes chen po brjod du med pa'i gnas gzhan rnyed pa yod dam 
[\[140b.7\]]ci/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum khyod ci la de lta bur 'dri/_brjod du med pa'i ye shes chen po khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi shes/_de ltar yin na bdag gi rang gi ngo bo yang dag par khyod kyis mi shes so/_/lha mos gsol pa/_khyod 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]kyi ngo bo bdag gis shes/_/'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus/_/sems can byang chub las gzhan ci/_/mchog gi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'am/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byang chub rnyed las gzhan ci zhig_/zhal bzang mo de rnyed yod dam/_/'on kyang de la 
[\[141a.2\]]mthong ba yod/_/tshil la bdud rtsi ji bzhin no/_/lha mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug_/rang bzhin ye shes sbyin pa'o/_/bdag gis gzhan zhig zhu ba bgyid/_/de la bka' drin bdag la stsol/_/dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes gang /_/bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin 
[\[141a.3\]]no/_/de la re zhig ji bzhin don/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bzhi pa de nyid ngo bor grags/_/de ltar ye shes 'du shes so/_/de bzhin ye shes las byung zhes/_/ye shes las byung lte bar bde/_/lha mo ye shes kha la yod/_/
[\[141a.4\]]ye shes las byung ske ru ste/_/ske ru longs spyod ngo bor grags/_/snying ga ru ni dbang zhes bya/_/thim pa kha ru shes bya ste/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs/_/yang na de bzhin gyi ni sgra/_/ji bzhin shes rab la sngar thal/_/de ltar ye shes lta ba yis/_/bkug nas rang 
[\[141a.5\]]gi kha la bkod/_/rang gi snying ga'i pad gnas su/_/byas nas nyid kyis nyams su myong /_/de yi skad cig ye shes bde/_/spros pa dang bral rtog med pa/_/sems kyis thams cad mthong nas su/_/nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya/_/de yang bsam pa bor nas 
[\[141a.6\]]su/_/phyi nas bsam pa ci yang med/_/nyid ni bde chen ye shes te/_/nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/lha mo de ni rdzogs pa'i rim/_/don dam par ni shes par bya/_/lha mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan ye shes rin chen nyi/_/'dod pa thams cad rab grub pa/_/snang ba 
[\[141a.7\]]bzhi la [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]gnas/_/mnga' bdag chen pos bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/snang ba bzhi la [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]gnas/_/sems dang sems byung 'du shes so/_/de dag las ni ma rig 'byung /_/mtshams kyi 'du shes mtshan nyid can/_/nyin mo'i rang 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bzhin sems las 'byung /_/sems ni mtshan mo'i ngo bo nyid/_/yang dag 'od ni gsum dang bral/_/lhan skyes ye shes mtshan nyid do/_/gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su sems/_/lha mo de tshe nyin mor 'gyur/_/gang tshe de las srog 'pho ba/_/de tshe mtshan mo 'og na 
[\[141b.2\]]gnas/_/steng yang ma yin 'og yang min/_/de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya/_/de yang me yi rang bzhin grags/_/nyi ma la ni srog 'dzin ma/_/gang gis nyi ma yod pa ni/_/snang ba las ni shar du 'gyur/_/snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan/_/yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsi 
[\[141b.3\]]g.yo/_/lha mo chen mo g.yo ba'i phyir/_/dga' bral dga' bar rab tu grags/_/gang du chad pa las ni thim/_/mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus/_/de ni snang ba dang po'i dga'/_/de las mchog ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/gsang phyir snang ba mched par grags/_/
[\[141b.4\]]zhu med g.yo med ska ba'o/_/ska ba la ni phra mo'i dngos/_/bde sbyin yang na kun spyod do/_/kun spyod las ni thob pa yin/_/zhal bzang mo ni snang bas so/_/de ni mtshams zhes grags pa ste/_/dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir/_/dbus kyi gnas na yod pa na/_/de phyir 
[\[141b.5\]]kun du spyod byed pa'o/_/dbus ni dngos po thams cad la/_/'dus par byed pa dran pa'o/_/yang na gang du mtshan mo ni/_/ma byung nyi ma nub pa'o/_/de ni dbus kyi mtshams zhes grags/_/rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin byed ma/_/de nyid snang ba thob pa yin/_/thams cad skye ba'i rgyu 
[\[141b.6\]]yin no/_/gang du dbus mtshams skad cig gis/_/bde ba'i tshor ba ma shes na/_/skal ldan lha mo de ru ni/_/dga' bral gsal bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de yi nyams su myong shes pa/_/skyon ni cung zad mi byed do/_/mi shes pas ni skal ldan mo/_/rtsa ba dang bcas med 
[\[141b.7\]]par byed/_/rtsa ba snang ba zhes byar dran/_/khu ba'i gzugs ni zla ba'o/_/bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter/_/bsrubs las skye ba yin pa'i phyir/_/lha mo me tog snang ba mched/_/dmar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar brjod/_/bde chen rnam par smin pa'i phyir/_/dmar ba'i 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gzugs ni sngar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu thob pa'i grags pa ste/_/mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan no/_/dngos dang dngos min bral ba'i phyir/_/zhal bzang mtshams kyi ye shes so/_/nyin mo snang ba mched 'khor grags/_/mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan
