[\[142a.2\]]'das/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das bral ba/_/mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o/_/de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog_/gang du yang ni gsal ma byas/_/skal ldan khyod kyi ngor byas pas/_/ye shes rin chen gsal byas so/_/lha mos gsol pa/_'bras bu de nyid rin chen 
[\[142a.3\]]gang /_/mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar rnyed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'bras bu de ni rin chen gang /_/de ni gnyis su dbye bar gnas/_/mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig_/mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/_/mchog dga' ngo bor grags pa 
[\[142a.4\]]ni/_/nyams su myong bas rnyed pa yin/_/mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/_/rang las rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong /_/de ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no/_/nyams su myong min rdzogs pa ni/_/gang du sus kyang mi shes so/_/ji ltar bu 
[\[142a.5\]]mo lang tshor bab/_/skyes bu med na nam yang min/_/legs dgyes kyi ni bde myong ba/_/legs dgyes dbang mo mi shes so/_/gang zhig bsam pa la sogs kyis/_/de ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs bral ba/_/de ni 'bras mchog rang 
[\[142a.6\]]bzhin no/_/de ru gang zhig sgom pa ni/_/phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog_/gang gis bla na med pa rnyed/_/'gro ba'i ma de yod pa min/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes che/_/bzhi dang bral ba rtag tu shar/_/rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci/_/gang du yang na sgom yod dam/_/
[\[142a.7\]]gal te gang gis sgom pa de/_/khyad par can du yong mi skye/_/mi skye'i phyir na bsam gtan la/_/gal te khyad par 'ong 'gyur na/_/de ni de nyid rang bzhin min/_/de nyid min par the tshom med/_/de nyid mi sgom de nyid ni/_/su zhig de la rnyed par 'dod/_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]de ni mkha' la ri mo ni/_/mchog gi dbang mo 'dri ba'o/_/lha mos gsol pa/_gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni/_/shes pa dang ni bshad bsu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang phyogs su dpal rdo rje'i gnas au rgyan du rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya 
[\[142b.2\]]bas shes pa dang bshad pa dang /_sems can la gsal bar byed do/_/lha mos gsol pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya ba des du'i dbang phyug lags/_bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dpal ye shes 
[\[142b.3\]]thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gang zhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i rgyal po de nyid in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i skus sa bcu'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi sku sa bcu bzhi'i dbang phyug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs 
[\[142b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin byas nas bstod pa/_de kho na nyid bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rab 
[\[142b.5\]]mchog rgyal gyur cig_/ye shes nam mkha' skye med gzugs med brjod med sku rab rgyal gyur cig_/dngos dang dngos min ro gcig ngo bo'i rmad byung de nyid rab gter rgyal gyur cig_/stong nyid stong pa nyid min mchog dang gzhan mchog 'od 
[\[142b.6\]]kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig_/de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod nas/_'khor thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing /_rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi 
[\[142b.7\]]sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA shrI gub+tas bskyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so//_//
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]{D424}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI bud+d+ha ka pA la nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[143a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/_'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags 
[\[143a.3\]]dang bral ba'i gtso bo rnams dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i tshig gis rdo rje chen po'i gnas su rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang 
[\[143a.4\]]dag par bshad nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dang pad+mo yang dag par sbyar bas btsun mo'i b+ha gar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rnal 'byor ma thams 
[\[143a.5\]]cad rmad du gyur te gcig la gcig lta zhing /_e ma'o bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_/de nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[143a.6\]]dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha mo sems can bsod nams dman pa rnams nus pa la zhon par 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad mchis sam/_gsungs pa/_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bye ba phrag drug nyid do/_/rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid 
[\[143a.7\]]do/_/mdo sde so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni bye ba la bsgres pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o/_/'di dag thams cad ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs so/_/sngags dang bral na ni rgyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste/_rgyud la lar ni ci 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/_/bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni sngags 'bum bzlas pas myur bar 'grub par gsungs so/_/bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub bo/_/de ltar rdo rje can chen po rgyud kyi bdag po'i gtso bos gsungs 
[\[143b.2\]]so/_/bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/_/sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis ni 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o/_/sems can sgom pa la zhen pa rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas par bya'o/_/sems can 'dod chags 
[\[143b.3\]]la zhugs pa rnams kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/_blun po dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/_/shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/_'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan du yang 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[143b.4\]]dman pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bzlas pa de'i tshe bskal ba skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do/_/de ltar thos nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la lta bar byed cing zur mig dang bcas pa'i chags pas bltas te/_
[\[143b.5\]]shin tu khro bas 'jigs par byed cing snying rje'i thugs 'khrugs pas bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo/_/de ltar bzhugs pa'i lha mo chen mo rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug la de nas des gzigs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags phyung ngo /_/o~M bud+d+he 
[\[143b.6\]]sid+d+he su sid+d+he/_a mr-i ta a ra dze bud+d+ha ka pA la sgo Ta ne spo Ta ya trA sa ya ho hU~M phaT/_de ltar sngags kyi mchog son pas sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa'i klu rnams bcom par byas shing phye mar byas nas slar 'ongs te sna tshogs sde ma'i zhal du zhugs te/_pad+ma'i nang nas byung nas slar 
[\[143b.7\]]thod par zhugs so/_/sngags 'di'i mthus klu rnams zhig ste/_skrag cing rdul 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nor rgyas la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu thams cad lhags te/_stobs kyis rgyu dang /_dung skyong dang /_'jog po dang /_mtha' yas dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]chen po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams dang /_gzhan gang yang rung ba dug las byung ba thams cad kyang lhags so/_/rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la kha phyogs te klu thams cad kyis zhus pa/_lha mo bka' stsol ci zhig bgyi zhes smra'o/_/gsungs pa 
[\[144a.2\]]gang yang sangs rgyas nyams su myong ba de ltar gyis shig_/de ltar thos pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thod pa kha phye ste glegs bam byung ngo /_/nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo /_/lha mo lha tshogs sde ma zung /_/sems can kun 
[\[144a.3\]]la phan 'dogs ma/_/rgyud 'di rgyal po chen po ste/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa'o/_/de ltar thos nas sna tshogs sde mas glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste/_/phyag na rdo rje la nye bar gtad do/_/
[\[144a.4\]]phyag na rdo rjes rgyud 'di zung /_/sems can kun la bde 'bab pa/_/rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub kun/_/'bras bu myur du ster byed pa'o/_/mnan dang spar ba ye shes che/_/gong na med pa rnyed dka' ba/_/gsang ba mchog gi nyams dga' ba/_/lus kun la ni 
[\[144a.5\]]rnam par gnas/_/nam mkha' lding dang char dbab dang /_/dngul chu bcud kyis len pa dang /_/bskrad dang dbang du bya nyid dang /_/rmongs dang mngon spyod nyid dang ni/_/dpung la sogs pa rengs nyid dang /_/dus su zin pa bzlog pa dang /_/phur bus gdab dang 
[\[144a.6\]]gsad pa dang /_/rtag tu sgrub pa byed pa dang /_/sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang /_/ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma bskyed dang /_/dpal chen he ru ka yi ni/_/bskyed pa dang ni gnas rgyu dang /_/dngos dang dngos med spros med dang /_/srid par spyod cing gos med 
[\[144a.7\]]dang /_/dgongs pas bshad pa mchog chen dang /_/rnal 'byor ma yi mchog chen dang /_/rnal 'byor ma yi 'dus pa dang /_/nus pa rnam pa mang gsungs pa/_/thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzugs brnyan dag pa nyid dang ni/_/de bzhin brtan pa 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bskyod pa dang /_/dur khrod 'jigs pa che bzang dang /_/ro langs bsgrub la sogs pa dang /_/stobs po che rnams dgug pa dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten gsum dgug dang /_/rims kyis gdung ba 'jigs chen dang /_/dgra yi kha sogs bcing ba dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[144b.2\]]gsad dang bslu ba dang /_/mi snang byed pa mchog dang ni/_/mig sman dang ni ril bu nyid/_/bcud len ral gri nyid dang ni/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/mi snang ba ni mchog chen dang /_/sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam 
[\[144b.3\]]'phrul dang /_/rang gi gzugs ni sgyur ba dang /_/gzhan gyi lus la gzhug sogs dang /_/sangs rgyas bye bas rab bsrungs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas bu mo mchog chen rnams/_/khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na/_/gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos/_/mig 
[\[144b.4\]]'phrul byed pa nyid dang ni/_/dge mtshan rnam pa mang shes pa/_/'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas/_/'di ru 'grub par gdon mi za/_/'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po/_/gcig gis 'bum las rgyal bar byed/_/skyes pa gcig gi 'dod chen gyis/_/bud 
[\[144b.5\]]med 'bum phrag 'dzag byed cing /_/rdo rjer byed pa rnyed dka' ba/_/gcig gi sa thams cad 'dod pa spyad/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/mkha' lding sbyor ba rim ji bzhin/_/rgyud kun tu yang rnyed dka' ba/_/mu stegs rnams kyi yul min pa/_/rgyud 
[\[144b.6\]]kun tu yang ma gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i gzhung ji bzhin/_/rdo rje mgon pos gsungs pa yi/_/mkha' lding shin tu rmad byung ba/_/'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i/_/sbyor ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gsungs/_/sha li ki yi sbyor ba dang /_/rig pa 
[\[144b.7\]]'dzin dang rgyal po 'gyed/_/rde rdung bud med 'phrog pa dang /_/shing bsnun zhags pas 'ching ba dang /_/khu byug pad+mas 'byed pa dang /_/stag byed chu blugs dung 'bud dang /_/thod lo kor 'phrog skyug pa dang /_/ras g.yogs thal lcag brdab pa dang /_/yig gsum 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bsam gtan gyis ni gtam/_/'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya/_/mkha' lding sbyor ba [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po/_/'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'/_/sems can rnams la phan byed pa/_/rdo rje mgon po nyid kyis gsungs/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad 
[\[145a.2\]]pa/_/mchog gi ye shes ji bzhin pa/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs/_/bde ba chen po ster byed pa/_/'di nyid du ni kun gnas kyang /_/byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/_/der ni bcud dang bcud len te/_/de nyid du ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/der ni dkyil 
[\[145a.3\]]'khor bzang po'o/_der ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'o/_/der ni he ru ka dpa' bo/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso'o/_/der ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa/_/de nyid du ni ro langs bsgrub/_/der ni dur khrod brgyad po rnams/_/skad cig tsam gyis bskyed pa'i rgyu/_/der 
[\[145a.4\]]ni sangs rgyas bdag nyid che/_/stong phrag gsum ni rnam par bzhugs/_/der ni 'jig rten khams kun te/_/de nyid bcom ldan 'das lha mo/_/sangs rgyas la sogs skyed pa'i yum/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po/_/shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen/_/
[\[145a.5\]]de nyid bsod nams kun ster ma/_/de nyid thar pa ster byed ma/_/phyag rgya chen po grags chen po/_/dngos grub kun ni 'dod byed ma/_/ma dang tsha mo sring mo dang /_/bu mo bud med rab brten ma/_/shes rab mnyes shing 'jigs byed ma/_/'gro drug bde sdug bag 
[\[145a.6\]]chags bcas/_/'khor ba mya ngan 'das nyid dang /_/bdag nyid chen po de nyid de/_/rnam rtog kun tu rtog pa nyid/_/de bzhin 'char dang nub pa dang /_/nyin mtshan mal stan bza' ba dang /_/nges pa'i brtul zhugs rtsis dang grangs/_/rnam par mi rtog yang dag rtog_/
[\[145a.7\]]dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang /_/gzhan dang gang dang de dang ni/_/de nyid bdag nyid chen po gcig_/sems can kun la bde ba 'bab/_/de ltar thos nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_'dod can ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' ba'i spyan gdangs nas sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du btud de/_'di ltar gsol to/_/e ma'o/_/sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/_/sems can kun la bde 'bab ma/_/glegs bam don dang ldan gang zhig_/de kun sangs rgyas byin 
[\[145b.2\]]brlabs bshad/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gnyis glang po che'i lag pa ltar rab tu brkyang ste glegs bam yang dag par blangs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i gnas su don dang bcas pa'i gzhung zhu bar gyur to/_/phyag na rdo rje'i 
[\[145b.3\]]snying ga nas byung ste/_sna tshogs sde ma'i thugs su ngal sos so/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal 'byor ma chen mo la 'di ltar gsol to/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa gang zhig lags/_/las kyi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'grub/_/sngon du bsnyen 
[\[145b.4\]]pa gang zhig lags/_/mkha' lding 'grub pa'i nges pa gang /_/dngul chu bcud len sna tshogs pa/_/dngos grub ster byed gang zhig lags/_/spar dang mnan pa gang gsungs dang /_/dus dang bya ba'i nges bcas dang /_/dngos grub thob dus gang zhig lags/_/
[\[145b.5\]]sangs rgyas ji lta bu ru brjod/_/de bzhin thod pa ji lta bu/_/sbyor dang ldan pa'i ji lta bu/_/sna tshogs sde ma'ang ji lta bu/_/theg pa chen po ji lta bu/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rnam nges ci/_/gsungs pa/_rgyud 'dir sngon du bsnyen pa med/_/de bzhin yul dang dus 
[\[145b.6\]]tshes dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar sbyor med pa/_/blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsten/_/dus dang bya ba'i nges mi bya/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes su gsungs/_/thod pa gru gsum yang dag 'byung /_/
[\[145b.7\]]sbyor ba gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa/_/de yi sna tshogs ngo mtshar byed/_/sde ni bde chen ye shes so/_/'di nyid theg pa chen po ste/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung /_/de ni rmad byung che mchog ste/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba nyid/_/de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba 'bab/_/rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs bde/_/dpa' dbang bdag mo dbang phyug ma/_/de yi thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/sngags dang rgyud ni 
[\[146a.2\]]rnam par gnas/_/de yi ye shes bzang po ni/_/lhan cig skyes pa dag las 'byung /_/de ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang /_/sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te/_/sna tshogs sbyor dang tshe 'phel dang /_/dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[146a.3\]]'grub par 'dir ni gdon mi za/_/man ngag lam las gang shes pa/_/bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub thams cad dang ye shes gtan la dbab 
[\[146a.4\]]pa dang /_thod pa kha phye ba las glegs bam byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/sngags le'u ji bzhin gsungs pa ste/_/mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung bo rnams/_/sngags gang gis ni 'grub 'gyur ba/_/de ni bdag gis rab bshad kyis/_/
[\[146a.5\]]khyod kyis dad pa brtan pas nyon/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni ta Ta s+pho Ta ya sar+b+ba shu b+ha pra dA yi ni hU~M phaT/_spos dbul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni ma Ta ma Ta pha swA hA/_me tog dbul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA ka pA la badzri ba ra ba ra ta Ta ta Ta sta Ta ya sta Ta ya ma Ta ma Ta hU~M he 
[\[146a.6\]]hrIHswA hA/_dri 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni gr-ih+Na gr-it+na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+hA pa ya bar ba ra ta Ta ta Ta/_sta Ta ya sta Ta ya ma na hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_mar me dbul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya kha kha hU~M/_lha bshos dbul ba'i 
[\[146a.7\]]sngags so/_/o~M ma hA ka pA li ni badzra d+ha r+m+ma d+ha r+m+me me g+he ba re pra ba re ba ra ba ra ka ra ka ra ta Ta ta Ta ha he swA hA/_gos dpul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M hA~M hai~M hauM he~M ha~M ha~M hA/_go cha'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a kha~M kro d+huM shrIM aH/_A hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ma hA ka pA la badzri Ni gats+tsha gats+tsha uta tiSh+Tha u ta tiSh+Tha dza dza dza ha dze~M dze~M dze~M/_trai lo kya~M pi Ta pA Ni hU~M phaT/_gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA ka pA la badzre tsi tre su tsi tre a lAM ba ne phrin yA/_sar+b+ba b+hU ta na mA ra Na kI la ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAn uts+tsA Ta ya sar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi trA pi ya b+ha ga pa ti 
[\[146b.2\]]ya k+Sha rA k+Sha sa bi shA tsA na sho Sha ya ta Ta yas b+ta pA tA la ga tA na/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags so/_/'bras sA lu blangs te 'o mas bkrus la bu mo gzhon nu mas de shin tu zhi bar btags la/_de yang 
[\[146b.3\]]shes rab can gyis gzugs brnyan byas te/_zhal gcig phyag bzhi gzhung bzhin cang te'u dang /_kha T+wAM ga dang /_ral gri dang /_thod pa 'dzin pa'o/_/de nas ro bsregs pa'i sol ba phye mar byas la rdo rje gtsug gis mnye bar bya'o/_/de nas des gzugs brnyan la byug 
[\[146b.4\]]par bya'o/_/me tog dkar pos mchod pa byas te/_sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas he ru ka'i rnam pa'i sbyor bas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/o~M ma hA badzra he ru ke badzre/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ma hA dz+nyA na s+phoT Ne/_shIg+h+raM sA da ya staM b+ha ya kI la ya hU~M 
[\[146b.5\]]phaT/_sngags 'di chu la lan bdun du mngon par bzlas te/_gzugs brnyan de bkru bar bya'o/_/chu des rang gi gdong bkrus na mi snang bar byed de/_lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/_/nags kyi nang du stag gis kyang mi mthong ngo /_/gzhan dag gis kyang de 
[\[146b.6\]]mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/srog chags 'bum gyi nang du song na ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed do/_/gang gis kyang mi mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu mo 'phrog cing lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo /_/'o mas gdong bkrus pa tsam gyis ni mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar 
[\[146b.7\]]shing 'ba' bo las phug ste/_dur khrod kyi me la 'ba' bol dang tshangs pa rdo rjes rab tu sbar la/_de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs te/_kham phor du gzhag par bya'o/_/yang na pad+ma'i snod du'o/_/sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas par bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ka pA li ni trAM hU~M/_o~M badzra pi li si nI hrIHhU~M/_o~M kA mi nI kha~M hU~M/_o~M pA tA la sI nAM AHhU~M/_o~M tsi traHse nA sa ma yA d+hiSh+Tha ya hrIHhU~M/_sngags 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/thal pa de dang rdo rje gtsug gis lus byug par byas 
[\[147a.2\]]na ji srid du lus la mtshon chas phog pa de srid du mi tshugs so/_/slar zhing dgra thams cad kyi mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang sdang ba la bltas na de long bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sdang ba'i sems 'dzin pa na de smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/thal ba de nyid dang mar khu bzang 
[\[147a.3\]]pos mig byugs na dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang ci yang rung ba'i sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i gter dpag tshad stong gi 'og tu son pa'i dngul dang gser dang /_rin po che gang na yod pa de thams cad la srin lag gis sdigs mdzub byas pa tsam gyis thams 
[\[147a.4\]]cad mdun du lhags te gsol ba 'debs so/_/kyai sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gter long la sems can gyi don gyis shig_/des gter blangs na gang 'dod pa de byed de/_thal ba des byed do/_/thal ba de dang go ro tsa na lhan cig bsnos te/_mdzub mos mnyes 
[\[147a.5\]]pas dpung gi tshogs langs pa mdzub mo bskor ba tsam gyis 'bum phrag stong gi dpung rnams kha sbub tu lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod pa de byed do/_/bkrus pa tsam gyis langs par 'di the tshom med do/_/thal ba de dang zha nye'i phye ma dang bsnos te gcig tu byas la/_/rdo 
[\[147a.6\]]rje'i gtsug rjes su byin te khab len gyi lcags kyi phye ma bsre zhing gser gyi phye ma yang cung zad bsre bar bya'o/_/rdo rje'i chu'i khu ba dang lhan cig tu bsnos te zangs ma'i snod du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du gzhag go/_/de nas mkhris pa chen po mnyes te rta'i khrag dang lhan cig tu bsnos la 
[\[147a.7\]]yang snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas bton te lcags gsum gyi snod du gzhag par bya'o/_/zangs ma'i snod du bzhag pa de me'i nang du bcug na gser dang dngul du 'gyur bar so ma nyi med do/_/srang gcig kyang srang stong gi rin thang du 'gyur te rin po che dang 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gser de ma sha gcig dang dngul srang gcig bsres te me la bzhun srang sum brgya'i rin thang gi tshad du 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med do/_/'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[147b.2\]]sems dpa' grags pa chen po snying rje dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po stobs che ba de rnams kyang sbyin par mi nus so/_/'di yi sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs/_/rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa yin/_/'dus sogs rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/_/sbyor ba rnam pa ma gsungs 
[\[147b.3\]]pa/_/gang tshe sngon du bsnyen de'i tshe/_/de yi sbyor bas ci zhig bya/_/bsod nams dman pa'i sems can gang /_/mtshams med lnga ni byed pa yang /_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'di lta'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/dngos po de yis blo chen rnams/_/sems can 
[\[147b.4\]]don la gcig tu brtson/_/srang gcig gis bsres bye ba'i rin/_/sbyor ba kun tu rnyed par dka'o/_/sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/_/bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/_/bla mas dngos grub bla mas mthar/_/bla ma ston pa rnam kun pa/_/des na slob ma blo chen gyis/_/
[\[147b.5\]]'bad pas bla ma mnyes par bya/_/thal ba de nyid kyis lus blta ba'i don du bu mo'i mgo la blugs te rdo rje gtsug gis bu mo bkru'o/_/yang thal bas thig le byas la/_tshangs pas rdo rjes maN+Dal gru bzhi byas te/_de'i dbus su bu mo gzhag par bya'o/_/bdug spos lngas bdugs shing 
[\[147b.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs na bu mo la 'bab par 'gyur te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ston to/_/bu don gyis 'bras bu la sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par bsngags so/_o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni de ti de hI da dA pa ya nga dA pa ya he he b+ha ga ba ti shI 
[\[147b.7\]]g+h+ra~M khaD+gaM da ri hi bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya ya dz+nya ma laM g+ha ya hU~M sta~M hrI phaT a phaT/_yungs kar bsnun pa tsam gyis ni/_/bu mo grags chen ma ni rgod/_/de yi kha nas ral gri bdun/_/'byung ba la ni the tshom med/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas skad cig ma de nyid la 'grub par 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'dir som nyi med do/_/de ltar ral gri gcig grub pas bye ba brgya stong gi rig 'dzin grub pas bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni 'jig rten gsum na yang rnyed par dka'o/_/bu mo bkrus pa tsam gyis rnal mar 'gyur ro/_/de'i thal ba lcags gsum 
[\[148a.2\]]gyis dkris te ril bu byas nas khar bcug pa tsam gyis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab can gyis sum cu pa yang bskor ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi gzigs so/_/ril bu lag par blangs pas dngos po gang dang gang la reg pa tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148a.3\]]thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA la dzaHhU~M khaM ra~M a/_'jig rten gsum bsgrub pa'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHhU~M/_dgra brlag pa'i sngags so/_o~M ma hA ka pA la badzri kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+Th+na g+ha g+ha g+nyA ta la 
[\[148a.4\]]g+tA ta ya sar+b+ba sha tru~M o~M ha trA~M hU~M phaT/_bskrad pa'i sngags so/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po/_rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las thal ba'i sbyor ba dang las sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa dang /_sngags kyi le'u ste 
[\[148a.5\]]gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sna tshogs sde ma la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can don la gcig brtson pa/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das lha mo/_/'di lta'i rab tu sbyor zhes pa/_/rgyud 
[\[148a.6\]]gzhan dag tu ma gsungs shing /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sbas pa/_/de ni 'bad de gsal bar mdzod/_/lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/_/lha yi le'u ni ji lta bu/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i/_/rgyud du lha rnams du zhig gsungs/_/de ru gzugs 
[\[148a.7\]]ni ji lta bu/_/gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/_/gsungs pa/_ra~M las nyi ma bsam par bya/_/nyi ma'i steng du hU~M byung ba'i/_/rdo rje nag po sreg pa'i bdag_/rdo rje de nyid 'od zer gyis/_/rab dra bas mtshams bcing ngo /_/de bzhin rdo rje nag gyur pa'i/_/rdo rje'i sa 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gzhi bsam par bya/_/rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus chung par/_/e yi rnam pa bdag nyid che/_/gru gsum khams gsum bdag nyid can/_/yi ge la~M gyur sa yi ni/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser po 'o/_/de yi dbus nas sa bon ni/_/yi ge o~M ste chos bdag nyid/_/
[\[148b.2\]]o~M las byung ba'i 'khor lo na/_/rtsa rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can/_/rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs/_/rtsa ni drug cu la rgyan dang /_/sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab/_/des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o/_/rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che/_/shes rab can gyis de ltar bsam/_/de 
[\[148b.3\]]yi dbus gnas sa bon ni/_/ba~M dkar yi ge las byung ba/_/chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o/_/rtsa rnams thams cad chu yi ni/_/dkyil 'khor la ni thim par 'gyur/_/slar yang bsam par bya ba ni/_/ra~M dmar las byung me dkyil 'khor/_/gru gsum 'bar 
[\[148b.4\]]ba'i bdag nyid can/_/rab tu 'bar bzhin pa yi ni/_/rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yang dag blta/_/de nas bsam par bya ba ni/_/ya~M gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/zla ba phyed pa'i rnam 'dra sngo/_/rtsa rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i gzugs/_/thim gyur 'khor lo'i rig par 
[\[148b.5\]]gsungs/_/de dag thams cad thim 'gyur ba/_/de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa/_/de ltar shes par byed gang zhig_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/de nas zla ba bsam par bya/_/zla ba'i steng du nyi ma'o/_/de yi dbus tshud sa bon ni/_/hU~M dang a 
[\[148b.6\]]yi rang bzhin no/_/yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te/_/ka ni ha la thim par 'gyur/_/mi phyed pa yi ha dang hU~M/_/gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can blta'o/_/ha ni mi shigs shes rab kyi/_/bdag nyid u dang thig le dag_/gnyi ga gcig tu gyur pa ni/_/yi ge hU~M gi mchog 
[\[148b.7\]]pa lta'o/_/hU~M las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams/_/de yis bde ba che bskul te/_/ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can/_/nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing /_/dkyil 'khor gnyi ga gcig gyur pa/_/nyi ma'i mchog tu blta bar bya/_/yang ni hU~M byung 'od zer des/_/rtsa ba'i 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]'khor lo thams cad la/_/reg ma thag pa'i mod la ni/_/rtsa ba'i 'khor lo las 'bab 'gyur/_/zhu bde yis sa bon bkru/_/hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ste/_/dbus su de nyid kyis byin brlabs/_/sa bon rdo rje las byung ba/_/dpa' bo khrag 'thung 
[\[149a.2\]]mdog sngon po/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/gtso bo hU~M zhes 'don pa ste/_/skyil krung phye pa'i gar gyis gnas/_/gnyi ga'ang khro ba'i bdag nyid can/_/stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'chang /_/bsregs su mchod phyir 
[\[149a.3\]]thogs pa yi/_/shin tu bzhad pas 'jigs che ba'i/_/gtso bo snying rje'i bdag nyid blta/_/dpung rgyan mgul do 'khor gdub dang /_/gcer bu rus pa'i ska rags 'chang /_/g.yer kar bcas pa'i rkang gdub can/_/ma lus bdud rnams 'joms par byed/_/
[\[149a.4\]]ral pa'i cod pan yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/_/zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/_/dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/_/'khor lo rna cha gdu bu dang /_/phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis mtshan/_/thal ba'i rdul can 'jigs par byed/_/thod pa gti mug 
[\[149a.5\]]gis brgyan pa'i/_/dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa/_/byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no/_/gtso chen de yi shes rab ma/_/sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/_/gcer bu mgo bo'i phreng ba spangs/_/rgyan med mchod phyir thogs med ma/_/bde ba kun gyi gzugs can ma/_/phyag gnyis 
[\[149a.6\]]skra ni grol ba mo/_/he ru ka la 'khyud gnas ma/_/de ltar pha rol phyin lha mo/_/kha dog dmar po rnam gsal ma/_/zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba/_/cung zad mche ba gtsigs 'jigs ma/_/g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/_/g.yon na kha T+wAM thod pa'o/_/rang gi lus 
[\[149a.7\]]skyes 'od zer gyis/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya/_/de yis bskul ba tsam gyis ni/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin las/_/'dzag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/_/brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog_/mchod pa sna tshogs 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'dzin pa yis/_/mgon po he ru ka mchod do/_/rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa/_/rdo rje mche ba ma yis ni/_/thod pa khrag gis bkang bzung ste/_/gzi brjid chen po gsol bar mdzad/_/rdo rje pho nya bdag nyid che/_/dbang ldan du ni cang te'u brdung /_/rdo rje gdong 
[\[149b.2\]]ma dri snod dang /_/me yi phyogs su rnam par gnas/_/rdo rje can ma grags chen mo/_/mchod yon snod bcas bde na bral na/_/rdo rje gtsigs ma lho yi ni/_/phyogs na rnga bo che 'dzin gsungs/_/rlung du rdo rje lte ba ma/_/ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no/_/nub tu rdo rje 
[\[149b.3\]]'jigs ma ni/_/ce spyang phyag na 'dzin par gsungs/_/byang du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/_/lha mo'i chags pas gtso bo mchod/_/de ltar he ru ka bsams nas/_/rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis mchod/_/sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/_/sna tshogs rol mo 
[\[149b.4\]]mchog gsungs dang /_/dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos/_/'di dag gis ni gtso bo mchod/_/mchod yon zhal bsil de bzhin khrus/_/glu yi mchog ni rnam mang pos/_/mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyid che/_/'di dag gis ni mchod par bya/_/dpa' bo 
[\[149b.5\]]rdzogs par mthong nas ni/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag_/'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/_/rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa/_/bder gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs/_/gzugs 
[\[149b.6\]]ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan/_/lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa/_/phyag g.yas byang chub sems bkang ba'i/_/bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas bsnams/_/zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/_/he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig_/rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra/_/mgon pos 
[\[149b.7\]]mdun du bltas nas ni/_/dbang bskur mchog ste gsol ba gdab/_/brtse dang ldan pa'i grags chen mo/_/'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag_/dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor mas khrus shig_/dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/_/shi ba 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]tsam gyis stong pa nyid/_/de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/_/ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid/_/dper na pi bang sbyor kun tshogs/_/rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung /_/de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/_/sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur/_/rmongs pa gang 
[\[150a.2\]]zhig dbang med par/_/bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/_/ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/_/slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/_/de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor mas/_/slar yang bdag la dbang bskur cig_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/_/thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[150a.3\]]gsol ba gdab/_/gal te dbang bskur med na ni/_/he ru ka yi bdag gyur cing /_/de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/_/rgyal gyur rgyal gyur zhes smra zhing /_/bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo/_/phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi/_/dbang bskur tsam gyis nam 
[\[150a.4\]]mkha' yi/_/khams nas rnga yi sgra grag cing /_/me tog tsan+dan char 'bab 'gyur/_/de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/_/rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la ni thim/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las lha bskyed pa dang /_
[\[150a.5\]]dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams/_/'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis/_/bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/_/de nas 
[\[150a.6\]]phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nor rgyas la sogs bdag nyid che/_/klu rnams ci phyir dgug pa lags/_/rnal 'byor chen po bdag la gsungs/_/de nas sna tshogs sde ma'i snying gi 'od zer gyis 
[\[150a.7\]]klu thams cad kyi snying gdang spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/_tshim par byas nas slar log go/_/de nas klu de rnams thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha mo bka' ni ci zhig gsol/_/kyai lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_/gsungs 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]pa/_mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sngags/_/ye shes las byung ji lta bu/_/dus su zin pa ji ltar yin/_/ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur/_/sbrul gyis zin pa tsam gyis ni/_/slar yang sems can 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/zhus pa/_khyab 'jug dbang phyug 
[\[150b.2\]]sogs lha dang /_/tshangs pa tshangs pa mdun na 'don/_/de rnams la ni 'chi 'pho mchis/_/dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur/_/de ltar dus su zin ces smra/_/sbrul gyi dug ni sel ba med/_/de bzhin sbrul la dug ni yod/_/sbrul zin 'tsho'am mi 
[\[150b.3\]]'tsho ba/_/bde byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che'i/_/lha de rnams ni de ltar smra/_/ston pa stong nyid nges gsung ba/_/bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/_/sbrul gyi dug ni ji ltar yod/_/gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin/_/
[\[150b.4\]]dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu/_/gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin/_/sems can dug zin mi 'chi ba/_/stong nyid smra ba'i nges pa yin/_/'dod chags gti mug stong pa nyid/_/grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid/_/yul gyi rang 
[\[150b.5\]]bzhin dri ma med/_/dri ma dang bral ji ltar dug_/sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig byed/_/tha mal pa yi yul ni sbrul/_/yul gyi nyes pa dug nyid do/_/lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs/_/thams cad dus su zin pa yin/_/yul gyi nyes pa sbyangs pa nyid/_/ston 
[\[150b.6\]]pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya/_/ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang /_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas/_/'dir ni klu rnams thams cad lhags/_/de phyir rab nges lha mo kye/_/dus zin tha chem 
[\[150b.7\]]med pa ru/_/blo med mu stegs can de smra/_/'di ltar smras te klu rnams kyis/_/sna tshogs sde la phyag 'tshal te/_/rang rang gi ni gnas su dong /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags gsungs pa/_o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas/_/sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig_/'jig rten mtha' dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis bcings/_/kyai lags bshas mo 'di ltar ltos/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs 
[\[151a.2\]]te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/_/lha mo yis ni bshad du gsol/_/sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/_/de ru bdag la ltad mo mchis/_/gsungs pa/_dkyil 'khor med par sbyin mi bya/_/slob ma bsdu bar mi bya'o/_/gtso bos ji 
[\[151a.3\]]ltar gsungs pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya/_/mtho lnga pa yis bzung ste/_/khor yug tu ni gru bzhi'o/_/de yi phyed kyi zlum po la/_/brgyud las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyad/_/o~M hU~M hrIHhU~M kha~M hU~M a hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha yed/_sa sbyang ba'i sngags 
[\[151a.4\]]so/_/badzra he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hri sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA pra b+ha~M dza ha hU~M ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M hU~M phaT/_sa sbyang ba'i dus su gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na i dam sU tra tiSh+Tha mA tsa la he he bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra he ru ka hU~M hU~M Tha Tha/_sngags 'dis lan bdun du 
[\[151a.5\]]srad bu la mngon par bsngags par bya'o/_/thig skud kyi sngags so/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/kha khyer snam bu spangs pa la/_/ba dan rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdul tshon gzhan dang 
[\[151a.6\]]'dres med pa'i/_/rdul tshon dmar por rdzogs par bya/_/de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams/_/grwa dang grwa ru rnam par bzhag_/bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba/_/thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga/_/gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang /_/cang te'u gnas su rdo rje bri/_/rdo rje'i steng du 'dam skyes te/_/
[\[151a.7\]]de ltar bum par bri byas nas/_/chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya/_/bum pa la ni ras kyis brgyan/_/rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing /_/bum par kun nas 'bru lnga dang /_/a mra'i lcug mas dag pa par bya/_/de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste/_/rdo rje slob dpon blo chen gyis/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan/_/pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste/_/nyi ma'i steng du hU~M yig bsam/_/hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ni/_/sngon po hU~M gi bdag nyid skyes/_/hU~M dang rdo rje byung dpa' bo/_/he ru ka ni bdag nyid che/_/sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa/_/gtso bo chen po zhal gcig pa/_/
[\[151b.2\]]g.yas na gri gug thod pa ste/_/g.yon na kha T+wA~M rdo rje'o/_/sku la mi yi rus pas brgyan/_/klu rnams skrag par byed pa po/_/skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/_/gcer bu 'jigs byed rang bzhin te/_/zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/_/dbu skra ser zhing gyen du 'bar/_/
[\[151b.3\]]thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa/_/sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed/_/dpa' bo de ltar bsam par bya/_/phyis ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/_/o~M dang hU~M dang kha~M dang swa/_/yi ge yongs su gyur pa las/_/rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bzhi/_/sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma/_/sa 
[\[151b.4\]]'og gnas ma rab bzang ma/_/lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo/_/grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs/_/g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/_/g.yas na gri gug thod pa 'dzin/_/g.yon na kha T+wA~M cang te'u/_/rus rgyan 
[\[151b.5\]]lha mo kun 'jigs ma/_/zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/_/stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/skra ni ser po gyen du 'bar/_/thod pa'i phreng bas spyi bor brgyan/_/de rnams mgo rgyus phreng ba can/_/lha mo'i 'od zer spros gyur pas/_/klu rnams skrag par mdzad 
[\[151b.6\]]pa mo/_/phyogs kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o/_/blo ldan mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la/_/nyi ma bzhi la hU~M yig bzhi/_/hU~M yig so sor gyur pa las/_/chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung po ma/_/bzhin bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma ste/_/mtshams kyi 'dab mar gnas lha mo/_/
[\[151b.7\]]kha dog ser mo grags chen mo/_/thams cad na bza' ser po mnabs/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/klu brgyad rgyan byas lha mo ni/_/g.yas na gri gug cang te'u 'dzin/_/g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/_/sku las 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'od zer ser po 'phro/_/shin tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/_/cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/_/thams cad gar byed skra ser ma/_/klu rnams skrag par skyed byed ma/_/mtshams kyi cha ru rnam par gnas/_/de nas bsam par bya ba ni/_/slob dpon he 
[\[152a.2\]]ru kas rang gi lus las skyes pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par byas nas slar log ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas he ru ka dang rnal 'byor 
[\[152a.3\]]brgyad lhan cig tu bkrus so/_/bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du gyur to/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni/_/slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/_/phyis ni gtor ma gtang bar bya/_/khyad par du ni 'o ma'o/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan 
[\[152a.4\]]pa'i/_/shes rab can gyis chang btung zhing /_/mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya/_/'bras bu bzhi yang dbul bya zhing /_/de nas slob ma blo chen gyis/_/ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya/_/der ni gdan yang bstabs par bya/_/slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/_/de ru 
[\[152a.5\]]rnal 'byor ma mchod do/_/blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas/_/sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshim bya/_/mgu bar sems pa'i yid kyis ni/_/'khor lo khyad par che bya ste/_/phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag_/phyi rol sa ru byung 
[\[152a.6\]]nas ni/_/bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te/_/slob mas maN+Dal gsum byas la/_/bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod/_/zhabs la spyis gtugs 'di skad gsol/_/ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kyi/_/sems can don la gcig brtson pa/_/nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang /_
[\[152a.7\]]sha ri ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal/_/dus su zin pa bzlog pa yin/_/sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs/_/bdag gi the tshom bzlog pa dang /_/sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi/_/brtan pa dang 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]ni rgyu ba dang /_/yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi/_/dug rnams dug med par bgyi zhing /_/sems can thams cad 'tsho bgyi pa/_/bla ma chen po de dag gsungs/_/de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi/_/
[\[152b.2\]]slob ma la ni so shing sbyin/_/so shing sngags ni sbyin par bya/_/o~M hU~M he b+ha ga ba ti mu la~M pa ri shud+d+ha~M ku ru swA hA/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/_/so brud nas ni kha bshal te/_/slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/_/rang gi lag pa byug bya zhing /_/me tog gis kyang 
[\[152b.3\]]dkri bar bya/_/mgrin pa lag par zla ba bsam/_/zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi/_/sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za/_/sangs rgyas tshogs kun zla bar blta/_/grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing /_/zla ba zhu bar gdon mi za/_/slob dpon bsgoms pa'i 
[\[152b.4\]]nus pa yis/_/slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/_/lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/_/oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+d+hiSh+Tha na/_yan+tu ma tsa la ma tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/_bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_tra ba tra ba b+ho b+ha ga wAn+tA sar+b+ba bud+d+ha ka pA li badzra s+ya ka taM ma 
[\[152b.5\]]la ya shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M ha ha/_sngags 'dis lan bdun du bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis de'i lus la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum 
[\[152b.6\]]pa yang 'dor ro/_/nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/_/lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis ni/_/'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na/_/mkha' lding rtogs pa'i sems can gyis/_/bdag ni ji ltar 
[\[152b.7\]]'gro bar 'gyur/_/de ma thag tu slob dpon gyis/_/dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya/_/sna tshogs spos dang lha bshos dbul/_/dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni/_/many+dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya/_/mchod yon gyi ni dan ched du/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya/_/khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yis/_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi/_/khrag 'thung rnam par spyan drangs te/_/dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan/_/mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[153a.2\]]rnams sa bon gyi/_/'od zer gyis ni rnam par bsam/_/bdag nyid chen po grags chen po/_/bum pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis/_/dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni/_/slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta/_/de nas zangs 
[\[153a.3\]]ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung phor chus bkang ste/_/man+dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o/_/ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags 
[\[153a.4\]]bzla'o/_/ab+hiShiny+tsa n+hu mAM sarba yo gi ni ma ku to a tra a tiSh+Tha yan+tu/_a tsan+tu hU~M swA hA/_cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/de nas slob dpon gyis kyai khyod su zhes smra'o/_/slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o/_/de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus 
[\[153a.5\]]su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/_mig ras bsal te/_dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/_/o~M he ru ka badzra buSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_dbus su'o/_/o~M ci tra se nA puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/_shar du'o/_/o~M kA mi nI puSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_lho'i 'o/_/o~M pA tA la bA si zhi puSh+pa yaM pra 
[\[153a.6\]]tI ts+tsha hU~M/_nub tu'o/_/o~M su b+ha dre puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/_byang du'o/_/o~M sho N+Ni ni puSh+pa yaM pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_mer ro/_/o~M bud+hI ni puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_bden bral du'o/_/o~M tsa tu ra b+ha dra puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_rlung ngo /_/o~M A kA sha bA si ni puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha hU~M/_dbang ldan du'o/_/de nas dkyil 
[\[153a.7\]]'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta ba dang /_mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan par bya'o/_/yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o/_/de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyo bas dug skyugs par 'gyur ro/_/brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]dang /_gzhan yang sbyar ba dang /_nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang /_mda' dug dang /_byug pa'i dug dang /_dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang /_/bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de rnams nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te klu yis zin pa yang /_/de ru de ni nges 
[\[153b.2\]]bar 'gro/_/gzhan yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung /_/chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang /_/de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de yi phyir na dug gi chu/_/'di ru btung bar the tshom med/_/de nas slob ma dri bar bya/_/'dir ni sha li kar byed cing /_/mkha' lding shes 
[\[153b.3\]]pa'i slob dpon 'gyur/_/bsam pa rnam par dag shes nas/_/phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya/_/stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab/_/de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin/_/ji srid sprul gyis zin dus dang /_/ji srid mkha' lding rigs yod par/_/de srid de dang 
[\[153b.4\]]de las kyang /_/ji srid dus su zin med par/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min/_/dus zin 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste/_/nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya/_/dus su zin no zhes smra ba/_/de srid rnal 'byor che 'di yis/_/de ru las 
[\[153b.5\]]ni brtsam par bya/_/bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing /_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang dag ldan/_/blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis/_/phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/der rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/_/sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang sngags kyis/_/gnas 
[\[153b.6\]]dgu ru ni mchod par bya/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes/_/mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams brtsam/_/gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod/_/de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro/_/klu rnams kyi ni snying skams pas/_/ci zhig bgyi'o zhes ni smra/_/gsungs pa/_lha 
[\[153b.7\]]mo sna tshogs sde ma yis/_/sangs rgyas thod par sngon du gsungs/_/kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu/_/song ste 'dir dus zin gyur pa'i/_/dus zin 'dzin pa bzung ba med/_/dug med sbrul yang med pa'o/_/gang phyir dogs pas rmongs gyur pa/_/de phyir skye bo rnams 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]'chir 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer slar log ste/_/snying ga ru ni thim par 'gyur/_/yang ni sems ni mnyam gzhag pa'i/_/slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar bstan/_/de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i/_/lci ba blangs te 'dab chags ri skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar 
[\[154a.2\]]po byas te/_ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la gzhag par bya'o/_/ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las snag tsha byas te/_sems can gyi don rig pas dben par sngags bri bar bya'o/_/oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hri tat+Tha pa yab+ho sha li ka na ya nA bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya Adz+nyA ma la~M g+ha ya hU~M hU~M sa ran+tu 
[\[154a.3\]]sar+b+ba da DI ka pha ti ka tse te/_man+ng+hu g+hi di sar+b+ba dzi i na su nan+ti ba ya ga re re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na spu tan+ti murda na re res spya/_a bas spya ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza i tsa la ha bu la ha re re b+ha ru kri pra b+hI ta yanA ga rA dza na u ha pu Ta Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i zhes pa ni sha li ka'i snying po'i 
[\[154a.4\]]sngags so/_/de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/_/sems ni shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la/_/pho dang mo ru brtag par bya/_/snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya/_/mig gi sngon du mi gzhag cing /_/sha li ka bzang pos phyogs blta/_/de 
[\[154a.5\]]nas lcug ma sngags kyis bsngags/_/o~M haM ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no/_/o~M ba~M tshangs pa'i sa bon no/_/o~M sa~M zhes pa ni zhi byed kyi sa bon no/_/o~M ha ha ha ha ha ha ha~M swA hA/_mngag pa'i sngags so/_/'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog_/stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'/_/
[\[154a.6\]]lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/_/'gro bar 'dir ni the tshom med/_/klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi/_/mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni/_/klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe/_/mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan/_/[{]rings [,]ring [}]nas kyang ni gshog rlung gis/_/stobs 
[\[154a.7\]]po che yi klu rnams skrag_/mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang /_/gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang /_/gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad/_/skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni smra/_/klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shin/_bdag nyid chen po sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]klu dang sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di skad gsol to/_/kyai sha li ka gzhan du gsung bar ma mdzad cig_/de ltar thos nas sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go/_/de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/_sa'i gong bu blangs 
[\[154b.2\]]la sha li ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun na/_/skad cig de nyid la de'i mig 'bye bar 'dir som nyi med do/_/dus su zin pa 'byel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas de'i lus la 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing /_dga' ba'i sems 
[\[154b.3\]]kyis ldang ngo /_/zin pa langs pa tsam nyid na sha li kas sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/skad cig ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o/_/stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin/_/chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kyai/_/gang gis 'dzin cing 
[\[154b.4\]]gang zhig 'dzin/_/mtha' dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kyai/_/dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma zhig pa de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par 
[\[154b.5\]]bya'o/_/de ltar slob ma la rjes su gnang ba byin nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o/_/des lan brgya 'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/_dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a hU~M/_/dug bza' ba'i sngags so/_/de nas gzhan yang don du 
[\[154b.6\]]gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la dkyil 'khor bstan te/_dung phor gyi chu 'thungs pa des na dug med par 'gyur te/_sbrul gyis mi 'dzin no/_/gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tshom med do/_/de ltar slob ma sha li ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la 
[\[154b.7\]]bkas gnang ba byin te/_grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do/_/gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci yang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]ste gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyis gshegs su gsol te/_/o~M bud+d+ha ga pA li ni hrIHu tiSh+Tha gats+tsha hU~M gats+tsha hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/chu 
[\[155a.2\]]yi sbyor ba bla med pa/_/gang gis byin pa tsam gyis ni/_/dug gis zin pa 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma bdun na 'chi ba dang /_/gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams/_/chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni/_/'di ru 'tsho bar the tshom med/_/sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas 
[\[155a.3\]]ni/_/gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya/_/dung phor chu yis bkang byas pa/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/_/de nas brtse ba chen po yi/_/bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni/_/rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/_/zla ba yi ni khyad par bsam/_/bcu drug cha las 
[\[155a.4\]]yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/dri med dge ba'i lus can te/_/de'i dbus sa bon mi shigs dge_/kha dog dkar po'i lus can no/_/lag des snod kyi kha bcad de/_/de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya/_/oM sar+b+ba piSha ha ra ha ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sngags 'dis lan bdun 
[\[155a.5\]]gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/_mi shigs pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du thim ste/_chu dang zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por 'gyur ro/_/gal te dug gis zin pa ma shin de'i tshe chu blud do/_/yang na shi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug 
[\[155a.6\]]par lan gsum gsum du chu rgyun mi 'chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tshom med do/_/de nas chu blud na rnal mar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang /_chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u 
[\[155a.7\]]ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog_/rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/_/gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka/_/grub ma byis pa can ma dang /_/de bzhin thod [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]can 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]ma'o/_/'di dag sman ni chen po lnga/_/sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka'/_/'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/bskal ba bye bar de 'tsho'o/_/gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu/_/de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum/_/grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o/_/byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis/_/
[\[155b.2\]]thod pa can yang zla bar te/_/tshe 'phel ba yi mchog yin no/_/bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs/_/glang po ma ni ngang pa'i gzugs/_/drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te/_/sdob sangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig_/kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni/_/mig las byung ba'i rdzas 
[\[155b.3\]]gang yin/_/sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma/_/'di ru bstan par som nyi med/_/de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas/_/rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas/_/ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul te/_/sman ni sha ri ka ru gsungs/_/me tog ldan pa'i bu mo gang /_/kha dog nag mos rab 
[\[155b.4\]]mdzes ma/_/gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus pa/_/de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung /_/sman de'i ming ni grub mar bshad/_/sangs rgyas tho pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bud med rab mdzes mnyams dang /_/dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi/_/de 
[\[155b.5\]]las dang por byung ba'i rdzas/_/sman de byis pa can no zhes/_/bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs/_/lhan cig skyes dag byung ba'i rdzas/_/mchog chen mar khu dag dang ni/_/bsre 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/sman de'i ming ni thod can mo'o/_/zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor 
[\[155b.6\]]ba yis/_/bya bar 'dir ni the tshom med/_/zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir/_/de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi/_/ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/_/de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni/_/dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dngos po gang 
[\[155b.7\]]dang gang yang rung /_/lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la/_/dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni/_/dngul dang gser du 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/rgyud gzhan du ni rab sbas pa/_/'bad pas de 'dir 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]rab gsal bya/_/dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste/_/dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid/_/khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin/_/khu ba rdo rje'i thabs byung nyid/_/sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin/_/de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog_/gang gi dam tshig rnyed dka' ba'i/_/thabs 'dir bdag 
[\[156a.2\]]gis bshad par bya/_/ba lang sha ni 'bar ba ste/_/khyi yi sha la spro bar gsungs/_/rta yi sha la bza' bar bshad/_/glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs/_/sha chen la ni bzang por bshad/_/de lnga rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par/_/
[\[156a.3\]]gal te gcig tu byed nus pa/_/de che rnam rtog de thams cad/_/'jig 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste/_/tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid/_/ro la shin tu rnyed dka' gsungs/_/byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid/_/g.yung mo la ni bzang mor 
[\[156a.4\]]gsungs/_/rus pa'i phreng la rdzas zhes bya/_/skyes bu la ni rdo rjer gsungs/_/bud med la ni snod bzang nyid/_/dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor la/_/gzi brjid phreng chen de bshad do/_/rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid/_/'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod/_/'dri 
[\[156a.5\]]ba la ni mar me'o/_/shin tu 'dri la me zhes bya/_/'gro ba la ni phreng can ma/_/'ong la shin tu phreng can ma/_/myur ba la ni byug ces bya/_/dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod/_/pad+ma rtse 'jo phreng can ma/_/sngags kyis mtshan ma rab nges zhe'o/_/ljags la lce 'og ces bya ste/_/
[\[156a.6\]]so la bza' bsnal ba de/_/mig la rol rtsed mu tig rna/_/gsang ba'i yul la rnyed dka' zhe'o/_/'di dag bshad do lag chen po/_/'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/med par phan tshun smra mi bya/_/'on kyang bshad chen de 
[\[156a.7\]]nyid 'di/_/gcig la gcig gis smra bar bya/_/rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa/_/rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/_/nye 'dun grong mtha' lhan cig zhe'o/_/'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs/_/nye ba'i 'dus pa nang de bzhin/_/gnas la 'bras bu zhes su 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gsungs/_/nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do/_/grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs/_/nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o/_/tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs/_/gcig pu la ni 'dab ma ste/_/stong pa la ni rtsa bzhi'o/_/de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni/_/bde gshegs 
[\[156b.2\]]rnams kyis mi mkhyen no/_/spyan ma la sogs rnal 'byor ma/_/rnams kyis khong du mi chud cing /_/byang chub sems dpa'i yul min zhing /_/bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/spros pa thams cad spangs nas ni/_/rdzas la chags par mi bya'o/_/shin tu song sgom 
[\[156b.3\]]rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog med/_/gti mug dang ni nga rgyal spangs/_/nyon mongs thams cad rnam par spangs/_/za 'thung de bzhin glu len na/_/shin tu spros pa spang bar bya/_/bde bas dga' ba nyid dang ni/_/shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid 
[\[156b.4\]]gsungs/_/bla med de nyid zla phyed kyis/_/'grub par the tshom med pa'o/_/kyai lags grogs mo 'gro kun gang /_/mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi/_/blta dang bral la skye bo ltos/_/gsog gsob rang bzhin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bslu ba/_/pad rtsa'i grib ma lta bur ltos/_/dbang 
[\[156b.5\]]po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing /_/lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las sman bzang po dang /_dgongs pa bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/_/
[\[156b.6\]]de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar/_/thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yis/_/gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba/_/shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus su/_/dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/sum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus/_/
[\[156b.7\]]'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa/_/dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par/_/mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur/_/gal te byang chub bla med 'dod/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min/_/lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/_/des 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni/_/de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid/_/byas nas slar yang 'jig byed pa/_/skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro/_/gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing /_/gang gis 
[\[157a.2\]]gshegs su gsol ba yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/_/gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no/_/dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/_/gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol/_/de nyid kyis na brtag med par/_/de 
[\[157a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya/_/lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni/_/tshul khrims mnyams chags chung ba'i/_/thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/_/nad med snying rje dang ldan ma/_/sems can don la gcig nan tan/_/dgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan/_/
[\[157a.4\]]zla ba'i cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma/_/mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul/_/des na slob ma blo chen po/_/shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan/_/'dod med dbang po dul ba dang /_/chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/_/sems can don la shin tu sbyor/_/gti mug zhe sdang 
[\[157a.5\]]phrag dog spangs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/_/de rnams la ni de nyid bshad/_/gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni/_/bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang /_/gnyi ga gcig tu 'dus pa'o/_/gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/_/slob ma legs dang ldan 
[\[157a.6\]]pa dang /_/brtse ldan sems gzhan med pa yis/_/gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang /_/sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang /_/glang po bud med dam pa dang /_/ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni/_/yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams/_/sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 
[\[157a.7\]]ni/_/der ni bla ma dbul bar bya/_/shin tu dri med sems kyis ni/_/de nas 'dir ni gsol ba gdab/_/'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag_/dpung gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol/_/bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing /_/sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs/_/kyai 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]kye ston pa bla ma che/_/mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod/_/de ltar gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas/_/de ru bla ma mi gsungs bzhugs/_/man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni/_/glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min/_/bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gang la 
[\[157b.2\]]gang gis brgyan/_/mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye/_/su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kye/_/'gro ba [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'dra'i som nyir lhung /_/mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye/_/chu nang zla ba ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus gnas/_/kye lags rnal 'byor 
[\[157b.3\]]ma tshogs ltos/_/der ni he ru ka gcig dang /_/thams cad skyed par byed pa yin/_/'gro kun rmi lam bslu bas na/_/gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las dkyil 'khor 
[\[157b.4\]]'jigs pa bri ba dang /_slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/ri dang phug dang tshang tshing ngam/_/yang na dur khrod dag na ni/_/gdod nas grub pa'i gnas su'am/_/'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor bla 
[\[157b.5\]]med bri/_/rdul tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las bya'o/_/rdul tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag las bya'o/_/rdul tshon ljang khu ni nim pa'i 'dab ma las bya'o/_/rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma las bya'o/_/rdul tshon ser po ni yung ba'i phye ma las bya'o/_/de ltar 
[\[157b.6\]]rdul tshon lnga rnams kyis/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la/_/rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor/_/phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa yi/_/sgo bzhir rtab bas rnams kyis brgyan/_/ba dan rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/_/dra ba dra ba phyed pas 
[\[157b.7\]]spras/_/phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang /_/rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan/_/pad+ma nyi ma nyi shu lnga'i/_/gdan rnams kyis ni shin tu mdzes/_/de yi dbus chud sa bon ni/_/yi ge hU~M gi rang bzhin sngo/_/skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka/_/sku mdog sngon po grags chen po/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/_/g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/_/skyil krung phyed pas 'jigs chen po/_/zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/_/ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing /_/sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/_/dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan/_/zla ba 
[\[158a.2\]]phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/_/sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/_/dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang /_/shin tu hU~M sgrogs 'jigs byed pa/_/gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs/_/mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/_/mchod phyir thod pa 'chang ba bo/_/thod pa gti mug 
[\[158a.3\]]rnam dag pa/_/phreng ba brgyud pas brgyan pa'i lha/_/mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang /_/rkang gdub dang ni dpung rgyan dang /_/gdu bu rked pa'i ska rags dang /_/dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan/_/'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso bo ni/_/hU~M zhes zlos par byed 
[\[158a.4\]]pa'o/_/de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams/_/sku mdog sngon mo grags chen mo/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod pa 'chang /_/so so yi ni ming ji bzhin/_/de rnams ming ni rab tu bshad/_/
[\[158a.5\]]phreng bzang ma/_'dod can ma/_'jigs ma/_thub dka' ma/_dge ba'i ska rags can ma/_gzugs can ma/_rnam rgyal ma/_'byung gnas ma/_thod can ma/_mtsho chen ma/_byed ma/_gsod ma/_sgrol ma/_'jigs ma/_mthong ma/_mi pham ma/_dge ma/_'dzur 
[\[158a.6\]]byed ma/_dus mtshan ma/_grags chen ma/_mdzes sdug ma/_nor 'dzin ma/_skal bzang ma/_grags mthong ma'o/_/'di lta bu yi dkyil 'khor mchog_/kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/_/de yi dbus gnas lha mo ni/_/he ru ka la bde ster ma/_/skyil krung phyed 
[\[158a.7\]]pa'i gar byed ma/_/mi yi rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan/_/lha mo 'od zer dpag dga' zhing /_/skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste/_/hU~M gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs/_/zhal nas khrag ni 'thor byed ma/_/dkar mo nag mo ljang khu ma/_/thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma/_/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]lha yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid gsungs/_/bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lha mos mchod/_/thod pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba/_/he ru ka yis btung bar bya/_/de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/_/'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid 
[\[158b.2\]]che/_/gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs/_/rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/_/de ltar he ru ka mgon pos/_/rnal 'byor ma kun spyad par bya/_/thams cad spyad pas zhu gyur te/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/_/de ni zhu bar mthong nas ni/_/shin tu srid pa 
[\[158b.3\]]bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sgo yi rnal 'byor ma yis bskul/_/ci ste 'jig rten snyan mnan na/_/ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes gyur/_/gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na/_/mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag thong /_/srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas/_/stong pa'i thugs ni ma mdzad 
[\[158b.4\]]par/_/nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye/_/rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs/_/gal te sngon gtso tshig gsan na/_/'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig_/khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi/_/skye bo mtha' dag gdung bas non/_/log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par/_/stong pa'i rang 
[\[158b.5\]]bzhin spangs nas ni/_/khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la/_/rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod/_/rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yis/_/'di lta bu yi glu yis bskul/_/sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan/_/kun nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor/_/'jigs pa 'khor ba 
[\[158b.6\]]sgrol byed pa'i/_/dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/_dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang sgom pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/_/sbyin 
[\[158b.7\]]sreg dkyil 'khor mchog bzang po/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/shing gi sbyin sreg mi bya zhing /_/'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang min/_/blo ldan gal te zhi 'dod na/_/me tog gis ni sbyin sreg 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]bya/_/me tog lnga bo mchog chen dang /_/'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya/_/gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod/_/zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pa yis/_/zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa/_/zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gang ba/_/kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa/_/dkar po rtse mo 'dus 
[\[159a.2\]]pa bri/_/rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni/_/zhi ba hU~M bdag 'khor bar ni/_/de yi dbus su 'khor lo la/_/gru gsum pa yi yi ges brgyan/_/e ba~M ma yA mchog chen gyi/_/lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs/_/rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor/_/rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma 
[\[159a.3\]]ste/_/pad+ma'i dbus su nyi ma bsam/_/nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hU~M/_/kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po/_/mtshams dang mtshams su rdo rje ni/_/rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya/_/bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste/_/phyis ni sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/_/shes rab can gyis me yi lha/_/
[\[159a.4\]]sngags 'di yis ni spyan drang ngo /_/o~M sar+b+ba de bA hu ta pra d+he ni a~M bi kalbe su da ha da ha ne da ha da ha dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_ya tri kun+ne a d+hiSh+Tha ya/_a d+hiSh+Tha ya/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ki li ki li/_ha he ho ha~M hraHhriHhU~M swA hA/_me lha spyan drang pa'i sngags so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[159a.5\]]thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/shes rab can sngags lan bdun bzlas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing /_/mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i/_/me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang /_/thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhugs/_/de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya/_/de ru sol ba gzhug 
[\[159a.6\]]bya'o/_/a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang /_/u dum bA ra ra ka ti/_pa la sha ste shing lnga las/_sol byas du med 'bar ba'i me/_blo ldan thab khung dbus su gzhug_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/pad+ma brgya ni rtsa brgyad dang /_/de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang /_/ku mu da 
[\[159a.7\]]dmar dri zhim 'dra/_/ka ra bI ra gzhan nyis 'gyur/_/byas te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs/_/sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la/_/de tshe du ba dbab par bya/_/mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bton zhing /_/pad+ma mar sbags bsreg par bya/_/o~M pad+ma rA dze ag+ni pra Ni ya 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]a mu ka s+ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/_mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzlas te/_/ut+pal 'o mas sbyin sreg bya/_/o~M g+ha g+ha g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya te dzo rA dza bi nA ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/_mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis/_/gur gum ku mud sngags bsreg_/o~M su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa le dz+wa la nI ye shAn+ti~M 
[\[159b.2\]]ku ru swA hA/_gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/dri zhim tsan+dan sbyin sreg bya/_/o~M d+ha me ma hA me rA dze da ha da ha sarba big+h+na~M shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/_ka ra bI ra dri zhim mar/_/mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas te bsreg_/oM kA li su kA li ka rA la rA tri sar+b+ba pA pa~M da ha da ha shan+ti ku ru swA hA/_/
[\[159b.3\]]me tog re re re re la/_/gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla/_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bla med pa/_/'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/_/me ni 'o mas zhi bar bya/_/de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi/_/sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya/_/rgyas la thag khud zla ma po ste/_/chu yi dkyil 
[\[159b.4\]]'khor ltar snang ba/_/zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste/_/kha dog ser por rnam par bsam/_/de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa/_/sngo bri de steng pad 'dab brgyad/_/bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa/_/khro ba'i sems kyi bdag nyid kyis/_/shing bsreg pa yi sbyin sreg bya/_/gal te 
[\[159b.5\]]rgyas pa mchog 'dod na/_/a mra ka n+tha pa la dang /_/arga bil ba du du ra/_/shin tu rnyed dka'i shing lnga las/_/sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du/_/slob dpon gyis ni gzung bar bya/_/ma gsam skams ma bcad cing /_/bu ga can gyi shing spang ngo /_/de yi dbus su 
[\[159b.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam/_/re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bgrangs te de nas sbyin sreg bya/_/bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul/_/sku mdog nag po 'od chen pos/_/mar dang yam shing thams cad ni/_/sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tshom med/_oM 
[\[159b.7\]]ga ga nig ga na bi lo ka ne hU~M phaT/_te dzo rA dzA puSh+Ti~M ku ru swA hA/_shing rnams kun gyi sngags 'di yis/_/re re bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/_/phyis ni ser bo'i tshus zhi bya/_/'di lta'i rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni/_/'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/_/rgyud gzhan rnams su spas pa ni/_/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg mchog_/thab khung gru gsum dmar po la/_/zabs dang rgyar ni sor mo brgyad/_/de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar/_/zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan/_/grwa grwa ru ni 
[\[160a.2\]]rdo rje dmar/_/bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa/_/dmar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag_/rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams/_/yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis/_/khams gsum pa la rjes su chags/_/a sho ka yi yam shing dang /_/go ro tsa nar ldan pa ni/_/blo ldan brgya rtsa 
[\[160a.3\]]brgyad bsregs te/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag sngags ni gdon/_/o~M a sho ka ni su ra ke a nu rA ga ya trai lo kya ba sha~M ka rI trai lo kyaM bA shA mA na yA hrI swA hA/_nyin bdun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/_/khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin/_/chu ni dmar por me zhi bya/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad 
[\[160a.4\]]pa/_/mngon spyod dang ni gsad pa mchog_/zla ba phyed pa'i cha 'dra'i thab/_/zabs dang rgyar ni khru gang tshad/_/'jigs chen mdog ni ljang khu'o/_/grwa grwa ru ni rdo rje bri/_/dbus kyis gzhi stong pa ru/_/blo ldan sha lngas sbyin sreg bya/_/gsod pa yi ni sbyin sreg mchog_/mngon spyod 
[\[160a.5\]]gsod pa ru ni gsungs/_/dgra kun bsnun cing zlog par byed/_/dgra bo thur du kha bltas shing /_/kha nas khrag ni skyug pa nyid/_/sha yi dbus su bsam par bya/_/seng ldeng sol bas me bya ste/_/med na 'ba' 'bo la nyid kyi/_/'ba' 'bo tsher mas sha phug ste/_/brgya rtsa 
[\[160a.6\]]brgyad du sngags kyis bsreg_/o~M mA ra ya mA ra ya kI la ya kI la ya sar+b+ba sha truM nA na sha ya hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing /_/sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas/_/dgra rnams thams cad brlag par ni/_/skad cig de la the tshom med/_/phed mdzad 'jigs shing 'jigs par 
[\[160a.7\]]byed/_/ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad/_/gdug pa thams cad gsod par ni/_/sbyin sreg tsam gyis the tshom med/_/'di lta'i bsad pa'i sbyin sreg dang /_/mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba/_/rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na/_/sngags skyes phal lta smos ci 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]dgos/_/de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi/_/rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems/_/lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/_/ljang khu'i chu yis me zhi bya/_/gang gis bsregs shing gang zhig bsregs/_/gang gi zhi ba gang zhi ba/_/gang gis 
[\[160b.2\]]rnam rtog kun bcom pa/_/de yis sems ni mgu bar byed/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/spyod pa'i le'u shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/
[\[160b.3\]]bud med shin tu mchog gyur dang /_/rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed/_/dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam/_/sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod/_/de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster/_/lag pas thod pa gzung byas te/_/gcer bu skra 
[\[160b.4\]]grol gyur pa yi/_/brtul zhugs can gyis spyod pas 'khyam/_/gang dang gang tshe de tshe der/_/rtag tu spyod pa thams cad bya/_/rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing /_/nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi/_/shes rab can gyis khyim khyim du/_/slong mo bya bar the tshom 
[\[160b.5\]]med/_/yid dang mthun pa kun blangs na/_/bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yi slong mo blang /_/chos la gzhol pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/thod pa'i steng du gzhag pa yi/_/rdzas ni de nas bza' bar bya/_/rdzas 
[\[160b.6\]]ni zos ma thag tu yang /_/khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang /_/gang du gang tshe der de'i tshe/_/gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis/_/blo gros chen po gnyid log phreng /_/'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya chen po nges par thob/_/de ltar yang rgyud las gsungs pa/_/gang 
[\[160b.7\]]du ji ltar der de ltar/_/gang gis de yis sangs rgyas te/_/rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams/_/mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]yang dag rab bshad pa/_/gcig tu sems can don rab nges/_/gser du nges par byed pa'i le'u/_/slob dpon la ni rab dang bas/_/mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang /_/dngul chu dang ni byi ru yis/_/gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/_/'di ni phyi yi 
[\[161a.2\]]sman min te/_/shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing /_/dngul chu bcud len ma yin te/_/mu zi lhang tsher ma yin zhing /_/lcags dang zha nye zangs ma min/_/lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te/_/grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no/_/'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas/_/phyag na rdo rje stobs po 
[\[161a.3\]]ches/_/zhabs kyi rdul gyi cha btud nas/_/sems dpa' gcig tu dad brtan pas/_/lha mo legs so zhes ni smra/_/sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing /_/dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu/_/gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/_/lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/_/grub pa'i 
[\[161a.4\]]sman gyi mchog gang lags/_/gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/_/tshe 'phel ba la brtson pa gang /_/sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis/_/sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang /_/gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur/_/mo sham bu dang ldan 'gyur gang /_/yang dang yang du 
[\[161a.5\]]mi 'chi zhing /_/shi nas yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba/_/lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi/_/sman chen po yis 'grub pa ste/_/de yang snod bzang mchog la 'grub/_/byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/_/bdag don gcig pu la 
[\[161a.6\]]'bab cing /_/kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas/_/ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur/_/snod bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud/_/ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te/_/ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i/_/sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod/_/gang gis lcags ni gser 'gyur ba/_/gcig 
[\[161a.7\]]gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur/_/'di lta bu yi sman chen mchog_/ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas/_/rab 'byor cho ga sngon 'gro bas/_/sman gyi mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/der ni yang dag sbyor bshad/_/dad pa brtan pa yis ni nyon/_/me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang /_/gzhon 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]nu kha dog nag po ste/_/rgyud 'di thos pa dang ldan zhing /_/ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma/_/'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsten cing /_/rtag tu rab sbas btsog med ma/_/'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te/_/sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam/_/
[\[161b.2\]]skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing /_/myur du byang chub sems 'bab pa/_/gang yin de la dngos grub med/_/'di lta bu yi sman chen po/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'/_/shin tu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/blo ldan bud med de rnams bsten/_/de ltar yang zhes 
[\[161b.3\]]gsungs pa/_rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas/_/zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams smra/_/de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya/_/der ni me tog ldan bud med/_/gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam/_/grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yi/_/zla ba 
[\[161b.4\]]rang gi snying khar bsam/_/sngon du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan/_/der ni yi ge hrIHsa bon/_/sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/_/blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam/_/zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas/_/zlum po snod bzang la bcug ste/_/g.yon pa bskum 
[\[161b.5\]]ba'i g.yas zur gzhag_/med na lcags kyang bya ba yin/_/brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/_/de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam/_/ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal/_/zhu 'gyur the tshom med pa yin/_/snod bzang der ni ngal bsos pas/_/'bo ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa 
[\[161b.6\]]nyid/_/bzang pos myur du rab blangs te/_/mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya/_/rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni/_/me yi nang du gzhug bya zhing /_/de nas shes rab can bltas na/_/gser du 'gyur ba the tshom med/_/de ni mi sha gcig gis ni/_/srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[161b.7\]]de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba mchog_/'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'/_/gal te sman chen tshad min na/_/de tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma yin/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir/_/dngos po gang dang gang gsungs pa/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bden par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'di tshad min smra ba'i/_/blo gros chen po thos ldan pa/_/ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/_/de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro/_/sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na/_/chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_/bla 
[\[162a.2\]]med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/_/de dag thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par 'gyur/_/mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang /_/sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe/_/sman gyis mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba/_/sdad cig de la the tshom med/_/sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/_/sgom 
[\[162a.3\]]ldan 'grub pa lta yi smos/_/sman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur/_/ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod/_/mi ni bskal ba bye bar 'tsho/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/mo sham rnams kyi bu med pa/_/yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis/_/skad cig de la 
[\[162a.4\]]bu ldan 'gyur/_/sngon gyi gtso bos ji skad gsungs/_/khrus kyi cho ga rab tu bshad/_/kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nam/_/yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis/_/dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/_/der ni bum pa lto che ba/_/zlum 
[\[162a.5\]]po bzhi ni gzhag par bya/_/shes rab can gyis chu yis dgang /_/ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/_/rang gi khrag gis mtshan ma bri/_/bud med mo sham de yi ni/_/khams kyi gtso bo blangs nas ni/_/mkhas pas bum pa'i kha la byug_/de nas khrag 'thung go 'phang la/_/
[\[162a.6\]]gnas pa bsgom pa'i mchog ldan pas/_/nag po dmar mo 'jigs chen po/_/rdo rje hU~M las pad dag byung /_/'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs byed pa/_/zhal gcig ba la phyag bzhi pa/_/bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing /_/mkhas pas hU~M ni sgrogs bzhin pa/_/blo ldan 
[\[162a.7\]]bum pa'i nang du bsam/_/de nas ral gri 'dzin pa yi/_/skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po/_/khro bo gzhan gyi sems dang ldan/_/'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis/_/ral gris nam mkhar bsnun cing gsod/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]de bzhin du ni bud med bkru/_/skad cig de la bkrus tsam gyis/_/bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sman chen po khyad par can dang /_mo sham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu 
[\[162b.2\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/mkha' lding sbyor las byung ba'i le'u/_/sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/blo ldan he ru ka dang ni/_/kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed/_/mtshan ma phyag sogs 
[\[162b.3\]]sngon gsungs bzhin/_/kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid/_/phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing /_/mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin no/_/sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/_/bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la/_/sngon gsungs phyag 
[\[162b.4\]]mtshan bri bar bya/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyis ni slob ma rjes su gzung /_/sngon gyi cho gas gsol btab ste/_/sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /_/de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/_/slar yang gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/slob ma rjes su gzung bar
