[\[162b.5\]]bya/_/sa stengs na ni dus zin la/_/cung zad gso bar mi nus te/_/nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing /_/dus su zin ces smra ba ni/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo/_/bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing /_/kun nas rnal 'byor ma 
[\[162b.6\]]brgyad de/_/de kun sku ni dkar po ru/_/cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/_/'bras btags rang bzhin blangs nas ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis/_/de yi lag par ral gri sbyin/_/de yi snying gar sngags bzhugs pa/_/'dab 
[\[162b.7\]]ma gang dang gang de la/_/mar khu che byas snag tsha dang /_/mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA le ni hrIHo~M ka pA la ni badzri Ni aH_bi d+h+waM sa ya sar+b+ba nA ga na u da pa ya d+ya d+ha ra ni/_bi b+ha ba ya ka la da sha na/_b+ho b+ho b+ha ga pa ti/_bud+d+ha ka pA la nI/_sar+b+bA na Na k+Sha ya~M ka 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rI ha ha ha swA hA/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_/'dab ma snying khar gzhug par bya/_/gsang sngags 'di dang lcug ma yis/_/lan bdun bar du spyan drang ngo /_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/_g+ha Da g+ha Da hri hri 
[\[163a.2\]]haHhaH/_he heHha~M/_lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis/_/bar snang du ni lding 'gyur te/_/gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru/_/sa la ltung ba ru ni 'gyur/_/dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med/_/gzhan yang stor ba rnyed dka' gang /_/bad 
[\[163a.3\]]stegs la sogs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po/_/glegs bam la ni bri ma byas/_/bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//
[\[163a.4\]]de nas phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa/_/shes rab chen po'i lha mo legs/_/khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba gang /_/'jig rten na yang rnyed par dga'/_/bdag 
[\[163a.5\]]gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi/_/sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par dka'/_/rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do/_/e ma'o sems can don la brtson/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kun skyed ma/_/e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson/_/sngags rnams 
[\[163a.6\]]kun gyi rab sbyor ma/_/shin tu rnyed dka' gang yin des/_/rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba/_/sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs/_/dang po'i le'u gang gang gsungs/_/sbyor de lha mos bdag la shod/_/'di lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/_/rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs 
[\[163a.7\]]sde/_/bzhad cing shin tu bzhad pa yis/_/lha rnams cad sgrag pa dang /_/bdud sde thams cad 'bros pa dang /_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis/_/rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro/_/gsungs pa/_rgyal mtshan 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'phyang ba blangs byas la/_/de yi sha yang blang bya zhing /_/de yi rked cha'i rus pa ni/_/blangs nas tha ba khung du ni bya/_/de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste/_/rgyus bsdong bur byas te gzhag_/de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing /_/thab khung gru gsum steng du gzhag_/gzhan yang dud pa 
[\[163b.2\]]'bebs pa dang /_/ji srid dud pa chags kyi bar/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni b+ha ra b+ha ra/_d+ha d+ha ra/_d+ha d+ha ra/_d+ha rA pa ya d+ha rA pa ya/_sho Sha ya/_sho Sha ya/_ta pa ya ta pa ya/_trA~M trA~M o~M ma~Ms ra d+hA ku ru 
[\[163b.3\]]ku ru b+ho b+ha ga pa te bud+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya shI g+h+raM ka dza la pa taM/_pa ta ya pa ta ya/_trA~M trA~M a hU~M stam b+ha ya b+ho b+ha ga ba ti hU~M a~M phaT/_'di ltar sngags kyi rgyal po yis/_/'jig rten gsum yang skems par byed/_/'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma/_/srin po sha 
[\[163b.4\]]za la sogs dang /_/gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams/_/thos pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur/_/ji srid dud pa ma babs pa/_/de srid sngags ni bzla bar bya/_/dud pa bsam thag tu ni/_/lag pa gnyi gas gzung bar bya/_/de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/_/rol 
[\[163b.5\]]rtsed phreng ba btung bar bya/_/bu mo lo ni bcu drug ma/_/lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can/_/'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis spyad/_/gcig tu sems can don 'bad pa/_/gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/_/mkhas pas hi hi'i sngags bton te/_/rol rtsed phreng ma btung bar 
[\[163b.6\]]bya/_/de yi rjes la rtse 'jo brtsam/_/shin tu bzhad gyur phed mdzad pa'i/_/brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon du/_/dud chen mchog ni gzhag par bya/_/sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis/_/phyis ni pags kyis bya ba bya/_/pad+ma las byung rdzas gang zhig_/de nyid kyis ni dud 
[\[163b.7\]]pa mnye/_/ming med mthe bos me tog sbyin/_/ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya/_/ril bu re re re re la/_/gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li ni trA~M hrIHhU~M phaT/_'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing /_/rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed dka' ba/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]mas kyang rnyed dka' ba'i/_/sngags 'di yis ni dud pa bsgrub/_/srin lag gi ni sor mo yis/_/mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis/_/stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_/dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad 
[\[164a.2\]]cu yi/_/steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/_/skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur/_/mdzub mos byugs ba tsam gyis ni/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te/_/'byung po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sha za dang /_/gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni/_/
[\[164a.3\]]dpag tshad bya ba stong phrag gi/_/steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/_/rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni/_/shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te/_/pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra tshad du/_/nag po 'bar 
[\[164a.4\]]byed rtse mo yis/_/sprin rnams thams cad 'thor bar 'gyur/_/'di lta'i dud pa rnyed par dka'/_/lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/_/skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur/_/mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi/_/bdag nyid chen po byugs tsam gyis/_/gzugs brnyan mtshan 
[\[164a.5\]]ma ri dang shing /_/gzhan dag gang yang rung pa rnams/_/khro bo'i lta bas bltas tsam gyis/_/dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin/_/g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni/_/rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/mthe'u chung gis ni mig byu gsan/_/skad cig de la mi snang 'gyur/_
[\[164a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/_/skad cig sum cu gsum du 'khor/_/mdzod dang bud med rdzas nyid dang /_/dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa/_/dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis/_/skad cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur/_/'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi/_/sbyor ba sna 
[\[164a.7\]]tshogs legs par bshad/_/de ni mig la byugs tsam gyis/_/rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur bar byed/_/dud pa 'di ni byugs tsam gyis/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang /_/sprul dang khyi dang ce spyang dang /_/stag dang gung dang byi la dang /_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]sprang bu glang po bong bu ru/_/de ltar dud pa chen po yis/_/sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o/_/kun la las kun yod mod kyi/_/sbyor ba 'ba' zhig rnyed par dka'/_/sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad 
[\[164b.2\]]de/_/sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/sngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do/_/glang po'i rus pas bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIH_hU~M/_rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+hA ka pA li nI kha~M hrIH_hU~M 
[\[164b.3\]]phaT/_ba lang gi rus pas dgra'i snying gar phur bu gdab par bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIH_/khyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so/_/oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AH_hU~M phaT/_rus pa chen pos ni dgug par bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIH_bau ShaT/_bong 
[\[164b.4\]]bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bru~M hU~M/_'ug pa'i rus pas dbang du bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIH_hU~M/_bya rgod kyi rus pas dbye bar bya'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nA hAH_phaT hU~M/_bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o/_/o~M bud+hA ka pA li nI 
[\[164b.5\]]badzri Ni tra~M/_ce spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do/_/oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga ba ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho ha ha/_ma he'i rus pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i byang chub sems mi ltung ngo /_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta kri Ta ha ha/_
[\[164b.6\]]sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsad nas 'don no/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ta Ta ta Ta/_tra ta ya tra ta ya/_ma ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ud+pa Ta ya hU~M phaT/_stag gi rus pas ri 'degs par byed do/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ma Ta ma Ta tra Ta ya tra Ta ya/_g+ha TA pa ya g+ha 
[\[164b.7\]]TA ba ya/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta mo Ta mo Ta ya saM kra ma ya hrIH_hU~M tra~M phaT/_lcags kyus ni nags stug po stong par byed do/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka bA li nI badzre nA sha ya ma ra ya g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni sar+b+ba bi na ya ti na hri ye yaM ta Da ya b+hi trA pa ya tsa maM tsa maM/_b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/_b+ho b+ha ga ba ti a~M a~M ta Ta 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]hU~M phaT/_sems gcig dri med me long bzhin/_/gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang /_/rmi lam lta bur shes mod kyi/_/'on kyang rnam par rtog pas bzung /_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i 
[\[165a.2\]]gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'/_/ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang /_/ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid/_/gal te phyag rgya che 'dod 
[\[165a.3\]]na/_/shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad/_/g.yung mo dang ni gar mkhan ma/_/khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi/_/bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs/_/blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad/_/de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/
[\[165a.4\]]ma dag pa yi sems sbyang phyir/_/mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste/_/rna ba tsha mo nyid yin no/_/sna ni ma ru 'gyur ba ste/_/lce ni bu mo nyid yin no/_/yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste/_/lnga po de rnams mchog lha mo/_/phyag rgya chen po rab ster ma'o/_/gti mug gar 
[\[165a.5\]]mkhan ma ru 'gyur/_/zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no/_/'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te/_/nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no/_/phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o/_/lnga po de rnams bud med mchog_/gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste/_/sgra las zhe sdang skye ba 
[\[165a.6\]]yin/_/dri la longs spyad pas 'dod chags/_/ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te/_/reg bya las ni phrag dog skye/_/sems kyi dag pa nyid yin no/_/da phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis/_/shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/_/skyes 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang /_/
[\[165a.7\]]skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob/_/ji ltar dngos po med par bsgom/_/ji ltar dngos po bsgom par bya/_/dngos po bsgom bya ji ltar 'gyur/_/sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/_/dkar mo ljang khu sngon mo'i mdog_/'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]par ni/_/dag pa'i sems kyis blta mi bya/_/tsha mos ji ltar sgra thos pa'i/_/sgra grag pa ni rnam gsum nyid/_/'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni/_/dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya/_/rab sbas skyed ma gang yin des/_/dri ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa/_/lta 
[\[165b.2\]]min yid dang ldan pa la/_/ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/_/lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas/_/ro drug myangs pa ci 'dra ba/_/myangs pas longs spyod ldan pa yi/_/myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu/_/yid kyis longs spyod dga' bde nyid/_/yid kyis gnyi 
[\[165b.3\]]ga spyad pas bde/_/der ni rtag pa yod ma yin/_/dngos po las ni dngos med yod/_/dngos med la yang dngos po nyid/_/dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga stong /_/'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro/_/
[\[165b.4\]]lta dang ldan pa snying rje ste/_/'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o/_/drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni/_/dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog_/gnyi ga 'dus las gang 'jog pa/_/de ni bdag gis btang snyoms gsungs/_/de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa/_/
[\[165b.5\]]ji ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur/_/mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye/_/'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam/_/drud pa las ni dga' ba skye/_/kun gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo/_/de ltar dga' dang dga' bral 'bras/_/khams gsum pa 
[\[165b.6\]]las skye bar 'gyur/_/rab dga' sems kyi sbyor ba yis/_/dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur/_/bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung /_/bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams/_/de kun bshang dang gci sogs su/_/rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag_/gang 
[\[165b.7\]]ci rung ba'i dga' rtse 'jo/_/'khyud pa dang ni 'o byed dang /_/nyed dang 'tshir ba nyid kyis ni/_/phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur/_/'di lta'i bsgom dang ldan pas ni/_/'di ru 'grub par the tshom med/_/rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs rgyas kyi/_/dpal dang phyag rgya 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]cher ster byed/_/rnal 'byor ba yis de mchod na/_/'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/_/phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang /_/de la nyes pas gnod pa med/_/rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid/_/sring ba'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/_/
[\[166a.2\]]ji srid khams ni phyi mi gsor/_/sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral/_/byang chub sems ni 'dzag med pa/_/gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing /_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sems rnam 
[\[166a.3\]]par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u/_/de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[166a.4\]]ba rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs sde ma la btud de bstod pa/_/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma/_/dpal dang grags pa che zhing 'jigs/_/sems can kun la phan mdzad ma/_/lha mo 
[\[166a.5\]]snying rje che ldan ma/_/phyag rgya chen po blo chen ma/_/don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma/_/sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud/_/rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing /_/byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa/_/gsung gcig gis 
[\[166a.6\]]ni gsal mdzad de/_/de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs/_/e ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod/_/rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa/_/de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa/_/rnyed dka'i dngos grub gang yin pa/_/de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod/_/gsungs pa/_rnal 
[\[166a.7\]]'byor ma ni thams cad nyon/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_/'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon/_/klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon/_/rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis/_/bsod nams gang yin 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]de kun gyi/_/bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo/_/phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul/_/sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni/_/sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod/_/shin tu sbas 
[\[166b.2\]]pa'i yul de yang /_/sems can don du gsal byas pas/_/rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa stobs po che/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla/_/
[\[166b.3\]]o~M hrIHbud+d+ha hU~M ka pA li nI AH/_'jug pa la o~M/_'byung ba la hrIH_gnas pa la bud+d+ha/_bde ba la hU~M/_nub pa la ka pA li nI/_ldang ba la AH'o/_/de ltar bzlas pa rab rnyed dka'/_/sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud bzla/_/de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas/_/
[\[166b.4\]]dngos grub 'thob par the tshom med/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhrIHheHhU~M phaT/_snying po'i sngags so/_/o~M bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri Ni ho hU~M/_a dur la kA+e hU~M phaT/_nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/_/
[\[166b.5\]]slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis/_/shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab/_/dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/_/maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa/_/lha mo che la gsol ba gdab/_/zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab/_/rdzas de rnams 
[\[166b.6\]]ni gsol ba dang /_/yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes so/_/lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni/_/tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed/_/rnam par rtog pa mang po yis/_/g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa/_/'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag_/mdzes ma khyod 
[\[166b.7\]]kyis skyob par mdzod/_/grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi/_/lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod/_/der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang /_/lhab lhub rgyan rnams dbul bar bya/_/dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/_/sna tshogs zas 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dang sna tshogs btud/_/de yi mdun du dbul bar bya/_/gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/_/'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang /_/snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig_/
[\[167a.2\]]mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs/_/gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/_/bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste/_/kye de lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/_/bla ma'i zhal sngar gsal bar zhus/_/gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dbang po dang /_/yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyag 
[\[167a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi snying sbas su sad pa/_/phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sngags kyi bzlas pa dang /_shes rab ma la gsol ba 
[\[167a.4\]]gdab pa dang /_/rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang /_phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/_ci'ang mi gsung 
[\[167a.5\]]bar bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[167a.6\]{D425}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_/dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bsgyur/_/ye 
[\[167a.7\]]shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/_/'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji skad rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing /_/'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa/_/de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste/_gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga /_/lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing /_/tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che/_/de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang 
[\[167b.2\]]phyug che/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo/_/'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma/_/gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/_/des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas/_/'jig rten gsum po yang spro'o/_/gsang ba pa rnams 'di yi ni/_/sgyu ma'i 
[\[167b.3\]]bdag nyid ces rnam grags/_/'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste/_/'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba/_/gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid/_/lha dang nor bdag dri za dang /_/gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas/_/rig pa 'dzin dang gang 
[\[167b.4\]]yang rung /_/mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/srin po dang ni sha za rnams/_/sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur/_/dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams/_/chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/_/chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/_/
[\[167b.5\]]thabs brjod pa yis de las ni/_/rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma/_/khams gsum po ni ma lus kun/_/ma lus lus pa med grub cing /_/sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su/_/lha mchog 
[\[167b.6\]]lha skyes bu mo skyod/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig pa/_/de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed/_/rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang /_/bskrad dang gsad pa la sogs pa/_/dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang /_/nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo /_/gzhan gyi grong sogs 
[\[167b.7\]]bya ba dang /_/mi snang ba dang gang yang rung /_/zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang /_/de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o/_/rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur/_/'chi ba med cing rgas pa med/_/rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di/_/'di yis na ba med par 'gyur/_/sngags 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su/_/rnal 'byor bas ni rnam rol byed/_/bklags pa dang ni bsams pa yis/_/bsgom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams/_/bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste/_/rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs 
[\[168a.2\]]med cing dka' thub med/_/dka' spyod smyung ba sdom med par/_/rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis/_/rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub/_/lte ba'i dbus nas dpa' bo ste/_/ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la/_/sems dang sems med sems kyi gzugs/_/
[\[168a.3\]]ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag_/de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/_/zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/_/A li kA li mnyam byas te/_/ri mo de la sbyar bar bya/_/ri mo steng du 'bar ba mthar/_/'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o/_/khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste/_/
[\[168a.4\]]bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i gzugs las so/_/gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni/_/de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur/_/mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab/_/dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang /_/ril bu chen po'i bsgrub pa yang /_/
[\[168a.5\]]sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rab sbyor ba'i/_/sdom pa'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur/_/mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas/_/sgrub pa'i dbang po shes bya ba/_/dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/_/gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis/_/lha yi gnas 
[\[168a.6\]]su myur bar 'gyur/_/de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/_/lha mo bden par nga smra'o/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas/_/'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya/_/rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni/_/bzang po'i yi ge'i phrang ba rnams/_/gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis 
[\[168a.7\]]ni/_/rgyu dang ni rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o/_/'dod pas kun la nyer spyod pa/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsten byas na/_/rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams 'grub/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni/_/rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed/_/de 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/_/dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur/_/bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o/_/khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni/_/gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid/_/sha chen po ni bkug nas su/_/rnal 'byor ma 
[\[168b.2\]]dang lhan cig spyod/_/tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang /_/gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur/_/lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/_/nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o/_/de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te/_/bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas/_/blta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni/_/cho 
[\[168b.3\]]'phrul dag ni ston par byed/_/yid la bsams ma thag tu ni/_/rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing /_/bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa/_/rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che/_/rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na/_/nga yi rig dang mnyam pa med/_/rgyud rnams kun gyi 
[\[168b.4\]]lung 'di ni/_/mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/_/rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o//_//de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i 
[\[168b.5\]]gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste/_gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/_/rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur ba/_/dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/_/rtag tu dgugs ni gtang bar bya/_/brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/_/u dang thig ler bcas pa yis/_/
[\[168b.6\]]rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/_/de la brtul zhugs ma bshad de/_/phreng ba sngags dang gzung ba dang /_/sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams kyang /_/gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur/_/sngags dang dbyibs dang chos 
[\[168b.7\]]bdag nyid/_/sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste/_/ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni/_/srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/_/de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa/_/rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang /_/zla ba gcig gis de 'grub 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]'gyur/_/dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan/_/dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste/_/rang gi rig pa rab sbyar na/_/des 'di mod la 'gugs par 'gyur/_/yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa/_/bsam zhing rnam par bsgom byas na/_/sa gsum po ni 
[\[169a.2\]]ma lus pa/_/de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang /_/de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug_/ye shes yi ges bskul byas na/_/de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs/_/yi ge a dang yang dag ldan/_/sku gsung thugs la legs 
[\[169a.3\]]gnas pa/_/sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgom byas na/_/gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/_/yi ge khe dang yang dag ldan/_/sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/_/lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag_/khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/_/yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis/_/
[\[169a.4\]]kha dog ser po kun tu 'od/_/rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas na/_/chang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/_/yi ger dang yang dag ldan/_/kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/_/phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa/_/ce spyang tshul du legs gnas pa/_/khro ba'i sems kyis bsgom byas na/_/
[\[169a.5\]]khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o/_/yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan/_/gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya/_/rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub/_/mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang /_/de bzhin sna dang yid nyid dag_/seng ge rnal 'byor phyag 
[\[169a.6\]]rgya yi/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya/_/srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su/_/bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/_/'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun/_/thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang /_/de ni rtog pa ma yin no/_/gal 
[\[169a.7\]]te thams cad rab rtogs na/_/'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig_/de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing /_/mi gsal yi ge med pa'o/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/_/rnal 'byor gnyid dang yang dag ldan/_/gong bur song ba'i yid de yis/_/gzugs 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]gcig tu ni sgom par byed/_/sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba/_/rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la/_/rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i/_/rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'/_/mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/_/kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni/_/bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i/_/
[\[169b.2\]]rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen mo las sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste/_/rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba/_/thams cad 
[\[169b.3\]]mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o/_/gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/'byung po'i mi rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/_/brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/_/de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi/_/chen por yang dag ldan pa ni/_/de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga/_/tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad 
[\[169b.4\]]la ni/_/lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas/_/nyi ma bdun du ce spyang gi/_/dbus su gzhag la de nas bton/_/lnga po dag las yungs kar gyi/_/'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/_/de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyi/_/tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi'i bar dag tu/_/
[\[169b.5\]]nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min bsgom ste/_/sbyar nas ce spyang dbus su lags bzhag la/_/de las bton te lnga po dag las ni/_/dngos grub 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/_/'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na/_/de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas/_/
[\[169b.6\]]'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis/_/thams cad du ni sbas pa'o/_/de nas sgrub thabs 'byung ba'o/_/yid kyi pad+ma bsam bya ba/_/kha dog dmar po kun 'od la/_/lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o/_/shar du ut+pal 
[\[169b.7\]]sngo 'od mdog_/lho ru ser po lta bu'o/_/nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od/_/byang du ma rgad 'od yin no/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang /_/zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum ma mdzes/_/shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon na kha T+wA~M ga dang 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]dril bu/_g.yas na rdo rje dang /_thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo/_/lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_rin po che dang /_ba dan dang /_ce spyang bsnams pa'o/_/nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang /_mda' dang /_sna tshogs 
[\[170a.2\]]pad+ma dang /_thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang /_zhags pa dang /_rnge'u chung dang /_thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/de yi dbus su bsam par bya/_/thod pa nyid dang kha T+wA~M ga/_/de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid 
[\[170a.3\]]do/_/dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/_/bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na/_/rdzas kyi dngos grub rab tu ster/_/rnal 'byor ma yi grub sbyor bas/_/'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug_/thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing /_/
[\[170a.4\]]stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun las phrogs pa dang /_/lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/_/gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/_/nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/_/lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/_/rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/gang gA'i 
[\[170a.5\]]bye snyed zhing dag kyang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_/dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/_/sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen/_/yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis/_/sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya/_/rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/_/ril bu re re bza' bar bya/_/
[\[170a.6\]]yi ge brgyad kyi mtha' ldan pa/_/U dang thig ler bcas pa ni/_/mtha' ru yang dag sbyar byas la/_/sngags ni kun du brjod bya ste/_/gu h+ya bak+Sha a b+ha k+She hU~M zhes bya'o/_/rnal 'byor ma kun sbyor ba yis/_/dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan/_/gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod 
[\[170a.7\]]na/_/lan bdun mngon sngags rnal 'byor pa yis bza'/_/yi ge gsum mtha' zhes bya ste/_/brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa/_/A dang thig ler yang dag ldan/_/yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas/_/yi ge dang po sbyor ba yis/_/hrI zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la/_/sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya/_/yi ge yis ni rnam bsgoms te/_/pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya/_/ci ste rdo rje can 'grub 'dod/_/de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya/_/de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i 
[\[170b.2\]]gras srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa/_kye grogs po rdo rjes pad+ma kha 'byed sad mdzad ma/_/a la la ho/_bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i kha ni rab phye ba/_/bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod/_/
[\[170b.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/_/de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul/_/de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas/_/sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/_/dus bzhir rab tu sbyor ba yis/_/'grub par 
[\[170b.4\]]'gyur ba bsgom pa'i mchog_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/_/ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i/_/dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/_/dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/_/'di ni rab tu snang bar byed/_/
[\[170b.5\]]dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/_/sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i/_/de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/_/'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni/_/gzugs rnams de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang /_/rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan 
[\[170b.6\]]rnam sgom pa'i/_/cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang /_/lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o/_/gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang /_rgyun du 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_rnam par bsgom pa de la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rgas 
[\[170b.7\]]pa dang /_bgegs mi 'byung la/_'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_rgyun du thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgags bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na bar dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[171a.2\]{D426}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra A ra li ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje A ra li zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/_kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes 
[\[171a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab par rig cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs 
[\[171a.4\]]te/_phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni/_/sman ni bza' bar byas nas su/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/he ru ka ni rab bsgrub bya/_/rang gi snying gar re pha ni/_/bsreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar bsgom/_/de 
[\[171a.5\]]byung rdo rje nyi ma ni/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag khyab/_/de yi steng du hU~M nyid de/_/bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid/_/de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas/_/rdo rje las byung he ru ka/_/bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni/_/sku la thal bas byugs pa dang /_/phyag rgya lnga dang yang 
[\[171a.6\]]dag ldan/_/'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/_/in+d+ra nIM la'i 'od lta bu/_/dbu skra ser po stobs po che/_/gar dgu'i ro dang ldan par ni/_/rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing /_/ri rab ri rgyal mthon po yang /_/sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan/_/phyag tu rdo rje 
[\[171a.7\]]rnam bsgoms nas/_/g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/sha lnga yang dag ldan par bsgom/_/kun+da dang ni zla ba dang /_/chu skyes do shal lta bur ni/_/kha T+wA~M ga yis phrag pa brgyan/_/rdo rje A ra li las lha'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo thams cad dang /_dzam b+ha la la sogs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin 
[\[171b.2\]]thams cad dang /_dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'byung po thams cad dang /_dbang po la sogs pa rdo rje nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad dang /_glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa zhing skyong ba thams cad dang /_kun dar la sogs pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad dang /_de dag la 
[\[171b.3\]]sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen po la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bde gshegs kun gyi ston pa 
[\[171b.4\]]yis/_/gtor ma'i las ni rab tu phye/_/phyag rgya yang ni khyad par du/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas/_/o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid/_/de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags/_/las ni thams cad pa yi 
[\[171b.5\]]sngags/_/yin pa nyid du the tshom med/_/rdo rje A ra li las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag par rab tu phye ba/_gdong ring na ni mtho ba dang /_/de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang /_/tshangs par spyod pa mang 
[\[171b.6\]]ba nyid/_/dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub byin/_/glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/_/khyi las byung ba'i mar me dang /_/mar me chen po bsregs nas ni/_/tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya/_/de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi 
[\[171b.7\]]tshig kyang smra bar bya/_/khyod kyis ma byin par yang long /_/gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis/_/ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang /_/bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni/_/thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/_/rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/_/de nas dbang bskur bka' stsal 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]pa/_/phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/_/de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/_/dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni/_/de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye/_/de nyid bde ba chen po ste/_/thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/_/'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/_/
[\[172a.2\]]mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/_/de nas sbyin sreg bka' stsal pa/_/khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni/_/khru phyed sa la brko bar bya/_/rdul tshon dkar po ldan par ni/_/rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya/_/gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni/_/der ni sha 
[\[172a.3\]]sogs sbyin sreg bya/_/me ni lha yi spyan nyid de/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar 
[\[172a.4\]]bya/_/dur khrod sol ba so phag dang /_/ldong ros phye ma nyid dang yang /_/ljang khu yi yang phye ma nyid/_/dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags/_/dbus su gsum la rdo rje bri/_/shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen po/_/lho ru rdo rje dril bu nyid/_/de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste/_/
[\[172a.5\]]byang du gri gug dge ba nyid/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri/_/chos don 'dod dang thar pa la/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dbye/_/dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni/_/der ni slob ma gzhug par bya/_/ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni/_/bkrol nas dkyil 
[\[172a.6\]]'khor bstan par bya/_/rdo rje A ra li las las thams cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//mngon par shes pa bka' stsal pa/_/lha yi mig dang rna ba dang /_/de bzhin gzhan sems shes pa nyid/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang /_/de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon 
[\[172a.7\]]shes nyid/_/he ru ka yi dbyibs bsgoms na/_/yo gi mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur/_/shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur/_/bsam gtan las ni nus skyes nas/_/phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam/_/yid ni brtan nam g.yo'am 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ci/_/rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir/_/glu ni sna tshogs len pa dang /_/de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid/_/sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang /_/lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi/_/gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/_/ro dang reg bya 
[\[172b.2\]]yang dag brtsam/_/de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa/_/re'u mig brgyad ni bris nas ni/_/rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya/_/las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye bas/_/de bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis/_/o~M ni dbang ldan la ni mer/_/de bzhin bden bral nyid du la/_/
[\[172b.3\]]rlung gi mtshams su hU~M nyid de/_/shar du dz+wa ni rnam par gnas/_/lho ru dz+wa yi rnam pa nyid/_/nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste/_/byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yis/_/dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas/_/ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming /_/rdo rje A ra li las spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi 
[\[172b.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka' stsal pa/_che ge mo 'di sod cig_/che ge mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig_/che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig_/che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig_/che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig_/che ge mo lkugs par mdzod cig_/che ge 
[\[172b.5\]]mo khug cig_/che ge mo skrod cig_/che ge mo la sdang bar mdzod cig_/che ge mo chings shig_/che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig_/che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig_/ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams kyi ngos gnyis su bris te/_gro ga'i 'dab mar gur gum gyis 'dri bar 
[\[172b.6\]]bya zhing /_'di dpung ba'i rtsa bar gdags par bya'o/_/dgug pa la ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas 'dri bar bya'o/_/bsad pa la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /_tsi tra ka'i khu ba dang /_yungs mar dang /_dug dang /_ske tshe 
[\[172b.7\]]dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_ka na ka'i khu ba dang /_rus pa'i smyu gus so/_/dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so/_/rmongs pa la ni d+ha ru ka'i shing gis so/_/rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i smyu gus so/_/ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi smyu gus 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'dri bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/_bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang /_/bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang /_/lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du/_/lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang /_/nyi shu rtsa lnga ma mchod bya/_/ba dang de bzhin 
[\[173a.2\]]ma te dang /_/ste'u mo dang khyi mo dang /_/bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang /_/sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid/_/phag dang ba man las byung ba/_/gzhan yang he ru ka mchod na/_/'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/_/nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi/_/tshes ni mu stegs can gyis brtags/_/
[\[173a.3\]]dri ma gzhig par bya ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya/_/srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/_/ma byin par ni blang mi bya/_/pha rol bud med bsten mi bya/_/nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo langs/_/shin tu mnyam par 
[\[173a.4\]]bzhag pas 'dug_/sha chen dang ni rus pa dang /_/khrag ni chen po btung ba dang /_/khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang /_/de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid/_/bram ze mo dang g.yung mo nyid/_/gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma/_/thod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan/_/
[\[173a.5\]]gdol pa de bzhin phyag dar ma/_/rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan ma nyid/_/de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang /_/smig mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma/_/gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid/_/ma dang sring mo bu mo dang /_/sring mo las byung bu mo nyid/_/gzhan gyi bu mo 
[\[173a.6\]]spang mi bya/_/rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste/_/bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas/_/bgrod min mkhas pas bsten par bya/_/rdo rje A ra li las 'khrul 'khor dang /_las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas dam tshig gi bag 
[\[173a.7\]]dbab pa bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la/_/bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing /_/de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang /_/ral pa can ni thams cad la/_/dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya/_/snying rje yis ni bdag nyid can/_/gal te yin na bza' 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]bar bya/_/grub kyang lta ba dman pa ni/_/sems can don byed skyes pa nyid/_/skal ba ngan pa zhes byar brjod/_/bram ze dam tshig rnam par sdang /_/de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/_dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang /_/bzod ldan dal ba 
[\[173b.2\]]mi bslu ba/_/bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan/_/rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags/_/de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa/_sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/_/snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas/_/de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/_/dkyil 
[\[173b.3\]]'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas/_/de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor ba des/_/dang po thun tshod byin gyis brlab/_/des ni ci srid nyi phyed na/_/nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa/_/dus dang bral nas nam phyed 
[\[173b.4\]]na/_/thun tshod byin brlabs rab tu grags/_/thun tshod byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis/_/bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis/_/bdag gi rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub/_/de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/phrag dog dang ni ser sna nyid/_/
[\[173b.5\]]bcom ldan he ru ka la med/_/yod na rnam par dag pa nyid/_/de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/_bgegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la'am/_/ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang /_/g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid/_/bdag nyid rnal 
[\[173b.6\]]'byor ldan pas bsgrub/_/de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/_btung ba rin po che yi chu/_/gang zhig bza' de don yod nyid/_/khrus ni dpag med rdo rje yis/_/dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad/_/dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad/_/btso ni 
[\[173b.7\]]gang zag mnyam pas ni/_/dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni/_/gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid/_/mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste/_/bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa/_/khro bo yi ni bsnyen bkur ba/_/bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur/_/brjod pa bzlas pa 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yang dag bshad/_/yan lag nyed sogs phyag rgya ste/_/lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/_/gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas/_/mang du brjod pa ci zhig bya/_/gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob phyir/_/
[\[174a.2\]]rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor sogs bya ba ni/_/'jig rten du ni mi shes pas/_/mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba/_/rnam dag dag pa dam pa ni/_/de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod/_/de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje dril bu 
[\[174a.3\]]gzung bya zhing /_/bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bar bya/_/rang gi phyag rgya rtag bsten cing /_/spyod pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya/_/de nas lha'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/_chu klung tshal gyi gnas su ni/_/bdag nyid lha ni mchod par bya/_/bdag gi sngags ni 
[\[174a.4\]]brjod par bya/_/me tog la sogs byin gyis brlab/_/rdo rje A ra li las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal pa/_mkhas pas phru ba chag par ni/_/rigs bzhi 
[\[174a.5\]]ru ni slong mos rgyu/_/chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing /_/gtsang sbra nyid ni rab tu dbye/_/byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni/_/kham ni blo dang ldan pas blang /_/phye btab bza' bar mi bya zhing /_/mi ster ba la rtag tu blangs/_/g.yas su rab mos skye bo ni/_/
[\[174a.6\]]g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya/_/nges pa med par khyim du gnas/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/rdo rje shing gi stongs byas dang /_/de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag_/he ru ka ni rab grub phyir/_/bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje 
[\[174a.7\]]gnod sbyin mo'i bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/_ser skya'i phru ma blangs nas ni/_/sngags ni 'di ni bzla bar bya/_/bsrung bar byas shing bskams byas nas/_/de la gu gul bsre bar bya/_/mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du/_/des ni bdug pa 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]sbyin par bya/_/shin tu mdzes shing gos mdzes pa/_/bris skur gnas pa legs grub phyir/_/'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/_/gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya/_/bris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo/_/snga bar byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de yi rgyan rnams 
[\[174b.2\]]thams cad ni/_/gang zhig cung zad rgyan rnams kun/_/snga ba ru ni blang bar bya/_/gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la/_/me tog gis ni mchod par bya/_/de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/_ma chad rma med gang ba ni/_/legs par brtul zhugs 
[\[174b.3\]]can gyis bkru/_/mar khu chen pos byug pa dang /_/bdug pa chen pos bdug par bya/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/_/mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul/_/nga yis khyod la ci gsungs pa'i/_/de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/_/yungs kar ro 
[\[174b.4\]]la brdeg bya zhing /_/sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod/_/de la mkhas pas 'jigs mi bya/_/o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M brjod par bya'o/_/des ni ci zhig sbyin zhes smra/_/sgrub pos de la blang bar bya/_/rkang byug dang ni mig sman nyid/_/ral gri dang ni sa 'og dang /_/
[\[174b.5\]]ril bu mkha' la spyod pa nyid/_/thams cad sbyin par the tshom med/_/de nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/_gong gi bsam gtan byas nas ni/_/de la sngags ni bzla bar bya/_/rang gis he ru ka yi ni/_/rnal 'byor gyis ni bdag nyid du/_/
[\[174b.6\]]tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/_/gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang /_/zhi zhing dge ba'i gnas su ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du/_/dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/_/A ra li zhes bya ba'i 
[\[174b.7\]]mtshan/_/za ba na ni gtam smra bya/_/ri yi rgyal po'i mgor gnas pa/_/tshogs kyis dag pa'i sems kyis bskor/_/de yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/'grub 'gyur gang phyir 'di nyid du/_/mchod pas grub par shes mi 'gyur/_/de yi 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]btsun mo bsrung ba ni/_/gshin rje mthar byed du ni 'gyur/_/shes rab mthar byed dpung gi mgon/_/pad+ma mthar byed sku bsrung bdag_/de yi bgegs kyi mthar byed ni/_/dmag dpon du ni brjod pa yin/_/'dod 
[\[175a.2\]]pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_/de yi gshed ma'i bdag po nyid/_/dpal ldan dbyig pa sngon po ni/_/sgo srung ba yi bdag po nyid/_/thams cad la ni dbang byed pa/_/zhar ba mi g.yo mgon po nyid/_/yi ge pa yi bdag po ni/_/de bzhin du 
[\[175a.3\]]ni stobs po che/_/rdo rje A ra li las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad gtam 'di thos nas srid pa'i sbyor ba kun tu bcad cing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang /_/
[\[175a.4\]]sdig pa zad cing nyon mongs pa bsregs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rdo rje A ra li brtson che/_/sna tshogs e ma rmad byung ba/_/gang zhig bdag cag nyon mongs khebs/_/gang zhig bdag 
[\[175a.5\]]cag grub 'gyur ba/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams rkang gnyis kyi mchog dam pa zob nas sangs rgyas kyi rol ba ston par byed do/_/la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad/_/kha cig tu ni dka' thub spyod/_/lha las babs pa'i sprul 
[\[175a.6\]]pa dang /_/de bzhin khab nas 'byung ba dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/kha cig tu ni rab byung byed/_/'dul bar ston par byed pa dang /_/mngon pa'i sems ni lhag pa'i sems/_/la lar sngags kyi bdag nyid 'chang /_/kha cig 
[\[175a.7\]]pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/kha cig bye brag smra ba'i lam/_/kha cig tu ni mdo sde pa/_/kha cig tu ni rnam shes nyid/_/kha cig tu ni dbu ma nyid/_/la lar dmyal ba chen por 'gro/_/la lar sems can rjes su skyong /_/sems can 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]'dul ba la bltas nas/_/snying rje'i bsam pas rol par bya/_/rdo rje A ra li las phan yon gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis las rnam par 'byed 
[\[175b.2\]]pa bstan par bya'o/_/gang zhig rgyud gang du dam tshig byed pa des ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis bstod par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rgyud de yis gang gi tshe byed pa de ni srid par mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig glu yis mchod byed na/_/des ni rtag tu 
[\[175b.3\]]sgra snyan 'gyur/_/gang phyir gang zhig mar me 'bul/_/de ni mig dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gang zhig gar gyis mchod byed pa/_/de ni rig 'dzin chen por 'gyur/_/gang zhig phyag 'tshal byed pa ni/_/de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[175b.4\]]zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni/_/lus ni dri zhim ldan par 'gyur/_/gang zhig phreng ba bzang 'bul ba/_/de ni gser gyi phreng ldan 'gyur/_/gang zhig gos ni 'bul ba ni/_/des ni lha yi gos rnyed 'gyur/_/gang zhig mtshan tsam 'don pa dang /_/
[\[175b.5\]]dad pa tsam yang rab byed pa/_/lhag par mos pa rab tu byed/_/gang zhig skye bo mchod byed pa/_/de rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i/_/srid pa'i longs spyod rab tu bzang /_/rdo rje A ra li las yon tan rjes su bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu 
[\[175b.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang gang zhig de ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyin pa byin pas de rkang gnyis kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bas the tshom skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nye bar 'dug ste 
[\[175b.7\]]zhus pa/_ji lta bu yi rnal 'byor bgyi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sbyin pa mtha' gsum yongs dag pa/_/he ru ka ni bsgom par bya/_/sbyin pa yang ni he ru ka_/gang la sbyin pa'ang de lta bu/_/sbyin pa 'di ni rab tu bsngags/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]sbyin pa 'di ni dpe tsam ste/_/tshul khrims la sogs 'di ltar spyad/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje A ra li las de skad ces gsungs so/_/rdo rje A ra li las rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs 
[\[176a.2\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D427}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ri gi A ra li tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_
[\[176a.3\]]ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri gi rnam pa'i e ba~M sdom pa la bzhugs so/_/gnyis med gnyis kyi rnal 
[\[176a.4\]]'byor gyi/_/A ra li dang ri gir brtags/_/ri gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/_/de la A ra lis zhus pa/_/gnas kyi rnam pa du zhig lags/_/nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur/_/de la zhing gi rnam pa du/_/nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs/_/
[\[176a.5\]]ts+tshan+do rnam pa du ru brjod/_/nye ba'i ts+tshan+do rnam pa du/_/de la 'du ba gang zhig lags/_/de bzhin nye ba'i 'du ba ci/_/de la dur khrod rnam pa du/_/nye ba'i dur khrod ji ltar lags/_/de la lha mo ri gi che/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher 
[\[176a.6\]]gnas pas/_/A ra li dang bder go bar/_/sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye/_/gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags so/_/de bzhin du ni ba lang spyod/_/gnas ni byang gi sgra mi snyan/_/gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu gling /_/gling bzhir 
[\[176a.7\]]lha mo bzhi dang ni/_/ri rab spyi bor ri gi bzhugs/_/A ra li dang mnyam sbyor bas/_/gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med las/_/si sa'i 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang /_/bde chen de bzhin sdom pa ma/_/ljang khu ser mo btsod mdog 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dang /_/dmar mo ru ni yongs su grags/_/zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis dang /_/g.yas na chu gri 'dzin ma ste/_/g.yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/_/gcer bu mgo skyes grol ba'o/_/A ra li yi sku mdog gnag_/spyan gsum phyag 
[\[176b.2\]]drug A ra li/_/ri gi sngon mo spyan gsum ma/_/phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar/_/rdo rje ra li'i phyag gnyis kyis/_/ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'khyud/_/g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni/_/rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtags/_/gzhan dag tu ni dgra sta dang /_/
[\[176b.3\]]thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid/_/gnas ni sems dang nye ba'i gnas/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi/_/kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/_/mi bzad rnon po sgyu ma che/_/mthon po gsung gi 'khor lo la'o/_/shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing /_/
[\[176b.4\]]nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur/_/ts+tshan+do ha ni nub kyi sgo/_/nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ha ni byang /_/wa dang ma he nyid dang ni/_/rta mgrin glang po'i rgyal mtshan nyid/_/'di rnams sgo dang sgo ru ni/_/kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/_/gsung gi 'khor lo'i mtshams rnams ni/_/'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba 
[\[176b.5\]]nyid/_/sku yi 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/_/dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/_/sku gsung 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/_/dmyal ba dag ni rtag tu bri/_/sku la grang ba'i dngos po bzhi/_/gsung la de bzhin tsha ba bzhi/_/ri gi A ra li'i sbyor ba ste le'u dang po'o//_//lha mo ri gi snying 
[\[176b.6\]]rje che/_/A ra li ni nyid kyis zhus/_/ji ltar 'khor lo'i mtshams brgyad du/_/dmyal ba brgyad ni rnam par bsgom/_/ri gis bka' stsal pa/_ji snyed pa yi sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal las skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes 
[\[176b.7\]]pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs med pa can nam/_'du shes can dang /_'du shes med pa can de thams cad A ra li dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams gdon pa'i blos e ba~M rnam par bzhugs par bya'o/_/
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]stong pa nyid ni bsgoms nas ni/_/hU~M ni snying gar bsgom par bya/_/hU~M las sna tshogs rigs bdag yin/_/rdo rje las ni A ra li/_/'byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba nyid/_/mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/_/e ba~M rnam pa ches gsang bar/_/sangs 
[\[177a.2\]]rgyas rin chen ga ba tser ni/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur/_/oM A ra li ri gi phe~M phe~M phe~M b+h+yo swA hA/_char dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/sa yi bdag po blangs nas ni/_/nor rgyas bu ni mkhas pas bya/_/thod pa sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/_/ba yi 'o mas dgang 
[\[177a.3\]]bar bar bya'o/_de yi sbyor bas bkang nas ni/_/nges par srad du nag pos dkri/_/chu yi 'gram du rang song ste/_/ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/_/sngags pas sngags ni khri bzlas na/_/klu ni 'khrugs pas char ba 'bebs/_/rmi lam gyi las bshad par bya ste/_/rnal 'byor bdag gi 
[\[177a.4\]]mal 'og tu/_/da du ra yi khu ba dang /_/dur khrod sol ba bsres pa dang /_/'ug pa'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis/_/ro dkris dmar po'i gos la ni/_/bsgrub bya'i ming ni rang gis bri/_/de la rnal 'byor ma 'dug nas/_/A ra li ni khri ru bzlas/_/o~M A ra li ri gi phe~M/_a mu ki ke/_
[\[177a.5\]]ma me da~M swa b+na~M dar+sha ya b+h+yo/_swA hA/_/brag dgug pa bshad par bya ste/_rna tshol brtag par byas nas ni/_/gong bu mdun du dgod par bya/_/ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/_/dbugs kyi gong bu dgag par bya/_/khab kyi phyag rgya mchu byas nas/_/dang po lce yi byed pa pos/_/ji ltar 
[\[177a.6\]]tsha ba'i gong bu bzhin/_/shes rab can gyis sbrang chen dgug_/khab kyi phyag rgya gnyis pa ni/_/mgrin skras dal gyis yongs su gzir/_/'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ste/_ji ltar sbyor ba'i gzugs bltas nas/_/bdag nyid ri gi yi gzugs su/_/
[\[177a.7\]]ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/_/mgo ni 'og tu rnam par bsgom/_/o~M badzra A ra li phaT ya to ta ya pha~M pha~M swA hA/_rengs par byed pa bshad par bya ste/_dgra bo nyid kyi lce la ni/_/bu ram gong bu bsgom par bya/_/o~M ri gi g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta sha hU~M phaT/_'khru ba rab tu bshad par 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bya ste/_dgra bo'i dri mas gzugs brnyan bya/_/de yi skra yis dkri bar bya/_/tsha ba gsum gyis kha bkang nas/_/gzugs brnyan kha ru gzhag par bya/_/o~M A ra li ma me a mu ka~M ka~M ka~M sa ra ya phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_dbang du bya ba la/_bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig tu ni/_/
[\[177b.2\]]e ba~M rnam par bsgom par bya/_/de yi g.yas pa'i mig tu ni/_/rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnam pa bsgom/_/de dag 'dus pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/ri gi A ra lis sbyor bas/_/mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba dang /_/gnas ni sbyang ba nyid dang yang /_/ye shes 
[\[177b.3\]]'khor lo gzhug pa dang /_/thugs sogs byin gyis brlab pa dang /_/yan lag dgod par bya ba dang /_/de bzhin lha yi dbang bskur dang /_/lha mo rnams kyi sngags 'byung ba/_/A ra lis ni rtag tu bya/_/o~M dang AHhU~M byin gyis brlab/_/de nyid gsum ni rigs gsum 
[\[177b.4\]]'byung /_/byin brlabs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/las rnams thams cad rab sbyin dge/_/snying dbus rang gi sa bon gyi/_/lcags kyus A ra li phyung nas/_/ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/_/bkug nas dam por bcing bar bya/_/dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/_a nu 
[\[177b.5\]]rak+to me b+ha ba/_sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban ti ri swA hA/_spyi bo snying dang de bzhin mgrin/_/lte ba gsang ba'i gnas su ni/_/zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/_/dam po la sogs bcing bar bya/_/ha ha hi hi de bzhin du/_/hu hu ho ho de bzhin te/_/lus kyi gnas ni 
[\[177b.6\]]brgyad rnams su/_/yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid/_/spyi bo mchan khung lte ba dang /_/kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang /_/rkang mthil gsang ba nyid du ni/_/yan lag dgod par rab tu grags/_/sngags ni rim pa yis ni mtshon/_/lag pa ba spu'i khung kun nas/_/ri gi'i 'od 
[\[177b.7\]]zer spro bar bya/_/lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rab sbyor ba'i/_/yang ni phyis ni bsdu bar bya/_/ri gi hU~M sa~M ka~M ma~M sa~M nyid/_/thugs kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/_/g+ha~M tA~M ma~M yu~M zhes bya ba/_/gsung gi 'khor lor grags pa'o/_/dza~M ma~M hA~M ka~M a~M nyid ni/_/sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]ri gi sngags kyi gdon pa ni/_/rim pa yis ni mtshon par bya/_/rang gi snying las 'od zer byung /_/lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar rab sbyor bas/_/phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa yi/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas/_/cho gas 'dod pas mchod nas ni/_/dbang ni blo dang 
[\[178a.2\]]ldan pas blang /_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta DA kin+yA nu ga ta ma hA a b+hi She kA nu d+ha nu zhes/_bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/_/des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya/_/lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta DA kin+yA b+hi Shi ka badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/_gru gsum me yi sa 
[\[178a.3\]]bon gyis/_/snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya/_/snying gar hU~M las rigs bdag nyid/_/de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje las byung kun/_/rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid/_/ri gi A ra li gnas su/_/bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya/_/dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'phar ma 
[\[178a.4\]]gsum gnas pa'i/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin/_/zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i A ra li/_/sems kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni/_/ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa/_/zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor ba bya/_/rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas/_/gar gyi 
[\[178a.5\]]rkang pas phyogs su gnas/_/tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas/_/mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin/_/las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//ri gi A ra lis zhus ba/_/brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags/_/de la lha mo ri gi chos/_/brda ni yang 
[\[178a.6\]]dga' rab tu phye/_/brda ni chen po ts+tsho ma bcu/_/bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid/_/gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na/_/gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod/_/ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid do/_/pus mo ts+tshan+dor 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dpral bar nye ba'i ts+tshan+do nyid/_/lag 
[\[178a.7\]]pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid/_/g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/_/rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas/_/g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do/_/snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur/_/lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang /_/tshong rdal nyams dga' tshong 'dus dang /_/ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta/_/brda yi rnam par shes par 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bya/_/rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston/_/ril bu mig sman la sogs pa/_/mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur/_/A ra li yis lha mor zhus/_/ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags/_/gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/_/'bras phyir byang chub thob 'gyur ba'i/_/ting 
[\[178b.2\]]'dzin lha mo ri gi ste/_/mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid/_/srub dang srub byed las byung ba/_/kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung /_/sems pa thams cad yongs su spangs/_/dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya/_/dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni/_/gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par 
[\[178b.3\]]spangs/_/mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni/_/smin ma'i dbus su sems byas na/_/mi zad mun pa'i gzugs su ni/_/sgrub pos dang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/phyis ni rna ba g.yon par bcug_/dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur/_/yan lag can gyi bde ba gang /_/de bzhin phyag rgya 
[\[178b.4\]]chen po bde/_/phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jig_/de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig_/bde ba chen po rtags pa'i phyir/_/de yi ye shes phyag rgya ba/_/'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid/_/rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can/_/gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bar/_/gzhan du brjod par mi nus so/_/lhan cig 
[\[178b.5\]]skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/_/sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni/_/sems can kun la snying rje yis/_/'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid/_/'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/_/snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor bas/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la 
[\[178b.6\]]the tshom med/_/dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul/_/gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ltar/_/bzhi pa ya pa'i me tog bzhin/_/lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni/_/rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/_/sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni/_/de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/_/
[\[178b.7\]]rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rtse gcig sems kyis ri gir 'gyur/_/ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas/_/bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing /_/skom pa yis kyang zil mi non/_/rga dang na bas gzir mi 'gyur/_/'di yi thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/ri gi thams cad rig par 'gyur/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po/_/A ra li ni nyid kyis ni/_/dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas/_/ri gi la ni gus pas zhus/_/e pa~M ma yA ci zhig bshad/_/e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad/_/ba~M gi rnam pa de bzhin chu/_/ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod/_/yA yi rnam pa rlung du gsungs/_/
[\[179a.2\]]ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad/_/ri gis bka' stsal pa/_ri gi mkha' 'gro mar ni gsung /_/sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di/_/ri gi e ba~M sdom pa ni/_/e ba~M rnam pa rna bar gnas/_/ri gi sna yi rtse mor ni/_/rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi/_/ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni/_/
[\[179a.3\]]kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag_/'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/_/A ra li ni nyid kyis ni/_/rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/_/khrag ni ji 
[\[179a.4\]]ltar dgug par bgyi/_/ri gis bka' stsal pa/_nus la sogs pas mdun du ni/_/ya pa'i me tog bzhag nas ni/_/rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya/_/ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi/_/nas ni nyi shu kha smad 'byung /_/phyi nas khrag ni 'gugs par byed/_/lha ni dral ba 
[\[179a.5\]]bshad par bya/_/spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni/_/der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya/_/o~M he ru ka pa ta~M phi pa tA ya/_/ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/_/lha la phyag byas 'gag par 'gyur/_/A li kA li yan lag mnyam/_/'di dag gnyis 
[\[179a.6\]]dbus rang sa bon/_/rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni/_/rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te/_/phyag rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung /_/o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/_/mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul/_/dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis/_/mthe bong rgan pos 
[\[179a.7\]]gzir bar bya/_/sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid/_/rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po/_/chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan/_/ri gi nyid du rab tu grags/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni/_/si si la sogs rab tu grags/_/mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te/_/mi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]bzar la sogs rab tu grags/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/_/wa la sogs pa rab tu grags/_/phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs/_/spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod/_/'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de/_/zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel ba nyid/_/dga' ba la 
[\[179b.2\]]sogs sa bcu ni/_/gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags/_/pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug_/thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/e ba~M ma yA'i dbus gnas pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam/_/'chol ba kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis/_/thams cad rgyud 
[\[179b.3\]]du yang dag gnas/_/gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid/_/thod pa nyid ni snying rje che/_/ri gi A ra li yi sgra/_/cang te'u hU~M he'i sngags bzlas pas/_/dgra ste chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/_/rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags/_/mgo bor nyon mongs pa yi bdud/_/thod pa 
[\[179b.4\]]nam mkha' dag pa nyid/_/lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste/_/de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid/_/ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni/_/lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste/_/skyil krung gdan du shes par bya/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs/_/gnyer ma gsum 
[\[179b.5\]]brtag lte ba nyid/_/lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur/_/mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod/_/kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya/_/spyi bo gdugs kyi phreng bar brjod/_/mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid/_/'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin/_/rus pa bde bar gshegs 
[\[179b.6\]]pa'i gdung /_/de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur/_/de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus/_/rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu mchod/_/rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di/_/A ra lis ni yang dag 
[\[179b.7\]]phye/_/de la ri gi sgyu ma che/_/'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag_/don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/lha mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya'o/_/sgra gcan bzang po'i bde ba che/_/sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las/_/sgyu ma chen pos 'tsho nyid/_/rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul bas/_/
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/_/sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags/_/yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin/_/de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags/_/mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin/_/lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs/_/sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phrul bas/_/don grub nyid ni 
[\[180a.2\]]gzi brjid can/_/ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/_/lha mo ri gi nga tshig nyon/_/las la spyod pa rab brtags pas/_/lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs/_/dga' ba yang ni shi shir gsungs/_/mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma/_/dga' bral dga' ba bde chen ma/_/lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa 
[\[180a.3\]]ma/_/mi bzang ma ni 'o ru gsungs/_/rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid/_/sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che/_/mthe bo mchu ni 'jib pa nyid/_/dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de/_/sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid/_/rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te/_/'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no/_/rdo rje ra li 'dod 
[\[180a.4\]]chen can/_/'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod/_/thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab/_/si si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi/_/de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi/_/'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo/_/rdo rje A ra 
[\[180a.5\]]li nyid ni/_/khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/_/ri gi bde ba chen por gsungs/_/ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/_/rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod/_/bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs/_/bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/_/sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed/_/snying po'i 
[\[180a.6\]]sngags ni/_o~M A ra lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/_si si si si mi gsal bar bzlas so/_/gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni/_/ha ha ha/_las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni/_/de yi sngags su rab tu bsngags/_/snying po yi ni sngags yin no/_/nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yin/_/bsgom pa bde chen myang ba ste/_/de 
[\[180a.7\]]bzhin dam tshig mchod pa nyid/_/thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la/_/mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags/_/klu gzir gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste/_/rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags/_/bsad la ma he dam tshig go/_/dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags/_/khrag dgug pa la dam tshig 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]ste/_/'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid/_/rengs pa la ni ne'u'i sha/_/kha na ma tho med rnyed pa/_/gal te bsad par byas na ni/_/de tshe rnal 'byor pas mi 'grub/_/sems can bskyab sems rnal 'byor pa/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi pa bya/_/
[\[180b.2\]]sgo la sor ni bzhi pa ste/_/sgo khyud sor ni gnyis su gsungs/_/lo gsal yang ni sor gnyis yang /_/sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la/_/sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs/_/lha yi snam bu sor gnyis te/_/rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid/_/sgo las sor mo gnyis 
[\[180b.3\]]kyis ni/_/rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin bya/_/dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste/_/phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi dang ldan/_/kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nyid/_/srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod/_/gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang /_/mu tig dang ni byi ru drang /_/mu men yang dag bsres nas ni/_/
[\[180b.4\]]rin chen lnga ni shin tu gzhug_/lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid/_/rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba/_/bum pa dkri ba nyid du ni/_/sgrub pa po ni dam pas bya/_/dang por sa ni yongs dag bya/_/gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa dang /_/lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /_/de bzhin lnga par sbyin sreg nyid/_/'jig 
[\[180b.5\]]rten skyong ba dbang po dang /_/lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi/_/'od srung ma yis bgegs med mdzod/_/ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin/_/rtag pa nyid du gtor ma sbyin/_/mtshan mo thun gcig gnas pa ni/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/_/gtor 
[\[180b.6\]]ma'i sngags ni/_o~M sharga ti ka sa ne nA kA ro mu khaM sarbA d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/_sa ni yongs su gzung dus su/_/bgegs ni skrod par byed pa'i sngags/_/o~M a na sa ta na na Ta stiSh+Tha ya ma bA ru na ku be ra ka swA tsA s+tha Ne Shu tiSh+Ta d+ha~M rak+ShaM ku ru ta me pi ra tra~M/_cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//
[\[180b.7\]]ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]{D428}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tsa tur+pI Tha ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba/_thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sdom/_/
[\[181a.2\]]ye shes stong pa can dbang phyug_/gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/_/thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_'phyang ba dang /_mgrin pa gsum pa can dang /_ri rab dang ri rab gtsug tong dang /_pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma yangs 
[\[181a.3\]]pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu 'dir phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[181a.4\]]lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gsang ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/_/ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/_/sa dang nam mkha' ji ltar lags/_/chu dang me ni ji lta bu/_/'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs dag gis/_/bsam gtan ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_/
[\[181a.5\]]yul 'khor skyong ba dang po'i lha/_/dkyil 'khor dag na ji ltar lags/_/ye shes rnam shes lus kyi ni/_/las la sogs pa ji ltar sbyor/_/'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid kyi/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/dbugs kyi yas la sogs thams cad/_/ye shes can gyi las 
[\[181a.6\]]su sbyar/_/nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang /_/drug brgya ru ni brtsi bar bya/_/chu tshod drug cu'i dbugs rnams kyis/_/nyin mtshan du ni grags pa yin/_/'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs rnams ni/_/'byung ba'i grangs kyis brtsi bar bya/_/blo dang ldan pas dbugs gnyis ni/_/'jug 
[\[181a.7\]]pa 'byung la thim par bya/_/de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis la/_/phyi rol mtshan ma bzhag bya ste/_/tshes grangs mtshan ma ji bzhin du/_/re mig bcu gnyis rnams su gzhag_/ga rim bcu gnyis rab brtson pas/_/shar nas dpyid zla 'bring sogs gzhag_/ro hi ta dang 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]mo hi ta/_/de bzhin b+ha drA br-iSha b+ha/_/kurma ma ka ra raN+Da dang /_/mi ki ra de bzhin bi tri ka/_/byA ku swap+na ka ma nA/_/kA ma sa dang bcu dang gnyis/_/'di dag shar sogs re mig la/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dgod par bya/_/ro hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/_/skal ba bzang la de bzhin 
[\[181b.2\]]phyug_/gdug pa'i sems la nad bu can/_/rtag tu mtha' 'khob gtso bo ste/_/'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/_/thams cad du ni snyan par smra/_/ro hi ta la lha mchod cing /_/de bzhin tshe lo bdun cu thub/_/ro hi ta la nor btang na/_/mdza' bo thams cad ldog par 'gyur/_/
[\[181b.3\]]ro hi ta la lus rmas na/_/dpal dang kun tu phrad par 'gyur/_/ro hi ta la gnas brten na/_/grogs dang nor gyis rgyas par 'gyur/_/ro hi ta la mgron zhugs na/_/bsam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub/_/bag ma blang dang me yi las/_/zhi ba'i las ni sbyar bar bya/_/mo 
[\[181b.4\]]hi ta yi don sbyor ba/_/bgrang ba nyid kyis shes par bya/_/mo hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/_/tshe ni drug cu rtsa lngar grags/_/mang du za zhing sems chung la/_/'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/_/rtag tu gdug cing ca cor ldan/_/mi snyan pa dag smra la dga'/_/khro la nga rgyal snying 
[\[181b.5\]]stobs med/_/sdig pa byed cing ngang tshul ngan/_/'khyal ba dang ni tshig rtsub smra/_/mtshon gyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/_/yang na tshe lo brgyad cu ni/_/rtsa bzhi dag tu rab tu grags/_/rung ba'i sa ni spong byed cing /_/mi rung ba la brtson par 'gyur/_/lus kyi yan 
[\[181b.6\]]lag rmas na ni/_/'chi bdag dang ni phrad par 'gyur/_/gal te cung zad nor gtong na/_/btang ba slar ni mi ldog go/_/b+ta drA la ni skyes pa'i bu/_/kha zas bzang po zab dang /_/bzang po'i las ni byed 'gyur zhing /_/lo brgya ru ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/dbul la chos ni spyod 
[\[181b.7\]]pa dang /_/bden par smra zhing snyan par brjod/_/chung ma gcig gis tshim pa'i lus/_/bzang por smra ba'i gtso bor 'gyur/_/bzo rnams kun dang dus tshod rig_/rtag tu rang gi gnyen dang mdza'/_/chad pa gcod pa'i rigs can te/_/de bzhin lus ni chu ru 'chi/_/br-i 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]Sha b+ha la skyes ba'i bu/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing dgra la dpa'/_/sgeg dang nor gyis phyug pa ste/_/chung ma mang du len par 'gyur/_/rtag tu gnyen ni mang ba ste/_/pha yi srog ni 'joms par byed/_/so nam tshong gis 'tsho byed cing /_/tshe ni drug cur 'tsho bar 
[\[182a.2\]]'gyur/_/snyom las mu cor smra ba dang /_/gdug cing las dang dang tshul ngan/_/mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na srog chags gdug pas so/_/kurma la ni btsas pa'i bu/_/rtag tu sems khral can du gnas/_/chung gis khro zhing chung gis mgu/_/mang du 
[\[182a.3\]]smra zhing gnyen la byams/_/drag tu smra zhing lhag par khro/_/phyug cing thams cad gtong la dga'/_/bu dang chung ma 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu rang gi yul na gtso/_/zhing gis las la sogs pas 'tsho/_/mdze yi nad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/_/tshe lo brgyad cu lon pa na/_de bzhin 
[\[182a.4\]]rang gi yul du 'chi/_/ma ka ra la bcas pa'i bu/_/tshe ni dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/_/tshul khrims phun tshogs bsod nams ldan/_/'dul ba dang ni spyod pa srung /_/nor ldan gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs/_/skal ba bzang zhing grags pas mdzes/_/bzo dang sgyu rtsal 
[\[182a.5\]]kun la mkhas/_/chung ma gcig ni shin tu gsal/_/rtag tu sems ni lhod pa ste/_/dul ba dang ni bsrung ba ste/_/gnyen gyi nang na gcig pu gtso/_/kun la snyan sogs smra ba dang /_/de bzhin g.yul ngor 'chi bar 'gyur/_/tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang /_/yang na drug cu'am 
[\[182a.6\]]sum cu'o/_/raN+Da la ni btsas pa'i bu/_/rtag tu sdig pa'i blo can te/_/sems can rnams la 'khyal bar smra/_/rtag tu dbul zhing kha gsag smra/_/dus kun du ni nad bu can/_/rgyal pos chad pa gcod pa'i bdag_/'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/_/gzhan dag la ni yid 
[\[182a.7\]]mi rton/_/zol dang bzo sogs kun rig pa/_/bud med rnams la skal ba bzang /_/tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'am/_/yang na drug cu'am sum cur nges/_/mi ki ra la btsas pa'i bu/_/chos shes rang gi rigs kyang mtho/_/lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs/_/bzo 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang rig pa sna tshogs ldan/_/tshig rtsub smra la drag pa ste/_/shin tu khro zhing 'jigs su rung /_/nor nyung gzugs ni bzang ba ste/_/bya ba thams cad myur bar 'grub/_/de yi lus ni rang nyid kyis/_/chu ru mchongs te 'chi bar 'gyur/_/tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa brgyad na/_/yang 
[\[182b.2\]]na rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsod/_/bi tri ka la btsas pa'i bu/_/skyes ma thag tu ma ni 'chi/_/pha yang lo ni brgyad na 'chi/_/de bzhin rang gi khyim na gtso/_/khrol rdzas ni nyung bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa la sogs blun dang ldan/_/las dang sems khral chung ba ste/_/dpung rnams 
[\[182b.3\]]kyi ni gtso bo nyid/_/tshe lo brgya dang rtsa brgyad na/_/rang gi khyim du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gnyen rnams kun dang mdza' ba ste/_/sdug phongs rnams la brtse bar ldan/_/byA ku la ni btsas pa'i bu/_/blo chung ngan par smra ba dang /_/shes rab zhan cing nad bu can/_/rtag tu grogs 
[\[182b.4\]]po ngan dang 'grogs/_/rang gi gnyen byams skal ba bzang /_/sdug phongs rnams la rjes su brtse/_/nor dang ba lang shin tu phyug_/khyim dang chung ma gsum la sogs/_/skad cig khro zhing nga rgyal ldan/_/dgra yis gzir bas 'jigs par 'gyur/_/pha dang ma ni 
[\[182b.5\]]tshe yang ring /_/de bzhin lo bdun cu thub/_/tshong gi las kyis 'tsho bar byed/_/lan cig tshong gi rgyu yis 'chi/_/sbyor ba brtsams pa'i mtshan ma la/_/ye shes can gyis bgrang bar bya/_/swap+na la ni btsas pa'i bu/_/dpa' rtul pha rol gnon pa yis/_/dgra rnams 
[\[182b.6\]]thams cad sreg par byed/_/mgon med rnams kyi rtsa lag ste/_/dus rnams kun tu dbul pa dang /_/sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed/_/bdag nyid seng ger sems pa dang /_/tshig rtsub smra la thams cad rig_/dus kun du ni nad med cing /_/rtag tu longs spyod rnyed 
[\[182b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/gzhan la brten pas 'tsho ba dang /_/bud med kun la gnod cing spyod/_/tshe lo lnga bcu tham pa ru/_/de ni nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/dgra yi mtshon gyis brgyab nas su/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/kA ma sa la btsas pa'i bu/_/tshe ni drug cu rtsa 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]brgyad 'tsho/_/nor dang 'bru dang grong dang ni/_/phyugs dang rta sogs bzhon par ldan/_/bden par smra zhing chos kyang shes/_/sems can kun la phan par byed/_/rig pa dang ni snyan par smra/_/bstan bcos thams cad shin tu rgyas/_/sems can kun 
[\[183a.2\]]la skal ba bzang /_/rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa rnams/_/ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/_/ro hi ta ni lha la mchod/_/mo hi ta ni nor la brkam/_/b+ha drA kha zas bzang po ze/_/br-i Sha b+ha la mang du khro/_/kurma la ni gzhan du sems/_/ma 
[\[183a.3\]]ka ra la 'brel bar smra/_/raN+Da la ni sdig sems can/_/mi ki ra ni 'khrig la brten/_/bi tri ka ni gnyid log cing /_/byA ku li ni bla rdol lo/_/swap+na la ni rang nyid sems/_/kA ma glu dang klog 'don byed/_/ro hi ta la zhi ba'i las/_/de bzhin br-i Sha rgyas pa ste/_/ma kar 
[\[183a.4\]]ni dbang dang 'byor/_/b+ha drA la ni mngon spyod bya/_/mo hi ta yis bskrad pa ste/_/kurma la ni bcing ba'i las/_/raN+Das dbye bar shes par bya/_/byA ku la ni smran sbyar bya/_/ra yi khyu mchog grub pa ste/_/bdud rtsi sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhag 
[\[183a.5\]]nas/_/snga dro mkhas pas brtsi bar bya/_/ro hi ta la nor byin na/_/rdzu 'phrul dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/mo hi ta la nor bsdus na/_/gzhan gyis dgag par mi nus so/_/b+ha drA la ni khyim brtsams na/_/dpal dang yang dag 'phrad par 'gyur/_/br-i Sha lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/
[\[183a.6\]]sngags ni kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/kurma'i sbyor bas pag ma blang /_/thams cad du ni 'bral mi 'gyur/_/ma ka ra la zhing btab na/_/gdon mi za bar 'bru rnams 'phel/_/raN+Da bud med bgrod byas na/_/shi bar gyur kyang mi gtong ngo /_/mi ki ra la tshong byas na/_/
[\[183a.7\]]gtam pa de ltar len par snang /_/rtag tu brtan par gzhag bya ba'i/_/las tshogs bi tri ka las bzung /_/bya ku li las mgron zhugs na/_/'tshe ba med par gnas su phyin/_/swap+nas thams cad kun tu ni/_/nges par rtag tu mngon par 'ong /_/kA ma la ni nor 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]btang na/_/btang ba slar la ldog mi 'gyur/_/ro hi ta la nor rgyas bu/_/mo hi ta ni 'jog po yin/_/stobs kyis rgyu ba b+ha drA'i gnas/_/de bzhin pad+ma br-i Sha b+ha/_/kurma pad+ma chen po ste/_/ma ka ra ni dung skyong ngo /_/raN+Da dung skyong chen po ste/_/mi ki ra ni rigs ldan no/_/pi tri 
[\[183b.2\]]mgo brgya ba yin te/_/byA ku la ni 'khyil ltung yin/_/swap+na 'jigs pa zhes bya ste/_/kA ma dus kyis 'chi bar 'dod/_/'di dag dus sbyor rim pa bzhin/_/bye brag tu ni shes par bya/_/ra yi khyu mchog grub pa ste/_/bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur/_/gang gi mche bas 
[\[183b.3\]]mngon zin na/_/'chi bdag dang ni phrad 'gyur ba'o/_/dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba dag_/gzhan la dug ni sbyar bar bya/_/dus kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]rim pa bzhin du bya/_/dpyid zla 'bring sogs rim bzhin du/_/nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/_/ji lta'i dus bzhin 
[\[183b.4\]]mtshan ma ni/_/rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/_/nyin mo'i chu tshod so sor ni/_/mkhas pas bcu gnyis bzhi bsgyur bya/_/mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur/_/chu tshod mkhas pas brtsam par bya/_/re mig dag ni gnyis pa la/_/dus la mkhas pas dus tshod bya/_/
[\[183b.5\]]nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/_/chu tshod kyi ni mtshan mar bya/_/bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni/_/mtshan mo chu tshod du ni brtag_/bdag dang bcu gnyis bsgyur bdag_/nyin mo ru ni brtag par bya/_/gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/_/mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag_/
