[\[183b.6\]]chu tshod sum cu tham pa ni/_/dbus kyi bi shug nyis par sbyar/_/gnyis mtha' bcu ni gsum po dag_/nyin mo chu tshod shes pa ste/_/brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis po dag_/de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya/_/bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni/_/nyin mo yi ni chu tshod de/_/
[\[183b.7\]]drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan ma bya/_/drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/_/nyin mo yi ni shes bya ste/_/bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/_/byang du bgrod pa bshad nas ni/_/de bzhin gzhan gyi dus shes bya/_/
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni/_/nyin mo yi ni bshad pa yin/_/drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/mtshan mo yi ni mtshon par bya/_/gnyis dang pa cu ni gsum bsgyur ba/_/de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/_/brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/chu tshod 
[\[184a.2\]]mtshan gyi rab tu grags/_/bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag_/bi shu nyin mo'i chu tshod de/_/de bzhin mtshan gyi na chu tshod kyang /_/bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya/_/de bzhin pi shu bar ma gnyis/_/brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya/_/
[\[184a.3\]]gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/_/mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag_/drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/_/nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin/_/bzhi dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/_/de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod de/_/sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/chu tshod kyis ni dus 
[\[184a.4\]]rnams 'da'/_/chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni/_/nyin mtshan phrugs gcig du ni sbyar/_/zla ba'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/rim pa de bzhin mtshan ma bya/_/chu tshod dbugs sogs rdzog pa dang /_/bi shu ma gtogs rim 'phel bri/_/las dang las min bye brag 
[\[184a.5\]]bzhin/_/dbugs kyi rim gyis gzung bar bya/_/kha dngar sogs dus tshigs dang /_/bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya/_/gnyis po dag ni bcus bsgyur ba/_/de bzhin lo yi chu tshod de/_/de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis/_/nyin mtshan gyi ni dbugs su brtsi/_/ngag gi 
[\[184a.6\]]dbang phyug kun bzung nas/_/dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par bzhag_/ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su/_/sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag_/a yi rim pa la bab na/_/dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing /_/nor rnyed pa ni snang ba ste/_/skal ba bzang por 
[\[184a.7\]]gdon mi za/_/A yi re mig la bab na/_/rims dang nad kyis gzir ba dang /_/'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur ba/_/A zhes bya bar nges pa ston/_/yi ge i la bab gyur na/_/rgyal pa'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te/_/kun nas nor na rnyed pa dang /_/gang zhig bsam pa 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]des 'grub 'gyur/_/yi ge I la par gyur na/_/zla ba drug na 'chi ba dang /_/de bzhin dgras ni gzir ba dang /_/me yis 'jigs pa shes par bya/_/yi ge u la bab gyur na/_/dpal dang grogs mo rnyed pa dang /_/nor dang 'bru ni 'phel par 'gyur/_/dpa' rnams 
[\[184b.2\]]kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/U la gal te bab gyur na/_/de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar 'gyur/_/bran bza' dang ni gnyen mtshan rnams/_/'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur/_/yi ge e la bab gyur na/_/'phral du skye bo skal can 'gyur/_/skyes pa pud med dag gi 
[\[184b.3\]]ni/_/mchod pa'i gnas ni thob par 'gyur/_/ai yi mtshan ma la lhung na/_/dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_/lus can rkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing /_/nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur/_/o yi mtshan ma la bab na/_/gnas kyi dbang po 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[184b.4\]]nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing /_/yid 'ong rig pa de bzhin no/_/au yi mtshan ma la bab na/_/'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing /_/gnas las nyams dang brdeg 'tshog dang /_/byas pa chud ni zor par 'gyur/_/yi ge a~M la bab gyur na/_/bran bzang dag ni rnyed 'gyur 
[\[184b.5\]]zhing /_/bu dang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te/_/de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa/_/de bzhin tha ma'ang gzung bar bya/_/drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su/_/lnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya/_/sum brgya drug cu bsres nas ni/_/sa bzhin du ni bcad nas 
[\[184b.6\]]su/_/yi ge lhag ma bzung byas te/_/dge dang mi dge mtshan par bya/_/yang na ri mo kyag kyog bri/_/dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs pa grang /_/yang na me tog gtor nas ni/_/de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya/_/snga dro ro hi ta dus su/_/bden pa thams cad blta bar bya/_/
[\[184b.7\]]rnal 'byor bstan bcos rab tu bsngags/_/bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba ste dang po'o//_//ye shes de ni byi brag dag_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/lus kyi mtshan ma ji lta bu/_/de nyid gang la brten par bgyi/_/
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]lus kyi mtshan ma ston pa rnams/_/nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po che/_/lus kyi mtshan ma mngon bstan gyis/_/gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas/_/dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam gyis/_/lus can zla ba drug gis 'chi/_/
[\[185a.2\]]'jigs pa cung zad mthong min par/_/'gram pa'i mtshams ni bye 'gyur na/_/de tshe dus la bab par 'gyur/_/dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa/_/snga dro ro hi ta dus su/_/mtshan ma dag ni brtag par bya/_/sna yi bar na chad gyur na/_/nyi ma bdun na gdon mi za/_/mig gi 
[\[185a.3\]]chu ni chad gyur na/_/de bzhin nyi ma lnga yis 'chi/_/'gram pa'i logs kyi mtshan ma yis/_/zhag gcig las ni mi 'tsho'o/_/rna ba'i chol zangs ltebs pa yis/_/chu tshod ldan gdon mi za/_/'dir ni lce yi thig nag gis/_/lus can zhag gnyis 'chi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[185a.4\]]steng 'og so ni 'thams pa na/_/zhag gsum 'chi bdag phrad par 'gyur/_/mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsas/_/zla ba phyed na gdon mi za/_/brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na/_/zla byed sman pas gsor mi rung /_/sen mo khrag ni med pa yis/_/lus can nyi ma brgyad na 'chi/_/
[\[185a.5\]]'chi ba'i mtshan ma brgyad bcas pa/_/'chi ba'i dus bab mtshon par bya/_/sna yi par sha chad pa la/_/ye shes sa bon gyis gzir bya/_/mig gi chu ni chad pa la/_/rdo rje ma yi sa bon gzung /_/mkhur tshos logs kyi mtshan ma la/_/drag mo'i sa bon gzir bar bya/_/rna ba'i 
[\[185a.6\]]chol zangs zhum pa la/_/ro langs ma yi sa bon dgod/_/lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/_/gtum mo'i sa bon bsam par bya/_/so dang so ni 'thams pa la/_/seng ge ma yi sa bon brdeg_/mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsa/_/stag mo'i sa bon brdeg par bya/_/brang gi dra 
[\[185a.7\]]ba zhom pa la/_/ce spyang sa bon gzung par bya/_/lag pa'i sen khrag med pa la/_/'ug pa ma yi sa bon gzung /_/'chi ltas yan lag mtshan ma ni/_/sa bon de dag dgod pas bsrung /_/phyi nas ye shes 'khor lo ni/_/bri ba'i cho gas rnam shes bsrung /_/ma bsregs 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]kham phor gnyis bzung la/_/gur gum ro tsa na yis ni/_/'og gi cha ni re mig dgu/_/de bzhin steng la bcu gnyis bya/_/dbus su ming ni bris nas su/_/sa bon gyis ni mngon par bskor/_/phyag 'tshal dbyangs kyi dang po ste/_/bsrung ba'i tshig ni sngon du bya/_/
[\[185b.2\]]sangs rgyas lnga sogs ldan pa yi/_/sa bon mtha' ru gnas pa ste/_/sreg byed yi ge de yi mtha'/_/steng sogs myu khyud dbyangs yig dgod/_/kha ba gnyis 'gyur sa bon dang /_/lha mo rdo rje ma zhes bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga yid sa bon ldan/_/thams cad phyag 
[\[185b.3\]]'tshal sreg byed mtha'/_/dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/_/gya gyu phyag na rdo rje yin/_/de bzhin lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog_/mgo dang dpung ba byams pa ste/_/steng du 'bar ba ma yig ste/_/'khor ba thams cad sgrol byed pa'o/_/de la shar gyi phyogs 
[\[185b.4\]]gnas pa/_/lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/byang du drag mo zhes bya ba'i/_/sa bon nyid ni sbyar bar bya/_/nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa ni/_/ro langs ma yi sa bon sbyar/_/lho yi phyogs su gang gnas pa/_/gtum mo'i sa bon rdzogs par bstan/_/sa bon mngon du 
[\[185b.5\]]bstan pa bzhin/_/dbang ldan du ni seng ge ma/_/me mtshams stag so dgod bya ste/_/bden bral du ni ce spyang ma/_/rlung du hU~M byed 'ug pa mo/_/mtshams na gnas pa'i sa bon ni/_/bzhi po'i drug po'i dngos su ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji bzhin du/_de 
[\[185b.6\]]bzhin sa bon dgod par bya/_/steng gi gnas ni bcu gnyis la/_/dbyangs kyi sa bon gzhag par bya/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mtha' dang bcas/_/phyogs su ma ning gzhag par bya/_/'bar ma 'jib ma zhes bya dang /_/de bzhin 'phrog byed mkha' 'gro ma/_/phyag 
[\[185b.7\]]'tshal sreg pa mthar gnas pa/_/ji lta'i gnas bzhin gzhag par bya/_/shar phyogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas/_/byang du gnas pa 'bar ma ste/_/nub tu 'jib mar yang dag gsungs/_/lho ru 'phrog byed dgod par bya/_/dbus su ming ni bri bya ste/_/'og tu ji 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]bzhin steng de bzhin/_/gnyi ga kha ni sbyar nas su/_/skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya/_/kun nas mnyam pa'i gnas su ni/_/tsan+dan dmar pos byugs nas su/_/sna tshogs me tog 'dug pa dang /_/drir bcas nyer spyod gtor ma byin/_/dbus su 
[\[186a.2\]]'khrul 'khor bzhag nas ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma lngas bskor bar bya/_/bdag nyid rdo rje can sbyor bas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/_/rdo rje lag ni lag rtse ru/_/rdo rje bsams nas reg byas la/_/dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas 
[\[186a.3\]]par bya/_/tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig la sogs/_/lha la sogs la bsgo bar bya/_/yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang /_/'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'tshe med nad ni thams cad dang /_/nad pa glor gzhag sbyar na ni/_/dus rnams kun tu nad mi 'byung /_/
[\[186a.4\]]lus can tshe ni zad ba yang /_/zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/_/gnas gzhan du ni bzhag nas su/_/rtag tu mchod la brtson par bya/_/rdo rje'i rgya ldan sbyor ba yis/_/rnam shes gang du'ang 'gro mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni/_/der ni rab 
[\[186a.5\]]tu brtag par bya/_/dbugs kyi gnas ni mtshungs pa na/_/thams cad grub par gsungs pa yin/_/g.yas la g.yas su gnas pa dang /_/blo ldan g.yon la g.yon du gnas/_/der gnas na ni smra byed pa/_/thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/_/dbugs dang 
[\[186a.6\]]'dri ba mi mthun pa/_/dngos grub ring pa mtshon par bya/_/skad cig srog gi rab sbyor ba/_/sbyor ba gnyis ni shes bya ste/_/skad cig la ni bya ba kun/_/rgyas par 'gyur bar rab tu grags/_/srog la bya ba gang byas pa/_/grub pa ring par the tshom med/_/mche ba la 
[\[186a.7\]]sogs bsams nas dug_/der ni gso ba dag tu bya/_/sbyor sogs sngar kyi mtshan nyid can/_/thams cad rig pas klu la bsgo/_/sbyor ba bzhi la sos btab pa/_/'chi par 'gyur ba the tshom med/_/dug bsdu pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/gzhan ma thams cad gso 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]bar bya/_/sos btab lus la kun rig pas/_/sa bon gyis ni dgod par dgod/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/_/yan lag brgyad po rnams su dgod/_/kha dog dkar po bsams pa yi/_/sa bon rnams kyis yid dug dbrog_/dkyil 'khor dbus su 
[\[186b.2\]]gnas pa yis/_/ye shes kyis ni rnam shes pa cing /_/yan lag bsgyur ba'i sbyor byas nas/_/de 'og phyi rol brtsam par bya/_/chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yis/_/sa snod yongs su dgang bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/_/dbus su pad+ma bsam 
[\[186b.3\]]par bya/_/gdugs dkar po yis brgyan pa yi/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bsgom/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa dang /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bklubs/_/klu brgyad kyi ni mgo bo 
[\[186b.4\]]bsnams/_/pad+ma yi ni gdan la mnan/_/shar du nor rgyas bu bsam bya/_/de bzhin byang du 'jog po'o/_/nub tu stobs kyis rgyu ba ste/_/lho ru pad+ma blta bar bya/_/dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/_/me mtshams su ni dung skyong ngo /_/bden bral rigs ldan zhes bya ba/_/rlung 
[\[186b.5\]]mtshams 'khyil ba ltung pa'o/_/klu brgyad po ni bsams nas su/_/mgo bo rnams ni mnan par bsgom/_/rdzas rnams kun gyis mchod nas su/_/me tog spos sogs gtor ma sbyin/_/bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ru bsam/_/rma bya 
[\[186b.6\]]sgro yi chun po yis/_/chu yi sbyor bas drang bar bya/_/kun nas rkang bar drangs nas su/_/rkang ba nas ni chur thim bya/_/oM hrI TaT+Ta t+Tar hU~M phaT swA hA/_rdo rje sems dpar mngon sbyor ngas/_/'bum phrag la sogs bsnyen pa bya/_/oM bA su ki ri hrI TaT+TaN+Tar hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM tak+Sha ka hrI 
[\[186b.7\]]TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM ka rko Ta ka hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM ma hA pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM sha kha pA la hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM b+h+yo ku li kA ya laM hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM hu lun ke hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/_oM hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT a mu ka s+ya ni ra bi shaM ku 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ru hU~M phaT swA hA/_zhes brjod cing /_'o ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis/_/'phral du 'o ma nag por 'gyur/_/yungs kar me tog dkar po dang /_/tsan+dan dag gis bsres pa yis/_/'chi bas zin pa'i snying ga ru/_/gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg 
[\[187a.2\]]par bya/_/snying ni 'phar ma thag tu yang /_/ye shes pa sbams te bsrung bar bya/_/rnam shes bsdams pa tsam gyis kyang /_/de bzhin dbugs ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/dbugs ni rnam par g.yos pa yis/_/bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya/_/dbugs kyis gzir ma 
[\[187a.3\]]thag tu yang /_/rkang lag la sogs 'dar bar 'gyur/_/yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na/_/bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya/_/hU~M gi klu ni blangs nas su/_/se gol gsum gyis bslang bar bya/_/'chi bas zin pa bslang nas ni/_/de yi yan lag bsrung bar bya/_/bsdus nas klu yi gnas su ni/_/
[\[187a.4\]]'o ma de ni dpo bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpar mngon sprul pa/_/'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas pa yis/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/_/de nas sgrub pos dug bsdus na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/kha dang thig le 
[\[187a.5\]]gnyis dag dang /_/steng dang mgrin pa sna rtse dang /_/snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang /_/rkang pa'i mthe bo dag tu ni/_/zin pa gso bar mi bya ste/_/'chi ba nyid kyi rgyu ru gsungs/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che/_/char ba dbab pa'i tshog mchog_/chu 'gram dang ni nye ba yi/_/sa 
[\[187a.6\]]phyogs nyams ni dga' ba ru/_/bla re dag ni bres nas su/_/dar dpyangs sna tshogs dbyangs pa ru/_/kha dog sna lngar btsos pa yi/_/tshon gyi las ni brtsam par bya/_/gru bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa/_/klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par bklubs/_/mgo bo gnyis ni sgor bcas te/_/
[\[187a.7\]]mjug ma gnyis kyis grwa ru mdud/_/shar du rgyal ba bzang po ste/_/dpal dang dga' bo byang du'o/_/nub tu tshar 'bebs sdug pa ste/_/brtan dang drag po lho ru'o/_/klu brgyad kyi ni ra ba ste/_/phyogs la sogs par rigs brgyad dgod/_/nor rgyas bu ni shar du ste/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'jog po byang du dgod par bya/_/nub kyi phyogs su stobs kyis rgyu/_/lho yi phyogs su pad+ma ste/_/dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/_/me mtshams dung skyong dgod par bya/_/bden bral du ni rigs ldan te/_/rlung mtshams 'khyil ba ltung ba'o/_/sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po brgyad/_/
[\[187b.2\]]phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya/_/sgra sgrogs rmugs pa de bzhin du/_/drag po 'khyil pa stug po dang /_/gtum po char 'bebs rab gang ba/_/brgyad po rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dgod pa/_/ji bzhin phyogs kyi mdog tu bsam/_/dbus 
[\[187b.3\]]su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/sku mdog dkar po shin tu 'bar/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/_/pad+ma sprul gyis bskor nas su/_/sprul ni 
[\[187b.4\]]gdan du sbyar bar bya/_/mchod pa rgya chen bshams nas ni/_/'o ma la sogs snod brgyad bzhag_/me tog bdug sogs dri dang ni/_/mar me sna tshogs rig pas mchod/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag bsgom pa'i/_/ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor 
[\[187b.5\]]pa'i/_/oM b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/_nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/_/oM bA su ki hU~M swA hA/_oM ta k+Sha ka hU~M swA hA/_oM karko Ta hU~M swA hA/_oM pad+ma hU~M swA hA/_oM ma hA pad+ma hU~M swA hA/_oM sha~M kha pA la hU~M swA hA/_oM ku li sha bA la hU~M swA hA/_oM hu lun+d+ha hU~M swA hA/_klu'i 
[\[187b.6\]]rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so/_/oM g+hi lhi g+hi lhi/_bar+Sha bar+Sha pa ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ho ho ho/_Tha Tha Tha swA hA/_sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so/_/lag pa kun tu bskor nas su/_/phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya/_/sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon 
[\[187b.7\]]pa khu tshur bcangs nas su/_/mthe'u chung dang mthe bong brgyad/_/g.yas pa sprul mgo gdengs nas su/_/mthe bong steng du gung mor sbyar/_/klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/o~M badzra Ta ki nI/_bar+Sha bar+Sha ba ya hU~M phu swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/sngon du bsnyen 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]pa 'bum phrag ni/_/gsum du byas nas bzlas pa bya/_/rnal 'byor can gyi las 'di rnams/_/char 'bebs pa yi cho ga mchog_/gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa yi/_/pho nya'i mtshan ma bshad par bya/_/mig yon mgo dkar sgur po dang /_/'jigs 
[\[188a.2\]]pa'i gos dang dbyug pa thogs/_/bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong /_/ngu zhing skra ni lhug pa sogs/_/gcer bu ngan gyis smra ba dang /_/sbyor bzhis 'chi ba ston pa yin/_/pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la/_/brtags nas rnam pa gnyis su bya/_/de tshe sngags pa 
[\[188a.3\]]'grogs 'dod na/_/grub pa nyams par the tshom med/_/bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o//_//rnal 'byor brtson pa'i khyad par dag_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/gang gis sngags rnams 'tshal 
[\[188a.4\]]bar bgyi/_/ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags/_/nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/_/de bzhin lha yi bdag nyid do/_/dang por stong nyid bsgoms pa yis/_/lus can dri ma bkru bar bya/_/dang po gzugs ni stong sogs bya/_/ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid yin te/_/gzugs 
[\[188a.5\]]khams zhes bya stong pa ste/_/de nyid du ni sgra yang bya/_/dri khams zhes bya stong pa ste/_/de nyid du ni ro yang bya/_/reg bya'i khams ni stong pa ste/_/de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya/_/mig gi bdag nyid stong ba la/_/dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/_/nyan pa'i 
[\[188a.6\]]bdag nyid stong pa la/_/dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/_/mnam pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la/_/dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/_/lce yi bdag nyid stong pa la/_/dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/_/lus kyi bdag nyid stong pa la/_/dbus na rnam shes ji ltar 
[\[188a.7\]]yod/_/yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa la/_/dbus na ji ltar brtag par bya/_/yid ni nam mkha' thim nas su/_/thams cad stong par bsam par bya/_/gling dang ri rab la sogs pa/_/steng dang 'og dang bar gyi ni/_/khams gsum stong par bsgoms pa yis/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]thams cad zad pa nyid du bya/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi/_/gzugs la sogs bzang par bsgom/_/bdag gi dngos po zang bya ste/_/dngos po 'dres par dmigs par bya/_/sbyor ba mnyam par kun bsams te/_/rnal 'byor ba ni mkhas pa 
[\[188b.2\]]yis/_/mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/_/de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang /_/de la mtshan ma brtag par bya/_/mar me'i 'od kyis zhi ba ste/_/ser po dngul gyis rgyas par 'gyur/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ni/_/chags pa la sogs 'grub par 
[\[188b.3\]]'gyur/_/mthar ni du pa gnag mthong na/_/mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/_/rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yis/_/de yi mod la bskrad par 'gyur/_/zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer lhar/_/thams cad du ni dkar mthong nas/_/rnal 'byor grub par shes par bya/_/
[\[188b.4\]]blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas/_/de 'og rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/_/myu gu la sogs mngon par bsam/_/gang zhig stong shes bsgom pa yi/_/myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur/_/ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba lta/_/shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/_/
[\[188b.5\]]pa dang ma ni bsad bya ste/_/bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/_/rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/_/mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/_/bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o//_//nyon cig rdo rje ji bzhin lam/_/gnyis 
[\[188b.6\]]spabs gnyis su med pa ste/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor rab 'jigs pas/_/chu yi dgra ni dam pas gang /_/dbus su bying ba'i lus can rnams/_/sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid ces byar brjod/_/mtshon byas mtshan nyid mtshon pa po/_/rnam shes kyis ni ye shes te/_/
[\[188b.7\]]ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/_/shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/_/'gro ba brtags pa'i sems kyis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin mngon par 'gro/_/zhags pas glang chen myos bcings ltar/_/'khor ba'i zhags pas gnod rmongs pas/_/rnal 'byor pa ni 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]stong phrag gcig_/tshe rabs snga ma'i 'gro bar 'gro/_/sngon du mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin/_/mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/_/stong pa'i zhing la sogs lus la/_/blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/_/dper na gdol ba'i khad pa mer 
[\[189a.2\]]bsregs pa/_/lha yi byin gyis bslabs par rab tu brjod/_/rigs can dge dang mkhas pa kun du gnas/_/de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis kun bshig nas/_/sa bon dgod pas rab tu dgod par bya/_/steng du me yi sa bon brtag_/sa yi sa bon rnam pa gnyis/_/
[\[189a.3\]]mig gnyis su ni sbyar bar bya/_/stong sogs rlung gi sa bon ni/_/sna dang rna ba dag la bsam/_/bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/_/lce yi dbang so dbang phyug gtso/_/gang gis brtsegs pa rim bzhin gzung /_/gnas bzhi ru ni sbyar bar bya/_/mgrin par gti mug sa 
[\[189a.4\]]bon te/_/de bzhin dpung par nyon mongs so/_/snying ga'i phyogs su g.yo ba ste/_/lte ba'i rtsa bar phyug yin no/_/yan lag brgyad du sa bon ni/_/brgyad po bkod pas bsrung bar bya/_/ye shes mkha' 'gror bdag byas te/_/lus ni sa bon ldan par bya/_/
[\[189a.5\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_/pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/_/gdugs ni dkar pos steng du g.yogs/_/btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar pa'i 'od/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/_/steng du rdo rje dbu rgyan 
[\[189a.6\]]can/_/dar gyi thod ni mdzes par bcings/_/spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/ral gri dgra sta rdo rje dang /_/g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub nyid dang ni/_/shak+ti kha T+wA~M bsgreng ba ni/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mngon par bsnams/_/
[\[189a.7\]]sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phros pa yis/_/sems can rnams kyi don mdzad brtson/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/yid kyi ye shes rnam shes dag_/shel dang 'dra bar bsam par bya/_/A li kA li rab sbyor bas/_/de yi 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]sa bon bzung byas te/_/smin par thigs pa'i gnas dag tu/_/ye shes can gyi sa bon bsgom/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa yi/_/yi ge'i sa bon bzlas par bya/_/rlung dang me yi mdun don la/_/rdo rje me yi sa bon bskul/_/sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/_/
[\[189b.2\]]char pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba brjod/_/thog mar bla ma'i yi ge gzhag_/sreg byed yi ge mthar bzlas bya/_/ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yi/_/blo gros can gyis sum 'bum bzla/_/bzlas dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/_/las brgyad 
[\[189b.3\]]la sogs dngos grub rnams/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/_/de 'og las rnams pa rtsam byas na/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/rmongs par bya ba'i bye brag ni/_/nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/_/bcings pa rnams kyi bye brag dang /_/sngon du rdo rje'i tshig brjod 
[\[189b.4\]]la/_/sde mtshan dang po'i dang po bzung /_/de bzhin sde tshan bzhi pa yi/_/yi ge dang po bzung nas ni/_/nyis 'gyur re pha steng du gzhag_/de bzhin i dang re phar sbyar/_/gang zhig sde tshan gnyis pa yi/_/yi ge gnyis pa thig le can/_/lcags kyu yis ni gzir 
[\[189b.5\]]bar bya/_/bzhi pa yi ni gsum par bcas/_/lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa dang /_/sngon du phyag 'tshal yi ge ste/_/yi ge drug po mtha' ru sbyar/_/sa bon 'di bzlas rnal 'byor pas/_/dngos po thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/_/
[\[189b.6\]]lag gnyis sor mo pa snol nas ni/_/de nyid bza' blta bur sbyar/_/khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang /_/gnyis ka phan tshun drud par bya/_/'di ni chen po'i phyag rgya ste/_/'od zer 'ar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug_/dgra yi mgrin pa la sogs pa/_/dngos po thams cad yid 
[\[189b.7\]]kyis rol/_/de nas chu la sogs ba kun/_/rab tu bcing ba bshad par bya/_/gang yang snga tshan tha ma ni/_/yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/_/de bzhin snga tshan gsum pa yi/_/yi ge gsum pa nyid dang ni/_/de yi sa bon gsum pa la/_/steg du a zhes bya 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bar sbyar/_/sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po la/_/lcags kyu yis ni gzir bar bya/_/gsum pa chu yi sa bon dang /_/tsheg drag yi ge dbus byas te/_/mtha' ma rdo rje can dang sbyar/_/re ba glon lcags kyu can/_/mtha' ni drag po'i yi ge dang /_/dang por 
[\[190a.2\]]phyag 'tshal gzhag par bya/_/bcing ba yi ni sngags su grags/_/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/_/srin lag gnyis ni phan tshun dkri/_/khro bo gnyis kyis mnan par bya/_/mthe bo gnyis ni dbus su sbyar/_/de nyid du ni mthe chung sbyar/_/rgod ma kha yi phyag 
[\[190a.3\]]rgya 'di/_/'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/_/phyogs bcu'i gnas su 'bar ba yis/_/sprin gyi lha tshogs sreg par byed/_/char pa bcing la sogs dus su/_/phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya/_/sgrub pos 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs 
[\[190a.4\]]bya/_/bdag gu gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi ba'o//_//lha yi gzugs ni ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs dang /_/gtor ma ldan pa ji ltar lags/_/gzugs sogs bsam pa rtse gcig pa/_/
[\[190a.5\]]nyon cig rdo rje da kho na/_/sngags dang phyag rgya sbyin sreg gi/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan bsgom pa rnams/_/sngon du me yi las sogs la/_/blo ldan bzlas pa shes par bya/_/sa ni sbyangs ma thag tu yang /_/stegs bu'i mtshan nyid 'bad de bya/_/sor brgyad lhag ni yan 
[\[190a.6\]]chad du/_/khru gang tsam nas brtsams nas su/_/ji snyed khru stong bar du gzung /_/brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa ste/_/de bzhin bcu pas rgyas par 'gyur/_/bcu gnyis pas ni dbang du sdud/_/bcu bzhis de bzhin zhi ba nyid/_/mtheb sor bcu drug tshad kyis ni/_/rigs 
[\[190a.7\]]rnams mngon par 'phel bar byed/_/mtheb sor [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gnas kyis ni/_/ba lang rigs sogs mngon par 'phel/_/thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas/_/grong khyer dang ni yul 'khor zhi/_/rgyar ni cha gsum ba gos pa las/_/cha gnyis su ni brko bar bya/_/brkos 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa yi ni brgyad cha yis/_/khung bu yi ni kha khyer bya/_/kha khyer gyi ni phyed pa yis/_/phyi rol gyi ni mu khyud bya/_/mu khyud cha brgyad ldan pa la/_/pad+ma'i 'dab de cha brgyad bya/_/pad+ma yi ni phyi rol du/_/sor gcig pa yir ba bya/_/thab khung nang du rdo rje rnams/_/pad+ma'i nang 
[\[190b.2\]]du gzhag par bya/_/mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/_/zhi ba la ni gru bzhi'o/_/kun nas zlum po dbang du sdud/_/rgyas pa la yang de bzhin no/_/bskrad la zla ba phyed pa ste/_/dgug dang bcing la zur brgyad pa'o/_/rim gyis rim gyis sbyar par bya/_/zhi dang rgyas dang 
[\[190b.3\]]dbang sogs rnams/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi mtshan ma rnams/_/ji bzhin phyogs su dgod par bya/_/kha khyer ni gnas bzhi ru/_/sangs rgyas mtshan mas brgyan par bya/_/zla phyed rdo rjes shin tu mdzes/_/grwa dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag_/ji bzhin stan gyi gnas 
[\[190b.4\]]su yang /_/mtheb sor bcu gnyis dag dang ni/_/dpangs su khru phyed ldan pa yi/_/ti se'i gangs ni mdzes par gzhag_/'dab ma brgyad kyi gnas rnams su/_/lha mo rnams ni ri ma bzhin dgod/_/rnal 'byor pa yis de yi tshad/_/khyad par du ni sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[190b.5\]]o~M hi li hi li ki li be tA li hU~M phaT/_nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom pa yis/_/rang gi lus ni bsrung bar bya/_/bdag gi yan lag brgyad po ru/_/thams cad bkod pas bsrung bya ste/_/lce la chu ni nyid dang ni/_/nam mkha' rna ba sna 
[\[190b.6\]]dag la/_/sa ni mig tu sbyar bar bya/_/de bzhin mi ni tshangs pa la/_/mgrin par rmongs pa'i ded dpon te/_/g.yo ba snying la gnas pa'o/_/nyon mongs thong ka kun tu'o/_/lte ba'i rtsa bar phyugs yin no/_/yan lag brgyad kyis bsrung ba 'di/_/lha rnams su ni 
[\[190b.7\]]shes byas la/_/ba dan gsum gyi phyag rgya yis/_/yan lag brgyad du gtugs te bsrung /_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid du/_/bdag nyid lus ni sprul byas te/_/kun+da zla ba ltar dkar zhing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/sems dpa'i skyil 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]krud phyag gnyis pa/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i bza' ma na bas/_/phyag na kha T+wA~M rdo rje ste/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu gsal/_/rang gi lus ni mnyam bzhag pas/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/de nas sa ni spyang bya ste/_/oM ha na ha na 
[\[191a.2\]]krod+ha hU~M phaT/_lag pa g.yas brkyang byas te/_/rdo rjer bsgoms nas sa la bsnun/_/sa sbyangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis khu tshur kha sbyar te/_/gud mo gnyis brkyang kun tu bstan/_/phyag rgya 'di ni dag khyed pa'o/_/o~M shrI swA hA/_mar sbyang 
[\[191a.3\]]ba'i sngags so/_/o~M a swA hA/_rdzas bkru ba'i sngags so/_/o~M dzriM swA hA/_'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ku ru ku ru swA hA/_zas mchog la sogs pa'i rdzas sbyang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M a swA hA/_ya ma shing sbyang ba'i sngags so/_/me dbus pad+ma bsams 
[\[191a.4\]]nas su/_/me yi lha ni dgug par bya/_/g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su/_/khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang /_/dbu ma'i chigs na gsum pa la/_/khro bo bsams te btsugs bas dgug_/o~M A ga ts+tsha A gats+tsa ag+ne dzaHswA hA/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ru/_/
[\[191a.5\]]thab khung dbus su bsgom par bya/_/bgrad phreng spyi blugs bu ram mdog_/ral pa'i thor tshugs ser skyar ldan/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bklubs/_/'od zer me ltar kun tu 'bar/_/me yi dbus su bsgom par bya/_/der ni ji ltar 'byor ba dang /_/dngos 
[\[191a.6\]]po lnga yis mchod nas su/_/me dbus me lha'i lca la ni/_/kun nas sreg blugs gsum gsum bya/_/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/_/pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/_/dbu ma kun tu brkyang bar bya/_/o~M dzu hu dzu hu ag+ne swA hA/_me'i snying po'i sngags dang phyag 
[\[191a.7\]]rgya'o/_/de nas 'bad pas se go la gsum/_/gtogs pas 'bar bar thim par bsgom/_/me yi gnas su kun rig pas/_/de nas sbyang ba brtsam par bya/_/o~M hU~M Ta Ti hU~M phaT/_rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag pa yis/_/me tog yungs kar chu yis ni/_/phyogs 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]kun tu ni gtor nas su/_/me yi nang du blugs par bya/_/sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M badzra prA kA ra hU~M phaT/_lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te/_/g.yas ba chur bstan rgyab sbyar nas/_/dbang ldan phyogs sogs bskor bar bya/_/ra ba'i sngags dang 
[\[191b.2\]]phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/_/phan tshun rtse mo reg par bya/_/o~M dzru~M swA hA/_rdo rje dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas su/_/mthe bong 'og tu brkyang par bya/_/o~M pru~M swA hA/_phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/nyi 
[\[191b.3\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/_/me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su/_/gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/_/rdo rje dbus su bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ste/_/kha dog dmar sogs bsam par bya/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/_/nyi ma'i 
[\[191b.4\]]dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje'i gzugs su bskyed nas su/_/rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/_/sbyor ba'i gdan la byung ba yis/_/las kyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/_/phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M rdo rje bsnams/_/thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[191b.5\]]gzugs ni bskyed nas su/_/rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/_/bdag gi lus ni gang yin la/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bstim par bya/_/me yi dbus su kun rig pas/_/sna tshogs dngos po mchod par bya/_/o~M ThaHThaHThaHswA hA/_dgang blugs kyi sngags so/_/
[\[191b.6\]]g.yas su dbyug pa bsam par bya/_/de bzhin g.yon du snod ni sbyang /_/o~M hU~M swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang pa dang /_/o~M pra tIts+tsha su gan+d+ha hU~M swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/brkyang ba de nyid kyi mthe bong 
[\[191b.7\]]dang khro bo sbyar ba dang /_o~M puSh+pa mA le hU~M swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/khu tshur de nyid las mthe bong brkyang ba dang /_o~M tik+Sh+Na dI pe hU~M swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las dbu ma 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bsgreng ba dang /_oM d+hU be shwa ri hU~M swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka brkyang ste mthe bong dang /_gung mo bskyod pa dang /_o~M ku ru ku ru ma hA pa liM hU~M swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag 
[\[192a.2\]]rgya'o/_/me yi kha yi nang du ni/_/lan re bzlas shing lan re bzhin/_/dbus su gong bu bsreg par bya/_/bdun las lhag ma kun bzung nas/_/dbus su gong bur na par ni/_/gong ma'i tshul gyis gnas pa ni/_/'bad de rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni/_lhag 
[\[192a.3\]]ma dag ni bsreg par bya/_/bsreg pa zin nas lha rnams ni/_bdag gi lus la thim par bsgom/_/dgang blugs kun la rdzogs pa ru/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas rdzogs par bya/_/snod ni mar gyis bkang nas su/_/me yi dbus su blugs nas kyang /_/drangs 
[\[192a.4\]]nas dbugs ni stongs 'gyur te/_/rang gi lus la thim par bya/_/de nas rang gi lus nyid du/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/dbus su me yi lha nyid ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas kyang /_/lhag ma lan gsum bsregs nas su/_/mchod de 
[\[192a.5\]]gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/bkra shis dbyangs ni blangs nas su/_/der ni phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/_/sbyin sreg las kyis phye ba gzhan/_/mdor bsdus rgyas pa min par bshad/_/sA lu 'bras dang so ba dang /_/ti la dkar po dang yungs kar dang /_/nas dang dUr ba'i 
[\[192a.6\]]sa bon bcas/_/mar dang 'o mar bsres nas su/_/sbrang rtsi bsres ba'i 'o thug ni/_/khyad par du ni bsreg par bya/_/'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/_/sor mo bcu bzhir ldan pa'i tshad/_/zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na/_/bsreg pa'i cho ga'i mchog yin no/_/til 
[\[192a.7\]]nag po dang ma sha dang /_/sA lu dmar po'i zan dang ni/_/dri dang gur gum 'o ma ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bsres ba dang /_/mar dang ldan pa'i 'o thug dag_/khyad par du ni bsreg par bya/_/'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/_/yam shing sor bcu'i tshad dang bcas/_/
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]gal te rgyas pa'i las 'dod na/_/sgrub pos khyad par bsreg par bya/_/til ni dmar dang gnag pa dang /_/nA ga ge sar pri yang ku/_/de bzhin ske tshe'u su dang /_/sbrang rtsi dang ni mar sar sbyar/_/thang shing dang ni n+ya gro dang /_/klu shing dang ni ba sha ka/_/yam 
[\[192b.2\]]shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa/_/chags pa'i las la mchog yin no/_/til nag po dang ma sha dang /_/pa la ta ka nag chen 'bras/_/tsha ba'i mar nag khrag dang ni/_/bsres pa yis ni byugs pa dang /_/lung tang shing dang skur po'i shing /_/ba lo ta ka ku li'i shing /_/
[\[192b.3\]]yam shing sor brgyad pa yi tshad/_/mngon spyod las la rab tu grags/_/yungs kar mon sran gre'u dang se'u/_/lam gyi rdul dang bsres pa dag_/khrag dang kha ba'i mar nag gis/_/de ni bsgo bar rab tu grags/_/gser shing dang ni ba sha ka'i/_/yam shing 
[\[192b.4\]]der ni bzung nas ni/_/de nyid las la bsreg bya ba/_/bskrad pa dag la rab tu grags/_/nya dang sha la sogs pa'i rdzas/_/bag phye 'bru rnams thams cad dag_/khrag dang sbrang rtsis bsgos pa dang /_/bya rog gi ni sgro dag dang /_/bya rog tshang gi shing pu dang /_/so shing 
[\[192b.5\]]'chos nas bor ba ste/_/'di dag bcing ba'i las rnams la/_/brtson dang ldan pas sbyor ba bya/_/de nas gzhan yang khyad par du/_/sbyin sreg mtshan nyid bshad par bya/_/zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi yis/_/bsgos pa yi shri ba la ni/_/byang chub shing gi yam 
[\[192b.6\]]shing la/_/lnga brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/_/de yi dbus su mnyam bzhag nas/_/smon lam btab ste khrus byas na/_/rgyal srid nyams pa'ang myur du ni/_/sa gsum rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/_/mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/_/lo ta'i yam shing me la ni/_/
[\[192b.7\]]brgya phrag brgya ru mngon bsregs na/_/shin tu myur bar dpal ldan 'gyur/_/bya ba gang dang gang bsams pa/_/de de thams cad 'dir 'grub 'gyur/_/de nas yongs gzung slob ma yi/_/mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya/_/yan lag thams cad yongs 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]su rdzogs/_/dul zhing spyod pa zhi ba dang /_/chos gsum la ni mngon par dad/_/theg pa che la rtag tu dga'/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/_/bzo dang sgyur rtsal thams cad mkhas/_/bsam gtan sbyor ba mngon par dga'/_/thos dang 
[\[193a.2\]]klog sogs gus dang bcas/_/dus rnams kun tu bla mar gus/_/sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la brtson/_/'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing /_/longs spyod la ni brten pa min/_/khro dang nga rgyal med pa dang /_/dang tshul ngan ma ni tshig rtsub min/_/sems can kun 
[\[193a.3\]]la smod pa dang /_/lha dang bla ma de bzhin te/_/gdug sems can dang ngang tshul can/_/rtag tu sdig pa'i blo dang ldan/_/'khyal pa dang ni tshig rtsub smra/_/'di lta bu dag spang bar bya/_/gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o//_//
[\[193a.4\]]nu yi sbyin sreg ji lta bu/_/lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/_/chu yi sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i/_/mtshan nyid dag ni ji ltar lags/_/chu sogs yang dag mtshan nyid rnams/_/nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/_/bla re dag ni bres nas su/_/sna tshogs gos 
[\[193a.5\]]rnams rab tu dbyangs/_/shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi par/_/kun tu dri yis byug par bya/_/dbus su chu yi snod sogs la/_/dri ni dkar pos byugs nas su/_/chu dang 'o mar bsres pa yis/_/snod ni mdzes par dag par bya/_/bum pa dag ni brgyad po yang /_/phyogs 
[\[193a.6\]]brgyad dag tu gzhag par bya/_/dri yi cu yis rab tu dgang /_/kha ni shing lo sar pas brgyan/_/bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/_/skad cig gis ni bskyed nas su/_/me tog bdug spos dri sogs pa'i/_/dngos pos bdag nyid mchod byas pa'i/_/de 'og 
[\[193a.7\]]phyi rol gzhag pa yis/_/chu yi las rnams sbyar bar bya/_/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/_/pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/_/oM ka ma le b+hi swA hA/_pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/_/pad+ma chu yi nang bkod la/_/gdugs 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/_/sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya/_/rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/_/sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung phyag gnyis ldan/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug 
[\[193b.2\]]pa bsnams/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/bzhad cing la sgeg dang bcas/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/dam tshig phyag rgya sogs bstan zhing /_/dam tshig sngags dang sbyar bar bya/_/lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcings/_/mdzub 
[\[193b.3\]]mo gnyis ni brkyang nas su/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud par bya/_/dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags/_/oM sa ma ye tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/_dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/shar gyi bum pa rdo rje ma/_/byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/_/nub tu ro langs ma 
[\[193b.4\]]yin te/_/lho phyogs su ni gtum mo gnas/_/seng ge zhes bya dbang ldan du/_/de bzhin me mtshams stag mo'o/_/bden bral na ni ce spyang mo/_/hU~M byed 'ug pa rlung gi phyogs/_/so so so sor mtshan ma dang /_/dam tshig phyag rgyar bstan par bya/_/rang gi 
[\[193b.5\]]gzugs kyi sku mdog ldan/_/sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'o/_/me tog bdug spos dri la sogs/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/_/g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/_/g.yas pas steng nas dbub par bya/_/rtsa 
[\[193b.6\]]ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags/_/oM dzruM hU~M swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/kun+da la sogs me tog dkar/_/rtse mor dUr ba btsugs nas su/_/lha mo'i dbu steng rdo rje yi/_/cod pan la ni gtor bar bya/_/gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su/_/lan 
[\[193b.7\]]re'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya/_/lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni/_/thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/_/dUr ba dang ni ldan pa yi/_/las ni khri phrag byas pa yis/_/khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags/_/nA ga puSh+pa'i ya ma shing gi/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]'o mar sbags te dbul bar bya/_/las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis/_/grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur/_/pad+ma yi ni yam shing rnams/_/khri phrag du ni bzlas nas su/_/las rnams kun la sbyar byas na/_/yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur/_/bri 
[\[194a.2\]]yang+ku dang bil ba dang /_/de bzhin ut+pal ku mu ta/_/rgyal po'i las la sogs sbyar nas/_/pha rol yul 'khor 'joms par 'gyur/_/sngags pas rtag tu skyong chu gtor/_/bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par 
[\[194a.3\]]phye ba gnyis pa'o//_//'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol mtshan nyid/_/nyon cig rdo rje rgyal chen po/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/_/dag dang ma dag rab tu spangs/_/dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs pas/_/gnyis med chos zhes bya ba ste/_/
[\[194a.4\]]gzugs stong thog mar mthar thug dang /_/dbu ma mnyam par gnas pa'o/_/dag dang ma dag dbu ma ni/_/'ba' zhig gis ni mnyam par blta/_/bsten dang bsten med dbu ma yi/_/mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba/_/lus ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/_/
[\[194a.5\]]ngag kyang mnyam par gnas nas su/_/mnyam nyid ye shes las byung bas/_/mnyam pa'i lta bas blta bar bya/_/mnyam pa'i lta ba ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/gnyis med chos zhes bgyi ba yi/_/bdag nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_/
[\[194a.6\]]gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid ni/_/ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/_/dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs la/_/ye shes can gyis gnyis med chos/_/rnal 'byor kun gyi 'og ma ru/_/dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/_/o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_
[\[194a.7\]]oM badzra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_o~M yo ga shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_bla med nyid du bya ba'i phyir/_/thal mo sbyar nas de dag brjod/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi/_/gnas dag tu ni brten nas su/_/bla re dag ni bre bar bya/_/sna tshogs gos 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ni dbyangs nas su/_/bdag rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya/_/g.yer ka drangs mdzes byas la/_/gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang /_/de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor bya/_/skad cig rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni/_/rang gi lus ni bsam par bya/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro 
[\[194b.2\]]bzung nas ni/_/bdag nyid mchod pas mnyes par bya/_/lag pa gan rkyal bzhag nas su/_/der ni rdo rje brtag par bya/_/gnas lnga dag tu bstim par bya/_/sa 'og tu ni spyang bar bya/_/phyag 'tshal 'joms pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/_/hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar bar 
[\[194b.3\]]bya/_/lhun po'i steng du bsam bya ba/_/kha dog bzhi sogs ldan pa yi/_/gser las byung ba'i grong khyer ni/_/rin chen bdun la sogs pas sngas/_/g.yer ka'i dra ba'i phreng ba can/_/mnyam zhing ji ltar 'dod pas dbyangs/_/phyag rgya kun gyi thog 
[\[194b.4\]]mar ni/_/dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing la/_/g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/_/g.yas pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/_/dam tshig phyag rgya shes par bya/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/_/ji ltar rdo rje 
[\[194b.5\]]dngos sa bon/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/_/de bzhin dam tshig bstan par bya/_/seng ge'i gdan ni rnam pa lnga/_/gnas ldan dag tu sbyar bar bya/_/nyi ma'i gdan ni bsams nas su/_/gdugs dkar po yis brgyan par bya/_/rang gi dbugs 
[\[194b.6\]]las byung ba yi/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus su bsam/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/_/sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/_/skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par bya/_/kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/_/sprul 
[\[194b.7\]]gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yi/_/zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum po/_/ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/_/na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes/_/kha T+wA~M gyen du bsgreng ba dang /_/gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/_/gsum 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa na ni rdo rje thogs/_/g.yon pas dril bu sgra sgrogs shing /_/gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de/_/gsum pas de bzhin ral gri 'phyar/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/_/dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya/_/ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs 
[\[195a.2\]]su/_/bdag gi chu las byung ba ste/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/skra grol ba ni rnam par bklubs/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/_/phyag na kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i 
[\[195a.3\]]na bzas bklubs/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/_/ye shes kyi ni byang gi char/_/bdag gi me las byung ba yi/_/kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/_/sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/_/skra grol bas ni shin tu brgyan/_/
[\[195a.4\]]sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/sku la na bza' mdzes pa man pas/_/phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/_/mkha' 'gro drag mo zhes bya bsgom/_/ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char/_/bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil 
[\[195a.5\]]krung can/_/kha dog dmar po kun tu 'ong /_/kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing /_/skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste/_/lus kun sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/mkha' 'gro ro langs 
[\[195a.6\]]ma bsgom bya/_/ye shes kyi ni lho yi char/_/sa yi ye shes las byung ba/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/_/kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/_/kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/_/skra grol bas 
[\[195a.7\]]ni shin tu mdzes/_/ha har rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes byar bsgom/_/bdag dngos lnga las byung ba yi/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga zhes bya/_/lnga po lnga ru bsgom par bya/_/gzugs 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]sogs shin tu mdzes pa yin/_/dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char/_/seng ge'i gdod ni bsam par bya/_/kha dog dkar zhing ser ba ste/_/glang po yi ni stan la bzhugs/_/rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub can/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/'od 
[\[195b.2\]]zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/_/'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/_/me mtshams stag mo zhes bya ba/_/rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs/_/phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/lag na lcags kyus brgyan pa 
[\[195b.3\]]ste/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/'bar ba' lus can bsgom par bya/_/bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo/_/ha ha bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad/_/ma hA yi ni gdan la bzhugs/_/mdog ni dmar zhing 
[\[195b.4\]]sngo ba ste/_/sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol/_/phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang /_/sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/_/rlung 
[\[195b.5\]]mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/_/kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste/_/klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs/_/rgyan du'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/_/sdigs mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba 
[\[195b.6\]]yi/_/'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/_/dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi/_/phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la/_/shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo/_/phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni stan la bzhugs/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis bklubs 
[\[195b.7\]]pa ste/_/shin tu drag cing skra grol pas/_/'od zer sna tshogs yang dag 'bar/_/lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni/_/ha har bzhad pas shin tu 'bar/_/byang na 'bar ma rgyal dbang mo/_/kha dog ser mo shin tu 'bar/_/spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]thal sbyar mar me lta bu 'bar/_/drag mo'i gzugs can tshig pa ste/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni stan la bzhugs/_/'od zer me ltar 'bar pa bsgom/_/nub kyi lha mo 'jib byed ma/_/kha dog dmar mo 'jigs 
[\[196a.2\]]byed can/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni stan la bzhugs/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i go bgos shing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]stan la kun tu gnon/_/lag tu skud pa dmar khyer zhing /_/thal mo sbyar te khrag 'thung ma/_/drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/_/lha mo 'jib byed rab tu grags/_/
[\[196a.3\]]ngag 'phrog ma ni lho phyogs su/_/kha dog nag mo mnyam pa'i 'od/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]stan la gnas pa yi/_/skra ni gyen du 'bar brgyan pa'i/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i dmar po'i gos/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/_/sdigs mdzub gtun shing lag na thogs/_/
[\[196a.4\]]rnam par rmongs ba'i sems can sgrol/_/drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/_/thams cad kun nas mkhas pas bsgom/_/de dag gi ni gzugs mdun du/_/dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya/_/rlung dang me yi bdun don la/_/rdo rje ma yi sa bon dbye/_/sgra dang 
[\[196a.5\]]thig le yang dag mnan/_/char ba'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/_/phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sa bon yin/_/dbyangs thog dang po'i sa bon ni/_/phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/_/shar phyogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/
[\[196a.6\]]sa bon du ni rab tu grags/_/dbyangs yig yi ge gnyis pa ni/_/phyag 'tshal sreg byed sbyar bar bya/_/'di ni byang gi phyogs gnas pa/_/mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sa bon yin/_/sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/_/dbyug pa glo ru gzhag par bya/_/phyag 'tshal dang po 
[\[196a.7\]]sreg byed mtha'/_/nub phyogs ro langs ma yi yin/_/sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/_/steng du thig le sbyin par bya/_/phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar sbyar pa/_/lho phyogs gtum pa mo yi yin/_/ma ning sa bon dang po ni/_/phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]sbyar/_/dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma'i/_/sa bon du ni rab tu grags/_/ma ning sa bon gnyis pa ni/_/phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/_/me mtshams lha mo stag mo yi/_/de kho na nyid sa bon bshad/_/de bzhin ma ning sa bon gsum/_/phyag 'tshal 
[\[196b.2\]]sreg byed mtha' dang spel/_/bden bral lha mo ce spyad ma/_/khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/_/ma ning yi ge bzhi pa la/_/phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/_/rlung mtshams hU~M byed 'ug pa mo'i/_/sa bon du ni rab tu sbyar/_sde chen dag ni lnga ba yi/_/yi ge 
[\[196b.3\]]dag ni gnyis pa bzung /_/sa bon rtsa bar sgra dang sbyar/_/phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'/_/shar gyi mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo'i/_/sa bon du ni shes par bya/_/sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/_/de bzhin yi ge gnyis pa gzung /_e dang thig ler sbyar 
[\[196b.4\]]bar bya/_/phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg byed mtha'/_/byang phyogs lha mo 'bar byed ma'i/_/sa bon yi ge sbyar bar bya/_/sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/_/yi ge gnyis pa bzung bar bya/_/o dang re pha thig ler bya/_/phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mthar/_/nub 
[\[196b.5\]]phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i/_/khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/_/sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/_/yi ge gnyis pa bzung nas su/_/re ba'i yi ge lcags kyu sbyar/_/phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar ba/_/lhor gnas lha mo 'phrog byed ma'i/_/sa bon du ni rab 
[\[196b.6\]]tu grags/_/khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su/_/dbu ma gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang /_/rtse mo phan sprad nas ni/_/ye shes lha mor bstan par bya/_/lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas su/_/dbu ma dag ni mthe bong sprad/_/cung zad cig ni bskyed 
[\[196b.7\]]par bya/_/shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan/_/khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su/_/mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang byas la/_/byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/_/rgya 'di drag mo la yang bstan/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su/_/mthe chung gnyis ni 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]brkyang bar byas/_/nub tu gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i/_/phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su/_/gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya/_/lho phyogs su ni bshad pa ste/_/de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/khro bo 
[\[197a.2\]]gnyis ni brkyang nas su/_/rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni/_/mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis thal mo khar bcug nas/_/phu zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya/_/shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa gnyis thal mo kha sbyar nas/_/spyi bo 
[\[197a.3\]]ru ni gzhag par bya/_/byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bstan par bya/_/phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su/_/kha ru gzhag ste hU~M zhes bya/_/nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i/_/phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya/_/lag gnyis kun tu bskor byas nas/_/
[\[197a.4\]]sor mo rnams kyi rtse mor sbyar/_/gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag nas kyang /_/lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la bstan/_/phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa yi/_/dbus su hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar/_/lag pa kun tu brkyang la sogs/_/dri sngags phyag rgyar rig par bya/_/bdud 
[\[197a.5\]]rtsi ro dang thig ler bcas/_/phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa mtha'/_/dri yi phyag rgya brkyang nas su/_/khro bo dang ni mthe bong sbyar/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/_/thams cad rig pas thams cad dbul/_/sde tshan dang bo'i dang po ni/_/phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg 
[\[197a.6\]]byed mtha'/_/phyag rgya de nyid sbyar nas su/_/dbu ma'i sor mo bsgreng bar bya/_/bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/_/lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/_/dgu mtha' yi ni sa bon gzung /_/phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/_/khu tshur bcings nas 
[\[197a.7\]]mthe bong bsgreng /_/mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/_/sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa gzung /_/sgra dang thig ler sbyar ba dang /_/phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/_/gtor ma'i phyag rgya dang ni sbyar/_/lag pa gnyis 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ni sbyar nas su/_/mthe bong gung mo sbyar bya ba/_/thams cad du ni skad cig bskyod/_/gtor ma'i sngags ni snga mar sbyar/_/gnyis med gtor ma snga ma bzhin/_/de nyid 'di yi mchod par bya/_/sngon du rdzas ni rnam pa lnga/_/sna tshogs pa yi lcags kyu dang /_/
[\[197b.2\]]dri dang med tog pa dug pa sogs/_/sngags dang phyag rgya phul nas kyang /_/phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/hU~M zhes pa yi glu blangs nas/_/rnal 'byor ma lus mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/_/rked pa'i 
[\[197b.3\]]mtshams su bzhag nas ni/_/yan lag gsum du hU~M gis bskyod/_/pi wang tshul du bsgreng pa dang /_/gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang /_/zangs dung tshul du 'bud pa dang /_/cang te'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang /_/dkrol ba'i tshul gyis dkrol ba dang /_/pa Ta 
[\[197b.4\]]ha ltar brdung ba dang /_/gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang /_/bsil g.yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang /_/bla re'i tshul du bres pa dang /_/ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang /_/gdugs kyi tshul du dbub pa dang /_/rdza rnga'i tshul 
[\[197b.5\]]du brdung ba dang /_/rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang /_/'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang /_/khro ba'i tshul du khro ba dang /_/sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang /_/'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang /_/mda' 'dren nu mar 'khyud pa dang /_/rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 
[\[197b.6\]]'tshal ba'i/_/phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste/_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyi/_/dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya/_/de nyid dbyangs su blangs nas su/_/hU~M zhes bya ba bdag gis sprul/_/hU~M gis glu ni blang par bya/_/rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis 
[\[197b.7\]]gzigs/_/yi ge'i dngos por rang bzhin stong par rol/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol dbu ma mkhyen/_/mi 'gyur dgra bcom lhag ma sems pa'o/_/gnyis sprod gnyis 'khyud chu yi bya ba can/_/gnyis med chos skyes thar pa'ang brnyes pa'o/_/bde bas 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]'khor mnan thar pa'ang btang ba'o/_/thams cad dngos kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams rol/_/rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen/_/gzugs mang sgyu mas sems can smin mdzad pa/_/rdo rje kun rtogs chos kyi rmongs pa gcod/_/rnal 
[\[198a.2\]]'byor ma rmongs snying chos tshogs la 'dud/_/rnal 'byor ma yi chos grol nges pa'i gtso la 'dud/_/sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/_/thams bdag skyes gcig dngos de la bstod phyag 'tshal/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 
[\[198a.3\]]rmongs gcod pa bstod phyag 'tshal/_/de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal/_/zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing /_glu dang bstod pas nye bar mchod par bya'o/_/bar bar du hU~M gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum 
[\[198a.4\]]gdab par bya'o/_/rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/_/snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya/_/oM swa b+hA ba sud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_g.yas pa pad+ma bsams nas 
[\[198a.5\]]su/_/g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang /_/pad+ma'i bskor bas bskor nas ni/_/phyag rgya chen po bsten par bya/_/oM ha ho hrIHswA hA/_phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs ba ru/_/lha rnams thams cad 
[\[198a.6\]]bsam par bya/_/'jig rten la sogs ye shes can/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/so sor dri yis mchod pa dang /_/so sor me tog gtor ba dang /_/so sor bdug pas bdug pa sogs/_/so sor sbyor bar dbul bar bya/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni 
[\[198a.7\]]bsres nas su/_/nya phyis la sogs dbul bar bya/_/ha zhes bya pas kha dog dbrog_/ho zhes bya bas dri gzhom ste/_/hrIHzhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de ltar mngon par brjod/_/rnam gsum lan gsum brjod nas su/_/lha gsum du ni 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]bsam par bya/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes gser gyi mdog_/dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/_/myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/_/lha gsum dbang phyug tu ni bsgom par bya/_/g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi/_/zla ba'i dbus su bdud rtsi 
[\[198b.2\]]yi/_/yi ge kun rig gug bskyed bcas/_/mthe bong sor mo sa nyid de/_/srin lag dag ni ri rab bo/_/bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis bdud rtsi yi/_/chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la/_/mthe bong 'thor 'thung so sor dbul/_/
[\[198b.3\]]de 'og rang gi dngos po yis/_/bdag nyid la ni bsam bya ba/_/rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten ni/_/rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya/_/lce rtse thig le steng du yang /_/blo dang ldan pas gnas gsum mchod/_/ltos shig shin tu mdzes pa'i chos/_/'di la 
[\[198b.4\]]rtog pa yod min thong /_/bram ze khyi dang gdol ba gsum/_/rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'/_/rnal 'byor pho mo'i 'khor lo la/_/tshigs bcad 'di yis sbyin par bya/_/pad+ma'i bskor ba sngon 'gro bas/_/sems ni shel ltar bsams nas su/_/
[\[198b.5\]]g.yas pa pad+ma'i gdan la ni/_/rdo rje rtse gsum bsgreng bar bya/_/'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i/_/rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/_/de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal/_/tshigs bcad 'di yis blang 
[\[198b.6\]]byas te/_/sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni/_/kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du/_/rnal 'byor pa yis kun tu sbyar/_/ji ltar bde bas kun zhes brjod/_/dmar po yi ni rdzas rnams kyis/_/maN+Dal gru gsum gsum du bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/_/
[\[198b.7\]]rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/mthe chung gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/_/g.yas pa cung zad bskum nas su/_/sbyar bas phyag rnams spyan drang ngo /_/oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti hU~M dzaHswA hA/_spyan dang ba'i sngags 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dang phyag rgya'o/_/me tog dmar po 'dug pa dang /_/dri dang mar me la sogs dbul/_/rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i snod la ni/_/nye ba'i longs spyod gtor mar ldan/_/sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs/_/bza' ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad la/_/bdud 
[\[199a.2\]]rtsi lnga dang bcas par dgod/_/g.yon gyi cha ru snod gzhag la/_/g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/_/oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri bo dang ni ri sul dang /_/grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/_/khyad par du ni khang stong dang /_/gdol ba snod dang thang dang 
[\[199a.3\]]ni/_/khyad par du ni tshul gnas/_/nag po drag po drag chen po/_/lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang /_/nag po gcigs dang mi sdug dang /_/rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/_/rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang /_/mi sdug ma dang u ma dang /_/
[\[199a.4\]]rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang /_/mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/_/nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/_/nag spom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/_/drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/_/'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/_/'jib byed grong gnas rnal 
[\[199a.5\]]'byor ma/_/drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/_/mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/_/thod phreng can dang kha T+wA~M ma/_/sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can/_/rdo rje bzhin gzhu can la/_/lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams ni/_/de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga/_/las 
[\[199a.6\]]kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/_/sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/_/de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/_/rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/_/rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/_/thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig_/
[\[199a.7\]]oM kak+ka D+Th+ha na/_bab+ban+d+ha na/_khakh+khad na/_sar+b+ba duSh+TAM ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a mu kas+ya shAn+tiM ku ru sU~M hU~M phaT dzaHswA hA/_bdud rtsi yis ni kha bgang nas/_/las kyi go 'phang mngon par bam/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms ste/_/las rnam 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]thams cad rjes su 'grub/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/oM tiSh+Tha hU~M b+hak+Sha b+hAk+Sha dzaHphaT swA hA/_ji bzhin las sbyor sngags sbyar nas/_/gtor ma'i las la sogs pa sbyar/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang /_/gsad 
[\[199b.2\]]bskrad dbye dang bcing ba la/_/phyi rol gtor ma de nyid kyis/_/gtor ma'i las la sogs pas sgrub/_/de nas mchod pa'i khyad par las/_/rung dang mi rung rnam par spang /_/lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa lnga/_/de nyid lnga ru bya ba ste/_/lcags kyu che la 
[\[199b.3\]]dgod pa ni/_/ye shes lhar ni 'dod pa ste/_/rdo rje lcags kyur mi bskyod pa/_/gnas kyi lcags kyur rin chen dbang /_/rgyal po'i lcags kyur don yod grub/_/g.yo ba'i lcags kyur 'od dpag med/_/lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa la/_/de nyid thams cad 
[\[199b.4\]]sbyar bar bya/_/gang zhig 'dod pas lha kun dang /_/rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya/_/'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing /_/longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya/_/rang 'dod thams cad de nyid de/_/mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya/_/de yi dbus su dpa' bo 
[\[199b.5\]]rnams/_/A li kA li sbyar bar bya/_/A li kA li rab sbyor gyis/_/lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/_/de yi dbus nas byung ba yi/_/bdud rtsi'i ro kun myang bar bya/_/rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag ma dag_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor du ni brtag_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i 
[\[199b.6\]]glu yis ni/_/bkra shis sgra yis dgang bar bya/_/lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa/_/kun 'khyud la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis sprod cing /_/sgyu ma lta bur sbyor bas shin tu brgyan/_/srid pa las sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang 'dod bkra 
[\[199b.7\]]shis sgra dang ni/_/hU~M hU~M brjod cing dril bu gsil/_/rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ni/_/snying ga'i gnas su rab gzhag la/_/ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir/_/smon lam dag ni gdab par bya/_/sems can thams cad nad med cing /_/sems can thams 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]cad bde gyur cig_/gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/_/sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad par shog_/ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la 
[\[200a.2\]]dgod/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/_/g.yon pa'i snying gar gzhag par bya/_/g.yas pas la brkyang nas ni/_/de yi 'og tu gshegs su gsol/_/oM At+ma tiSh+Tha hU~M swA hA/_de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni/_/bdag gi lus la bstim par bya/_/
[\[200a.3\]]skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya/_/oM sar+b+ba duSh+TaM graMh+tA gats+tsha hU~M phaT/_se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yis/_/phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol/_/gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum 
[\[200a.4\]]pa'o//_//bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang /_/gang gis lcags kyu lnga po brlabs/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par rtog_/gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos/_/gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar spang /_/A li kA li ji ltar lags/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[200a.5\]]bstan bcos tshul rnams ni/_/phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/_/lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug_/reg na dro ba me yin te/_/du ba ltar 
[\[200a.6\]]snang rlung yin no/_/sla ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya/_/gzugs su snang bas yin no/_/ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje'o/_/lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya/_/ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/zad par bya ba me nyid dang /_/de bzhin rtag tu rlung dang ni/_/dad pa mtshungs 
[\[200a.7\]]don sa dbang po/_/ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga/_/sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/_/de yi dbus su zla ba yi/_/dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o/_/lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i/_/rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis/_/des ni gti mug 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bsrings pa yin/_/phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po/_/me yis btsos nas spyangs pa ltar/_/lha sogs me yis btsos nas ni/_/lhag ma bshang dang gci ba yin/_/me yis btsos nas sbyang me yi/_/dbus su sbyin sreg rtag tu dbul/_/rdo rje chu yi 
[\[200b.2\]]sa bon ni/_/sa bon babs pas bzlas nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su nyi ma la/_/dur khrod yi ge bsams nas sreg_/dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/_/de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug_/dri 
[\[200b.3\]]chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/_/myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/_/lha gsum rnam gsum du ni shes par bya/_/ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog_/ho zhes pa yis dri gzhom ste/_/hrIHzhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de ltar mngon par brjod/_/
[\[200b.4\]]bdud rtsi cu zhes bya ba ste/_/lta ni rnam pa gsum du grags/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/_/de phyir rmongs pa ring du spong /_/A li bung ba zhes brjod de/_/bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin/_/A li nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/_/chos 
[\[200b.5\]]kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can/_/lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o/_/bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/_/dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams/_/de yi dbus nas drangs nas su/_/A li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur/_/'jigs byed rdo rje 
[\[200b.6\]]sgra yis te/_/sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin/_/rlung dang me yi bdun don la/_/rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar/_/sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/_/char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/_/dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/_/de yi dbus su gzung bar bya/_/
[\[200b.7\]]dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/_/de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/_/kA li me tog kun tu mnan/_/rdo rje can gyi lus me tog_/'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste/_/sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya/_/ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir/_/de bzhin shes rab chu 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]srin nya/_/gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni/_/thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te/_/ban+du ka ltar kha phye ba'i/_/sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ger gnas/_/kA li bdud rtsi de nyid ni/_/me tog chu yis de bzhin bskor/_/yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le 
[\[201a.2\]]dang /_/rtsa bar sgra ni yang dang sbyar/_/yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum/_/zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/_/bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis/_/dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/_/de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong /_/
[\[201a.3\]]A laM bung ba zhes byar brjod/_/kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/_/lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag_/bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog_/sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/_/yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba/_/dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can/_/lu gu rgyud kyis dkri 
[\[201a.4\]]par bya/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis/_/lus can bdag nyid pa kru bar bya/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang /_/gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing /_/dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par/_/bdud rtsi sbyor ba kun shes 
[\[201a.5\]]pas/_/rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya/_/bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon/_/gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis/_/myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni/_/rigs la 'gran dang reg 'gro dang /_/
[\[201a.6\]]lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas/_/shel dang 'dra bas longs spyad bya/_/rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni/_/de yi sa bon gzung bar bya/_/shel gyi sems kyis longs spyod na/_/rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur/_/dag pa'i sems kyis bza' 
[\[201a.7\]]bar bya/_/bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te/_/de yi yan gal la sbyar ba/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/_/lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya/_/gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni/_/gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid/_/rab tu sbyang nas bsams nas su/_/
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]rnam par rtog pa ring du spang /_/rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa/_/thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba/_/rnal 'byor pa yis dzriM zhes pa/_/dag pa'i shel ltar bsam par bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas/_/rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste/_/sri zhes 
[\[201b.2\]]bya ba bkod de bza'/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo /_/bcu bzhi ba dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang /_/khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin/_/sgrub bos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/_/rtag tu 
[\[201b.3\]]mchod pa'i las byas na/_/spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang /_/las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang /_/myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_/mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar/_/'thong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 
[\[201b.4\]]'gyur/_/dbul po nor gyis phongs pa yang /_/khyim ni 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa/_/bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_/dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi/_/rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la/_/yi ge bcu yi sngags dag ni/_/phyag 
[\[201b.5\]]'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te/_/mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin brlabs la/_/sgrub po sa 'di yi du bas 'dug_/'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/_/gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi/_/rdzas bcud phan tshun 
[\[201b.6\]]ldan pa yi/_/rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya/_/skyes bu 'gro la skal bzang 'gyur/_/tsan+dan dang ni sbyar ba yi/_/rdzas bcud dag ni ldan pa yi/_/yan lag dag ni byugs nas su/_/rig na shi yang mi gtong ngo /_/dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi/_/
[\[201b.7\]]rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru/_/bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na/_/dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/_/sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang /_/mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas/_/de dag las su sbyar bar bya/_/ngas bstan pa la 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]the tshom med/_/gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni/_/thig le byas na go char 'gyur/_/de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir/_/'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma/_/sems can rnams la sdug par 
[\[202a.2\]]lta/_/bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed ma/_/de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes/_/thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma/_/mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can/_/skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma/_/kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni/_/blo ngan srid pa'i 
[\[202a.3\]]ngo bo 'joms/_/lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni/_/yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grags ma/_/yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid/_/lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni/_/spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol/_/de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/
[\[202a.4\]]pho nya'i las kyi bya ba yis/_/grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni/_/bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/_/pho nya'i las su sbyar ba yis/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/las rnams kun gyi snying po bas/_/rab tu 
[\[202a.5\]]'bad de pho nya bsgrub/_/shing gcig gi ni drung dag tu/_/cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas/_/khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi/_/thang ga la ni bri bya ste/_/mtheb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni/_/kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/_/phyag gnyis mgo bor thal 
[\[202a.6\]]sbyar ba'i/_/'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri/_/sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su/_/'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam/_/dri dang me tog dmar po dang /_/sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/_/sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/_/nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin/_/rdzas 
[\[202a.7\]]lnga dag ni dngos po lnga/_/mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas/_/dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/_/gnyis pa la ni nya dri bsnam/_/gsum par shing ni 'gul 'gyur te/_/bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/_/de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang /_/dam tshig phyag 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rgya bstan par bya/_/oM dI pe shwa ri hU~M phuH/_lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/_/spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya/_/dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/_/dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/_/'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/_/lag 
[\[202b.2\]]pa g.yon pas bzung nas su/_/rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pas/_/byin gyis rlobs la bdag sgrubs shig_/de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas/_/bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang /_/gser la sogs pa ci yang rung /_/bka' bzhin myur du ster 
[\[202b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad/_/'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/gal te grub par ma gyur na/_/de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla/_/sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis/_/'bar phyed ma yi spyi bo 'gems/_/sems can don 'bad sgrub pa 
[\[202b.4\]]bos/_/'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya/_/grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la/_/mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te/_/de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya/_/dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes/_/
[\[202b.5\]]phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/_/phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams/_/skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/_/'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/_/mig g.yon ha har bzhad pa bri/_/dur khrod kyi 
[\[202b.6\]]ni sa phyogs su/_/sgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram/_/kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni/_/me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod/_/me tog dri dang bdug pa dang /_/sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/_/bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/_/nye bar spyod pa'i 
[\[202b.7\]]gtor sbyin cing /_/rnal 'byor bsgom pas bzlas nas ni/_/'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/_/lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su/_/kha ru bcug nas bgad par bya/_/oM DA ki nI hU~M phruM phuH/_sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/dang po 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/_/gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs/_/gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas/_/bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/_/dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/_/g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis/_/ci 
[\[203a.2\]]'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/_/dgra rnams bsad cing gtse ba dang /_/yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/_/las la sogs pa thams cad ni/_/g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/_/gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na/_/rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/_/sngon du 
[\[203a.3\]]bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/mkhas pas gzir par byas te bzla/_/ra dag gi ni pags pa la/_/'bad de thang ga brkyang bar bya/_/'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug_/kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/_/lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/mdzes pa'i gos ni 
[\[203a.4\]]gyon pa bri/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang /_/g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/_/lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/_/lci ba yis ni byug byas la/_/me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/_/me tog bdug pa mar 
[\[203a.5\]]me sogs/_/'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/_/khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong /_/bza' bdag dang sna tshogs dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin/_/'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla/_/oM tsu ShI ni A kar+Sha ya phuHphaT/_lag gnyis mnyam 
[\[203a.6\]]par byas nas ni/_/snyim pa'i tshul gyis bar bskyod bya/_/snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/_/'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/dang po khyi ni dur ba'i sgra/_/gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod/_/gsum pa 
[\[203a.7\]]la ni mtshon thogs nas/_/bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/_/bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/_/bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/_/dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/dbul 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bo bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/_/de nyi ma re re bzhin/_/gser phrang phyed ster bar 'gyur/_/gal te 'bum gyis ma 'grub na/_/ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla/_/sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/_/'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so/_/chu 
[\[203b.2\]]'gram gyi nis phyogs su/_/ka ma po tsi ni bsgrub par bya/_/ba lang la sogs ko ba ni/_/brkyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru gzhug_/lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste/_/kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/_/skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/_/gos dmar bgos 
[\[203b.3\]]shing phyag gnyis mdzes/_/ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/_/ha har bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa/_/khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/_/dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug_/rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/_/
[\[203b.4\]]nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/_/rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom zhing bzlas/_/'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs/_/
[\[203b.5\]]mdun du rdo rje'i sgra 'byin cing /_/gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/_/bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/_/dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/_/oM k+ShaM kruM phraM phuHphaT/_lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/_/de yi sngags ni 
[\[203b.6\]]brjod par bya/_/snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni/_/ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur/_/ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/_/rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/_/slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang /_/rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang 
[\[203b.7\]]rung /_/ba 'dod pa de khrid de shog_/gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs/_/bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong /_/lha mi'i chung ma gang yang rung /_/ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/_/
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bstan pa'i las kyis ma 'grub na/_/las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/_/bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/_/de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/_/mnan te lnga brgya bzlas nas ni/_/gdon 
[\[204a.2\]]mi zab rab grub par 'gyur/_/gal te des kyang ma 'grub na/_/dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni/_/dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/_/kriM zhes bya dang gsod pa mtha'/_/hU~M gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis/_/thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/_/des 
[\[204a.3\]]ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/_/thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang /_/gal te ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bstan pa'i las kyis ma 'grub na/_/b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing /_/me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni/_/khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/_/
[\[204a.4\]]nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes ni/_/brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na/_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ba'am/_/cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su/_/nges par las rnams sgrub byed par/_/ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/_/khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste/_/
[\[204a.5\]]khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong /_/nor bu rin chen gces bcings ba'i/_/dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/_/bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/_/dpa' bos gnang gis gtang du gsol/_/rnal 'byor ma yi tshoms dbus su/_/bzang po sgo 'di phye ste 
[\[204a.6\]]thong /_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che/_/gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba/_/ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 
[\[204a.7\]]'byor pa/_/g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/_/sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/_/thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/_/g+ho g+hu/_'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yi/_/gu g+hu/_mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa yi/_/'jib byed ma 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]yi mtshan ma'o/_/mug+hu/_lag pa rna bar brde bas pa ni/_/blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/_/lu g+hu/_sna rtser skyor mo brdabs pa ni/_/thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/_/DaSh+Ta/_sha ba'i mgo ltar stod byed pa/_/rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/
[\[204b.2\]]gan+d+ho de/_gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa/_/nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/_/ag+ne da ha/_so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/_/lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/_b+hak+Sha so/_lag pa skra la 'ju byed pa/_/khyod kyi khyim du bas phyin pa'o/_/dwe ra ti/_/
[\[204b.3\]]lag pa snying gar reg byed na/_/da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/_/ru tsa Ta ba ta/_sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/_/med do zhes ni ston pa'o/_/shUn+ya tA/_lag pa brkyang ste ltor brdebs na/_/phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o/_/bip+d+ha ka si Da/_lte ba ru 
[\[204b.4\]]ni nyid byed na/_/kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o/_/tsaN+Da li ka_/mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/_/zhe ga nag gtum la drag pa yin/_/nI la da N+Da pa ta/_smin ma la ni reg byed na/_/'dir 'dod pa ni nga la ston/_/a naM gA yud+d+ha/_lce ni 'dril bar 
[\[204b.5\]]byed pa dag_/da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/_/dur+k+ka ti/_kun tu lta bar byed pa ni/_/tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/_/tA ra ga NaH/_tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/_/mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/_/nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/_/sngar bstan bzhin du 
[\[204b.6\]]mdun du reg_/gi ri to/_steng du lta bar byed pa ni/_/nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o/_/sa mats+tsha yA/_'dzum dang bcas pas lta byed cing /_/lag pa lag pas bzung nas su/_/rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byin zhes bya ba'o/_/dzIM N+Na ba ta/_
[\[204b.7\]]lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/_/sa l+ya bad/_mthe bong gis ni rin lag la/_/reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/so ma/_mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs/_/su r+ya bad/_rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]dang brda'i mtshan nyid do/_/gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o//_//mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu/_/shes nas ji ltar sbyar 
[\[205a.2\]]bar bgyi/_/'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid ni/_/yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/dang po de nyid rdo rje ni/_/dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o/_/bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste/_/ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi ba'o/_/de nyid bzhi yi dpa' rlabs kyis/_/ji ltar 
[\[205a.3\]]'dod bzhin pha rol sgrol/_/dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad/_/thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa/_/lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung /_/nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod/_/byang gi phyogs su don yod grub/_/rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so/_/pad+ma byang chub 
[\[205a.4\]]yan lag brgyad/_/ji bzhin sa ru gzhag par bya/_/phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang /_/nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang /_/gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gi dpal/_/sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_/lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/_/shar la sogs par ji bzhin 
[\[205a.5\]]bsam/_/dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru/_/ye shes lha ni thim par bya/_/pad+ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/_/ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du/_/zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste/_/de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag_/de bzhin 
[\[205a.6\]]phyogs bzhir rol pa yin/_/mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba/_/skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang /_/rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can de/_/gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ste/_/mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod/_/rtse mo lnga 
[\[205a.7\]]ni mkha' 'gro ma/_/snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya/_/shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/byang du drag mo zhes bya ste/_/nub tu de bzhin ro langs ma/_/lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas/_/dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/_/rdo rje de kho na yi lha/_/mkhas pa 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]yis ni shes par bya/_/cha gsum gsal bar gzung ba la/_/ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan/_/ut+pal ku mud ltar mdzes/_/rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas/_/phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni/_/dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu/_/rtse mo dgu 
[\[205b.2\]]yi lha nyid de/_/lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/_/chu srin las ni byung ba ni/_/rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas/_/rtse mo dgu ba zhes bya ba/_/ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol/_/rdo rje de nyid gang yin pas/_/bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[205b.3\]]snying po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje yi ni sems su bya/_/rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas/_/chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med/_/thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin/_/rdo rje las kyi snying po'o/_/rdo rje 'pho ba sbyor ba'i bdag_/rdo rje 'khor bsgrol par byed/_/rdo rje
