[\[205b.4\]]'gugs pa sbyor ba'i bdag_/rdo rje bcings ba'i sbyor bar ldan/_/bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan/_/rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni/_/ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su/_/phyogs kun tu ni snang bar byed/_/rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun/_/rdo rje'i bdag 
[\[205b.5\]]nyid pa lta bar bya/_/chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste/_/thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o/_/rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas ni/_/de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams/_/nyon cig rdo rje 
[\[205b.6\]]'dzin rgyal po/_/shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni/_/thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par/_/byang chub snying por rnam par gnas/_/thams cad rigs pas phyogs kun tu/_/gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams 
[\[205b.7\]]mthar thug_/phyogs brgyad zhes ni bya ba rnams/_/lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni/_/phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya/_/shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/_/byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo/_/nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan/_/mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang /_/bzhi ba rdo rje phreng ba mo/_/dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/_/gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes/_/pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung /_/
[\[206a.2\]]gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni/_/shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/_/shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dag la/_/de yi dbus kyi stan dag la/_/shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/_/gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas/_/steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams/_/snga 
[\[206a.3\]]ma bzhin du bsam par bya/_/dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste/_/thams cad sprod dang bsdud pa po'o/_/A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis/_/phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya/_/A li kA li'i rab sbyor bas/_/'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste/_/rdo rje dril bu'i thabs 
[\[206a.4\]]yin te/_/thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so/_/g.yas bar nyi ma bsams nas su/_/g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod/_/lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/_/pad+ma'i rnam pa lag tu bskor/_/lus rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar/_/rang 'dod lha rnams bsam 
[\[206a.5\]]par bya/_/rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste/_/'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung /_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya/_/rdo rje gsor bas mdzes pa yis/_/sems can thams cad mdzes par bya/_/rnam thar chos su bya ba ste/_/
[\[206a.6\]]rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog_/oM badzra gaN+De ho hU~M/_oM badzra d+harmA ra Ni ta/_pra ra Ni ta/_saM prar Ni ta/_sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+Shi tra pra tsA li te/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi hA nA dA swa b+hA ba na/_badzra d+harma hr-i da ya a ba san+to ShaNi/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ho ho ho/_a a a swA hA/_shes rab 
[\[206a.7\]]thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/_/shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya/_/shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni/_/'gro ba rnams kyis rtags bya'am/_/mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/_/sems can don phyir dkrol bar bya/_/rdo rje de kho na yis bzung /_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/_/sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas/_/shes rab thabs su blta bar bya/_/de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang mtshungs/_/rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi/_/dngos grub ring bar shes par bya/_/de nas gsang 
[\[206b.2\]]dang phra ba yi/_/rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung ba ste/_/yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa/_/dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya/_/de nyid kyi ni cha gcig gis/_/phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag_/spyi gtsug lag 
[\[206b.3\]]pa la sogs pa/_/rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcang /_/slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin/_/'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog_/bgrang phreng la sogs gzung ba ni/_/yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni 
[\[206b.4\]]the tshom med/_/shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang /_/gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs/_/zhi sogs las la khyad par gyi/_/bgrang phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni/_/gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang /_/pad+ma sa bon khyad par du/_/rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng ste/_/
[\[206b.5\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya/_/gur kum la sogs dri zhim pa'i/_/dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las/_/ril bur byas te dmar por btsos/_/dbang du sdud par rab tu grags/_/rudwAk+Sha dang lung tang dang /_/mi yi rus pa de bzhin te/_/drag po'i 
[\[206b.6\]]las la sbyar bar bya/_/mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la/_/bu tra dzi ni las kun bya/_/sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste/_/dbang la de yi phyed du bya/_/zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te/_/rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o/_/mngon 
[\[206b.7\]]spyo la ni drug cu'o/_/las kyi bya brag gis ni sbyar/_/las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du/_/bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/_/dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu/_/lha dgu yi ni skud pa la/_/lha dgus byin gyis 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]brlab par bya/_/gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang /_/gtsang zhing dang ldan snyan par smra/_/de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis/_/grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/_/skud pa rnams ni sangs rgyas tshul/_/ril bu rnams ni dgra 
[\[207a.2\]]bcom yin/_/'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan/_/steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no/_/mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o/_/lag bar nyi ma bsams nas su/_/dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni/_/lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu/_/dmar po la ni dmar po bsgos/_/
[\[207a.3\]]g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/_/g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam/_/g.yon pa pad+ma'i 'dab mar bsgom/_/rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis/_/kha sbyor dbus 
[\[207a.4\]]su phreng bzhag la/_/de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis/_/bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya/_/sor mo dag gi bye brag gis/_/de nas sngags pas bzlas ba bya/_/rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste/_/g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o/_/dkar po dud pa dung dang ni/_/
[\[207a.5\]]pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste/_/gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang /_/sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang /_/ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis/_/lag la sogs pa'i las can ma/_/zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang /_/rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste/_/srin lag 
[\[207a.6\]]la ni dbang du bstan/_/tha mas mngon par spyod pa ste/_/mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni/_/lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin/_/mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de nyid me pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/de nyid med pa'i 
[\[207a.7\]]sngags bzlas dang /_/de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril/_/phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba/_/rnal 'byor pa yis grub pa med/_/rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni/_/de nyid thams cad kun bya'o/_/yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos/_/sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rang bzhin med pa'i grangs bzlas na/_/rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub/_/bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs gcig_/rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub/_/oM pa de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+hA be/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ho ho ho/_AHswA hA/_sngags 'di yis 
[\[207b.2\]]ni sbyang byas na/_/bgrang phreng gi ni lha rnams 'grub/_/las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/_/mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur/_/ye shes de dag bye brag dag_/yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon/_/ye shes bye brag ring du gnas/_/thun mong ye shes brjod 
[\[207b.3\]]pa ste/_/dman dang rab dman dman pa can/_/gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/_/klu dang byol song gsang ba pa/_/lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci/_/mi dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mkha' 'gro ma/_/dmyal bar 'tshang ba'i sems can dang /_/byol song gzugs su brjod pa 
[\[207b.4\]]ste/_/phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus/_/chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/_/de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/_/brtan pa de nyid thams cad dang /_/rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang /_/bong ba rdo dang brag la sogs/_/thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs/_/ye shes med na skye mi 
[\[207b.5\]]'gyur/_/ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o/_/ye shes thar par gang gis ni/_/ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/_/bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu/_/lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi 
[\[207b.6\]]gnas/_/gong nas gong du gnyis 'gyur te/_/'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag_/gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel/_/gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste/_/lha min ye shes khro bo'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ye shes zhen pa ste/_/dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing 
[\[207b.7\]]du/_/byol song ye shes glen pa ste/_/brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/_/mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga/_/bye brag tu ni shes par bya/_/glen pas sgribs dang lkugs pa dang /_/bud med ye shes slu brid do/_/byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]ye shes de nyid bye brag dag_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis spyangs pa/_/skye ba bye ba stong phrag du/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas/_/'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/_/sgra sgrogs phyi rol 
[\[208a.2\]]bstan bcos ni/_/gar gi gnas dang mtshungs pa ste/_/blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis/_/spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob/_/snying po snying po bstan bcos te/_/rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye 
[\[208a.3\]]ba dang po'o//_//'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang /_/bsrung dang mngon par spyod pa dang /_/re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni/_/phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya/_/'khor lo las 
[\[208a.4\]]kyi kha dog gis/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_sa bon de dag thams cad ni/_/phyag 'tshal tham dbus su bya/_/dbus su ming dang bsrung ba yis/_/tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[208a.5\]]chus/_/bdag gi las ni bkru bar bya/_/mnyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas/_/srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/_/ye shes can gyis bsrung bsgoms na/_/'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur/_/sems can dngos po med pa ru/_/sbyor ba'i dngos 
[\[208a.6\]]pos 'jigs pa la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya/_/sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgoms pa yis/_/bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul/_/oM tA re swA hA/_mgo la'o/_/oM tut+tA re swA hA/_mig la'o/_/oM tu re swA hA/_
[\[208a.7\]]sna la'o/_/oM tu swA hA/_rna ba la'o/_/oM re swA hA/_lce la'o/_/oM tA re ni swA hA/_snying gar ro/_/yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod/_/'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan rnams thams cad 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]kyis ni bklubs/_/kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang /_/gzhan gyi rna drung ut+pal bsnams/_/thams cad 'od zer rnam bsgoms nas/_/khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya/_/thams cad yon tan can du bsgom/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_srung ba'i las 
[\[208b.2\]]thams cad kyi sngags so/_/rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang /_/nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang /_/yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni/_/chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs/_/gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas/_/de dang der ni bsam par bya/_/shes rab 
[\[208b.3\]]zhen dang le lo sogs/_/'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya/_/srung ba bzang po 'di yis ni/_/'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni/_/de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/_/'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa la/_/phyi rol mu 
[\[208b.4\]]khyud bskor nas su/_/dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/_/bzlas pa thams cad gzhag par bya/_/mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su/_/'khor lo dkar bo bsam par bya/_/yan lag thams cad phye ba yis/_/mnyam nyid stong bar bsams nas su/_/sngon gyi 
[\[208b.5\]]mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/_/sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya/_/'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom pa yis/_/las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur/_/oM pradz+nye pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hU~M swA hA/_'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bas su/_/dngos po bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_/zla 
[\[208b.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/_/shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su/_/sa bon 'di 
[\[208b.7\]]ni bzlas byas nas/_/shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/glen dang snyom las blun po yang /_/sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel/_/snying po re'u mig dgu ru bya/_/de bzhin bar ma bcu gnyis te/_/phyi rol re'u mig bcu drug go/_/mthar thug mu khyud de 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bzhin te/_/phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i/_/dbus su bdag gi sems gzhag la/_/sgra dang thig le ldan pa yis/_/yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod/_/bcu gnyis po la dbyangs sa bon/_/ma ning spangs pa dri bar bya/_/sde tshan 
[\[209a.2\]]gsum gyi yi ge rnams/_/yi ge lhag ma gcig dang bcas/_/sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag_/bcu drug gnas su gzhag par bya/_/gsod pa'i yi ge khyud la/_/thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor/_/dang po dkar po rabs ma bya ste/_/gnyis pa ser por bsgom 
[\[209a.3\]]par bya/_/gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste/_/de bzhin bzhi ba sngon po'o/_/sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/_/mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas/_/mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su/_/'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/_/mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms 
[\[209a.4\]]pa yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste/_/me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni/_/bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed/_/ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis/_/kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang /_/sangs 
[\[209a.5\]]rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su/_/bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgom byas la/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de yi dbus su sa bon ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste/_/sde 
[\[209a.6\]]tshan dang po gang yin pa'i/_/yi ge dang po bzung nas su/_/lcags kyu yis ni gzir bya ba/_/rtsa bar re pa sbyar bya ba/_/bdud rtsi'i thig le steng du dgod/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag 
[\[209a.7\]]pa bsgom/_/rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_/yid can gyis ni bsam par bya/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang /_/rtsa bar sga ni sbyar bar bya/_/bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/_/'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du sdud/_/bu mo rnams kyis gang bsams 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]pa/_/ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni/_/bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni/_/sngar bzhin du ni stong pa nyid/_/thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[209b.2\]]dbus gnas par/_/bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas/_/'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro/_/'od zer ser po shin tu mdzes/_/gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsam/_/rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa/_/thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug_/sgrub pa po 
[\[209b.3\]]yi lus la ni/_/de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i/_/lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya/_/kha dog la sogs dmar bsams shing /_/gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por bsgom/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/
[\[209b.4\]]ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya/_/gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni/_/yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya/_/lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yis/_/mdzub mo lcags 
[\[209b.5\]]kyu bskyod par bya/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang /_/rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/_/bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/_/'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub/_/de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas nas su/_/sor mo yang ni bskyod byas na/_/bsgrub bya'i yid ni 
[\[209b.6\]]bskyed 'gyur bar/_/'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/'khor lo 'dab ma med pa la/_/mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/_/mu khyud mkhas pas bskor bar bya/_/sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa/_/yi ge gsum 
[\[209b.7\]]pa bzung nas su/_/i dang re pha sbyar nas su/_/'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas kyang /_/ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di/_/sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la/_/'dab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya/_/'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pas/_/'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas/_/gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/_/sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru/_/sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/_/de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi/_/gzugs su bdag nyid bskyad par bya/_/gzugs 
[\[210a.2\]]mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin/_/g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams/_/dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' sbyar te/_/de ltar bsgom 
[\[210a.3\]]zhing bzlas pa yis/_/rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis/_/rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin/_/bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu/_/rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no/_/bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/_/stong pa'i 
[\[210a.4\]]de nyid bsgoms nas su/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom/_/'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/dbus su sa bon bsgoms 
[\[210a.5\]]nas su/_/phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la/_/dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya/_/phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi/_/gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya/_/mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang /_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[210a.6\]]rdzogs pa ni/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can/_/rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste/_/rang gi lus la bsgom par bya/_/gang 'dod yid ni rtog bya'i phyir/_/de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya/_/'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par 
[\[210a.7\]]bya/_/rmugs dang glen dang snyom las dang /_/shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams/_/rnal 'byor ba yis skad cig la/_/snyom las la sogs ring du spong /_/mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su/_/rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya/_/phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]ni/_/thams cad rim pas kun snang bya/_/ye shes sems la bltas nas ni/_/rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur/_/sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su/_/mnyam gzhag 'khor lor blta bar bya/_/mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis/_/'khor 
[\[210b.2\]]ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes sa bon gyis sprul te/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis/_/kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs 
[\[210b.3\]]pa ste/_/phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/_/snying ga'i phyogs su 'tsher bar mdzad/_/kha dog dkar po mdzes pa yi/_/'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro/_/spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas/_/sems can khams 
[\[210b.4\]]ni sgrol bar mdzad/_/shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba/_/dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/_/mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya/_/phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/_/sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su/_/mnyam gzhag dngos por bzlas nas ni/_/byang chub 
[\[210b.5\]]rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o//_//byin brlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag_/gang gis sems can rnams la bstan/_/byin brlabs rim pa ji lta bu/_/lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/_/
[\[210b.6\]]sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir/_/byin gyis rlob pa'i chos bstan pa/_/yang dag 'khor bsgrol ba yi/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/snying gar zla ba bsam ma nas su/_/hU~M gi sa bon dbus su bsam/_/'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/_/nyi 
[\[210b.7\]]ma'i dbus su gzhag par bya/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis/_/kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su/_/sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi/_/dang po stong 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]pa nyid du bya/_/me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya/_/dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/_/gya gyu phyag na rdo rje ste/_/lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no/_/mgo dang bum pa byams pa ste/_/steng du 
[\[211a.2\]]'bar ba'i ma yig ni/_/'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba po/_/'jig rten gsum gyi grub 'dod na/_/sa bon de ni bsgom par bya/_/pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du/_/bdag nyid ye shes 
[\[211a.3\]]kyis bsrung ba/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/_/steng gi rdo rje cod pan la/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/'od 
[\[211a.4\]]zer sna tshogs 'bar ba du/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/_/rdo rje dbyug pa gug skyed bcas/_/lu gu rgyud la sogs pas dkri/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/_/'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas 
[\[211a.5\]]su/_/gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/_/de yi 'og tu las rnams bya/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/_/cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya/_/de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur/_/babs nas rnal 'byor ba yis ni/_/
[\[211a.6\]]rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya/_/rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod/_/zhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol/_/skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral/_/glu 'di yis ni gar byed de/_/rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/_/oM tiSh+Tha yo ga 
[\[211a.7\]]ma hA krod+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_'di ni tshi ma bya thams cad bya/_/rnal 'byor ma kun bstan par bya/_/dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la/_/de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya/_/oM yo ga A be sha ya/_shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/_/'di yis sngon du 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]bsnyen par bya/_/gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang /_/hU~M gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis/_/sgrub ba po yis 'dis gdab bya/_/sngar gyi smos pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/_/oM ma na g+hu ru 
[\[211b.2\]]g+hu ru/_d+h+ri sti tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phaT/_rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na/_/bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi/_/mthong bar byas te gar byed do/_/oM ma la ma li hU~M phaT/_'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 
[\[211b.3\]]'gyur te/_/'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur/_/oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phaT/_'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis/_/skyes sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs/_/oM ba ta li ba ta li hU~M phaT/_rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni/_/bzlas 
[\[211b.4\]]pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'byung po gsang ba sogs/_/lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par byed/_/oM pa ta ni pa ta ni hU~M phaT/_rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig_/bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/_/chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni/_/shing 
[\[211b.5\]]rnams kun la 'bebs par byed/_/dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/_/shin tu dul zhing brtags pa yis/_/de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam/_/lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/_/bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin/_/
[\[211b.6\]]oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M g+h+raM phuHphaT/_thal par lan bdun par du ni/_/mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor/_/nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang /_/cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/oM phu ru phu ru/_maM tre dzaHhU~M phuHphaT/_skud pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru/_/
[\[211b.7\]]yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yi/_/gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na/_/ce spyang bzhin tu 'khyam par 'gyur/_/skud pa dang ni bral gyur na/_/bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed/_/byin rlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]zhing bzlas/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/mngon du bsgrub pa bya bar 
[\[212a.2\]]bsam/_/rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni/_/sa bon stan du bsgom par bya/_/sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni/_/rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par/_/rlung gis bskor ba snying gar gzhag_/thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam/_/rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi 
[\[212a.3\]]rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya/_/oM yuM pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT/_rnal 'byor pa yi gsang sngags 'di/_/brgyad brgya rab zlas na 'grub par 'gyur/_/'gro ba la sogs bzung nas su/_/dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas 
[\[212a.4\]]su/_/thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/_/skud pa dmar po dkris nas ni/_/shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya/_/rlung gis sbur bar bsgom pa ste/_/gad du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba/_/de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 
[\[212a.5\]]'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pa ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te/_/bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su/_/blo dang ldan bas sngags bzlas na/_/gnyis med gang 
[\[212a.6\]]ba'i gtor ma ni/_/de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya/_/oM badzra DA ki nI de sha mA kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya oM hrIHhU~M pho phrung phuHphaT/_maN+Dal dmar por byugs nas ni/_/seng ldeng phur bu brgyad kyis gdab/_/dbus su ming ni bris nas su/_/gtor ma yongs su gang 
[\[212a.7\]]bar ldan/_/skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang /_/lan bdun bskor bas drang bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyus drangs nas su/_/gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na/_/dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas/_/las 'dis bzlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu/_/las 'dis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/mkha' 'gro drag mor bsam bya ba/_/rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/_/nya mo gcig ni bzung 
[\[212b.2\]]nas su/_/mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyi brlab/_/sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/_/nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni/_/rkang pas mgo ni rab mnan la/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/_/oM phruM phruM/_a mu ka s+ya mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_hrI hrI hrI/_phuM 
[\[212b.3\]]phaT/_de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/_/bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/_/thams cad chu la bya ba ste/_/las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya/_/sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni/_/bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya/_/gang du nya ni gnas pa yi/_/nya yi kha ru gzhug 
[\[212b.4\]]bar bya/_/mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te/_/ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni/_/lan re bzlas te zar bcug na/_/bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/bdag nyid tsaN+DA lI yi gzugs/_/gzugs rnams 
[\[212b.5\]]thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su/_/gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/_/de yi dbus su rab tu bya/_/lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas pa/_/ming dang sngags kyis gzhag par bya/_/oM stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya hU~M/_
[\[212b.6\]]b+hag+gaM mu trAM phru phruM phaT/_gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su/_/lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams/_/las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya/_/
[\[212b.7\]]mthar na chu dang 'o ma yis/_/bkrus na bcings pa las grol 'gyur/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom/_/kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/_/'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar/_/yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni gdan la bzhugs/_/ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung /_/gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi/_/las ni de ru byas nas kyang /_/'bras phye la sogs khyad par las/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[213a.2\]]dbyibs ni byas nas su/_/khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya/_/ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su/_/gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/_/las der byin gyis brlab par bya/_/oM kro d+he shwa ri phru phruM phaT/_brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/_/rdo rje gsang bar gzhug 
[\[213a.3\]]bar bya/_/las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis/_/b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/_/las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste/_/phyung na de las thar bar 'gyur/_/chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/_/las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas 
[\[213a.4\]]bar/_/lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom/_/rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/_/ban+du'i me tog rgyas pa yi/_/dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge ste/_/kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar/_/gsang zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya/_/
[\[213a.5\]]khro bo'i sor mo rtse mo ru/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/_/sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya/_/sbyor ba gsum ni bsams pa yis/_/de yi dbus kyi gnas rnams su/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/_/chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/_/'di yis 
[\[213a.6\]]b+ha ga brtag par bya/_/'od zer can dang bla mar bya/_/smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas/_/gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsre/_/mar nag chen pos bskol bar bya/_/sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu dang ni/_/lce yi dbang pos myang bar bya/_/'dir ni smyo 'gyur the tshom 
[\[213a.7\]]med/_/mar zos pas ni grol bar 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gos ni ma lhung bas/_/mar me yi ni sdong bu bya/_/klu dbang gi ni gong du gzung /_/rkang gi mar gyis sbar bar bya/_/gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis/_/du ba 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dag ni dbab par bya/_/dur khrod du ni gtor byin la/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/_/lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung /_/gang la dub byugs pa des/_/mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur/_/lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis gzung la/_/dur khrod kyi 
[\[213b.2\]]ni sol ba yis/_/tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni/_/bya rog sgro rtsas bri bar bya/_/oM ki ri ki ri kro d+he a mu kaM phruHphruM phaT/_snod ni gnyis la so so ru/_/gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la/_/gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni/_/khro bos bkang ste drud 
[\[213b.3\]]par bya/_/oM ka li brtA li brtA li kro d+ha mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badzra tiSh+Tha mu khi phruM phroM phroM phaT/_brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/_/myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi/_/dbang bskur na ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba'i 
[\[213b.4\]]gdan gyi rab tu dbye ba las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o//_//gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste/_/gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin/_/sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba/_/rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi/_/rdo rje 
[\[213b.5\]]dril bu'i phyag rgya dag_/so sor gzung ba'i de kho na/_/yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang /_/chos kyi dril bu lha mo'o/_/kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste/_/thabs ni de ru thim pa'o/_/dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/_/rdo rje 
[\[213b.6\]]thal mo dam bcings nas/_/sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/_/dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/_/oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM badzra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_gzung dang 'dzin 
[\[213b.7\]]pa las grol bas/_/sbyin pa'i ra bas sbyin par bya/_/rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/thams cad rtsa bzhin blta bar bya/_/sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/'gro rnams brtse bar mi bya sogs/_/sems can don ni dgag mi bya/_/steng du 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]tshul khrims dra ba'o/_/gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs/_/bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdab/_/phur bur 'dra ba yis/_/sdang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad/_/bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur/_/rang gi sems kyis bsdams 
[\[214a.2\]]ba'o/_/rang gis rang sems btul ba na/_/bdud kyis 'tshe bar gal 'gyur/_/mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni/_/gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya/_/lus la ste 'jog tsan+dan byug_/sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/_/bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor 
[\[214a.3\]]bas/_/'bad dang ldan pas dgam par bya/_/mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis/_/rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/_/shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste/_/khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams/_/mar me 'di yis bcom nas su/_/ji 
[\[214a.4\]]ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya/_/sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis/_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya/_/mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du/_/gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas 
[\[214a.5\]]su/_/bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni/_/shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul/_/bar du khru gang bzhag nas su/_/mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya/_/snying gar hU~M ni bsgom byas la/_/thams cad rig pas kun stong bya/_/khams gsum zad par byas nas 
[\[214a.6\]]ni/_/thams cad nam mkha' yang dag gnas/_/sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/_/pho brang yangs par ci 'dod pa/_/ri rab rtse mor bsams par bya/_/lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan/_/rdo rje sngon du bstan pa 
[\[214a.7\]]bzhin/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/hU~M gi thig le las byung ba/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/mi g.yo rdo rje bsgoms nas su/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du/_/bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya/_/yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]su/_/mkhas pas go cha byas nas hU~M/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/_/gangs dang kun zla ba'i mdog_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste/_/phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas/_/go 'phang 
[\[214b.2\]]mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba la/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro/_/dngos po bsgom pa bsgoms nas su/_/hU~M gi sgra yis dgang bar bya/_/rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis/_/ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya/_/btso 
[\[214b.3\]]ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar/_/sems can kun gyi don la chags/_/de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams 
[\[214b.4\]]kyis/_/dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro/_/de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni/_/shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/rgyan 
[\[214b.5\]]rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/_/kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni/_/yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya/_/phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgom 
[\[214b.6\]]par bya/_/A li kA li las byung ba'i/_/de yi sa bon bzlas par bya/_/'dod chags sems kyi stobs kyis ni/_/btso ma gser gyi 'od dang bcas/_/sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'khyud/_/nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jib/_/rdo rje sor mo'i rtse 
[\[214b.7\]]mor ni/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/_/lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni/_/bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya/_/bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni/_/kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa/_/mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'dzag par 'gyur/_/gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su/_/shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod/_/rol pa'i stabs kyis lha mo ni/_/rdo rje rkang pa'i stabs kyis mnan/_/dril bu g.yon gyi rlung gnon pa/_/nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis 
[\[215a.2\]]gzir/_/sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te/_/'og ma gnon pos btsir bar bya/_/dril bu lag gnyis gsang bar sbyor/_/de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas/_/shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis/_/sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/_/
[\[215a.3\]]lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su/_/lho ru kha ni blta bar bya/_/rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su/_/rkang mthil gnyis ni de bzhin btsir/_/dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis ni/_/rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya/_/rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang /_/de bzhin gsang 
[\[215a.4\]]par rtse bar bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni/_/yang dang yang du sprad par bya/_/sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis/_/lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur/_/nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis/_/lha mo nub tu blta bar bya/_/rdo rje yi ni phyogs 
[\[215a.5\]]gcig gis/_/g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya/_/mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khyud de/_/dril bu'i lce ni bskyod nas su/_/rdo rje lce la reg par bya/_/de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas/_/rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni/_/lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam 
[\[215a.6\]]pa'o/_/dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang /_/rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya/_/gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas/_/de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas/_/rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[215a.7\]]bde gyur cig_/kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog_/gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig_/skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang /_/skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can/_/kun nas kun tu skad cig ste/_/skad cig gis ni 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gsang sngags 'don/_/dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/_/gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de/_/rang nyid lha mor bsam par bya/_/slar yang 'di nyid rab tu bya/_/rang gi rjes su chags pa'i 
[\[215b.2\]]sems/_/de nas rdo rje kun tu 'khyud/_/de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru/_/ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya/_/rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/_/chu las byung ba'i me tog ni/_/gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las/_/rtsa ba myu 
[\[215b.3\]]gu me tog ste/_/ban+du ka ni rgyas pa 'dra/_/thong ga gnyis kyi sa bon rnams/_/sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no/_/'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la/_/myu gu me yi sa bon no/_/sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/_/yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/_/dbyug pa 
[\[215b.4\]]phyi mo rdo rje can/_/ska bo che la sogs pas dkri/_/lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su/_/sa yi nang du thim par bya/_/dus me'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mar sbyor cing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]me dang dus me sbyor/_/lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba/_/mtheb chung mthe 
[\[215b.5\]]bos mnan nas su/_/gsum po dag ni rtse mor sbyor/_/phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsugs nas/_/bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/_/gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya/_/bcud dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas/_/dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar 
[\[215b.6\]]bya/_/g.yon gyi cha na ban+du ka/_/chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can/_/chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la/_/der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/_/rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni/_/rang bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya/_/thong ga 
[\[215b.7\]]la sogs gnas kun tu/_/de nas sor mo gdab par bya/_/de nas rdo rje'i rtse mo ni/_/phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya/_/gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni/_/rdo rje pad+mo bsgul bar bya/_/hU~M gi sgra yis bkang nas su/_/lha mo thams cad tshim par bya/_/dril 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]bu yi ni dngos pa yis/_/A li sa bon kun tu sbyin/_/ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse/_/bdag gi lha ni mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu lus yin te/_/phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang /_/de kho na yis so sor gzung /_/
[\[216a.2\]]rdo rje de kho nas bskyod la/_/dril bu rang dgar dkrol bar bya/_/rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te/_/phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin/_/lus ni gnyis ka mnyes pa yis/_/sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/_/gnyi ga yi ni bdag nyid sems/_/chu de byin gyis brlab 
[\[216a.3\]]par bya/_/sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste/_/bde ba'i sta na la 'dug nas ni/_/rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste/_/dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis rol/_/lag g.yon 'khyud cing nu ma gzung /_/g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor bar bya/_/bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa 
[\[216a.4\]]yis/_/yang dang yang du spre bar bya/_/dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/brla yi stan la 'dug nas su/_/rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni/_/dku yi gnas su gzhag par bya/_/mgrin par gcig gis 'khyud nas ni/_/g.yon pas dril bu 
[\[216a.5\]]gsil bar bya/_/ngo mtshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis/_/yang dang yang du sprad par bya/_/de nas rdo rje glu blang zhing /_/sna tshogs hU~M zhes bya bar 'dod/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su/_/slar yang glu ni blang bar bya/_/'khor lo stong pa snying po med pa ni/_/
[\[216a.6\]]snying po dag ni shin tu bsags pa ste/_/rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste/_/dngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub/_/phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa/_/de yis don ni yang dag byed par 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la/_/
[\[216a.7\]]rnal 'byor ma yi dbus su snying po bsgrub/_/rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas/_/de nas de ltar glu blang bya/_/mnyam bzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/las ni gang zhig bsams pa rnams/_/de yis thams cad 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams/_/bskyod pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya/_/gur gum dang ni gi wang dang /_/kar sbrang rtse pa la sha/_/yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa/_/sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya/_/rdzas de dag ni bsgos nas su/_/
[\[216b.2\]]rtag tu thig le byas gyur na/_/rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas/_/thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/dbang po lag dang ru rta dang /_/rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma/_/bdag gi lda dang yan lag lnga/_/lnga po thams cad cha bsnyams la/_/bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang /_/zhib tu 
[\[216b.3\]]btags te sbyar la sbyin/_/thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te/_/'chi ba na yang gter mi 'gyur/_/khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub/_/sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/_/'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/_/
[\[216b.4\]]bdag gi lus la gshegs gsol ba/_/bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya/_/sems can don phyir blo ldan pas/_/thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos/_/zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos/_/
[\[216b.5\]]rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar par bya/_/rje'u rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis/_/dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya/_/lham mkhan shan pa nya pa mos/_/mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/_/kla klo gdol pa tshos mkhan mas/_/sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin/_/de 
[\[216b.6\]]bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya/_/gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya/_/sems can bsgral ba'i gnas yin te/_/gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bskyod/_/de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya bcing /_/mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang /_
[\[216b.7\]]dbye ba'i stabs dang /_zlum po'i stabs dang /_gsum gnon po'i stabs dang /_rus sbal gyi stabs dang /_g.yas brkyang dang /_g.yon brkyang dang /_gnas gcig pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_bung ba'i tshogs dang /_rgya mtsho rlab pa dang /_ri bo 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]dpung pa dang /_rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang /_mchod sdong gi tshul dang /_pus mo btsir ba dang /_bsdu ba'i tshul dang /_mnyam du gnas pa dang /_dus kyi me dang /_snying po dang /_dga' bas gnas pa dang /_gcig tu bsdu ba'o/_/
[\[217a.2\]]rkang stabs bskyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_/mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/_/yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/_/snying gar btsir ba dang /_rkang pa sbyar ba dang /_phreng ba'i tshul dang /_nu ma'i tshul dang /_gnyi ga 
[\[217a.3\]]sbyar te bza' ba dang /_phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang /_lag pa gnyis sbyar ba dang /_gsang bar reg pa dang /_lus mnye ba dang /_ko sko la reg pa'o/_/lag pa'i thabs nyid bcud pa ni/_/zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang /_mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa 
[\[217a.4\]]yis/_/de yis las rnams 'grub par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag_/de kho na yis so sor bzung /_/gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na/_/dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'grub/_/rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na/_/rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring par 'gyur/_/rdo rje dril 
[\[217a.5\]]bu'i phyag rgya dag_/dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/_/mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang /_/nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus/_/de bas rdo rje dril bu dag_/mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed/_/A li kA li mnyam bsgoms nas/_/rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa 
[\[217a.6\]]pos/_/A li rdo rje zhes byar brjod/_/kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/_/A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/_/dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/_/sems can don rnams ma lus pa/_/lha yi gzugs kyis phri bar bya/_/phyi rol shes rab thabs 
[\[217a.7\]]rnams kyis/_/ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/_/rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas/_/de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che/_/rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin/_/gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa/_/de yi rnal 'byor 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ba ru grags/_/shel ldan dag pa'i sems la ni/_/de yi chos ni bstan par bya/_/gal te sems ni the tshom na/_/skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung /_/'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing /_/longs phyir ni bsten mi bya/_/sems can don bya'i phyir du ni/_/
[\[217b.2\]]rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs/_/gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa/_/thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te/_/rang dgar skad cig yang dag 'byung /_/rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o/_/skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/_/bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod/_/
[\[217b.3\]]gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par/_/A li'i sa bon gzung bar bya/_/bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla/_/gang yang cung zad lus dang lag_/lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya/_/thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson/_/
[\[217b.4\]]dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis/_/'gro ba thar pa de ring thob/_/e ma'o chos kyi mchog gi lam/_/e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po/_/e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam/_/tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/_/
[\[217b.5\]]smyung ba med par bstan pa ste/_/'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod/_/bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed/_/las kyi 'khor lor cho ga rnams/_/sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par 
[\[217b.6\]]bya/_/de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni/_/sngon bzhin de nyid bsgom par bya/_/sngags bas sum 'bum bzlas nas su/_/byi nas las ni bsgrub par bya/_/yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang /_/rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya/_/phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i 
[\[217b.7\]]mthar bzhag pa/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du/_/bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni/_/de nyid las rnams 'bad de sgrub/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gos la sogs bzungs/_/lha mo ser mo tshon rtsi bris/_/phyag gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs can/_/dkar 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus/_/ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/_/skra ni lhug pas rnam par brgyan/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni stan la bzhugs/_/skyes bu'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis 
[\[218a.2\]]rnam par bklubs/_/glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/kha T+wA~M mchog gis brgyan pa ste/_/g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnams/_/hU~M gi sgra yis 'jigs par mdzad/_/'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsol/_/lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya/_/sa yi 
[\[218a.3\]]dbus sogs sbyor bar bya/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/_/gnyis med gtor mas dgang bar bya/_/gal te 'byor na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo/_/tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni/_/yam shing thang shing las byas pa'am/_/zho 
[\[218a.4\]]can lnga yi shing las bya/_/mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang /_/sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya/_/sbrang rtsi khrag la spags pa dag_/brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya/_/de ltar bsreg pa tsam gyis ni/_/des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur/_/oM smrAM phruM phuH
[\[218a.5\]]phaT/_sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya/_/dang pos ni 'gul 'gyur te/_/gnyis pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul/_/gsum pa la ni dri chen 'byung /_/bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te/_/lnga par bsgrub pa'i grogs 
[\[218a.6\]]por ni/_/seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su/_/drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs/_/'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/_/dam tshig phyag rgya sogs phyin nas/_/gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang /_/
[\[218a.7\]]bstan ni bdag gis mdzad du gsol/_/de nas lha mo dngos bstan nas/_/bdag gis bu yi ci zhig bsgrub/_/'bad de dam tshig byin nas su/_/de la phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su/_/da ltar bdag gi 'di mdzod cig_/bdag 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]nyid la ni lha mo 'grub/_/oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hU~M hU~M hU~M dza dza dza swA hA/_spyi bor lag pa bzhag nas ni/_/gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya/_/sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas/_/gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bgrod par gnas nas su/_/
[\[218b.2\]]rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab/_/lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo/_/dri za mi'am ci dang ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mi mo gang 'dod pa/_/bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na/_/phran tshegs mi mo smos ci dgos/_/bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su/_/lha min 
[\[218b.3\]]klu yi gnas dag kyang /_/gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams/_/myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur/_/gang yang dgra rnams gsad pa dang /_/bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur/_/las rnams kun byed lha mo ste/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[218b.4\]]stag mo ce spyad 'ug pa mo/_/las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste/_/dngos grub de ltar shes byas la/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/_/de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung /_/rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing /_/dril bu chos kyi lha 
[\[218b.5\]]mo'o/_/phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin/_/kun rig pas ni thams cad sgrub/_/sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o//_//rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i/_/slob dpon dag ni bzung bya ba/_/sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor 
[\[218b.6\]]sogs ldan/_/'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi/_/ji bzhin lam gyis 'khor ba las/_/sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rjes nyon/_/slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing /_/bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/_/bcom ldan 
[\[218b.7\]]ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_/thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi/_/de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon/_/byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_/lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/cha shas byang chub yan lag gnas/_/dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de/_/ba spu 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rnams ni dgra bcom mo/_/'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/_/'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/_/de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur/_/rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta/_/ye shes can ni shes bya ba/_/mtshan nyid gang yin bstan 
[\[219a.2\]]par bya/_/shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs/_/sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas/_/rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig_/thams cad du ni snyan par smra/_/sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/_/sbyin pa la sogs 
[\[219a.3\]]rtag tu dga'/_/rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson/_/snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/_/mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed bas na/_/sems can rnams kyi mgon skyo ba yin/_/de nyid bcu ni yongs shes ba/_/'di ni 
[\[219a.4\]]slob dpon zhes byar brjod/_/gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi/_/de nyid mtshan nyid mnyam par gyis/_/rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta/_/dam tshig spyod pa dang lta nyid/_/gtor ma gsang ba las sogs ldan/_/slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya/_/smad 
[\[219a.5\]]na myur du mnar med 'gro/_/kun tu dam tshig med pa dang /_/stan dang mal dang lha ma sogs dang /_/gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams/_/grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya/_/bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min/_/'das na de ni dus kun tu/_/
[\[219a.6\]]gdon gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang /_/nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/_/bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed/_/de yi grib ma 'gom gyur na/_/mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod/_/slob dpon smod par gang byed pa/_/rmi lam na yang 
[\[219a.7\]]dngos grub med/_/slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yi/_/skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/_/de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro/_/bslab pa sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/_/de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya/_/sngar bstan 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]yi ge gcig pa yis/_/sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya/_/de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/_/las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/_/sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis/_/yi ge brgyad po bsgom par bya/_/gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur 
[\[219b.2\]]ba'i/_/de yis chos ni shes par bya/_/sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la/_/ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya/_/slob dpon dbang ni bskur nas su/_/thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan/_/dang por slob mas bya ba ni/_/bla gos phrag par gzar 
[\[219b.3\]]nas su/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag_/sa la legs par btsugs nas ni/_/thal mo snying gar sbyar bar bya/_/bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni/_/rang gi lha ru rab bsgoms la/_/lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni/_/mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par 
[\[219b.4\]]bya/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/theg pa gsum po thams cad dang /_/rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/khyad par du 
[\[219b.5\]]yang slob dpon la/_/rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_/rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa/_/rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang /_/don yod grub pa la sogs pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/
[\[219b.6\]]bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/_/dus chod 'di nas bzung nas su/_/byang chub snying por mchis par du/_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing /_/ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/_/bdag gis chos khrims 'di 
[\[219b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du/_/mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod/_/oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_lus kyi las ni rnam 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gsum dang /_ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/_/lus bsdams pas ni dam tshig bsrung /_/sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya/_/de nas ras kyis mig 
[\[220a.2\]]bkab nas/_/gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya/_/lag pas lag pa bzung nas su/_/slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/_/slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi/_/sbyor ba'i 
[\[220a.3\]]gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnams shes nas/_/rnal 'byor ldan pas sgrib g.yogs rnams su dral ba'i phyir/_/srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su/_/rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de 
[\[220a.4\]]nyid rgyal por 'gyur/_/AHni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog_/gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/_/hU~M ni nyon mongs bsreg pa ste/_/thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/_/oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste/_/sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/_/de nas mig phye 
[\[220a.5\]]mthong ma thag_/kun la yan lag lngas btud nas/_/bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid/_/sbyor ba'i gdan du gding bar bya/_/de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/_/lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/_/mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya/_/ji ltar bstan 
[\[220a.6\]]bzhin mtshon byas la/_/de nas bslab sogs yang bya ste/_/ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtag_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin/_/ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog_/ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed/_/hrIHyis nus pa gzhom 
[\[220a.7\]]bya ste/_/la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/_/mgo bos btud de dbul bar bya/_/oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dzo bas+thA nA ya At+nA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_oM A tsAr+ya pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_oM sarba satwa pa ri trA Na ar+thA ya At+mA naM 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]ni r+yA ta yA mi/_nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang /_/brlang dang tshig rtsub spang bar bya/_/sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste/_/srog gcod rku ba de bzhin no/_/longs spyod kun la mi chags shing /_/bdag nyid nges par chog shes bya/_/gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra 
[\[220b.2\]]ba'i/_/phyi rol bstan bcos zhen mi bya/_sa ma ya s+t+waM/_sa ma ya hoH/_a A aM aHhU~M dzaH/_rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis/_/yan lag drug gi sa bon gzung /_/gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/_/
[\[220b.3\]]de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas/_/rtag tu bla ma yon dbul bya/_/rang gi bu dang chung ma dang /_/gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang /_/glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu/_/rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas/_/gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni/_/gos dang 'bru 
[\[220b.4\]]la sogs pa'i nor/_/stan dang mal cha lham la sogs/_/gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul/_/mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang /_/bla ma'i yon du phul nas su/_/chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa nyid/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru/_/rdzogs 
[\[220b.5\]]pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/_/sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/sems can rnams la gzir mi bya/_/gzhan la tshig rtsub smra mi bya/_/thams cad mi dgar bya ba min/_/tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung ba dang /_/skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya/_/srog 
[\[220b.6\]]chags bsad par mi bya ste/_/de bas shi bar 'gyur kyang bla/_/rab tu 'bar me mtshungs pas na/_/gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/_/dngos la srid pa'i blun po rnams/_/bdag nyid srid pa mi bzang ltung /_/rags dang phra mo tsam la yang /_/rnal 'byor pa 
[\[220b.7\]]yis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bsrung ngo /_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/_/de la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra yod pa min/_/spyod pa legs par bsdams pa dang /_/bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam/_/dga' dang rtse la 'ang legs par bsdam/_/gtor ma'i dus su'ang 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]legs par bsdam/_/rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams/_/sems can dga' bas 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang zhig kun shes slob ma la/_/sems can spro ba bstan par bya/_/mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni/_/thams 
[\[221a.2\]]cad mnyam par blta bar bya/_/rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya/_/rnal 'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya/_/sems dman pa sred pa'i gzhis/_/tshong byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te/_/de yi myu gu ljon shing gis/_/'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gog par 
[\[221a.3\]]byed/_/mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yis/_/lus can rnams ni byams pas na/_/dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis/_/bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur/_/mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing /_/glegs bam bklag par mi bya'o/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya 
[\[221a.4\]]mi bcing zhing /_/sngags kyi yi ge bzla mi bya/_/bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/_/de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/_/slob dpon dag gi lung gis ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/_/bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni/_/bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog_/
[\[221a.5\]]bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o//_//der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/_/nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso/_/de nyid med pa'i sngags pa 
[\[221a.6\]]rnams/_/srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung /_/lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas/_/de nyid chos ni bstan du gsol/_/rnal 'byor kyi ni tshad ma ci/_/sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu/_/chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyis/_/lus kyi chad ni ji ltar lags/_/
[\[221a.7\]]rnal 'byor pa yi gtor ma'i las/_/rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang /_/gang gis 'gro ba bsgrub pa yi/_/mtshan nyid tshad ma ji ltar lags/_/mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad/_/ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/_/bdag gi khams ni mi brtan pas/_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las/_/phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi/_/'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang /_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur/_/phyag na rdo rjes yang gsal ba/_/srid pa so sor 
[\[221b.2\]]'byung ba rnams/_/gang gis de yi tshad ma ste/_/sems ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_/yid ni the tshom skyes par gyur/_/'khor ba khyod yis dris pa nyon/_/sems ni yid kyis bkrus nas su/_/rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa/_/mkha' 'gro rlung gis 
[\[221b.3\]]bcings pa yis/_/sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par/_/bsam gtan dmigs pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams/_/rtag tu 'dod yon spyod pa ste/_/de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni/_/rang 'dod sa la sogs pa 
[\[221b.4\]]'grub/_/de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams/_/de yi don ni gang yin pa/_/nga yis legs par bshad par bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus nyon/_/rnal 'byor can gyi rnam shes dang /_/lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rnam shes rnam par shes 
[\[221b.5\]]pa yis/_/phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub/_/sems kyi ngo bo the tshom pas/_/bcom ldan de yang bshad du gsol/_/shes rab rnam shes dngos rang bzhin/_/mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags/_/rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis/_/the tshom 
[\[221b.6\]]gyur pa nyan par 'tshal/_/shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i sems/_/sems la skyon dang yon tan med/_/yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yin/_/srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin/_/gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos/_/yul gnas pa yi zhi gyur nas/_/ji 
[\[221b.7\]]ltar gnas bzhin rab sbyor ba/_/bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya/_/de yi dbus su shes bya ba/_/rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra/_/kha dog med cing thams cad mtshon/_/mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste/_/gzugs med pa ni kun gyi gzugs/_/de bzhin 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]thung ngu ring po min/_/sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis/_/dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/mtshan nyid thams cad ster ba'o/_/dngos po med par bsgom pa yis/_/bsgom pa dag ni 
[\[222a.2\]]mtshon par bya/_/gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/_/sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste/_/thams cad kun nas dmigs pa yis/_/rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa'o/_/gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po/_/rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag_/
[\[222a.3\]]bstan bcos klog la sogs sbas shing /_/yul gyis mtshan nyid las kyang ring /_/mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni/_/bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/_/sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing /_/sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o/_/lus ni gdung 
[\[222a.4\]]bar mi bya'o/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/_/lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag_/mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su/_/dbugs 
[\[222a.5\]]ni lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung /_/thong ga kun tu spangs pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya/_/'bad de mnyam nyid sems kyis ni/_/de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la/_/yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang /_/yid kyi me tog mchod par bya/_/rang bzhin dri yis 
[\[222a.6\]]byugs nas su/_/shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya/_/bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus/_/kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya/_/kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste/_/drag mor ldan pa'i sa bon nyid/_/tshangs pa'i sgo ru 
[\[222a.7\]]shin tu bsrung /_/thams cad gzugs kyi 'jig byed pa/_/dril bu chu yi yi ge ste/_/stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni/_/sna dang rna ba dag la dgod/_/bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/_/lce dbang rtse mor gzung bar bya/_/seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/_/stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/_/thong ga kun tu gzung bar bya/_/ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni/_/snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/lte ba'i tshigs ni gdan gyi sgor/_/phyugs kyi sa bon gyis bsrung ngo /_/lha mo 
[\[222b.2\]]brgyad du sbyar nas ni/_/sa bon brgyad po gzung bar bya/_/de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste/_/lus kun tu ni shin tu 'bar/_/steng gi mche pa gnyis las ni/_/dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab/_/'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin/_/'jug pas brlabs pa'i 
[\[222b.3\]]mdog lta bu/_/steng gi mche ba gnyis kyi ni/_/lce yis bsten pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu/_/lce chung gsang ba'i nang du dbab/_/dpral pa'i sde dang sna dang ni/_/rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab dag tu/_/kha zas lta bu'i dngos po ni/_/kun nas drangs te gzhag par bya/_/
[\[222b.4\]]mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog_/bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus nas su/_/lhag ma 'og tu them par bya/_/'og tu rlung gi sa bon gyis/_/'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs/_/chu ni mjug de rtsib logs dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[222b.5\]]mchan khung gnyis dang ni/_/dus dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]me rkang pa/_/tshigs rnams kun dang snying ga nas/_/bdud rtsi btung ba gang yin pa/_/ba lang rmig par thim nas ni/_/sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur gzhag_/lus kun la ni gnas pa yi/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[222b.6\]]gang gis shes pa dag_/lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas/_/de yi rnal 'byor brtags pa yin/_/snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba/_/mdangs ldan shin tu mdzes shing gsal/_/gangs dang kun+da zla ba 'dra/_/zla ba de dbus 'o ma'i rgyun/_/bdud 
[\[222b.7\]]rtsi'i kun rig gug skyed bcas/_/bdud rtsi'i 'od ni shin tu bsil/_/ma ning rnams ni spangs pa yis/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi/_/gnas rnams kun tu bskor bar bya/_/ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/_
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rtag tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas su/_/gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi/_/ye shes lus su bsgom par bya/_/mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/_/'o ma'i zla ba sa bon dag_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' 
[\[223a.2\]]ldan pa/_/mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas byas nas/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang /_/bkres skom la sogs med par 'gyur/_/lo ni brgya phrag du mar 'tsho/_/gzugs dang gzi brjid na chod ldan/_/rims dang 
[\[223a.3\]]dug la sogs pa dang /_/grang dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams/_/ye shes can gyi ye shes lus/_/yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba dmigs pa yis/_/myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur bas/_/gzugs 
[\[223a.4\]]dang ye shes bdag nyid che/_/de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni/_/stong pa'i brag la sogs par brten/_/bdud rtsi gang gis shas pa yis/_/bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems/_/ye shes can gyis de kho nas/_/
[\[223a.5\]]dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan/_/ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/_/gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni/_/'dod chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yi/_/rang gi lus ni bkru bya ba/_/ye shes sems dpa' mnyan par gyis/_/rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu 
[\[223a.6\]]yi/_/stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis/_/phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na/_/lus ni shel dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/shel dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos/_/dri med dung dang kun+da 'dra/_/ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyi/_/chos kyi tshon gyis btso bar bya/_/rang 
[\[223a.7\]]bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa/_/nyes byas legs byas las byung ba/_/gang gis rang bzhin las rgyal ba/_/ye shes kyis ni snang bar bya/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis/_/'gro ba'i dngos kun zad par bya/_/mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pa yis/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na/_/de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba/_/zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon te/_/A li kA li rab sbyor bas/_/de yi dbus su btu bar bya/_/de yi sa bon de nyid kyis/_/'od zer phreng ba bsam par bya/_/sa bon de nyid gang gis ni/_/myur du 
[\[223b.2\]]ye shes snang bar 'gyur/_/gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yis/_/ye shes sku ru de nas bsgom/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni/_/sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/_/sa bon gang zhig bzla 
[\[223b.3\]]ba ni/_/sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/_/yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/_/dbyug pa spyi bo rdo rje dang /_/ska bo che la sogs pas dkri/_/sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas par bya/_/mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/
[\[223b.4\]]dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/_/rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas/_/'og min la sogs snang bar bya/_/'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis/_/sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam/_/rnal 'byor snang bar 'dod pa yis/_/rtag tu sems kyis 
[\[223b.5\]]bsgom par bya/_/snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/_/thams cad kun nas zad par bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/
[\[223b.6\]]'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/ye shes sa bon de dbus bsam/_/de las byung nga'i ye shes lus/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid de/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ste/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun 
[\[223b.7\]]rig pas/_/yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la/_/snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'o ma'i sa bon bsam/_/kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rtag tu de nyid bsgom par bya/_/kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las/_/kun tu 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]rdul phran dkar pos dgang /_/pha rol dngos po dmar po ru/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/_/rdo rje sems dpar bsams nas su/_/gang gi snying gi dbus su ni/_/de yi rnam shes gzung bar 
[\[224a.2\]]bya/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyogs brgyad du/_/kha dog dmar po bsams nas ni/_/rtag tu mnyam nyid lta ba yis/_/blo ldan pha rol sems shes bya/_/kun nas dpag tshad phyi rol du/_/rnal 'byor pas ni gang bsams na/_/de yi bsam pa thams cad ni/_/
[\[224a.3\]]yi ge de yis sten par 'gyur/_/gal te pha rol cha yis ni/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas/_/gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis/_/kun nas thams cad shes byas la/_/dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir/_/rnal 'byor 'di yis sbyar bar 
[\[224a.4\]]bya/_/de nas me yi las kyi bdag_/sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_/ye shes me yi bdag nyid la/_/sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/_/thams cad sems kyis byin brlabs pas/_/skye bo'i lus can ye shes me/_/thams cad ye shes byin 
[\[224a.5\]]brlabs pa/_/me yi de nyid mnyam par gyis/_/bdag nyid sems kyis bsregs pas ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyis sbyin sreg bya/_/mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus nyid kyi/_/dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste/_/me yi thab kyi gnas yin la/_/klu dbang 'khyil ba'i 
[\[224a.6\]]bskor ba yin/_/yi ge thams cad 'bar bar bya/_/de dbus pad+ma rig pa yis/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung /_/mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par bya/_/g.yas kyi cha yi logs su 
[\[224a.7\]]ni/_/drag po thim bya me dang 'dra/_/lte ba dmar bo 'bar ba la/_/lha mo'i rtse mo ro langs ma/_/g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la/_/drag tu 'bar ba gtum mo ste/_/me lnga yi ni bdag nyid rnams/_/gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta/_/chu dang me dang 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]rlung dang ni/_/sa dang ye shes rnam pa lnga/_/lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la/_/sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no/_/bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/_/dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya/_/ba lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni/_/'dzag pa der ni thim par bya/_/me 
[\[224b.2\]]yi dbus su bsreg pa'i gzhi/_/dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/_/'di ltar de kho na bsgoms nas/_/bdag nyid rgyas phyir bsreg par bya/_/cung zad bza' dang btung la sogs/_/rung bar byas nas bza' bar bya/_/'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/
[\[224b.3\]]bu lon du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par bye ba gnyis pa'o//_//spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa/_/mnyam nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi/_/lus kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/_/lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal/_/
[\[224b.4\]]'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang /_/gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon/_/sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/_/nye bar zhi nas ka lir 'jug_/lus las spu rnams skye ba ni/_/kun tu chu yi tshad ma ste/_/chu la lus ni ma yin te/_/lus la chu yi tshad ma yin/_/lus 
[\[224b.5\]]kun las ni khyab pas na/_/blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o/_/lus ni rdo rje lha mo yin/_/lus kyi yan lag thams cad la/_/me 'bar lta bur dro ba ste/_/kha zas smin pa'i tshad ma yis/_/me ni tsad mar rab tu grags/_/yan lag thams cad khyab pa yi/_/me ni 
[\[224b.6\]]kun rig dmar yin pas/_/lus ni drag mor bstan pa ste/_/bdag nyid tshad mang rab tu grags/_/bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas/_/rlung gis lus kun khyab pa ste/_/dbugs rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis/_/mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar grags/_/lus la brten 
[\[224b.7\]]ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su/_/thams cad lha mo ro langs mar/_/mkhas pa yi ni shes pa ra bya/_/sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te/_/gzugs sogs dbang po yon tan ldan/_/gzugs la sogs pa snang ba na/_/sa ni tshad 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ma'i gnas yin no/_/mdzes ma zhes bya rab tu grags/_/de ni lha mo gtum mo ste/_/kun gyi gtso mor rab tu grags/_/yid ni the tshom gcod pa ste/_/byed po sdud po za bo'ang yin/_/dbang po kun gyi sems rnams kyi/_/mtshan 
[\[225a.2\]]gzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa/_/yul la sogs pa nyer spyod kyi/_/rnal 'byor tshad ma mkhas pa yis/_/lus la ye shes bsten par bya/_/sems las chu ni byung bas na/_/rnam shes chu ru gyur pa ste/_/gal te 
[\[225a.3\]]chu ni gzhan yin na/_/ci phyir zhen chu mi 'byung /_/lus la nges par drod yod na/_/chu yi nang du bying mi 'gyur/_/lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas/_/lnga po gcig gi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas/_/rnal 'byor ba yis 'gro ba brtag_/
[\[225a.4\]]de yi mtshan nyid shes bya'i phyir/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/_/de nyid rnal 'byor grogs kyis ni/_/'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/_/yul dang dbang po'i ye shes ni/_/gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur/_/sgong skyes khyim gyi 
[\[225a.5\]]gnas su ni/_/dbus su gnas pa bcing bar bya/_/'byung dang 'byung min sems kyis ni/_/g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya/_/bcing ba'i gnas dang stan dag ni/_/rnam shes pad+ma'i stan la'o/_/rnal 'byor pa yis de yi phyir/_/rnam shes rang bzhin 
[\[225a.6\]]mtshon par bya/_/gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yis/_/rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur/_/lte bar chu shing me tog ni/_/snying gar yang ni 'greng ste gnas/_/rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te/_/mkhas pas 
[\[225a.7\]]rtag tu bzlog par bya/_/gser dang ni ldan pa yi/_/rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad du 'gyur/_/de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni/_/ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba ste/_/sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char/_/de dang mthun pa'i sor brug pa'o/_/mdud pa yi ni nub 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]phyogs char/_/'og tu sor ni lnga pa'o/_/zhing de la ni sa bon dang /_/'od zer tshogs kyi myu gur 'gyur/_/sa bon de yi 'od zer gyis/_/chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya/_/rgyas pa lnga yi sa bon la/_/lho yi 'og nas dgar bar bya/_/pad+mo mdzes pa 
[\[225b.2\]]bkas pa yis/_/'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/_/pad+mo de yi stan la ni/_/sgong skyes ye shes gnas dag la/_/dbus su shel ltar dag pa yis/_/ye shes rnam shes dbu ma nyid/_/mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams/_/phyogs kyi 'dab 
[\[225b.3\]]mar gnas pa ste/_/dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/_/mtshams su sen mo la sogs pa'i/_/ma ning yi ge sngar bstan bzhin/_/snying gar dngos po dngos po yis/_/snying gar yi ge blta bar bya/_/ba lang rmeg pa'i steng du ni/_/sgo dgu pa yi bdud rtsi 
[\[225b.4\]]yis/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bkru/_/yi ge dkar po brgyad po rnams/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge dkar po yi/_/'od 'bar pa spu'i khung nas spro/_/rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad du/_/'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang /_/nyal ba la sogs dus kun tu/_/
[\[225b.5\]]ye shes rnam shes sa bon bzlas/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bsgoms bzlas na/_/ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa/_/'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/_/g.yo ba med cing 'tshe med par/_/dngos pos 
[\[225b.6\]]dngos po bsgom par bya/_/gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/_/ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par gyis/_/lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa/_/'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya/_/sgo dgu po ni ji lta bu/_/ye shes sgo yi bye brag gis/_/yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu/_/
[\[225b.7\]]ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams/_/yang dag rab sbyor mnyan par gyis/_/lam bzang po yis mdzes pa'i gnas/_/lam ngan srid pa'i skyon gyis gos/_/thig le lte ba spyi gtsug dang /_/mig dang sna dang rna srid sgo/_/chu 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]dang chu min sgo yin te/_/sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin/_/lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te/_/thig les gzugs khams kyi lus can/_/steng nas steng du gnas de ru/_/mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro/_/sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/_/
[\[226a.2\]]rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/_/gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/_/mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gro/_/srid pa'i sgo yis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]te/_/de bzhin gci bas dud 'gro'o/_/chu min rnam shes myur ba ru/_/dmyal ba brgyad du shes par bya'o/_/sgo rnams kyi ni bye 
[\[226a.3\]]brag gis/_/'khor ba'i bye brag 'byung ba yin/_/de bas sgo yi bye brag las/_/sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste/_/'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang /_/'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/_/rims la sogs pas ma phog par/_/gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog_/
[\[226a.4\]]sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/_/sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/_/rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis/_/sgo ni dgag pa bsgom bya ste/_/de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/_/chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/_/chu dang chu min sgo la ni/_/me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/_/de 
[\[226a.5\]]la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom/_/lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/_/sems ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/_/rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no/_/rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/_/thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[226a.6\]]sa bon drag mo yis/_/lcags kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis/_/gnas nas drag tu drang bar bya/_/gnas dang gnas nas steng du dbye/_/tshigs dgu las ni steng du bya/_/steng du smin pa'i sa bon dang /_/yi ge phyed dang 
[\[226a.7\]]gnyis kyis sbyang /_/drag mo'i nga ro brjod bya ste/_/brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon la/_/sde tshan dang po'i dbang po ni/_/yi ge phyed du sbyar bar bya/_/'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya/_/rlung gi sa bon ldan pa yi/_/rlung gi dkyil 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]'khor bsams nas ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams nas/_/gong nas de bzhin steng gnas su/_/rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la/_/steng gi rtsa la bzla bar bya/_/tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/_/mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste/_/nyin re bram ze 
[\[226b.2\]]gsod pa dang /_/mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang /_/rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag_/lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/_/sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /_/srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/_/ji ltar 'dam nas skyes pa yi/_/pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/_/de 
[\[226b.3\]]bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/_/ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/_/dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/_/dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/_/de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams/_/mthong nas mkhas pas sbyor ba brtsam/_/rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/_/
[\[226b.4\]]de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/_/mnyam nyid sems ni bsgom par bya/_/snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam/_/de 'od nyi mar 'bar ba yis/_/gzugs rnams zad par bsams nas ni/_/
[\[226b.5\]]sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/_/sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par bya/_/gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba gnas par bsam/_/sa bon gyis ni bskyed bya ba/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/_/pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[226b.6\]]ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/_/spyan gsum cod pan gyis brgyan zhing /_/bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa yi/_/kun+da zla ba ltar dkar zhing /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/
[\[226b.7\]]sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas ni/_/sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro ba mdzad/_/g.yas kyi dang po mda' yin te/_/gnyis pa yis ni lcags kyu bsnams/_/gsum pa ni rdo rje nyid/_/g.yon pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub ste/_/gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]thogs/_/go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsnams/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/yan lag brgyad du rab 'bad nas/_/sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod/_/A li kA li rab sbyor bas/_/sa bon ji bzhin pa tu 
[\[227a.2\]]bar bya/_/'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams/_/kun tu kha dog dkar por bya/_/chu shing me tog pad+mo la/_/snying gar sgong skyes gzhag par bya/_/de yi dbus su rnam shes dang /_/ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni/_/mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/dngos pos 
[\[227a.3\]]dngos po bsgom par bya/_/de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/_/gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de yi dbus su me yin te/_/me yi dbus su nyi ma la/_/A li kA lir ldan pa yi/_/de yi 
[\[227a.4\]]sa bon dmar por da god/_/rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/_/'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya/_/'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/_/dbus su bsnun dang ldan par bya/_/'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la/_/me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/_/'byung ba 'jug 
[\[227a.5\]]min bzlas bya zhing /_/'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dang /_/bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya/_/'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang /_/'jug pa yis ni mtshon byas la/_/rnal 'byor pa yi 'byung 'jug dag_/de kho na nyid 
[\[227a.6\]]mnyam par bsgom/_/mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/de nas phyi rol lus la ni/_/sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/_/pha rol sems dang rjes mthun par/_/mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/_/bsgom dang 
[\[227a.7\]]bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste bsam/_/gang gis lam nas bsams nas ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o//_//gsang ba'i gdan gyi gsang 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ba nyid/_/sems dang ye shes 'dres pa yi/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim ci 'dra/_/ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don/_/byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon/_/'dod chags la sogs rim spangs nas/_/mnyam nyid sems ni 
[\[227b.2\]]bskyed par bya/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/_/khams dang sems ni bde ba yis/_/snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya/_/yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos/_/slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro zhing /_/gsang chen de nyid 
[\[227b.3\]]don sgom pa/_/gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can/_/thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas/_/thams cad stong pa nyid du bya/_/dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni/_/byang chub rim pas btso bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes 
[\[227b.4\]]mkha' 'gro bsam byas te/_/zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi/_/kun+da zla ba ltar dkar mdog_/zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/_/pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/_/phyag 
[\[227b.5\]]gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/_/nyid kyi thugs kar 'tshir bar mdzad/_/gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_/ye shes sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/_/chu shing me tog lte ba nas/_/snying gi bar du 'greng ste gnas/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[227b.6\]]bzlog nas/_/sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par bya/_/ge sar dang ni lte bar bcas/_/'dab brgyad shin tu mdzes pa ste/_/dbus kyi sgong skyes la gnas par/_/yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya/_/kha dog dkar po dag cing gsal/_/dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i 
[\[227b.7\]]gtso/_/de yi dbus su rnam shes dang /_/ye shes dag ni sbyar bar bya/_/shar du byams par ldan pa yis/_/mi bskyod pa yi sa bon bsam/_/lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste/_/rin chen sa bon de nyid do/_/nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/_/'od dpag med kyi sa bon 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dgod/_/byang gi cha yi 'dab ma la/_/don yod gtso bo bsam par bya/_/dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon/_/thig le dbyug par ldan rim bzhin/_/'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste/_/yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/_/phyogs 
[\[228a.2\]]mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/_/sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod/_/de yi dbus su de yi sems/_/yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya/_/stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/_/ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi/_/sems ni ya mtshan skyes par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan bdag la 
[\[228a.3\]]bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/_/chu shing snye ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin/_/snying po med pa'i snying por gyur/_/de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/_/dbus na gnas pa ye shes te/_/ye shes rang 
[\[228a.4\]]bzhin gzugs med cing /_/mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/_/yi ge'i gzugs ni yi ge med/_/gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid gzugs/_/
