[\[228a.5\]]gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas/_/mnyam nyid ye shes shes pa dang /_/de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/_/myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/_/bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni/_/ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid/_/bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan/_/
[\[228a.6\]]de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad/_/'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru/_/'di ni kun tu bsgom par bya/_/rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten te/_/bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/_/'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs/_/bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag pas bkru/_/thigs 
[\[228a.7\]]pa'i dbus su sa bon ni/_/mthe bo tsam gyi zlum por bya/_/de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/_/A li kA li dag las btu/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/_/de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/_/thig le bsam par rab tu grags/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha/_/rdul phran gzugs su kun tu bsam/_/rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi/_/mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas/_/thig le gnas kyi go 'phang lta/_/snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni/_/thigs 
[\[228b.2\]]pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu/_/bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis/_/rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya/_/phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang /_/bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin/_/bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/_/de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/_/bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la 
[\[228b.3\]]gus pa'i/_/thabs dang ldan pa sgrub pa po/_/bla ma'i lung gi lam gyis ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/_/mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po bsgom/_/chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te/_/yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis 'dag_/
[\[228b.4\]]de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin/_/blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya/_/gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas/_/snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya/_/sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa/_/de kho nar ni gzugs min no/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/_/de kho na nyid 
[\[228b.5\]]mthong ba min/_/gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la/_/sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya/_/kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang /_/'og dang 'og min yang dag gnas/_/rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar bya/_/ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni/_/thig le sgra dang 
[\[228b.6\]]yang dag ldan/_/srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/_/phyi rol ngag ni spangs nas su/_/yid kyis bzlas dang ldan par bya/_/rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis/_/mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas/_/rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas/_/ye shes la ni rnam 
[\[228b.7\]]shes thim/_/rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas/_/byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/mar me lta bu thams cad du/_/snang 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste/_/srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul/_/mthong ba mtshan ma gnyis pa yin/_/gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pas/_/nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan ma ste/_/rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni/_/de bzhin phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa lha yis longs spyod rnams/_/sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste/_/mtho ris gzugs kyi 
[\[229a.2\]]lha rnams ni/_/sems kyis mthong ba lnga ba yin/_/gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste/_/bdun pa chos kyi sa la'o/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste/_/rnal 'byor pa ni rang dgar spyod/_/mchod rten gzugs kyi khyad par las/_/dbyibs kyi 
[\[229a.3\]]gzugs ni ji lta bu/_/lha yi rnam dag bsgoms pa rnams/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/lus can rnams la yang dag blta/_/yang dag de nyid shes nas su/_/de nyid sbyor ba brtsam pa yi/_/rab sbyor rdo rje mnyan par gyis/_/snying gar zla ba 
[\[229a.4\]]bsams nas su/_/dbus su hU~M ni bsgom par bya/_/me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal/_/spyi gtsug dkar por yang dag ldan/_/me lce 'bar bas bcom nas ni/_/thams cad kun nas zad par bya/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas/_/de nyid stong pa nyid du 
[\[229a.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas zla bar sa bon ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su/_/mchod rten pho brang gnas nyid ni/_/de la sems kyis bskyed par bya/_/gya gyu sa zhes brjod pa ste/_/phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na/_/dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas pa/_/
[\[229a.6\]]lhun po'i lha yi gnas nyid do/_/'dod na spyod pa'i lus can rnams/_/bre ru nges par brtag par bya/_/'og dang steng dang dbus nyid kyi/_/dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos/_/gzugs khams zhes bya'i mtho ris rnams/_/'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam 
[\[229a.7\]]par brgyan/_/gzugs can bcu dang brgyad po ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin rnam par gnas/_/gzugs med srid pa'i sems can ni/_/chos kyi srog shing nyid du thim/_/lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/_/gzugs su mchod rten bskyed par bya/_/steng gi 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]sgong skyes gnas su ni/_/bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste/_/sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na/_/gnyis med mnyam pa'i khyad par gyis/_/gzugs dang stong pa'i mtha' dang ni/_/de bzhin dngos dang dngos med nyid/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa la sogs 
[\[229b.2\]]gzhan/_/legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ston pa'o/_/de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i/_/rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas su/_/mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/dngos pos dngos 
[\[229b.3\]]po bsgom par bya/_/mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/_/'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/_/de nyid bstan bcos lung la sogs/_/rnal 'byor dmigs pa goms byas pa'i/_/slob ma chen po'i lus 
[\[229b.4\]]can rnams/_/gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na/_/bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yis/_/rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de/_/bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya/_/bdud rtsi myong ba'i rnal 'byor bas/_/ye shes sku ni myur du 'thob/_/ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[229b.5\]]bdag dang gzhan don mchog tu 'gyur/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ro/_/gsang chen sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi/_/de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid/_/gang gis byang chub lam gyur pa/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/
[\[229b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/_/bdag nyid rang dgar byed pa yi/_/rta rgod lta bu'i sems de nyid/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsdam par bya/_/ji ltar bung ba me tog bsnyung ba yi/_/chang gis myos shing sems ni 
[\[229b.7\]]brtan 'gyur te/_/longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs dang bral/_/de bzhin bsgom pa'i lam gyis yid bcing bya/_/yid bsdams pa ni 'grub 'gyur bas/_/dang por yid ni bsdam par bya/_/yid kyis bsgrub pa'i bye brag gis/_/byang chub ye shes 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mtshon par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste/_/phyag rgya chen po snying gar bcing /_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams/_/yi ge'i gnas su dgod par bya/_/
[\[230a.2\]]rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/_/sgo ni dgag par bsam bya ste/_/bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis/_/rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/_/me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis/_/chu dang chu min de bzhin bsrung /_/chu shing me tog pad+ma ni/_/mdzes shing 'khyil ba rgyas 
[\[230a.3\]]par dbye/_/de yi dbus kyi sgo ngar ni/_/dung dang zla ba ltar dkar ba/_/phyogs phyogs gnas su sa bon de/_/phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi po yi/_/phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/_/'od zer 
[\[230a.4\]]kun nas dkar zhing dag_/lha mo'i yi ge bsgom par bya/_/ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'o/_/de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni/_/sems ni rang dgar bsgoms pa yis/_/phyi nas gzugs ni gzhom par bya/_/phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/_/
[\[230a.5\]]phyogs phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su/_/rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi/_/lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid/_/shar gyi phyogs su chu yin te/_/kha dog dkar po kun+da'i 'od/_/me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar/_/rtag tu byang du bsam par bya/_/rlung gi 
[\[230a.6\]]sa bon dmar po ni/_/nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya/_/sa yi sa bon ljang khu ni/_/lho yi phyogs su bsam par bya/_/phyogs mtshams 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/_/grwa bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/_/lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te/_/sgong skyes bcas pa 
[\[230a.7\]]gzhom par bya/_/de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/_/mtshon bya mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o/_/sems kyi dngos po stong pa bas/_/rang bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/_/rnam rtog stong pa'i dbus dag tu/_/rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs/_/A li kA li 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sa bon ni/_/rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste/_/rnam pa med cing brjod du med/_/thams cad rdul zhes bya ba la/_/stong nyid du yang mi dmigs te/_/gzugs la sogs par mi blta'o/_/rdul ni sa bon ma yin la/_/rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med/_/
[\[230b.2\]]rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te/_/mnyam nyid dbu mar mtshon par bya/_/gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung /_/bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste/_/lung gi dam pa dag dang ni/_/bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyad 
[\[230b.3\]]nas su/_/lung dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/mi g.yo'ang 'tshe ba med pa ru/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/mnyam gzhag dngos pos dpyad nas ni/_/byang chub rim pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/sems 
[\[230b.4\]]can don byed mchog tu brtson/_/kun rtog lus dang sems kyi ni/_/gang tshe yul 'khor bsrung 'dod na/_/ye shes dbang po'i longs spyod can/_/rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing /_/khams gsum ye shes kyis 
[\[230b.5\]]blta dang /_/rang 'dod yid kyi gnas dang ni/_/nam mkhar rgyu ba'i lus can dang /_/sems can kun gyi gzhan don gnyer/_/mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur/_/lus dang dbang po don gnyer bas/_/bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[230b.6\]]kyi rang bzhin gyi/_/sbyor bas 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams kyi yang /_/sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer 'gyur/_/sgrub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang /_/sgra sgrogs skye bos dben pa yi/_/tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu/_/gnas nas 
[\[230b.7\]]de ru bsgom par bya/_/nA ga mu la ba la sha/_/ru twa rta cha ni gsum po dag_/ma ga d+hA ni srang gcig ste/_/cha bsnyams phye mar byas nas ni/_/ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas/_/phye ma bzhi char bsres nas su/_/'di ni nyin re rnal 'byor pa/_/mkhas pa 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]yis ni bza' bar bya/_/rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya ru/_/brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/_/nges par shin tu smin pa yis/_/grang dang bkres skom la sogs grol/_/sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru/_/brag phug stong sogs gnas 
[\[231a.2\]]nas ni/_/'dul ba bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/_/lus ni rtag tu bsrungs par 'gyur/_/ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang /_/gnyis spyod gtam du smra zhing ston pa ste/_/de ltar lam bshad 'chi ba yod ma yin/_/rnal 'byor lam ngan de ltar bstan pa 
[\[231a.3\]]min/_/rig byed chu dang de bzhin dUr ba rnams/_/bram zes spyir bzhag sangs rgyas pas gzung min/_/dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis 'jigs pas na/_/gnas ngan lha tshogs rigs la phyag mi bya/_/de nas rnal 'byor pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma 
[\[231a.4\]]dang /_mkha' 'gro dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag brgyad cu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tshim nas/_thams cad kyis ye shes thob par gyur te/_/phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sems can 
[\[231a.5\]]rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/_rang dgar sems can sgrol ba yi/_/rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/_/te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/_ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing /_/dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/_/te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/_rdo rje dril 
[\[231a.6\]]bu'i phyag rgya can/_/gnyis su sbyar ba 'dzin pa po/_/te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/_sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/_/'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu med dngos/_/te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/_srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/_/'od zer rnon po stong 
[\[231a.7\]]phrag nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/_/rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog dang rol gar mdzad ces bya ba ste/_bkra shis sgra yis bkang nas su/_/thams cad kun nas glur blangs so/_/ji bzhin lam ni rdo rjes 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]nyon/_/bstan bcos shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/gang zhig su yang rung ba las/_/yi ge 'am tshig tsam nyan byed na/_/mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te/_/yang na 'khor los sgyur bar ro/_/'dri 'am 'dir 'jug klog pa dang /_/shin tu dang ldan sngags 
[\[231b.2\]]zlos pa'i/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/_/srid pa'i gzugs kun bsams bzhin 'grub/_/rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams/_/myur du byang chub rim pa thob/_/ces bdag nyid kyis bka' stsal pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[231b.3\]]rnal 'byor pa dang /_/rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang /_phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[231b.4\]]gyis dga' zhing mgu nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'bum phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs pa 
[\[231b.5\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+har dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[231b.6\]{D429}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shi tsa tuHbI ThA khyA ta tan+t+ra rA jo man+t+ra aM sa nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags kyi cha zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[231b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dam tshig la spyod pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/_/gsum pa 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]yi ni dang po'o/_/de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni/_/sngags kyi de bzhin khyad par nyid/_/snying po yi ni snying po'i chos/_/rab sbyor gsang zhing gsang ba yi/_/de nyid de nyid de las mchog_/snying po'i de nyid bsdus pa'o/_/bla ma'i ma ning 
[\[232a.2\]]gnyis bzung la/_/rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/_/spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o/_/sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/_/zla ba dkar dang kun+da'i mdog_/gtso bo'i sngon du sbyar bar bya/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya zhing /_/dbyangs yig mngon par 
[\[232a.3\]]mthong ba ni/_/las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/_/bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o/_/dkar dang ser dang dmar po'o/_/bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/_/myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid/_/sred pa mchog tu sgrol pa'o/_/dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi bsgom pa ni/_/rnal 
[\[232a.4\]]'byor pa yi mtshon par bya/_/don grub 'dod pas bzlas pa yi/_/ban+du ka yi me tog 'dra/_/rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/_/de nyid du na rnam par thim/_/dkar bo zla bas mnan pa yi/_/gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/_/pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang /_/bdud rtsi 
[\[232a.5\]]yis ni bkru bar ldan/_/dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis/_/dbyangs yi ge kun la khyab pa'o/_/dkar zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/_/gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/_/bzhi bar nam yang ma yin no/_/ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i/_/khyad par dbyangs 
[\[232a.6\]]yig sa bon nyid/_/mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid/_/de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro/_/bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni/_/mnyam pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/_/bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/_/mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid do/_/yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid 
[\[232a.7\]]ni/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/_/lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni/_/lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya/_/dmar dang gnag sogs sa bon ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/_/lnga ba drug pa'i sa bon ni/_/thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/_/dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang /_/zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni/_/kun kyang sgra yid bye ba'o/_/thams cad las la sgra yis ni/_/kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags/_/bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis/_/skyes bu rang 'dod 
[\[232b.2\]]pa yi las/_/nges bar lus ni sdom pa dang /_/gnyis pa'i sa bon gyis mnan pa'o/_/yang bas dmar dang gnag la sbyar/_/rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/_/mtshams ni bcad cing mnan pa'i las/_/gnyis pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni/_/rang bzhin yi ge 
[\[232b.3\]]ming gi ni/_/de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang /_/sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o/_/kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/_/thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni/_/dbyangs yig bskyed pa'i sa bon ni/_/las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/_/ma ning gis bskyed sa bon 
[\[232b.4\]]ni/_/brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no/_/bud med dang ni skyes pa'am/_/'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar/_/sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni/_/tha ma bzhi ni rnam spangs pa/_/dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog_/nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes/_/tha ma bzhi ni lnga pa dang /_/
[\[232b.5\]]sde tshan drug pa yang dag ldan/_/kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni/_/khyad par du ni shes par bya/_/bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/_/dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od/_/de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni/_/kun nas bdud rtsi'i grub pa'o/_/lha min grub pas 
[\[232b.6\]]'gugs pa dang /_/lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang /_/thams cad las rnams grub pa ni/_/sa bon 'di ni khyad par nyid/_/sbom po ma ning gnyis kyis la/_/lcags sgrog bzhin du kha sprad pa/_/rtsa bar yang ba nyis 'gyur ro/_/spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam 
[\[232b.7\]]par dgod/_/steng du thig le 'bar ba'i mchog_/sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku/_/sa bon lnga yi ngo bo nyid/_/rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis/_/lce rtsa lce rtser gsungs pa ni/_/kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/zhi dang chu yi bye brag la/_/hU~M gi rnam 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pa rkan la sbyar/_/rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba/_/bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs/_/gal te 'dod na lha yi lus/_/khyad par du ni zhi ba'i las/_/snying ga'i rtsa bar gsungs pa ni/_/kha dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/_/sbom po'i sgra 
[\[233a.2\]]dang thig le dang /_/rgyas pa dang ni me yi las/_/lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni/_/kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/_/sbom po'i sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od/_/dbang gi las la rab tu sbyar/_/sna rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni/_/kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/
[\[233a.3\]]yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni/_/ldan par blo dang ldan par bskul/_/bskrad dang gsang dang bcing ba dang /_/mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad pa dang /_/gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las/_/hU~M gi rnam pa sbrid par sbyar/_/de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni/_/hU~M gi rnam pa 
[\[233a.4\]]nye bar mtshon/_/sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/_/hU~M gi rnam pa dbang phyug mchog_/thams cad 'byin pa'i ngo bo bas/_/hU~M gi yi ge mchog gi lha/_/stong nyid yi ge'i hU~M gyur pas/_/hU~M gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/_/stong pa'i gzugs dang 
[\[233a.5\]]rab ldan pa/_/dngos dang dngos med 'byin mdzad pa/_/btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog_/sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan/_/ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags/_/brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar ldan/_/lha dang lha min grub pa dang /_/mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor ba/_/
[\[233a.6\]]lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni/_/gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed/_/sde tshan dang po'i sa bon ni/_/rtsa bar re pha ma nan pa dang /_/lcags kyus mgor ni rnam par dgod/_/steng du zla ba'i 'od dang bcas/_/kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/lcags 
[\[233a.7\]]kyu yis ni snying po bsgrub/_/lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin/_/lcags kyu yis ni kun 'gugs pa'o/_/stong bar rlung gi sa bon ni/_/sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la/_/rtsa bar sgra yis dkri bar bya/_/spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang /_/rlung gi kha dog drag po yis/_/
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]lus can kun ni bskul bar bya/_/bskul ba'i las kyi sa bon gyis/_/sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar/_/lnga pa sde tshan gnyis pa yi/_/gsum pa'i yi ge gzung byas la/_/yi ge gsum pas mnan par bya/_/re pha rtsa bar sbyar ba dang /_/steng du bdud rtsi'i 
[\[233b.2\]]thigs pa'o/_/kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/dgyes pa la sogs sa bon gyis/_/lha tshogs kun nas mnyes par byed/_/sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/_/gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro/_/steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang /_/dkar zhing yid 'ong shin 
[\[233b.3\]]tu 'bar/_/mchod pa'i sngags kyi dus dang ni/_/gtor ma sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs/_/rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la/_/rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags/_/dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/rtsa bar re pha sgra dang ni/_/spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o/_/kha dog 
[\[233b.4\]]dmar bo mnyam pa'i 'od/_/zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa/_/las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o/_/rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pas/_/rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/_/sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang /_/gnyis pa'i sa bon blang byas pa/_/mtha' ru 
[\[233b.5\]]stod pa gnyis kyis so/_/kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/lha dang lha min gsang ba sogs/_/rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag_/bzhag pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/_/blo ldan yi ge 'di yis gzhag_/stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/_/de yi 
[\[233b.6\]]bzhi pa gzung bar bya/_/rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang /_/steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le'o/_/'jigs pa bsrung ba'i las nyid la/_/kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/rnal 'byor de nyid 'dod pa yi/_/sa bon 'di nyid kyis bsrung ngo /_/bsreg pa'i 
[\[233b.7\]]yi ge sngags nyid ni/_/dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/_/dkar dang ser dang dmar sogs kyi/_/las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o/_/bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la/_/brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan/_/bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu/_/kha dog dkar po 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]mnyam pa'i 'od/_/ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i/_/me ltar dmar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/_/logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/_/zhi ba la ni bsreg pa'i mthar/_/bdud rtsi'i sa bon kha dog ser/_/chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan/_/
[\[234a.2\]]logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/_/brgyad kyi mtha' ma kun nas 'bar/_/rdo rje 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me/_/sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa/_/dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i sreg pa'o/_/rgyas pa'i sreg pa'i mtha' mar ro/_/de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i ni/_/
[\[234a.3\]]brgyad mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o/_/kun nas dmar dang dmar ba yi/_/mthar ni dbyug ba lcags kyu'o/_/dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/dbyug pa'i dbugs kyis bzla bar bya/_/chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/_/sreg pa'i yi ge rnam pa 
[\[234a.4\]]gsum/_/rnam pa bzhi las don gnyer pas/_/'joms pa'i yi ge gnyis su shes/_/bskrang dang bsad dang dbye ba dang /_/mnan dang nye bar bzlog pa la/_/stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni/_/dbyug pa glo ru rnam par sbyar/_/nyi ma'i sde tshan gsum 
[\[234a.5\]]pa las/_/dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o/_/kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/_/'od zer me bzhin kun nas ldan/_/rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las/_/lus kyi dbus su dbug par bya/_/bsad dang gdug pa bskrad la sogs/_/drag po'i las ni thams cad 
[\[234a.6\]]la/_/dngos grub 'dod pa rnal 'byor pas/_/'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/_/de yi sa bon ldan pa ni/_/sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam par spangs/_/dang po dbu yi steng rnams su/_/kha dog sngon por ba rno bas/_/gsad dang dbye dang gdug pa ni/_/khro 
[\[234a.7\]]bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya/_/'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni/_/sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya/_/dkar po'i sde dang sde tshan gyi/_/dang po'i dang po blang byas la/_/kun nas rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/_/sa bon yi ge phyed dang gnyis/_/'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dus su/_/rnam shes gong du bskul ba'o/_/lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas ni/_/yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis drang /_/brgyad pa'i mtha' ni sngon du'o/_/ma la ta yi sbyor dus su/_/'pho bar sbyor bas sngon du'o/_/'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni/_/rnal 'byor ba 
[\[234b.2\]]yis rab tu spyad/_/u la pa li ta sa bon/_/spyad bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis/_/dngos dang dngos med sa bon las/_/skra dang thig le rnam par sbyar/_/rlung gi rtsa ba'i gnas su ni/_/sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o/_/chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/_/sa bon 'di 
[\[234b.3\]]yis bsgyur bar bya/_/sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan dang /_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis bcing /_/bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/_/bdud rtsi'i sa bon sa bon gyis/_/bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni/_/chu shing me tog lta bur gyis/_/ji ltar 
[\[234b.4\]]sde tshan gsum pa ni/_/yi ge gsum pa gzung byas la/_/dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang /_/'og pag gis ni sngon dkris pa/_/de nyid de nyid kun dang ni/_/sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtso/_/theg pa rnam gsum dag byed pa/_/A li'i sa bon rab tu 
[\[234b.5\]]grags/_/sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la/_/lcags kyu yis ni spyi bor mnan/_/spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang /_/kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/_/sems can kun nas rmongs byed pa/_/yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar/_/kun tu rmongs ni sa bon no/_/
[\[234b.6\]]rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/_/brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/_/spyi bor lcags kyu 'dren pa dang /_/rtsa bar re pha'i sa bon no/_/kha dog sngon po 'bar ba yi/_/dri dang me tog ro sogs mid/_/las kyis kun nas 'phrog par byed/_/'phrog byed ming 
[\[234b.7\]]gi sa bon gyis/_/'phrog pa'i las la kun tu sbyar/_/bdun pa dkar po'i sa bon ni/_/dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/_/bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon no/_/chu yi yi ge ming can no/_/ka shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni/_/kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa/_/me bzhin 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]'bar zhing 'bar ba yi/_/me yi yi ger rnam par grags/_/sde tshan brgyad kyi dang bor ni/_/de nyid stong pa'i dngos po dang /_/rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/_/rlung gi sa bon du ni grags/_/brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/_/kha dog sngon 
[\[235a.2\]]po'i 'od mnyam pa/_/snying gar sa yi sa bon ni/_/de nyid pa yi sa bon no/_/'di rnams sa bon sa bon la/_/thig le'i yi ge rtsa bar ro/_/rtsa bar nyis 'gyur re pha dang /_/rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro/_/rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa'o/_/steng du thig le sbyar ba 
[\[235a.3\]]dang /_/de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/_/bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o/_/rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni/_/g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang /_/sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/phyugs ni me la kun tu sbyar/_/yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni/_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad sems 
[\[235a.4\]]dang bcas/_/bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi/_/'khor ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa/_/thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang /_/yi ge kun nas gnas pa'o/_/sa bon 'di ni kun nas bzung /_/ye shes sa bon zhes bya'i ming /_/rtag pa'i rtsa bar mnan pa dang /_/
[\[235a.5\]]sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/_/dkar po kun+da zla ba'i mchog_/ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid/_/rgyu pa'i gzugs kyi sa bon ni/_/sa bon sa bon de bas mchog_/ye shes rnams shes bya ba'i ming /_/las kun la ni rab sbyar bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhi 
[\[235a.6\]]ba ni/_/zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/_/mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan/_/sngon du bsnyen pa'i sngags pa yis/_/gnyi ga lus la bsgoms nas ni/_/'di yis lha mo sbyar bar bya/_/sngags bas bsreg pa'i sngags pa ni/_/sngon du dbyug pa med 
[\[235a.7\]]pa'o/_/lha mo'am yang na lha mo la/_/khro bo'i gzugs 'joms la sogs pa'i/_/'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' bzhag ste/_/bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya/_/gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis/_/khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid/_/sreg 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dang 'joms pa'i sa bon ni/_/khyad par dang ni khyad par can/_/de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni/_/rab tu spyad cing blta bar bya/_/de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni/_/dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin/_/bsgrub pa'i dus su lha nyid kyi/_/sa bon mtha' ra bzlas pa bya/_/mchog 
[\[235b.2\]]tu zhi ba'i de nyid la/_/dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o/_/khro bo mo'i lha la ni/_/rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' mar ro/_/lha mo kun gyi de nyid la/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/_/dang po sngags kyi sa bon ni/_/phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnam spangs nas/_/bdag 
[\[235b.3\]]nyid ming gi sa bon dang /_/gnyi ga yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu/_/stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni/_/bar ma bsgrub pa'i lha nyid do/_/nyin mo'i yi ge dang po ru/_/bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i ming nyid ni/_/de yi sgrub pa'i las rnams ni/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mtshon/_/
[\[235b.4\]]sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni/_/rab tu blta zhib spyad par bya'o/_/nyin mo stong pa'i sgrub pa ni/_/'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/_/nyin mo nyin mo nyin mo sgrub/_/stong pa stong pa bar ma'o/_/go bzlog pa yi sa bon ni/_/lhag pa'i yi ge brtsi bar byed/_/nyin 
[\[235b.5\]]bar bsgrub bya lhag ma ni/_/sgrub pa po la bu lon ni/_/bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni/_/dag nyid pas na 'dras bu med/_/rab tu blta zhing spyad pa yis/_/sngags kyi sgrub pa shes pa yin/_/sngon du ma ning sa bon dang /_/de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ning nyid/_/dbus 
[\[235b.6\]]sum ning yi ge ni/_/dngos grub stong par bshad pa yin/_/de nyid 'di yi sa bon gyis/_/rang 'dod lha nyid bsgrub par bya/_/thog ma tha ma khyad par du/_/dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming nyid do/_/mtho dang dma' dang bar ma dang /_/khyad nyid kyang ni khyad par ro/_/zhi dang 
[\[235b.7\]]rgyas pa la sogs la/_/khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid/_/stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/_/rtsa bar re pha sgra nyid dang /_/steng du zla tshes thig le dang /_/kha dog ser po kun 'od la/_/lha mo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/_/snying po yi ni snying po mchog_/gong du 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]phyag 'tshal yi ge dang /_/'don bzhin ming ni dbus su'o/_/mtha' dang mtha' ni bsreg sogs nyid/_/thams cad du ni kun nas ldan/_/stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/_/spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan/_/rtsa 
[\[236a.2\]]bar nA da thig ler bcas/_/kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyis/_/rnal 'byor ma kun dga' bar byed/_/de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni/_/rnal 'byor ma kun gyis rab spyad/_/de nas sman sogs rim pa ni/_/khyad 
[\[236a.3\]]par nyid du sbyar bar bya/_/bla re bla re nyid dang ni/_/spos dang bdug pa dril sogs/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/_/mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs pa/_/sngon du gnyis med gtor mar ldan/_/dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/_/dbus su rnal 'byor 
[\[236a.4\]]bas bri ba/_/gur gum shin tu dri zhim ldan/_/re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/_/blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi bri/_/dbang po la sogs re'u mig nas/_/blo dang ldan pas yi ge dgod/_/dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/_/de yi sa bon spang dbus so/_/nyin mo'i 
[\[236a.5\]]yi ge thams cad nyid/_/lhag ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yi/_/sa bon mnyam par gzhag pa dgod/_/sgra dang thig ler yang dag ldan/_/kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa'o/_/gu gul dbang po'i lag pa dad/_/rmongs byed rengs byed de bzhin sgra/_/sat+ta si 
[\[236a.6\]]hA tsam pa ka/_/ku tu ru dang ko li ki/_/son rtsi ka dang pa bla dang /_/gu gul ru rta dUr ba kar/_/me dang dri dang gur gum dang /_/tsan+dan gi wang yang dag ldan/_/sha khar dang li shi dang /_/pri yang ku dang ge sar dang /_/chu srin sder mo nub phyogs cha/_/re'u 
[\[236a.7\]]mig kun dang gnas kun tu/_/dbang po la sogs sman rim bzhin/_/rdzas ni re re re re dang /_/cha la sa bon bzlas par bya/_/phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg pa mtha'/_/brgyad dang brgyad du bzlas pa bya/_/cha dang ldan sogs sa bon ni/_/sman dang ldan na de 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bas mchog_/bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la/_/mkhas pas byin pas dbang du byed/_/bdag nyid lnga yi lnga dang ni/_/sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas/_/re pa'i rdzas la 
[\[236b.2\]]bsgoms byas na/_/ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid/_/rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang /_/skyes pa'am yang na bud med la/_/bza' ba'i dngos po byin pa yis/_/dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags/_/skyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/_/son 
[\[236b.3\]]rtsi ka yi cha dang sbyar/_/brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni dbang du byed/_/me da la sogs sman rim dang /_/mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan/_/mkhas pas dpyad cing brtags pa yis/_/mnyam pa'i cha dang ma ru bya/_/thig 
[\[236b.4\]]le'u ni sbyin byas na/_/rgyal po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang /_/tha snyad las ni rnam par rgyal/_/'gro ba yang dag rmongs par byed/_/dang po sha kha ra sogs dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni rnam par sbyar/_/sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni/_/tsan+dan gyi ni cha nyid dang /_/
[\[236b.5\]]byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa/_/yan lag nying lag byug byas nas/_/dri ni sna la man mas tsam gyis/_/nges par dbang du byed pa'o/_/mtshams dang mtshams kyis sha kha ra/_/sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni/_/mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa 
[\[236b.6\]]yis/_/kun nas nges par dbang du byed/_/mtshams kyi nang gi kun bzung nas/_/sha khar yi cha dang bsre/_/bdug pas bdug cing bdug byas nas/_/mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes mkha' 
[\[236b.7\]]'gro sprul nas ni/_/sa bon so so'i sa bon nyid/_/kun nas brgya phrag gcig tu'o/_/de bzhin du ni dmar po'i las/_/de yi rjes ni kun bzung la/_/bdag nyid ye shes lta ru'o/_/nyi ma'i lag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/_/kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]'od/_/de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis/_/g.yo ba dang ni ltung bar byed/_/snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/_/de yi dbus su sa bon ni/_/skyed par re pa thig le can/_/khri phrag 
[\[237a.2\]]gcig tu bzlas pa yis/_/gnyis kyis ltung ba'am g.yo bar byed/_/phyi nas gtor ma'i las kyis ni/_/g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed/_/gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas/_/rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar byas nas/_/phra ba'i sgo nga tsam zos pas/_/mod la 
[\[237a.3\]]myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sha ta ca sogs srin bu ni/_/'o ma bdun par sbyar byas pa'i/_/zhag bdun las lhag par zos na/_/'chi ba 'di la the tshom med/_/son rtsi kar sogs srin bu lnga/_/sbrang rtsi smyo byed lnga ba ni/_/bza' dang btung ba sbyin byas nas/_/
[\[237a.4\]]skyo byed myos bar 'gyur ba'o/_/med la sogs srin bu lnga/_/sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas/_/thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni/_/skad cig de la mdze yis 'dzin/_/kha ra'i sde tshan srin bu ni/_/mgo la sgong dang ldan par/_/de yi phye ma zos pa yis/_/
[\[237a.5\]]mi ni dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur/_/mtshams kyi khar kun bzung la/_/sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang sbyar/_/de yi phye ma bza' byas na/_/de yi mod la gzir bas 'dzin/_/mtshams kyi nang gi yang dag gzung /_/sbrang rtsi lhan cig bsgo byas pa'i/_/phra rab tsam zhig 
[\[237a.6\]]zos pa yi/_/mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed/_/de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni/_/gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don/_/ye shes ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i/_/lus kyi rim pa rnam par blta/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang /_/slob dpon dang ni gsang 
[\[237a.7\]]smod pa/_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/_/lnga pa'am lnga ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni/_/sman rnams kyi ni khyad par nyid/_/de nyid kun gyi mchog 'gyur ba/_/
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]mchog gi snying po snying po nyid/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/_/cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags/_/de nyid gtor ma'i las dang ni/_/dri yi re'u mig dgod par bya/_/bcu dgu dang ni sum cu yi/_/gru bzhi pa yi re'u mig dgod/_/nyin mo stong pa'i sa 
[\[237b.2\]]bon dang /_/sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya/_/dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su/_/dang por dbyangs yig rim ji bzhin/_/re'u mig kun gyi sa bon ni/_/sman sogs bzhin du gzhag par bya/_/na ki b+ha la bi ling ga/_/ru rta bu ram b+ha sa ka/_/ka sa la sogs 
[\[237b.3\]]bdun pa ni/_/dbang ldan la sogs gnas su dgod/_/dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang /_/rmongs byed dang ni tsan+dan dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni gur gum nyid/_/bdun pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o/_/ga bur sA li shu dag dang /_/
[\[237b.4\]]gur gum rkun mo gi wang dang /_/sbrang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha/_/gsum pa'i re'u mig sde tshan no/_/sa rdzar gu gul ru rta dang /_/g+han d+hi kha ra kun du ru/_/me tog phreng ba bdun pa ni/_/bzhi pa'i re'u mig gnas su'o/_/ka ko la dang sha ta dang /_/ge sar 
[\[237b.5\]]so rtsi rgya skyegs dang /_/pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni/_/lnga pa'i las su yongs su grags/_/dri dang bcud len k+Sha ra dang /_/yung ba dang ni kha ra tra/_/k+Shau dri bi bi ling gi cha/_/drug pa'i re'u mig mig yin no/_/dan ta dan ta ku su ma/_/rams dang gar sma be ta 
[\[237b.6\]]ki/_/sar rnams ni bdun pa'i cha/_/bdun pa'i sman gyi rim pa'o/_/brgya phyed gcig gis mtshang bar/_/re'u mig kun sogs sman nyid do/_/re re la yang sngags 'di ni/_/brgya phrag mngon par rab bsngags te/_/dang po chu srin sde tshan sogs/_/bdag 
[\[237b.7\]]nyid bdun gyi bdun pa ni/_/mthar ni phye ma sbyar byas te/_/shin tu zhi ba mor mkhas pas btags/_/'dus pa rgyal po rgyal dbang gi/_/bza' dang btung dang ldan par sbyin/_/thams cad bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin/_/kun nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/dang po 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]la sogs sde tshan ni/_/phra zhing zhib par rab tu bya/_/phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni/_/bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun/_/bza' dang ston mor cho ga bzhin/_/rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya/_/skyes pa'am ni bud med dam/_/thams 
[\[238a.2\]]cad kun nas 'od 'gyur ro/_/dang por shel gyi sde tshan ni/_/mnyam por cha de phyed mar bya/_/mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar/_/grib ma dang ni grib mar bskams/_/cho lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang /_/snga dro thig le sbyin byas na/_/rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gro ba/_/
[\[238a.3\]]skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur/_/sa rdza sngon sogs dbang por sbyar/_/phye ma zhib tu byas nas ni/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang /_/rang 'dod spos chu rab sbyar nas/_/mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang /_/ngag gi 'dren pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de yi bdug pas bdugs pa'i 
[\[238a.4\]]lus/_/'gro ba kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/_/ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas/_/phye ma mnyam por char byas te/_/tsan+dan dang po thams cad kun/_/cha gsum du ni bya bar bya/_/mi byams sman zhing bkur pa ni/_/skal ldan mdzes par 'dod 'gyur na/_/de yi 
[\[238a.5\]]yan lag la byugs la/_/'gro ba rnam par rmongs byed yin/_/dri yi sde tshan bdun par ni/_/ka ko la sogs dang ldan par/_/mar dang 'o ma dang bsres nas/_/kun gyi cha dang sbyar byas nas/_/grib ma'i grib mar bskam par bya/_/rigs dman kla klo la sogs 
[\[238a.6\]]kun/_/yid mi 'ong ba byams par 'gyur/_/'di yi sbyor ba sbyin byas nas/_/dang gi 'dod bzhin byed pa'o/_/da na ti mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang /_/rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi cha/_/me la bsro bar rab tu sbyar/_/ka ra na dza yi rdog ma tsam/_/yid du mi 'ong 
[\[238a.7\]]ba yi gnas/_/khar bcug kun tu de yi dag_/tshig gsum tshig tu brjod pa yis/_/bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed/_/mtshams kyi dan ti la sogs pa/_/smyo byed chu ni lnga ba dang /_/bdag nyid bcings bar sngon ldan pas/_/mchog tu bsgoms na 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'dug par bya/_/bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na/_/sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis/_/de yi rang 'dod su la ni/_/dbang du gyur par yongs su grags/_/mtshams kyis ra la sogs blang /_/phye ma zhib mor byas na ni/_/bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang 
[\[238b.2\]]ni/_/kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la/_/phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan/_/'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis/_/bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na/_/nges par dbang du byed pa'o/_/cha dang cha yi bye brag ni/_/mkhas shing bzo bar byas bar bya/_/khyad par sman gyi 
[\[238b.3\]]las 'di ni/_/cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta/_/rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba ni/_/pad+ma'i gdan gyi gdan la bzhugs/_/kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/_/snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/a ni thig le yang dag ldan/_/
[\[238b.4\]]'bar zhir rab tu 'bar ba yis/_/bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'grugs par byed/_/mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang /_/rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar/_/mthang ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming /_/'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu bsgrub/_/sman gyi sbyor bar ldan pa ni/_/zla ba'i 
[\[238b.5\]]dkyil du kun nas bya/_/gtor ma de nyid byin brlabs nas/_/'bum dang 'bum du bsnyen pa bya/_/sngon du da na ti'i yan lag dang /_/thig le brgya par kun nas ldan/_/bza' ba'i dngos pos sbyin byas na/_/mi yi skad cig rnam par spangs/_/da na ta la sogs srin 
[\[238b.6\]]bu dang /_/ra yi 'o mar bsres byas na/_/gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/_/ku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni/_/smyo byed chu ni rnam pa lnga/_/bza' bar zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/smyo zhing smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/_/rams kyi lam sogs 
[\[238b.7\]]sde tshan dang /_/dkar por srin bu sbyar nas ni/_/bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na/_/thams cad kun nas 'thab par 'gyur/_/ka mi srin bu'i sde tshan dang /_/mi yi mar khu dang sbyar nas/_/phye mas yan lag la reg na/_/skal ngan mi byams pa dag ni/_/tsi te 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]sde tshan bdun pa ni/_/nor bur sgong ldan bzlas nas/_/thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis/_/mong la tshor ba mi bzad 'byung /_/sa yal sogs sde tshan dang /_/nyi shur ra yi chu yis spangs/_/cung zhig tsam zhig zos pa yis/_/nyi ma nyi shu na 
[\[239a.2\]]de 'chi/_/dan ti mtshams kyi srin bu dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni/_/bza' dang btung ba zos nas ni/_/mdze nad kyis ni yan lag gzir/_/mtshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni/_/bza' dang btung bar rab byin na/_/rnam par rmongs shing dran pa nyams/_/
[\[239a.3\]]de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med/_/rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid/_/gsang zhing gsang bar byas pa yi/_/rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs/_/sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan/_/dkon mchog gsum la brnyas pa dang /_/slob dpon dang ni 
[\[239a.4\]]gsang smod dang /_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ba/_/rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/_/nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang /_/shes rab zhan cing yid mi gzhungs/_/sngags kyi snod min snying rje med/_/sman gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o/_/gdan 
[\[239a.5\]]bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o/_/de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni/_/brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o/_/le'u bzhi pa zhes bya pa rdzogs so//_//de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi/_/de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub 
[\[239a.6\]]pa'o/_/de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs/_/shes rab thabs ni rgyur gyur pas/_/rang 'dod las ni bsgrub par bya/_/shes rab ye shes snang ba'o/_/thabs ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid do/_/rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di/_/thabs ni de yi grogs nyid do/_/
[\[239a.7\]]gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/_/nyon mongs lus las rnam par rgyal/_/srid pa'i nyes skyon du ma yang /_/srid pa dang ni rmongs pa gzhi/_/dngos po'i gnas ni mi rtag pas/_/de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs/_/dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/_/skye 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pa dang ni 'gag pa med/_/dngos po yongs su gnas pa med/_/'jigs pa yi ni rnam pa med/_dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'/_/dag dang ma dag dbus su ni/_/de yi mtshan nyid sngon shes nas/_/mnyam pa'i lta ba ldan par gzung /_/gzung dang 
[\[239b.2\]]'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/_/dngos po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs/_/sangs rgyas kyis rtogs bstan bcos las/_/yongs su brtags nas snying po blang /_/dngos med dngos por gzung par bya/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par spangs/_/dngos dang dngos 
[\[239b.3\]]med mnyam byas pas/_/'o ma bsrubs pa las ni mar/_/mchog gi snying po yang dag blang /_/mnyam par lta ba 'ba' zhig go/_/bstan bcos bstan zhing yongs shes na/_/de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med/_/yang dag lam la dmigs pa yis/_/dngos 
[\[239b.4\]]po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub/_/ji bzhin gnas kyi rim pa brten/_/ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong /_/gzhan gyi gnas las 'phangs pa yi/_/mnga' yis mnga' ni bsnun par bya/_/gong nas gong la sogs par blta/_/rang 'dod dngos por yang 
[\[239b.5\]]dag blang /_/bdun pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal/_/'khor pa'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni/_/gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/_/dgra yi dngos po gang du gnas/_/le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang /_/khro dang rmongs pa srod pa dang /_/khro ba yis ni yan lag 
[\[239b.6\]]gzir/_/thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par sbangs/_/le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas/_/gnyid kyis dge ba rnam par 'joms/_/khro ba yis ni sring pas 'dren/_/'dod pas dran pa rnam par nyams/_/rmongs pa yis ni gnyis kyis non/_/sreng ba yis ni 'khor 
[\[239b.7\]]bar 'jug_/bkres pas dman zhing sdang ba yi/_/bdud bdun po ni yongs su srangs/_/kun nas bdud kyis 'bigs pa yi/_/lus ni nyon mongs sdug bsngal gnas/_/rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis ni/_/dul bar bsrubs shing mnan par bya/_/gang 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]dang gang gi lam du ni/_/rang 'dod sems kyi 'bad pa yis/_/thams cad snying po bsdus nas ni/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/_/smon lam bla med rgyu yi ni/_/o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba 
[\[240a.2\]]shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_smon lam kun mchog don du ni/_/lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/_/rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas/_/sred dang rmongs pa rnam par spangs/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[240a.3\]]'khor dbus gnas par/_/bdag nyid lus ni rnam par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/_/dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/_/bdag nyid sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang /_/sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/_/rdo rje me 
[\[240a.4\]]'od rab 'phro ba/_/'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/dngos po dngos por bsgom par bya/_/A li kA li rab sbyor bas/_/sa bon sa bon byung ba yi/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa/_/rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla/_/rim bzhin 'gags 
[\[240a.5\]]pa'i phyi nas ni/_/bdag med shin tu mnyam par gzhag_/gzugs kun rnam par dbug nas ni/_/khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/_/zla ba la sogs bdag nyid med/_/kun nas thams cad stod par rig_/stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang /_/dngos med 
[\[240a.6\]]dngos por bsgoms pa yis/_/bsgoms nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni/_/rnam shes sgron ma lta bur 'bar/_/de yi 'od zer snang ba yis/_/khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni/_/'bar zhing rab tu phra ba'o/_/rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid/_/dngos dang 
[\[240a.7\]]dngos po med pa'i dbus/_/gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dang /_/'du shes 'du shes med par ldan/_/yud tsam lta bar rig pa'o/_/gzugs dang stong ba la sogs dbus/_/'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/_/'gog pa'i sbyor ba'i rim 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa ni/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/_/yan lag gzir med pa dang /_/sems kyi skyo ba med pa yis/_/rim dang rim pa tsam byas nas/_/'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o/_/rtag tu nyid kyi sems kyis ni/_/yang dag byang chub rim pa 
[\[240b.2\]]bstan/_/shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya/_/o~M b+ha ta li b+ta ta li pe ta mu khi hU~M phaT swA hA/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor gyis/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/_/gzugs kun rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi/_/btso ma'i gser dang 
[\[240b.3\]]'dra ba'i 'od/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje 'od zer kun nas 'phro/_/ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/_/sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/_/'dod dang grol ba rgya chen po'i/_/phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/_/dur khrod thal ba sogs 
[\[240b.4\]]blangs la/_/snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis/_/gang du dkyil 'khor sprul ba yis/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/_/rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/_/de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/_/thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/_/
[\[240b.5\]]dri dang bdug pa mar me dang /_/gtor ma'i de nyid de nyid dang /_/kun nas nya phyes dngos po yi/_/sna tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni/_/pho nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan/_/seng ge stag mo ce spyang dang /_/'ug pa mo ni phyogs 
[\[240b.6\]]bzhir ro/_/thams cad kun nas kun tu ni/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod/_/de yi shar gyi gnas su ni/_/me yi las ni rab tu bya/_/dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang /_/de yi shing gi ba dan gsum/_/de'am 'on te gdol pa'i mes/_/'bad 
[\[240b.7\]]pas me ni rab tu sbar/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres byas pas/_/mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing /_/bsregs pas lha mo tshim par 'gyur/_/thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang /_/
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mi bzad ku co rab sgrogs na/_/'jigs par mi 'joms par 'gyur/_/dbung gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi/_/rgyal bo myur du 'ong 'gyur na/_/de la tsham dam sbyin par bya/_/ri rab ri la sogs pa dang /_/sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba 
[\[241a.2\]]dang /_/sna tshogs mi bzad dri dang ni/_/'dren pa'i sems ni 'jig mi bya/_/sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas/_/khri phrag gcig tu bsreg byas na/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya 
[\[241a.3\]]ba dang /_/gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang /_/lus la ltos ba med pa yis/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni/_/me yi dbus su ston par byed/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/_/gtor ma dang ni ar+g+haM dbul/_/zab 
[\[241a.4\]]cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yi/_/de la lha mo tshig tu brjod/_/sems can chen po ci zhig 'grub/_/gang 'dod dngos grub rab tu smros/_/de la sgrub pos smras pa ni/_/dngos grub chen po 'grub ldan pa'i/_/gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod/_/grub pa brgyad 
[\[241a.5\]]ni gsol ba gdab/_/bdud dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis/_/gal te yid gnyis skyes nas ni/_/til mar chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/lcags kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya/_/rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/
[\[241a.6\]]dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/_/mchog gi lha mo bsgrub pa ni/_/lus dang srog la mi ltos par/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/de nas ye shes de nyid mchog_/shin tu phra la rab zhi ba/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/'byung ba 
[\[241a.7\]]kun la 'dis khyab pa/_/'od kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i mi/_/ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa/_/srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams/_/gang dug nas kyi rnam pa 'byung /_/lus la sems shing sems pa dang /_/bcu gnyis dus kyi gnas su yang /_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o/_/rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni/_/srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod/_/rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/_/srid pa'i 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba/_/dag pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yis/_/sgrib pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[241b.2\]]'joms pa yi/_/chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni/_/dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa'o/_/dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/_/legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can/_/'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag_/rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'/_/
[\[241b.3\]]bcu gnyis lus kyi bdag nyid can/_/rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas/_/dag pa'i chos kyi chu yis ni/_/lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru/_/rang bzhin pad+ma'i dbye ba yis/_/nyon mongs la sogs gdung ba gcod/_/rnam rtog 'jigs pa chen po 
[\[241b.4\]]ni/_/srid pa'i rgyu ste me bzhin no/_/de phyir rnam rtog ring du spang /_/rnal 'byor ba yi 'gro ba rtogs/_/mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas nas/_/kun nas thams cad mnyam par blta/_/rab tu mi gnas ming can la/_/las dang las kyi mtshan 
[\[241b.5\]]nyid med/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin yang /_/bdud rtsis lus ni tshim par bya/_/rtag tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o/_/dngos su med na rnam par brtag_/lcags kyu rnam pa lnga drangs nas/_/thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod/_/sbyor bas 
[\[241b.6\]]mkha' 'gro la sogs ni/_/bdag nyid dbang du myur du 'gyur/_/rtag tu de nyid kyis bza' zhing /_/med na gzhan las rnam par brtag_/gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bas ma/_/bza' ba yang na sha nyid du/_/rtag tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/_/rtags 
[\[241b.7\]]dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni/_/dag pa'i lus su gdon mi za/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor ba spangs pa/_/bgrod dang bgrod min rnam par spangs/_/lo ma'i dang ni 'dab ma'i rgyu/_/snod la thams cad myu gu'i/_/de yi pad+ma 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]rgyas byed pa/_/dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o/_/kha dog ngan zhing dri mi zhim/_/btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs/_/dag pa'i ngo bo gcod byed pa/_/gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o/_/kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang /_/gnod pa nam 
[\[242a.2\]]yang mi byed cing /_/sems can kun la snying brtse ba/_/gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/_/rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas/_/zab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni/_/thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong /_/bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/_/dag cing brtan 
[\[242a.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/lus gcig la ni rab lhos pa/_/rtag tu gsang sogs za ba ni/_/lnga ba'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs/_/brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/bsam gtan mchog tu brten byed pa/_/drug pa'i 
[\[242a.4\]]mtshan ma ru ni brtag_/bzo dang sgyu rtsal nyan pa dang /_/rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni/_/rtag tu sems can don la brtson/_/bdun pa yi ni mtshan mar bstan/_/mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi blo rtogs byed/_/srid pa 
[\[242a.5\]]yang dag byang chub lam/_/mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan/_/'ga' yang nam du mi smod cing /_/rdzas dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas/_/gdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang /_/rnam par rtog pas srid bar ltung /_/dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bzad 
[\[242a.6\]]pas/_/bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis/_/'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o/_/rnam rtog med pas mnyam par bya/_/dngos po mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas/_/sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni/_/rnam par mi rtog sems 
[\[242a.7\]]kyis bza'/_/bsgrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni/_/g.yong nga mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/_/chos kyi snying po snying po nyid/_/sems ni ye shes rang bzhin ldan/_/sbyor ba'i bstan bcos cha nyid ni/_/de nyid de nyid khyad par ro/_/sbyar dang bsam gtan byas 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa yis/_/rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/_/rnal 'byor rjes rnal 'byor dang /_/rnal 'byor las 'das gnas chen po/_/las bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i/_/ye shes kyis ni 'khor bsgrol/_/dang por bskyed rim spyod pa dang /_/dbugs kyi sbyor ba 
[\[242b.2\]]rim sogs dang /_/las la sems shing sems pa dang /_/dang po'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/me bzhin du ni za ba dang /_/mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta/_/rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du/_/rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 
[\[242b.3\]]ni/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o/_/gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o/_/dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar/_/phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs/_/sbyor ba las 
[\[242b.4\]]'das 'di nyid do/_/rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na/_/thams cad bdag med pa las byung /_/lus sogs stong bar rtogs pa ni/_/bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o/_/'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/_/chen po'i sems kyi sdom pa'o/_/rtag 
[\[242b.5\]]tu bya ba der 'jug pas/_/'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol ba'o/_/spyan ni pad+ma ltar yangs shing /_/bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa 'dra/_/'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten/_/bde bar spyo cing bde bar reg_/'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa/_/bde ba'i sems kyis 
[\[242b.6\]]bsgrub par bya/_/rnam par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/zla ba nyi ma kha 
[\[242b.7\]]sbyar nas/_/sor mo 'brel par byas nas ni/_/dri med gsum dang dud pas sprel/_/sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags/_/tsham dam phur bu ra ba dang /_/dra ba thams cad las nyid do/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/_/'di yi phyag rgyar bstan 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]par bya/_/kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni/_/rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang /_/spyi bor 'bar ba'i re ba dang /_/mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing /_/rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi gnas/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/_/'di 
[\[243a.2\]]ltar sa bon mdor byas pa/_/thams cad las ni bsgrub pa'o/_/lus la sgra yis kun tu dgang /_/gzugs la sogs pa zad par byed/_/sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni/_/sa bon lhag ma bsam par bya/_/go cha'i bsrung ba dang bral zhing /_/thams cad 
[\[243a.3\]]yan lag drug gi las/_/stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med/_/ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang /_/dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni/_/mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya/_/sngon du rig pas 
[\[243a.4\]]smon lam rnams/_/bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/_/gang zhing yid la 'dod spyod pa/_/de yi thabs ni rdo rje'i/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/rked pa'i phyogs su bzung nas ni/_/hU~M gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing /_/grub pa'i 
[\[243a.5\]]glu yis mnyam par bya/_/dza dza dza dza/_rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod/_/ha ha ha ha/_hU~M yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ba ba ba ba/_rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa/_/a a a a/_
[\[243a.6\]]a ho ma gu pa'i rdo rje A li gcig tu thim par hU~M/_/'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po/_/rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa/_/rtse gcig rnal 'byor sems bcas pas/_/khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/_/khams 
[\[243a.7\]]gsum snying po'i dbus su ni/_/rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas/_/sems nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/_/A li sa bon 'od 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dang bcas/_/las kyi sa bon mdog tu ni/_/mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/_/'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma/_/A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/_/ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/_/yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te/_/glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje 
[\[243b.2\]]dang /_/'og bag gis ni dkri bar bya/_/'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog bsgom pa/_/'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/_/phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni/_/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin/_/kun nas chu yis gang bar ni/_/phyogs brgyad du ni 
[\[243b.3\]]mnyam par ro/_/de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/_/pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/'o ma zla ba'i bon 'dzin/_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/_/de yi sa bon 
[\[243b.4\]]las skyes pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/_/kun dkar dang zla ba'i mdog_/phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang /_/dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/rdo rje snying gar mtha' 'dzin cing /_/g.yon pa 
[\[243b.5\]]dril bu dku ru brten/_/sgeg cing spro ba'i rang bzhin dang /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/_/dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i/_/rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba/_/'jigs 
[\[243b.6\]]pa med cing gnod med par/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/_/spro ba'i sems kyis mnyam par bsgom/_/dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang /_/phyag 'tshal A lir mthar bzhag pa/_/yi ge drug pa'i 
[\[243b.7\]]sngags chen po/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o/_/zlos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas/_/rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub/_/'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis/_/de nas de yi mngon du 'grub/_/de nas kun gyi snying po ni/_/skye 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba/_/gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor bas/_/'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o/_/rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang /_/ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs/_/rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni/_/dril bu mnan pa'i 
[\[244a.2\]]rkang pas gnon/_/pad+ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas/_/phyag rgya 'ching bar mchog tu brtson/_/dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par/_/rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg_/g.yon pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o/_/tshems kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing /_/gnyis 
[\[244a.3\]]kyis sems kyi mchog brtson par/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/_/thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni/_/sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya/_/mthar ni sgron ma'i 
[\[244a.4\]]rnam pa'o/_/dbus su A li'i sa bon ni/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phro/_/khams gsum kun gyi cha dang bcas/_/phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa/_/gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o/_/dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon/_/
[\[244a.5\]]'od dpag shes rab kyi ni gzhi/_/rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas/_/mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje gsang bas mtshan nas ni/_/gnyis ka 'khyud nas bzlas par bya/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas/_/dbus su A li'i sa 
[\[244a.6\]]bon ni/_/rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid/_/bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/_/kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya/_/shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so//_//de nas thams cad 
[\[244a.7\]]snying po ni/_/mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o/_/sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya/_/shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/_/dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/_/dag pa'i ngo bor 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bsgom pa nyid/_/de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa/_/bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid/_/btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o/_/'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas/_/sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams/_/'bad pas brtul zhugs gzung bar bya/_/rim 
[\[244b.2\]]pa bzhin du zla ba dang /_/nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su/_/brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/_/yon tan de yi yongs su bza'/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang /_/khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o/_/brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni/_/nan tan gyis 
[\[244b.3\]]ni gtor ma sbyin/_/de yi las rnams thams cad ni/_/ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs/_/de ltar bden pa'i sngags kun gyis/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byar pas/_/zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung /_/rang 'dod 
[\[244b.4\]]chos ni rab brtags na/_/thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re'am/_/gal te ma 'byor pa na yang /_/dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni/_/lo yi nyi ma gzung bar bya/_/mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/_/skyon 
[\[244b.5\]]med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas/_/de yis dus rnams thams cad du/_/dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas/_/rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga' bas/_/gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas/_/de yis chos la brten nas ni/_/mchog gi 
[\[244b.6\]]go 'phang bsgrub par bya/_/stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing /_/blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed/_/thams cad sdom pa nam mkha' ni/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam/_/thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni/_/'o ma zla ba'i sa 
[\[244b.7\]]bon bsam/_/'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni/_/dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog_/A li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo/_/dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya/_/skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni/_/zhal gsum 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]phyag ni drug pa nyid/_/kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_/steng du rdo rje cod pan dang /_/sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan/_/rgod dang khro dang sgeg 
[\[245a.2\]]pa dang /_/spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/smad g.yogs glang chen pags pa dang /_/mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/_/mi yi yan lag lnga rus pa'i/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/_/skra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing /_/me 'bar ba dang 
[\[245a.3\]]mnyam pa'i 'od/_/dang po'i phyag na kha T+wA~M ga/_/gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams/_/gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang /_/gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang /_/ral gri'i phyag ni steng du'o/_/rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med/_/
[\[245a.4\]]sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba/_/sa yi dbus su rnam rol bar/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/'ug pa ce spyang seng ge dang /_/stag mo phyogs su rnam par bsgom/_/bya rog ce spyang bya rgod dang /_/tsa li ka yi mtshams su dgod/_/'jigs 
[\[245a.5\]]pa'i sgra sgrogs mche ba gtsigs/_/ha hU~M rnam par 'jigs par byed/_/'di ltar mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang ma/_/bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya/_/rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya/_/rnal 'byor pa yi 
[\[245a.6\]]bris sku sogs/_/de yi gnas su kun tu bsam/_/'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/_/gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin/_/sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos/_/'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/_/bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang /_/gsang ba'i 
[\[245a.7\]]mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sems kyis hU~M gi sa bon las/_/de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod/_/bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/_/dag pa'i dngos por 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bsgoms nas ni/_/bsgrub pa shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis/_/o~M ha ho hrIHswA hA/_oM gyis 'bar bar bsam pa dang /_/ha yi rnam pas so sor rtogs/_/sa bon ho yis snang par byas/_/hrIHyi rnam pas dri ma sbyong /_/
[\[245b.2\]]lus kyi lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir/_/a yi rnam par rtogs par bya/_/sa bon lnga yis lha nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim/_/o~M dza~M g+h+ra~M trA~M hU~M a swA hA/_bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/_/sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya/_/oM gyis rnam 
[\[245b.3\]]pas lus dang ni/_/dza~M gyis rnam pas gzung ba dang /_/g+h+ra~M gyis rnam par lto ba dang /_/trA~M gis rnam par dri med lus/_/hU~M gis rnam pas spyad par bye/_/sems kyis snying gar yi ge a/_/de nyid rtag tu mchod byas na/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya/_/
[\[245b.4\]]dri dang mar me me tog dang /_/lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis/_/glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang /_/pi wang gling bu la sogs sbyar/_/rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod/_/'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang /_/'chag 
[\[245b.5\]]dang thams cad dus nyid du/_/rtag tu sems shing sems pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/_/oM a mu hU~M swA hA/_ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis/_/sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas na/_/sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing /_/rang 
[\[245b.6\]]'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i sdig_/gang gis gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang /_/rtag tu bsgom zhing bzlas byas na/_/sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/oM ka ra ka ra pra dz+r+wA ma hA tIk+Sh+Na pany+tsa oM bud+d+he ha/_oM kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a 
[\[245b.7\]]a a mu mu mu swA hA/_sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di/_/sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o/_/skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos/_/thams cad ldan pa'i sa bon ni/_/mtshan mo yi ni mtha' nyid dang /_/dang por ro hi ta dus la/_/nya phyis snod du chu 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang ni/_/ma gad+hA ni srang gnyis nyid/_/kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan/_/bdud rtsi bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/_/shin tu mnyam rnal 'byor pas/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags 
[\[246a.2\]]byas pa'i/_/de yi chu ni btung byas ni/_/sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa dang /_/ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku/_/yid gzhungs shes rab rno ba dang /_/rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing /_/kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni/_/thos dang shes rab 
[\[246a.3\]]nor dang ni/_/rlung mkhris dug dang bad kan dang /_/'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang /_/mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni/_/chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'grog_/o~M ra ta a brta ni/_sarba phA pha~M ha ran+tu ma~M hU~M/_bi kr-i ta kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di yi sngags 
[\[246a.4\]]ni sngags chen po/_/bsrung ba kun gyi bla na med/_/sngon gyi dus su gzhag byas nas/_/rnal 'byor lus ni bsrung ba'o/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/_/gnas lnga ru ni lan gsum mo/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsam nas/_/spyi bo'i steng du 
[\[246a.5\]]bskur byas nas/_/rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang /_/rkun mo dang ni me dang chu/_/rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs nad/_/'jigs byed 'jigs pa 'joms par byed/_/o~M bi mo ha ni sa~M mo ha ni/_sarba pri ye ti hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_'di yi sngags ni sngags chen 
[\[246a.6\]]pos/_/'gro kun rmongs par byed pa gsungs/_/mi byams byams pa skye byed cing /_/kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa yi ni chus/_/snga dro'i dus su kha bkrus na/_/rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 
[\[246a.7\]]'gyur/_/de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad/_/snying po las ni snying po mchog_/rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya/_/gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres/_/yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom/_/dug med pa yang dug gis bsnun/_/shin tu mi bzad 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rmongs pa yis/_/rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jigs/_/'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni/_/dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed/_/dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis/_/nyon mongs la sogs mun pa 'joms/_/nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la/_/sems dang 
[\[246b.2\]]sems ni rnam par thim/_/gcig sogs dngos po bsgom pa ni/_/'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/_/me yi lhag ma sogs lhags pa/_/dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher/_/de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas 
[\[246b.3\]]blta/_/sa bon 'di yi myu gu las/_/A li kA li rnam par 'byung /_/sa bon sa bon rab 'phro ba/_/nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam/_/pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par 
[\[246b.4\]]bzhugs/_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/_/lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang /_/spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/sgeg pa'i nyams kyis 
[\[246b.5\]]blta ba dang /_/na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs/_/mchog gi sems dang sems pa la/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam/_/lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+Shu~M/_/bzlas shing 'di yis drang par bya/_/gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing /_/rang 
[\[246b.6\]]gi dbugs kyis dga' bar bya/_/o~M rA ga ta rA ga ta b+ha ti hU~M k+Shu~M swA hA/_lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang /_/rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni/_/mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu bsgrub/_/gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/_/
[\[246b.7\]]sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las/_/grub pa'i snying po bsdus pa ni/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o/_/de nas ye shes lus la ni/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/_/bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/_/sbyang dang rtogs par spyad par 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bya/_/dngos por smad pa ma yin zhing /_/gang yang brtag par mi bya'o/_/mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs/_/mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o/_/gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa/_/sems kyis gnod par mi bya'o/_/gal te gnod pa 
[\[247a.2\]]byed sems na/_/rnal 'byor sdom pa ring bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig che dang phra ba yi/_/gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yis/_/rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o/_/rnal 'byor sdom pa ring pa nyid/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang /_/'khyal ba'i dag ni ring du spang /_/
[\[247a.3\]]gzhan gyi sems la gnod byas pas/_/rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/_/don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas/_/sbyor ba'i chos kyi snying po nyid/_/rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis/_/de yi rab sbyar smad pa nyid/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni/_/
[\[247a.4\]]bde ba bskyed pa'i lus kyis ni/_/sems can bde ba lhur len pas/_/theg pa che la legs par bslabs/_/gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i/_/mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra/_/sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do/_/
[\[247a.5\]]rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing /_/rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o/_/phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas/_/rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya/_/bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas/_/lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya/_/sems can don gyi ngo bo yis/_/
[\[247a.6\]]sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed/_/theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che/_/'di yis lam gyis bsten par bya/_/gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas/_/de dang der ni phan pas bde/_/sems can sdom pa la sogs pas/_/de yi sems ni gnod mi bya/_/
[\[247a.7\]]'khor bar skyes pa'i dus na ni/_/thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan/_/dngos po dngos med byed pa dang /_/sems can don ni A lir sgyur/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba bcings pa yis/_/de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni/_/skye 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o/_/'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i/_/A li mchog ni mtha' med do/_/gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni/_/phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid/_/bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal ldan zhing /_/sems can la ni snyan par stod/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[247b.2\]]lnga yi kun gyi lus/_/btso ma gser ltar 'bar ba'o/_/cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang /_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/dgod dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ni/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_/gnyis pa rdo 
[\[247b.3\]]rje zhags pa'o/_/g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang /_/gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi/_/phyag bzhi bo yi phyag rgya ni/_/gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang /_/lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru/_/snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag_/ha yi rnam pa'i 
[\[247b.4\]]sa bon ni/_/yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed/_/ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus/_/rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do/_/sems dang sems pa bsgoms pas ni/_/lha nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/thams cad lus dang lus can gyi/_/srog dang sems 
[\[247b.5\]]ni 'phrog pa'o/_/hrIHyi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/_/phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/_/o~M gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro/_/kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o/_/a yi rnam pa des tshim byed/_/blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten/_/bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni/_/
[\[247b.6\]]de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o/_/bdud rtsi gang gis myangs pa yis/_/bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob/_/de bzhin gshegs dgyes lha mo ni/_/gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis/_/phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar 
[\[247b.7\]]bya/_/rnal 'byor pa ni bsgrub 'dod na/_/gnyis ni gnyis su med par bsgom/_/gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas/_/ye shes ldan pas yongs su gsal/_/nga rgyal chen pos bcings pa ni/_/spros pa'i sems dang ldan pas bcings/_/sgeg 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dang khro ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim/_/nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/_/zla ba'i lag pas reg byas la/_/de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni/_/lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim/_/lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha/_/de yi 
[\[248a.2\]]gnas su tshim par bya/_/shes rab thabs la thim pa yis/_/gnyis med sbyor bas tshim pa nyid/_/o~M ha ho hrIHa/_sa bon chen bo'i sa bon ni/_/'di yis sa bon bsam par bya/_/rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni/_/sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no/_/lha 
[\[248a.3\]]mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog_/sgeg cing snyan par smra ba dang /_/nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed/_/brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas/_/kun nas skal ldan lha mos ni/_/rmongs byed 'jigs dang 'gugs par byed/_/yid mi gzhungs dang ngo 
[\[248a.4\]]tsha 'jigs/_/lha mo snyan mas 'joms par byed/_/de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan/_/yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo/_/'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang gnas/_/gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam/_/chu sbyar ne tso gtam dang ni/_/sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan 
[\[248a.5\]]pa'o/_/lha min brtson 'grus bdun pa ste/_/dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o/_/lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las/_/myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o/_/rnal 'byor ba yi bdag nyid sems/_/'dod pa'i sems kyi rnam par byed/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i 
[\[248a.6\]]mtshan nyid kyis/_/'bad pas thang ka sna tshogs dgram/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/_/kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni/_/bud med gzugs su de yi tshul/_/phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o/_/gzugs 
[\[248a.7\]]mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi/_/dung chen la sogs lag pa na/_/gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu/_/sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs/_/bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes/_/de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]me tog spos dang dri la sogs/_/gnyis med gtor mar yang dag ldan/_/dang por re zhig dam tshig gi/_/phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya/_/zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/_/rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan/_/oM hi li hi li hU~M phaT/_dam tshig 
[\[248b.2\]]sngags dang phyag rgya yis/_/mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/_/oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha ho hrIHa swA hA/_nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/_/zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la/_/snying po'i snying dang phyag rgya yis/_/rang 
[\[248b.3\]]'dod las ni rab tu byed/_/'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/_/phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las/_/gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis so/_/me thab kha ran gsum par ni/_/snang byed shing ni rab sbar la/_/lha 
[\[248b.4\]]mi'i me tog rgyas pa ni/_/sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la/_/bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsre/_/gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung /_/brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg byas na/_/nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o/_/me yi lha sogs thal ba dang /_/bdag nyid khu ba 
[\[248b.5\]]lan lnga ru/_/bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na/_/bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed/_/smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang /_/u dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa/_/bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na/_/myur du smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/_/nim pa la sogs rtse mo la/_/
[\[248b.6\]]mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/_/me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang /_/gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/_/arga dkar po'i rtsa ba las/_/'bad pas me ni rab tu sbrar/_/pad+mo zhib mo phye ma ni/_/'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis bsku/_/brgyad brgya ru bsreg 
[\[248b.7\]]byas pa yi/_/lhag ma'i thal ba bsgos pa'o/_/tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba'i chus/_/lan bdun bsgos la grib mar bskam/_/mchod pa'i dus rnal 'byor pas/_/de yi thal ba bdud rtsi chus/_/myur ba nyid du bsgos pa ni/_/kha ba kun+da 'o ma ru/_/lus 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]ni rmongs pa'i gzugs dang ni/_/shin tu rmongs shing rmongs pa'i dri/_/pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni/_/stobs dang gzi brjid don med pa'o/_/rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la/_/'di yis las kyis rab tu sbyar/_/rmongs pa spangs 
[\[249a.2\]]pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/'gro ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/_/'di yis phye ma blangs byas la/_/dzA ti mar khu lan gsum spang /_/bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni/_/thal ba lhan cig bsres byas nas/_/thig le lce yis myangs pa yis/_/pho nya brgyad 
[\[249a.3\]]kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/_/pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa/_/smyo zhing rgyags shing rgyags pa'o/_/smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang /_/'bad pas me ni rab sbar la/_/me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan/_/brgya brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/_/de yi thal ba blangs 
[\[249a.4\]]nas ni/_/rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya/_/bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni/_/thal pa de yis byugs byas na/_/chu yis mdog ni gzhan du dang /_/de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur/_/sbrang rtsi 'o mar ldan pa yis/_/de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/_/de 
[\[249a.5\]]yi thal ba blangs byas la/_/sku gsum pa yi cha dang bsre/_/bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang /_/ma ru tse yi cha brgyad nyid/_/mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni/_/de yi thal ba blugs byas na/_/gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni/_/bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig_/
[\[249a.6\]]gang dang gang gis lam gyis ni/_/de dang de yi rmongs pa rnams/_/sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir/_/rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya/_/gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya/_/rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o/_/sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang /_/shes 
[\[249a.7\]]rab dman la sogs pas dman/_/gdan bzhi ba yi rgyud kyi ni/_/gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyi ni/_/dngos grub snying po btus pa ni/_/de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o/_/sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni/_/gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/mchog 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas/_/byin gyis brlabs kyis rim pas bsgrub/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/_/gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni/_/gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub/_/gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya/_/sngon du ras 
[\[249b.2\]]kyi mtshan nyid dang /_/gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang /_/gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang /_/bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid/_/gleng gzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/_/mnyams kha tshar yang dag ldan/_/steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa/_/ras la zhi 
[\[249b.3\]]ba'i ri mo bri/_/ma lhung ba yi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gos/_/ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya/_/tshon gyis ma phog cha la ni/_/rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo yi dmar po'i ras/_/ma ltung bar ni rab tu spyad/_/tshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba/_/dbang 
[\[249b.4\]]nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/ra nag po yi pags pa dang /_/ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la/_/gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las/_/mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do/_/de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni/_/thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya/_/cha gsum 
[\[249b.5\]]du ni rab tu bsgo/_/gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya/_/cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o/_/gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni/_/tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni/_/cha lnga pa ni bdun du'o/_/lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod/_/zhi dang yan lag mnyam pa'o/_/
[\[249b.6\]]zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do/_/mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o/_/mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do/_/rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad/_/zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid/_/dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do/_/smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i ltag_/mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad/_/
[\[249b.7\]]bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o/_/de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do/_/mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni/_/brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/_/snying ga'i gnas dang lte bar ni/_/mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o/_/nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa/_/brang du nu ma 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]gnyis mnan la/_/lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni/_/lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o/_/sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni/_/brla dang rje dar kun tu ldan/_/bus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o/_/rkang pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin no/_/bcu 
[\[250a.2\]]gnyis ta la'i tshad kyi ni/_/lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bri/_/lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni/_/lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o/_/dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni/_/sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o/_/dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/kun nas na bza'i 'od zer 
[\[250a.3\]]sogs/_/rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni/_/ta la bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad/_/'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang /_/nye bar mdzes sogs ri mo bri/_/steng gi lhag pa'i cha la ni/_/rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o/_/las kyi mdog sogs mdog tu ni/_/'dod 
[\[250a.4\]]bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya/_/gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni/_/bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o/_/de yi ta la'i tshad la ni/_/phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/_/sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la/_/zhi ba'i lha yi rnam pa'o/_/de yi ta las zhal bzhin 
[\[250a.5\]]bya/_/gsus khyim che zhing che ba nyid/_/kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni/_/sor mo gnyis ni dor bar bya/_/khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/_/bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni/_/drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/_/ta la bcur ni bri ba'o/_/dkyil 
[\[250a.6\]]'khor bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/_/mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan/_/ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni/_/ta la'i steng du dor bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni/_/rim dang rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/dbus su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha/_/gcig 
[\[250a.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/_/mgrin pa ko sko zhabs nyid ni/_/de gsum ring na nyes skyon no/_/sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni/_/skrod dang gnas ni brlag pa'o/_/shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni/_/de gsum thung ba'i nyes pa ni/_/nges par dngos 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]grub brlag pa dang /_/de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid/_/rje ngar zhabs dang mkhur tshos ni/_/de gsum sbom pa nyes pa che/_/nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni/_/bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo /_/'gram pa brang dang rtsib logs ni/_/de gsum 
[\[250b.2\]]dma' na skyon che'o/_/yun mi ring ba myur du ni/_/nor ni brlag par 'gyur ba'o/_/nu ma rna ba dpral ba ni/_/de gsum yo na skyon che'o/_/'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe bar/_/myur du sgrub po 'gyur ba'o/_/brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni/_/de gsum 
[\[250b.3\]]dma' na skyon che'o/_/dgras ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /_/'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/_/sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang /_/rna ba mchu dang [(]dbral [,]dpral [)]ba ni/_/bgegs dang bdud dang mes 'jigs shing /_/dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/_/gyen du lta 
[\[250b.4\]]ba'i dbu dang ni/_/gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa/_/brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni/_/nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags/_/'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang /_/phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni/_/mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar/_/sgrub po'i gzugs 
[\[250b.5\]]brnyan nyes skyon no/_/rgyab yol gdugs dang ba dan ni/_/rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni/_/'chi zhing dpal nyams brlag pa dang /_/mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o/_/de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen pos/_/dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang /_/
