[\[250b.6\]]sems ni shin tu mnyam gzha pas/_/rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod/_/mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan/_/sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni/_/dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha/_/zhi ba la ni zhi 
[\[250b.7\]]ba'i tshul/_/drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung /_/dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis/_/dgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang /_/khro ba'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni/_/bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul/_/las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du/_/bdag nyid kyi ni 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]kha dog bsgyur/_/de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yi/_/dngos grub myur du rdzogs pa dang /_/rnal 'byor ba yi 'dod pa las/_/sngags pas thang ka'i ri mo bri/_/na maHsaman+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/_sa~M bod+ha ni/_bi shud+d+ha/_na maHsarba b+hi ga ha re nam 
[\[251a.2\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sngags pa yis ni sngags 'di yis/_/ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o/_/thams cad las kyis sngags kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/_/gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas/_/sgrub pos thang ka bsgrub par 
[\[251a.3\]]bya/_/gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/_/sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis ni gos blangs la/_/gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi/_/nan tan gyis ni thang ka brgyad/_/thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 
[\[251a.4\]]ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/phyag gnyis pa la thang ka mdzes/_/rdo rje cod pan mthon ka'i rtse/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/
[\[251a.5\]]dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang /_/rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing /_/snying gar gnon pa mchog tu brtson/_/g.yon par dril bu mngon ldan pas/_/rked pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon/_/bco ma gser gyi kha dog dang /_/sgeg cing shin 
[\[251a.6\]]tu bzhad pa'i zhal/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor la brten par/_/khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro/_/dkar dang zla ba kun+da'i mdog_/lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing /_/rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar/_/phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/_/
[\[251a.7\]]tshams kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/_/myos pas khro bo mchog gi ste/_/rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/_/chags pa'i gos dkar mnabs pa nyid/_/ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro/_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i/_/'di ltar rdo 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rje dbang phyug rgyal/_/pad+ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni/_/mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni/_/gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o/_/gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di/_/rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni/_/rgyan kun gyis ni 
[\[251b.2\]]rnam par brgyan/_/phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa/_/phyogs kyi mdog tu btso bar bya/_/dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/_/lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o/_/phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni/_/lha mo bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rdo rje byang gi cha la ni/_/
[\[251b.3\]]lha mo snyan par smra ba ni/_/de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/_/pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/_/snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog_/bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod/_/
[\[251b.4\]]sgeg pa'i nyams kyi lta ba ru/_/mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya/_/ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/_/lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma/_/btso ma gser gyi mdog dang ni/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/
[\[251b.5\]]lha mo gzhon nu grub pa ni/_/lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni/_/gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan/_/rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni/_/'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can/_/sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/bdud 
[\[251b.6\]]rtsi'i bum pa phyag gnyis na/_/gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang /_/gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid/_/dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/_/thams cad kun la gzugs mdzes par/_/rnam par brtags te ri mo bri/_/rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang /_/
[\[251b.7\]]dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/phyag ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs/_/de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/_/rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya/_/lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]gtor mas mchod/_/o~M sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hU~M/_nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra hU~M phaT/_nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/_/ye shes kyi ni pad+ma mnan/_/dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[252a.2\]]yan lag drug tu bsrung bar bya/_/ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/dkar po dang nis gdugs bsgreng /_/'khyil ba ras gdugs 'khyud byas la/_/dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo /_/o~M badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_phyag rgya de gnyis brtan 
[\[252a.3\]]bcings la/_/dkar bo dang ni gi wang sbrel/_/zhags ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/_/kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan/_/o~M badzra pA sha hU~M/_phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags 
[\[252a.4\]]sgrog gis/_/lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya/_/khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan/_/sa gdugs pad+ma sprel byas la/_/kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o/_/spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas/_/sor mo gnyis 
[\[252a.5\]]ka bsgreng byas la/_/zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas la/_/snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/oM su ra ta badzra hU~M dza/_khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la/_/nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/_/shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/_/snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M 
[\[252a.6\]]shri ye ba ti hU~M phu swA hA/_phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te/_/ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgreng /_/oM su kri ye hU~M phu swA hA/_byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/_/snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/_/dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng /_/
[\[252a.7\]]oM su ru su ru ma dur hU~M phu swA hA/_nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/_/snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/_/sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya/_/oM pri ya~M me khA la hU~M phu swA hA/_lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gis/_/snying po 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang /_/mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shus mchod/_/'dod dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas/_/las rnams thams cad grub byed pa/_/
[\[252b.2\]]rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba/_/rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed/_/de nas kun gyi snying po ni/_/khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni/_/dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi/_/khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro/_/
[\[252b.3\]]'jigs pa theg pa rnam pa gsum/_/lha mo'i lta bas 'jigs par byed/_/bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing /_/bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang /_/gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang /_/'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang bsgrub/_/tshangs pa 
[\[252b.4\]]mnan cing nyed pa dang /_/tsa muN+Di ni drag pos 'gugs/_/'jigs byed kun nas bsgrubs pa yang /_/mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub par bya/_/re zhig dang po bris pa'i sku/_/mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/_/bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs dang ni/_/
[\[252b.5\]]sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa/_/lha mo dka' zlog gdan du ni/_/rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/_/'od zer sngon po 'bar 
[\[252b.6\]]ba'i zhal/_/rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni/_/tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan/_/spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can/_/dmar zhing dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan/_/'khyil zhing rnam par gyes pa yi/_/dbu sgra dmar pos rnam par brgyan/_/rus 
[\[252b.7\]]ba'i thod pa'i phreng ba yis/_/sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no/_/bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yis/_/klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs/_/zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o/_/glang chen pags pa 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bsnams pa'o/_/mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/_/rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du/_dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas mgo bo'i phrang ba dang /_/mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'bar/_/steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni/_/
[\[253a.2\]]gnyis pa la ni kha T+wA~M ga/_/gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o/_/g.yas pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang /_/gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o/_/gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan/_/rgan byad drag mo 'jigs su rung /_/zhags pas bcings shing rnam par 
[\[253a.3\]]brgyan/_/drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs/_/khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni/_/so sor dbus su brgyan pa yi/_/so so'i pho na rab tu bsgrub/_/tshon bdun gyis ni gos pa yi/_/rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu spro/_/khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i 
[\[253a.4\]]lus/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can/_/mi yi keng rus keng rus dang /_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/_/ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag_/drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul/_/bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa/_/shin 
[\[253a.5\]]tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/_/zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/_/khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa bstan/_/khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang /_/ce sbyang srin po khyi la sogs/_/'jigs pa'i ku cho rab 
[\[253a.6\]]sgrogs dang /_/mi yi keng rus gyis bkang ba'i/_/de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas/_/'dod dang thar pa don gnyer dang /_/thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i/_/sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya/_/o~M ta hU~M ma tha ma tha du Sh+DA na g+hA ta 
[\[253a.7\]]ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis/_/las rnams kun nas rab tu byed/_/spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri/_/rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun ldan pas/_/dpa' bo mchod sogs yang dag ldan/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]cho ga'i yan lag sbyin sreg las/_/gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid/_/ma brtags pa yi sha dang ni/_/khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las/_/gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/_/de yi rnam pas tshim par bya/_/o~M bi tri t+ti nA ma ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_zla 
[\[253b.2\]]ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/dkar po gi wang sbrel byas nas/_/sa yi gdugs dang pad+ma sbrel/_/de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang /_/sngags de nyid ni rnam par sbyar/_/phur bu ra ba tsham ngam dang /_/dra ba ge cha mtshon cha rnams/_/
[\[253b.3\]]las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni/_/phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu grags/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid snying gar bcing /_/ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar/_/o~M kro d+ha ni hU~M a/_snying po mchog gi sa bon dang /_/phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya/_/lus dang srog la ltos 
[\[253b.4\]]med par/_/chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni/_/rno ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni/_/thabs cig gis ni mtshan nyid do/_/chu yi 'gram gyi sa phyogs su/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs 
[\[253b.5\]]bya/_/'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa dang /_/phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so/_/zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni/_/me yi las la sogs pa bya/_/nag por yi sha dang ni/_/khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni/_/bris sku la sogs gzugs brnyan 
[\[253b.6\]]mdun/_/rdzogs pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya/_gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/_/thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang /_/mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub/_/dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis/_/bum pa rgya 
[\[253b.7\]]cher mchod pa yis/_/nad kyi yan lag gzir ba la/_/sngon du dbang bskur byin byas nas/_/nad kun dang ni bral ba dang /_/de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid/_/skal ba dman dang mi byams pas/_/thams cad zhi ba thob par 'gyur/_/ser po'i 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]tshon dang spra tshil las/_/log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid/_/mnyam pa'i gdan la thal mo sbyar/_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/mche ba gtsigs pa yan lag rgyas/_/pad+ma'i snod la gnas pa ni/_/rtse gsum 
[\[254a.2\]]dang ni bza' ba'i snod/_/dgra sta la phug phyag na'o/_/sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/_/'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/_/groga'am ni shing shun la/_/gi wang dang ni gur 
[\[254a.3\]]gum gyis/_/sgrub pa po yi gzugs brnyan bri/_/gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa/_/snying gar ming ni bri bar bya/_/g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa/_/lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang /_/dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya/_/bgegs kyi 
[\[254a.4\]]dbang pa yi ni gdan/_/snying gar mnan nas gzhag par bya/_/me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/_/nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las/_/don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i/_/rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas/_/o~M tra~M tha tha tha hU~M 
[\[254a.5\]]dza swA hA/_me tog dkar po la bzlas shing /_/re re zhing ni brdeg par bya/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/sngags 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis/_/sgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing /_/myur du 'gugs 
[\[254a.6\]]shing yon pa'o/_/rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal tshab dang /_/phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid lus/_/sha tsi dang ni brgya byin sogs/_/gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis/_/
[\[254a.7\]]sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/_/ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar/_/dus rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud/_/nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo bas/_/nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis/_/las dang las ni myur du 'grub/_/khro bo'i 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]lus rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa/_/brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/_/ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas/_/spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/mi bzad 'khor ba 'jigs pa ni/_/
[\[254b.2\]]chags pas srid par ltung ba'o/_/chags pa spangs pa'i lus kyi ni/_/rgyun du brtul zhugs yang bzung ngo /_/dben par shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa'o/_/chags pas srid par ltung ba dang /_/zhen pas 'khor 
[\[254b.3\]]bar 'jug par byed/_/rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs/_/sems can don du chos bstan phyir/_/sems can don byed gyur pas kyang /_/brtul zhugs dka' thub mi bzad pas/_/dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/_/chags pa'i nyes pa rgya 
[\[254b.4\]]mtshor 'khor/_/bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir/_/sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go/_/sems can don 'gyur dus su ni/_/spyod dang sdom pa'i ston bzhin no/_/'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/_/dga' ba ru ni lus bsrung ngo /_/dang po re zhig 
[\[254b.5\]]rnal 'byor pas/_/bstan bcos tshig rnams blangs byas nas/_/sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/_/rab tu rno bas chos spyad do/_/gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i/_/nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo /_/bza' dang bza' min par rtog pa'i/_/dman 
[\[254b.6\]]sogs nges par mi bya'o/_/'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis/_/lha ma mkhan nya pa shan pa dang /_/bram ze dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams/_/mnyam pa'i sems kyi lam gyis ni/_/rtag tu slong mo bslang bar bya/_/gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe/_/
[\[254b.7\]]gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang /_/mal cha ras dang mchil lham yang /_/longs spyod longs spyod yid 'ong ba'i/_/brtul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni/_/rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/_/spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas/_/bsod nams 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]lag tu blang bar bya/_/thams cad bslangs kyang nyes med de/_/dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo /_/sems ni rnam par dag pa yis/_/thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid/_/dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis/_/de yi gnas ni 
[\[255a.2\]]yongs su spangs/_/dad pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /_/yang na gtor ma'i las la ni/_/bsags pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni/_/de yi gnas su dbul bar bya/_/chos gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni/_/slar yang gus pa yis ni gzung /_/spyi bor 
[\[255a.3\]]ngur smrig mtshan ma dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang /_/rnying pa'i tshem ber chos gos gsum/_/steng du rdo rje dbyug pa dang /_/lhung bzed mchan khung chu tshags bcas/_/de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni/_/glegs bam la sogs gzhan 
[\[255a.4\]]yang med/_/grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/_/rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang /_/chos don rtsa pa snying rje nyid/_/de nas bslab par bya ba ni/_/bla ma'i tshig gi sdom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu 
[\[255a.5\]]'phrul che/_/mchog la skyabs dang skyabs su mchi/_/rdo rje dbang phyug mchog gi lus/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/_/lha mo shes rab sbyor rang bzhin/_/mkha' 'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mu ka sa ma yo ha~M sa ma ya/_a mu 
[\[255a.6\]]ka sa ma yo/_o~M a mu ka sa ma yo/_ha~M sa ma ya/_o~M badzra badzra/_ma hA badzra badzra/_kA ya su par/_hi hi hi/_ho ho ho/_hU~M na ni ba ta da~M/_'di yis slob ma rab tu gzung /_/brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje can/_/gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub 
[\[255a.7\]]par bya/_/sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rig pas/_/thams cad dus dang dus nyid du/_/tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya/_/gang zhig pha dang gang zhig ma/_/gang zhig mdza' ba'ang mi rtag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas lus ni sgya ma nyid/_/rtag tu 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]chos kyis yongs su skyob/_/kye ma stong ba nyid kyi mthus/_/dngos kun rnam par mnan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/_/mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/_/rmongs pa bcad pa'i don du ni/_/dus gsum du ni tshigs bcad brjod/_/'chag 
[\[255b.2\]]dang nyal dang 'gro ba dang /_/'dug dang 'gro ba thams cad du/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba brtan byas nas/_/sems dang sems kyis nyal bar bya/_/skye dang skye bar brgyud pa yi/_/'byung ba lnga yi lus kyi sdig_/nyin mtshan gnyis kyi spyod pa yis/_/
[\[255b.3\]]lus kyi dri ma dag pa nyid/_/zla ba drug tu spyad byas pas/_/rang 'dod lha ni 'grub pa'o/_/brtul zhugs spyad pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/mi shes pas kyang ye shes 'thob/_/de ltar yon tan rang bzhin zhing /_/brtul zhugs spyod pa yi ni rgyu/_/brtul 
[\[255b.4\]]zhugs sbyor ba sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad rmongs pa rnam par spangs/_/thabs kyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/_/mnyam nyid lta ba rdzogs byas nas/_/rnam dag lta ba 'ba' zhig go/_/kun nas stong pa mnyam pa'i ros/_/dngos po kun gyi mtshan 
[\[255b.5\]]nyid med/_/kun nas stong pa nyid kyi mthar/_/rnam par rtog pa ji lta bur/_/rmongs pas brtags shing rnam brtags pa'i/_/dag pa'i sems dang sems par bcas/_/rmongs pa nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i lus/_/'dod pa khro bo'i gzhi de ni/_/rno 
[\[255b.6\]]ba'i sems kyis rmongs pa ni/_/ye shes ldan pa'i lus kyi dbye/_/snum pa'i bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos/_/sna tshogs dbang bos reg pa yis/_/gti mug chags pas go bzlog pas/_/srid par ltung ba'i las su 'gyur/_/las ni bya ba'i dbang 
[\[255b.7\]]por 'gyur/_/rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag pa'o/_/'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms/_/srid par 'ching ba'i bza' ba'o/_/'byung po 'byung la brtse ba dang /_/kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go/_/mgon med sdug bsngal phongs pa la/_/nor bas 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]mnar med gyur pa bzhin/_/'jig rten 'dir ni rma 'bebs dang /_/mtshang 'dru ba ni mchog tu gtso/_/theg pa che la legs bslabs pas/_/ngan 'gro'i dngos por yang ma yin/_/kun nas bza' dang legs bza' bas/_/yang 
[\[256a.2\]]dag dga' bas lus bsrung ngo /_/rnying pa'i bza' ston ngan pa yis/_/nges par bdag nyid dga' bar bya/_/sngon gyi bslab sogs bslab pa dang /_/sngon du thams cad bsdam pa nyid/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/_/mnar 
[\[256a.3\]]med dmigs pa med pa'o/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/_/sngon du bslab sogs bslab par bya/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/_/bslab pa gus pas bslab par bya/_/bud med 'jigs gzugs drag mo nyid/_/skra ni 
[\[256a.4\]]'jings shing 'khyil pa dang /_/ngur smrig dmar po 'jam pa nyid/_/phra mo'i rdul gyis 'jam pa bgo/_/mi yi rus pas byas pa yang /_/bud med rgyan du rnam par brgyan/_/rnying pa'i tshom ber dmar po ni/_/mi yi pags pas g.yog par bya/_/
[\[256a.5\]]snod chen po ni gnyis pa ru/_/bzung la dbang po lnga ni gzung /_/steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni/_/mi yi yan lag rus pas brgyan/_/ba dan dril bu phreng ba ni/_/dbyug pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung /_/de ltar bsdus pa'i lus kyis ni/_/'bad 
[\[256a.6\]]pas brtul zhugs spyod par bya/_/'di ltar rdzas sogs dngos po ni/_/me bzhin 'bar bas reg mi bya/_/bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan/_/dang po bsdu bar yang mi bya/_/snying rjer phan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar 
[\[256a.7\]]bya/_/thams cad gnod pa don med pas/_/dngos po kun nas yongs su sbang /_/lus ni bsrungs pa tsam gyis ni/_/slong mo'i bza' ba bslang bar bya/_/stong pa'i khyim dang dur khrod dang /_/bas mtha' dang ni dgon par gnas/_/mtshan mo 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]kun nas bgrod par ni/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog tu brtson/_/'chag dang nyal dang 'dug pa'am/_/shel gyi rnam pa'i sems dang ni/_/rang bzhin yongs su dag pa nyid/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan 'ba' zhig go/_/de yis thams cad 
[\[256b.2\]]'grub 'gyur bar/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa nyid/_/sdig spangs rnam par spyod pa yis/_/'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa'o/_/thams cad dngos po dngos med par/_/rtag tu sems kyis blta ba nyid/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni/_/
[\[256b.3\]]de nas tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod/_/sbyin pa chos kyis bsrung ba ni/_/tshigs bcad gcig gis gnang bar bya/_/e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus/_/lus can kun nas dbang du byas/_/'dod sogs chos sogs mi bzad pas/_/mkhas pa 
[\[256b.4\]]yis ni yongs su spangs/_/dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtogs pas/_/srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing /_/dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob/_/gzhan gyis brtags pa'i longs spyod sogs/_/nyal dang 'chag 
[\[256b.5\]]par dus gsum du/_/rnal 'byor tshigs bcad gcig gis ni/_/rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed pa'o/_/sems chen po yi sems kyi ni/_/rnying pa'i ras ni bsags pa yis/_/de yi gos su rab tu bgos/_/keng rus kyi ni yan lag kun/_/
[\[256b.6\]]shin tu mjos pa'i dbyug pa bzung /_/pa Ta ha yi chos kyis brdung /_/rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid/_/sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu ru ni/_/grong nas grong du kun tu rgyu/_/dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/brtul zhugs spyod pas mnyam par 
[\[256b.7\]]gzhag_/dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas/_/dga' ba yis ni bsrung bar bya/_/spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur pas/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam bsal zhing /_/nyes pa kun nas rnam spangs la/_/brtul zhugs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]zla drug spyad pa yi/_/rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//de nas thams cad snying po ni/_/de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa/_/'khor ba'i 
[\[257a.2\]]brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/_/kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o/_/dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/_/rdo rje'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/_/
[\[257a.3\]]'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas/_/phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/spra tshil las ni gzugs brnyan bya/_/tsha ba'i mar khus byugs byas la/_/snying gar ming ni bzhag pa dang /_/tshigs dang tshigs su tsher 
[\[257a.4\]]mas dgang /_/skyur bo tshwa dang ma ru tser/_/gzugs brnyan dang ni yang dag ldan/_/snod du bsres la yang dag gzhag_/ye shes lus la lus kyi ni/_/rkang pa g.yas pas mnan par bya/_/rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas byas pas/_/mtshan mo 
[\[257a.5\]]gcig gi mtha' ru ni/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/smin pa'i me la gzhag byas na/_/rgyal po myur du gdung bar 'gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/_/las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya/_/hrIHa mo g+ha si si da ha da ha gr-i h+Na hU~M hrIH
[\[257a.6\]]phaT/_snga dro nyi ma shar dus la/_/me tog dkar po'i maN+Dal dang /_/spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis/_/zhi ba'i las ni rnam par bya/_/chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i snang /_/der ni gtor ma sbyar nas ni/_/sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/_/rgyal po 
[\[257a.7\]]nad dang bral bar 'gyur/_/oM a mr-i ta b+ha re de hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a a a/_thams cad las ni bsdus byas la/_/chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur/_/rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so//_//de nas rab sbyor snying po 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]'di/_/sngags bas rab tu rnam par spyad/_/yungs kar las ni gzugs brnyan bya/_/snying gar ming ni rnam par sbyar/_/rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro/_/rkang pas mnan cing bzlas par bya/_/su tI k+Sha NA shU la hU~M dza phaT hrIH/_me la bsro zhing gdung ba dang /_/
[\[257b.2\]]lhag par bzlas shing gzhag par bya/_/'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/_/mod la gzer bas yang 'dzin to/_/zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las/_/'o ma dang ni sbrang rtsis bkru/_/chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na/_/gzer zhing gzer ba'i nad dang 
[\[257b.3\]]bral/_/oM sarba ka ri hU~M dza swA hA/_gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags go/_/de nas thams cad snying po yis/_/gzhan gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/sngon du bsnyen sogs bsten byas pas/_/las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/_/nag po'i mtha' 
[\[257b.4\]]dang tha ma la/_/ba skam gyi ni lci ba las/_/bsgrub bya yi ni ming dang gzugs/_/dmar po'i tsan+dan gyis ni bsku/_/bsgrub bya'i ming ni kun nas gzhag_/seng ldeng phur bas mig 'bras la/_/g.yon pa'i rkang bas mnan nas ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du 
[\[257b.5\]]bzlas byas shing /_/me la bdug cing bdugs pa yis/_/mig ni gzer bas 'dzin par 'gyur/_/oM tsak+Shu ma li ni hU~M phaT/_'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/zhi ba'i mchod pas mchod byas nas/_/oM badzra 
[\[257b.6\]]tIk+Sha NA ya hU~M swA hA/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas/_/de yi 'o rgyun la bkrus nas/_/bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/_/mig 'bras rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur/_/mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/_/lhad tsher las ni 
[\[257b.7\]]bsgrub par bya/_/mkhas pas khrag gis bri pa'o/_/dug dang dur khrod sol ba yis/_/mig gi 'bras bu byugs byas la/_/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o/_/o~M kr-iSh+NA ping+ga li hU~M kha~M phaT/_'di yi sngags dang 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]sngags kyis ni/_/bdag nyid lci bas bran par bya/_/de ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas/_/bsgrub bya myur du long bar 'gyur/_/sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas/_/bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon 
[\[258a.2\]]par bzlas/_/oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a swA hA/_long ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/_/gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos/_/las ni shin tu rnam par spyad/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur 
[\[258a.3\]]ro/_/bag zan las ni pad+ma'i dbyibs/_/bsgrub bya'i ming ni dbus nyid do/_/khyi yi spu yis bug pa dgang /_/tsha ba'i mar khus bskus byas la/_/g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/oM badzra ba ke hU~M phu phaT/_me la bsro zhing 
[\[258a.4\]]bsros pa yis/_/b+ha ga myur du bzlog par bya/_/shin tu gdug pa'i chung ma ni/_/'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar/_/lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas/_/sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru/_/oM su ko b+ha bi hU~M he swA hA/_zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[258a.5\]]'jim pa'i snod ni blangs byas la/_/pad+ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya/_/rno ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis/_/bug pa dgang zhing sbyar bar bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/_/seng ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing /_/sngags ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na/_/
[\[258a.6\]]b+ha ga gzir zhing gzir bar 'gyur/_/hri pi la ta hU~M phaT/_'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/_/b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid do/_/chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing /_/sngags kyang mngon du sbyar bar bya/_/oM sarba sho d+ha ni swA hA/_'di yi sngags dang sngags 
[\[258a.7\]]kyis ni/_/b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo/_/gzhan yang las kyis mtshan nyid ni/_/shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad do/_/rgyal po lam gyi sa rdul blang /_/yang na bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las/_/pad+ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni/_/b+ha ga'i snying po khrag 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]dang ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phyag rgya phyag rgya yis/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas/_/hri pri phaT/_'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/_/pad+ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur/_/oM a mri ta wa ti swA hA/_dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang /_/bla ma dang ni slob 
[\[258b.2\]]dpon smod/_/dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni/_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni/_/las kyi rtag tu byas nas ni/_/'dis ni nges par ltung ba ru/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs the tshom med/_/las kyi rab tu dbye ba 
[\[258b.3\]]zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so/_///gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don/_/snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus pa/_/rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi/_/de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas/_/gnyis med dngos po ngo bo las/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 
[\[258b.4\]]'gyur/_/gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas/_/gnyis dngos dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po dngos min dngos med la/_/mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su/_/rnam par brtan dang brten bya med/_/rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang /_/gzugs 
[\[258b.5\]]dang gzugs can zad par byed/_/rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni/_/bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya/_/dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/thams cad dbyings su 'jig par byed/_/stong nyid stong la 
[\[258b.6\]]sogs stong pa'i/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid/_/dag cing phra la phra ba'i don/_/sems dang sems pa dang bcas pa/_/kun tu dngos po dngos med pas/_/thams cad nam mkha' bsngams pa'o/_/rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i 
[\[258b.7\]]don/_/nam mkha'i khams ltar brtan sems pas/_/me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro/_/chu skyar bzhin du brtags pa yi/_/rnam shes ye shes lhag ma ni/_/nam mkha' 'phro zhing snang ba'o/_/nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni/_/ye shes rdo rjes 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bcom nas su/_/rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar/_/ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur/_/sems dang sems byung sems pa yis/_/rnam par blta zhing rab tu spyad/_/'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/dngos pos dngos 
[\[259a.2\]]po bsgom par bya/_/thams cad kun tu snang byed cing /_/thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa/_/snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni/_/dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog_/A li kA li rab sbyar bas/_/phyung ba yi ni sa bon mchog_/sbyor ba 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/_/
[\[259a.3\]]mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/_/sa bon nam mkhar spros pa yis/_/'jig rten gsum po snang bar byas/_/ma lus sprin ltar spro ba nyid/_/skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu/_/phyis ni rang 'dod dmigs med cing /_/yi ge med pas yang bsam mo/_/
[\[259a.4\]]gzugs ni stong par brtags pa yi/_/mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyis ni/_/ma lus rnam par bltas pa yis/_/khams gsum snang bar byed pa'o/_/de ltar sems kyis bsams pa yis/_/byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/skad cig gzugs 
[\[259a.5\]]dang gzugs nyid dang /_/skad cig phung po'i rnam pa dang /_/skad cig thams cad dbyibs rnams ni/_/de phyir mi rtag pa yi gnas/_/legs byas nyes byas ming can ni/_/nyes pas smad par mi bya'o/_/gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus/_/sems 
[\[259a.6\]]dang sems byung rnam par mtshon/_/dngos po'i lhag ma dngos med pas/_/de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o/_/ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yi/_/'od zer mnyam par gnas pa nyid/_/de yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/_/rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad/_/rtag 
[\[259a.7\]]tu zhi zhing mchog gi las/_/yang dag byang chub rtag pa'o/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/sngon du bsnyen pa rab brtsams nas/_/las dang don kun rab grub pa'o/_/ri rab rtse mor kun bsams pa/_/rang 'dod rgyal 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]chen gzhal yas khang /_/sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin mchog_/dril bu dra bas mngon par brgyan/_/gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang /_/sna tshogs mchod pas mngon par brgyan/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/_/dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i 'od/_/de 
[\[259b.2\]]ni rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing /_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par chas/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i gos mnabs shing /_/phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dril/_/'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po/_/kun nas rdo rje'i 'od zer 'phro/_/khams gsum po yi rnam pa ni/_/sems 
[\[259b.3\]]dang sems kyis bsgom pa'o/_/snying gar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/dmar po'i hU~M ni rab 'bar ba/_/spyi bor thig le me ri'o/_/ba spu'i bu ga nas 'phro ba'o/_/shar du rdo rje gzhag pa dang /_/lho ru mda' ni rnam par dgod/_/nub tu ral gri 
[\[259b.4\]]mtshon pa dang /_/byang du gzhu ni yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje'i zhags pa las sogs bzhi/_/mtshams dang mtshams su gzhag par bya/_/'di ltar mtshan nyid mngon ldan pas/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/_/A li'i sa bon gtso mo ni/_/de nyid 
[\[259b.5\]]ldan pas yang sngags bzlas/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pas mthar bzhag pa/_/'bum phrag gsum du rab bsnyen pas/_/rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid du/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/sbas pa'i snying po snying po dang /_/rdo rje chos dang chos mchog go_/
[\[259b.6\]]rdo rje sems ni rjes mchod pa'i/_/hU~M gi glu yi rnam pas bya/_/bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis/_/mnyam par gzhag pas blang par bya/_/tri b+hu ba na dzA li ta mU rti a nu ra ya na wa ti/_rasmi sa ha sra tIk+Sha NA d+ha sa su pa ra sra wa ti/_ba hU bi da ru ba pe sha a nu ra ya na ta ta 
[\[259b.7\]]ta wa ti/_na ta i badzra sa bar be sa ra liM la wa ti swA hA/_gdan bzhi'i rgyud ni rgya chen las/_/stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa/_/de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las/_/snying po mdor ni bsdus pa'o/_/sdeb sbyor sgra dang rtog sogs med/_/don dang 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]don ni yang dag bsdus/_/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don ni sbas ba nyid/_/brda yi skad kyis bshad pa'o/_/gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par btus bsngags kyi cha'i rgyud bshad pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[260a.2\]]bshad pa'i rgyu man+dA ang pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+har dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[260a.3\]{D430}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tsa tu rwI Tha bi kh+y+wa ha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang /_rdo rje rnal 'byor dang /_rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs 
[\[260a.4\]]gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal rdo rje sems 
[\[260a.5\]]dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang /_/drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang /_/rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde/_/gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/_/thams cad mkhyen pas 'di 
[\[260a.6\]]skad gsungs/_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang /_/bdag ni de nyid ji ltar lha/_/chu dang me ni ji ltar lags/_/ji ltar 
[\[260a.7\]]rab mdzes nam mkha' dang /_/ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba/_/ye shes dbang la nyan par 'chal/_/'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag_/nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/dang bor dbang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/gnyis par yi ge gcig pa ni/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang /_/bzhi bar rtsa yi lha nyid do/_/bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me/_/blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya/_/lto ba me yi thab khung du/_/de yi me la sbyin sreg bya/_/steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni/_/rnam shes rtsa ni bsngam par bya/_/
[\[260b.2\]]thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru/_/rtsa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom/_/lho ba'i me ni 'bar ba la/_/khyad par kha dog bsgom pa ni/_/lte ba'i me ni dkar po'o/_/g.yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser/_/lho ni sngon po'i ming can te/_/lhag ma 'di ni dmar por sbyang /_/de 
[\[260b.3\]]dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su/_/me yi du bar rab tu grags/_/me yi dbus su pad+ma nyid/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_/de yi dbus su ye shes lha/_/'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad/_/phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni/_/rdo rje dril 
[\[260b.4\]]bus rnam par brgyan/_/g.yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang /_/rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can/_/bzhad dang khro bas hU~M sgrogs shing /_/'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha/_/de yi dbus su rab tu grags/_/shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang /_/byang du de bzhin gos dkar 
[\[260b.5\]]mo/_/nub tu lha mo mA ma kI/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni lho ru'o/_/gzugs ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam du/_/bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do/_/lce la mchu ni sbyar bar bya/_/nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/_/mig la sa 'di rnam par shes/_/de bzhin tshangs par 
[\[260b.6\]]'bar ba'i me/_/mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang /_/g.yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid/_/thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni/_/phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/_/yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni/_/'di nyid lha ni shes par bya/_/rnam shes rtsa nas 
[\[260b.7\]]drangs pa yi/_/de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu/_/steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa/_/kun tu tshwa bzhin zhu ltar babs/_/ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming /_/lce yi steng du bsten pa yi/_/nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yis/_/'khor lo phrar brdul bzhin no/_/steng gi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]nam mkha' nam mkha' ni/_/bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim/_/g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid/_/g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o/_/'og dang steng ni 'di yi rtsa/_/'og ni sngon du rab tu grags/_/dbugs dang dri ni mnyam drangs 
[\[261a.2\]]nas/_/rgyas pa'i lnga yi steng du ni/_/rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang /_/bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim/_/ye shes dbang phyug de'i steng du/_/de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya/_/de ltar kun tu bzhin rngubs nas/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/
[\[261a.3\]]lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom/_/ye shes yi ges de dbus so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis/_/khams lnga'i ba dgra nyid bsreg pa'o/_/sngon sa bon hU~M byas nas/_/gnyis par de bzhin gsum dang ni/_/gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o/_/de 
[\[261a.4\]]bzhin rlung min bzhi pa dang /_/lnga par rang ba'i sa bon gyis/_/mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya/_/bdag gi de nyid me la ni/_/bdag nyid sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid/_/ji ltar ye shes me de ni/_/bsreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags/_/sbyin 
[\[261a.5\]]sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs so//_//stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis/_/skye ba'i dra ba rnam 'jig pas/_/'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa/_/bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/_/stong pa'i de nyid rang 
[\[261a.6\]]bzhin gyis/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang /_/sa ni nam mkhar kun tu bsam/_/rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/yid 'ong pad+ma 'byung bar ldan/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas/_/me yi bdag nyid 
[\[261a.7\]]bsgom par bya/_/shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di/_/de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/_/mA ma kI ni nub phyogs su/_/lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/_/chu ni sgrol mar kun tu thim/_/me ni gos dkar ma la thim/_/mA ma kI ni nub nas sa/_/rlung ni sangs 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rgyas spyan la thim/_/chu shing me tog pad+ma 'di/_/sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gdan/_/de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo/_/sgong skyes 'og tu 'byed pa can/_/gzugs med sbid pa'i dbyibs can na/_/ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim/_/de ltar bdag nyid stong pa 
[\[261b.2\]]nyid/_/de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid/_/'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la/_/lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru/_/phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom/_/dmar po 'dab ma brgyad dang ni/_/
[\[261b.3\]]ge sar lte bar btsas pa yis/_/dbus su pad+mas rnam par brgyan/_/'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi/_/sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/_/shar du si ka zhes bya dang /_/byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin/_/nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs/_/lho ru hU~M gi 
[\[261b.4\]]dbang phyug go/_/dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs/_/me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so/_/bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang /_/rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o/_/dbus su ye shes rgyal bo 'di/_/sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[261b.5\]]'khor gyis dkris pa/_/bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o/_/kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni/_/go 'phang mchog gis bsgom par bya/_/dbugs mi g.yo ba'i sems dpa' yis/_/dngos pos dgos po bsgom byas nas/_/phyis ni rtsa nyid lha yi gdan/_/
[\[261b.6\]]mig las yi sa bon dang /_/nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o/_/lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di/_/snying gar hU~M zhes bya ba'i ming /_/yan lag drug 'dzin sa bon gyis/_/rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par bsrung /_/ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas/_/ci yi phyir 
[\[261b.7\]]na skye bo'i ming /_/gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang /_/kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos/_/gnas med gnas kyi dbyibs can dang /_/mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid/_/stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid/_/bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas/_/bskal bzang po brgya yi sngon/_/dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas/_/ri rab 
[\[262a.2\]]lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/_/mA ma kI ni lho phyogs gnas/_/lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling /_/de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/_/shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di/_/lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas/_/de ltar snying ga ri rab dang /_/de bzhin mgo bo mA ma kI/_/sgrol ma 
[\[262a.3\]]lho yi gnas dang ni/_/g.yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo/_/snyan pa mo 'di bdag gis gnas/_/lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlab/_/pad+ma'i dbus su rdo rje dang /_/rdo rje'i dbus su pad+ma can/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa/_/lus po kun nas dkris 
[\[262a.4\]]pa'o/_/yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim/_/lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid/_/rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes/_/bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni/_/rdo rje'i rtsa zhes rab tu grags/_/de yi lus kyi khrag dang ni/_/
[\[262a.5\]]lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas/_/khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas/_/blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag_/ji ltar bdag gis sa bon lnga/_/de ltar pad+ma yi yang bsgom/_/ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni/_/nam mkha' rdo rje 'jib byed do/_/
[\[262a.6\]]rkang bas rkang pa dkri bya zhing /_/mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la/_/gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni/_/rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag_/rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang /_/snying ga'i rnam shes bsgom pa yi/_/yi shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di/_/skyes 
[\[262a.7\]]bus khros pas hU~M byas nas/_/de ltar rdo rje pad+ma 'di/_/rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya/_/gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis/_/lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/_/khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i/_/sa bon myu gus 'gro ba la/_/lha rnams 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]lus ni yang dag 'byung /_/'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te/_/longs spyod phyir yang gnas mi bya/_/sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'ong sku/_/gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas par/_/gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya/_/
[\[262b.2\]]sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so//_//nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid/_/yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar bya/_/lnga yi bdag nyid du rtogs bya/_/lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/_/lnga yis lus ni yongs 
[\[262b.3\]]su bsrungs/_/yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags/_/ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar/_/ji ltar sbyang zhing bsgom pa dang /_/ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste/_/ji ltar thar pa la gnas nyid/_/ngo mtshar lha la nyan par 'tshal/_/gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba/_/
[\[262b.4\]]rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon/_/thog mar stong pa de kho na/_/stong par chu ni bsam par bya/_/kha dog bdun gyi pad+ma ni/_/ge sar dang bcas yid 'ong ba/_/stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis/_/pad+ma'i gzugs ni snying por bcas/_/pad+ma rgya cher rab 
[\[262b.5\]]mdzes pa/_/rin chen bdun gyis mngon par spras/_/dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang /_/dar dang na bza' mngon par 'phyang /_/seng ge'i gdan ni mngon par bsam/_/de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/pad+ma rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/_/'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi/_/
[\[262b.6\]]sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis/_/rdo rje'i rtse mo rnam par bsam/_/dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes/_/shar du de bzhin mi bskyod pa/_/rin chen sa bon lho nyid du/_/de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med/_/byang phyogs su ni don yod grub/_/sa bon 
[\[262b.7\]]lnga ni rnam par bsgom/_/pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/_/ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag_/dbus su snying po sgong la/_/rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim/_/pad+ma brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni/_/mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/_/shar du 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]lha mo sgrol ma 'di/_/byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/_/nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo/_/de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por/_/'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje las ni lha yi lus/_/bzhugs 
[\[263a.2\]]ba ru ni rnam par bsam/_/spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o/_/kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes/_/rdo rje yi ni cod pan can/_/dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'phyang /_/rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang /_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/steng du 
[\[263a.3\]]ral gri 'phyar ba dang /_/gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu/_/gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gsor/_/g.yon pa'i steng du kha T+wA~M dang /_/gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir/_/gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/stag 
[\[263a.4\]]gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan/_/g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni/_/phyag gcig gis ni 'khyud pa dang /_/gcig gi phyag na thong pa ni/_/bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan/_/mA ma 
[\[263a.5\]]kI yang de bzhin du/_/gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud/_/gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na/_/khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o/_/spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam/_/phreng pas phyag ni brgyan pa dang /_/gtor ma spyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa/_/mdun du snod la rnam par blta/_/de ltar 
[\[263a.6\]]bdag nyid lnga yi lus/_/lus la kun nas yang dag gnas/_/shar du lha mo me tog ma/_/lho ru spos dang yang dag ldan/_/nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma/_/byang du dri yi lha mo'o/_/dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo nyid/_/de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma/_/bden bral 
[\[263a.7\]]phyogs su dbyangs ma dang /_/rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o/_/nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi/_/'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog_/sangs rgyas sprin ltar 'phro ba ni/_/sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson/_/bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni/_/bdag nyid lha ni 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]mchog yin no/_/bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya/_/phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/de nyid pad+ma bsam pa dang /_/de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam/_/sngon du gsungs 
[\[263b.2\]]pa'i gdan la ni/_/der ni nyi mas mngon par g.yogs/_/sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang /_/sna tshogs dar ni mngon par dbyangs/_/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/pad+ma'i tshul du kha phye la/_/oM kam la ud b+ta be shrI swA hA/_pad+ma'i sngags 
[\[263b.3\]]dang phyag rgya'o/_/rang gi dbugs la phyung nas ni/_/rdo rje mdun du rnam par bsgom/_/lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni/_/sdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dkri/_/lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o/_/o~M badzra a~M ku sha dzaH/_rdo rje lcags kyu'i 
[\[263b.4\]]sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/_/sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa/_/zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o/_/o~M badzra bA sha hU~M/_zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/de ltar mdun 
[\[263b.5\]]du'ang rab bsam bya/_/lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro/_/shar du gshin rje mthar byed dngos/_/lho ru de bzhin bgegs mthar byed/_/nub tu pad+ma mthar byed pa/_/byang du khro bo skyong pa'o/_/lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur 
[\[263b.6\]]bcings/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/oM badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/_rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/_/oM badzra g+haN+De hoH/_rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/lag 
[\[263b.7\]]pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya las/_/sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM bai ro tsa na sa mA d+hi/_bi shwa ye g+hu ya pa dza b+hi Shai swA hA/_/oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ho ho ho ho ho ho/_hri hri hri hri swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dang phyag rgya'o/_o~M tA re tut+ta re sa ta k+Shi tA hU~M swA hA/_lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so/_/o~M hi li hi li ba li swA hA/_gos dkar mo'i sngags so/_/o~M ta ra sarba ta na hU~M phaT/_mA ma kI'i sngags so/_/oM bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha ya hU~M/_sangs rgyas 
[\[264a.2\]]spyan gyi sngags so/_/sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni/_/dbus dang dbus su sbyar bar bya/_/mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba ni/_/lha mo bzhi yi phyag rgya'o/_/ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni/_/me tog ma la sogs pa dang /_/sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid 
[\[264a.3\]]yin/_/g.yas brkyang rkang ba yang dag gnas/_/sdigs mdzub snying gar sbyin byas nas/_/dbung pa mdun nas brkyang byas nas/_/se gol hU~M gi rnam pa dang /_/lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pa/_/'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M A yuHpA la pra ti 
[\[264a.4\]]rak+Sha duk+Sha ban d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba yi'o/_/o~M A kar+Sha ya sa twa d+hA tu nA~M kro swA hA/_byang du rgyas pa yi'o/_/o~M mo ha ya mo ha ya/_/sarba sa twA nA~M shrI swA hA/_nub tu dbang gi'o/_/oM shak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta k+dA ta ya hri phaT/_lho ru mngon 
[\[264a.5\]]bar spyod pa yi'o/_/oM su ga na d+ha hU~M haM swA hA/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba bri'i phyag rgya'o/_/oM su so bid puSh+pe b+h+yaHswA hA/_sdigs mdzub dang mtheb mo sbyar ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M d+hU pa mA la ku la swA hA/_sor mo dbus ma bsgreng ba 
[\[264a.6\]]ni/_bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M tI k+Sha Na dI pe pra ti gr-i h+Na swA hA/_khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo bsgreng ba ni/_mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M ku ru ku ru bi dza ya swA hA/_lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni/_gtor 
[\[264a.7\]]ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/ji ltar ston du sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya/_/lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/_/rked pa'i phyogs su bzung byas la/_/pi wang tshul 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]gyis bsgreng ba dang /_/gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang /_/si la snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang /_/brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdegs pa dang /_/gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang /_/rlung g.yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng 
[\[264b.2\]]ba dang /_/bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang /_/ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang /_/gdugs kyi tshul gyis dag pa ba dang /_/cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'khrol ba dang /_/khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang /_/bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang /_/khro bo'i stabs 
[\[264b.3\]]stabs yan lag bskyod/_/de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor bas/_/glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/_/'byin pa'i sa bon gzung byas pa/_/spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o/_/dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che/_/
[\[264b.4\]]thar pa chen po gnas chen po/_/gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi/_/gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po/_/rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las/_/lha dang lha min mngon par sprul/_/bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/_/sbyor ba'i 
[\[264b.5\]]sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas/_/ji ltar las la mngon bde bar/_/rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis/_/phreng ba la ni bzlas bar bya/_/ji ltar nus pa mchod byas la/_/slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o/_/dbugs 
[\[264b.6\]]kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste/_/lhan cig thim par bsam par bya/_/ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid/_/de ltar rnam par snang mdzad bdag_/ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha/_/de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las/_/de bzhin 
[\[264b.7\]]ye shes skye ba 'di/_/chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad/_/me la gos dkar yang dag ldan/_/rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di/_/de bzhin rab mdzes mA ma kI/_/dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni/_/dud pa yang ni me yi gnas/_/dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]du ni pad+ma dang /_/ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa/_/lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni/_/gdan bzhi nyan par mi nus pa/_/gzhung nyung ba ni bstan pa yin/_/gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba bzhi ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[265a.2\]]rdo rje'i chu ni ji ltar lags/_/bdud rtsi'i chu ni ji ltar skye/_/gang gi dbye ba ji ltar myang /_/gang gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_/'di yi rab tu dgos pa'ang ci/_/ngo mtshar lha la mnyan par 'tshal/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/gnyis dang gnyis med 
[\[265a.3\]]spangs pa yi/_/gsang zhing gsang ba rab spas pa'i/_/'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de nyid/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba/_/sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'o/_/ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid/_/ji ltar me yis mnyam 
[\[265a.4\]]ra bsreg pa'i spyod pa dang /_/nyi ma ji ltar mnyam par lta bar ston pa dang /_/ji ltar rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar/_/rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho bsrings pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog_/dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu 
[\[265a.5\]]snang mdzad dang /_/ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag_/lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya/_/ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog_/ho zhes pa yis dri med cing /_/dpa' bo hrIHyis bcom pa yi/_/de dag rim bzhin shes par bya/_/pad+ma'i gdan ni rtag tu 
[\[265a.6\]]mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/_/mthe bo rdo rje srin lag gnyis kun ldan pas/_/sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyis cho ga bsrung bar bya/_/gang zhes ro 'di myang pa blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o/_/rdo rje chu yi khyad par ni/_/nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/'dzag 
[\[265a.7\]]pa yi ni lus kyi chu/_/bdag nyid lnga yis byin gyis brlabs/_/dro ba'i rang bzhin me ru mthong /_/zhi ba chu ru rab tu brtag_/rlung dang rlung ni du pa'o/_/sa ni gzugs su snang pa'o/_/gang zhig de nyid kyis myangs na/_/dri ma can lus dri med 'gyur/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]rin chen bzang dga' rnal 'byor pa/_/sbyangs pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang de bzhin rdzas/_/dang bo rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/_/nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa de/_/rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o/_/ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas ni/_/rnal 
[\[265b.2\]]'byor pa ni de la snang /_/bdud rtsi bsten 'dod lus can gyis/_/gnyis med kha sbyar sbyar bar bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa po/_/sngon du A li kA li bsam/_/A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs/_/kA li de bzhin gshegs ma nyid/_/sbyor ba'i 
[\[265b.3\]]ye shes sgra yis ni/_/gnyi gas 'khyud par bsam par bya/_/ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/_/yi ge gsum pa gzung byas te/_/rdo rje ra ba tsam zhig gis/_/'od dpag med ni dkri par bya/_/lha mo gsum pa nyid kyis ni/_/dbyug pa tsam zhig rdo rje 
[\[265b.4\]]'dzin/_/dbus su dam tshig zhags pa yis/_/kun+da mgo la mchog tu brtson/_/de ltar sngags zlos rnal 'byor pa/_/pad+ma rdo rje can gyis bskyod/_/rang bzhin gyis ni si sgra dang /_/bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi/_/de nyid 'di yis myang byas pa/_/
[\[265b.5\]]rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shis/_/bden pa'i chos ni mchog tu bden/_/rnal 'byor chos ni rab tu bstod/_/de nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid/_/sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/_/bye ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma/_/gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud 'di nyid/_/
[\[265b.6\]]mkhas pa yis ni rnam bltas la/_/sbyor ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma/_/sbyor ba'i chos kyis gtor ma sbyin/_/bdud rtsi lnga mdor bsdus le'u zhes bya ba lnga pa rdzogs so//_//'byung ba'i dbugs kyi the tshom ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[265b.7\]]mngon par 'dri/_/'chi ltas ji ltar 'tshal bgyi zhing /_/gang gis shes nas rab tu sbyar/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'gro ba lus can sems can don/_/'chi bdag kun nas bslu ba ni/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje bdag_/gang zhig 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/'chi bdag lus ni gnas pa nyid/_/dang por snga dro'i dus nyid la/_/dbugs ni rnam par dgod bshad pa/_/lus can zla drug nas 'chi bar/_/nges gsungs pa la the tshom med/_/gal te dus la bab 
[\[266a.2\]]gyur na/_/dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na/_/'gram pa'i tshigs ni yo bar 'gyur/_/lus kyi mtshan ma shes byas la/_/rnal 'byor pa yis zhi bar bya/_/rna ba'i u da rnam chad na/_/chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo/_/
[\[266a.3\]]mig gi aM par yi rtsa/_/tro ta de bzhin nyi ma lnga/_/sna yi ma si ga chad na/_/nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za/_/steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/_/nyi ma gsum gyis the tshom med/_/'di yi lce la thig nag na/_/zhag gnyis kyis 'chi lus can rnams/_/
[\[266a.4\]]grin pa'i glo yi phyi rol rtsa/_/zla phyed las ni mi thub bo/_/brang gi lhe'u 'og zhom gyur na/_/zla phyed sman pas gso spyad yod/_/sen mo khrag ni med pa na/_/chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo/_/pho nya brgyad kyi 'chi ltas ni/_/'chi ba'i rma sogs rnam par 
[\[266a.5\]]spangs/_/rna ba'i u da'i bdag nyid ni/_/rnal 'byor dbye bas bsten par bya/_/mig gi aM ba ra chad na/_/mkhas pas dgar bo'i sa bon bzla/_/sna yi ma si ka la ni/_/dbugs bsdams mi yi dud pa'o/_/so dang so 'thams rtsa la ni/_/dung gi 
[\[266a.6\]]bon bzlas pas 'phrog_/lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/_/bdag nyid sbyor bas mnan par bya/_/mgrin pa glo yi phyi rol rtsa/_/pad+ma'i sa bon gyis rtse bya/_/brang gi lhe'u zhom pa la/_/sgong skyes ye shes bsgom pa'o/_/sen mo khrag ni med pa la/_/
[\[266a.7\]]lag pa bsdus la bzlas par bya/_/bug pa dgu yi sgo ru ni/_/sa bon dgu yis rtse bar bya/_/rtsa dgu la ni sa bon dgu/_/sgo dgu sa bon dgu yis bsdam/_/de ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni/_/rnam par shes pa mi 'gro'o/_/ma bsregs snod 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ni gnyis gzung ste/_/gur kum dang ni gi'u wang gis/_/bcu gnyis tshan ni yang dag bri/_/sa bon dbyangs yig bskor bar bya/_/lha mo brgyad kyi sa bon 'di/_/mtshams su ma ning sa bon dang /_/dbus su ye shes sa bon ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni 
[\[266b.2\]]bskor bar bya/_/de bzhin ming ni dbus su bri/_/hU~M gi dbus su gnas pa nyid/_/gnyi ga dang yang sbyar byas nas/_/skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya/_/mA ma kI ni 'dab mar bsam/_/steng du de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag_/gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa 
[\[266b.3\]]yis/_/nus pa yi ni mngon par mchod/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/rtse dang rtse ni sprad par bya/_/rnam shes ye shes sa bon ni/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/_/rnam shes bsdams pa'i dngos po dang /_/rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i khyad 
[\[266b.4\]]par gyis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po 'byung po dang /_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba nyid/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bsrungs tsam gyis/_/grol bar 'di la the tshom med/_/tshe zad pa yi lus can ni/_/zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i mtshan ma yongs su 
[\[266b.5\]]brtag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba drug pa rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor bstan bcos cho ga'i rim/_/de nas ye shes dbang gis gsungs/_/'khrig pa'i dngos po bsten pa las/_/khrag dang khu ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ye shes ngo bos 'byung 
[\[266b.6\]]pa yi/_/'byin pa'i rtsa ni mngon par sems/_/bdun par khu bar gyur pa yis/_/dkar po'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed/_/khrag gis mtshan mo brgyad na ni/_/du ba'i rtsa ni mngon du gso/_/mtshan mo phyed dang bzhir bsnyen pas/_/dung gi rtsa ni byin gyis 
[\[266b.7\]]brlab/_/gong du mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ni rab tu sbyar/_/nyi ma drug cu'i grangs 'di yis/_/mkhas pas gi'u wang gi ni rtsa/_/mkhrang 'gyur dgu zhes bshad pa ni/_/dri med gsum gyi rtsa ni bskyed/_/mtshan mo bcu dang drug gi ro/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'byed pa'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed/_/sa gdugs ye shes rnam shes ni/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus can no/_/sa gdugs bcu dang brgyad nyid kyis/_/mkhas pa zla dgur kun tu gnas/_/skye ba skra bra la sogs ldan/_/sen mo khog 
[\[267a.2\]]pa dus pa dang /_/zhag dang srin bu gci pa dang /_/bshang ba bad kan mchi ma sogs/_/brgyad ni mngal nang rgyal ba/_/rtsa yi brgyad pa zhes bya la/_/lhag par lha dgug nas pa nyid/_/bdag nyid lha dang pha rol mchog_/bdag nyid lha ni mchog 
[\[267a.3\]]yin no/_/dkar po lha mo sgrol ma 'di/_/dud pa la ni gos dkar gnas/_/lha mo sangs rgyas du nyid la/_/mA ma kI ni pad+mar gnas/_/lha mo snyan ma gi'u wang la/_/rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la/_/'byed par rin chen yid 'ong ba/_/sa yi gdugs la 
[\[267a.4\]]pad+ma'i rtsa/_/'di ltar spros pa'i ye shes rtsa/_/thams cad 'byin cing sdud pa yi/_/ji ltar rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/_/de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags/_/mnyam pa'i cha ru de byas pas/_/mnyam pa'i gzugs ni 'od dang bcas/_/stong phrag dgu yi 
[\[267a.5\]]grangs nyid ni/_/re re las ni gyes pa'o/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do/_/dgu pa yis ni 'byin cing sdud/_/dgu yi rtsa ni rtag pa'i sa/_/dgu dang lnga yis dga' bar bcas/_/lnga bo'i lha 'di 'gro ba'o/_/gcig 
[\[267a.6\]]gis 'byin cing sdud pa dang /_/gcig gis lha ni ye shes can/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/_/gcig gi lus dang lus can dang /_/gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang /_/mi stong pa dang stong pa nyid/_/ring min thung min gzhan ma yin/_/dngos med 
[\[267a.7\]]dngos po tsam ma yin/_/kha dog med la tshon kun dngos/_/ye shes lus can rnal 'byor pas/_/lam gnyis pa ni srid pa'i skyon/_/lam gcig pa yi rnal 'byor pas/_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs la/_/gcig gi lam nyid shes par bya/_/shes 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ltar dag pa'i lus kyi ni/_/dag pa'i lam du yang dag bgrod/_/rtsa bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ba bdun pa rdzogs so//_//sbyor ba'i mdo ru bsdus pa nyid/_/bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/_/phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/sbyor ba'i 
[\[267b.2\]]bstan bcos sgrub pa pos/_/gdan bzhi pa las btus pa yis/_/stong phrag bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/_/de yi don ni mdor bsdus pa'o/_/gzhung [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pa yis 'jigs pa yis/_/de nyid mdor bsdus pa yi tshig_/sbyor ba'i rnams la nye bar 
[\[267b.3\]]gsungs/_/rnal 'byor pa la rab dgod pa'i/_/de nas zhi ba yang dag bshad/_/thog mar bya ba stong pa nyid/_/stong pa'i dbus su pad+ma ni/_/pad+ma sa bon myu gu can/_/kha dog bdun pa rgya chen po/_/sde tshan bzhi pa'i tshig la ni/_/steng du ma ning thig 
[\[267b.4\]]ler bcas/_/de yi sa bon mnyam bsgoms nas/_/de bzhin khro gnyer can ma bskyed/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas la ni/_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/_/dag pa'i sku dang spyan gsum pa/_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/
[\[267b.5\]]mchog sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang /_/bgrang phreng ril ba spyi blugs bsnams/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/_/bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pa mchog gi yi ge gcig_/khro gnyer 
[\[267b.6\]]mchog gi yi ge ni/_/'bum phrag gcig zlos sngags pa yis/_/rnal 'byor pa yis brtsams tsam gyis/_/tshe ni 'phel bar rab tu grags/_/lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/_/de nas rgyas pa'i las 'di nyon/_/ti se gangs kyi rtse mo dang /_/gser 
[\[267b.7\]]gyi ri bo'i ngos dang ni/_/rin chen bdun rang bzhin gnas su/_/gzhal yas khang pa nyer mdzes pa'i/_/seng ge'i gdan la gnas pa ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa dang /_/gdugs dkar po dang bla re dang /_/dril bu dra bas mngon par mdzes/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung ste/_/gsum pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/_/sde tshan mtha' yis steng du'o/_/ye shes can gyis sa bon gcig_/dbugs mi g.yo zhing 'od zer bcas/_/ser po'i mdog tu rnam par bsgom/_/phyis ni nor rgyun 
[\[268a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i/_/lha mo'i gzugs su rnam par bsam/_/phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/kha dog 'bar bar bsgom par bya/_/rin chen shing dang za ma tog_/gnyis pa na ni rab tu 'phel/_/gsum pas mchod 
[\[268a.3\]]sbyin lag pa dang /_/steng du shes rab phyag dang ni/_/gnyis pa la ni bgrang phreng dang /_/gsum pa ril ba spyi blugs so/_/bsgom dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/dbugs ni 'dren pa'i khams nyid do/_/rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[268a.4\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dmar po'i las kyi khyad par ni/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs nas ni/_/stong par pad+ma yang dag bshad/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten cing /_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par 
[\[268a.5\]]brgyan/_/dbyangs yig dang po'i yi ge gcig_/steng du sde tshan tha ma dang /_/mnyam par gzhag pas sa bon dmar/_/'od zer dmar po 'bar ba 'di/_/sems can 'gugs par byed pa'i dngos/_/lha mo'i gzugs brnyan 'di bsams la/_/bcom ldan 
[\[268a.6\]]gser gyi mdog lta bur/_/mA ma kI bsam yang dag 'byung /_/phyag gnyis rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/_/gcig gis lcags kyu yang dag 'dzin/_/g.yon pas dril bu mngon sgrogs pa/_/thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i 
[\[268a.7\]]na bza' gsol/_/bsgom zhing bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/_/sems can dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/de nas nag po'i las 'di ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing /_/rlung gi dbus su rlung gi ni/_/rlung gi sa bon bsam par bya/_/du ba du ba rab 'bar 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ba/_/sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan/_/nag po drag po yi ni gdan/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gdan la kun gnas pa/_/bsam par la gcig ma yi gzugs/_/kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/_/dbu skra gyen brdzes lha mo che/_/drag par rgod pas 'jigs 
[\[268b.2\]]par mdzad/_/spyan gsum zhal ni gcig pa la/_/phyag bzhi yi ni rnam par spras/_/gcig ni phyag na ral gri dang /_/gnyis pa na ni rdo rje gsor/_/g.yas na mdung ni 'dzin mdzad cing /_/gnyis par de bzhin sdigs mdzub bo/_/'phen pa'i rol 
[\[268b.3\]]pas rnam par bzhugs/_/me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/zhags pa 'phen pas 'ching mdzad cing /_/hU~M sgra'i rnam par 'jigs par byed/_/sa bon dbus su ming dang ni/_/phaT kyi rnam pa de bzhin mthar/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa 
[\[268b.4\]]dang /_/rnal 'byor bstan pa 'jig byed pa/_/lha mo ral ba gcig ma 'dis/_/nus pas brlag par byed par gsungs/_/sngags dang rgyud ni mnyam bzung la/_/lha mo 'od zer can sa bon/_/dug dang khrag tu bsres pa yis/_/rdo rje phag mo kun 
[\[268b.5\]]nas bri/_/de yi mchu la ming dang yang /_/mgo la yi ge'i sa bon dang /_/steng du me yi yi ge dang /_/kha la rlung gnyis de bzhin no/_/'dis ni skrod par byad par gsungs/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba dgu pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[268b.6\]]sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/_/ye shes dbang gis de nas gsungs/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/'khor ba'i lam nas grol ba yi/_/mtha' yas sbyor ba mngon phyogs pas/_/mtha' yas sgo zhes bya ba'i ming /_/stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid 
[\[268b.7\]]lus/_/ji ltar stong pa de nyid 'dis/_/phyi dang nang du bcas pa ni/_/de bzhin nam mkha'i khams su ni/_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/de yi dbus su rab gang ba'i/_/kun nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin du/_/gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing /_/sna tshogs dar ni rnam par 'phyang /_/yi ge gcig gis sa bon ni/_/'od zer 'bar ba tshon gyi dngos/_/dang po'i dbyangs yig kun bzung la/_/steng du 
[\[269a.2\]]bdud rtsi thig le can/_/lha mo bdag nyid lhan cig dang /_/phyi nas gzugs ni mnyam par bsam/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/_/rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' 
[\[269a.3\]]gsol/_/gcig gi phyag gis rdo rje 'dzin/_/g.yon pa dril bu mngon par sgrogs/_/yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid/_/spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang /_/chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung /_/sa ni mig gi yi ge'o/_/sgo bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi/_/sgong skyes rdzi 
[\[269a.4\]]lir gnas pa nyid/_/bzhi pa nyon mongs me dang ni/_/yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du/_/rmongs pas dang nyon mongs dang /_/sngon du phyugs ni mnyam pa dang /_/chu shing me tog pad+ma ni/_/'di yi sgong skyes stan nyid do/_/ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/_/
[\[269a.5\]]bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye/_/shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/_/snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog_/lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang /_/nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/_/sa ni mig la sbyar byas te/_/tshangs par me ni de bzhin 'bar/_/rmongs pa'i sa ni mgrin 
[\[269a.6\]]bar ro/_/g.yo ba snying la gnas pa dang /_/nyon mongs sems can brang dang ni/_/phyugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/_/yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis/_/lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang /_/nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/_/'di yis lha nyid yang dag shes/_
[\[269a.7\]]yi ge brgyad kyi sngags 'di ni/_/phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu grags/_/dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/_/gnag cing 'bar ba'i las 'di ni/_/las rnams bzhi yi lha mo ni/_/mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas/_/ye shes las byung snying po nyid/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang /_/phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun/_/las dang las kyi khyad par nyid/_/thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/mnyam par 'jigs byed me dang yang /_/ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang /_/dad pa'i don dang sa dbang po/_/lhag 
[\[269b.2\]]ma brtsegs pa las byung ba/_/bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o/_/'gro ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad/_/lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags/_/mnyam bzhag bzlas shing bsgoms pa yis/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[269b.3\]]sngon du reg cing reg pa nyid/_/'jig rten 'dir ni bde ba dang /_/rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni/_/gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas/_/bdag gi de nyid dman pa yis/_/ji ltar sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[269b.4\]]de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis/_/sbyor ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya/_/dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang /_/nag po'i a ka ru dang gu gul mar me dang /_/gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yang dag yid ldan gyis/_/lha mo 
[\[269b.5\]]ma mo gzhan rnams kun nas rab tu mchod/_/steng du rnam par snang mdzad bsam/_/mchu la phyag na rdo rje'o/_/yid kyis nam mkha'i snying po ni/_/rna ba gnyis la rab tu sbyar/_/lce la 'jig rten mgon po dang /_/mgrin par 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sras/_/
[\[269b.6\]]byang du byams pa yang dag sbyar/_/snying gar kun tu bzang po gnas/_/lte bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni/_/gshin rje mthar byed rab tu grags/_/de nyid rnam pa'i bye brag nyid/_/lha mo'i gdan nyid du ni bsgom/_/snying gar sems dang ye shes ni/_/mkhas pa 
[\[269b.7\]]yi ni bsam par bya/_/'od zer bye ba rnam mang po/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni rab tu 'phro/_/mnyam par bzhag cing bsgoms pa yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/mtha' yas pa'i sgo'i lha mo'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ba bcu pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/_/srin mo dang ni ro langs mo/_/mi med gnas su sgrub pa pos/_/oM b+hi tsi ba ta hU~M phaT swA hA/_nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/_/sdigs mdzub snying gar 
[\[270a.2\]]sbyin byas la/_/g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur byas/_/rked pa'i phyogs su gzung byas la/_/'di ni tsham ngam mchog gi rgya/_/ra nag po yi pags pa la/_/dur khrod ras kyi skud pa yis/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/_/kha dog sngon po spyan gsum 
[\[270a.3\]]pa/_/dmar po'i skra yis rnam par 'dzings/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa nyid/_/rgod cing mche ba gtsigs pa dang /_/'bar ba'i me yis rnam par brgyan/_/dang por mdung gi lag pa dang /_/gnyis par de bzhin mi mgo'o/_/gsum pa la ni rdo rje 
[\[270a.4\]]gsor/_/g.yon pa steng du sdigs mdzub dang /_/gnyis pa'i lag na thod pa'o/_/gsum par dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/sham thabs stag gi pags pa dang /_/glang chen pags pa rab tu mnabs/_/rol ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa ni/_/
[\[270a.5\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gdan la rab tu bzhugs/_/'bar ba dmar po'i rang bzhin lus/_/gdugs dkar po ni rnam par 'phyang /_/ral pa gcig pa'i srin mo na/_/rdo rje pho nya mngon par bri/_/sen mos khrag ni mngon par glang /_/lha mo'i lte ba bya bar gsungs/_/de 
[\[270a.6\]]yi sha yis sbyin sreg bya/_/de bzhin dur khrod kyis ni bskor/_/mgo bor oM/_mig tu hU~M/_sna la ha/_rna bar hri/_lce la hra/_snying gar hriH/_rdo rje khu tshur mnyam byas te/_/dbu ma gnyis ni rab tu brkyang /_/yan lag drug gi sngags dang 
[\[270a.7\]]phyag rgya'o/_/snying gar sdigs mdzub sbyin byas la/_/dpung pa g.yas pa rab tu brkyang /_/hU~M gi rnam pas se gol dang /_/lhan cig nyid du sbyar byas la/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi rkang pas mnan/_/oM ma tha ma tha puSh+Ta hU~M phaT/_'di ni lha mo'i 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/ra sha 'o mar bsres pa yis/_/dur khrod gnas pa'i lha mo la/_/brgyad brgya ru ni dbul bya zhing /_/sna tshogs mchod pas tshim byas la/_/phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/_/sA lu'i 'bras la gzugs brnyan bya/_/ming 
[\[270b.2\]]gi dbus su gzhag byas la/_/seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pas/_/lhan cig dngos pos brdung bar bya/_/rdo rje'ang de ru gzhag byas na/_/gcin ni mchog tu sdom par 'gyur/_/ba lci las ni gzugs brnyan bya/_/khyi yi spu yis dgang byas la/_/ming ni hU~M gi 
[\[270b.3\]]rnam par sbyar/_/brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas bya zhing /_/rdo rje pad+mas brdung byas la/_/gdug pa ji bzhin 'tshe bar 'gyur/_/lha dgra las ni pad+ma bya/_/ming gi sa bon gzhug byas nas/_/gang zhig bsams pa'i bud med rnams/_/de bzhin nges par dbang 
[\[270b.4\]]du 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang gsungs/_/gzhan yang las kyi khyad par nyid/_/phyag na rdo rje nyid nyon cig_/srog chags kyis brkos sa las ni/_/blo dang ldan pas gzugs brnyan bya/_/lha mo'i 
[\[270b.5\]]sa bon yi ges bskor/_/snying gar ming gi rnam par bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/_/blo dang ldan pas brgyad brgyar bzlas/_/sbrul gyi pags pas bkang byas na/_/sbrul gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/sbal ba'i 'dab mas bkang byas 
[\[270b.6\]]na/_/sbal pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/til mar nag pos bkang byas na/_/sbrang bus rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/sen mo yis ni bkang byas na/_/srin bus mngon par gang bar 'gyur/_/sha yis kun nas bkang byas na/_/mod la gzer bas 
[\[270b.7\]]yongs su 'dzin/_/sbyor bas 'jig par byed pa dang /_/slob dpon dang ni gsang dmod pa'i/_/shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/_/'di yi lam gyis sbyar bar bya/_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha mo pho nya rdo rje 'chang /_/sbyor ba bsrub 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa'i don du gsungs/_/las 'di yi ni khyad par nyid/_/nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/gdan bzhi pa dang mnyam ldan pas/_/yid mi gzhungs pas rtogs bya'i phyir/_/mdor bsdus sbyor ba byed pa'o/_/slob mas shes pas don 
[\[271a.2\]]dam smra ba'i seng ge yis/_/rnal 'byor chogs nyon mongs g.yos pas gcad pa'i phyir/_/nyon mongs sred pa'i nyes pa skye rtsa 'joms mdzad pa/_/rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po nyid du 'grub gyur cig_/sbyor ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya ba bcu gcig pa 
[\[271a.3\]]rdzogs so//_//dpal ldan shes rab dbang po sbas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad/_/dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa/_/rtag tu kun nas rngubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun 
[\[271a.4\]]dgra yi dus dang dus su g.yul 'gyed pa'i/_/chags pa med pa'i ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad/_/'khor bar thim par gsungs pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/_/gsang ba'i ngo bo mnyam shes phyir/_/
[\[271a.5\]]gsang ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/hU~M gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos/_/hU~M gi rnam pa mchog gi lha/_/hU~M gi rnam pa stong gyur pa/_/yi ge hU~M la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sngon du rtsa ni kun sbyar la/_/phyis ni sa bon rnam par 'phrul/_/lte bar phyugs kyi 
[\[271a.6\]]zhags pa ni/_/phyugs kyis grol shing shin tu grol/_/shar gyi phyogs su gzhu rgyal ni/_/pad+ma yi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/_/gsher ba yang ni nub kyi phyogs/_/rnam par shes pa'ang lhan cig 'byin/_/nam mkha'i dbus su bdag nyid bya/_/bdag 
[\[271a.7\]]nyid dbus su nam mkha'o/_/gnyi ga'i dbu ma shes byas la/_/grol ba nyid du the tshom med/_/stong pa'i dbus su bdag gi ni/_/bdag nyid rtags ni mtshon pa'o/_/rtags kyi bdag nyid 'byin pa ni/_/bsgoms pas sa yi 'byin pa'o/_/gzhu 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]las rgyal zhing gsher ba nyid/_/skam po pad+ma 'byin pa las/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis mnyam 'byin pa/_/rtsa dgu yi ni ming 'di nyid/_/rtsa dgu'i sa ni rtag gyur pa/_/gsum po 'byin cing yang dag sdud/_/gsher dang skam po zhes bya ba/_/rtsa ba gzhu 
[\[271b.2\]]las rgyal ba nyid/_/dngos po yi ni mtshan nyid pa'i/_/'di yis 'byin cing yang dag sdud/_/pad+ma dgur ni mnyam bshad pa/_/rnam par shes pa lhan cig gnas/_/steng 'og phyogs kyang stong pa nyid/_/dbu ma stong pa nyid du ni/_/rtag tu stong pa 
[\[271b.3\]]gsum bsgom pa/_/gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o/_/g.yon gyi glo ru ser skya dang /_/g.yas par nag po chen po gnas/_/rtsa lnga las ni mnyam 'byin pa/_/lnga nyid du ni sbyar bar bya/_/chu dang me dang nam mkha' dang /_/sa nyid bzhi ste mnyam 
[\[271b.4\]]pa'i gdan/_/chu shing me tog lta bu ni/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/rtag tu kha ni rab zlum pa/_/mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya/_/'dab ma brgyad par rtag tu gyur/_/gsungs pa'i ge sar dang ldan par/_/de yi dbus su bshad pa 
[\[271b.5\]]ni/_/rnam shes lhan cig bsgom pa ni/_/phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar/_/rnam par shes pa mtshon par bya/_/skra yi rtse mo brgya yi char/_/'od zer g.yo ba med par gnas/_/kun nas sbyor ba gsum pas dkri/_/dkris pa'i mtshan nyid 'khor lo 'dra/_/
[\[271b.6\]]rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor/_/gnas su bzlog pa ye shes so/_/rang bzhin brgyad pa'i dbye ba yis/_/skyes bu dbus su sbyar ba'i don/_/dbus mas 'byin cing yang dag sdud/_/thams cad lta ba 'joms par byed/_/rtsa brgyad mngon 
[\[271b.7\]]par kun nas ldan/_/dkar po dud pa pad+ma dung /_/gi wang dri med 'byed pa dang /_/sa gdugs brgyad pa'i dbye ba'o/_/bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor/_/bdag med pas ni rnam par dkris/_/khams gsum skyes pa zad byed nas/_/ye shes 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]nus pa yis ni 'joms/_/dang por dkar por yang dag bsgom/_/gnyis par ser por bsgom pa dang /_/gsum par kun nas dmar por bsgom/_/bzhi pa la ni nag po nyid/_/rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ste le'u dang po zhes bya 
[\[272a.2\]]ba rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/dkyil 'khor sa bon bsgom pa ni/_/sa bon nges par de bzhin gshegs/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge'i mtshan nyid do/_/rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol 
[\[272a.3\]]'gro/_/dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo yis/_/ye shes lus ni dag pa'i dngos/_/dag cing dag pa de bzhin dngos/_/dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin nyon mongs mun pa ni/_/rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o/_/ye shes rdo rjes bcom 
[\[272a.4\]]nas ni/_/snang ba la sogs thob par 'gyur/_/dag pa'i lus dang sems kyis ni/_/blo ldan dkyil 'khor mtshon par bya/_/slob dpon dang bral 'di yis ni/_/rtag tu sa stengs dngos grub med/_/slob dpon yon tan gzung bya zhing /_/skyon ni 
[\[272a.5\]]nam yang ma yin no/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni/_/de bzhin mnyam par brtags la bya/_/grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/de dbus pad+ma mnyam par bri/_/dbus su mchog gi yi ge ni/_/yi ge'i 
[\[272a.6\]]gzugs dang dbyibs su ni/_/yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya/_/shar du dkar po kun nas bsam/_/nub tu du ba'i sa bon bzhin/_/lhor ni dung gi sa bon dang /_/byang du pad+ma'i sa bon no/_/dbang ldan mtshams su ro tsa na/_/me ru dri med gsum 'byung 
[\[272a.7\]]ba'o/_/bden bral du ni 'byed pa shes/_/thams cad las la rlung nyid do/_/'di ltar dkyil 'khor mnyam shes bya/_/rtag tu dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/dkyil 'khor bsams pa tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa spangs shing rnam par grol/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rnal 'byor sbyor ba tsam gyis ni/_/bza' ba rnal 'byor brtag par bya/_/dbang po lnga ni tshim byas pas/_/mi 'chi mdzes par gyur pa'o/_/dang por bdag nyid sbyang ba dang /_/gnyis par rtag tu dkyil 'khor nyid/_/gsum par bdag gi gdan 
[\[272b.2\]]dang ni/_/bzhi pa la ni sbyor ba'i gdan/_/sa bon gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/yi ge'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba/_/yig don dbyangs las yang 
[\[272b.3\]]dag 'byung /_/yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya/_/mgrin pa mchu dang rkan dang ni/_/yi ge lce yis yongs bsgyur ba'o/_/ka tshan dud pa las byung nyid/_/tsa tshan dkar po yang dag mtshungs/_/Ta tshan dung las yang dag 'byung /_/pad+ma nyid las ta yis 
[\[272b.4\]]tshogs/_/dbyangs bzhi yi ni 'du shes su/_/so sor dbyangs ni 'byung ba'o/_/yi ge gnyis las kun 'byung ba/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge dman pa nyid/_/kha dog med cing kha dog 'byung /_/gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid/_/ring ba ma 
[\[272b.5\]]yi mthang ba min/_/rigs pa dang ni rigs min nyid/_/stong min stong pa'i yang dag dngos/_/gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o/_/gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/_/blo dang ldan pas gzung bar bya/_/srog gi yi ger lhan cig pas/_/ji 
[\[272b.6\]]ltar gzugs don mdzes pa dang /_/yid 'ong 'od zer yi ge ni/_/dus las 'das pa phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/stong pa dang ni pad+ma rgyal/_/pad+ma dkar po'i yi ge ni/_/de bzhin gang shes rnal 'byor pa/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin/_/stong 
[\[272b.7\]]pas lus ni sbyang byas la/_/stong pa nyid du lhan cig bskrun/_/sa bon bskrun pa tsam gyis ni/_/yi ge'i mtshan nyid lhan cig go/_/yi ge'i mtshan nyid rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so//_//[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni mi 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]smra ste/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar rab goms pas/_/bslab pa thams cad rnam par mnan/_/nyes pa thams cad kun gyi gnas/_/chags pa'i thag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/'khor ba'i phur pa la rab btags/_/mi gtsang bum pa'i 
[\[273a.2\]]mar lta bu/_/thams cad du ni rtag tu spang /_/lus kyi rnam pa gsum nyid dang /_/ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bsdam/_/ngag gi mchod pa mngon rdzogs pa'o/_/de nyid dman pa'i 
[\[273a.3\]]sgrub pa pos/_/bsgrub bya 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/_/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/_/de phyir de nyid la mnyam brten/_/bla ma bsnyen bkur bsten la rig_/ci 'byor pa yi rdzas nyid dang /_/yang na rig dang rig par brje/_/bzhi pa nye 
[\[273a.4\]]bar rnyed mi 'gyur/_/bcu bzhi dang ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang /_/khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/'bad pas gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/bdun gyi sde tshan tsa muN+Di/_/khro gnyer can la nyi shu lnga/_/sde tshan brgyad pa mA 
[\[273a.5\]]ma kI/_/sgrol ma sde [(]tshen [,]tshan [)]lnga par bshad/_/mkha' 'gro ma yang lnga par bshad/_/'byung ba sdud pa drug pa'o/_/ri khrod ma ni dgu par bshad/_/sangs rgyas spyan ma [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad cu nyid/_/phyi yi mchod pas 
[\[273a.6\]]mtshungs pa'o/_/dbus su bde ba chen por bshad/_/rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis bskor/_/ha yi rnam pa kha dog 'phrog_/ho yi rnam pa dri ma med/_/dpa' bo hriHyis 'dzoms pa ni/_/rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya/_/kha cig dri yi rang 
[\[273a.7\]]bzhin dang /_/kha cig me tog gi rang bzhin/_/kha cig spos kyi rang bzhin dang /_/kha cig gtor ma'i rang bzhin du/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' brgyad/_/phyi yi mchod par gnas pa nyid/_/dam tshig dang gtor ma dang mchod pa'i le'u 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ste bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rang bshad pa/_/yi ge las kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/rang bzhin mnyam par bshad pa nyid/_/khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya/_/o~M ni lte bar mngon par dgang /_/oM ni rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/
[\[273b.2\]]oM ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba/_/oM ni stong pa nyid du bshad/_/oM ni yi ge brgyad cu'o/_/ka ni 'gugs pa'o/_/kha ni za ba'o/_/ga ni dri ba'o/_/g+ha ni 'joms pa'o/_/nga ni skyong ba'o/_/tsa ni g.yo ba'o/_/tsha ni tshig dor ro/_/dza ni
