[\[273b.3\]]'gugs pa'o/_/dz+ha ni 'dar ba'o/_/nya ni shes pa'o/_/Ta ni dkar po'o/_/Tha ni 'bar ba'o/_/Da ni dbul ba'o/_/D+ha ni rnam par g.yeng ba'o/_/Na ni skrag pa'o/_/ta ni 'bar ba'o/_/tha ni zhi ba'o/_/da ni bskrun pa'o/_/d+ha ni rgyas 
[\[273b.4\]]pa'i'o/_/na ni skrag pa po/_/ba ni tshod pa'o/_/pha ni spyan no/_/ba ni 'bar ba'o/_/b+ha ni 'jigs pa yang dag par byed pa'o/_/ma ni za ba'o/_/a ni 'khrul 'khor 'jig pa'o/_/wa na rtsod pa'o/_/ra ni skem pa'o/_/la ni dbang du byed 
[\[273b.5\]]pa'o/_/sa ni dgra 'joms pa'o/_/Sha ni gnod pa'o/_/sha ni ltung pa'o/_/ha ni drag po'o/_/k+Sha ni bskyod pa'o/_/I ni dbang phyug go/_/swA hA ni rnam pas rgyas pa'o/_/phaT kyis rnam pas 'joms pa dang /_ma Da'i rnam pas 'joms par 
[\[273b.6\]]byed/_/ga ha yis ni dbang du byed/_/po Sha hri yis rgyas par byed/_/re Ta yis ni zhi ba'o/_/g+ha ta yis ni gcod pa'o/_/sngags la sngags kyi rnam par sbyar/_/don gzhi las dang lhan cig tu/_/de yi ming ni rab tu sbyar/_/las ni 'di ltar 
[\[273b.7\]]bshad pa yin/_/sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi/_/dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi/_/dge 'dun la yang skyabs song bas/_/de ni ngan 'gror 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ma yin no/_/bsod nams yi rang sdig pa bshags/_/tshul khrims tshad med yan lag dang /_/de bzhin brtul zhugs yan lag nyid/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes rig pas/_/'di lta bu ni rtag tu spang /_/de ltar lan 
[\[274a.2\]]gnyis lan gsum du/_/byang chub snying por byas nas ni/_/snying rje mchog dang ldan pa yis/_/'gro drug 'khor lo nye bar bshad/_/srid pa'i nyes pa la zhen pa'i/_/de lta'i sems ni rnam par spang /_/de yi sdig pa zhi ba dang /_/bsod nams 
[\[274a.3\]]rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/oM ma hA de bi/_ma hA su le/_ma hA te dza/_ma hA po ta/_ma hA ba le/_/ma hA yadz+nye/_oM se ta b+hi dza gr-ih+NA ni/_oM si ti b+hi dza ya d+hA ra yA mi/_oM d+hU ma bi dza dza/_oM d+hU ma bi dza b+h+yo bat+ta na/_de ring bdag la dgongs su 
[\[274a.4\]]gsol/_/gsod dang rku rang 'dod chags dang /_/de bzhin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang phreng ba dang /_/byug pa gar la sogs pa dang /_/lhag pa'i bza' ba bsdam par bya/_/longs spyod la dga' chos mi rnyed/_/swa b+hA ba shud d+h+yaHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA pa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_
[\[274a.5\]]badzra shud d+haHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/_yo ga shud d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_de ring bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ni rnal 'byor mchog rab ster/_/bdag gis rnam shes rgyal po bskyed/_/bdag gis rnam shes 'phro ba shes/_/de ring slob 
[\[274a.6\]]ma don dam de nyid rgyal po nyid rgyal po nyid kyis dbang bskur gsol/_/bkra shis mngon par 'dod phyir dmyal ba las byung rtags bstan pas/_/'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad las ni rnam par ldog pa yi/_/rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po mchog tu grub gyur cig_/bslab pa'i le'u 
[\[274a.7\]]ste drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/mdor na lcags kyu rnam pa gsum/_/sbyin pa sbyin par mi bya'o/_/'khrig pa'i dngos po bsten pa las/_/khrag dang khu ba yang dag 'byung /_/sngon gyi sa la ma rig pas/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rtags su gzugs kyis dkris pa'o/_/zhag bdun pa na khu ba yis/_/rnam shes ldar ni yang dag byung /_/bcu gnyis zhag na shes bya ba/_/brgyad par rtag tu mkhrang 'gyur nyid/_/ro ni nyin zhag bcu drug na/_/ar bu ta ra ni zhag lngar ro/_/phyogs 
[\[274b.2\]]gsum la brtag gzugs brnyan nyid/_/de yi ngo gdong rkang lag dang /_/ba spu sor ni 'gyur ba'o/_/zla gsum rkang pa rna ba'o/_/zla drug gzugs phyed bcas par 'gro/_/rnam shes lnga dang sems pa'o/_/gnas skabs bcu ni rnam bshad pa/_/mngal 
[\[274b.3\]]nas skyes pa'i skye ba po/_/rnal 'byor rig pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mngal gyi gnas skabs rnam par bshad/_/skra dang spu dang sen mo so/_/rdul dang de bzhin dri ma sha/_/rus pa mgo bo lto ba dang /_/gnye ma bshang dang gci ba dang /_/mchil ma snabs dang 
[\[274b.4\]]skyugs pa dang /_/rab 'dzag mi gtsang rnam pa gang /_/'du byed cho gas skye ba'o/_/rnal 'byor ba yis kun shes nas/_/sngon gyi las kyi 'byin pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_/rnam par 
[\[274b.5\]]shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_/len pa'i rkyen gyis 
[\[274b.6\]]srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig las skye zhing 'byung bar 
[\[274b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/mngal na gnas pa'i rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/yon tan las ni yon tan skye/_/rnam shes gzugs kyi ngo bo ni/_/kha dog bdun pa'i 'od zer ni/_/
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dbang po lnga yi 'od zer nyid/_/mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/_/rtsa dgu las ni rnam par 'byung /_/gzugs dang dbang po lhan cig tshogs/_/'od zer 'byin cing sdud pa'o/_/de la dbugs kyang sbyar bar bya/_/mthe bong lhan cig 
[\[275a.2\]]tsam gyi ni/_/gzugs ni dbus su rnam par 'gro/_/klu dgus rtag tu pad+ma la/_/nyin zhag gcig la brgyad du ni/_/gzugs dang kha dog yon tan du/_/de yi gzugs ni rtag tu 'gro/_/gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'i dbus su ni/_/zhi ba lhan cig 
[\[275a.3\]]brtsam par bya/_/drug cu rtsa bzhir skye ba ni/_/sbyor ba rtse mor 'dzin pa'o/_/brgyad pa dbang la mnyam gnas pa/_/sbyor ba dbu mar mtshungs pa'o/_/brgyad la nag por kun nas sbyor/_/sbyor ba sngon du gzung bar bya/_/rtsa dgu yi ni gdan nyid la/_/
[\[275a.4\]]klu yi gdengs ka kun nas mnan/_/rtsa yis g.yogs shing rab tu bskor/_/thams cad 'byin cing nges par rgyal/_/byang du dkar po zhes bya ba/_/dud pa de bzhin de yi lhor/_/dbugs ni mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/_/g.yon pa'i dbugs ni dri med 
[\[275a.5\]]gsum/_/nyin dang mtshan gyi dngos po yis/_/'pho ba brgyad du bshad pa'o/_/de yi sbyor bas 'pho ba ni/_/'pho ba'i sbyor bas gzung bar bya/_/'byin pa pad+ma'i rnam par mnyam/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par gnas/_/gang zhig gal te 
[\[275a.6\]]yang dag mis/_/shi bar gyur kyang mi gtang ngo /_/'di ltar rlung gi rgyun tshogs ni/_/du bar kun tu yang dag gnas/_/pad+ma'i rnam pa ltar mnyam pa/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par gnas/_/dkar po dbang po lnga bshad pa/_/de bzhin du ni rus 
[\[275a.7\]]pa'o/_/'bu dang srin bu pad+ma'o/_/rus pa'i mtshams su gnas pa ni/_/du ba ru ni gyur pa'o/_/ro tsa na ni rlung du mtshungs/_/dri med gsum ni lag pa'i mtha'/_/dbye ba rkan dang mgrin pa'o/_/sa gdugs rked brgyab la ni/_/rang 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bzhin med pa'i 'byin byed pa'o/_/gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/'chi ba'i dus su gnas pa nyid/_/gal te dus la bab tsam gyis/_/dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'jigs pa chu mthong na/_/'gram pa'i mtshams 
[\[275b.2\]]ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/bcu gnyis zhag la khri phrag gcig_/chu tshod dbugs ni chad pa'o/_/gang zhig mtshan mo'i mtshan nyid ni/_/lho phyogs bgrod par yang dag bshad/_/byang du bgrod par bshad pa ni/_/ji ltar nyin mo'i rnam pa'i 'od/_/
[\[275b.3\]]sor mo drug pa tsam nyid du/_/nang gi rnam shes 'pho ba'o/_/gsang zhing gsang ba gsang chen po/_/sbyor ba gsang bar mtshungs pa'o/_/rnal 'byor shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/de phyir gsang ba la mnyam bsten/_/nang gi le'u zhes bya ba 
[\[275b.4\]]ste brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/rdo rje sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/pad+ma'i gzugs nyid gzung ba nyid/_/mchog dang rdo rje mchog mnyam pa'i/_/pad+ma mnyam par byas nas ni/_/'khrig pa bdud 
[\[275b.5\]]rtsi'i sbyor ba'o/_/thig le yi ni rang bzhin nyid/_/rnal 'byor ba yi thig le gsang /_/ku sha'i rtse mo bdun gyi chas/_/rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad la dbul/_/bdud rtsi srub pa blang byas la/_/glo ru thig le bzhin du dbul/_/nyon mongs rtag tu 
[\[275b.6\]]skad cig gis/_/a rdza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos bltas nas ni/_/'dul ba 'di ni rtag zlos pa'i/_/sems can 'jig rten 'das pa thob/_/ngan par spyad pa'i dri ma 'dam/_/blo ldan gang zhig gis bkrus nas/_/
[\[275b.7\]]dge ba 'di yis dri ma 'di/_/gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yi/_/des byas bde gshegs nyid du 'gyur/_/rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa rdzogs so//_//stong nyid dngos po'i gzugs kyis ni/_/dbus su lhan cig bsgom par 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bya/_/stong pa'i de nyid kyis bkrus la/_/stong pa stong pa'i sa bon bzhin/_/phyogs stong chur ni bshad pa nyid/_/der ni pad+ma gzugs bcas pa'o/_/pad+ma'i dbus su pad+ma de/_/yid 'ong lhan cig 'byung ba'o/_/rnam 
[\[276a.2\]]shes gdan du re pha'o/_/de nyid re pha dang lhan cig_/de bzhin steng du thig le bshad/_/dbus su rnam shes lhan cig bzhin/_/sa ni 'od zer gzugs can du/_/khru phyed du ni bsgom par bya/_/rnam shes dkar por bsgom bya ba/_/gang 
[\[276a.3\]]zhig sbyor ba shes la snang /_/snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/gzhan gyi ye shes mchog 'gro ba/_/dkar po mdun du rab tu bshad/_/dud pa phyi rol nub tu'o/_/de yi 
[\[276a.4\]]g.yon pa gzung byas la/_/dbus su rnam shes lhan cig tu/_/rnam par shes pa ser por bsgom/_/de yi ming can ro hi ta/_/ming ni stong par de bzhin bshad/_/dung gi phyi rol rnam bskor bas/_/de yi sems kyang bsgom par bya/_/blo ldan pha 
[\[276a.5\]]rol sems shes pas/_/gzhan sems rtag tu yi ge ru/_/mnyam par bzhag cing bsgoms tsam gyis/_/gzhan sems shes par 'gyur pa'o/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//de nas 
[\[276a.6\]]gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rngub par lhan cig mtshungs pa yis/_/rtsa rnams dgu ni bsdam par bya/_/rngubs shing bkang ba'i bdag nyid kyis/_/rang nyid sbyor bas yang dag bkru/_/dbugs kyi 'byin byed g.yo ba nyid/_/blo ldan sgo ni sdom pa 
[\[276a.7\]]pos/_/g.yo ba'i yi ge sbyar bar bya/_/dbugs kyi mthar ni sbyar ba yis/_/'byung ba slar ni mi bzlog go/_/dbugs kyi mthar ni 'byung ba yis/_/blo dang ldan pas dgang zhing stong /_/gang ba la ni lha nyid kyi/_/rtsa nyid dgu yi yi ge'o/_/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]blo ldan lhan cig rngub pa yis/_/sdud pa'i gzugs ni gcig gis so/_/rngub dang 'byin dang bkang ba yis/_/'pho bar sbyor ba lhan cig gnas/_/rigs pas dus la bab pa'i tshe/_/'pho bar lhan cig sbyor ba brtsam/_/'pho ba sbyang 
[\[276b.2\]]pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/tshigs dgu las ni 'byin pa'o/_/de bzhin tshigs dgu gong du bshad/_/lhan cig 'pho ba bsten par bya/_/dud pa'i sa bon gyis g.yo 
[\[276b.3\]]zhing /_/de bzhin thams cad mkhyen par 'gro/_/nag po'i sbyor ba'i bsgom pa yis/_/tshangs pa'i bug las rnam par 'byung /_/rnam shes yang dag sbyor zhes bya/_/gdan du rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/rlung gi sa bon mnyam par bshad/_/de yi 
[\[276b.4\]]cod pan bzhin du 'pho/_/de bzhin tshigs dgu las ni steng /_/tshangs pa'i bug pa dang mtshungs pa'o/_/tshangs pa'i bug pa las byung ni/_/mod la 'pho ba'i 'byung nyid yin/_/mod la 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[276b.5\]]rab bshad pa/_/de nyid mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/de nyid lhan cig bsgoms pa yis/_/gdan ni dkar por yang dag gyur/_/stong ba'i ming zhes bya bar bshad/_/zhi ba'i dus su kun sbyar bas/_/zhi bar lhan cig brtsam par bya/_/zhi ba'i 
[\[276b.6\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi ba rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/bdag nyid rtags ni sbyang ba bzhin/_/sbyang zhing bdag nyid chen por sbyang /_/stong nyid lhan cig spyang bar bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/me yi 
[\[276b.7\]]dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o/_/me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o/_/de dbus de nyid gsungs pa ni/_/lhan cig myu gu'i mtshan 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]nyid do/_/gsang zhing gsang ba'i gsang chen po/_/snying po snying po chen po yis/_/de nyid mi shes thams cad kyi/_/rnam shes lhan cig sbyang bar bya/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa bdun gyi bdun pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan 
[\[277a.2\]]yang rab bshad bya/_/dkar po'i sa bon brgyad pa mthong /_/dgu mtha' du ba'i sa bon bzhin/_/dung gi sa bon yan lag drug_/dang po sgra yig pad sa bon/_/mgo yang de bzhin dbyangs yig mtha'/_/dang po'i cha ni dri med gsum/_/dbye ba sde 
[\[277a.3\]]tshan tha ma'o/_/mtha' yi sgra yig sa yi gdugs/_/yi ge'i sa bon ger shes bya/_/sdug pa las ni mya ngan dang /_/sdug pa las ni 'jigs pa skye/_/sdug pa dang ni rnam bral bas/_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/'dod pa las ni mya ngan 
[\[277a.4\]]dang /_/'dod pa las ni 'jigs par 'gyur/_/'dod pa dang ni rnam bral bas/_/mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan byas te/_/de nyid lhan cig gdan la ni/_/de yi bdag nyid cher ldan pa'i/_/de nyid 'od zer bdun pa'o/_/
[\[277a.5\]]rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/pad+ma nyid dang gzhal yas khang /_/rnam par shes pa lhan cig bskyed/_/mdun du re pha ser po yang /_/sde tshon lhan cig sems bzhin no/_/sa yi mtshams su bsgom bya ba/_/rang 
[\[277a.6\]]lus sa bon lhan cig bcas/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung ming dang ni/_/blor ni gsang ba'i ri rab gnyis/_/mig ni sna rtse rab lta bya zhing /_/dbugs kyis lte ba'i drung bar ro/_/mnyam bzhag sbyor ba'i ngo bo yis/_/gsang ba'i gdan la mnyam par zhon/_/
[\[277a.7\]]zhen pas sdig las grol bar byed/_/gdan la kun tu zhon tsam gyis/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ba'o/_/yang na sngags kyi bzlas pa yis/_/'di ni dbang gi brtsam par bya/_/yang na sman dang ldan pa yis/_/sngags ni gzhan gyi gdan nyid do/_/le'u 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/tshigs dgu las ni 'byin pa po/_/'byin pa stong pa mnyam par bshad/_/tshigs nyid rked pa nyid dang ni/_/tshigs dang lte ba dkar po'o/_/dkar pos khog pa dkris pa'o/_/snying gi stong pa 
[\[277b.2\]]du ba nyid/_/shi yang du bar 'gyur ba'o/_/snying la dung nyid yang dang ni/_/dung gi tshigs la gnas pa nyid/_/snying gi steng du pad+ma nyid/_/brang la pad+ma rnam par bshad/_/de bzhin mgrin par gi'u wang dang /_/dbang po lnga la gi'u wang bshad/_/dri med gsum 
[\[277b.3\]]ni so yi mtshams/_/sa yi gdugs ni pho nya tsar/_/'byed pa gnag dang g.yon pa la/_/sa gdugs pho nya'i rtsa ba la/_/'byin pa tshangs pa'i bug pa'o/_/'di yis sgo rnams bsdams na ni/_/rnam par shes pa gang zhes brjod/_/le'u gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[277b.4\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/cho ga 'dis ni brtsam pa dang /_/yi ge 'dis ni sbyar ba dang /_/'dis ni bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyis/_/tshad mar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gang /_/de bzhin yi ge'i tshad ma gang /_/lha nyid ldan pa'i tshad ma gang /_/'gro ba 
[\[277b.5\]]khyom pa'i tsha dam gang /_/lan cig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/dgra yi mthar ni 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin dgra yi ming bshad pa/_/nag po lhan cig sbyar bar bya/_/le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/sbyor ba mchog gi 
[\[277b.6\]]tshig bya ba/_/lha nyid lhan cig ngo bo yis/_/dud pa'i sa bon gyis spyan drang /_/oM d+hU ma d+hU ma pi dza yak+Sha ra d+hu ma b+h+yo man+t+ra bA la yaM swA hA/_mtha' yi yi ge ldan pa yi/_/mchog gi yi ge dgyes par bya/_/dam tshig ser po bsgoms pa yis/_/oM sa ma ya 
[\[277b.7\]]A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya d+hu ma bI dza swA hA/_le'u bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/skye ba bzhi yi khyad par nyid/_/dung can ma dang pad+ma can/_/de bzhin ri mo glang po can/_/pad+ma can ni bad dri dang /_/glang chen myos pa'i 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'gros su 'gro/_/rtag tu snyan par smra ba dang /_/chung dang 'bring gis nus pa'o/_/yan lag thams cad smad pa dang /_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig_/ji srid skra ni de bzhin 'khyil/_/bzhin dang so ni phra ba dang /_/sor mo phra 
[\[278a.2\]]zhing yan lag dman/_/sor mo dmar zhing chung ba nyid/_/zhi ba'i gzugs can dbu mar bshad/_/pad+ma can gyis dpal 'grub cing /_/zhi ba'i longs spyod la rab sbyar/_/le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/glang can ma ni 
[\[278a.3\]]chang dri dang /_/dman dang 'bring gi rtsol dang bcas/_/mchu 'phyang byin pa sbom pa dang /_/glang chen myos pa'i 'gros su 'gro/_/gzugs ring sen mo ring ba dang /_/nu ma 'phyad zhing skra rtsub pa'o/_/'dod pa chung zhing byin pa sbom/_/de bzhin dpung pa mtho 
[\[278a.4\]]ba'o/_/mig dang sen mo phra ba dang /_/sbrang rtsi la dga' snyan par smra/_/bzhin ni rab tu dgod pa dang /_/dbyangs snyan 'dod la sred pa nyid/_/gsang ba'i kha khyer rgyas pa dang /_/sa la rkang mthil mnyam par gnas/_/rtag tu chang la dga' ba dang /_/
[\[278a.5\]]don 'dod pa yang glang po ma/_/rgyas pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/dung can ma ni dung gi mdog_/zhib ma'i gdong can byin pa ring /_bya rog skad dang bya rog dri/_/sor sbom sor mo ring ba 
[\[278a.6\]]can/_/skra rtsub yan lag 'jam pa dang /_/bong chen [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgyogs 'gros 'gro/_/mgrin pa ring zhing so sgo can/_/sna mtho mchan khung sbu dang ni/_/gdugs kyi rnam pa mchu 'dra ba'i/_/'di lta'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/_/blo dang ldan pas lhan cig 
[\[278a.7\]]spang /_/dbang la sbyar ba'i bud med do/_/le'u bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/ri mo can la ri mo dga'/_/ri mo'i gzugs dang kha dog bzhin/_/nu ma chung zhing sor mo phra/_/sgra chung yan lag chung ba dang /_/byad chung 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]skra yang chung ba dang /_/bya rog rang bzhin bya rog skad/_/she la dga' zhing drag tu smra/_/'di ni mtha' yi mtshan nyid de/_/bud med nag mo'i la sa la sbyar/_/mig g.yon ma dang 'og mig ma/_/tsu ta'i gdong pa bkra ba'i lus/_/rtag tu skra dang so ste 
[\[278b.2\]]ba/_/'dod pa drag cing drag par 'bab/_/mdog skya sgur zhing thung ba dang /_/nu ma mtho zhing dpung pa mtho/_/'di yi smin ma rje ngar tsam/_/'di yis bran kun za 'joms shing /_/yang na bdag po gsod byed pas/_/'di 'dra'i bud med rnam par spang /_/
[\[278b.3\]]pad+ma can ni lha yi rigs/_/glang po can ma gnod sbyin rigs/_/dung can ma ni mi yi rigs/_/ri mo can ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]cha/_/le'u brgyad pa'o//_//mir skyes pa ni kun sbyor bas/_/sngon du rigs kyi cha nyid ni/_/ba Da ba ni glang por bshad/_/
[\[278b.4\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]can ma rtsa yi rigs/_/pa ra pa ni lha yi rigs/_/gdugs ltar dpung pa mgrin pa ring /_/so sto mchu ni snum pa dang /_/pad+ma'am ni dmar po'i rigs/_/dpral ba smin ma rgya che zhing /_/skra ni 'jam zhing ser skya'o/_/gzugs ni 'tsham zhing 
[\[278b.5\]]rje ngar ring /_/sna mtho sna ni 'phrang ba dang /_/yan lag 'jam zhing dpung pa ring /_/ngang pa'i 'gros dang ngang pa'i skad/_/dri dang me tog la dga' zhing /_/'o ma la dga' sbyin pa gtong /_/bsod nams che dang sgeg par bcas/_/dbang phyug dpal ni 
[\[278b.6\]]rab ster zhing /_/sems brtan kha zas nyung dus 'tsho/_/le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/glang po can ma lus bong che/_/byin pa ring zhing ngo gdong che/_/mig phra rna ba 'phyang ba dang /_/skra rtsub pa dang phum pa 
[\[278b.7\]]can/_/mchu 'phyangs yan lag rgyas pa nyid/_/zas ni drag tu za ba dang /_/zhib ma'i gdong ba can rna ba 'phyang /_/'dod pa chung zhing 'dus la dga'/_/dpung mgo ras 'phyang yan lag phra/_/skra ring so ni sto ba dang /_/sen mo chung zhing rkang pa 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]'jam/_/sna dang lto ba ring ba dang /_/bung ma'i skad dang lus po rtsub/_/'dod la dga' zhing gti mug dngos/_/phyug cing thams cad bdag po'o/_/le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/
[\[279a.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]can ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rkang /_/mig dkyus ring zhing lus bong che/_/skra phra so ni chung ba dang /_/mchu ba snyung lus ni mdzes pa dang /_/til gyi bzhin dang pags pa srab/_/mang la dga' zhing mang du smra/_/bya rog skad dang rkang pa 'gyur/_/rtag tu dbul zhing mi 
[\[279a.3\]]brtan pa/_/gdug sems ldan pa'i bdag nyid can/_/sdig byed tshig 'dor smra ba'i sa/_/dud 'gro'am yang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rigs/_/le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/mkhas shing brtson 'grus brtan pa 
[\[279a.4\]]dang /_/shes rab brtul zhugs brtan pa nyid/_/snying stobs brtan zhing stong pa nyid/_/mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang /_/lus po 'tsham zhing yan lag phra/_/pags pa sra ba cing sen mo dmar/_/snyan par smra zhing snying rje che/_/sbyin pa'i bdag nyid la 
[\[279a.5\]]rtag dga'/_/me tog dril dga' ba nyid/_/sbyor dang ye shes la dga' ba/_/snying rjer mngon dga'i bdag nyid sems/_/bud med las ni khyad par 'phags/_/le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//_//chang la mngon du dga' ba dang /_/rtag sred 
[\[279a.6\]]la ni dga' ba yi/_/rtag tu sa stengs sbyor ba dman/_/'di lta bu ni spang bar bya/_/le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/thab khung thab khung mnyam shes bya/_/ku ru me ni kun tu brtags/_/rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 
[\[279a.7\]]pad+ma mnyam/_/du ba mer ni rab tu brtag_/dkar ba'i sa bon gyis ni shing /_/dung gi sa bon me tog bzhin/_/gtor ma spos ni pad+mar bshad/_/khams lnga nye bar longs spyad bya/_/gi'u wang dri ma gsum byed pa/_/sa gdugs 'byin byed sa bon 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bzhin/_/srin lag mthe bong gung mo ni/_/lhan cig phyag rgyar sbyar byas la/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ngo bo yis/_/bdag nyid mchod sbyin sreg par byed/_/bsreg rdzas 'o ma btung ba'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la/_/khyad par du yang tshes brgyad 
[\[279b.2\]]la/_/mnyam par sbyor bas cha spangs la/_/bdag bzhin bla ma sbyin sreg bya/_/de bzhin lha 'joms ji lta bar/_/yang na gsang ba 'jig byed pa/_/yang na bla ma mnyes par yang /_/de bzhin bla ma blangs pa dang /_/cho ga rdzogs par blang pa dang /_/
[\[279b.3\]]bdag nyid me la lhan cig sbyar/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par/_/'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/_/le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/phyag rgya yi ni cho ga mchog_/g.yas brkyang rkang pas 
[\[279b.4\]]mnan nas ni/_/sdigs mdzub snying gar rnam par sbyin/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par/_/'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/_/se gol hU~M gi rnam pa dang /_/lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pas/_/klu rnams skrag par byed pa dang /_/log 'dren 
[\[279b.5\]]'dar bar byed pa dang /_/sgo 'phar 'byed pa dang /_'byung po gsod pa dang /_sha za 'dul ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skrod pa dang /_'di ni tsham ngam gyi cho ga'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/gzhan yang rdo rje tsham ngam gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mi brlag par 
[\[279b.6\]]byed pa dang /_steng du 'phen pa dang /_'byung po 'joms pa la du ba'i sa bon gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan dbul/_'jig rten pa yi gnas tsam 
[\[279b.7\]]ni/_/dung pa'i lcags kyus spyan drang la/_/rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog gis dgyes bya/_/rdo rje dril bus mchod par bya/_/me tog gi sor dang /_dri'i sor mo dang /_spos kyi sor mo/_/mar me'i sor mo/_/gtor 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ma'i sor mo rnams kyis mchod pa lnga mnyam par byas te mchod par bya'o/_/ra ba'i phyag rgya dang /_dra ba'i phyag rgya dang /_/phur pa'i phyag rgya dang /_ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang /_sha ga ti'i phyag rgya dang /_pad+ma'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o/_/
[\[280a.2\]]chu'i sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya dang /_me la pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang /_rdo rje gri gug gis gcod pa dang /_log pa'i gri gug gis gsod pa dang /_phag mo'i phyag rgyas skrod pa dang /_snying gar bsdu zhing gshegs su gsol pa'o/_/phyag rgya'i le'u zhes 
[\[280a.3\]]bya ba ste le'u bdun pa zhes bya'o//_//kye ma'o 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/des na de bzhin 'dod pa spang bar bya/_/'dod pa rnams ni dug ltar nyes mtha' yas/_/dmyal bar ltung zhing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas 
[\[280a.4\]]su skye/_/skad cig dbang du mi 'gyur 'dod pa yi/_/yon tan 'di dag smig rgyu lta bu dang /_/snying po med cing chu bur dbu bar mtshungs/_/thog ma lang tsho mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa/_/sdug cing yid 'ong 'di ni byis pa'i dus/_/gzugs mdzes 
[\[280a.5\]]gzugs ni mi sdug gzugs su 'gyur/_/mdza' med 'chi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yi/_/'gro 'di nor gyis dbul zhing slong mo ba'o/_/de phyir 'bad pas rnal 'byor pas/_/thams cad du ni lus bsdam zhing /_/bza' ba bca' ba bsdam par bya'o/_/spyod 
[\[280a.6\]]pa'i dus la 'di yis bsdam/_/le'u brgyad pa ste bstan bcos bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//sor brgyad las ni lhag pa ru/_/ji srid khru stong bar du ni/_/brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa dang /_/bcu par rtag tu rgyas pa'o/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[280a.7\]]dbang du yang dag ldan/_/bcu bzhi de bzhin zhi ba nyid/_/bcu drug tu ni kun tu brko/_/kha khyer gsum par mngon par spyod/_/zhi ba la ni gru bzhi ba/_/yongs su dgod pa dbang du ldan/_/yang na rgyas pa la yang yin/_/dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]badzra spo Ta ma hA te dza hU~M phaT/_rdo rje'i phur bu la hrIHha ha zhes so/_/rdo rje'i rab la ni ha zhes dang /_rdo rje'i cho ga la ni he he'o/_/lce sbyang ba la ni sa'o/_/lag pa sbyang ba la ni AHhU~M ngo /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kyis ni dgod pa'o/_/me yi dbus su 
[\[280b.2\]]pad+ma nyid/_/de yi dbus su me yi lha/_/du ba'i lcags kyus gzhug byas la/_/rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/_/spyan gsum de bzhin lto pa dang /_/ral pa dmar ser yang dag ldan/_/bu ram mdog can gsus 
[\[280b.3\]]pa 'phyang /_/skyabs sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang /_/sdigs mdzub dang ni rtse gsum nyid/_/oM sa swA hA me'i snying po'o/_/o~M tu ta hU~M tab+ta te sa swA hA/_nor gyi phyag rgyas mchod par bya/_/dngos po lnga yis de bzhin bsreg_/ji ltar 'byor pa gsum gyis mchod 
[\[280b.4\]]gang phyir de ni gshegs su gsol/_/de bzhin pad+mar bsgyur ba lngas/_/oM ka ma la ut+pa lo hrIH/_lha nyid rtsa dang lhan cig bzhin/_/sgra yis lta ni dbyung bya ba/_/zhi bar dkar por yang dag ldan/_/rgyas par ser por rnam par bsgom/_/dbang la 
[\[280b.5\]]dmar por yang dag ldan/_/nag po nyid ni drag po'o/_/lha yi gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rnal 'byor dang /_/hUM hUM sa yam shing sbyang ba'o/_/hU~M 'bru sbyang ba'o/_/oM 'o ma sbyang ba'o/_/hri ti yi'o/_/oM shu su pi ta buSh+pe b+h+yo swA hA/_
[\[280b.6\]]oM d+hu ba mA la ku le swA hA/_oM tI k+Sha NA dI pe swA hA/_oM ku ru ku ru bi dza ya swA hA/_lhan cig lha dang dbus su ni/_/bzlas pa gcig gis bsdu bar bya/_/dpa' bo 'bar ba'i bdag nyid che/_/phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni/_/de yi zhal du sreg 
[\[280b.7\]]blugs ni/_/kun nas lha nyid tshim par bya/_/dngos po brgyad kyi mchod pa ni/_/hUM gi glu yi rnam pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas/_/dku yi phyogs su gzung bar bya/_/me tog tshul gyis gtor 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]ba dang /_/gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang /_/sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang /_/gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod/_/'bud pa'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang /_/bla re'i tshul gyis bre 
[\[281a.2\]]ba dang /_/ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang /_/rlung g.yab tshul gyis g.yab pa dang /_/lha nyid la mchod phyir ni mchog tu 'dud/_/zhi phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud pas zhi bar byed/_/spro phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/bdag med rnal 'byor 
[\[281a.3\]]grub phyir hUM 'byin sa bon 'dzin par mdzad/_/bdag med par sbyor rnam par snang mdzad dngos la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/khyad par glu dang mchod pas me la mchod bar bya ste sgras 'jug par bya'o/_/de bzhin du phyis sreg blugs phyed dang bzhis me lha mchod 
[\[281a.4\]]par bya'o/_/le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/slar yang me yi brtag pa ni/_/mtho bar 'bar bas zhi ba'o/_/dma' bar 'bar bas rgyas pa nyid/_/'khor bar 'bar bas dbang dang ldan/_/ngu bar 'bar 
[\[281a.5\]]bas bdag nyid 'joms/_/de bzhin me yi de nyid ni/_/blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya/_/dbang ldan du ni zhi ba nyid/_/shar du dpal dang mngon par 'grogs/_/me yi phyogs su rgyas pa nyid/_lho phyogs su ni nor brlag go/_/bden bral 'chi 
[\[281a.6\]]ba'i pho nya nyid/_/nub tu dbang ni brtsam par bya/_/rlung du nor ni nyams pa dang /_/byang du rigs ni rnam par 'phel/_/le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/yam shing gi ni brtag pa ni/_/yam shing gi ni 
[\[281a.7\]]bye brag nyid/_/zhi ba la ni sor mo bcu/_/rgyas pa la ni skyes bu nyid/_/mngon spyod la ni brgyad pa po/_/dbang la bcu gnyis pa nyid dang /_/dbye ba de bzhin 'o ma'i shing /_/de bzhin pad+ma pri yang ku/_/khyad par du ni zhi ba la/_/yam shing 'di ni cho ga'i 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mchog_/thang shing de bzhin shing dang ni/_/'o ma 'dzag pa'i shing ji bzhin/_/yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog_/rgyas pa la ni sbyar bar bya/_/b+ha la ta ka sgur po'i shing /_/bya rog tshang gi shing ji bzhin/_/yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog_/shing gi 
[\[281b.2\]]nag po'i las la sbyar/_/'o mar ldan pa'i btung ba dang /_/de bzhin 'bras dang 'bru mnyam pas/_/zhi ba la ni sbyar bar bshad/_/sbyin sreg gi ni cho ga mchog_/gi'u wang dang ni gur gum nyid/_/thams cad 'bru dang mnyam ldan pa/_/de bzhin rgyas 
[\[281b.3\]]pa'i sbyin sreg go/_/yang na gser gyi lha dang ni/_/puN+Da rI ka gur gum dang /_/a ru ra yi me tog brgya/_/dbang la sbyar bar yang dag mtshungs/_/b+ha la ta ka lu btang dang /_/dug dang de bzhin khrag nyid dang /_/tsha ba'i mar khu de bzhin skra/_/nag 
[\[281b.4\]]po'i phyogs la sbyar ba nyid/_/le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/'byung po gnod sbyin de bzhin klu/_/lha dang nam mkha' lding dang ni/_/smyo dang 'khor byed gnod sbyin dang /_/lha mo ma mo'i bdag nyid ni/_/dkyil 
[\[281b.5\]]'khor dgu ni mngon byas nas/_/re'u mig dgu dang cha dgu dang /_/dbus su bdag gi lha nyid dang /_/dbang ldan du ni lha yi ris/_/shar du klu yi cha dang ni/_/me yi phyogs su gnod sbyin nyid/_/lho phyogs su ni 'byung po'o/_/de bzhin smyo byed 
[\[281b.6\]]bden bral du'o/_/nub tu nam mkha' lding nyid dang /_/rlung gi phyogs su gtor ma mtshungs/_/byang du 'khor byed gnod sbyin no/_/bdag nyid cha yis mchod par bya/_/le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//_//dkar po'i 'od mchog mi bzad mngon par 
[\[281b.7\]]rol pa gsang ba la mkhas lce'o/_/steng gi mche ba gnyis la chu 'byin ro ni 'o ma'i chu zhes pa/_/'phyar ba'i chu yi kha dog dang mtshungs mche ba gnyis ni rtsa bzhin no/_/lce yi gdung ba sel ba'i chu ni bdud rtsi dkar po'i bdud rtsi lnga/_/rgyas pa lnga la bdud 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]rtsi'i ro bzhin sbyor ba mkhas pas mi shes so/_/lce la de bzhin dkar po'i sa bon de ni dud pa'i lcags kyu drangs/_/sna la ro yi dgod pa'i bdud rtsi rlung gi lcags kyu yis ni 'dren/_/rig pas rig pa mthong ba de ltar de yi 
[\[282a.2\]]bdud rtsi rnam par thim/_/ji srid ring du 'tsho zhing chos spyod pa/_/de srid dge ba'i rgyun ni rab tu 'phel/_/rlung gis 'byin cing yid ni mngon nga rgyal/_/rlung gi sa bon gyis ni rtag sbyor byed/_/ka ba gcig dang tshig dgu dang /_/sgo lnga bug pa gsum 
[\[282a.3\]]pa nyid/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo phra ba 'di/_/g.yo dang mi g.yo gsang bar bcas/_/gzugs gcig la ni sdud pa nyid/_/rtsa yi rang bzhin gyis mi rtag_/dang po'i gdan la bshad pa yis/_/sngon du bdag nyid bshad par bya/_/chu shing me tog lta bu 
[\[282a.4\]]ni/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/de dbus de bzhin gsungs pa ni/_/ye shes rnam shes sems pa'o/_/bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed/_/gang la lce ba'i skye ba thob/_/'khor ba 
[\[282a.5\]]de la 'khor lo che/_/'khor lo'i 'khor lo ldan gyur pa/_/dmangs rigs phyugs bzhin 'gro ba yi/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do/_/bzhi brgya dang ni lnga bcu yang /_/khrag dang rus pa ma lus pa'o/_/chu ni bre phyed dang 
[\[282a.6\]]bcas pa/_/de bzhin srin bu khri nyid dang /_/khri phrag gsum dang stong phrag gcig_/skyes pa yi ni ba spu nyid/_/sha khrag drug cu tham pa ni/_/skyes bu bar mar 'gyur ba'o/_/sum brgya de bzhin drug cu yi/_/chu tshod dbugs dang rtsa gzhan no/_/mnyam po cha 
[\[282a.7\]]ru 'phel ba yi/_/mnyam pa'i gzugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/rtsa ni 'khor lo bzhin du bsgyur/_/'khor lo brgyad pa brgyad pa bzhin/_/srog dang rtsol ba lnga zad dang /_/bdag nyid yang dag mnyan par mdzad/_/dbus su me yi bung po nyid/_/'byin pa'i sa bon de 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]dbus su/_/dri med rtag tu mnyam zhing dma'/_/phyi rol du ni bcu gnyis 'gyur/_/'khor zhing sa bon mnyam pa dang /_/dbugs ni mnyam par 'khor ba'o/_/me dang rlung gi bdun don la/_/du ba'i sa bon bsgom par bya'o/_/sgra dang thig ler yang dang 
[\[282b.2\]]ldan/_/char gyi rgyun zhes bshad pa yin/_/'khor lo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/oM ni re ba'i thig le rdzogs/_/bla ma'i yi ger kun tu brtag_/nyin mo dbugs ni mnyam par chad/_/de bzhin lha 
[\[282b.3\]]yi yi ge'o/_/mtshan mo chen po lnga chad na/_/chu shing dus ni mnyam pa bzhin/_/zla ba drug ni mtshan mo nyid/_/zla drug nyin mor rnam par brtag_/chu tshod dang ni zla phyed dang /_/nyin zhag bcu gnyis bdag nyid ni/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha nyid la/_/dkar po'i 
[\[282b.4\]]bla na med dang ni/_/de ni dkar po'i sa rang bzhin/_/mgo dang rkang gi steng dang ni/_/de bzhin mig dang sna dang ni/_/lce dang rna ba bcas pa dang /_/dpral ba tshangs pa'i bu ga dang /_/thig le dkar po'i sa can pa'o/_/dgun gyi phyogs ni snga ma dang /_/
[\[282b.5\]]mak+ga yi ni rang don dang /_/khyu mchog pu ma pa karka Ta/_/mi dang chu srin spang gis khyab/_/de ni dud pa sa yi dngos/_/dgun gyi dbus su snga ma bzhin/_/lag mthil sen mo'i tshogs dang ni/_/nges par de bzhin mchan khung dang /_/mgrin pa mchu dang 
[\[282b.6\]]brang gi tshogs/_/phur bur mnyam par 'phro ba'o/_/'jig rten sprul dang dga' ba'i rig_/de bzhin 'jig rten phyed bcas sbyin/_/lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo bskor/_/de ni dus kyi sa gzhi'o/_/so ga dang po'i dbus nyid dang /_/lag mthil sen 
[\[282b.7\]]mo'i tshogs dang ni/_/de bzhin mchan khung sa dang ni/_/[(]'grin [,]mgrin [)]pa chu dang brang gi mtshams/_/de bzhin blo ldan 'gro ba'o/_/le'u bdun pa zhes byas pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/tshigs kyi dbus dang nu ma'i steng /_/snying 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dang snying ni shin tu mchog_/de ni pad+ma'i gnas rang bzhin/_/rnam par shes pa'i cha brgyad nyid/_/so ga dang po'i dbus nyid dang /_/dgun gyi zla ba brgyad pa bzhin/_/gi wang phra zhing yang ba nyid/_/chu yi mdog dang sbyangs de 
[\[283a.2\]]bzhin/_/b+h+r-i d+hi pa la mnyam pa'i sa/_/gza' ni bum pas bsgyur pa dang /_/gzhung tshigs ngos dang nu ma'i steng /_/snying dang snying ni shin tu mchog_/de ni gi wang gnas rang bzhin/_/rim bzhin zla ba phyed dang ni/_/rus sbal rus sbal mnyam rus 
[\[283a.3\]]sbal/_/mtshams dang mtshams ni mnyam par dang /_/pad+ma pad+ma pad+mar mnyam/_/dri med gsum gyi sar gnas pa'o/_/srin bu skye ba mnyam par bza'/_/dku dang rus pa'i mtshams su ni/_/rked par pad+ma pad+ma yang /_/mnyam pa'i cha yis gnas 
[\[283a.4\]]pa nyid/_/da ni dri med gsum gyi sa/_/rnam shes lhan cig gnas pa'o/_/le'u brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o//_//re pha zlum po re phar mnyam/_/mngal gyi steng dang 'og tu yang /_/lha dang lha mo'i ye shes bzhin/_/brla dang pus mo mnyam 
[\[283a.5\]]pa'i brla/_/steng dang 'og tu rigs nyid ni/_/sor mo'i mtshams dang logs su yang /_/'byed pa'i rtsa ni rnam par gnas/_/de ni dbye ba'i gnas rang bzhin/_/blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/_/re pha re pha zlum por mnyam/_/bcu yi steng dang 'og tu 
[\[283a.6\]]yang /_/brla dang pus mo'i steng du mnyam/_/steng dang 'og tu rigs nyid du/_/sor mo'i tshigs dang logs su yang /_/sa gdugs rtsa ni gnas pa bzhin/_/de rnams sa gdugs gnas rang bzhin/_/gnas par blo dang ldan pas shes/_/le'u 
[\[283a.7\]]dgu pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/steng du chu tshod dbugs dang ni/_/ye shes gal te 'byung gyur na/_/sum brgya de bzhin sum cu dang /_/ji srid bdun du 'dres gyur na/_/gnyis gcig bcu phyed bcas pa yi/_/
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]chu tshod dbugs ni chad pa bzhin/_/ye shes 'gyur ba rnam shes bya/_/blo ldan spyi yi bstan bcos bzhin/_/sbyor ba'i dus la phan pa'i phyir/_/bstan bcos las ni bshad pa'o/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi dbugs mnyam pas/_/rtag tu sa ni bsrung bar bya/_/
[\[283b.2\]]le'u bcu pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/yid ni sngon du 'gro ba'i chos/_/yid dag cing ni yid 'gro bas/_/de phyir yid mngon thams cad du/_/blo dang ldan pas yid bsgrim bya/_/sa bon gyi ni khyad par nyid/_/
[\[283b.3\]]sngags kyis pha rol gnon bya med/_/phyag rgya mngon par ldan pa ni/_/dgod cing mngon par rtse ba med/_/de la khrus kyi cho ga min/_/smyung ba mchog tu bzod pa med/_/mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing /_/glegs bam gyi ni tshig med pa'o/_/lag pa'i phyag 
[\[283b.4\]]rgya mi bcing zhing /_/sngags kyi yi ge mi bzla'o/_/skad cig rnal 'byor blta bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor sbyor bas 'gro ba brtsam/_/shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/_/dag pa yi ni sbyor ba mchog_/ye shes rnam shes ldan pa'o/_/ye shes kyis ni gnas 
[\[283b.5\]]brtsam mo/_/le'u bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/_/dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/gangs dang kha ba'i chu lta bur/_/rnam par shes pa'i kha dog bzhin/_/pad+ma 
[\[283b.6\]]dkar po'i gdan la ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'o/_/mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang ni/_/sngags brgyad kyi ni sa bon bzhin/_/bdud rtsi dkar po'i zas dang ni/_/dag pa'i chu ni brtsam par bya/_/pad+ma'i gdan dang gdan la ni/_/zla ba'i 
[\[283b.7\]]dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'o/_/gi wang bla mar bshad pa ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad ye shes lha/_/dkar po nyid ni mi bskyod pa'o/_/don yod grub pa du bar bshad/_/snang ba mtha' yas dung nyid dang /_/pad+ma nyid ni rin chen no/_/gi wang lha mo 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mA ma kI/_/dri med gsum ni sgrol ma'o/_/gos dkar mo ni 'byed par 'gyur/_/sa yi gdugs ni sangs rgyas spyan/_/le'u bcu gnyis ba zhes bya ba'o//_//thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams bzhi 
[\[284a.2\]]rnam par mnyam pa nyid/_/khams bzhi ru ni rnam par 'gro/_/me dang chu ni 'di bshad pa/_/nam mkha' yang ni stong pa nyid/_/sra ba nyid ni sa yin no/_/dro ba'i dngos po me dang ni/_/oM ni rnam par snang mdzad dngos/_/spyi bor dkar po yi sa bon/_/
[\[284a.3\]]shar du mi bskyod pa nyid ni/_/a yi rnam pa de nyid lha/_/hU~M gis don yod rnam par gyur/_/lho yi phyogs su brtsam par bya/_/traM gi rnam pa mnga' bdag lha/_/de nyid snang ba mtha' yas lha/_/cod pan nub kyi phyogs su'o/_/de nyid mchod pa 
[\[284a.4\]]mnyam pa dang /_/traM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/byang du rin chen 'byung ba'o/_/spyi gtsug la sogs lha lnga ni/_/blo dang shes pas rnam par dgod/_/traM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/dpral ba khro bo'i phyag can no/_/ka yi rnam pa ye shes lha/_/
[\[284a.5\]]mi g.yo sa yi mgon po bzhin/_/hrIHyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/de bzhin zla ba mig gnyis su'o/_/le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dzaM gyi rnam pas bdag po'i lha/_/rna bar byams pa nyid yin 
[\[284a.6\]]ni/_/k+ShaM gi rnam pas bdag po'i lha/_/mkhur tshos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skyong ba po/_/sa yi rnam pas bdag po'i lha/_/lce la yang ni mA ma kI/_/hUM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/mgrin par rta mgrin khro bo bzhin/_/shriM yi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/
[\[284a.7\]]ye shes lha ni mchog tu gtso/_/snying po yi ni ye shes mchog_/sor mo lnga dang mnyam pa'i lha/_/lnga ni sangs rgyas nyid yin no/_/a yis bdud rtsi lha mo ni/_/lag mthil rdo rje sgeg mo bzhin/_/shriM gi rnams sa mnga' bdag lha/_/lte 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bar rnam par sel ba nyid/_/tsuM gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka/_//laM gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/de bzhin brla gnyis sa snying ngo /_/yuM gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha/_/pus mo [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha mo'o/_/traM bi 
[\[284b.2\]]rnam pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha/_/'og tu 'byung po'i gtso bo'o/_/le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/oM hrI he ha ha ha hU~M phaT/_'di ni nye ba'i cho ga'i sngags so/_/sku mdog sngon po khro gnyer ldan pa'i zhal dang 
[\[284b.3\]]ni/_/spyan gsum zhal dang rked pa spyi bo cod pan can/_/sbyor ba'i gdan bdun mngon pa'i phyag rgya dbang dang ni/_/dar gyis mngon par gang ba'i gdengs ka'i rna cha dang /_/sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs ni lhag par ldan/_/dmar po'i gos dang sbrul 
[\[284b.4\]]gyi pags pa bsnams/_/g.yon gyi phyag na snod ni rab gang mdzes/_/gnyis par dbyug pa gsum par dgra sta dang /_/gyen du ba dan dang ni dril bu g.yas pa'o/_/rdo rje gsor dang lcags kyu dril bu'i phyag_/pad gdan nyi ma'i phyag can me dkyil 
[\[284b.5\]]he ru ka dpal mgon po shin tu 'jigs/_/shar gyi char ni mA ma kI/_/thod pa phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/lho yi char ni sangs rgyas spyan/_/phyag gi 'khyud pa'i tshul bzhin no/_/nub tu sgrol ma drir bshad pa/_/de bzhin phyag na me tog phreng /_/gos 
[\[284b.6\]]dkar gtor ma yang dag ldan/_/byang gi phyogs su dgod par bya/_/dbang ldan rdo rje sgeg mo dang /_/me ru bil ba lag pa ma/_/bden bral du ni glu ma dang /_/rlung du gar ma bskyod pa bzhin pa'o/_/le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas 
[\[284b.7\]]gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/sa shrI swA hA/_shar gyi'o/_/sa hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_lho yi'o/_/sa k+Shu~M sa ha/_nub kyi'o/_/sa k+ShuM k+ShuM k+ShuM swA hA/_byang gi'o/_/hU~M dbang ldan gyi'o/_/he me yi'o/_/he bden bral gyi'o/_/hri rlung gi'o/_/oM 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_o~M badzra pA sha hU~M/_o~M badzra s+pho Ta baM/_o~M badzra g+taN+De toH/_o~M pad+ma ud b+hA ba ya swA hA/_gdan gyi'o/_/o~M puSh+paM b+h+yo sa/_oM d+hu pe b+h+yo sha/_/o~M dI paM b+h+yo hri/_g+ha ts+tshan+te swA hA/_b+hA be na su ra a ga ma nA ya swA hA/_
[\[285a.2\]]le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//_//pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog_/dri chu'i dngos po shin tu snang mdzad dang /_/ro ni bdud rtsi chu yi ngo bo nyid/_/mthe ba mdzub kyis ni sa yi steng du dor/_/dbus ma'i ri rab kyis ni bdud rtsi bsrub/_/
[\[285a.3\]]ji bzhin gnas brgyad 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya/_/ha yi rnam pas kha dog 'phrog_/ho zhes bya bas dri med byed/_/dpa' bo hriHyi rnam pas 'joms/_/rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya'o/_/lha rnams kun nas lcags kyu yis/_/bdud rtsi'i yi 
[\[285a.4\]]ges tshim par bya/_/lcags kyu kun nas skyod byed cing /_/rnal 'byor bdag nyid mtshan nyid yin/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin de nyid/_/dud pa'i sa bon gyis ni sbyang /_/gtor ma sbyang ba byas pa yin/_/de yi sa bon gyis de sbyang /_/logs su kha 
[\[285a.5\]]khyer gsum byas la/_/pho nya rnal 'byor mas spyan drang /_/ka Da ka Da ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na hr-i kha kha kha sha truM dza dza sha tru~M mAr na ba li ba ta li d+he ba ti she swa/_le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/'jim pa las ni gzugs 
[\[285a.6\]]brnyan bya/_/zhal gsum spyan gsum rkang pa gsum/_/phyag gsum rab tu bzhad pa dang /_/glang po'i mig can ro langs ma/_/rtag tu ral gri zhags pa dang /_/gos dmar pags pa dmar po mnabs/_/zhabs gnyis skad cig sa la mnan pa 
[\[285a.7\]]dang /_/ro langs phyag rgya snying gar mngon par bsdigs/_/hU~M gi sgra yi sa bon bzlas pa yis/_/bstan pa srung zhing skems pa yis/_/mngon du pho nya chen po 'od/_/kAr+ya kAr+ya ban+d+ha ban+d+he/_nA da nA da hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_'di ni pho nya mchog gi sngags/_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dbang dang mngag la de bzhin ming /_/dug dang lhan cig sbyar byas pa'i/_/khrag gis mngon par bri bar bya/_/rkang pas mngon du mnan byas la/_/blo dang ldan pas rim bzhin bzlas/_/lan cig bzlas shing lan cig min/_/lan cig phyag 
[\[285b.2\]]rgya bsnun par bya/_/ming ni brgya phrag brgya phrag gsum/_/nag mo ser skya tsan+dan dang /_/dmar po'i me tog sa bon gyis/_/dkyil 'khor gsum ni bri bar bya/_/gu gul nag po'i bdug pa dri/_/de yi gtor ma ldan dbul bzhin/_/ser skya'i pho 
[\[285b.3\]]nya mo zhes bya/_/le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/mi shes mun pa nyid dang 'bu dang srin bu'i 'khor los khyab/_/mi rnams sdig pa'i khyad par nyin re bzhin du spyod pa ni/_/dge ba'i lam chen dag nas mi ni 
[\[285b.4\]]dbu ma'i skye bar skye/_/thos la mngon par dga' zhing spro zhing rnam par lta ba yis/_/mi yi ye shes mchog dang mchog tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/rgyal ba'i thar pa don dam mchog tu rnam par shes/_/phra zhing shin tu phra ba de nyid rab tu phra/_/dngos po med cing 
[\[285b.5\]]dngos po dang bral ba/_/sbyor ba'i dngos po bde bar rtogs/_/shes pas bsgoms pa dag pa yis/_/mnyam par dag pa dbu ma'o/_/rtag tu bdag med rnam par dag_/'dod pas rnam par mi gos pa'o/_/le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o//_//
[\[285b.6\]]sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos po yis/_/rtag tu spyi bor brgyan pa'o/_/gnyis med phyag rgya'i gnas su ni/_/de la rgya mtsho chu nyid bsgom/_/spyi gtsug rnam shes tshim par bya/_/g.yon gyi phyogs su mi bskyod pa'o/_/don yod grub pa g.yas su bzhugs/_/
[\[285b.7\]]rin chen gyis kyang g.yon par brgyan/_/rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni gzung bar bya/_/gzhan du nam yang ma bshad pa/_/sangs rgyas bstan bcos nyid du gsungs/_/snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dus/_/dus gsum du ni rtag tu 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]bzung /_/sa bon 'di yis bkrus pa yis/_/'thor 'thung rnam par sbyangs pa'o/_/lnga pa yang dag sbyar bas dbul/_/chi ling ga yi thig le sbyang /_/gong bu bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/rnam shes lhan cig dkar ba'o/_/le'u 
[\[286a.2\]]brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o//_//e ma'o las ni mchog tu gtso/_/e ma'o rnal 'byor rmad du byung /_/e ma'o chos ni mchog tho pas/_/drang srong lhan cig ngo mtshar skyes/_/ye shes mchog gi chos 'di ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dus 
[\[286a.3\]]nas gsungs/_/ye shes yid kyi chos can ni/_/tshig gis khyod la bshad pa yin/_/ye shes phyag rgya mchog nyid ni/_/ye shes rtsa ba yang dag 'byung /_/shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/_/dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rtags/_/lha yi yan lag 
[\[286a.4\]]mchod pa pos/_/gnyis med dgod par yang dag ldan/_/gnyis med rnam shes ngo bo yis/_/blo ldan bdud rtsi shes par bya/_/bdud rtsi chu ni dbul ba yis/_/phyi rol rnal 'byor ma mchod do/_/gnyis med phyag rgya'i rdo rje 'di/_/rtsa gsum gnyis 
[\[286a.5\]]med phyag rgyas bzhin/_/rkang pas pad+mar mnyam zhon pas/_/'khrig pa bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba'o/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam pa'i dngos/_/skyes bus hU~M gi sgra byas nas/_/rang bzhin gyis ni sgra 'byin cing /_/gnyi ga'i ye shes dkar po bzhin/_/de yi rang 
[\[286a.6\]]bzhin gyis ni rdul/_/du ba'i sa bon gyis sbyar bya/_/dbang po ru rta bi la bar mnyam/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi ba la sha/_/bdud rtsi chu dang yang dag ldan/_/rgyu skar zla ba lha nyid la/_/byin nas don chen dbang du byed/_/le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o//_//
[\[286a.7\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/stong nyid ngo bo'i tshul gyis ni/_/phyi dang nang du bcas par ro/_/ye shes chos kyi sbyor ba las/_/ye shes kyi ni sbyor ba mchog_/thams cad lus la gnas pa ni/_/rmongs pas kun tu mi shes pas/_/de phyir rmongs 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]pa yongs spangs la/_/ye shes kyi ni gnas pa rtsam bya/_/'du 'dzi las ni rmongs pa'i tshul/_/de phyir 'du 'dzi yongs su spang /_/gcig pu'i sbyor bas grub pa yi/_/gcig pus 'gro ba brtsam par bya/_/byis pa'i skye bos mthong ba yi/_/de phyir de 
[\[286b.2\]]nyid gcig pu ni/_/gnas med gnas ni shes byas la/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo la/_/gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/gnyis kyi shes pa rnam par spangs/_/de nyid rig pa mchog tu phra/_/sbyor ba'ang mchog tu phra ba nyid/_/mgrin pa rkan gyi steng 
[\[286b.3\]]du bzla/_/smin ma'i dbus dang mig gi rtsar/_/sgor ni thig le phrar gyur pa/_/'khor lo phra rab rdul lta bur/_/dang po mchog dang yang dag ldan/_/bla mas bstan las shes par bya/_/rdul phran ye shes de kho na/_/de phyir blo ldan gyis shes bya/_/
[\[286b.4\]]le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/skyon dang yon tan dngos po spang /_/kha ga'i sgo ni ji bzhin bsdam/_/bug pa dgu dang kha ga nyid/_/bu ga dgu las dud pa 'byung /_/skyes bu gong gi sgo la ni/_/
[\[286b.5\]]der ni pad+ma dkar po bzhin/_/lus kun la ni dgod bya nyid/_/lha nyid so sor bsgom par bya/_/lha yi sa bon de nyid kyis/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya dgod pa bzhin/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/ye shes 
[\[286b.6\]]rnam shes mchog tu drang /_/dngos dang dngos po phra ba'i de kho na/_/dngos dang shin tu 'brel bar mtshungs pa'o/_/snying gar gnas pa'i snying po mchog ming brjod/_/sems kyi rtsa nas de bzhin du hi ka/_/steng dang 'og dang de bzhin steng /_/yi ge 
[\[286b.7\]]byed dang gnyis kyis sbyang /_/bzlog par bya ba'i sa bon gyis/_/lhan cig blo dang ldan par sbyang /_/le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/thams cad lus la gnas pa yi/_/ye shes kyi ni ye shes mchog_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sa dang ri dang de bzhin shing /_/bong pa chu dang de bzhin srin/_/'bu srin rnam par spangs nas ni/_/ye shes lus la sems med pa'o/_/'bu dang srin bu ye shes blun/_/khyad par nyid du spang ba'o/_/rnam gsum lha dang gnod sbyin dang /_/
[\[287a.2\]]lha min [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mkha' 'gro ma/_/gzugs dang ye shes de bzhin khro/_/zhi zhing zhi ba'i ye shes bzhin/_/lus la thams cad gnas pa ni/_/blo dang ldan pas khyad par shes/_/le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan 
[\[287a.3\]]yang bshad par bya/_/drang srong ngo mtshar skye ba ni/_/ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu dang /_/bu ga gsum dang ye shes lha/_/rnam shes ye shes lus la ni/_/chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar grags/_/thar pa thob pa'i dus su ni/_/mi shes ye shes lus ji bzhin/_/
[\[287a.4\]]ji ltar chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_/ye shes dang ni gzugs kyi cha/_/ye shes ji ltar mthong ba dang /_/ji ltar na ni ye shes gzugs/_/de nyid gzugs la sems med pa/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ger rnam par brtag_/ye shes lha dang mnyam pa'i dngos/_/
[\[287a.5\]]sngon gyi mtshan nyid lta bur ro/_/le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi dbye ba nyid/_/ti la ti la yi ni mtha'/_/stong pa sgra dang yang dag ldan/_/steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le sbyin/_/mchog gi 
[\[287a.6\]]yi ger yang dag shes/_/stong phrag gcig dang sum brgya brgyad/_/de yi mtshan nyid bzlas pa'o/_/bdag nyid lus la dgod pa ni/_/de bzhin lha ni bskyed cing bskrun/_/las brgyad dang ni mnyam pa yi/_/re'u mig brgyad kyi dbye ba'o/_/las bzhi yi ni blo 
[\[287a.7\]]can gyi/_/de bzhin sa bon sngon du bsnyen/_/o~M A gats+tshaM tu de bsam ye A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/ye shes can gyis spyan drang ba/_/o~M a k+Sho ni t+yaM ma 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]hA nA ga ta k+Sha ka wa sa wa ta na hU~M ga hU~M ga swA hA/_klu'i'o/_/o~M d+ha nA d+hi piM Adz+nyA na ya k+Sha No/_mA ga ts+tsha sa ma ya u da b+hA pa kru~M kru~M kru~M hrIHswA hA/_gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/_/o~M b+hA ta kro d+he nA b+he A gats+tsha sam ya ud ma he phu phu phu~M dzaH/_'byung po'i sngags so/_/o~M g+hu ru g+hu ru 
[\[287b.2\]]A kar+Sha ya hU~M hri dzaH/_'byung po dgug pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so/_/le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gang gis mchog gi chos shes shing /_/gang gis rnam par mi rtog shes/_/gang zhig lha nyid rnam shes pa/_/
[\[287b.3\]]gang shes de ni rnal 'byor pa'o/_/gang zhig gsang ba mi shes pa/_/mchog gi chos ni mchog phra ba/_/thams cad lus la gnas pa'i mchog_/rang lus mchod pas pha rol mchod/_/gzhan du byas na lha nyid brlag_/mchod pa'i bdag nyid de nyid mchod/_/thams 
[\[287b.4\]]cad lus las shes 'gyur bas/_/thams cad lha nyid tshim pa'o/_/de nyid ye shes lhar gyur pas/_/bdag nyid las ni thams cad pa'i/_/rtag tu nyon mongs rnam spangs nas/_/ye shes can gyi sku ru gyur/_/de yi ming ni de bzhin dag_/rnal 'byor sbyor 
[\[287b.5\]]ba'i blo ldan pas/_/tshe rabs gzhan du byas pa'i sdig_/bklags pa tsam gyis thag bsrings pa'o/_/brgyad pa ste de rnams kyi bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa rab tu byed pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las rtsa ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba 
[\[287b.6\]]rdzogs so//_//thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid/_/de bzhin sbyor ba'i bstan bcos dang /_/drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang /_/gnas gtsang gnas na bzhugs nas su/_/thams 
[\[287b.7\]]cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/_/rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam bshad pa/_/stong pa nyid la mchog tu brtson/_/ye shes dbang phyug yang dag ldan/_/gnyis med gnyis med la brtan pa/_/khams bzhi yi ni ngo bo dang /_/rtsa dgu yi ni dbye ba dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lha dgu lhag pa nyid/_/sngags dang las ni gsum nyid kyis/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ba'o/_/yul 'khor skye mched lus rgyal nyid/_/sgo lnga nas ni drang bar bya/_/chu dang me dang nam mkha' rlung /_/'di ni lus la gnas pa nyid/_/
[\[288a.2\]]chu ni dbang phyug rgyal chen po/_/de bzhin bdud rtsi dkar po'i rtsa/_/me ni du bar 'bar bzhin drag_/de bzhin mya ngan 'bar ba'o/_/dbang chen dung gi rang bzhin rtsa/_/mi rtag pas ni yang dag gnas/_/nam mkha' nam mkha'i rtsa nyid ni/_/pad+ma de bzhin 
[\[288a.3\]]brtan zhing rtag_/gi wang rnam par rmongs pa'i rtsa/_/lus po bskyed cing sdug bsngal gnas/_/dri med gsum ni g.yo ba'i rtsa/_/sgra ni bsgrub par dkar ba'o/_/'byed pa nyon mongs nyid kyi rtsa/_/sdig pa'i rtsa dang sdig pa'i gnas/_/mi shes pa dang 
[\[288a.4\]]phyugs nyid yin/_/sa gdugs rtsa ni dbang phyug mchog_/dkar po myu gu rab dbye dang /_/de bzhin du dpas mi bzad phyir/_/sa ni dung du gsungs pa'o/_/nam mkha' g.yo zhing 'gro ba'o/_/rmongs pas sred cing 'jigs pa'i dngos/_/de bzhin nyon 
[\[288a.5\]]mongs sdig pa'i gnas/_/g.yo zhing g.yo ba'i blo nyid ni/_/mi shes phyugs kyi rtsa nyid la/_/dgu yi lha ni ci zhes brjod/_/dbye bas rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_/de bzhin 'phags pa ye shes dbang /_/'gro ba'i bsod nams sdig gi gzhi/_/de bzhin sems 
[\[288a.6\]]can srid pa'i las/_/de bzhin nyon mongs dmyal bar bshad/_/srid pa pha dang ma yi dngos/_/gzhan du du ma'i shes pa nyid/_/rgyal po zhes pa ci zhes brjod/_/dbang po'i yul ni rgyal po'o/_/phan tshun bsten cing bsten pa las/_/lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 
[\[288a.7\]]rnam par skye/_/nyon mongs ba spu sogs pa'i lus/_/lus po yi ni gzhi nyid do/_/'khor bar 'gyur ba'i zhags pa yis/_/glang chen gnad du brgyab pa bzhin/_/tshe rabs snga mar stobs chung ba'i/_/rnal 'byor pa ni stong la dga'/_/rab tu byed pa 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/rtsa yi lha ni de bzhin rim/_/bcu gnyis pa ni mngon du bri/_/dkar po 'byung ba'i dbyibs kyi ni/_/cha bzhi lag pa'i rigs pa yis/_/spyi bor dkar po'i gnas 
[\[288b.2\]]rang bzhin/_/rgyas pa lnga yi steng du ni/_/'bar ba'i rtse ni steng du'o/_/smin dbus de bzhin thig le dang /_/mig ni bcings pa nyid dang yang /_/rna ba nyan pa yi ni rtsa/_/g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid/_/de bzhin skyes bu g.yas pa nyid/_/dud pa 
[\[288b.3\]]sngon gyi dbugs dang ni/_/lce dang ro yi rtsa nyid do/_/bdud rtsi rnam pa dgur bshad pa/_/dkar po'i rtsar ni yongs su grags/_/sngon du du ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/dud pa 'bar pa'i rtsa chen po/_/dpung pa'i ngos su yang dag gnas/_/brang dang rus sbal 
[\[288b.4\]]mtshams su ni/_/rtsa ni mtshams kyi dbus su'o/_/lag pa'i sor mo'i dbyibs lta bu/_/sor mo dang ni sen mo'i rgyab/_/dud pa lhag ma'i rtsa nyid ni/_/brang nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/logs dang de bzhin nye ba yi/_/de bzhin ji ltar tshigs dang tshigs/_/
[\[288b.5\]]lud pa dri nga mchan khung mnyam/_/ro stod lag pa'i rtsa ba dang /_/rked pa'i rgyab kyi rtsa nyid ni/_/dung nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/dang pa'i mtshams dang rked pa nyid/_/brla dang brlar ni nye bar mtshon/_/'gro ba yi ni lto ba'i rtsa/_/rkang pa 
[\[288b.6\]]dus kyi me dang ni/_/pad+ma rkang pa mnga' bdag nyid/_/rtsar ni blo dang ldan pas shes/_/gi wang 'dod pa'i gnas kyi gnas/_/rtag tu lci bar mtshan par gsungs/_/bla ma'i pha rol 'gro ba'i rtsa/_/de bzhin srin bu 'byung ba'o/_/gi wang dku yi gnas 
[\[288b.7\]]su ni/_/gtso bo'i dbyings su grags pa nyid/_/ri med rkang pa g.yon par gnas/_/rkang pa'i gnad dang sna yi rtse/_/pus mo'i rjes su skyod pa'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]brtul zhugs mer bshad pa'o/_/rtsa nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/gtso bo'i 'gyed pa g.yon 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]pa'i rtsa/_/mchan khung dang ni mchan khung mid/_/drag pa'i tshogs kyi de bzhin rtsa/_/dra bar gnas pa'ang de bzhin no/_/nu ma'i khung gi grangs kyis ni/_/stong gi cha ru de bzhin bshad/_/de rnams 'byed pa'i rang bzhin rtsas/_/lus su yongs 
[\[289a.2\]]su grags pa nyid/_/sa gdugs dpung pa g.yon pa dang /_/de bzhin brang du yang dag gnas/_/mtshams dang tshigs kyi rtsa yi mtha'/_/de bzhin 'gro ba'i lag pa dang /_/skye mched drug gi dbye ba yis/_/rang bzhin gyis ni gru bzhi dang /_/rang bzhin gyis 
[\[289a.3\]]ni 'bab pa'i gnas/_/rang dang skyes bu la yang skye/_/don dam nyid du dngos med cing /_/'jig rten la phan snying brtse bas/_/kun tu 'byung ba skyon med pa'o/_/'gro ba'i gnas kyi ye shes chog mchog_/dngos med dag pa don dam dbu ma pa/_/ma rig nas 
[\[289a.4\]]brtsams bcu gnyis sa dbang phyug_/bri Sha b+ha sogs re ba ni/_/bdud rtsi sbyor ba mi skye'o/_/dbus su yang dag sbyor ba gnas/_/srid pa'i nyes pa rnam par spangs/_/bcu gnyis sbyor ba'i gnas su ni/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pas shes/_/rtsa'i 'khor 
[\[289a.5\]]lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/kun nas skye ba'i dbye ba'i cha/_/skyes bu so sor gnas pa dang /_/rtsa dang dbugs ni so so yi/_/gzhan gyi rkang pa chad pa na/_/rnam pa mang du bdag po'i rlung /_/
[\[289a.6\]]'byung ba'i rlung ni chad par 'gyur/_/brang gi 'og dang rked pa'i gong /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba/_/dngos med dngos po yang dag gnas/_/kha dog med la mtshon kun dngos/_/gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang /_/stong dang stong min 
[\[289a.7\]]don gyi gnas/_/ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po che/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing /_/rnam shes las ni byed pa nyid/_/bcu gnyis dngos po bsgyur ba'i bdag_/sum brgya de bzhin drug cu yi/_/chu tshod dbugs ni rtsa bzhin no/_/snga dro dkar po 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rgyu ba nas/_/nyin dang mtshan du shes par bya/_/'pho ba bcu gnyis bdag nyid ni/_/nyin mtshan du yang de bzhin no/_/bcu gnyis sa la chad pa yis/_/byang du bgrod pa'i mtshan mo'o/_/lho phyogs su yang sngon bzhin du/_/nyin mo'i rlung ni chad pa'o/_/bi 
[\[289b.2\]]shu'i bar du zas sbyar ba/_/rim bzhin rab tu grags pa nyid/_/dbugs kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di/_/ye shes can gyis las la sbyar/_/mtha' ma'i yul dang yul 'khor gyi/_/rim bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/ro hi ta dang mo hi ta/_/bzang po khyu mchog 
[\[289b.3\]]bla ma dang /_/kur ma ma ga ran+d+ha dang /_/de bzhin rmi lam lkugs pa dang /_/kun rmongs 'jigs dang 'dod pa yi/_/bcu gnyis sa ni srid pa'i skyon/_/ro hi ta la lha mchod bya/_/mo hi ta la nor rnyed cing /_/bzang po la ni mdzes par bza'/_/mang du khro ba b+he Sha 
[\[289b.4\]]ba/_/kur ma mchog tu sems khral can/_/ma ka ra la gtam gyi gzhi/_/bla ma bsgrub pa'i dngos po ni/_/ran+d+ha la ni sdig pa'i blo/_/byA ku li dang nyid dang ni/_/swa p+na la rmi lam tshul/_/rmongs pa sems khral mchog dang ni/_/glu dang rig pa klog la mkhas/_/
[\[289b.5\]]'dod pa la ni 'khrig par bshad/_/bcu gnyis srid pa'i nyes skyon no/_/shel lta bur ni gcig gis gtso/_/rgyas par tshon rtsi bdun gyis so/_/de yi rnam shes srid pa'i dngos/_/yul ni dngos po med par gnas/_/ye shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste/_gsum 
[\[289b.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sku gsum ji ltar stong pa ni/_/'di ni dmigs pa bcas pas gzung /_/rang bzhin dang bral ma yin pa/_/dngos po na ma mkha' brtag par bya/_/dngos po'i nyes pa spangs pa yis/_/gzugs su mi 
[\[289b.7\]]gnas zad pa'o/_/lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/gzugs ni mi gnas zad par byed/_/phyi stong 'og kyang stong pa nyid/_/skyon med dbus ni stong pa'o/_/thams cad stong pa nyid dang ni/_/'gro ba'ang stong pa lnga pa'o/_/yul lnga yang ni stong pa nyid/_/de 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bzhin dbang po la sogs pa'ang /_/stong par mi brtag yang dag gnas/_/de phyir rdul med stong pa'i tshul/_/ji ltar zhing pas zhing ni thabs kyis yang sbyangs nas/_/thong pas rmo zhing thong pas kun du rab bsgyur bas/_/zhing la gnod pa'i rtswa 
[\[290a.2\]]dang ljon shing rgya cher sel/_/des na rnam dag gtsang sbra can zhes brjod de bzhin/_/de bas mchog tu sbyor ba'i bdag_/gnyis pa yang ni gzhag par bya/_/de ltar de bzhin phyi nyid bkru/_/de phyir mkhas pas stong pa nyid/_/gsum gyi tshul gyis dag par bya/_/
[\[290a.3\]]de bzhin gzugs dang stong pa bzhin/_/dbus su rnam shes sa bon no/_/sa bon sa bon myu gu dang /_/gzugs dang dbang po rtsa yi gzhi/_/rang bzhin tshul gyis cha shas mtshan nyid ni/_/skyon med rdo rje'i rang bzhin yang dag gnas/_/dbang po drug dang cho ga 
[\[290a.4\]]drug ni yang dag 'byung /_/lha gnas bcu gnyis sa ni sarba dang /_/sngags kyi yi ge mchog nyid ni/_/yid kyi 'phrul pas bsgrub par bya/_/e ma'o sems can nyon re mongs/_/sngags ni u gu u gu dang /_/nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan mnyam bsgom 
[\[290a.5\]]pa/_/snying po nyid kyis rnam par spangs/_/sngags kyi yi ge dam pa ni/_/de phyir yid kyis rjes su 'brang /_/sems can thams cad bskyed cing g.yo zhing bskyed pa yi/_/sngags ni blo dang ldan pas nges par shes par bya/_/de nyid med pa'i sngags kyis 'gro ba 
[\[290a.6\]]rmongs par bzod/_/log par smra ba yi ni gzugs brnyan sems dang ni/_/sngags kyi bdag nyid don dam mchog gi yi ge yis/_/las bzhi yi ni cho ga yongs su grags pa'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[290a.7\]]bshad bya ba/_/skyon dang yon tan spangs gyur pa'o/_/dbu ma'i gnas ni skyon med pa'o/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i yid las 'byung ba'i lus/_/bdag med rnal 'byor gcig gi yid kyis sbyar bar bya/_/ji ltar ma bsregs snod kyi chu bzhin du/_/khyod kyis nang gi rnal 'byor 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]mang du 'jig pa'o/_/ji ltar rdza mkhan gyis ni me ni kun tu gang bas 'gengs/_/du ma dbus su zad par byas pas rang gi gzugs bzhin no/_/nang gi ye shes dbang phyug me ni 'bar ba yis/_/de yi gzhig pas 'dir ni gzugs ni grol ba bzhin/_/rang bzhin 
[\[290b.2\]]dag pas dag pa'i chos/_/dag pa'i dbyangs kyi lam chen po/_/ma dag rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho ni/_/rnam rtog bcas pa rnam par spang /_/dag pa'i chos ni mchog tu zhi/_/dag pa'i chos ni skyon med pa'o/_/dag pas byang chub thob pa'i phyir/_/dag pa'i chos 
[\[290b.3\]]ni rab tu bstan/_/dang por gzhu las rgyal ba nyid/_/gsher ba nub tu mchog tu brtson/_/sku gsum ma ni lhan cig gnas/_/blo dang ldan pas sa bon bskrun/_/de yi gnas su srog gsungs pa/_/snga dro skyes bu gnas pa nyid/_/dbugs ni yang dag 
[\[290b.4\]]'pho ba'i tshe/_/rim bzhin bcu gnyis sbyar bar bya/_/lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni/_/de yi sa bon phyugs su gsungs/_/chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/_/snying gar 'greng bar gnas pa nyid/_/kha ni 'og tu zlum pa nyid/_/mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya/_/bdud 
[\[290b.5\]]rtsi'i yi ge sgra yis ni/_/yid 'ong lhan cig dgram par bya/_/de yi dbang phyug ye shes rgyal/_/sgong skyes bcu gsum dbang phyug go/_/kha dog bdun par rnam mang po/_/de bzhin 'od zer nyi ma brgya/_/ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag_/shes byas 'gro ba brtag 
[\[290b.6\]]pa'o/_/ji ltar dar gyi mig gi ngar/_/blo med tha dad 'gyur ba'o/_/ji ltar rmongs pa'i mi shes pa/_/ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs gcod/_/de dag mar me'i rgya mtsho yis/_/ye shes can gyis rang 'dod lam/_/de nas sems can kun rang bzhin/_/yan lag 
[\[290b.7\]]rlung gis gzir ba dang /_/rang dbang nyid dang rlung dang ni/_/de bzhin ba spu'i bu ga 'di/_/rlung dang mnyam pa'i lus med cing /_/rlung gi sems la'ang med pa'o/_/lus kyi dbyibs nyid la yang ni/_/stong pa yan lag kun la gnas/_/thams cad chu yi rang bzhin 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]nyid/_/lus po yang ni sems kyi ni/_/thams cad sha ni chu rang bzhin/_/chu yis thams cad khyab pa'o/_/sa dang chu yang mtshungs par ni/_/phyi rol khyab par brtags pa'o/_/de bzhin lus po yi ni chu/_/thams cad khyab par yang dag 
[\[291a.2\]]gnas/_/lus la me ni drod bcas pas/_/dbyibs la thams cad kun nas 'bar/_/sa yis thams cad kun du ni/_/gzugs la yon tan dbang pos brgyan/_/de phyir 'byung ba bzhi yi lus/_/khams dang rtsa yis khyab pa'o/_/rtsa ni mnyam pa'i cha yi 
[\[291a.3\]]dngos/_/mnyam pa'i dbyibs su rnal 'byor pas/_/lha bsgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/lha rnams lnga ni gang du gnas/_/bug pa gsum dang sgo dgu yi/_/de bzhin bdag nyid lha yi gnas/_/
[\[291a.4\]]rlung bsdams sku yi mer bcas pa'i/_/snying ga'i sgong skyes kyi ni gnas/_/phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar/_/de bzhin sgo nas mtshon pa'o/_/sgo dgu yi ni dbyibs nyid dang /_/'dab ma brgyad par yang dag grags/_/phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa bzhin/_/de ltar 
[\[291a.5\]]lha ni phra zhing phra/_/lnga pa lnga yi lnga bdag lha/_/rang bzhin gyis khyab rnam par spang /_/so ti ke ni gcig nyid dang /_/de bzhin chu dang chu min gnyis/_/de bzhin ji ltar bug pa nyid/_/tshigs dgu dang ni sgo dgu dang /_/rtsa dgur yang dag grags pa nyid/_/dang 
[\[291a.6\]]por stong pa nyid kyi dngos/_/steng dang dbus dang mnyam pa'i gnas/_/gzugs dang tshor ba mnyan pa yang /_/dngos med stong pa'i ngo bo'o/_/rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/de dbus ge sar bcas pa'o/_/dgu ru chu ni sbyar bar bya/_/de bzhin pad+ma chu shing 
[\[291a.7\]]gi/_/de yi ye shes dbang phyug lha/_/sgong skyes khyim pa mnyam par brten/_/'dab ma brgyad la sa bon ni/_/rim pa ji bzhin rtsa yi lha/_/de yi rgyab kyis rtsa la yang /_/bdag nyid sgo ni phra ba bzhin/_/phye nas bdag nyid brgyan pa ni/_/kun nas lha yi 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]lhag par brgyan/_/de yi bdag nyid lhar sbyangs pa/_/sbyor ba'i lus sogs nyid kyi dbyibs/_/sbyor med gal te sbyor byas pas/_/sngon bzhin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying po'i lus la ni/_/lhag par lha dang lha yis brgyan/_/ji ltar 
[\[291b.2\]]gdal ba'i khang pa mes bsregs na/_/lha la sogs pa'i gnas su rab byed pa/_/dge dang rigs can mkhas pa mnyam par bsten/_/de bzhin rmongs pa rgya mtsho lha yi gzhi/_/sgong skyes kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[291b.3\]]gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/nges par rnal 'byor pas rngub pa/_/ji ltar rngub pa'i bdag nyid ni/_/sgo ni sa bon gyis bsdam bya/_/sa bon dgu yis bsdams pa yis/_/rnal 'byor dgu yi bdag nyid do/_/ji ltar tshangs pa'i sgo bsdam zhing /_/mchod 
[\[291b.4\]]rten gyi yang sgo dgu yang /_/dbugs mi g.yo ba'i dngos po yis/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsdam par bya/_/bsdus nas gnas pa'i mtha' ru ni/_/rang bzhin gyis ni g.yo ba nyid/_/gzhan yang drag po'i ming gnyis ni/_/dud pa'i sa bon gyis ni rtse/_/
[\[291b.5\]]de ltar rngub pa mnyam pa nyid/_/yi ge phyed dang gnyis sbyang bya/_/hU~M gi rnam pa g.yo ba'i dbyibs/_/mnyam par rngub pa'i 'bar ba nyid/_/'tshe med rnam par rtse ba yis/_/'khor ba 'jigs pa bsten par bya/_/bcu gnyis sa yi dbang phyug ma/_/de bzhin dbugs 
[\[291b.6\]]ni rngubs pa yis/_/tshe rabs sngon gyi sdig pa dang /_/yul dang dbang po nye gnas pa/_/bde sbyor rngub pa'i rgya mtsho yis/_/ye shes can gyis sdig pa gcod/_/ji bzhin sngon du mnyam drangs nas/_/mtha' yi gcig ni gzung byas la/_/sa bon yi ge gcig 
[\[291b.7\]]bzung bas/_/de yis sgo brgyad mnyam pa'o/_/bcu gnyis spangs pa'i bsgom pa yis/_/sgo brgyad rnam par rtse ba'o/_/ji ltar rgyal po sbyangs pas rab bsgyur ba/_/drod dang ba lang rang bzhin lus kyi las/_/byis ni rang 'dod rba rlabs rgya chen po/_/de 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bzhin lus ni rang 'dod mtshon gyi gtso/_/'pho ba sbyang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/'byin byed tshogs ni dgu pa nyid/_/phra ba'i rnam par bshad pa nyid/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[292a.2\]]gyis bskor ba'o/_/bcu gnyis dgu yi rim pa ni/_/dgu yi sbyor ba la rab brten/_/'di yi dgu yi rlung ji bzhin/_/rnam shes rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/_/rlung gi dbus su me yi dbyibs/_/me yi du ba'i yig de bzhin/_/u ni re phar yang dag ldan/_/
[\[292a.3\]]smra ni rgya mtshor bshad pa'o/_/de bzhin thig le ye shes gnas/_/sgra dang sgra yis bsgom pa'o/_/bshang ba'i sgo nas de bzhin du/_/srid pa'i nyes las yang dag 'pho/_/sna dang rna ba mig las mi/_/mi rnams kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/lte ba'i thig le 
[\[292a.4\]]de bzhin steng /_/gong gi gnas ni shes par bya/_/sems kyi rtsa dang 'dra ba yi/_/snying gar de bzhin sbyong ba'o/_/'phyar bar rlung gi sa bon ni/_/mnyam pa'i gnas su shes par bya/_/de ltar nga yis mtshan nyid bshad/_/gzhan du bla ma ston pa'o/_/steng 
[\[292a.5\]]du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni/_/mod la 'pho ba'i ming du bshad/_/ji ltar bung ba me tog bu gar ni/_/rgyags pas myos nas sems ni zhu ba ltar/_/de bzhin ye shes dbang phyug sgor gnas pa/_/ud tran tra yi mnan pas 'jig pa'o/_/e ma'o chos ni mchog gi 
[\[292a.6\]]lam/_/e ma'o 'khor ba gcod byed pa/_/e ma'o grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/_/e ma'o ye shes ngo mtshar che/_/'pho ba sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[292a.7\]]ldan/_/dang por gzugs ni sbyang bar bya/_/bdag nyid mdun du yang dag gnas/_/bdag nyid lha dang de bzhin gzhan/_/shes pa gzhan la rmongs pa rnams/_/ming gi yi ge mnyam por drang /_/'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha/_/sgong skyes kyi ni 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]dbus su thim/_/ye shes lus la bsgom byas pas/_/blo ldan lus ni rnam par 'pho/_/sngon du rngub cing 'byin pa yis/_/sngon bzhin lhan cig 'pho ba'o/_/sdig bral spyod pa med pa nyid/_/sdig spangs spyod pas yang dag gnas/_/nyon mongs rgya 
[\[292b.2\]]mtsho'i sdig pa sbyong /_/sdig spong de bzhin rmongs pa dang /_/sbyor ba yis ni sdig pa sbyong /_/spyod med sdig pa sbyong ba'o/_/rtag tu sdig sbyong lam la gnas/_/sbyor ba'i lus ni skyon med pa'o/_/dbugs kyi mthar ni gnas pa yis/_/'di yis steng du gol 
[\[292b.3\]]bar gnas/_/dbugs ni lte bar gtong ba yis/_/sems ni gzugs med srid par ro/_/sdig pa kun nas mi gnas pa'o/_/nyes pa kun gyi gos pa ni/_/'pho bar sbyor ba sbyar bar grol/_/pha dang ma ni gsad bya zhing /_/rgyal po dang ni gtsang sbra gnyis/_/
[\[292b.4\]]yul 'khor bcas pa bcom byas na/_/mi de dag pa zhes su brjod/_/dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/_/dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/_/ji srid yun ring 'tsho zhing chos spyod pa/_/de srid dge ba'i rgyun ni 'phel ba'o/_/ji ltar bum pa mkhan ni mkhas 
[\[292b.5\]]pa yis/_/lo zlas gnas ni snod ni du mas 'gengs/_/mig dang dbyibs med 'khor lo 'ji ba'ang med/_/rnam shes ye shes rnam pa kun du brtag_/lus yang dag par 'pho ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[292b.6\]]bshad bya ba/_/sbyor ba'i bstan bcos sgrub pa pos/_/rngub pa'i bdag nyid dbye ba ni/_/sor bzhi las ni nam mkha'o/_/nam mkha' las ni skar ma dang /_/gong bu me yi phung po nyid/_/me yi dbus su yi ge a/_/nam mkha' dang ni zla ba 'di/_/
[\[292b.7\]]dbus su bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'o/_/'khor lo nyi ma'i dra ba can/_/bdud rtsi'i thigs pa rnam par 'byin/_/sa bon 'bar zhing 'bar ba yis/_/dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o/_/dbus su a yig sngon po'o/_/'od zer lnga ni de bzhin phyogs/_/ri rab 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]dbus su 'bar ba ni/_/thig le'i sgo ru snang ba'o/_/a yig rnam pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu/_/kha dog gnyis pa'i lha nyid do/_/ji ltar bug pa stong pa nyid/_/rtag tu stong pa'i lha nyid do/_/sna bug ji ltar bzed pa yis/_/lce yi yang ni bdud 
[\[293a.2\]]rtsi'o/_/yi ge gsum ni sbyar bar bya/_/rmongs pa mgrin pa dbyangs yig sbyar/_/u ni rnam pa rim bzhin mchog_/kun nas nyon mongs lhag par sel/_/hU~M gi yi ge dbang phyug mchog_/sngon du pad+ma mnyam pa nyid/_/sgong skyes sngon du bzod pa'o/_/de'i 
[\[293a.3\]]lha ni lhag par rdzogs/_/'od zer bye ba rnam mang po/_/de yi ye shes dbang phyug rgyal/_/dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/_/stobs 'jigs pa yi dbyug pa can/_/hu~M gi rnam pa mnga' bdag dbang /_/lte bar ji ltar gtso bo nyid/_/e yi rnam pa brda 
[\[293a.4\]]yi lus/_/kun nas dgod pa rnam par bshad/_/bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni/_/bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no/_/bdag nyid gdan du grags pa yis/_/bdag nyid lha ni mchod par bya/_/bdag gi gdan gyi le'u bya ba ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[293a.5\]]bshad bya ba/_/'od zer gyi ni mtshan nyid dag_/rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas/_/sa ni sbyang bar bya ba'o/_/hU~M gi rnam pas pad+ma bsgyur/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzhi la ni/_/cod pan rab tu dgod par bya/_/gal te bdag nyid lhar 'dod pas/_/
[\[293a.6\]]dbugs las lha ni dbyung bar bya/_/gzugs rdzogs yid du 'ong ba nyid/_/mchog gi go 'phang bsgom par bya/_/gnas brgyad so so lha la ni/_/phyag rgya brgyad ni bstan par bya/_/las dang las kyi khyad par la/_/sngags pas 'di yi sa bon bzlas/_/
[\[293a.7\]]sa yi rnam bzhi pa nyid/_/de bzhin k+Sha yi rnam pas rgyas/_/dbang la ya~M gi yi ge shis/_/ha yi rnam pa mngon par spyod/_/mchod pa chog kun rdzogs pa/_/gzhan du bltas nas shes par bya/_/phyis ni las la rab tu 'jug_/rang gi lus la thim par bya/_/
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis nyid/_/lus kyi rtsar ni rab tu nges/_/stong phrag dgu yi grangs las ni/_/bye ba brgya sogs dga' bar gnas/_/
[\[293b.2\]]stong pa'i dbyibs ni sngon 'gro bas/_/blo dang ldan pas sa bon bskrun/_/zag pa'i lus ni bcom nas kyang /_/de yi snying gar pad+ma nyid/_/sgong skyes stong pa yi ni gzhi/_/de ltar gnas la mnyam sbyor bas/_/de yi gnas su shes par bya/_/nyi ma 'char ba'i 
[\[293b.3\]]'od zer gyis/_/phra rab rdul bzhin gnas pa nyid/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ni so sor bsdam/_/de bzhin 'od zer 'bar ba dang /_/kun tu rdzogs pa'i lus po 'byung /_/kun tu rdzogs pa lha yi sku/_/rnal 'byor pa yi kun du blta/_/'dod khams srid pa'i gzugs can sogs/_/
[\[293b.4\]]rgyun du rnal 'byor la brten pas/_/rten gyi ye shes des mthong ngo /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/me yi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/
[\[293b.5\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o/_/de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi/_/sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i ming /_/dngos po mi g.yo bar bsgoms pas/_/nyon mongs srid pa'i rgya mtsho zad/_/ye shes nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pas/_/de yi ye shes de dbang phyug_/
[\[293b.6\]]ji ltar byis pa pha ma'i gnas su rtse ba ni/_/tsheg nyid dang ni lus ni 'bar zhing g.yo ba yis/_/phyi nas 'di yi ye shes de ni shin tu bsgrim/_/de ltar rnal 'byor bla mas bstan pa bde yang /_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[293b.7\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sbyor ba mchog ni mnyam bshad pa/_/rang bzhin med pa bya ba'i tshig_/lhag pa'i gnas su lus bral ba/_/phra ba'i dngos po gos pa med/_/rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsdam par bya/_/de bzhin mchod rten dbang phyug go/_/chu min nas ni 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]gyen du dbugs/_/de bzhin lto ba rlung gis gang /_/ye shes thig le gnas nas gnas/_/rnam par shes pa nges par thim/_/'jig pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i ngo bos sgom/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngubs pa yis 
[\[294a.2\]]dbus su ye shes skyon med pa'o/_/bla mas bshad pa'i lam gyis ni/_/rtag tu nges par blta ba'o/_/ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu gtam gyis rmongs nas su/_/gnyi ga 'tham pa srad nas gtam gyis smras pa dang /_/lam ni ji ltar bstan kyang bzung par mi nus pa/_/
[\[294a.3\]]ltar rnal 'byor ba ni lam ngan bstan pa bzhin/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya/_/ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/de ltar rjes su 
[\[294a.4\]]brtse ba'i phyir/_/bdag gi sbyor ba'i bsam gtan bya/_/lus ni rnam pa gsum nyid dang /_/ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni/_/lus kyis bsrung zhing rab tu bsdam/_/gnyis kyi gnas ni mngon par spang /_/ye shes can gyis thar 
[\[294a.5\]]pa bsten/_/skad cig longs spyod de bzhin sdug_/gnyis med lhan cig bstan par bya/_/tshe 'di nyid la sems can rnams/_/skad cig phun tshogs skad cig rkud/_/de bzhin rmongs pa'i longs spyod ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis ltos mi bya/_/de phyir nyes pa 
[\[294a.6\]]yi ni gnas/_/'gro ba'i nyes pa srid pa'i dngos/_/longs spyod lhag pa'i gnas gcig gi/_/'bras bu 'dod pa go bzlog pa'o/_/sems can sbyin la sred pa yi/_/longs spyod kyi ni gnas su brjod/_/de phyir gnyis pa'i lam spangs la/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[294a.7\]]ba yis de bzhin dbus/_/sbyor ba'i chos ni mnyam dmigs pas/_/spyod pa'i chos zhi skyon med pa'o/_/bdag med lus ni yang dag gnas/_/bdag med la ni mnyam par brten/_/bslab bya rtogs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bshad bya ba/_/snying gar zla ba gzhag byas la/_/de dbus bdud rtsi yi ge ni/_/rnam pa kun tu bdud rtsi sngags/_/'od zer 'bar ba bsgom par bya/_/zhi ba'i gnas su sbyar ba yis/_/rnal 'byor par ni yongs su grags/_/ji ltar de yi zla ba nyid/_/ci tsa'i yi ges rnam par 
[\[294b.2\]]brgyan/_/gser gyi mdog ltar yid 'ong gzugs/_/'od zer sna tshogs bsgom pa yis/_/don 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/_/de ltar sangs rgyas sbyor ba'o/_/hU~M gi rnam pa dbang gi dngos/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/'od zer du ma'i cho ga nyid/_/dbang 
[\[294b.3\]]nyid du ni yongs su grags/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i gzhi/_/ji bzhin 'od zer sngon po 'bar/_/mngon par spyod par rab tu grags/_/las kyi le'u zhes bya ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sbyor 
[\[294b.4\]]pa'i zas sman zhes bya yod/_/'dab ma 'o ma 'dzag pa dang /_/de bzhin me tog a dza ga/_/dri ni dri zhim rnam par 'byed/_/mdog ni ljang dang ser ba nyid/_/rtsa ba gcig gi dbang nyid dang /_/ji ltar me bzhin 'tsher ba'o/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge sgom pa yis/_mchod dang bzlas 
[\[294b.5\]]pa'i tsha gar sbyar/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam pa'i char/_/srang ni re re bza' ba nyid/_/brgya dang de bzhin brgyad cu nyid/_/mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya/_/rnal 'byor pa yis lo brgya ru/_/dben pa'i ri la gnas na ni/_/ye shes can gyis ye shes lus/_/nges par yongs 
[\[294b.6\]]su rgyas par 'gyur/_/dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang /_/bkres pa la sogs med par 'gyur/_/gnas ni nges pa nyid kyi mchog_/rtsa ba rnal 'byor sbyor bar bcas/_/de ltar thos pa'i bdag nyid che/_/sbyor ba'i bstan bcos skyon med pa'o/_/tha mal 'gro bar nges pa 
[\[294b.7\]]ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang 'dzin/_/de ni yang sos rnal 'byor pa/_/ye shes can gyis ye shes rtog_/lnga pa'i lnga pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan shes rab dbang po 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]sbas pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad/_/dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa/_/rtag tu kun nas rngubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun dgra ni dus dang dus su g.yul 'gyed pa'o/_/chags med ye shes ri bo 
[\[295a.2\]]mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad/_/hU~M gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos/_/hU~M gi rnam pa mchog gi lha/_/hU~M gi rnam pa stong gyur pa/_/yi ge hU~M la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/yi ge brgyad kyis ngo bo nyid/_/spyod bcas mi spyod gsang pa dang /_/chu dang me 
[\[295a.3\]]dang de bzhin rlung /_/sa ni mig gi yi ge'o/_/sgo bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi/_/sgong skyes dza lar gnas pa nyid/_/bzhi bo nyon mongs ming dang ni/_/yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du/_/rmongs pas sa dang nyon mongs dang /_/sngon du phyugs na mnyam pa dang /_/chu shing me tog pad+ma 
[\[295a.4\]]ni/_/'di yis stong skyes stan nyid do/_/ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/_/bdud rtsi brgyan kyis rnam par dbye/_/shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/_/snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog_/lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang /_/nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/_/sa ni mig la sbyar bya ste//
[\[295a.5\]]tshangs par me ni de bzhin 'bar/_/rmongs pa yis ni mgrin par ro/_/g.yo ba'i snying la gnas pa dang /_/thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni/_/phyugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/_/yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis/_/'di yis lha nyid yang ngag shes/_/yi ge 
[\[295a.6\]]brgyad kyi sngags 'di ni/_/phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu grags/_/dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/_/gnag cing 'bar ba'i las la ni/_/las rnams bzhi la lha mo yis/_/mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas/_/ye shes dbang phyug snying po nyid/_/
[\[295a.7\]]mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang /_/phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun/_/las dang las kyi rnam par grol/_/thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni/_/mnyam par 'jig byed me dang yang /_/ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang /_/dad pa'i don dngas dbang po/_/lhag mas 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]bzhin brtsegs pa ni/_/bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o/_/'gro ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad/_/lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags/_/mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/sngon du reg cing reg pa 
[\[295b.2\]]nyid/_/'jig rten 'dir na bde ba dang /_/rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni/_/gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas/_/bdag gi de nyid mnan pa yis/_/ji ltar sngags 'di 'grub par 'gyur/_/de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis/_/sbyor 
[\[295b.3\]]pa'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya/_/dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang /_/nag po'i a ka ru dang gu gul mar me dang /_/gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yid ni ldan pa yis/_/lha mo ma mo rnam pa kun nas rab tu mchod/_/yi ge brgyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dang 
[\[295b.4\]]po'o//_//de nas gsang ba'i yan lag gi/_/thig le la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khams gsum skyes pa zad byas nas/_/ye shes dngos po gnas pa bzhin/_/lha yi dngos po dbyer med pas/_/steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni/_/thams cad kun nas stong pa nyid/_/ri rab gling gzhan 
[\[295b.5\]]bde byas nas/_/mnyam nyid sbyor ba kun du bsam/_/thams cad sdem pa'i dbye ba yis/_/de yis me tog thig le yi/_/thig le'i dbus su gsal ba'o/_/ye shes rngul ni rnam par thim/_/ye shes blo dang ldan pas shes/_/kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos/_/gzugs med 
[\[295b.6\]]ye shes gzugs bzhin no/_/ring ba ma yin thung ba min/_/mi ldan pa dang ldan pa nyid/_/gzugs dang stong pa'i de bzhin dbus/_/lhan cig ye shes gzung bar bya/_/nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni/_/rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o/_/ye shes rdo rje bcom byas nas/_/snang ba'i 
[\[295b.7\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_me yi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de dbus ji 
[\[296a\]]
