[\[296a.1\]]skad gsungs pa yi/_/ye shes dang ni rnam shes sems/_/'jig pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/ye shes kyi thig le'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//ka pa gcig dang sgo gsum gyis/_/ye 
[\[296a.2\]]shes dbus su thim pa nyid/_/bzlog par bya ba'i sa bon nyid/_/sbyang bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis/_/brgyad kyi mtha' la gsum pas drang /_/sa bon 'di ni drag po'i me/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/sngon gsungs mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/_/sngon du lhan cig bsgoms 
[\[296a.3\]]pa yis/_/dkar pos lus ni bsdam par bya/_/mnyam pa'i gnas su 'bar ba yis/_/ji skad sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung /_/dbus su mchod rten sbyang bar bya/_/rlung dang me yi mdun don la/_/rdo rje'i sa bon bsgom byas la/_/sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan/_/char gyi 
[\[296a.4\]]rgyun nas bshad pa yin/_/rgyas pa lnga yi sgo nyid la/_/kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/_/sgo gnyis mngon par bstan pa ni/_/de bzhin chu dang chu min gnyis/_/yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang /_/rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/_/'di yis lus ni bsdam bya zhing /_/me ni sgo 
[\[296a.5\]]rung sam par bya/_/sems 'di yis ni dmigs par bya/_/steng du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni/_/tshigs dgu yi ni mchog gi gdan/_/lus med sems kyi ngo bo yis/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/_/dus min lha rnams gsod 
[\[296a.6\]]pa nyid/_/sdig gis kun nas mi gos te/_/'khor ba'i pha rol mchog tu sgrol/_/'pho bar sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o//_//sngon gsungs mtshan nyid ldan par ni/_/sngon du stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/_/de yi lus ni sbyang bar bya/_/sbyor bas bsgom 
[\[296a.7\]]pa'i lus can ni/_/dngos po med par bsgom pa'i dngos/_/gang zhig dngos po rnam rtog pa'i/_/dngos por bsgom pa'i sa bon gyis/_/steng pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/dgong bya'i yi ge rnam bkod pa/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/_/dbyig pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/_/zhabs skyed phyag na rdo 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]rje dang /_/lus ni dril bu 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/de bzhin mgo ni byams pa dang /_/ma yi rnam pa steng 'bar ba/_/'khor ba rnam par grol bar mdzad/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por/_/kun nas stong pa'i dbus su bsam/_/rnam shes ye shes sa bon gyis/_/dbus dang dbus su rnam 
[\[296b.2\]]par dkris/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog brtson pas/_/rlung gi steng du bsam par bya/_/dang po dkar po kun nas bsam/_/gnyis pad bzhin ser po'o/_/gsum par gang zhig dmar po dang /_/bzhi pa la ni sngon po nyid/_/mnyam bzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis/_/'grub par 'di la the 
[\[296b.3\]]tshom med/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming zhes pa/_/gsang zhing gsang ba gsang chen po/_/bdag gi gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/tsha ba'i sa bon bye brag ni/_/lto ba'i thab khung 'di yi me/_/lto ba'i me ru shes par bya/_/shar gyi cha 
[\[296b.4\]]ni dkar po'o/_/byang gi de bzhin ser po nyid/_/nub kyi phyogs su dmar po ste/_/lho phyogs su ni nag por grags/_/dbus su mnyam pa'i kha dog nyid/_/me lnga ru ni bsam par bya/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ming zhes pa/_/shar gyi mer ni rab tu brtag_/drag mo mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/_/
[\[296b.5\]]byang gi phyogs su rnam par brtag_/ro langs ma zhes bshad pa ni/_/nub kyi phyogs su rab tu dgod/_/mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes bya'i ming /_/lho phyogs kyi ni me yi ming /_/dbus su ye shes me 'di ni/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya'i ming /_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 
[\[296b.6\]]ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing /_/lag na rdo rje kha T+wA~M dang /_/me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/gzugs ni mthe bo'i rnam pa tsam/_/khro bo'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/_/na li las ni yi ge brgyad/_/'phyang pa po yi sgor ni thim/_/mkhas pas phyis ni bdag 
[\[296b.7\]]nyid lngas/_/gnas lnga ru ni sbyin sreg bya/_/sems kyis dbugs ni rab bsdams nas/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/gang zhig cung zad bza' btung rnams/_/sbyin sreg tu brtags bza' bar bya/_/dang po sgra yi yi ge dang /_/de bzhin gnyis pa gnyis 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]'gyur gnyis/_/gsum pa glo ru re pha dang /_/bzhi pa'i steng du thig ler bcas/_/lnga pa steng du 'bar ba nyid/_/sa bon lnga la bzlas shing bsreg_/de ltar bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/rgyas pa'i sbyor bar grags pa'o/_/sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dang 
[\[297a.2\]]po'o//_//de nas dag pa rnam gsum bya/_/swa b+hA ba shud+hAHsarba d+harmAHswab+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_badzra shud+d+hAHsarbad+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_o ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_de ltar spyod pa'i sbyor bas ni/_/yid ni dag par byed pa'o/_/thams cad kun nas stong nyid kyis/_/der ni chu 'di bsam par bya/_/kun 
[\[297a.3\]]nas chu yi gzugs dang ni/_/de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/_/rgya chen yid la 'dod bzhin du/_/gser gyi grong khyer 'byung ba ni/_/rin chen bdun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/seng ge gdan gyis gdan gyi ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_/dbus su ye shes bsam pa ni/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i 
[\[297a.4\]]ming nyid de/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/_/rab tu bzhad pas 'jigs par byed/_/na bza' dmar po gtsigs pa'o/_/dbu skra sil bur tu drag_/ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya'i ming /_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i phyir rol du/_/de yi gzugs kyi logs 
[\[297a.5\]]gnyis su/_/ji ltar phyogs kyi mdog nyid ni/_/kun nas de yi phyag rgya rigs/_/lnga pa'i bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni/_/rtag tu mchod dang gtor ma dbul/_/chu nya yi ni bdag nyid rnams/_/chu dang me dang de bzhin g.yo/_/ji ltar rlung du du ba bzung /_/ye shes rdo rjes dkris pa ni/_/lnga pa'i 
[\[297a.6\]]lha nyid 'byung ba ni/_/lnga pa nyid du bsgom par bya/_/gi wang gnyis ni mA ma kI/_/de yi gcig ni bdud rtsi'o/_/A li kA lir ba sbyor bas/_/gnyis kyi de nyid rab tu bya/_/A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs/_/kA li de bzhin gshegs ma nyid/_/ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/_/yi ge 
[\[297a.7\]]gsum pa gzung byas te/_/rdo rje yis ni dbyug pa nyid/_/'og pag sogs pas dkri bar bya/_/sa bon te ni mchog bsam pa/_/rnal 'byor pa yis sdig pa gcod/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog_/dri yi ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang /_/ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]rdo rje'i phyag_/lha gsum dag gi chog shes par bya/_/ha zhes bya bas kha dog 'phrog_/ho zhes bya bas dri med cing /_/dpa' bo hrIHyis 'joms pa ni/_/rim pa 'di bzhin shes par bya/_/thabs shes sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[297b.2\]]gzhan gyi gdan/_/dang por re zhig mtshan nyid kyis/_/bdag nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/ji ltar me yis thams cad mnyam par bsreg pa dang /_/ji ltar nyi mas khyab par 'char bar ston pa dang /_/ji ltar rlung gis dri ni mnyam phar len pa ltar/_/rnam rtog ring du spangs 
[\[297b.3\]]pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/sngon gsungs mtshan nyid ldan par ni/_/nyi ma'i dbus su chu dkyil 'khor/_/chu yi dbus su pad+ma ni/_/rab 'dod pad+ma bsam par bya/_/gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa'i dngos/_/rin chen bdun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/seng ge'i gdan gyi 
[\[297b.4\]]gdan la ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'o/_/na bza' sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang /_/gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/_/dgod bya'i yi ge rnam par bkod/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/dbus su ye shes rnam shes ni/_/gzugs 
[\[297b.5\]]la yon tan dbang pos brgyan/_/dang po'i sgra yig dang po dang /_/de bzhin gnyis par nyis 'gyur nyid/_/gsum la logs su re pha dang /_/bzhi pa'i steng du thig ler bcas/_/phyogs kyi mdog tu dgod pa ni/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/_/mtshams 
[\[297b.6\]]su [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gdan la ni/_/ma ning yi ge bzhi pa nyid/_/dbang ldan seng ge zhes bya ba/_/de bzhin me ru stag mo dang /_/bden bral 'ug pa hU~M sgrogs pa/_/ce spyang rlung du dgod par bya/_/dbugs kyis dngos po thams cad dang /_/de yi phyag rgya'ang brtag par 
[\[297b.7\]]bya/_/dngos pos dngos po bsgom pa yis/_/mkha' 'gro brgyad kyis rnam par bskor/_/logs su lnga ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/dbus su'ang ye shes rnam par dgod/_/bdag nyid lus kyi lus can ni/_/gnyis med mchod pas mchod par bya/_/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]yid kyi me tog dgram pa dang /_/yid kyi bdug pas bdug pa dang /_/yid kyi byug pas mngon par byug_/yid kyi mar me spar bar bya/_/sngon du rdzas ni lnga pa la/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs/_/sngon du gsungs pa'i 
[\[298a.2\]]bdud rtsi ni/_/dpa' be'i lus la gzung bar bya/_/lcags kyus lha rnams thams cad ni/_/bdud rtsi'i yi ge tshim par bya/_/A li kA li rab sbyor las/_/dpa' bo'i dbus su byin gyis brlabs/_/A lir shes pa mA ma kI/_/skyes bu rdo rje 'jigs byed do/_/
[\[298a.3\]]lha mo g.yon pa la brten cing /_/skyes bu'i rkang pa hU~M byas pa/_/de yi rdzas ni rab bstan pas/_/dpa' bos thams cad byin gyis brlabs/_/bdag nyid lnga yi lus la ni/_/mkha' 'gro lnga ni rnam par thim/_/'dod la dga' nyid ma yin zhing /_/longs spyod 
[\[298a.4\]]phyir yang brten mi bya/_/gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/_/dus kun tu ni mchod par bya/_/gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas phyi yi gtor ma bshad/_/snying po'i gnas su mkha' 'gro ma/_/de bzhin byang du 
[\[298a.5\]]'bar byed ma/_/'jib byed ma ni nub tu gsungs/_/ngag 'phrog lho phyogs rnal 'byor ma/_/rnal 'byor pho nya bzhi po ni/_/drag po'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni sbyin bya zhing /_/dam pa'i spyod pas mchod par bya/_/mnyam nyid lta ba'i ye shes 
[\[298a.6\]]kyis/_/mkhas pas gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbrel byas nas/_/sdigs mdzub gnyis ni bsgreng byas nas/_/'di ltar gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/mkha' 'gro lnga ni kun 
[\[298a.7\]]gyi'o/_/ba dan gsum pa'i snying gar sbyin/_/steng du khu tshur thams cad bcas/_/'di ni pho nya'i phyag rgya'o/_/brgyad mtha' dang po'i sa bon dang /_/dgu yi mtha' ni byang du shar/_/shar dang nub kyi sa bon dang /_/lho yi gsum par mngon par gzung /_/pho nya bzhi 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]yi sa bon 'di/_/sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/_/shar du bdud rtsi drag po yi/_/sa bon dbus su sbyar bar bya/_/ji ltar las la sogs sbyar ba/_/'bum phrag gsum gyis mngon par 'grub/_/tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/_/smyung bar gnas pa'ang med 
[\[298b.2\]]pa'o/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/rtag tu 'bad pas mchog tu bsgrub/_/dam tshig la gnas dpa' bo che/_/'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs bcom/_/dag pa'i chos la dmigs pa yi/_/dag pa'i dbyangs ni lam po che/_/chos chen po ni legs 
[\[298b.3\]]par 'ongs/_/ro mchog mchog tu zhim pa'o/_/srid pa'i mgon po rgya che ba/_/sangs rgyas gang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshigs bcad 'di yis dbul bar bya/_/sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bdag nyid lha la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/'di nyid tshe la 'khor ba gcod la phyag 
[\[298b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bya zhing /_/tshigs bcad 'di yis rab tu zed/_/pad+mar bsgyur ba'i gdan la ni/_/steng du rdo rje bstan par bya/_/dbus su bdud rtsi ri rab kyis bsrubs nas/_/mthe mdzub gnyis nis yi steng du 'thob 'thung dbul/_/
[\[298b.5\]]rgyas pa'i mchod rten lnga la ro yis lan lnga ru/_/bdud rtsi chu yis mchod rten dbus su bsam par bya/_/gzhan gyi gdan gyis bdag nyid dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//gzhan yang gtor ma'i las bshad pa/_/logs su gru gsum bya ba ni/_/khrag 
[\[298b.6\]]sogs kyis ni bya ba'am/_/g.yon pa khu chur bcings byas la/_/dbu ma khro bo brkyang par bya/_/dbus ma yi ni gsum pa la/_/sdigs mdzub bkug la sbyar bar bya/_/du pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang par bya'o/_/oM A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_ma hA 
[\[298b.7\]]pU dza b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/kun nas gtor ma rdzogs byas la/_/lnga ba'i rdzas kyis sbyar bar bya/_/oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri dang brag dang phug gis/_/yul gyi mdo dang lam dang zhing /_/khyad par du ni 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]khyim stong nyid/_/shing chen shing gi bdag po dang /_/khyad par du ni chu mi gnyid/_/snod dang thang dang sa stong dang /_/khyad par sa steng gdol khyim gnas/_/nag po drag po drag chen po/_/lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang /_/nag po gtsigs bye 
[\[299a.2\]]'jigs byed pa/_/dga' las 'das pa bgegs rgyal po/_/rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang /_/'jigs byed ma dang u mas bstod/_/rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang /_/thub chen gzhan gyis mi thul ma/_/nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/_/nag mo nag mo rnal 'byor ma/_/
[\[299a.3\]]dbang byed ma dang zla ba mo/_/drag mo sngang ba'i lam pa ki/_/'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma/_/'jib byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma/_/drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen po/_/mche ba gtsigs dang thod can ma/_/thod phreng thod pa'i phreng can ma/_/kha T+wA~M ga ma rdzu 'phrul che/_/
[\[299a.4\]]ral gri dgra sta'i lag pa dang /_/rdo rje de bzhin gzhu lag ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i de nyid che/_/las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa'i/_/sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen po/_/rdo rje dbang phyug de bzhin gtso/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen mo/_/gos med sbyar ba'i lha byed ma/_/
[\[299a.5\]]rdo rje dbang phyug ma ka yis/_/thams cad thams cad 'gugs pa'o/_/oM A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_sarba de ba lo ki ni na kak+ka ka Da ni/_khakh+kha kha Da ni/_bab+ba ban+d+ha ni hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_sha da da nya yis sbyar ba yis/_/o~M gyis spyan drangs gtor ma sbyin/_/ji 
[\[299a.6\]]ltar las la sogs brtsam pa/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang /_/khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin/_/ye shes can gyi dpal 'dod pas/_/lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/o~M hi li hi li 
[\[299a.7\]]badzrI/_ma tha ma tha yo gi nI hU~M dzaH/_gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o//_//sngags kyi yi ge yi ge ni/_/yid kyi sprul pas bsgrub par bya/_/snying po'i sems ni rnam spangs nas/_/nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par bsgom/_/sngags 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ni ngur ngur zhes brjod pa/_/e ma sems can nyon re mongs/_/des na yid la mngon 'dod pa'i/_/sngags kyi yi ge mchog nyid ni/_/'gro ba rmongs pas de nyid med sngags dang /_/log par smra zhing gzugs brnyan sems dang bral/_/sngags kyi bdag nyid 
[\[299b.2\]]blo ldan gyis shes bya/_/las bzhi'i rnam par yongs su grags pa nyid/_/skyes pa du ma'i gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/nus mthu'i mtshan nyid kun nas thams cad ni/_/g.yo zhing 'thab pa phra zhing gos pa med/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid mchog 
[\[299b.3\]]gi yi ge'o/_/gzugs la sogs pa kun 'jig pas/_/thams cad nam mkha'i bsgom po'o/_/khams drug dang ni dbang po drug_/dbus ma'i khams nyid 'jig pa dang /_/stong pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad blo ldan gyis bsgom pa/_/sems can bsgom pa'i dngos 
[\[299b.4\]]po yis/_/stong pas thams cad 'jig pa'o/_/shar du kha dog dkar po dang /_/byang phyogs su ni ser po'o/_/rin chen nyi ma la'i 'od 'bar ba/_/lho phyogs su ni sngon po nyid/_/dbus su mnyam pa'i gnas su yang /_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/A li 
[\[299b.5\]]kA lir rab sbyor ba/_/de yi sa bon dbyung bar bya/_/nam mkha'i dbus ni mchog nyid du/_/gang zhig dbus su zla ba dang /_/zla ba'i dbus su sa bon ni/_/'od zer 'bar ba bsgom par bya/_/tshon sna bdun ni sna tshogs pa/_/'od zer 'bar pa mnyam pa'i 'od/_/
[\[299b.6\]]gong du bla ma'i yi ge dang /_/tha ma bsreg pa'i yi ge dang /_/dbus su sa bon gzhag byas pa/_/mnyam bzhag bzlas su 'ong ba yis/_/'bum phrag gsum du mkhas pas bzla/_/sbyor ba'i gdan las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba 
[\[299b.7\]]pa le'u dang po'o//_//sngon gsungs mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/_/sngon bshad stong pa nyid kyi gzhi/_/ye shes can gyis mnyam bzhag pas/_/gzugs la sogs pa gzhig par bya/_/kun nas stong pa'i dbus su ni/_/mkhas 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]pa yis ni blta bar bya/_/'khor lo nyi ma 'dra ba bzhin/_/'od zer kun nas yang dag gnas/_/phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun tu/_/dpag tu med par gzhag par bya/_/thig le thig le phra ba'i gnas/_/'jig rten 
[\[300a.2\]]'jig rten kun mkhyen bcas/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/me yi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par 
[\[300a.3\]]bya/_/de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi/_/rnam shes ye shes sems dpa'o/_/spyi bor thams cad bsam pa'o/_/yi ge yi ge steng du bcas/_/smra ba'i sa bon thams cad ni/_/de ni rgyal po zhes su brjod/_/ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbyibs/_/
[\[300a.4\]]rlung gi dbus su btung bar bya/_/sa bon de yi sbyar bya ba/_/sgra ni steng dang steng du'o/_/de ltar sa bon mchog bsam pa/_/ye shes rnam shes ming nyid do/_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam dmar po/_/zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/bdun pa'i mtha' ni yang dag 
[\[300a.5\]]blang /_/gang gis bdud rtsi sa bon bzhin/_/gang zhig bzlas pas dkris pa ni/_/kha dog dkar por bsam par bya/_/sgra yig dang po blang byas la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa'o/_/dgu mtha'i sa bon yi ge ni/_/logs su me yis sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[300a.6\]]gzhan du rlung gi sa bon dang /_/rlung gi ngos su mngon par bsam/_/thams cad kun nas bsgom pa ni/_/ye shes thig le zhes bya'i ming /_/sdig byed blun po'i sems can rnams/_/sbyor ba 'di yis dag par bya/_/sa bon las ni rdo rje bskyed/_/de bzhin rdo rje'i 
[\[300a.7\]]mtshan nyid shes/_/dbus su rnam par snang mdzad lus/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan/_/'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/ting 'dzin kun nas yang dag gnas/_/dbus su 'di gzugs bsam par bya/_/rin chen 'bar bas 'bigs pa yi/_/mgrin 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]par re ba'i thig le dang /_/bsgrub bya'i mdun du bsgom bya ba/_/lan bdun pa yis 'byed pa ni/_/mda' yi rtse mor sa bon bsam/_/kha dog dkar po ka sha bzhin/_/mda' 'dren pa yis dbyig pa yis/_/sngags pas sa bon bzlas par bya/_/phyag rgya'i rnam pa 
[\[300b.2\]]bcing ba dang /_/sa bon sems kyis bzla bar bya/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas rnal 'byor pas/_/de bzhin myur du mngon par 'gugs/_/yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang /_/rtsa ba rang ro sbyar bar bya/_/de ni bdud rtsi yid 'ong ming /_/'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub 
[\[300b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/'byung po bzhin du dri za dang /_/mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma bshad pa/_/gnod sbyin [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum dang /_/rdo rje lha mo rnal 'byor ma/_/gal te 'dod na phran tshegs mi/_/sbyor bas myur du 'gugs par byed/_/sbyor ba'i gad las dmar po chen 
[\[300b.4\]]pos kun tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//gzugs kun zad par byas nas ni/_/gzugs ni mi gnas zad par 'gyur/_/skar ma'i rnam pa'i dbyibs su ni/_/dang por stong pa mngon bsam bya/_/mnyam nyid 
[\[300b.5\]]lta ba bskyed byas nas/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/_/gu gul phyag na rdo rje dang /_/yan lag 'jam dbyangs dril bu mchog_/byams bzla ba'i ri mo nyid/_/ma zhes bya ba steng 'bar ba/_/rnam par 'khor ba 
[\[300b.6\]]sgrol bar mdzad/_/sa bon 'di yis 'bras bu ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por/_/lha nyid lnga ni bsgom par bya/_/ri rab rtse ru gzhal yas khang /_/rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/gdan du me tog sngon po 'di/_/
[\[300b.7\]]bung ba'i zas su za ba nyid/_/me tog myur du za ba rnams/_/sbrang rtsi mnyam pa'i gnas nyid do/_/steng du 'phro ba'i yi ge ni/_/sangs rgyas kun du 'thon pa'o/_/chu dang nam mkha' rlung gi ni/_/sa bon bzhi yis lha nyid do/_/dbyibs ni ban du ka ltar gyis/_/kha dog 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]li khri'i sems kyis ni/_/lha mo mA ma kIr sbyor bas/_/ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya/_/dpa' bo rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/_/lha rnams kun gyi bdag nyid do/_/phyag rgya gnyis dang mngon ldan pa'i/_/rtse mo gsum gyis kun 'jig pa'o/_/sa 
[\[301a.2\]]ni gnas su gnon pa ni/_/rkang pa gnyis kyis rnam par mnan/_/tshems kyi ma ma mu bcir nas ni/_/gzugs dang gzugs la lta ba nyid/_/hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa dang /_/sgra yang de ru sbyar bar bya/_/bdud rtsi re pa thig le dang /_/lcags kyu yis ni rtse bar bya/_/lha mo sngags kyi 
[\[301a.3\]]kun nas zlos/_/rdo rje can dang pad+ma'i gdan/_/ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/_/yi ge gsum pa bzung byas la/_/glu ru rdo rje dbyug pa dang /_/gnyis par 'og pag gis ni dkri/_/sngags pa mchog gi sa bon 'di/_/kun nas bzla zhing sngon du gzung /_/lha rnams 
[\[301a.4\]]kun nas mnyes byas nas/_/'di yi rdzas ni bza' bar bya/_/rgyal pos spro zhing brten pa yis/_/dbang gi las ni mngon du brtsam/_/rab min dman pa'i rigs la ni/_/mngon du las ni sbyar bar bya/_/mnyam pa'i rigs kye me tog la/_/rgyas pa'i 
[\[301a.5\]]las ni bya bar bya/_/bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs kyis/_/zhi ba'i las ni de las mchog_/las bzhi mngon par sbyor ba yis/_/rigs kyi bye brag brtsam par bya/_/bdud rtsi'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rdzas gzhan dag ni bsgom par bya/_/dbang po'i 
[\[301a.6\]]lag pa shu dag ru rta dang /_/rmongs byed dang ni de bzhin gur gum dang /_/ku tan tsa ri zla ba dung nyid kyis/_/'di nyid kyis ni rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/_/gnyis med gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/sdug pongs la ni rjes brtse bas/_/sems 
[\[301a.7\]]can don du las brtsam bya/_/'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te/_/longs spyod phyi ru bsten pa min/_/khro med rmongs pa med pa yis/_/sems can don du sbyang bar bya/_/sbyor ba'i gdan las dbang du byed pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o//_//lce la chu ni rnam par sbyar/_/nam 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]mkha' rna ba sna gnyis la/_/sa ni chu la yang dag gsungs/_/mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa dang ni/_/g.yo ba snying la gnas pa'o/_/nyon mongs kun nas thong ka dang /_/phyugs ni ste ba'i rtsa bar ro/_/yan lag brgyad la dgod pa ni/_/lha nyid dang ni sbyar bar bya/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro 
[\[301b.2\]]bsam bya ba/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/_/lus kyi sa sogs rab sbyar ba/_/kha dog gcig pa'i rnam par bya/_/mtheb mo sum cu rtsa gnyis tshang /_/rnam par shes pa'i nang du 'pho/_/phyi rol nyis 'gyur sa dag la/_/dbugs kyi las la sogs pa bya/_/lte bar me yi lha 
[\[301b.3\]]bsam pa/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i ming nyid do/_/dbugs la bdud rtsi yang dag thim/_/kun nas sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/_/lha rnams la ni sreg blugs dbul/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan/_/mchog gi 
[\[301b.4\]]dbus nas sa bon ni/_/A li kA li las byung ba/_/kha dog dmar po 'od 'bar ba/_/sa la sogs pa'i phyi rol du/_/'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs kyis ni/_/sbyor ba gnyi ga'i phyi rol du/_/sa bon mda' yi rtse mor bsam/_/kha dog nag po 'od 'bar 
[\[301b.5\]]ba/_/sngon gyi ka sha'i sa bon ni/_/o~M dang re pa'i thig le can/_/mda' la goms pas ba rdeg par bya/_/sa bon dbus su son byas nas/_/bdud rtsir dbugs ni 'phrog par bya/_/bdud rtsi yi ger sbyar byas la/_/'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/_/
[\[301b.6\]]dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/_/phyi nas bdag gi las la ni/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba bzhin/_/o~M A kar+Sha daM hU~M swA hA/_rgyud chen po yi sa bon bzlas/_/'jig rten gsum po 'phral du bsgrub/_/sbyor ba'i gdan las 'byung ba dang /_/'jug 
[\[301b.7\]]pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//yongs rdzogs gzugs ni 'od zer bcas/_/dpral bar zla ba bsam par bya/_/dbus su sa bon hU~M rang bzhin/_/kha dog dkar po rab mdzes pa/_/rgya mtsho lta bur rab tu 'jigs/_/kha dog bdun pa rgya chen po/_/phyogs 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyi/_/gzugs rnams thams cad bcom nas su/_/bdag nyid nam mkha'i nam mkha' nyid/_/dbyibs dang gzugs ni thams cad pa/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun gyis so/_/chu yi dbus su pad+ma'o/_/gzhal yas khang pa bsam par bya/_/
[\[302a.2\]]rin chen bdun gyis mngon par mdzes/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/hU~M gi rnam pa me bzhin 'bar/_/spyi bo'i steng du rdzogs par bya/_/brang du dri med zla ba dang /_/dril bu snying gi ngos nyid du'o/_/lte bar dbyug pa gsang ba 'dzin/_/gya gyu rkang pa'i gdan nyid du/_/pad+ma'i gdan 
[\[302a.3\]]la rnam par sbrul/_/gzugs rdzogs pa las rdo rje ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/_/dar gyis bcings shing cod pan can/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/_/kha dog dkar po mchog tu 'bar/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/na bza' sngon po rab tu mdzes/_/
[\[302a.4\]]rdo rje dril bu phyag gnyis na/_/de ltar bsams pa tsam gyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/_/brgyad kyi mtha' la rtsa bar rlung /_/de bzhin rtsa bar re pha sogs/_/gsum pa yis ni rnam par 'dren/_/steng du thig le'i sa bon gyis/_/'di yi 'jig rten gsum po skrag_/
[\[302a.5\]]rdo rje'i sa bon rnal 'byor bas/_/khams gsum thams cad 'dren pa dang /_/rlung gi bdag nyid thams cad pa'o/_/sa bon dbus su gnod sbyin ming /_/de bzhin lha yi ming nyid do/_/sa bon dbus su ming rnams ni/_/thams cad me yi dbang phyug nyid/_/'bum phrag gsum 
[\[302a.6\]]bzlas rnal 'byor pas/_/rgyas par yongs su grags pa nyid/_/mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis/_/'grub par 'di la the tshom med/_/phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa/_/sngon du bsnyen pa'i rnam pa bya/_/gsang ba'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste dang 
[\[302a.7\]]pa'o//_//sor bzhi par ni nam mkha'o/_/gang phyir nam mkhar skar ma nyid/_/kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od zer mes/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun dang /_/khams gsum skyes pa zad byas nas/_/thams cad kun nas 'bar ba yi/_/me yi gzugs kyang de bzhin 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]zad/_/de nyid lnga yi khyad par nyid/_/shar du rdo rje dkar po'o/_/ser po rdo rje byang du'o/_/nub tu rdo rje dmar po nyid/_/lho ru sngon po'i rdo rje can/_/kun nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od/_/dbus su mnyam pa'i kha dog nyid/_/thams cad kun nas sngon po yi/_/dbang po'i gzugs ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[302b.2\]]sor bzhi pa yi nam mkhar ni/_/sgrol ma yi ni mtshan nyid ni/_/A li kA lir rab sbyor ba'i/_/de yi sa bon 'byung ba'o/_/dbus su sgrol ma gzhag bya ba/_/phyag rgya 'di yis mchod par bya/_/chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/_/snying gar 'greng bar gnas pa nyid/_/rtag tu bzhi mar 
[\[302b.3\]]phyogs pa/_/mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya/_/rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad par 'gyur/_/gsungs pa'i ge sar gyis ni brgyan/_/de dbus zla ba dkar po ni/_/'o ma zla ba de yi dbus/_/'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin/_/gzugs la 
[\[302b.4\]]sogs pa yi gzung zhing /_/stong pa'i sems kyang ma yin no/_/gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/_/ye shes can gyis de bzhin gzung /_/mnyam nyid ye shes thams cad kyis/_/kun nas blta ba thams cad rig_/bla mas bstan pa'i lam gyis ni/_/rtag tu nges par 
[\[302b.5\]]blta bar bya/_/ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu gtam gyis rmongs nas su/_/gnyis ka 'thabs pa phrad cing gtam ni smras pa dang /_/lam ni ji ltar bstan kyang gzung bar mi nus pa/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor pa ni gzhon nus bstan pa bzhin/_/rnal 'byor pa yis thos tsam gyis/_/nyon 
[\[302b.6\]]mongs ring du spong par byed/_/gang zhig sbyor ba bsten pa yis/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du 'thob/_/gang gis sna tshogs bsten pa yis/_/de yis las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/thams cad rgyud du bshad pa ni/_/rnam shes lhan cig sprad par byed/_/ji ltar 
[\[302b.7\]]sems kyis kun nas ni/_/nan tan gyis ne ye shes sbyar/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o//_//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par sprul/_/de yi snying gar yi ge hU~M/_/kha dog dkar po 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]bsam par bya/_/bdud rtsi re pa thig le dang /_/de yi sa bon sbyar bar bya/_/zhi bar rgyal zhing mchog tu brtson/_/zhi ba'i dus la bab nas ni/_/bdag nyid sbyin sreg rab tu bya/_/zhi ba'i'o/_/snying ga dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/kha dog zhi bar mtshungs pa'o/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[303a.2\]]kun nas rig pa yi/_/zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/de ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/_/rgyas par yongs su grags pa nyid/_/snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rked par re pa thig le can/_/dmar zhing dmar bar bsams pa yis/_/dbang nyid du ni yongs su 
[\[303a.3\]]grags/_/snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas bsam/_/dngos su rlung gi sa bon ni/_/dbus su dgra yi ming nyid kyang /_/ji ltar du ba du ba'i mdog_/mngon spyod par ni rab tu grags/_/kun nas thams cad stong pa nyid/_/sngon gyi mtshan 
[\[303a.4\]]nyid sbyar bar bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de dbus hU~M gi rnam pa ni/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/_/rlung gi sa bon gyis ni dkri/_/dbus su ming nyid sbyar byas la/_/rlung gis bskyod pa'i lus su ni/_/sgrub pa po 
[\[303a.5\]]yis bsam par bya/_/gang bsams de ni bskrad par 'gyur/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/mkha' 'gro drag mo bsam par bya/_/sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/_/gzugs dang dbyibs bzhin bsgom par bya/_/me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_/mdun du zlos 
[\[303a.6\]]shing kun du bsam/_/bsgrub bya yi ni lus kyi khar/_/rlung gi sa bon gyis ni gtso/_/mthar ni 'joms pa'i yi ge dang /_/sngon bzhin me yi yi ge nyid/_/dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming 'di ni/_/'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis/_/gang phyir sbyor ba bsnyen pa yis/_/lus 
[\[303a.7\]]ni kun nas sdom pa'o/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsten par bya/_/kha dog sngon po 'jigs chen po/_/shin tu bzhad pas 'jigs par byed/_/lag na lhung bzed kha T+wA~M ga/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/dgra 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]yis kun nas gdan du ni/_/bdag nyid rkang pas mnan par bya/_/rdo rje'i sa bon re pha la/_/lcags kyu'i yi ges sbyar nas ni/_/mtha' ru 'joms pa'i yi ge ni/_/'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i gdan gyi 
[\[303b.2\]]le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o//_//ji ltar lus las byung ba yi ni pad+ma la/_/bung ba gnyis kyis bdud rtsi za ba'i sems dang yang /_/yang dag sbyor bas byang chub yan lag ldan pa yi/_/mchog gi chos gsum pha 
[\[303b.3\]]rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srin mo dang ni ro langs ma/_/mi med dur khrod gnas su ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]tshes dang skar ma la/_/brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/ra nag po yi pags pa blang /_/mtshon gyis ma bsnun sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[303b.4\]]ras ni brkyang la thig gis gdab/_/rdzas lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/_/gnyis med gtor ma byin gyis brlab/_/lcags kyu lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/sngon du gsungs bzhin dbul bar bya/_/mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas/_/de yi ra yi sha yis ni/_/sbyin sreg 
[\[303b.5\]]brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/_/bris sku gnas su gzung byas la/_/gtor mas mchod la bri bar bya/_/kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/_/rol ba'i 'phen pas yang dag gnas/_/yan lag brgyad du kun gyis brgyan/_/skra ni dgyes pas rnam par brgyan/_/spyan gsum khro 
[\[303b.6\]]bo mche ba can/_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/kha T+wA~M ga dang rdo rje'i lag_/de bzhin ral gri thod pa dang /_/glang po'i pags pas mngon par bgos/_/stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/de ltar srin mo ro langs ma/_/rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson 
[\[303b.7\]]pas bri/_/kun nas gtor ma yang dag ldan/_/mi med dur khrod gnas su ni/_/nag po'i ra yi sha dang ni/_/zho dang mar du mngon par sbyar/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas pas/_/pho nya ro langs ma rab 'grub/_/mgo la hU~M/_spyi bor ha/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]mig la hrI/_sna la he/_rna ba la haM/_lce la ho/_/snying gar hU~M/_yan lag drug tu bkod pa'i sngags so/_/oM hrIHha na ha na/_sarba sha trU~M ma tha ma tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M a mu ka/_sang g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_phu phu/_'di ni bsgrub 
[\[304a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi sngags so/_/ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas ni/_/yan lag drug tu dgod par bya/_/ba dan gsum pas snying gar sbyin/_/dpung pa kun nas brkyang byas la/_/se gol gyi ni sgra dang ni/_/hU~M gi rnam pa lhan cig sbyar/_/g.yas brkyang ba 
[\[304a.3\]]yis yang dag gnas/_/'dir ni mchog gi phyag rgya'o/_/slob dpon la ni dmod pa dang /_/dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/_/sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba bye ba brgya stong du/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[304a.4\]]ye shes kyis bskul zhing /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis/_/rnal 'byor gtsug lag phrad pa'o/_/sems can thams cad skyon med cing /_/sems can thams cad bde gyur cig_/gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis/_/
[\[304a.5\]]sangs rgyas nyid du grub gyur cig_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/_/de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos 'di bgyis so/_/gdan bzhi pa las sbyor ba'i rab 
[\[304a.6\]]tu byed pa gdan bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//dpal gsang ba thams cad kyi rgyud ces bya ba 'di ni/_paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis gsar du bsgyur nas bshad cing gtan la phab pa/_de ltar na rgyud 'di'i le'u sil bu rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdoms na 
[\[304a.7\]]le'u brgya dang bzhi bzhugs so/_/slad nas bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs dam rgyud 'bum dang dpe dpang rnying pa dag dang yang gtugs te/_sdebs zhus dang bcas pa ches shin tu dag par bgyis so//_//
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]{D431}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_e ka bI rA khya shrI tsaN+DA ma hA ro Sha Na tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum po khro bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[304b.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi snying po rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/_/dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyang ngo /_/'di 
[\[304b.3\]]lta ste/_mi g.yo ba dkar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /_mi g.yo ba ser po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /_mi g.yo ba dmar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /_mi g.yo ba ljang gu'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /_gti mug rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang /_phra ma rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang /_'dod 
[\[304b.4\]]chags rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang /_phrag dog rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma bye ba khri brgya stong rnams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mi g.yo ba nag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar 
[\[304b.5\]]gsungs so/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba'i/_/gcig pu de ni dga' bzhi'i mchog_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/_/spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nga /_/rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes/_/lus dang ngag rnams kun la gnas/_/nga ni de rnams phan don phyir/_/rnam 
[\[304b.6\]]pa lnga yis yang dag gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar gsungs so/_/stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i/_/lha yi 'dod pas bde bar gnas/_/bdag ni kun rtog rnam par bral/_/spros pa 
[\[304b.7\]]med cing g.yo ba med/_/bud med gang gis nga mi shes/_/bud med kun gyi lus la gnas/_/bdag ni de rnams phan don phyir/_/rnam pa lnga yis yang dag gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba nag po la bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas dam du 'khyud nas tsum par 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]mdzad de gsol ba btab pa dang /_lha mo lha mo dga' chen mo/_/gsang ba shin tu'ang rnyed dka' ba/_/snying po las snying mchog gi gtso/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs pa/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang phyug mchog_/dga' ma rgyud chen mnyan par gyis/_/dbang 
[\[305a.2\]]po gcig pu zhes bya bas/_/sems can dngos grub myur du 'grub/_/dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la/_/rgyud 'di rab tu bstan mi bya/_/dkyil 'khor gzhan du zhugs pa la'ang /_/rgyud 'di bstan par mi bya'o/_/gang zhig gtum po khro bo yi/_/dkyil 'khor rab zhugs 
[\[305a.3\]]mnyam gzhag cing /_/dad dang brtson 'grus mchog ldan la/_/gtum po'i rgyud 'di bstan par bya/_/bla ma la gus snying rje can/_/sngags kyi theg par mchog tu gzhol/_/gtum po'i dbang phyug la rtag gus/_/de la rgyud 'di bstan par bya/_/rnal 'byor pa gang la la zhig_/'dod 
[\[305a.4\]]brkam sangs rgyas slu byed pas/_/gtum po'i dkyil 'khor ston byed cing /_/bla med rgyud ni ston byed na/_/de ni nad chen gyis gzir nas/_/bshang gci'i dri mas gos par byed/_/zla ba drug gi nang du ni/_/de ni 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de phyir gshin rje'i pho nyas 
[\[305a.5\]]bzung /_/dus kyi zhags pa'i dbang du 'gyur/_/gang tshe sdig can dmyal bar 'khrid/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang bsrung mi nus/_/lo ni 'bum du de sdug bsngal/_/gal te myong 'gyur las zad kyang /_/gal te mi ru skyes na yang /_/rdo rje'i gnam lcags kyis de 'jig_/sngags rig brtul 
[\[305a.6\]]zhugs can gyis ni/_/de phyir dkyil 'khor legs bris nas/_/de nyid sngon du yongs brtags pa'i/_/slob ma bzang po rab gzhug bya/_/'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i/_/rgyud ni de phyir bstan par bya/_/gang yang ma thos rgyud 'chad pa/_/de yang 'og tu 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[305a.7\]]gal te sangs rgyas dang mtshungs kyang /_/de yi gdong du rnam smin 'gyur/_/slob ma dad pa dman pa dang /_/the tshom za bas nyan byed na/_/mgo bor rdo rje'i thog ltung ba/_/char 'bab dus su the tshom med/_/mchog gi zhal mnga' lha mo la/_/bdag gis 'di ni bden par bshad/_/
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dpa' bo gcig nyid rgyud 'di ni/_/gtum po khro bo shin tu gsang /_zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i/_dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las rgyud la 'jug pa'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang 
[\[305b.2\]]rdo rje mas/_gtum po chen po khro bo la dam du 'khyud nas gsol pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni bya ba la/_/gang gi tshad kyis bri bar bya/_/de bzhin de dbus bri bya ba/_/gang yin gtso bos bdag la gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dkyil 'khor tshad du 
[\[305b.3\]]gang gyur pa/_/khru gang dang ni khru do dang /_/khru gsum pa dang khru bzhi pa/_/khru lnga'i tshad las lhag mi bya/_/gang du de yi rdul tshon nyid/_/kha dog sna tshogs kyis byas pa/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/sgo ni brgyad cha nyid du ni/_/de yi tshad du 
[\[305b.4\]]rab tu brtag_/sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud dang /_/de yi phyed kyis 'gram dang ni/_/logs dang de bzhin stegs bu dang /_/dra ba dra phyed snam bu rnams/_/rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du/_/de yi byed kyi rdul tshon sa/_/rdo rje'i phreng ba nyid dang ni/_/ka ba brgyad ldan brtag par bya/_/sgo 
[\[305b.5\]]yi sum 'gyur nyid kyis ni/_/sgo yi rta babs mchog tu bya/_/mchog tu sna tshogs rdo rje bri/_/rdo rje'i ra ba khor yug ldan/_/dpag bsam shing sogs dang ldan pa/_/khro bo gtum po'i dkyil 'khor la/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnam pa la/_/'phar ma gcig pa 
[\[305b.6\]]nyid du bya/_/de yi shar phyogs phyogs brgyad la/_/sna tshogs pad+ma yang dag bri/_/dbus ma dang dgu de dbus su/_/ral gri sngon po rdo rjes mtshan/_/rdo rje gri gug thod bcas 'og_/shar du 'khor los mtshan pa yi/_/ral gri kha dog dkar po bri/_/lho ru kha dog ser po yi/_/
[\[305b.7\]]rin chen dang bcas yang dag bri/_/nub tu kha dog dmar po yi/_/pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa dang /_/byang du ral gri rkyang pa yi/_/kha dog ljang khu yang dag khri/_/'khor lo dkar pos mtshan pa yi/_/gri gug me yi mtshams su bri/_/rin chen ser pos rab mtshan pa/_/bden 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]bral du ni bri bar bya/_/pad+ma dmar pos rab mtshan pa/_/rlung du de bzhin bri bar bya/_/dbang ldan kha dog ljang khu yi/_/ut+pal sngon pos mtshan pa bri/_/zla ba nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i/_/mtshan ma thams cad rab tu brtag_/rdul tshon dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs 'di/_/
[\[306a.2\]]bdag gis 'jig rten don phyir bshad/_/yang na dkyil 'khor bri bya ba/_/ras ris tshul du bri bar bya/_/sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor bri byas nas/_/dbus su mi g.yo mthing nag bri/_/zhe sdang rdo rje mas 'khyud pa/_/shar du mi g.yo dkar po bri/_/mi g.yo ser po de bzhin lhor/_/
[\[306a.3\]]nub tu mi g.yo dmar po bri/_/byang du mi g.yo ljang khu bri/_/me mtshams gti mug rdo rje dkar/_/bden bral phra ma rdo rje ser/_/rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/_/lha mo dmar mo yang dag bri/_/dbang ldan phrag dog rdo rje ma/_/ljang bri ras bris dkyil 'khor la/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[306a.4\]]la sngags kyis lhag par gnas par bya ba ni/_o~M shrI tsaN+ta ma hA ro Sha Na sa pa ri wA ra sa hi tA/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_/a tra maN+Da le/_a d+hiSh+ShA naM ku ru hU~M phaT swA hA/_'dis kun nas dgug pa dang /_rab tu gzhug pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_dbang du byas te mchod par bya'o/_/de 
[\[306a.5\]]nas sngags kyi mchod par gyur pa ni/_o~M kr-iSh+ta tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M shwe tA tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M pI tA tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M rak+tA tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M sh+yA mA tsa la puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M hA+e Sha badzrI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M mo ha badzrI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M 
[\[306a.6\]]pi shun badzrI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M rA ga badzrI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_o~M Ir+th+ya badzrI puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/_de bzhin du/_di paM dang /_d+hU paM/_gan+d+haM/_nai be d+yaM/_de lta bu'i nye bar spyad par lngas dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o/_/gang tshe dbus su mi g.yo dkar/_/gti mug rdo rje ma dang bcas/_/
[\[306a.7\]]de yi dkyil 'khor nyid du shes/_/de bzhin mi g.yo ser la sogs/_/rnal 'byor lnga yi rab dbye bas/_/dkyil 'khor lnga ru brtag par bya/_/sems nyid rtse gcig gyur pa yis/_/sngon du bsnyen pa brtsam par bya/_/dkyil 'khor rab bzhugs rnal 'byor ma/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]dang ni yang dag ldan/_/phan tshun du ni phyag byas nas/_/bza' ba sha dang chang yang bya/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum mo chen po'i rgyud las/_dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[306b.2\]]mas gsol ba/_/slob ma ji lta bu nyid la/_/rgyud 'di rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/the tshom med par bya ba nyid/_/khyab bdag chen po bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang por skyabs su 'gro ba gsum sbyin par bya'o/_/bslab pa lnga dang gso sbyong 
[\[306b.3\]]dag kyang ngo /_/de nas dbang lnga dang /_gsang ba dang /_shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo /_/de nas skal ldan slob ma la/_/rgyud kyi de nyid bstan par bya/_/gzhan dag ring du spang bar bya/_/gzhan du gus bcas gyur kyang spang /_/de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[306b.4\]]'di'o/_/ji srid snying po byang chub par/_/sangs rgyas la ni bdag skyabs mchi/_/dam pa'i chos la bdag skyabs mchi/_/dge 'dun la yang mi phyed dang /_/de la bslab pa lnga'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/_srog gcod ma byin len pa dang /_/gzhan gyi bud med rdzun smra rnams/_/spang bya 
[\[306b.5\]]kun la 'phags bzhin bya/_/lnga pa chang gi btung ba nyid/_/de la 'dir gso sbyong gi tshigs su bcad pa ni/_/bdag gis sems can gsad mi bya/_/pha rol nor ni dbrog mi bya/_/bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa spyad/_/rdzun gyi tshig kyang spang bar bgyi/_/myos byed chang gi btung ba ni/_/
[\[306b.6\]]bdag gis gang du'ang bdung mi bya/_/gar dang glu dang rgyan rnams dang /_/rgod bag rnams ni spang bar bya/_/khri stan mtho dang khri stan che/_/dus min kha zas spang bar bya/_/de ltar gso sbyong yan lag brgyad/_/dgra bcom rjes su bdag gis bslab/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[306b.7\]]gsungs ltar/_/rnam dag 'dag gis gzung bar bgyi/_/de yis g.yon can bdud las rgyal/_/bla med sangs rgyas mchog thob bya/_/'dir ni srid pa zhi gyur nas/_/lus can kun gyi skyabs gyur te/_/'khor ba ji srid de srid par/_/skyes bu bde bar gshegs par skye 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs 'dir/_/blo ldan 'jig rten la phan dga'/_/de la 'dir chu'i dbang ni/_slob ma dri ma dang bral zhing shel dag pa bzhin du bsams nas/_rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs te/_lo ma dang bcas pa'i lag pas/_o~M sarba ta 
[\[307a.2\]]thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hU~M/_/zhes pa 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de la 'dir dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba ni gos la sogs pa la byas pa'i dbu rgyan rin po che kun las grub par bsams nas/_slob ma yang 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsams nas/_mgo bor dbu rgyan sbyin par 
[\[307a.3\]]bya'o/_/sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na A bi sha A bi sha a s+ya hr-i da ya~M hU~M phaT/_de la ral gri'i dbang bskur ba ni/_lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las ral gri de'i lag pa g.yas su byin nas/_sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/_o~M ha na 
[\[307a.4\]]ha na/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba sha trU~M dz+nyA na khaD+ga hU~M phaT/_de la 'dir zhags pa'i dbang bskur ba ni/_zangs ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i zhags pa de'i sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i lag pa g.yon par byin nas/_sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/_o~M gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_/ka 
[\[307a.5\]]ha ka ha/_kaD+D+h+ya kaD+D+h+ya sarba duSh+TAM pA she na ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ma hA sa t+ya te d+ha r+m+ma te swA hA/_de la 'dir ming gi dbang ni/_slob ma khro bo gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya ru nye bar bkod nas/_de'i rnam par sems kyis dmigs te/_o~M he shrI b+ha ga ba na kr-iSh+NA ce la sid+d+he s+t+waM hU~M phaT/_de nas sngon bzhin 
[\[307a.6\]]du dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sgrub pa pos nag po la sogs pa'i dbye bas/_mi g.yo ba rnam pa lnga'i ming gis dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni dbang lnga'o/_/bud med rnams kyi dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba bzhag nas/_sin d+hu ra'i dbang bskur ba 
[\[307a.7\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/rgyal srid kyi lha mo chen mo'i tshul du slob ma dmigs te/_o~M b+ha ga wa tI A bi sha A bi sha a s+ya hr-i da yaM hU~M phaT/_lcags la sogs pa'i gri gug de'i lag pa g.yas su sbyin par bya'o/_/o~M karti ke sar+b+ba mA rA NA~M mA~M sa~M kArta ya kArta ya hU~M phaT/_lag pa g.yon 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]du mi'i thod pa'am/_rdza las byas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/o~M badzra ka pA la sar+b+ba sha tru NAM rak+taM d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya hU~M phaT/_de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya ru rnam par bkod nas/_de'i rnam par dmigs te/_o~M he shrI dwe Sha badzri sid+d+he s+t+waM hU~M phaT/_de bzhin du bud med ni nag 
[\[307b.2\]]mo la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma lnga po rnams kyi ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/'dir shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su thabs kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes so/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni bla ma la slob mas gos la 
[\[307b.3\]]sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/_de la rang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_lang tshos brgyan pa'o shes rab ma dbul bar bya'o/_/khyod la 'di ni 'bul lags kyis/_/'dod kun bde bar rab tu stsol/_/bdag ni 'dod pa'i bde don phyir/_/mgon po khyod kyis 
[\[307b.4\]]brtse bas zung /_/de nas bla ma la phyag 'tshal nas slob ma phyir byung ste/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing gnas par bya'o/_/yang bla mas chang dang sha la sogs pa rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod nas/_shes rab kyang tshim par byas te/_yang dag 
[\[307b.5\]]par sbyor ba las nye bar byung ba'i dkar dmar lo ma'i skyong bu la sogs par bzhag nas slob ma bos te/_de'i lce la mthe bong dang ming med kyis rdzas bzung nas/_hU~M phaT kyi yi ge bri bar bya'o/_/de nas/_a ho su kha~M zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/_de ring 
[\[307b.6\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed par bya yis/_gang gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur gyis/_'on kyang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun 
[\[307b.7\]]du 'di smra bar mi bya'o/_/de nas slob ma'i snying gar ral gri bzhag nas/_'di skad brjod par bya ste/_gal te smras na de yi tshe/_/shin tu rno ba'i ral gri 'di/_/khro bo gtum po'i phyag na gnas/_/gang gis dam tshig 'jig byed pa/_/de la 'di yis mchog tu gcod/_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]skye ba bye ba stong rnams su/_/mi rnams ral gri lag phyar bas/_/yan lag kun gcod mgo bo ni/_/'di yis mchog tu gcod par byed/_/gal te dam tshig 'di nyid kyis/_/khyod kyis 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur/_/de nas slob mas brjod par bya ste/_de ltar 
[\[308a.2\]]nges zhes so/_/de nas gdong g.yogs bcings nas/_dkyil 'khor du me tog dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas gdong g.yogs bsal nas/_dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gang dang gang gi mtshan ma de nas bstan par bya'o/_/de nas slob ma la shes rab ma de sbyin 
[\[308a.3\]]par bya'o/_/gzungs ma yid 'ong 'di khyod kyis/_/bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa/_/de la mchog gi dngos grub med/_/de nas dga' ba bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba bla mas rna bar smra bar bya'o/_/de nas bla ma phyi rol du byung nas/_/
[\[308a.4\]]shes rab gcer bur cog pus gsang gnas mdzub mos bstan nas/_ci ste bu khyod 'di spro'am/_/nga las mi gtsang ba dang ni/_/bshang gci rak+ta za ba dang /_/b+ha ga'i gnas la'o byed dam/_/sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/_khyod las mi gtsang bza' ba ni/_/ci yi phyir na 
[\[308a.5\]]bdag mi spro/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/bdag gis mi mo kun gus bya/_/des kyang /_a ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di/_/bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan/_/gang zhig cho gas sten byed na/_/bdag ni dngos grub stsol mdzad ma/_/blo ldan brtan par rab sbyor bas/_/
[\[308a.6\]]pad+ma ra bya ba ji bzhin gyis/_/rang nyid khro bo gtum po chen por gnas pas bde ba chen po ste/_de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid khro bo gtum po chen po'i rnam par bsams la/_shes rab kyang zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i tshul gyis yang dag par sbyor bas/_dga' ba bzhi mtshon par bya'o/_/
[\[308a.7\]]de nas yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_bla ma la sogs pa la chang dang sha la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o zhes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_dbang bskur 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]ba'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_ji ltar sgom pa po yi phyir/_/khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar bya/_/dbang phyug dam pa bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[308b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs ni/_/bar du gcod pa kun bral bar/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan nyid la/_/de la mnyam gzhag brtag par bya/_/dang po byams pa bsgom par bya/_/gnyis par snying rje bsgom par bya/_/gsum pa la ni dga' ba bsgom/_/kun 
[\[308b.3\]]gyi mtha' la btang snyoms so/_/de nas rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis mdun du bsam gtan gyi khro bo gtum po bsams nas yid kyis mchod pa bya ste/_mkhas pas me tog la sogs pas/_/yid kyis de rnams 
[\[308b.4\]]mchod par bya/_/de mdun sdig pa bshags par bgyi/_/bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang /_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/_/bskul zhing gsol ba rab tu 'dabs/_/bdag nyid yongs su 'bul ba dang /_/bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya/_/de nas smon lam 
[\[308b.5\]]btab nas ni/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/de nas phyag ni btsal byas la/_/'od zer rnams kyis slar yang bsdu/_/mkhas pas stong par bsams pa ni/_/sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya/_/o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_rab tu 'bar bas hU~M 
[\[308b.6\]]yig ni/_'od zer de yi ya bsregs par bsam/_/ga bur bsregs pa ji bzhin bsam/_/'od zer la yang rnam mi rtog_/thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin du/_/skad cig gis ni rnam par bsgom/_/dri med dag pa'i shel bzhin du/_/rang lus rnam par bsgom par 
[\[308b.7\]]bya/_/sngon du bsgom bya phyi nas ni/_ya~M ra~M ba~M la~M bzhi rnams las/_/yongs gyur bsgom bya rlung dang ni/_/me dang chu dngas rnams so/_/b+h+ru~M yig de las bsgom bya ba/_/gzhal yas khang du rab tu bsgom/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]de yi dbus su bsam bya ba/_/sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad ldan/_/ba~M yig sa bon las byung ba/_/de la a~M yig las byung zla/_/ra~M yig las byung nyi ma ste/_/de steng hU~M yig las kyang slar/_/nges bskyed ni bskyod pa ru bsam/_/mA ma kI bcas yang 
[\[309a.2\]]dag sbyor/_/de la rim bzhin rnal 'byor dbang /_/de yi spyi bo la thim nas/_/skar mda' ji bzhin sbyor ba yis/_/mA ma kI yi b+ha gar bsam/_/de las khu ba ro mnyam gyur/_/lhung gyur de yi b+ha ga'i nang /_/gtum po'i gzugs su gyur nas ni/_/b+ha ga'i mtha' 
[\[309a.3\]]las ngas byung nas/_/mi bskyod pa la ral gri yis/_/bsnun nas phyi nas rab tu bza'/_/mA ma kIs kyang de las de'i/_/sha za bar ni rab tu bsam/_/de phyir mA ma kIs bzung nas/_/ma dang yang dag rab 'dod bya/_/des kyang 'khyud par bsam bya ba/_/zhe sdang rdo rje 
[\[309a.4\]]ma yi gzugs/_/phyag g.yas na ni ral gri phyar/_/g.yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i/_/sdigs mdzub kyis ni sdigs par byed/_/so yis ma mchu yang dag bsdams/_/rkang g.yas brdegs pa'i stabs kyis ni/_/bdud bzhi rnam par nyed par mdzad/_/pus mo 
[\[309a.5\]]g.yon pas la btsugs/_/'jigs byed 'khyog por gzigs pa can/_/nor 'dzin la ni sdigs mdzub bstan/_/pus mo g.yon pa'i rtse mos gnas/_/mi bskyod sngon pos dbu rgyan mdzad/_/rin po che yi cod pan can/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa'i/_/gzhon nu 
[\[309a.6\]]zur phud lnga dang ldan/_/brgyad gnyis lo yi rnam pa can/_/spyan gnyis dmar po gtso bo yi/_/sems nyid brtan par bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid khro bo gtum grub nas/_/de nas srub pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/shar du mi g.yo dkar po spro/_/me mtshams gti mug rdo rje ma/_/ston 
[\[309a.7\]]ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs spro/_/lho ru mi g.yo ser po spro/_/phra ma rdo rje bden bral ser/_/mi g.yo dmar po nub tu spro/_/rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/_/mi g.yo ljang khu byang phyogs su/_/dbang ldan phrag dog rdo rje ma/_/phyi nas shes rab dang bcas des/_/rang gi mgrin pa las 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]byung ba'i/_/lha mo rnams kyis glu yis bskul/_/pa hu mai trI du bi bar+dz+dzi a ho mA shun+na sa hA pa todz+dzu bI o e phiT+Ta mi sab+ba dza/_ga hi ba b+hA ba/_gti mug rdo rje mas so/_/mA ka ru NA ci a phiT+Ta hi pa hu mA ho hi tu shun+na mA mo dz+dzu de ha/_su duk+khi a hu i dzI ba bi hun+naH/_phra ma rdo rje ma yis so/_/
[\[309b.2\]]kI sa tu ha ri sa bi ho hi a shun+na hi ka ra si pa be sha/_todz+dzu ni man+tA Na ka ri a ma N+Ni ats+tsha i lo A shi Sha/_'dod chags rdo rje ma'i 'o/_/dzo ba na mats+tshi u pa khi a niSh+pa la shun+naH/_a DiT+Te/_shun+na sa hA ba bi go i a ka ra hi tu mo eM sa ma g+hiT+Ti/_phrag dog rdo rje ma'i'o/_/khyab bdag 
[\[309b.3\]]byams pa rnam spangs nas/_/stod pa'i rang bzhin du ma mdzad/_/khyod dang rnam bral bdag 'gum pas/_/'gro kun stong par ma mdzad cig_/gti mug rdo rje mas so/_/snying rje'i sems bral bdag 'gum pas/_/khyab bdag stong par ma mdzad cig_/bdag gi lus ni sdug 
[\[309b.4\]]bsngal bas/_/'tsho ba dang bral ma mdzad cig_/phra ma rdo rje mas so/_/ci ste mkhas pa khyod nyid ni/_/dga' ba spangs nas stong par 'jug_/'jig rten ma lus pa rnams dang /_/bdag gi yid ni khyod la sdod/_/'dod chags rdo rje ma yis so/_/lang tsho dang ldan btang 
[\[309b.5\]]snyoms pa'i/_/mig ni stong pa 'bral med can/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/_/bdag la mnyam nyid sbyor bar mdzod/_/phrag dog rdo rje mas so/_/'di ni rmi lam ltar thos nas/_/khu ba las 'khrungs skad cig gis/_/sngon ma'i gzugs bzhin bsam par 
[\[309b.6\]]bya/_/bdag nyid yang dag sbyor de las/_/mi g.yo dkar po la bsnun nas/_/gti mug rdo rjer rab 'dod bya/_/mi g.yo dkar po'i gzugs su bya/_/mi g.yo ser po slar bsad nas/_/'dod bya phra ma rdo rje mar/_/bdag nyid mi g.yo ser por bya/_/de bzhin mi g.yo 
[\[309b.7\]]dmar po bsad/_/'dod chags rdo rje mar 'dod bya/_/mi g.yo dmar por bdag nyid bya/_/mi g.yo ljang khus bsad nas kyang /_/phrag dog rdo rje mar 'dod bya/_/mi g.yo ljang khur bdag nyid bya/_/lha mo bzhi la rjes chags pas/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdu/_/
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bdag nyid gcig tu yang dag sbyor/_/'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/de las nga rgyal byas pa yis/_/bdag la dngos grub the tshom med/_/kha dog nag phyir rnal 'byor pa/_/gang bsgom de ni mi g.yo nag_/kha dog dkar phyir rnal 'byor ba/_/
[\[310a.2\]]gang bsgom de ni mi g.yo dkar/_/kha dog ser phyir rnal 'byor pa/_/gang bsgom de ni mi g.yo ser/_/kha dog dmar phyir rnal 'byor pa/_/gang bsgom de ni mi g.yo dmar/_/kha dog ljang phyir rnal 'byor pa/_/gang bsgom de ni mi g.yo ljang /_/kha dog nag mo'i bud 
[\[310a.3\]]med des/_/zhe sdang rdo rje ma bsgom bya/_/kha dog dkar mo'i bud med des/_/gti mug rdo rje ma bsgom bya/_/kha dog ser mo'i bud med des/_/phra ma rdo rje ma bsgom bya/_/kha dog dmar mo'i bud med des/_/'dod chags rdo rje ma bsgom bya/_/kha dog ljang khu'i bud med des/_/
[\[310a.4\]]phrag dog rdo rje ma bsgom bya/_/skyes kun rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ba/_/bud med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma/_/nag sogs kha dog dbye ba yis/_/'di rnams kun la rab tu brtag_/yang na las kyi dbye ba yis/_/dbye ba lnga ru rab tu brtag_/gnag phyir gsad dang zhe sdang la/_/
[\[310a.5\]]zhi la dkar po dag tu 'dod/_/rengs dang rgyas la ser po ste/_/dbang dang dgug la dmar po'o/_/skrod pa las ni ljang khur bshad/_/yang na rigs kyi rab dbye bas/_/bram ze dkar po dmangs rigs nag_/gtum po ser po dag la 'dod/_/dmar po gar ma dag la 
[\[310a.6\]]'dod/_/ljang khu tshos ma zhes bya'o/_/bu mo sngo bsangs mig yangs ma/_/nag po bsgom pa pos 'dod bya/_/bu mo dkar po dkar mo yis/_/bu mo ser po ser mo yis/_/bu mo dmar po dmar mo yis/_/bu mo ljang khu ljang khu yis/_/yang na gang gis de 'dzin pa/_/
[\[310a.7\]]de dang de yi bsgom pa mchog_/ji lta ba yang mi shes pas/_/sems nyid brtan pas 'dod par bya/_/phyogs tsam rab tu sbyor ba las/_/bu mo de yis dngos grub ster/_/rdo rje'i shu krar gyur pa la/_/lce yis kun nas 'jib par bya/_/ji srid 'dod pa'i bshang gci yang /_/
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]de yi kha dang b+ha gar sbyin/_/gu da pad+ma rab 'jib pas/_/boSh+Tha~M ci 'dod rab bza' bya/_/ngo tsha skyug bro byed gyur na/_/rnam pa kun du dngos grub nyams/_/'di ni rang gi bza' ba mchog_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bzas/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pur gsungs pa'i 
[\[310b.2\]]dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_lha nyid kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sngags rnams kun las btus/_/bdag gis rab tu bshad par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[310b.3\]]bzhugs nas/_sngags kun las btus pa 'di gsungs so/_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/o~M a tsa la hU~M hrA~M/_rtsa ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o/_/o~M hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'o/_/hU~M snying po'i sngags so/_/hA~M snying po'i sngags gnyis pa'o/_/
[\[310b.4\]]hriM snying po'i sngags gsum pa'o/_/o~M hrA~M hrA~M hra~M/_tsaN+Da tsa Ta tsa Ta/_pra tsa Ta pra tsa Ta/_ka ha ka ha/_pra spur pra spur/_pra s+phA ra ya pra s+phA ra ya/_ha na ha na/_gra sa gra sa/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_sarba sha trA NAM/_mu khaM ban+d+ha naM/_ku ru ku ru/_
[\[310b.5\]]sarba DA ki nI nAM gra ha b+hU ta pi shA tsabyA d+hi yak+ShA NAM/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_ma ra ma ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_ru ru tsaN+Da ru ka/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_lha sbyin la tsaN+Da ma hA se naH/_sarba mA dz+nyA pa ya ti/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_phreng ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarbA shA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/_
[\[310b.6\]]sarba thA a ca la kA Na/_naT+Ta naT+Ta/_moT+Ta moT+Ta/_saT+Ta saT+Ta/_tuT+Ta tuT+Ta/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_A bi sha A bi sha/_A ma hA mat+ta pA ra ka_d+hu na d+hu na/_ti Na ta Ni/_khA da khA da/_big+h+nAM mA ra ya mA ra ya/_duSh+TAM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/_sarbA ku ru ku ru/_ki ri ki ri/_ma hA bi Sha ma badzra phaT/_hU~M hU~M hU~M tri ba li ta raM ga na 
[\[310b.7\]]bar+t+ta ka ha~M ha~M ha~M/_a tsa la tse Ta phaT/_spA Ta ya hU~M hU~M/_sa man+ti ka trA Ta ma hA ba la sA ta ye/_sa mA na ya/_trA~M mA~M hA~M/_shud+d+haM tu lo kaHtu Sh+ya tu badzrI na mo s+t+wa pra ti ha ta pa le b+h+yaH/_dz+wA la ya trA Ta ha sa na maHswA hA/_phreng ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o/_/na maHsarbA shA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba trA T+Ta/_a mo g+ha tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya hU~M/_b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/_hU~M trA Ta mo hA~M/_phreng ba'i sngags gsum pa'o/_/zhes pa ni mi g.yo ba lnga po rnams kyi spyi'i sngags so/_/bye brag pa'i sngags ni/_o~M kr-iSh+NA tsa la hU~M phaT/_oM shwe dwa tsa la hU~M phaT/_
[\[311a.2\]]o~M pI tA tsa la hU~M phaT/_o~M rak+tA tsa la hU~M phaT/_o~M sh+yA mA tsa la hU~M phaT/_lha mo rnams kyi thun mong ba'i sngags ni/_o~M badzra yo gi ni hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pradz+nyA pA ra mi te hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o/_/o~M bau hi raM hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'o/_/
[\[311a.3\]]o~M pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la med+hA bar+d+ha ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_phreng ba'i sngags so/_/bye brag pa'i sngags ni/_oM dwe Sha badzri hU~M phaT/_oM mo ha badzri hU~M phaT/_o~M pi shun badzri hU~M phaT/_o~M rA ga badzri hU~M phaT/_o~M IR+Sh+ya badzri hU~M phaT/_gtor ma'i spyi sngags 
[\[311a.4\]]ni/_o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te shrI tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ya de wA su ra/_ma nu Sh+ya trA sa nA ya/_sa ma sta mA ra ba la/_pi nA sha nA ya/_rat+na mu ku Ta kr-i ta shi ra se i maM/_ba li gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sar+b+ba big+h+naM/_ha ra ha ra/_tsa turmA rAn+ni pA ra ya ni pA ra ya/_trA sa trA sa/_b+h+rA ma b+h+rA ma/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da 
[\[311a.5\]]nA sha nA sha/_tA pa tA pa/_sha Sha sho Sha/_ts+tshedi ts+tshed/_b+he da b+he da/_duSh+Ta satrAM/_ma ma bi ru D+d+ha tsit+ta kaM b+ha smIM ku ru ku ru/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las sngags kyi rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o/_/
[\[311a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la bcom ldan 'das kyis dam du 'khyud nas/_pad+ma dang rdo rje rab tu sbyor bas gsungs pa/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yi/_/bsgom par bya ba ci 'dra zhig_/rnal 'byor rnams la des phan phyir/_/dri ba mtha' dag 
[\[311a.7\]]bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor gnas pa'i/_/gcig sbyor de mchog rnal 'byor pa/_/nyin mtshan bdag gi tshul gyis ni/_/sems rtse gcig pas bsgom par bya/_/re zhig rang gi bud med kyang /_/
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]khyod kyi gzugs su nges par brtag_/de nyid shin tu mngon sbyor bas/_/ji lta ba bzhin gsal por bgrod/_/ma dang bu mo de nas ni/_/sring mo dang ni tsha mo dang /_/gzhan yang nye du kun dang ni/_/de bzhin Dom+bi bram ze mo/_/gtum mo dang ni gar ma dang /_/tshos ma dang ni 
[\[311b.2\]]gzugs kyis 'tsho/_/brtul zhugs can ma rnal 'byor ma/_/de bzhin thod pa can ma yang /_/gzhan yang ji ltar rnyed pa yi/_/bud med gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/_/cho ga mkhas pas bstan par bya/_/ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur bas/_/zhig na khro bo gtum po 
[\[311b.3\]]ni/_/khros yas sgrub pa po 'joms byed/_/ral gri zhags pas 'jigs byed can/_/mnar med par yang ltung bar byed/_/'jig rten 'dir yang dngos grub med/_/'jig rten pha rol kyang de bzhin/_/de phyir shin tu gsang ba yis/_/gnyis kyi spyod yul min par bya/_/khro bo 
[\[311b.4\]]gtum po'i sgrub thabs ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzhin smra/_/shin tu 'dod ldan don gyi phyir/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa/_/bar du gcod pa kun spangs pa'i/_/yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su/_/rang sems 'dod ldan ma dga' ma/_/rab tu sbas 
[\[311b.5\]]pas brtsam par bya/_/shes rab pha rol phyin dga' mas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas mi g.yor 'grub/_/rang gzugs shin tu 'bad pa yis/_/mkhas pas sems kyis bsgom par bya/_/skye bos dben byas gnas su ni/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos kyis ni/_/gnyis gnyis 
[\[311b.6\]]phan tshun sbyor ba yis/_/rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya/_/mi mo mngon sum byas nas ni/_/mngon du phyogs pas nyer 'dug ste/_/phan tshun gnyis po chags pa yis/_/rab dga' phan tshun blta bar bya/_/de las mthong ba de'i bsam gtan ni/_/yid ni rtse gcig 
[\[311b.7\]]gnas par bya/_/de yis de la de nyid brjod/_/bde ba'i gzi mdangs byed pa smra/_/de la bu khyod bdag gi bdag_/khyod ni ming po mes po dang /_/bdag ni khyod kyi chung ma ma/_/sring mo dang ni tsha mo yin/_/skye ba bdun rgyud zham ring ba/_/khyod ni bdag gi g.yog yin 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]te/_/bdag ni khyod kyis rin gyis nyos/_/bdag ni khyod kyi rje dpon ma/_/rkang pa dag gi drung btud nas/_/shin tu thal mo rab sbyar nas/_/de la 'di bzhin brjod par bya/_/bde ba'i gzi mdangs mchog byed brjod/_/khyod ni bdag gi pha dang ma/_/bdag 
[\[312a.2\]]gi chung ma tsha mo yin/_/sring mo bu yi chung ma dang /_/khyod ni bdag gi rje bo yin/_/khyod kyi bdag ni rnam kun du/_/shin tu gus pa'i dpung gnyen g.yog_/bdag la sum gyi brtse bas gzigs/_/yid 'ong lta bas nges bltas nas/_/de nas yang dang yang du ni/_/skyes 
[\[312a.3\]]bu yis ni tsum+ta bya/_/yi ge gsum ni g+ho sogs sbyin/_/kha las kha yi bdud rtsi dang /_/langs nas pad+ma bstan par bya/_/mig 'phrul kha yis 'jib byas nas/_/ku tsa snying gar btsir bar bya/_/mngon phyogs de yi gdong bltas nas/_/tsu ta'i gnas la smra bar bya/_/
[\[312a.4\]]de la blta ba'i tshig la ni/_/bdag gi rnam par snang mdzad bza'/_/khyod ni mi bskyod chu 'thungs na/_/bu dang pha dang bran pho'o/_/khyod kyi rje dpon ma nyid nga /_/rgyal rigs ma yi yum nyid kyang /_/bu khyod rab tu 'bad pa yis/_/bdag gi zhabs la skyabs su song /_/gang 
[\[312a.5\]]phyir bdag ni 'phel byed ma/_/khyod la rin chen nye bar 'ongs/_/bu khyod byas gzor gyis shig kye/_/rdo rje bde skyed bdag la byin/_/dbus su ze 'brus brgyan pa yi/_/chu skyes 'dab ma gsum par gzigs/_/a ho bde ba can gyi zhing /_/sangs rgyas sku mdog dmar 
[\[312a.6\]]pos mdzes/_/chags can zhi bde ster mdzad ma/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/bdag ni gan rkyal yang dag sbyar/_/chags pas yid ni rnam par myos/_/phrag par [(]rkad [,]rked [)]pa zung byin nas/_/bdag gi steng dang 'og tu ltos/_/de nas rdo rje rab sad pas/_/
[\[312a.7\]]pad dbus ran d+ha ra rab tu gzhug_/brgya stong 'bum dang bye ba phrag_/de nas bskyod pa nyid du gyis/_/bdag pad 'dab ma gsum ldan pa/_/sha yis rab tu gang ldan pa/_/rang gi rdo rjer de gzhug pas/_/sems nyid bde pas rab tu mchod/_/rlung dang rlung gis 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]bdag pad la/_/snying po las ni snying po mchod/_/rdo rje'i rtse mor rab tu rig_/ban+d+hu dmar po dang mtshungs pa/_/'dzag pa'i bsam gtan de la ni/_/slar yang sems nyid tshim par bya/_/shin tu mi g.yo'i sems nyid kyis/_/bde ba de skyes bsgom par bya/_/de la 
[\[312b.2\]]lan ni rab tu sbyin/_/dga' ma khyod ni skad cig sdod/_/ji srid ma lus b+ha ga'i gzugs/_/skad cig tsam zhig bsam par bya/_/de la yum gyur gcig nyid nges par 'gro ba gsum rnams zhi dang bde ba'i ma ma de/_/sdig pa'i las la gnas nyid mu cor smra ba zhe sdang ba 
[\[312b.3\]]las 'di ni smod par byed/_/de dang de rnams gting mtha' med pa'i dmyal bar de nyid mi bzad rtag tu sdug bsngal nyid/_/lus ni lan mang me yis sreg cing ngu 'bod du ni bskal ba gsum du gnas par byed/_/mi mo'i yon tan gang brjod na/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[312b.4\]]yongs su 'dzin/_/ji snyed brtse dang bsrung ba dang /_/mi mo'i sems nyid la rab gnas/_/rang gzhan skye ba de snyed kyang /_/kun kyang de la yang yang rgyas/_/dpal gyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/_/gal te de gzugs las gzhan min/_/de yi lta dang reg pa dang /_/nyed 
[\[312b.5\]]pa kun nas ring zhog gi/_/gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis kyang /_/skad cig de la bde ba 'thob/_/yul lnga rnams la mi mo yi/_/gzugs 'di nyid ni mchog tu gnas/_/de la bde ba 'bab mdzad pa/_/skyes bu rnams kyis rol bar gyis/_/de phyir nyes las nges grol 
[\[312b.6\]]ba/_/yon tan dam pa kun gyis brgyan/_/bsod nams bsod nams bsod nams che/_/yum gyis bdag la bka' drin mdzod/_/de nas de la shin tu bltas/_/mchu ni so yis bsdam par bya/_/nu ma 'gram dang si ta yog dang /_/de yi gos bral rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[312b.7\]]byed pa cing gis ni bde 'byung bya/_/do yil zhon bcing ba dang /_/pus mo bzung la de nyid bcing /_/bcing pa brla nyed pa yang yin/_/rkang pas gcod byed bcing pa yang /_/bcing pa sa la gnon par bya/_/mkhas pas mnyam bcing de nyid ni/_/bcing ba'i mo can zhes bya/_/
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]dbung ba'i drab bcing ba dang /_/'khrul 'khor der zhon rkang pa can/_/de bzhin nyid du rus sbal bcing /_/kun nas bzang po de bzhin nyid/_/de la skyil krung dbus su ni/_/mi mo tsog bu stan la 'dug_/dpung pa zung gis phrag pa la/_/de la dam du sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[313a.2\]]rang gi lag pa zung dag de'i/_/rked pa'i dbus su nyer son te/_/pad+ma ra rdo rje rab bcug nas/_/bde ba 'byung ba'i bcing par grags/_/gnyi ga'i lag zung rab bcug nas/_/phan tshun sbyor bas bcing bar bya/_/gnyi gas cung zad bskyod par bya/_/do yi'i bskyod pa zhes grags 
[\[313a.3\]]so/_/de yi pus gnyis rang gi ni/_/snying ga nyid du yang dag sbyar/_/do li bskyod pa'i byed pa dgod/_/'di ni pus mo bzung nas bcing /_/de yi rkang mthil rang nyid kyi/_/brla yi khar yang sbyar bar bya/_/bde ba 'byung byed bkod pa yis/_/'di ni brla nyed bcing pa'o/_/
[\[313a.4\]]de yi nu ma rkang pa dang /_/lte ba snying ga logs gnyis bkab/_/do li g.yo ba'i byed pa dgod/_/bcing pa 'di ni rkang pas spyod/_/de yi 'phongs gnyis sa la bzhag_/pha rol la ni 'khyud pa pos/_/bde ba 'byung byed bkod nas ni/_/bcing ba 'di ni sa la mnan/_/
[\[313a.5\]]tsog pus yang dag gnas de la/_/rkang pa gnyis po rab brkyang bya/_/bcing ba mnyam du shes byas la/_/re re zhing yang brkyang bar bya/_/de yi rkang zung 'khor lor byas/_/g.yon par rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/kun nas mngon par phyogs pas kyang /_/rgyab nas 'phongs 
[\[313a.6\]]la reg par bya/_/lag pas dang por mnye bar bya/_/bcing 'di tsi tra can zhes bya/_/slar yang bde ba 'byung byas nas/_/de lag na rkyal bskyel bar bya/_/lag pa g.yas pas de nyid du/_/pad+mar rdo rje nges gzhug bya/_/de yi pus mo'i 'og bzung nas/_/gru khugs steng du 
[\[313a.7\]]sbyar bar bya/_/phan tshun lag pa gnyis kyis ni/_/bung ba'i dra ba zhes su shes/_/de yi rkang pa zung dag ni/_/phrag pa'i steng du nges par byin/_/bcing ba 'di ni 'khrul 'khor zhon/_/'bebs shing 'bebs pas rab tu sbyor/_/de yi rkang g.yon phrag pa la/_/g.yas g.yon 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]brla yi rtsa ba las/_/de yi rkang g.yas g.yon pa las/_/g.yas pa yi ni rtsa ba ru/_/'dir ni rkang pa steng bcings pas/_/yang dag bde bas sdug bsngal 'joms/_/de yi rkang pa'i mthil la ni/_/brang gi dbus su mnyam du sbyar/_/lag pa gnyis kyis bcir 
[\[313b.2\]]par bya/_/pus mo rus sbal bcing bar gsungs/_/de yi rkang pa'i mthil la ni/_/mig dang rna ba mgo bo sbyar/_/bcing ba 'di ni kun du bzang /_/'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster/_/tsi tra ji srid skyil krung byas/_/kun nas sna tshogs pa yi ni/_/khro bo gtum po sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[313b.3\]]kun nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/ji srid 'dod pas yang nas yang /_/de yi kha la 'o bya'o/_/mig ni zim bus gdong du blta/_/ji ltar 'dod tshig smra ba yi/_/gdong la lce yis 'jib par bya/_/de yi kha nas byung ba'ang btung /_/so yi dri ma'ang za zhing 'jib/_/bde bar 
[\[313b.4\]]rnam par bsgom par bya/_/cho ga shes pas cung zad du/_/so yis lce dang mchu ni bsdam/_/lce yis sna yi bu ga dang /_/mig gi zur kyang spyang par bya/_/so dang mchan khung las byung ba'i/_/dri ma kun kyang bza' bar bya/_/mgo dang mig dang mgrin pa na/_/logs 
[\[313b.5\]]dag rked pa nu ma lag_/'os 'jib sen mo sbyin par bya/_/mig gnyis spangs la bud med la/_/lag pas nu ma mnye bya zhing /_/so yang gdab cing 'jib par bya/_/rang gis gan rkyal byas nas 'jib/_/lto ba mdzes la 'jib par bya/_/bdag gis sngon nas 
[\[313b.6\]]'di nyid ni/_/yang dang yang ni dran par bya/_/pad+mar lag pas reg par bya/_/rlung gis mdzes pa zhes smra ba/_/de la 'o dang sen mo sbyin/_/blta zhing lag pas bsal bar bya/_/mi mo'i dri ma mnam bya zhing /_/bu ga'ang ro 'dzin gyis spyad bya/_/ji lta bar ni bdag 
[\[313b.7\]]zhugs nas/_/'di yis kyang ni dang ga med bskyed/_/de la blta zhing tshig 'di brjod/_/lam 'di nyid ni drang po ste/_/de nyid mi shes sbyor ba yi/_/lam 'dis 'gro ba drug tu 'jug_/sbyor ba rab tu shes pa yis/_/khro bo gtum po'i dngos grub 'gyur/_/de phyir bad 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]byung dkar dmar ni/_/kha yis dgug par byas nas ni/_/yang dang yang ni blta byas nas/_/de ni kha yis bza' bar bya/_/sen mo legs byas brla dang ni/_/bran bzhin rkang pa mnye bar bya/_/mgo bor yi ge gsum sbyin bya/_/snying dbus khu tshur chung ngus 
[\[314a.2\]]sbyin/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mnyam bzhag pas/_/de phyir gzhan don ldan par bya/_/yid ni rtse gcig bde ba yis/_/'dod pa'i bya ba de la sbyin/_/ji ltar 'dod pa rab 'dzag pas/_/'pho med yid ni rtse gcig bde/_/'phos gyur pad+ma las 'jib ste/_/pus btsugs rab tu 
[\[314a.3\]]sbyor ba yis/_/pad+mar khu ba rdul gyur pa/_/lce yis blangs nas bza' bar bya/_/sna yis na li rab sbyor bas/_/stobs ni 'phel phyir btung bar bya/_/kha la 'o ni byas nas kyang /_/shes rab pad+ma lce yis myangs/_/'khyud byas de yi phyi nas ni/_/sha dang nya ni bza' bya zhing /_/
[\[314a.4\]]'o ma chang ni yang yang btung /_/'dod pas rab tu 'phel 'gyur phyir/_/dal dang rnyings gyur de las ni/_/phyi nas 'dod 'gyur bde sogs kyis/_/slar yang sngon ma'i rim pa yi/_/gnyis gnyis phan tshun rab tu brtsam/_/goms pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/bde ba chen po 
[\[314a.5\]]bsgrub par bya/_/skye bar 'di nyid sbyor rig na/_/khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang 'dzin/_/chags can dngos grub don gyi phyir/_/bdag gis sbyor ba rab bshad bya/_/g.yon pa'i byin pa steng bzhag nas/_/g.yas pa'i byin pa rol par bya/_/'di ni sems dpa'i skyil krung 
[\[314a.6\]]grags/_/'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster/_/byin pa g.yas pa steng bzhag nas/_/byin pa g.yon pa rol bar bya/_/'di ni pad+ma'i skyil krung grags/_/'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster/_/pad+ma'i skyil krung bcings nas ni/_/byin pa g.yon pa steng du dgod/_/byin pa 
[\[314a.7\]]g.yas pa rol pa ste/_/rdo rje'i skyil krung zhes byar shes/_/rkang pa sa la bzhag nas ni/_/mtshungs par ring du gdong phyogs pa/_/'dod kun rab tu sbyin shes bya/_/'dir ni tsog pu'i gdan la ni/_/rkang pa sa la dgod byas la/_/dkyog por 'phred la ring du bya/_/zla 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]ba phyed par shes par bya/_/'dis ni bde ba rab tu ster/_/pus bzung 'phred la sa la bzhag_/long bu'i dbus su 'phongs tshos bzhag_/'dir ni gzhu yi gdan byas pas/_/'dod pa mchog gi dga' ba ster/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung de bzhin du/_/rdo rje'i skyil 
[\[314b.2\]]krung zhes byar brtag_/tsog pu zla ba phyed pa dang /_/gzhu yi gdan yang 'dir 'dod do/_/zla ba phyed pa'i gdan gnas pa/_/rtag tu mi mo byas nas ni/_/lhung na pad+mar lce yis blang /_/gsang gnas yi ge gsum mtshon bya/_/slar yang gzhu yi gdan byas nas/_/rang 
[\[314b.3\]]gi me yi bshang nang du/_/khro bo gtum po sbyor ba yis/_/des bskyed bde ba bsgom par bya/_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas/_/de yi rnal 'byor ldan par bya/_/chags bral sems ni spang byas la/_/ma la rab tu 'dod par bya/_/rjes su chags las bsod nams 'thob/_/
[\[314b.4\]]chags bral las ni sdig pa 'thob/_/chags bral las ni sdig gzhan med/_/bde las bsod nams gzhan pa med/_/de phyir sems nyid mnyam bzhag nas/_/'dod pa'i bde ba bskyed par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rab tu dgyes nas mngon 
[\[314b.5\]]par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_/'di skad du yang gsol pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das ci ste 'dir 'di nyid mi rnams 'ba' zhig gi sgrub pa'i thabs yin nam/_gzhan rnams kyi yang yin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs 
[\[314b.6\]]kun tu rnam par gnas pas 'di la rjes su chags par bya ste/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_de rnams kyis kyang bsgrubs pas 'grub bo/_/de nyid thos nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams/_gau ri dang /_dpal mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_
[\[314b.7\]]dga' mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams blangs nas bsgom par rtsom mo/_/de nas de'i skad cig la de thams cad de'i skad cig thang cig de nyid la khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang thob nas/_sa'i steng du spyod par gyur to/_/de la dbang phyug chen po rdo rje bde byed nyid du grub bo/_/nor 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]lha rdo rje sred med kyi bu nyid do/_/lha'i dbang po phyag na rdo rje nyid do/_/'dod pa'i lha yan lag med pa'i rdo rje nyid do/_/de lta bu la sogs pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis grub bo/_/sems can don kun sgrub pa po/_/'dod 
[\[315a.2\]]pa'i yon tan lnga ldan nyid/_/'byung po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa/_/sgyu ma kun las rnam par rgyal/_/ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi/_/pad+ma 'dam gyis gos pa med/_/de ltar 'dod chags las byung ba'i/_/nyes pa rnams kyis gos pa med/_/ces pa ni dpa' 
[\[315a.3\]]bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpa' khro bo gtum po'i rgyud las rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_skye bo kun gyi 'khrig spyod pas/_/yongs su ngal ba chen por gyur/_/de yi 
[\[315a.4\]]ngal so'i gnas nyid ni/_/mgon po khyod kyis gsung bar rigs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bud med bde ba la dmigs nas/_/rang gis mngon sum dgag par bya/_/sha dang nya ni bza' bar bya/_/chang ni btung bya mnyam bzhag pas/_/gzhan 
[\[315a.5\]]yang ji ltar rnyed pa bza'/_/'o chu rak+ta la sogs bza'/_/thog mar bud med la byin nas/_/de yi lhag ma bza' bar bya/_/de yi lhag ma'i snod la ni/_/longs ni rtag tu spyad par bya/_/de yi kha bshal chu dang ni/_/pad+ma bkrus pa'ang btung bar bya/_/bshang sgo 
[\[315a.6\]]pad+ma bkrus bzung nas/_/brtul zhugs can gyis kha sogs bkru/_/de yi skyugs pa bza' bya zhing /_/de yi bzhi mnyam bza' bar bya/_/skye gnas las byung btung bar bya/_/kha chu yang ni bza' bar bya/_/ji ltar shing la lud sogs kyis/_/'bras bu lhag par 
[\[315a.7\]]'gyur ba ltar/_/de bzhin mi gtsang sogs spyod pas/_/bde ba dam pa skyes bu la/_/na dang rgas pa nyid dang ni/_/de yi lus la 'chi ba med/_/gang de'i mi gtsang sten byed pa'i/_/rnal 'byor pa yis de 'grub byed/_/gang du bza' dang bza' min dang /_/'dir 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]ni rnam rtog mi bya'o/_/sbyor rig bya dang bya min dang /_/bgrod min bgrod pa'ang de bzhin no/_/bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang med/_/mtho ris thar par brtag mi bya/_/lhan cig skyes pa gcig pu'i gzugs/_/rnal 'byor pa yis mnyam gzhag bya/_/de nyid sbyor 
[\[315b.2\]]ldan rnal 'byor pa/_/gang tshe sgom pa mchog gyur pa/_/khro bo gtum po gcig sbyor bas/_/de yi nga rgyal 'dzin pa po/_/gal te bram ze brgya bsad kyang /_/sdig pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/_/de phyir mgon po cho ga yis/_/khro bo gtum po de nyid bsgom/_/skye bo gang 
[\[315b.3\]]zhig drag po yi/_/las kyis dmyal bar 'gro byed kyang /_/de la sdig pas mi gos shing /_/mtho ris 'gro bar the tshom med/_/yid ni sngon du 'gro ba 'di/_/dge dang sdig pa kun la 'dod/_/yid dang rnam rtog rnam pa la/_/gnas la sogs pa'i dbye bar bstan/_/ji 
[\[315b.4\]]ltar sngags dang bral ba yi/_/dug zos pas ni tshe zad 'gyur/_/sngags dang de nyid shes pa yis/_/bde ba dang ni tshe 'phel byed/_/de nas skad cig de la lha mo mchog gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas gri gug dang /_thod pa'i phyag gis khro bo gtum po'i phyag rgyas/_rdo 
[\[315b.5\]]rje gtum mo khro chen mas/_/de nyid mchog la gzigs nas gsungs/_/bdag gi gzugs ni bsgom byas nas/_/nga rgyal mchog 'di byas gyur na/_/gal te tshangs 'joms de yang ni/_/sdig pa yis ni gos mi 'gyur/_/khro chen sems nyid gcig pu yis/_/
[\[315b.6\]]bdag gi gzugs ni sgom byed na/_/nya dang bya ni bsad byas kyang /_/brtse med g.yo dang khro ba dang /_/gsod pa'i don phyir sems dpa' can/_/rnal 'byor sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/_/de rnams kun la phal cher ni/_/mthu che bar ni rab tu bstan/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo 
[\[315b.7\]]gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_lus kyi bde ba'i rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma la dkyil 'khor lnga yis phyag btsal nas gsol pa/_dga' 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ma khyod gzugs rnal 'byor pas/_/ji lta bur na shes par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das mar gus bya ba/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gang la bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa/_nga ni 'jig rten gsum po na/_/mtho dang dma' ba'i gzugs gyur pa/_/bud 
[\[316a.2\]]med gzugs de la ni 'dod/_/ji srid 'jig rten gyis mi mthong /_/lha mo lha min mo dang ni/_/de bzhin gnod sbyin srin mo dang /_/klu mo 'byung mo mi ci mo/_/de bzhin mi yi bu mo dang /_/dri za mo dang dmyal ba mo/_/dud 'gro'i bu mo [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo/_/tshangs ma rgyal rigs rje 
[\[316a.3\]]rigs mo/_/dmangs rigs mo ste shin tu mang /_/yig mkhan ma dang rgyal mo dang /_/gtso mo ka la ut+ti ni/_/chod mo skyed mos tshal mo dang /_/smad 'tshong ma dang tshos mkhan ma/_/ko lpags snod mkhan sha ba ri/_/hA Di Dosbi tsaN+Da lI/_/khrus ma chang ma la du mkhan/_/lcags 
[\[316a.4\]]mgar 'dreg mkhan gar ma dang /_/khar ba mo dang gser mgar ma/_/nya pa mo dang shan pa mo/_/srub ma mkhan dang me tog ma/_/thod pa can ma dung mkhan ma/_/gdugs mkhan ma dang khang mkhan ma/_/ba lang song dang mda' mkhan ma/_/phru klog rdo mkhan ma dang ni/_/
[\[316a.5\]]shing mkhan rgyan cha mkhan mo dang /_/rigs rnams kun la rab tu 'jug_/ma dang sring mo chung ma dang /_/a ne dang ni tsha mo dang /_/kha T+Ti ka dang sgyug mo dang /_/gzhan yang gnyen 'dab ma kun dang /_/brtul zhugs can dang rnal 'byor ma/_/yugs sa mo dang dka' thub ma/_/
[\[316a.6\]]zhes sogs mang po kun la ni/_/nga ni bud med gzugs gyur nas/_/sems can kun gyi don phyir gnas/_/rang rang tshul du nges pa yis/_/de rnams ji ltar rnyed pa nyid/_/'o dad 'khyud pa la sogs kyis/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsten 
[\[316a.7\]]par bya/_/sems can kun la phan 'dod pas/_/mi mo bsten pas dngos grub po/_/skad cig tsam gyis ster byed pa/_/de phyir bud med bsten par bya/_/bud med mtho ris bud med chos/_/bud med de nyid dka' thub mchog_/sangs rgyas bud med dge 'dun nyid/_/bud 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]med shes rab phar phyin nyid/_/kha dog rnam lnga'i rab dbye bas/_/so sor brtag par 'dod pa yin/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog sngo/_/zhe sdang rdo rje ma ru grags/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar/_/gti mug rdo rje mar 'dod do/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog ser/_/lha mo phra ma 
[\[316b.2\]]rdo rje ma/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/_/'dod chags rdo rje ma ru grags/_/bud med gang zhig kha dog ljang /_/phrag dog rdo rje ma zhes grags/_/bcom ldan shes rab phar phyin ma/_/gcig nyid lnga yi tshul gyis gnas/_/chang dang bza' ba me tog sogs/_/
[\[316b.3\]]rnams mchod lus la gos kyis mdzes/_/yang dag smra bar 'dud byas nas/_/thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te/_/blta dang reg pa nyid dang ni/_/dran pa yis ni smra bar bya/_/rtag tu 'o dang lag pas 'khyud/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/_/lus kyis nus pa rnams byas 
[\[316b.4\]]nas/_/mi nus pa rnams ngag yid kyis/_/mchod pas brnyes des bdag la ni/_/dngos grub thams cad stsol bar byed/_/bud med kun gyi lus spangs nas/_/bdag ni gzhan du gyur pa med/_/sna tshogs spangs nas bud med mchod/_/'di ni bdag la rab mchod
