[\[316b.5\]]'gyur/_/'di yis bdag la bsnyen bkur nas/_/sgrub pa po mnyes dngos grub mchog_/de yis mthong ba'i lam zhugs nas/_/rnam kun rtag tu kun nas ster/_/ma lus gzugs kyis bdag bsgoms nas/_/rang gi bud med 'dod bsten bya/_/rdo rje pad+mo mnyam 
[\[316b.6\]]sbyor bas/_/bdag la byang chub steng ba mo/_/de phyir rnam pa kun gyi ni/_/bdag la gus pas mchog tu de/_/'di yis de nyid rab sbyor bas/_/brtul zhugs can gyis rab gus bya/_/dmyal ba la sogs ngan 'gro yi/_/sdig pa yis kyang 'jigs mi bya/_/'jig rten 
[\[316b.7\]]sdig pas 'jigs gyur na/_/ji srid nus pa thob mi 'gyur/_/sdig pa cung zad yod min zhing /_/bsod nams cung zad yod min phyir/_/sems nyid mi srung 'jig rten gang /_/sdig dang bsod nams rnam par gnas/_/gang du sems nyid tsam gyis ni/_/thams 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]cad skad cig tsam de gnas/_/dmyal bar 'gro ba 'dir gang gis/_/gang gis 'dir ni mtho ris 'gro/_/gang gis dug btags mthu yis 'chi/_/ji lta ba la de nyid med/_/dug gi mthu yis yang dag brgyal/_/de bzhin mtho ris ngan 'gror 'gro/_/
[\[317a.2\]]de nyid yongs su shes gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/myang 'das stong pa'i tshul nyid du/_/mar me rlung gis ji bzhin du/_/nyer chad ltung ba de yang ni/_/byang chub go 'phang ma yin no/_/de phyir thams cad yongs spangs nas/_/bdag nyid gus bya 
[\[317a.3\]]brtul zhugs can/_/skad cig tsam gyis gtum po yi/_/dngos grub ster bar the tshom med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la gsol pa/_ji lta bu yi rnam pa yis/_/gtum mo'i dngos grub ci 'dra zhig_/de 
[\[317a.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa/_kha dog lnga yi rab dbye bas/_/rnal 'byor ma ru rab grags gang /_/de yang rang rang bdag po yi/_/kha dog lnga yi rab dbye las/_/gtum po kun gyi de nyid 'dis/_/bdag ni rnal 'byor ma ru shar/_/kha dog sngon po gang de 
[\[317a.5\]]yang /_/bdag po mi g.yo sngon por shes/_/kha dog dkar po'i bdag po gang /_/mi g.yo dkar po zhes bya'o/_/kha dog ser po'i bdag po gang /_/mi g.yo ser po yang dag grags/_/kha dog dmar po'i bdag po gang /_/mi g.yo dmar po zhes grags so/_/kha dog ljang 
[\[317a.6\]]gu'i bdag po gang /_/mi g.yo ljang gu zhes bya'o/_/gtum po de nyid gcig pu nyid/_/rnam pa lnga yi tshul gyis gnas/_/'di yi dngos grub brtan pa nyid/_/de ni gtum por yang dag bshad/_/nam mkha'i mthar thug ji snyed pa/_/lha mo'i gzugs kyis yang dag 
[\[317a.7\]]gnas/_/gtum po'i dngos grub ji bzhin gsungs/_/de bzhin du ni gtum mo 'grub/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po'i rgyud las/_ngo bo nyid kyi rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab dag gi nga rgyal ji ltar bsgom par bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mi mo mngon byas rnal 'byor pas/_/phan tshun de yi lta ba mchog_/lus ni drang por mnyam gnas nas/_/rtse gcig yid kyis bsam 
[\[317b.2\]]gtan bya/_/sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin phyir/_/tha dad med pa'i yid kyis so/_/slar yang byang chub dbyer med pas/_/thabs dang shes rab nyid du 'dod/_/'chi ba nyid ni chos su brjod/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa bar srid dang /_/'gro ba drug gzugs sprul pa dang /_/'dod 
[\[317b.3\]]pa'i longs spyod bde chen po/_/sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin 'di/_/skyes bu la ni khams gsum pa/_/sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin phyir/_/bud med gzugs la khams gsum mo/_/sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin las/_/skyes bu 'dir ni sangs rgyas yin/_/bud med shes rab phar phyin 
[\[317b.4\]]mar/_/phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gnas/_/de nyid nga rgyal byas pa yis/_/slar yang bdag la dngos grub bo/_/khro bo gtum po'i tshul nyid du/_/rang nyid gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/_/'dod chags gtum mo'i gzugs bsgoms na/_/bdag la dngos grub 
[\[317b.5\]]rnam kun du/_/de nyid gsum rig dus ring du/_/'di ni gus pa dang bcas bsgom/_/las kun yongs su spang byas nas/_/bla ma bsten pa de nyid mchog_/ji srid dngos grub ma thob par/_/bde ba'i sems nyid gcig pus gnas/_/gang tshe rnal 'byor dngos grub thob/_/
[\[317b.6\]]sdig pa dang bral dri med 'gyur/_/rlung dang sems kyi 'dzum mdangs ni/_/'jig rten pa yis mthong ba med/_/kun mkhyen kun la khyab pa'o/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam par 'das/_/de la nad dang rgas pa med/_/de la 'chi ba yod min te/_/de la dug gis 'da' ba med/_/
[\[317b.7\]]chus min mes kyang 'tshig pa med/_/mtshon gyis ma yin dgra yi ni/_/dbang du nam yang 'gro ba min/_/yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis ni/_/dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skad cig de la 'bad med par/_/yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs 'gyur/_/
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/gang dang gang du de bzhin gshegs/_/de ni gzhal yas mkha' 'gro ste/_/der ni 'dod kun de rnams kyis/_/gzugs dang lang tshos rab brgyan pa'i/_/lha yi bu mo dga' mas der/_/ji snyed mtho ris skar 
[\[318a.2\]]ma rnams/_/the tshom med pa nyid du 'gyur/_/tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug gang /_/brgya byin yan lag med sogs gang /_/mngag gzhug 'gyur zhing 'gro drug tu/_/gnas pa'i srog chags kun kyang ngo /_/rnal 'byor dngos grub ji lta bzhin/_/de bzhin 
[\[318a.3\]]rnal 'byor mas kyang ngo /_/skyes bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ltar/_/bud med rdo rje btsun mo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus 'di la thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba las bde ba chen po ji ltar skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[318a.4\]]stsal pa/_/[{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]shes rab rang bzhin te/_/g.yon pa'i rtsa ru rab tu grags/_/ro ma thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/g.yas pa la ni yang dag gnas/_/[{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]ro ma'i dbus dag la/_/kun 'dar mar ni rab tu gsungs/_/gang tshe a ba d+hu tIr rlung /_/khu ba dang 
[\[318a.5\]]ni ro gcig gyur/_/rdo rjes mgo bo'i mtshams su 'gro/_/bud med b+ha ga'i ran+ta la/_/thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/_/lte bar gnas pa'i tsaN+Da li/_/mar me ltar 'bar de yis ni/_/zhu ba'i khu ba mchog la ni/_/de las skyes pa'i bde ba la/_/cung 
[\[318a.6\]]zad cung zad rab sbyor las/_/de yang chen po cher sbyor las/_/de yang dngos po'i rang bzhin las/_/gang gis de yi bde ba 'phel/_/rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las/_/de ni skye ba 'di nyid la/_/dpal ldan gtum po nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig 
[\[318a.7\]]pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po'i rgyud las/_bsam gtan gyi rim par phye pa ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_ci ste bcom ldan sgrub pa pos/_/khro chen gtum po'i go 'phang ni/_/bud med dang bral 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]bsgrub nus sam/_/'on te bsgrub par nus ma yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir na bde ba ster ba med par mi nus/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[318b.2\]]stsal pa/_e ma bde ba skyes tsam gyis/_/byang chub mchog ni thob byed pa'i/_/bde ba khyad 'phags 'byung ba las/_/de nyid 'thob kyis de gzhin min/_/de med de yi bya ba yang /_/de nyid med par skye ma yin/_/byed po bud med dang sbyor las/_/gzhan du nam yang ma 
[\[318b.3\]]yin no/_/sgyu ma'i de nyid thams cad la/_/bud med sgyu ma'i de nyid bsngags/_/de yi de nyid las 'das gang /_/de las dngos grub lhag 'byung med/_/de phyir bud med dang bral 'di/_/nam yang bya ba ma yin no/_/de nyid gal te sdug bsngal gyur/_/'chi dang 'ching ba'i 
[\[318b.4\]]'jigs pa yang /_/de rnams thams cad bzod bya yis/_/'dir ni bud med spang mi bya/_/gang phyir bud med bde de nyid/_/kun nas sangs rgyas ster ba bo/_/g.yo dang spobs can mtsher ngo bral/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i dpung gnyen no/_/dngos grub ster ba 'di nyid ni/_/dngos po 
[\[318b.5\]]kun gyis bsten par bya/_/bud med tshul ni gcig brjod pa/_/dga' ba'i phyir ni 'chi ba'ang med/_/bdag po dang ni bral gyur na/_/'dod pa mchog ni ci zhig smra/_/de phyir kun gyis bud med lhar/_/rnam pa kun du rab tu brtag_/shing dang rdo la sogs rnams kyang /_/yid 
[\[318b.6\]]kyis yongs su brtag par bya/_/skyes ba bud med lha mo dang /_/bud med kyi ni skyes pa lha/_/rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/_/phan tshun du ni mchod par bya/_/mchod par bya ba gzhan du min/_/rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa'ang de/_/de phyir rnal 'byor brtse ldan pas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[318b.7\]]mdun du byas nas ni/_/de la nyer zhugs bud med ni/_/shes rab phar phyin rnam pa la/_/rtag tu me tog gis mchod cing /_/de bzhin spos dang mar me sogs/_/dkyil 'khor lnga ni rab sbyor bas/_/phyi nas phyag ni btsal bar bya/_/de nas g.yas su bskor ba bya/_/gtum 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]mo la ni mchod par bya/_/gus pa dang bcas sems kyis ni/_/de bzhin skyes bus bud med mchod/_/de nyid mchod pa'i cho ga ni/_/rgyal bas phan tshun bya bar gsungs/_/bud med smad par yong mi bya/_/de nyid 'dod pa'ang spang mi bya/_/snyan pa'i tshig 
[\[319a.2\]]gis smra bya zhing /_/rjes su mthun par sbyin par bya/_/dngos po kun gyis phyag byas te/_/ji bzhin gdug can shes mi bya/_/gang du'ang bud med mi spong ba/_/'di ni sangs rgyas gsung du thos/_/gang du khyod kyis gzhan byas nas/_/de yi sdig pas dmyal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[319a.3\]]bud med dang bral ci byas kyang /_/gzhan du 'chi 'gyur dngos grub min/_/khro bo gtum po'i sgrub thabs ni/_/dka' thub kyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/yid ni dri med ma byas par/_/'bras med gti mug dra bas bcings/_/'dod ldan 'dod pa spong byed pa/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis 'tsho ba skye 
[\[319a.4\]]'gyur te/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis gang 'tsho sdig pa ste/_/sdig pas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus ni thob pa na/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis 'tsho bar the tshom med/_/de phyir bsgrub bya bsgrub par bya/_/rgyal ba'i bdag nyid 'dod pas so/_/'dod yon lnga po de spangs nas/_/bdag nyid dka' 
[\[319a.5\]]thub gdung mi bya/_/gzugs rnyed pa ni blta bya zhing /_/sgra yang de bzhin mnyan par bya/_/dri ni man ma par bya ba ste/_/ro yi mchog ni bza' bar bya/_/reg bya reg par bya ba ste/_/'dod pa lnga po bsten par bya/_/khro bo gtum po de mchog ni/_/myur du sangs rgyas 
[\[319a.6\]]mchog 'gyur ro/_/gzhan la slu ba med gyur cing /_/gti mug mchog tu med par bya/_/mi yi lang tsho thob pa la/_/mi mo'i bde ba mi spyod na/_/chen po mchog tu zad byas na/_/lta ba'ang 'bras bu med par byas/_/'dod can ma rtag bsten byas na/_/'dod pa tsam gyi dpung gnyen 
[\[319a.7\]]gyis/_/btsun mo'i skye gnas yang dag bsten/_/khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang mthong /_/gnyid ni ji ltar spang bar bya/_/bza' ba dang ni dgod pa nyid/_/'jig rten ma dad spang ba'i phyir/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras mkhas pas/_/pho brang 'khor gyi btsun mo ni/_/stong phrag 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]brgyad khri spangs nas slar/_/na ra ny+dza na'i 'gram gshegs nas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub rab gsungs dang /_/gang du bdud ni 'dul mdzad pa/_/de nyid gzhan don kho na yin/_/gang phyir btsun mo'i nang sangs rgyas/_/go pa dang bcas bde ldan grub/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam 
[\[319b.2\]]sbyor bas/_/gang phyir bde ba las thob bo/_/bde ba las thob sangs rgyas ni/_/bde ba bud med dang bral min/_/gang du sbyor bral bya ba ni/_/'jig rten nyams pa spang phyir ro/_/'jig rten gang gis 'dul ba na/_/de dang de yi sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sgyu ma'i gar 
[\[319b.3\]]nyid kyis/_/de dang de nyid tshul gyis so/_/mdo sde chos mngon thams cad nas/_/bud med rnams ni smod mdzad pa/_/sna tshogs slob ma'i snod phyir bshad/_/de kho na nyid sbas nas gsungs/_/phung po lnga dang rnam bral ba'i/_/mya ngan 'das pa blta bar bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[319b.4\]]'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi sras gang lags/_/go pA yang gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo sgyu 'phrus sras nyid kyang /_/khro bo gtum po bdag nyid yin/_/sa 'tsho khyod nyid bcom 
[\[319b.5\]]ldan 'das/_/shes rab phar phyin bdag nyid ma/_/ji snyed pa yi bud med kun/_/khyod kyi tshig nyid 'dir 'dod do/_/skyes bu bdag gi gzugs de nyid/_/de bzhin kun tu yongs su grags/_/'di ni rang bzhin gnyis yin te/_/'gro ba thabs shes bdag nyid do/_/de nas 
[\[319b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa rnams bud med sun 'byin par byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams gnas pa'i/_/nyan thos la sogs grags kun gyis/_/bud med la ltos kun 
[\[319b.7\]]ster ba'i/_/thar pa'i lam ni mi shes so/_/gang na nye bar gnas gyur pa'i/_/gur gum la sogs rnyed sla na/_/de la rin ni thob mi 'gyur/_/gang du rin nas rin chen nyid/_/thog med mi shes sbyor ba yis/_/dad pa dman pa'i skye bo 'di/_/de nyid la ni sems mi 'jug_
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]bdag gi'ang 'di ni rab tu sbas/_/rtsod pa'i dus la de nyid 'di/_/sems can re rer bgrangs pa yi/_/bye ba'i nang na 'ga' zhig kyang /_/dad dang brtson pa'i dpung gnyen can/_/kun nas de phyir gsungs pa ni/_/byang chub myur du rab bsgrub phyir/_/zhes 
[\[320a.2\]]pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las mi mo rab tu bsngags pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyod ci ste chags pa dang bcas pa'am/_chags pa dang 
[\[320a.3\]]bral ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bdag ni kun te kun la'ang khyab/_/kun byed kun gyi 'jig pa po/_/kun gyi gzugs 'dzin sangs rgyas te/_/byed po 'joms po khyab bdag bde/_/gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni/_/sems can 'dul byar 'di 
[\[320a.4\]]nyid 'jug_/de dang de nyid tshul gyis ni/_/'jig rten don rgyur bdag gnas so/_/'ga' zhig sangs rgyas grub thob 'ga'/_/la lar chos dang dge 'dun no/_/la lar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la lar phyugs/_/la lar dmyal ba'i gzugs can no/_/la lar lha dang lha ma yin/_/
[\[320a.5\]]la lar mi yi gzugs can no/_/la lar brtan pa'i gzugs can dang /_/sna tshogs gzugs can the tshom med/_/bdag ni skyes pa bud med dang /_/ma ning gzugs su'ang la lar ro/_/la lar chags can la lar sdang /_/la lar rmongs shing la lar gtsang /_/la lar mi_
[\[320a.6\]]gtsang gzugs su nga /_/sems kyi gzugs kyis bdag gnas so/_/bdag ni sems su blta bar bya/_/gzhan du cung zad yod yin te/_/dngos po dngos med rab dbye nga /_/nga ni bskyed bya skyed byed pa/_/bdag ni bgegs dang grub pa nga /_/kun gyi gzugs kyis yang 
[\[320a.7\]]dag gnas/_/nga ni skye dang 'chi ba'ang nga /_/nga ni nad dang rgas pa'ang nga /_/nga ni bsod nams sdig pa'ang nga /_/de yi las kyi 'bras nyid nga /_/'gro kun rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid/_/kun du bdag gi gzugs nyid 'di/_/rnal 'byor de nyid sems dpa' bos/_/
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]ro mnyam rnam par shes par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci ste khyod kyi gzugs nyid 'di lta bu yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar khyod kyi gzugs nyid kyang /_/rnam pa de ltar kun nas gsungs/_/
[\[320b.2\]]brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro kun la/_/'dir ni khyod kyis khyab pa po/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las sna tshogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol 
[\[320b.3\]]pa/_sngags rnams kyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs/_/zhi dang rgyas pa de nyid gsungs/_/dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor dang /_/gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang /_/dug sel ba dang nad zhi dang /_/me dang ral gri sogs rengs dang /_/g.yul du rnam par rgyal ba dang /_/mkhas 
[\[320b.4\]]pa yi ni mchog nyid dang /_/gnod sbyin mo sgrub bran dang ni/_/pho nya 'byung sogs sgrub thabs dang /_/dpag med rnam shes nus pa rnams/_/bdag la nges par gtso bos gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kyai khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/_/
[\[320b.5\]]zhes pa dang sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas nyid stsol cig ces so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i lus la rab tu zhugs so/_/rab tu zhugs pa tsam gyis/_lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can/_mngon par shes pa drug pa/_sa bcu gsum gyi dbang phyug_/lha'i 
[\[320b.6\]]gzhal yas khang na spyod pa can gyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs brgya stong gis brgyan pa/_'dod pa'i gzugs can thams cad mkhyen pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/_/yang na ral gri dang /_mig sman dang /_ril bu dang /_rkang mgyogs dang /_rkang pa'i byug pa dang /_
[\[320b.7\]]rgyal srid dang /_'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang /_rig pa dang /_nor can dang /_rig pa la mkhas pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_bcud len dang /_reg rdo dang /_khams smra ba ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin zhu bar bya ste/_de thams cad bcom ldan 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]'das kyis ster bar byed do/_/yang na dpa' bo gcig pa'i ras ris bris la sngon ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/de la dpa' bo gcig pa'i ri mo ni mi g.yo ba nag po la zhe sdang rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o/_/mi g.yo ba dkar po la gti mug rdo rje mas so/_/mi g.yo 
[\[321a.2\]]ba ser po la phra ma rdo rje mas so/_/mi g.yo ba dmar po la 'dod chags rdo rje mas so/_/mi g.yo ba ljang gu la phrag dog rdo rje mas 'khyud pa bri bar bya'o/_/yang na shes rab dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das gcig pu bri bar bya'o/_/yang na ri mo la bcom ldan 'das ma lnga po 
[\[321a.3\]]rnams kyi dbus na gcig tu byas la/_der bdag nyid de'i bdag po'i gzugs su bsams nas sngon bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/yang na rang gi bud med lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/grub par gyur na/_sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster bar byed na dngos grub 
[\[321a.4\]]gzhan smos ci dgos/_yang na zhabs g.yon brkyang ba ral gri dang zhags pa bsnams pas bsgrub par bya'o/_/yang na sems dpa'i skyil krung can/_ral gri dang zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa/_rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la rol pas bsgrub par bya ste/_lhan cig pa'i khro 
[\[321a.5\]]bo gtum po chen pos sngon bzhin du 'grub bo/_/'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi ri mo'i dngos grub bo/_/yang na sku gzugs kyi sgrub thabs kyis kyang 'di nyid bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas ral gri'i sgrub thabs ni yid kyis de'i tshe me tog dzA ti dang /_lcags kyi rang bzhin dang /_
[\[321a.6\]]shing gi snying po'i rang bzhin las sam/_ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa byas nas ba'i rnam pa lngas rab tu bkrus te/_dri thams cad kyis byugs nas yang dag par brtsams te/_sngon bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyis yongs su bzung nas/_thun mtshams gsum dang zla ba gcig tu 
[\[321a.7\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/zla ba'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo ril po bzlas pa bya'o/_/tho rangs ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te/_ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can skra 'khyil pa 'di ni/_snying po 'dod yon lngas rnam par rol par byed 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]do/_/de bzhin du 'khor lo dang rtse gsum la sogs pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du zangs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhags pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bum pa dang /_mchil lha ma dang /_mchod phyir thogs dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_shes rab 
[\[321b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i po ti dang /_rgyud kyi po ti la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rnga bo che dang /_pi wang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gser gyi rang bzhin las/_gnod sbyin dzam+b+ha la dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po 
[\[321b.3\]]dang /_pi ci kuN+Da li la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa sgrub par byed do/_/de bzhin du smyug ma'i rang bzhin las dri bzang bsgrub par bya'o/_/grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin las nam mkha' lding ngo /_/thang shing gi rang bzhin las lha rnams te/_tshangs 
[\[321b.4\]]pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dbang po dang /_'dod lha la sogs pa rnams so/_/dur khrod kyi sol bas srin po bri bar bya'o/_/ga Da'i nya tshig pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bri bar bya'o/_/spra tshil gyis mi'o/_/glang po che'i rang bzhin las tshogs bdag go/_/
[\[321b.5\]]shA kho Ta'i shing gi rang bzhin las pI lu ba lA sha la sogs pa'i sha za'o/_/pra pA la'i nya las gau rI tsau rI la sogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin las rA ma de ba dang /_'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa'i ro langs so/_/nA ga ge sar gyi shing gi rang bzhin 
[\[321b.6\]]las nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu dang /_klu mo rnams so/_/mya ngan med pa'i shing gi rang bzhin las 'phrog ma dang /_lha mo sun+da ri dang /_gar ma dang /_dga' ma dang /_yid 'ong ma dang /_sh+ya ma nu Di dang /_pad+ma can dang /_rjes su chags ma dang /_zla 'od ma dang /_tshangs 
[\[321b.7\]]pa'i bu mo dang /_'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /_mi'i bu mo dang /_re ba tI dang /_lha byed ma dang /_na ra d+hi ra la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/n+ya grod+ha'i shing gi rang bzhin las dpal lha mo dang /_rgyal po'o/_/thang shing gi rang bzhin las/_til 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]mchog ma dang /_zla ba'i lha mo dang /_gser phreng ma dang /_kuN+Da la ha rI Ni dang /_rin chen phreng pa ma dang /_ram b+hA dang /_ur bA shI dang /_dpal gyis brgyan mdang /_dga' ma dang /_dbang mo la sogs pa ste lha'i bu mo'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o/_/de 
[\[322a.2\]]bzhin du nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_lhag pa dang /_lha'i bla ma dang /_pha bsangs dang /_spen pa dang /_sgra gcan dang /_du ba dang /_gza' dgu'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[322a.3\]]rnams so/_/de bzhin du rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can te sangs rgyas rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnams so/_/de bzhin du gshin rje la sogs pa 'phags pa'i pho nya rnams so/_/de bzhin du kaM ka la 
[\[322a.4\]]sogs pa'i bran rnams so/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi pho mo rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/thams cad bka' sgrub pa byed pa por 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan cig gis grub par ma gyur na/_de la lan gnyis pa yang bya'o/_/de'i tshe yang ma grub na lan gsum pa yang 
[\[322a.5\]]brtsam par bya'o/_/de ltar na yang mi dge ba chen po'i dbang gis gal te ma grub na/_de'i tshe sngon bzhin du pus mo g.yon pa'i khar rkang pa g.yas pas kyang mnan nas/_ji srid ma grub pa de srid bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa 'joms pa pos kyang 'grub bo/_/de la 
[\[322a.6\]]'dir khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi sngags kyi nang du byas nas/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hU~M phaT/_ral gri la sogs pa bsgrub na che ge mo sgrubs shig ces sbyar bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe mnan nas/_che ge mo la ha na ha na zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar lan 
[\[322a.7\]]cig brjod pas mtshams med pa lnga po byed pas kyang thams cad sreg par byed do/_/sarba pA paM mi nA sha ya ti zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'jigs pa thams cad la brjod pa tsam gyis srung bar byed do/_/rak+Sha rak+Sha ti zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de lta bus thams cad srin po 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]rnams sreg par byed do/_/de nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa'i lcags su bsams nas/_yungs kar dang sran ma mud gang dang /_mA Sha la brgya rtsa brgyad rang gi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la brab par bya'o/_/thams cad 'bros par byed do/_/
[\[322b.2\]]brab pa'i dus suDA ki n+yA di ka ma pa sA ra ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang na thod lo kor gyis kham phor so ma btang ba gnyis la/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du sngags bris nas kha sbyar te/_nya rgyas dkris nas sgo la bcang bar bya'o/_/byis pa rnams kyi srung bar byed do/_/rak+Sha rak+Sha 
[\[322b.3\]]pA la kaM zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/spra tshil las bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa byas te/_gro ga la sngags mngon par bris nas de'i snying gar ske tshe la sogs pa rab tu gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas tsher mas kha la phur bus gdab par bya'o/_/phyir rgol ba'i kha la phur bus 
[\[322b.4\]]btab par 'gyur ro/_/lha sbyin gyi mu khaM kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos nas de bzhin du rkang pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed do/_/lha sbyin gyi rkang pa la kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/snying la phur bus btab na khros 
[\[322b.5\]]pa rengs par 'gyur ro/_/lha sbyin gyi hr-i da yaM kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/mi'i rus pa'i phur bu'am lcags kyi phur bu'am/_mtshon sbal gyi tsher mas 'ga' zhig gi yan lag la phur bus btab na de dang de'i phur bus btab pa de zug rngu chen por 'gyur ro/_/lha sbyin gyi yan 
[\[322b.6\]]lag che ge mo la kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/gang gis khang pa'i sgo ru brkos nas sbas na de skrod par byed do/_/lha sbyin bskrad par gyis shig ces sbyar bar bya'o/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon par bsngags nas sgo glegs la gtor na skrod par byed do/_/lha sbyin uts+tsha Ta ya 
[\[322b.7\]]zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/gzugs brnyan la tsher mas btab nas bzlas par bya'o/_/lha sbyin mA ra ya/_zhes sbyar na 'chi bar byed do/_/ral gri la sogs pa la rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas g.yul du 'jug par byas na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gang bya 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]ba'i phyogs su gtor ma byin pas de 'grub po/_/sdig pa'i nad la sogs pa la rma bya'i sgro la rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bya ba bar bya'o/_/che ge mo'i che ge ro ga nA sha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[323a.2\]]bzhin du mche ba'i dug la sbyar bar bya ste/_lag pa'i mthil gnyis su'o/_/lha sbyin gyi bi Sha nA sha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/dug med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang gi dbang du bya ba la ni rang gi gnas nas 'ongs te gcer bu skra grol ba mdun du bsams te 'gyel bar bltas 
[\[323a.3\]]nas bzlas pas dbang du 'gyur ro/_/che ge mo bdag gi ba sha mA na ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sngon ma bzhin du dgug par bsams nas bzlas pas 'gugs par byed do/_/che ge mo A kar+Sha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyi nor dang 'bru dang gter la sogs pa yongs su 
[\[323a.4\]]gang bar bsams nas bzlas par bya'o/_/bdag la puSh+TiM ku ru zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'dis gru gsum gnyis kha sbyar te/_dbus su go la'i 'dab ma la tsher mas bris te/_/pho ba ris lnga dang bcas pa'i go la zos nas/_rims thams cad 'joms 
[\[323a.5\]]par byed do/_/sarba dz+wa ra~M nA sha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/zla ba gzas bzung ba'am/_nyi ma gzas bzung ba la/_'o ma'i zan nam zho'i zan gyis lhung bzed bkang nas/_kar dang mar dang bcas pa/_a shwad tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas/_lo ma bdun gyis steng nas 
[\[323a.6\]]g.yogs te/_lag pa gnyis kyis brten nas/_ji srid ma grol gyi bar de srid bzlas par bya'o/_/de zos pas lo lnga brgya thub bo/_/rim pa 'di nyid kyis ba bla 'am/_gi wang ngam/_ldong ros sam/_slang dreg la bsgrub par bya'o/_/'bar bar gyur na thig le 'am/_/mig sman 
[\[323a.7\]]gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/du ba byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur na dbang du byed do/_/yang na nA ga ge sar gyi shing gi rang bzhin la klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas bya'o/_/de chu'i nang du kha thur du bstan nas/_gdong nam mkhar bltas nas bzlas pa bya'o/_/ha na ha na a 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]nan+ta~M shi g+h+ra~M paR+Sha pa ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha yis char 'bebs so/_/de nas mtha' yas chu nas bton te/_'o ma yis khrus byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas sprin la rnam par bltas nas bzlas par bya'o/_/char rengs par 'gyur ro/_/sarba bA ta pr-iSh+Ti stam+b+ha 
[\[323b.2\]]ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhes pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i yi ge bcu'i sngags so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags dag gi cho ga dang /_snying po'i sngags kyi yang cho ga 'di nyid do/_/dang por phreng ba'i sngags ke ta ki'i lo ma la tsher mas bris nas/_gos 
[\[323b.3\]]sngon po dang skud pa dag gis dkris nas mgo bo'am/_dpung pa'am/_mgul pa'i rgyab bam/_g.yon par bcing bar bya'o/_/kro d+ha tse taM sAM che ge mo dzra ra~M nA sha ya zhes pa 'di byas pas rims thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/'ching ba'i dus su nad pa gdong shar du phyogs 
[\[323b.4\]]par byas nas/_nya bsregs pa dang zan dang chang la sogs pas gang ba'i kham phor gyis sbyangs nas/_'di zol rims la sogs pa thams cad myur du phyir dengs shig_/bcom ldan 'das khro bo gtum po chen po'i bka' 'di nyid kyis song shig_/gal te na yang gzhan du 
[\[323b.5\]]mi 'gro na/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtum po khros pa'i ral gris til gyi tshad tsam du gtub par bya'o zhes brjod nas/_bden bral gyi mtshams su gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nad dang mkha' 'gro ma dang /_bar du gcod pa thams cad la gtor 
[\[323b.6\]]ma sbyin par bya'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad la bklags pa tsam gyis srung bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas thams cad byed do/_/phreng ba'i sngags gnyis pa la yang cho ga 'di nyid do/_/phreng ba'i sngags gsum pas lhag ma'i chad pu la mngon par bsngags 
[\[323b.7\]]nas sbyin par bya'o/_/mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/_/zan gyi phung po la mngon par bsngags nas/_phyi dro'i dus su dben pa'i phyogs su sbyin par bya'o/_/bya ba gang gi phyogs la des thams cad 'grub bo/_/cho ga lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/_/cho ga sngon ma bzhin du 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid nya gang ba'i bar sngon bzhin du bya'o/_/phreng ba'i sngags rnams kyi stong phrag bcus sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/_/lha rnams kyi bye brag gi sngags rnams rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 
[\[324a.2\]]kyis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi'o/_/khyad par du phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pas/_snyan dang gas mkhan dang paN+Di ta nyid du myur du 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba'i sngags gsum pa'i cho ga'o/_/mal gyi steng du lag pa g.yon pas ling ga bzung nas brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[324a.3\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/gang gi ming gang yin pa de 'ong bar byed de 'dod par bya'o/_/sngags ni/_o~M bau ha ri che ge mo me A yA tu hU~M phaT/_btsag gis b+ha ga la kun nas byugs nas/_sa la lag pa g.yon pas brten nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/gang gi ming yin pa de 
[\[324a.4\]]'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags nas skyes bu la bsnun par bya'o/_/nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis brtag par bya'o/_/chu la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/gos la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun 
[\[324a.5\]]na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa la yongs su bzlas nas gang gi rkang pa'i sen mo la byin na de dbang du byed do/_/ba lang gi spu'i thag pa sngags kyis mngon par bsngags nas gang gi mgul du bcings pa de ba lang du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma la mngon par phyogs nas 
[\[324a.6\]]gang gi ming nas mngon par bzlas pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhum bu'i spu'i thag pa gang gi mgul par bcings pa de zhum bur 'gyur ro/_/bya rog gi rgyus pa'i srad bus bya rog tu 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu'i skra'i srad bus skyes bur 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyi skra'i srad bus bud 
[\[324a.7\]]med du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang dang gang gi spu la sogs pa'i srad bus byas pas de dang de'i gzugs nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi ming gis bzlas na de'i khrag 'gugs so/_/mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing 'di bzlas pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni lha mo'i sngags 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]kyi cho ga'o/_/gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/nad dang bgegs la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gtor ma phul nas bya ba gang la zhugs na/_de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dkar po'i kham phor dang /_'o ma'i kham phor 
[\[324b.2\]]dang /_dri [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]chu'i kham phor dang /_zho zan gyi kham phor te/_kham phor bzhi po 'di rnams shing thog dang nye ba'i shing thog gis rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan mo/_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na i ma~M ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na bdag gi bya ba che ge mo sgrubs shig hU~M phaT/_ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags 
[\[324b.3\]]nas dben pa'i phyogs su bsgrubs pas de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'grub bo//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas nas/_tsha ba'i mar nag gis sbrum ma'i b+ha ga'i nang du mnye bar bya'o/_/'thungs na yang rab tu bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[324b.4\]]du 'dis rma la byugs na yang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zos pas kyang thams cad du'o/_/dang por phreng ba'i sngags kyis gro ga la chu skyes 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus su bri bar bya'o/_/srad bu sngon pos dkris nas lus la bcings na thams cad du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/gi 
[\[324b.5\]]wang ngam rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bya'o/_/'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/de bzhin du rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i cho ga yang 'di nyid kyi sbyor bas sbyar bar bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pa'i mthu yis de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig 
[\[324b.6\]]pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_rnal 'byor sdom pas gang gis gzhag_/spyod pa'i tshul yang ci 'dra zhig_/gang gis 
[\[324b.7\]]dngos grub legs par 'thob/_/bya ba khyab bdag gsung bar mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa sun 'byin pa'i/_/nges par gdug can gsad par bya/_/de rnams nyid kyi nor blangs nas/_/sems can rnams la phan phyir 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]spyad/_/yugs sa mo kun nges par bsten/_/gzhan yang ma dang bu mo dang /_/sha dang nya sha bza' bar bya/_/mnyam bzhag nas ni chang ni btung /_/rang gzhan ngag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang ni/_/nyes pa de bcas bsam gtan mchog_/bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog 
[\[325a.2\]]bsla ba/_/sbas pa rab sbyor nyid las 'grub/_/gang gang sdig pa de nyid kyis/_/sems can rnams ni 'og tu 'gro/_/de dang de yi thabs kyis ni/_/rnal 'byor myur du dngos grub mchog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di nyid gsol to/_/
[\[325a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ji ltar sdom pa phyin ci log tu gsungs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mes tshig pa la me yis bdug_/'dod chags kyis bsnun 'dod chags kyis/_/dug gis bsnun la dug nyid kyis/_/thabs ni rab tu sbyor las so/_/
[\[325a.4\]]'gro ba rang bzhin med bsgoms nas/_/bdag gi dngos grub ces bsgom pa/_/shin tu sbas pa kun nas spyad/_/sus kyang ji ltar mi shes bya/_/sdig pa thams cad zad byas nas/_/phyin ci log gis 'di nyid 'grub/_/rnal 'byor de nyid gcig sbyor mchog_/gang zhig sbed 
[\[325a.5\]]par mi byed na/_/sdom pa phyin ci log 'di yi/_/de yi dngos grub yod ma yin/_/sdig pa med cing bsod nams med/_/rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin las/_/'jig rten 'phya ba bsal ba'i phyir/_/bdag gis gsal por ma byas so/_/da ni bden par gsung mdzad 
[\[325a.6\]]pa/_/gtum po'i tshul gyis dga' ma kye/_/rnal 'byor 'jig rten gzhug pa'i phyir/_/sems can kun gyi don rgyud rnams/_/rab gsal sdom pa bshad pa yis/_/da ni dga' ma khyod nyon cig_/srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing /_/pha rol nor ni 'phrog mi bya/_/
[\[325a.7\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig kyang smra mi bya/_/blo ldan chang ni btung mi bya/_/'jig rten smod pa spang bar bya/_/rab gsal bslab pa'i gnas 'di ni/_/gus pa dang bcas spyad par bya/_/da ni sdom pa'i tshul gsungs pa/_/'di yi spyod pa bshad par bya/_/mgo bo la ni dbu rgyan bya/_/rna 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]bdag la rna rgyan no/_/de bzhin rang lus nyid la ni/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/_/rkang pa dag la rkang gdub bo/_/de bzhin rked pa rked rgyan no/_/de bzhin lag g.yas ral gri dang /_/g.yon du zhags pa gzung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas/_/
[\[325b.2\]]mgo bo dbu rgyan phyag rgya bya/_/zur phud lnga yis brgyan byas nas/_/skra dang kha spu breg par bya/_/lo ni bcu gnyis gsang spyod bya/_/tshe phyed kun nas yang dag spyad/_/sngon gsungs rigs kyi dbye ba yis/_/gzhon nu ma rnams rab tu brtag_/bu mo la 'os rgyan gyis ni/_/
[\[325b.3\]]rtag tu yang ni brgyan par bya/_/g.yas par gri gug sbyin bya zhing /_/g.yon pa ru yang ka pA la/_/rigs kyi dbye bas nges par bya/_/kha dog dbye bas lus la'o/_/rang rigs shes rab gzung byas nas/_/yang na gzhan rigs mnyam bzhag nas/_/rang 'dod yang 
[\[325b.4\]]dag bzung nas ni/_/spyod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam/_/rin chen la sogs med gyur na/_/rdzas la sogs pa sprul pas so/_/gal te rab 'jug ma rnyed na/_/yang na sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/rigs lnga'i rab tu dbye ba las/_/dam tshig lnga la spyad par bya/_/de 
[\[325b.5\]]ni sngon gsungs sbyor ba yis/_/phan tshun gnyis gnyis brtsam par bya/_/'dir ni bya ba gzhan mi brtsam/_/rnam kun rnal 'byor dngos grub thob/_/thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/_/yig gsum sen mo sbyin par bya/_/'o dang 'khyud pa nyid dang ni/_/kun gyi nor 
[\[325b.6\]]ni khu ba nyid/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs par/_/de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur/_/lus ngag yid ni de mchog tu/_/bde bas yang dag sdom pa ni/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin zhes bya/_/sen mo gdab pa bzod pa yis/_/yi ge gsum gyis bcir ba nyid/_/'di 
[\[325b.7\]]ni bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/_/gus pa dang bcas dus ring du/_/shin tu bde bas mnyam gnas bya/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin zhes bya/_/sems nyid bde ba de sbyor las/_/dngos po kun gyi gzugs kyis ni/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin par 'dod/_/bud med tshul 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]gyis bsgom pa nyid/_/shes rab pha rol phyin mar grags/_/shin tu dga' cig sbyor tsam gyis/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin lnga bsod nams dang /_/shes rab ye shes zhes byar gsungs/_/shin tu dga' sbyor mtshungs ldan pa/_/
[\[326a.2\]]rnal 'byor pa yi tshogs gsum 'gyur/_/bsod nams ye shes dang ldan na/_/skad cig tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/dper na 'khri shing las byung ba'i/_/me tog 'bras bu dang ldan ltar/_/skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub/_/tshogs gnyis las ni yang dag 
[\[326a.3\]]byung /_/sa ni bcu gsum dbang phyug tu/_/de ni the tshom med par 'gyur/_/sa ni rab dga' zhes bya dang /_/dri med de bzhin 'od byed dang /_/'od 'phro ba dang sbyang dka' dang /_/mngon gyur ring gyur mi g.yo ba/_/legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/_/kun du 'od dang de bzhin 
[\[326a.4\]]du/_/dpe med pa dang ye shes spyan/_/bcu gsum zhes bya 'di rnams so/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas 'khor der byang chub sems 
[\[326a.5\]]dpa' kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci phyir mi g.yo ba zhes bya/_/dpa' bo gcig nyid ces bya dang /_/khro chen gtum po zhes pa yang /_/mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[326a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/_/bde ba mi g.yo'i gzugs nyid ni/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/_/de yang chags bral gyis mi g.yo/_/de nyid phyir na mi g.yor grags/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can/_/zhal gcig 
[\[326a.7\]]phyag gnyis zhi ba ste/_/sdig pa dang bral dri med yid/_/ral gri zhags pa'i phyag dag ni/_/shes rab mar 'khyud de mchog go/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/_/pad+ma zla ba nyi gnas la/_/kun nas 'khor bar gnas pa yin/_/lha yi bde bas shin tu 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]gnas/_/de phyir 'di ni mi g.yor gsungs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ste/_/ma g.yo ba yi mthu nyid kyis/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis ni/_sems can don ni mdzad pa'i phyir/_/sgrub byed nye bar mtshon pa'o/_/de nas kun tu bzang pos gsol ba/_
[\[326b.2\]]a yig gis ni ci zhig bstan/_/tsa yig gis ni ci zhig brjod/_/la yig kyang ni ci la brjod/_/ji ltar ming ni yang dag bsdus/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/a yig lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul/_/dngos med ngo bo nyid du gsungs/_/tsa yig 
[\[326b.3\]]dga' dang mchog dga' dang /_/khyad par dga' ba nyid dang ni/_/lhan cig skyes dga' zhes bya ba'i/_/dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gsungs/_/la yig la la na ru rol/_/shin tu bde bar gsungs pa'o/_/a yig gis ni shes rab brjod/_/tsa yig 
[\[326b.4\]]gis ni thabs su bshad/_/thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor bas/_/la yig bde ba'i lak+Sha Na~M/_/de nyid dpa' bo gcig pa nyid/_/gcig phyir gcig pa nyid du gsungs/_/chags bral 'joms phyir dpa' bo ste/_/dpa' bo gcig pa zhes gsungs so/_/gtum po 'di ni shin tu rno/_/
[\[326b.5\]]de ni khro bo chen por gsungs/_/khro bor shas bya ro Sha Na/_/bdud kun rnam par 'joms par byed/_/chags bral tsaN+Da zhes bya'o/_/shin tu chags chen bdud sogs las/_/de la khro bo ro Sha Na sa/_/gdul dka' chags bral dag po la/_/g.yon pa'i long bus mnan 
[\[326b.6\]]par bya/_/tshangs pa'i tshig la mnyam gnas nas/_/khro bo'i mche bas mchu bsdam bya/_/phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pas/_/'bad pas shes rab la 'khyud bya/_/chags bral kun nas gzhom byas nas/_/dngos grub sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/_/zhes pa ni 
[\[326b.7\]]dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_a tsa la'i don gyi rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas gsol pa/_dpa' bo gcig pa ji ltar 'grub/_/dbang phyug mchog gis 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/a yig las sbyor skad cig gis/_/mi g.yo nag por bsgom par bya/_/de nyid brtan pa'i stobs nyid las/_/rnal 'byor sangs rgyas the 
[\[327a.2\]]tshom med/_/mi g.yo dkar po bsgom pa dang /_/yang na ser po'am dmar po'am/_/yang na ljang gu bsgom byas nas/_/zhe sdang rdo rje ma sogs ldan/_/dbus su mi g.yo lnga rnams kyis/_/bzung nas gcig tu rnam par bsgom/_/shes rab de yi rigs can ma/_/yang 
[\[327a.3\]]na gzhan yang bsgom par bya/_/de yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor pas/_/myur du dngos grub the tshom med/_/yang na shes rab dang bral ba'i/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom par bya/_/mi g.yo bsgom pa yongs rdzogs na/_/byang chub rgyal srid yang dag 'thob/_/de nas 
[\[327a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_lha yi rnam par dag pa gang /_/'dren pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/sngon du gsungs nyid dkyil 'khor rnams/_/gtso bo bdag la rnam dag gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de nas kun gyi sbyong byed 
[\[327a.5\]]pa'i/_/rnam dag bdag gis rab bshad bya/_/de la gru bzhi pa ni tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'o/_/sgo bzhi ni bden pa bzhi'o/_/rta babs bzhi ni bsam gtan bzhi'o/_/ka ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do/_/'phar ma gcig pa ni sems rtse gcig 
[\[327a.6\]]pa nyid do/_/pad+ma ni skye gnas so/_/kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sprul pa sna tshogs pa'o/_/lha dgu ni gsung rab yan lag dgu'o/_/phyogs dmar po ni 'dod chags chen po'o/_/mtshams su dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_ljang gu dang /_nag po rnams ni bram ze dang /_rje 
[\[327a.7\]]rigs dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_da [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rigs rnams nyid do/_/zla ba dang nyi ma ni/_khu ba dang /_rngul lo/_/dbus kyi ral gri ni mi g.yo ba nag po'i mtshan ma'o/_/gri gug ni zhe sdang rdo rje ma'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams ni mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]pa rnams so/_/me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/_/zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'o/_/bsgom pa'i rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste/_dang po mchod pa ni/_bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par 'phags pa'i las 
[\[327b.2\]]so/_/stong pa nyid ni ye shes kyi tshogs 'chi ba khyad par 'phags pa dri ma med pa'i lus te/_dri za'i lus so/_/gzhal yang khang gi mthar thug pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/pad+ma ni skye gnas so/_/zla ba nyi ma ni dkar dmar ro/_/hU~M yig ni ma dang pha'i dbus su dri za'i 
[\[327b.3\]]sems so/_/ma bskyod pa ni pa'o/_/mA ma kI ni ma'o/_/phan tshun du rjes su chags pa mthong nas pha la rnam par zhe sdang zhing /_ma la rjes su chags nas gti mug pas sems can bzhin du 'jug go/_/pad+mar zhugs pa'i bu yis pha bsad nas de'i go 'phang 'thob bo/_/ma 
[\[327b.4\]]bzung nas skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas de yang bur skye bar byed do/_/bu mo ni yang mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang /_gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang ngo /_/bu rnams kyang pha bsad nas gzhan la bgrod par byed de/_/
[\[327b.5\]]'di nyid dgra bo zhes de gsod par byed do/_/bu mo rnams kyang skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas 'dod par byed do/_/ral gri shes rab la zhags pa ni thabs so/_/yang na zhags pa ses rab la ral gri thabs so/_/gnyis ka ro gcig 
[\[327b.6\]]tu gyur pa ni sdigs mdzub po/_/g.yon pa 'og tu bltas pa ni sa 'og bdun skyong bar byed pa'o/_/g.yas pa steng du bltas pa ni tshangs pa'i sgo nga bdun skyong bar byed pa'o/_/bus mo g.yon pa sa la btsugs pa ni sa skyong bar byed pa'o/_/g.yas pa'i rkang pas 
[\[327b.7\]]yang dag par bsnun pa ni bdud thams cad skrag par mdzad pa'o/_/phung po'i bdud tshangs pa/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dbang phyug_/'chi bdag gi bdud khyab 'jug_/lha'i bu'i bdud lha'i dbang po'o/_/sa ni sa steng mtha' dag gi gzhon nu ma la longs spyod pa'o/_/
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]gzhon nu ma la yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir pad+ma'i gdan no/_/skye gnas la skyes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan no/_/khu ba dang rngul las skyes ba'i skyes bu ni dngos po'o/_/bud med ni dngos po med pa'o/_/nag po ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/dkar po ni gzugs 
[\[328a.2\]]so/_/ser po ni tshor ba'o/_/dmar po ni 'du shes so/_/ljang gu ni don yod grub pa'o/_/yang na mthing ga ni nam mkha'o/_/dkar po ni chu'o/_/ser po ni sa 'o/_/dmar po ni me'o/_/ljang gu ni rlung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 
[\[328a.3\]]'das ma'o/_/yang na mthing ga ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so/_/dkar po ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/dmar po ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/_/ljang gu ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/ston pa rgyal ba gcig 
[\[328a.4\]]pu nyid/_/lnga yi tshul gyis yang dag gnas/_/shes rab pha rol phyin nyid kyang /_/rnam lnga'i tshul gyis yang dag gnas/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 
[\[328a.5\]]pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_'jig rten ji ltar skye ba dang /_/slar yang skye ba ji ltar mdzad/_/dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur ba yang /_/dbang phyug mchog gis bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma rig pa'i 
[\[328a.6\]]rkyen gyis 'du byed do/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i 
[\[328a.7\]]rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_/smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams so/_/de lta bu nyid las 'dir sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]'ba' zhig pa kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go/_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go/_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go/_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched 
[\[328b.2\]]drug 'gag go/_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go/_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go/_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag go/_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go/_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go/_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 
[\[328b.3\]]'gag go/_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'dir sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 
[\[328b.4\]]'brel bar 'byung bas 'jig rten skye'o/_/de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'gag go/_/tshul gnyis po 'di rtogs shing yang gnyis su med pa bsgoms pas 'grub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_ma rig pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba 
[\[328b.5\]]bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'das pa la sogs rab dbye bas/_/'di ni gsum gyi 'khor mor 'jug_/'dir ni rgyal bas chos rnams kun/_/rnam pa bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsungs/_/de la ma rig pa ma spangs pas len pa dang 
[\[328b.6\]]'chi ba'i nang du gzugs nub pa'i sems kyi lus can zhes pa'i don no/_/de las 'du byed du 'gyur ro/_/de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_de la lus kyi 'du byed dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag dang /_dag gi 'du byed dag dang /_rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go/_/yid kyi 'du 
[\[328b.7\]]byed 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams so/_/de rnams dang ldan pa ni ma rig pa ste/_dbugs 'byung ba dang /_dbugs rngub pa ste/_rnam par rtog pa ni rags par 'dzin par byed do/_/rnam par dpyod pa ni phra mor 'dzin par byed do/_/rjes su chags pa dang zhe sdang ba 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]yang yin no/_/de las rnam par shes par gyur pa rnam pa drug ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[329a.2\]]ste/_de rnams dang ldan pa ni ma rig pas lta bar byed do/_/nyan par byed do/_/snom par byed do/_/za bar byed/_reg par byed/_rnam par rtog par byed do/_/de las ming dang gzugs te/_tshor ba ming gzhi la sogs pa rnams so/_/gzugs la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[329a.3\]]ces gnyis su mngon par bsdus shing bsdoms nas ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs so/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i gzugs kyis ma rig pa yongs su gyur pa zhes pa'i don no/_/de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum ni bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin 
[\[329a.4\]]bde ba yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/'du shes ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gzung ba'i mthar mngon par brjod pa ste/_'du byed ni spyi'i khyad par gyi gnas skabs la 'dzin pa can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so/_/rnam par shes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa bzhin 
[\[329a.5\]]no/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs ni/_sa ni lci ba nyid dang /_chu ni gsher ba nyid dang /_mngon par 'dzag pa nyid do/_/me ni dro ba nyid do/_/rlung ni bskum brkyang ba dang /_yang ba dang g.yo ba nyid do/_/de las skye mched drug po rnams ni mig dang /_rna ba 
[\[329a.6\]]dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid do/_/de rnams dang ldan pa ni/_sngon bzhin du lta bar byed pa la sogs pa'o/_/de las reg pa'o/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi khams yang dag par thob pa'o/_/de las sred pas bde 
[\[329a.7\]]ba mngon par 'dod pa'o/_/de las len pa'o/_/de las thob pa'i las so/_/de las srid pa mngal du 'jug pa'o/_/de las skye ba rab tu gsal bar byed pa mngon par rgyu mthun par byed pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'thob bo/_/de nas mngal nas skye bar 'gyur 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]ro/_/'chi ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'gog pas/_de nas rga shi'i sems mya ngan dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/grol na bdag gis smre sngags 'don pa 'tshol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes so/_/nad la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pas kyang sdug bsngal ba can du 
[\[329b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de nyid la yang dang yang du yid sbyor bas yid mi bde ba can yin no/_/yid mi bde ba can gyis kyang bar du gcod pas 'khrug pa can yin no/_/'di'i don ni ma rig pa la sogs pa skye mched drug gi mthar thug pas do'i sems can gcig nyid du gnas 
[\[329b.3\]]pas/_'jig rten gsum po lta zhing lta bar byed do/_/pho mo rjes su chags pa la de las 'das pa'i skye ba'i las gang gis 'phangs nas gang zhig tu skye ba len par 'gyur ro/_/de'i skye ba ni pho mo dag gi dga' bdag la lta bar byed pas/_de'i shin tu bdag gi rig pa skye'o/_/
[\[329b.4\]]de la gal te skyes bur 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag nyid skyes bu'i rnam par lta bar byed do/_/sems ma la mchog tu chags par 'gyur ro/_/yang pha la sems zhe sdang chen por 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag gis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la/_de las 'di yis 
[\[329b.5\]]lhan cig khyed pa gang gis dga' bar byed do zhes sems par byang bas sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o/_/de yis gdong phyir ldog pa'o/_/de nas sngon gyi las kyi rlung gis 'phangs pa'i sred pa chen pos de la bdag nyid dga' bar bya'o zhes zhen pa'i 
[\[329b.6\]]cha yis so/_/gang zhig skyes bu yin na rang gi ma la 'dod par bya'o snyam nas/_sems skar mda' bzhin du pha'i mgo bo'i lam nas rab tu zhugs nas/_de'i khu ba la gnas nas sems gnas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bde ba la chags pas bdag nyid lta bar byed do/_/
[\[329b.7\]]bde ba'i rgyus nye bar len par byed do/_/de nas khu ba dang /_ro gcig tu gyur pas chags pa chen pos rjes su chags pas/_a bad+hU tI'i rtsa pha'i rdo rje'i lam nas ma'i pad+ma'i bu ga'i gnas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa mngal gyi skye ba'i rtsa la gnas nas 'dzag pa'i sems 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]bzhin du/_de las skye ba yin no/_/de yang rim pa bzhin mer mer po dang /_kleng kleng po dang /_ltar ltar po dang /_mkhrang 'gyur dang /_yan lag dang nying lag tu gyur pa'i bu ni zla ba dgu'am/_bcu nas lam gang nyid nas rab tu zhugs pa de nyid kyi lam 
[\[330a.2\]]nas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yang bud med du 'gyur na/_/de'i tshe sems pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ro/_/ma la sems zhe sdang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdag nyid ma'i gzugs la lta bar byed do/_/rnam par shes pa ma'i mgo bo'i lam nas pad+mar rab tu zhugs nas 
[\[330a.3\]]pha'i khu ba dang 'dres par gyur nas de'i skye ba'i rtsal gnas nas/_de nas sngon bzhin du 'byung zhing skye'o/_/de bzhin nyid du ma rig pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'jig rten du skye ste/_'jig rten rnams kyang phung po lnga po rnams de bzhin du de rnams kyang sdug bsngal 
[\[330a.4\]]la 'khor zhing 'jug pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so/_/thar pa don du gnyer ba rnams la/_ma rig pa la sogs pa phung po'i rang bzhin 'gog pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal gyi bya bar gyur pa yang med do/_/stong pa nyid dang snying po med pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi bya ba yang med cing thar 
[\[330a.5\]]pa'i don dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i phyir thar pa'i bsam pa med cing /_med pa'i bsam pa yang med pa'o/_/de'i phyir dngos po med pa dang bral ba'i thabs dang shes rab yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po'i gzugs can ni/_dpal ldan mgon po mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid 
[\[330a.6\]]can dga' ba bzhi'i sku can/_srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu mi gnas pa'i thugs can no/_/thar pa ni 'dod chags las skyes pa ste/_'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dod chags zad pa dang zad pa ma yin par gyur pa/_mi g.yo ba'i don yongs su shes 
[\[330a.7\]]pa sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub yang dag par grub par byed do/_/g.yo bar byed pa ni shes rab dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i ros dga' ba'i sems gang yin pa'o/_/zla ba'i khyad par gyi dga' ba mchog gi snying po de mi g.yo ba zhes gsungs so/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_mgon po 'dir ni khu khrag sbyor/_/ling ga b+ha ga nu ma rnams/_/rab tu 
[\[330b.2\]]'phel bar byed nus dang /_/nad dang rgas pa 'joms pa dang /_/bud med yid ni dbang gyur dang /_/mo sham nyid du bya ba dang /_/khu ba bcing dang khrag 'bab pa'i/_/sbyor ba yang ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo 
[\[330b.3\]]legs so legs par byas/_/khyod kyis nga la gsol btab gang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs bde bshad bya/_/'jig rten dngos grub don phyir nyon/_/dang por lus ni sbyang byas nas/_/phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/_/dper na gos ni dkar byas la/_/tshon gyis kha dog 
[\[330b.4\]]mchog 'bar ltar/_/'bras bu gsum gyi thang bzung nas/_/ya bak+Sha ra pa lA sa k+Sha~M/_/bza' bya bu ram dang bcas btung /_/srin bu ma zhu rab sbyangs nas/_/ke ta kya khu mar khu dang /_/hi la mo tsi sen+d+ha ba/_/btung bya byugs nas nyi mas bdug_/shig dang srin bral 
[\[330b.5\]]lus su 'gyur/_/ke ta kya khu tI la mar dang /_/lan tshwa dang bcas btung byas nas/_/nyi ma la 'chag sbyor ba yis/_/yan tshwa rnams ni nyams par 'gyur/_/hi la mo tsi'i khu cung zad/_/sen+d+ha ba dang yang dag ldan/_/grib ma la ni gnas bcas nas/_/mkhris pa rnams 
[\[330b.6\]]ni sel bar byed/_/ke ta kya khu ti la dang /_/ku ca mA la ba'i 'o ma/_/btung ba'i sbyor ba 'di nyid ni/_/tshil ni sbyor bar the tshom med/_/pha tha se myug khu ba dang /_/lan tshwar bcas pa btung byas na/_/srin bu phra mo 'joms par byed/_/'u sus bad kan sbrang snas 'thung /_/re re'ang nyi ma 
[\[330b.7\]]gnyis su bya/_/nyes pa sbyangs nas phyi nas brtsam/_/de yis de nyid 'bras bu ster/_/dga' ma gzhan du de 'bras med/_/mon tsa ra shun phye ma yi/_/thug pa tsha mo btung bar bya/_/lan bdun du ni sngags byas nas/_/snga mo'am ni zas dus su/_/nyin re ji bzhin ji 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]srid 'tshor/_/shu kra sho Ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na i daM di byA mraM taM me ku ru hU~M phaT/_na ri ke la'i nang rul dang /_/ma he yi ni mar gsar dang /_/'bras bu zhag lon dang ldan pa/_/phag las byung ba'i tshil gyis ni/_/ling ga rna ba nu ma 
[\[331a.2\]]dang /_/b+ha ga rnams kyang rnam par mnye/_/lus kun kyang ni rnam mnyes na/_/rnam par 'phel bar the tshom med/_/sen mo dang ni bral byas nas/_/mdzub mo yis ni nyed par bya/_/yo ni'i dbus su rab tu nyed/_/byugs na ran d+hA 'phel bar gyur/_/se 'bru'i shun pa phye 
[\[331a.3\]]ma ni/_/yungs kar til mar la btsos nas/_/nu ma mnyes na 'phel bar 'gyur/_/muN+Di rI thang sna yis btung /_/yungs kar dkar po shu dag dang /_/rta dri dang ni bri ha ti'i/_/phye ma yis ni nyed par bya/_/ling ga nu ma rna ba 'phel/_/glang chen pi pi ling dang ni/_/a 
[\[331a.4\]]par dzi dkar po yis/_/de bzhin ma he'i mar gsar gyis/_/ling ga mnyes na 'phel bar byed/_/se ba la dang ka Tu dang /_/ro hi NI dang ma he yi/_/mar gsar byugs pas ling ga 'phel/_/d+hu tu ra khu rta dri'i rtsa/_/gnur nas ma he'i mar dang bsres/_/d+hu tu ra yi 
[\[331a.5\]]'bras nang du/_/nyin mtshan du ni gzhag par bya/_/de nas ling ga ma he yi/_/mar gyis lan cig brtan par nyed/_/sngon bzhin du ni zhag gsum du/_/byugs shing mnyes pas 'phel bar byed/_/in+d+ra go ba'i phye ma dang /_/ma he'i mar gyis bsgrub par bya/_/yo 
[\[331a.6\]]ni'i nang du byugs gyur na/_/yo ni'i lhod pa dam par 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i ze 'bru ut+pal 'bru/_/pad rtsa u shi ra dang ni/_/mon lug til mar nang du btso/_/de yis b+ha ga ling ga dag_/dri ngan dang ni lhod pa dang /_/nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed/_/ni ma pa'i shun pa'i 
[\[331a.7\]]thang gis ni/_/b+ha ga la ni khrus bya'o/_/ni ma pa'i shun pas bdug byas na/_/'di ni gzhon dang dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/skal bzang yon tan dang ldan 'gyur/_/ba bla yi ni cha lnga dang /_/kiM shu ka k+ShA ra cha gcig_/ya bak+Sha ra cha gcig dang /_/chu shing k+Sha ra cha gcig dang /_/
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]chu nang mnyes nas byugs tsam gyis/_/b+ha ga mtshan dang skye gnas kyi/_/spu ni ltung bar byed pa yin/_/de nas ha la ha la'i sprul/_/mjug ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas/_/tsha ba'i til mar zhag bdun gzhag_/de yis ling ga la sogs mnye/_/slar yang spu ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/
[\[331b.2\]]ma he phag dang glang chen dang /_/kar ka Ta yi zhag dang tshil/_/nu ma la sogs nyed byas 'phel/_/sna ma'i me tog til dang btags/_/b+ha ga la ni grul byas na/_/steng du mtho bar byed pa yin/_/ma he yi ni mar gsar dang /_/shu dag ru rta ba la dang /_/nAg ba la sa nyed 
[\[331b.3\]]byas na/_/nu ma 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/chu dron gyis ni khrus byas na/_/ling ga sngon bzhin 'phel ba nyams/_/daN+Da ut+pal rtsa ba dang /_/ba yi mar dang btung byas na/_/dus ldan dus la sbrum par 'gyur/_/rta dri'i rtsa ba mar 'thungs na/_/sbrum ma nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[331b.4\]]ba la a ti pa la dang /_ka ra dang /_til dang /_mAk+Shi ka'i sbrang dang bcas pa 'thungs na sbrum par 'gyur ro/_/ba bla'i rtsa ba chu dang btags nas 'thungs na/_khrag 'dzag pa chad par 'gyur ro/_/nas kyi phye dang /_ba'i chu dang /_spos dkar dang /_shing mngar dang /_mar rang gi 
[\[331b.5\]]lus la dril phyis byas na bzang por 'gyur ro/_/ba rA nya kra na tA'i rtsa ba dus ldan ma'i rna ba la btags na sbrum par 'gyur ro/_/ka la ma bi'i lo ma zos na khams 'phel lo/_/sbrang dang zho zos na khams 'phel lo/_/dkar mar zos na khams 'phel lo/_/bud med kyi dri 
[\[331b.6\]]chen dang dri chu mnyes nas 'thungs na khu ba 'phel lo/_/skyu ru ra'i phye ma chu'am mar dang sbrang dang sbyar te phyi dro zos na/_mig gzhon nu dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do/_/skyu ru ra'i phye ma til phye ma dang mnyam po mar dang sbrang bza' bar byas na yang 'bras bu de ji lta ba bzhin no/_/
[\[331b.7\]]gar kha tan Tu la'i rtsa ba dang /_rta dri dang /_til dang /_nas dang /_bu ram ro mnyam por byas nas bza' bar byas na gzhon nur 'gyur ro/_/a rdzu na'i shun pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar nyin re zhing bza' bar byas na/_lo gcig gi sbyor bas tshe lo sum brgya'o/_/skyu ru ra'i khu ba 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]srang gcig dang /_ba ku so mar dza'i phye ma zho gnyis tho rangs 'thungs nas/_zhu ba dang 'o ma'i bza' ba zos na/_zla ba gcig byas na tshe lo lnga brgya 'tsho'o/_/bA gu tsi zho gnyis dang dar ba dang /_chu dang rtsa ba mo 'o ma dang /_gang yang rung ba dang sbyar 
[\[332a.2\]]'thungs na zla ba drug gi sbyor bas gzhon nur 'gyur ro/_/muN+Da ri'i phye ma mar dang zos na/_zhag bdun phrag gsum gyis lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam par 'gyur ro/_/sa na pI dzA'i phye ma srang gcig dang /_ra ka shA la srang gcig dang /_ba kha dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham 
[\[332a.3\]]phor do btso bar bya'o/_/dang por 'o ma kham phor gang zad pa dang blangs nas/_sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btso bar bya'o/_/de nas bza' bar bya'o/_/sman zhu nas 'o ma dang bza' bar bya'o/_/rlung dang nyi ma spangs te zhag bdun phrag gsum du ji srid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi 
[\[332a.4\]]nas bya'o/_/de nas skra la sogs pa ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/slar yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma bral nas lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rak+ta uts+tsha Ta'i rtsa ba dang /_mar dang sbrang rnams zhum bu'i lag pa tsam bza' bar bya'o/_/'di'i 'bras bu 
[\[332a.5\]]ni de bzhin nyid do/_/skyu ru ra dang /_a ru ra dang /_b+h+r-ing gi rA dza dang /_pi pi ling dang /_lo ba ris dang /_lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang dang /_ka ra dag dang /_u dum pA ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu byas nas/_de nas ril bu re re nyin re zhing bza' bar bya'o/_/zla ba 
[\[332a.6\]]gcig gis lo sum brgya 'tsho'o/_/gzhon nu ma srang gcig dang /_mar dang bcas pa bza' bar bya'o/_/zhag bdun gyis tshe lo brgya'o/_/nas dang /_til dang /_rta dri dang /_nA ga pi la dang /_pa ShA dang /_bu ram dang bza' bar bya'o/_/stobs chen por 'gyur ro/_/b+ha dra la'i 
[\[332a.7\]]phye ma sum 'gyur ro/_/a ru ra dang /_de bzhin du chu la sogs pa dang bza' bar bya'o/_/stobs cher por 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par bsgoms nas gtum po'i sngags kyis sman yang dag par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/zhes pa ni dpa' 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/_khams la sogs pa 'phel ba'i rim par bye pa ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba rang skyur la btags nas spyi bo ma nyes na mgo bo'i 
[\[332b.2\]]zug rngu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ra dang ba dang mi'i chu bsres nas rgya ma tsha dang bcas pas rna ba bkang na rna ba'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sdom skam po til mar du bcug nas/_ka Ta ka~M dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_yung ba dang /_zil pa'i chu la ril bu byas nas de yis mig sman 
[\[332b.3\]]byas na/_mig gi nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/sbrang dang pi pi ling gi mig sman gyis kyang ngo /_/rna lpabs dang sbrang gis mig sman byas na srod long sel bar byed do/_/g+ho Sha pha laM gi dri ma mnom zhing kaM k+Sha laM ko'i rtsa ba dang /_sbrang gi chu dang /_sna yis btung bar byas na mkhris 
[\[332b.4\]]nad mig ser sel bar byed do/_/le brgan rtsi'i khu ba dang /_dUr ba'i khu ba dang /_se 'bru'i me tog gi khu ba dang gcig tu byas nas snar blugs na sna khrag 'dzag pa 'chad do/_/kaSh+Tha u dum bA ra'i rtsa ba dang 'bras kyi chus kha nas khrag 'dzag pa 'chad par byed do/_/se pha li kA'i rtsa ba 
[\[332b.5\]]ldang na mgul 'gags sel bar byed do/_/ra ta'i rtsa bas so 'cha' ba sel bar byed do/_/ba'i mar dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_sdig pa'i rkang pa bcos nas rkang mthil la mnye bar byas na/_so 'cha' ba rnam par sel bar byed do/_/la phug gi sa bon dang /_pri yang ku dang /_
[\[332b.6\]]tsan+dan dmar po dang /_ru rta dang btags nas dril phyis byas na/_khyi rngo la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/ha ri Na'i sha skam po srang gcig dang /_ra'i 'o ma dang btung bar byas na/_zad byed kyi nad sel bar byed do/_/ma he'i zho dang 'bras zan gyi bza' bas/_btsan 
[\[332b.7\]]thabs su 'khru ba sel bar byed do/_/'bras zan chu dang bcas pa grang mos kyang de bzhin du sel bar byed do/_/ru rta'i shun pa cha gnyis dang /_pho ba ris dang /_bu ram dang /_sgog skya rnams cha re ba'i dar ba dang /_'thungs na lto 'gying sa pa sel lo/_/skyu ru ra dang /_pe pi ling 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_sge gsher dang /_bu ram rnying pa dang /_mar dang sbrang dang /_cha mnyam du dgongs ka zos na/_glo dang dbugs mi bde ba sel lo/_/a ru ra'i phye ma dang /_/sbrang gis kyang de bzhin no/_/seng ldeng gi lo ma dang /_nas dang /_nas kyi myu gu 
[\[333a.2\]]bca' bar byas na/_lto ba'i nad sel bar byed do/_/sge gsher dang /_zir dang /_zho'i thug pa lan tshwa dang bcas pa 'thungs pas rab tu tsha ba'i chu nad rnam par sel lo/_/ka ra dang /_ya bak+Sha ra dang cha mnyam du bza' zhing /_sho b+ha dza na'i tsa ba'i chang 'thungs na/_chu so'i 
[\[333a.3\]]rde'u 'byin par byed do/_/a ru ra dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_sge gsher dang /_dar ba 'thungs na mcher pa skrangs pa'i nad sel lo/_/zir dang /_bu ram bza' bar byas na/_tsha ba sel bar byed do/_/ya bak+Sha ra dang /_zho 'thung bar byas na be snabs 'khru ba'i nad sel bar byed do/_/
[\[333a.4\]]tsha ba gsum dang /_byi tang ka dang /_rgyam tsha dang bcas pa'i thug pa dron mo 'thungs na/_me 'bar ba dang /_srin bu'i nad sel bar byed do/_/a ru ra dang /_bu ram gyi bza' bas 'brum nag gi nad sel bar byed do/_/a ru ra dang /_sga skya'i bza' bas be snabs 'khru ba'i nad 
[\[333a.5\]]sel lo/_/dUr ba dang yung ba btags nas byugs na rngo shu sel bar byed do/_/'di yis de bzhin du me dbal dang /_pho la mig dang /_khyim la sogs pa'ang sel bar byed do/_/kA sha ma ra d+ha'i rtsa ba rang skyur la btags nas kyang de bzhin no/_/bu ram dang tsha ba'i mar khu 
[\[333a.6\]]'thungs na glo dang dbugs gdug pa sel bar byed do/_/a rdzu na'i shun pa dang /_mar la sogs pa zos na snying gi zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/ka bed bsregs la bu ram dang bza' bar byas na/_khrag tu 'khru ba sel bar byed do/_/ma tu lung ka'i khu ba bu ram dang btung bar 
[\[333a.7\]]byas na zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/bu ram dang bca' sga snar blugs na/_cham pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/ka ta ka~M dang /_sbrang gis mig sman byas na mig nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/rang skyur dang /_'bru mar dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_dUr ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]'khar ba'i nang du mnyes nas mig sman byas na zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/bu ram dang /_mar za bar byed na/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_mdze la sogs pa rnam par sel bar byed do/_/'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma/_mar dang /_sbrang dang bza' bar byas na nad 
[\[333b.2\]]thams cad sel bar byed do/_/a ru ra'i phye ma dang /_mar dang /_sbrang dang /_phyi dro'i dus su ldags na/_rlung dang /_bad kan sel bar byed do/_/bA sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang /_chu dag dang /_tshangs ma dang /_pi pi ling rnams skams nas phye mar byas te/_rgyam tsha dang /_
[\[333b.3\]]sbrang dang /_ril bu byas te/_de nas dgongs mo zos na bad kan rnams sel zhing shin tu dbyangs snyan par byed do/_/tshangs ma dang /_chu dag dang /_bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_a ru ra dang /_ba sha ka dang /_seng ldeng rnams sbrang la ril bu byas nas bza' bar byas na de 
[\[333b.4\]]lta bu'i 'bras bu nyid do/_/la phug dang /_bca' sga dang /_a ru ra dang /_rgyam tsha dang cha mnyam por bza' bar byas na/_ma zhu ba thams cad sel bar byed do/_/sle tres kyi khu ba dang /_sbrang 'thung bar byas na chu nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/'o ma dang /_pi pi ling gi 
[\[333b.5\]]phye ma mar dang /_sbrang dang 'thung bar byas na/_tsha ba dang /_snying nad dang /_glo la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/ladz+dza lu dang /_sha ra pung ka'i rtsa ba 'bras khu grang mos btags nas byug par bya'o/_/sle tres kyi rtsa ba bza' bar byas na/_rtsa nang gi rma 'tsho bar byed do/_/bca' 
[\[333b.6\]]sga dang /_ya bak+Sha ra bza' bar byas na ltogs pa sel bar byed do/_/dza yan ta'i sa bon dang /_pho ba ris nyi ma gsum 'thung bar byas na sdig pa'i nad 'brum nag sel bar byed do/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_rams dang /_sa nag po dang /_b+h+r-iM ga rA dza'i khu ba dang /_a mra'i sa 
[\[333b.7\]]bon dang /_lcags kyi phye ma rang skyur dang bsnyal nas bsing bar bya'o/_/de nas gu gul gyis skra la bdugs nas de yis mnye bar bya'o/_/de nas zhag bdun bcings nas gzhag par bya'o/_/skra kha bsgyur ba'o/_/rma bya'i mkhris pa dang /_b+h+r-iM ga rA dza'i khu ba dag 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]pa'i mar la btsos nas snar blugs na zhag bdun gyis skra'i mdog nag por 'gyur ro/_/pu nar na pa dang raN+Da dag gi thang bcu drug 'gyur gyi bar du cha gcig lus kyi bar du bskol bar bya'o/_/de nas b+huny+dza dkar po'i phye ma blugs nas dkrug par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[334a.2\]]'bru mar kham phor gang dang btso bar bya'o/_/'dis skra dang mnyes pas skra kha dog nag por 'gyur ro/_/b+hu mi bi dA rI dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_mu zi dang mnyam po phye mar byas nas sdong bu'i nang du bcug nas/_sdong bu kha thur du bstan nas me sbar nas rim par tsha ba'i 'bru 
[\[334a.3\]]mar blangs nas/_rtag tu thigs pa gnyis sna yis 'thungs na/_skra dkar dang gnyer ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i khu bas mdze la byugs shing mnyes na mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/mar gsar pa yis mnyes nas ldong ros drug nam gcig dang bcas te dngul chu 
[\[334a.4\]]srang gcig dang /_sha ling rtsa dang /_lo Ni a'i gong bu dang /_lugs kong gi kha bkab nas/_bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi nang du bye ma dang bcas pa me la bsreg par bya'o/_/dngul chu bcing ba bza' bar byas na/_zad byed la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/
[\[334a.5\]]ba'i be'u skyes pa'i dang po'i lci ba blangs nas ril bu byas te piN+Da ta ga ra'i rtsa ba dang mnyes nas bcing bar bya'o/_/sor gcig zos nas dug zos na yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/dze ma bu'i sa bon dang /_bI dza pU ra ka'i sa bon dang /_sha ri Sha'i sa bon dang btags 
[\[334a.6\]]nas ra'i 'o ma la btso bar byas nas mar dang bza' bar byas na/_zla ba phyed du ltogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/skyu ru ra dang /_ru rta dang /_ut+pa la dang /_spang spos dang /_bA la dang /_de rnams kyis byugs na skra sa ba mo yang tsha na mthug por 'gyur ro/_/khyi'i mche ba du 
[\[334a.7\]]ba'i nang du bsregs nas 'o ma dang mar dang bcas pas mnye bar byas na skra ma skyes pa yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/na ri ke la'i chu la skyes bu'i dbang po cung zad bar du bzhag nas su ra su na phye ma byin na skyes bu'i dbang po'i shu ba'i nad sel bar byed do/_/rgyal gyi zla ba la b+h+r-iM 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]ga rA dza'i rtsa ba rang gi khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na de bzhin no/_/ka ra bI ra dkar po'i 'khri shing dang /_rtsangs pa'i khrag gis mnye bar byas nas/_sh+ma tha dang /_b+h+r-iM ga rA dza ma nyes nas rab tu byugs na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du 
[\[334b.2\]]gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_nang 'phel ba gzhom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_a ba ra dzi ka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_khu ba ril bu byas nas thig le byas na bud med dbang 
[\[334b.3\]]du 'gyur ro/_/[(]prah+mA da [,]prah+mAd [) ]N+DI dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_sbrang ling ga la byugs nas mnyes nas bud med la 'dod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bong bu'i khu ba dang /_chu skyes kyi ge sar btags nas/_rgyal mtshan la byugs te daN+Da ut+pal dang /_ru rta dang /_go la byin na 
[\[334b.4\]]yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/prad+mA daN+DI dang /_byi taM ga dang /_ru rta dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_go la byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/byugs nas 'dod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bu chung so ma skyes pa'i lce blangs te/_gi wang dang /_b+h+r-iM ga rA dza dang /_skar ma rgyal la ril bu byas 
[\[334b.5\]]nas thig le byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gi wang gi rang byung gi me tog la spangs nas thig le byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi du bas bdugs nas bud med la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ma yU ra shi kha dang /_bya rog gi lce dang /_ro'i me tog rnying pa skam po'i phye ma 
[\[334b.6\]]gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ba bla dang bya rog gi brun btags nas bza' ba dang btung bar byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/biSh+Nu kAn+ta'i rtsa ba ling ga la byugs nas dga' bar byas na de bzhin no/_/rgyu skar rgyal la d+hu tu ra'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu blangs nas/_rgyu skar 
[\[334b.7\]]skag la shun pa blangs/_ha sta la lo ma blangs/_nag pa la me tog blangs/_mU la la rtsa ba blangs la/_cha mnyam por phye mar byas nas/_sbrang dang ril bu byas nas/_ras sbangs te skam por bya'o/_/go la byin nas phye ma yis dbang du byed do/_/khyi smyon pa'i rkang pa g.yas 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]pa'i sor mo sol ba'i me la bsregs nas gang gi ming bris te che ge mo khug cig ces pas de 'ong bar byed do/_/du ba med pa'i me la bsro bar bya'o/_/ma yU ra shi kha dri ma lnga'i bza' ba la sogs pa byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/a pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la bton nas ras la yang dag 
[\[335a.2\]]par bsgos pa'i sdong bus mi'i thod pa la mig sman du bya'o/_/de'i mig sman gyis skyes pa dang /_bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/_/daN+Da ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang /_dri ma lnga dang byin na dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/pi DaM ga dang /_ta ga ra dang /_ru rta chang dang byin na mi 'dod pa nyams par byed do/_/ldong ros 
[\[335a.3\]]dang /_nag ge sar phye ma dang /_pri yang ku dang /_gi wang rnams kyis mig sman byas na dbang du byed do/_/gla ba dang /_ladz+dza lu dang /_d+hu tu ra dang /_sa ha de ba dang rnams kyis thig le byas na/_'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed do zhes te/_o~M tsa la ci te/_/tsi li tsi li tsu lu tsu lu tse to muny+tsa muny+tsa swA hA/_rang gi 
[\[335a.4\]]ling ga'i steng du kar bIr dmar po'i me tog bzhag nas stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/ming gi mtha' brten nas so/_/gang gi mdun du sngags bzlas nas zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas bskor bas de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sngon bsnyen pa stong phrag bcu ming dang bral bar byas nas/_na maHtsaN+DA 
[\[335a.5\]]li che ge mo ba shI ku ru swA hA/_bsnyen pa dang bcas pas dur khrod kyi thal ba nag po'i bcu bzhi la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas/_bud med spyi bor byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ra'i ling ga blangs nas rked pa la dur khrod kyi srad bus bcing bar bya'o/_/yang na rtsangs pa'i mjug ma bcings na 
[\[335a.6\]]khams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu bde ba'i yid gcig pus mai thu na bya ste brtan pa'i sbyor bas so/_/rtag tu sems med pa bzhin du gyur nas/_khams mchog tu 'ching bar byed do/_/mU laM si ta ko ki lA khya s+ya/_/yang na d+hu tu ra gos dang bral zhing mdoms dkris dang bral spa grol 
[\[335a.7\]]bas bton nas bcings na khams 'ching bar byed do/_/byi la nag po'i rkang pa'i rus pa bcings na khams 'ching bar byed do/_/shar pung ShA dkar po'i rtsa bas bcings na yang khams 'ching bar byed do/_/sa Na mU la dang /_go la la gal te na/_su ra su na na ka zos nas nas mi thu na sngon 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]bzhin byas na khams 'ching ba'i mchog go/_/'jam 'bras kyi nang brus nas dngul chus bkang nas rked pa la bcings na khams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phag gi tshil gyis yar ka'i bal dkar po la sdong bu byas nas mig sman byas na khams 'ching ngo /_/sa'i 'khri shing gi phye mas 
[\[335b.2\]]sdong bu la til gyi 'bru mar bsreg par bya'o/_/khams 'ching bar byed do/_/sa'i 'khri shing phye mar byas nas til gyi 'bru mar gur gum gyis ra khu dang btsos nas/_de yis rkang pa la mnyes na khams 'ching ngo /_/sbal pa'i zhag dang sdig pa dag ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas des rkang pa la 
[\[335b.3\]]byugs na khams 'ching ngo /_/kA ka ji g+ha dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_pad+ma dkar po ke sha ra sbrang dang lte bar byugs na khams 'dzin no/_/glang gi rwa gyen du skyes pa blangs nas bdar te/_ling ga la byugs na ling ga gyen du byed do/_/ka pi kats+tsha'i rtsa ba bdar nas ra'i chu dang btags nas ling ga la byugs 
[\[335b.4\]]nas mnyes na mkhrang por byed do/_/lan gnyis sam gsum du'o/_/chu dron mos bkrus na zhing ra 'gyur ro/_/'gron bu'i nang du dngul chus bkang nas khar bcug na khams 'ching ngo /_/ra'i chu dang /_iN+Da bA ru NI nyi ma bdun du spang bar bya'o/_/des mnyes na ling ga gyen du byed do/_/Do Sha 
[\[335b.5\]]Ni'i rtsa ba dang /_ka ma ci'i rtsa ba dang /_d+hu tu ra'i sa bon dang /_kastu ra dang mnyes nas ling ga la byugs nas bud med la 'khrig pa bya'o/_/rgyam tsha dang tsha la dang /_kastu ra dang /_g+ho Sha'i phye ma sbrang dang byugs na yang de bzhin no/_/phug ron gyi brun dang /_sbrang ling ga la byugs nas 
[\[335b.6\]]'dod pa byas na bud med 'dzag par byed do/_/ka ma tsi'i rtsa ba dang /_go la bud med dang dga' ba'i dus su zos na de 'dzag par byed do/_/bse yab smin pa dang /_la si kaM dang /_rgyam tsha dang bsres nas rang gi mdzub mo la byugs nas de'i b+ha ga'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa 
[\[335b.7\]]la ji srid bskyod pas de 'dzag par byed do/_/ga pur dang /_tsha la dang /_dngul chu dang /_ha sti pi pi ling dang /_sbrang gis byugs pas bud med 'dzag par byed do/_/rA ma du ti'i rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang bcas pa ling ga la mnyes nas mai thun byas pas bud med 'dzag par byed do/_/dza 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]yan ti'i rtsa ba dang btags nas 'bras kyi chu dang bsres nas rdul dang ldan pa'i skye gnas la byugs na mo sham du the tshom mi za'o/_/pa lA sha'i sa bon mnyes nas byugs nas/_sbrang dang mar gsar pa'i btung ba dang /_tsi tra dmar pos mo sham du the tshom med do/_/chag pa 
[\[336a.2\]]dang /_phye ma leb kyi phye mas skye gnas lhad pa la byin na ma khrad por 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_khams bcing ba la sogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas bcom ldan 
[\[336a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sogs mkhas pa'i/_/sna tshogs dbye ba gsungs pa dang /_/khyab bdag de bzhin ngo mtshar dang /_/rlung gi sbyor ba ma lus dang /_/de bzhin dus kyi mtshan nyid dang /_/gzhan yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/rang gzugs

[\[336a.5\]]rA la ba da ne/_ha sa ha sa/_ha lA ha la badzre su badzre sba ra sba ra/_s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba me g+ha bA ta/_pr-iSh+TiM stam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/_yaHyaHyaHsarba pA nI yaM sho Sha ya/_sho Sha ya hU~M phaT/_sngags 'di bzlas nas nam mkha' la khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/_/rlung dang sprin la

[\[336a.7\]]hi li hi li phuHphuH/_zhes pa 'dis sa la mngon par bsngags nas rdul gyis gtor na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/ma m+mA ma m+mA/_zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/be du A pe du A/_zhes pa 'dis glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/te l+li A te l+li A/_zhes pa 'dis bse 'bros par 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/o~M hrIM pha Tu ka nA tha tsaN+Da la hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_zhes pas lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis brdungs pas khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/o~M ya mAn+ta ka hrIHSh+DIHhU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_tsaN+Da pra tsaN+Da hU~M phaT/_zhes pa 'dis ma he 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/o~M ya ma mar 
[\[336b.2\]]da ni mArnga ya mArnga ya tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_zhes pa 'dis sdig pa'i nad 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/o~M kro d+ha ne saM kro d+ha ne b+he da nA ya hU~M phaT/_chu la mngon par bsngags nas byin na zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/o~M saM trA sa ne mo ha nA ya hU~M phaT/_zhes pa 'dis spyi bor bcings na srang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[336b.3\]]oM a tsa le saM tsa le che ge mo mu khaM kI la ya hU~M phaT/_spra tshil las gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa byas nas/_gro ga la ba blas bris nas de'i bar btsug na phur bus 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos nas sbas na phyir rgol gyi kha phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/_/o~M sarba mA ra

[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]zin par 'gyur ro/_/o~M dza ya dza ya pa rA dza ya ni ra dzi te ya n+t+re hI hI/_hA hA/_spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/_u ts+tshA Ta ya uts+tshA Ta ya shIg+h+ra~M karma ku ru/_ku ru/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_oM ce N+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~MphaT/_dur khrod kyi gos la bris nas skud pa sngon pos lan brgyad dkris nas dpung pa'am

[\[337a.6\]]g+hA ta ya/_ka ha ka ha/_pra spu ra pra spu ra ya/_pra spA ra ya pra spA ra ya/_kI la ya kI la ya/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_che ge mo hU~MphaT/_grog la rus sbal le brgan rtsis yang dag par bris nas sor drug pa'i rkang pa bzhi po rnams la hri yig dang /_kha'i nang du piM gi yi ge dang lto bar

[\[337b\]]

[\[337b.4\]]zhags pa dang lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa 'dod pa'i mdangs can 'jigs pa'i yan lag la/_tshil dang /_chang dang /_le brgan rtsi dang /_khrag dang /_bud med kyi rdul dang rnams kyis bsten pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams te/_o~M shi ra si hrI hri di klIM nA b+hau traM me D+he/_de nas phreng ba'i

[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]ru ShaM tsa ru Shi Ni khaHkhaHkhaHhaHhaHhaHsaHsaHsaH/_oM tsaN+Da ma hA se nA dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/_yang na o~M saM kA ri Ni d+hAM hAM hU~M ha~M haH/_dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/o~M nA gA ri pA ma ne ha raHphaT/_mngon par bsngags nas khang pa'i sgo gong du gos kyi ras ma bcings na sbrul 
[\[338a.2\]]khang par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/o~M A ne kA ne che ge mo ba shI ku ru swA hA/_me tog dkar po'i dri zhim po byin na dbang du byed do/_/na mo pI ta nA gA ya/_mai tri ya si ha lo tsa ne swA hA/_chu la mngon par bsngags nas mig bkrus na rab rib sel lo/_o~M saM phar khaHtsUr+Na/_khA da nA na pra b+ha ba ti A di t+ya 
[\[338a.3\]]ra tha be ge na bA su deb ba len tsa ga ru Da bak+Sha pA te n+D+ya b+hU myaM gats+tshan+tu pi ShaM swA hA/_sprul dang /_bi shwa~M ka ta dang /_sdig pa la sogs pa'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_o~M tsa muN+Di a dzi te/_a pa rA dzri te kliM kliM rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/_lan bdun dus spar gang la mngon par bsngags nas phyogs bzhir 'phang zhing

[\[338a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_o~M traHsu bi sma re swA hA/_ke ta ka'i 'dab ma gshags pa la bris nas bcangs na tsha ba thams cad sel bar byed do/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_'khrul 'khor dang sngags sna tshogs pa'i rab tu dbye

[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]phye ma dang bcas pa rgya skyegs kyis kha bsgyur nas/_sdong bus me sbar na sti yang de gcer bur mthong bar byed do/_/mar gyis rna ba dang mig la bsgos nas bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas/_ha la ha la'i mjug ma gcad par bya'o/_/gcer bu skra grol bas ji srid 'phar ba de srid gar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i
