[\[338b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/d+ha du ru'i me tog gi nang gi phye ma dang /_su gan d+hi'i me tog gi nang gi phye ma dang /_su gan d+hi'i nang du bcug nas ma rnams pa tsam gyis mgo bo zug rngur 'gyur ro/_/skyur po snar blugs na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/khyi gu skyes pa'i mal stan gyi dud pas bdugs nas/_rma bya'i sgros g.yas su 
[\[338b.4\]]bskor na rtsig pa'i ri mo mi snang bar byed do/_/g.yon du bskor bas slar yang snang bar byed do/_/bya rog gi snying gi khrag gis a mra'i lo ma la de'i gshog pa'i smyu gus sngags bris nas/_gang gi zag pa'i nang du bcug na de bya rog gis za bar byed do/_/o~M kA ka ku ha ni bad+d+ha nI de bad t+taM kA ke na 
[\[338b.5\]]b+hak+Sha ya swA hA/_b+ha ga'i rnam pa'i dong byas nas bud med kyi bshang ba la za'i lo ma khri phrag gcig bcug nas spa bar bya'o/_/de'i lam zug rngur 'gyur ro/_/shi ri khaN+Da'i 'o ma la sbangs pa'i til gyi 'bru mar skra la mnyes na skra dkar por 'gyur ro/_/skra bzhar na sangs par 'gyur ro/_/zhum bu'i 
[\[338b.6\]]phru gu btsas pa'i ma la stan dang /_bud med kyi bu tsha btsas pa'i mal stan gyi dud pas bdugs na rtsig ngos kyi ri mo mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mak+Shi kas bdugs na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnga mo'i 'gram pa'i rdul dang dri chu ba bla dang lan mang du sbangs nas lag pa la mnyes nas reg na ri mo mi snang bar 
[\[338b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/lag pa bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/s+t+ri gar+b+ha'i mal stan gyis bdugs na/_ri mod ti/_gu gul gyis bdugs na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/b+ha ga'i tshil gyis mig sman byas na khang pa'i phya ma rnams sar par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mar me bstal nas g+ha na d+ha ka'i phye ma blugs na 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]slar yang 'bar bar byed do/_/maN+Da rI dang /_se bA la dang /_dza lo ka dang /_sbal pa'i tshil gyis rkang pa dag mnyes nas/_chu shing gi lo ma dkris nas me ma dka' bar ba'i steng du phyin na tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/shi thib tu dang /_bu ram zos na gnyid du 'gyur ro/_/ka ma rtsa'i rtsa ba spyi 
[\[339a.2\]]bor bcings na gnyid du 'gyur ro/_/nA ga dam na ka'i rtsa ba dang /_gro na buSh+Ta'i bal dang /_yung ba dang /_'bras dang btags nas dril gyis byas na/_chu'i btags pa las rgyal lo/_/shal ma la'i rtsa bar brus nas/_shing kun bcug na me tog rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sa skyur mo dang /_
[\[339a.3\]]chang byin nas go la byin na 'khru bar byed do/_/shi ri kha Na'i 'o ma dang /_arka'i sa bon dang /_srin bu'i zos pa'i shing phye dang /_bu ram zos na khrag tu 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/spang bye'i phye mas rta'i sna la mnyes na rtswa za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan gyis bkrus na dag par 'gyur ro/_/ke ta 
[\[339a.4\]]ka'i rtsa ba spyi bor bcing bar bya'o/_/kha rdzu ra'i rtsa ba dang /_ha te ta la'i rtsa ba mu kha rgyal gyi zla ba la byang phyogs su gnas pas/_gcer bu skra grol bar byas nas bton nas gsum po dang cung zad mnyes nas 'thungs na mtshon gyis thed par mi 'gyur ro/_/sho na ka'i sa bon gyis mchil 
[\[339a.5\]]lha ma gnyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa la byas nas/_nang bkang nas chu la phyin na 'bying bar mi 'gyur ro/_o~M Sha Ni zos nas lce 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/_/thong lcags bsregs nas ldags na tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngul chu dang k+Sha ra dang ldan pa'i ha sti shuN+Di 'thungs na mngal ltung bar byed do/_/
[\[339a.6\]]shar pung ga dkar po'i rtsa ba rgyu skar rgyal la bton nas ba'i mar la sbangs nas mgo bo 'am dpung bar gdags par bya'o/_/mda' dang chom po'i 'jigs pa las skyob par byed do/_/bya rgod kyi zhag dang /_'ug pa'i zhag mchil lha ma la byugs nas steng du gnas nas shin tu ring por 'gro 'ong 
[\[339a.7\]]nus so/_/yungs kar gyi 'bras bu mtshon gyis gcad par bya ste/_nyi ma bzang po'i dgongs mo'i thun mtshams su lhag par gnas pa byas na gcer bu skra grol bar byas nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas sa la ma lhung bar bcom ldan 'das kyi [(]stags [,]sngags [)]kyis bsrungs nas/_phreng ba'i sngags kyis 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]gang dang gang gi khrag gis sbangs nas/_mtshon cha mang po'i khrag gis gtor nas ma bkrus pa'i chu dang /_de'i rus pa'i lud dang zhag dang /_de'i thal ba bskyed nas/_de'i thod pa'i nang du zhag dang ra la sogs pa'i khrag la sogs pa bsags nas/_bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs ba 'bad pas byas 
[\[339b.2\]]nas/_yang dang yang du bsrung ba dang gtor ma bya/_yongs su gyur pa'i 'bras bu khar bcug na bdag nyid de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/lcags gsum gyis dkris na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'dir lcags gsum ni phyed dang bcas pa'i drug nam bdun dang /_phyed dang bcas pa'i gnyis dang /_bzhi 
[\[339b.3\]]dang /_drug nam lnga rnams te/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_me rnams mi'i thod pa la gi wang dang le brgan dag gis bsgrub bya'i ming sngags kyis bsten nas bris nas dri'i chus byugs te/_thod pa gnyis pa yang dag par sbyar bar byas nas/_ro'i srad bus dkris nas spra tshil gyis dril bar bya'o/_/dur khrod 
[\[339b.4\]]kyi me la bdugs pas ji srid mtshan mo spra tshil ma zhu'i bar du'o/_/lha'i bu mo 'gugs par byed do/_/o~M A kaD+d+h+ya A kaD+d+h+ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_che ge mo A kar+Sha ya dzaHswA hA/_ka pit+tha'i 'bras bu phye mar byas nas ma he'i zhol spang bar bya'o/_/lan bdun du'o/_/rdza gsar pa na gnas nas dar ba cung 
[\[339b.5\]]zad blug par bya'o/_/skad cig tsam gyis zho ru 'gyur ro/_/ka pit+tha'i 'bras bu btags nas rdza gsar pa la byug par bya'o/_/de la 'o ma bskol nas srub pa dang bral na zho ru 'gyur ro/_/rdza so ma btang ba'i bum par 'o mas bsgos nas btso bar bya'o/_/bum par blugs nas brtan pa dang bum 
[\[339b.6\]]pa bcag pas zho'i bum par 'gyur ro/_/a rka'i 'o ma bum pa gsar par lan mang du bsgos nas/_der chu blugs na dar ba bzhin du mthong ngo /_/bud med bu tsha skyes nas zhag bcu lon pa'i mes bdugs pa'i thal ba blangs nas/_/khu tshur gnyis steng 'og tu rnam par bkod nas chus bkang 
[\[339b.7\]]nas de la thal ba'i ri mo'i steng du khrid na/_bum pa'i chu skams par 'gyur ro/_/'og tu thal bas ri mo byas na gang bar 'gyur ro/_/gza' nyi ma'i nyin mo ga liny+dza'i rtsa ba dang /_a pa mArga'i rtsa ba bton nas so sor dbyug pa'i rtse mo la byugs nas rked par bzung na de dag 'thab par byed do/_/ba hU a 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]ra'i sa bon gyi khu bas ras bzang po mnyes nas chu blugs na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spa'i bum pa la de yis de bzhin du byugs nas zhon na chu la 'bying bar mi 'gyur ro/_/b+hu la ta dang srin bu me khyer gyi phye mas rtsig pa la byugs na mtshan mo 'bar bar mthong ngo /_/zangs kyi snod 
[\[340a.2\]]la chang dang skyu ru ras mnyes nas lcags kyi snod la byugs na zangs ma bzhin du mthong ngo /_/ba lang gi rus pa bsregs nas mu zi'i phye ma byin nam lce 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/d+heN+Da ka'i sa bon gyi steng du me tog bzhag nas chu byin na me tog yar nas 'gro'o/_/kuN+Thir las byas pa'i byi'u'i nang du/_
[\[340a.3\]]bung ba bcug na nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/_/sha skam po b+tal+la ta ka'i mar khus sbangs nas chu'i steng du gzhag na 'gro bar byed do/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/_ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[340a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snying gar srog rlung thur sel bshad/_/mnyam gnas lte ba'i phyogs na gnas/_/gyen rgyu mgrin pa'i phyogs su gnas/_/lus kun la ni khyab byed gnas/_/de rnams nang nas gtso bo yi/_/srog gi rlung ni snying gar gnas/_/'byung 'jug dbugs 
[\[340a.5\]]kyi dbye ba yis/_/skye bo kun gyi srog tu gnas/_/'pho ba bcu drug sbyor ba yis/_/so sor dbyug gu re re'o/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi ni 'bab pa yis/_/nyi khri chig stong drug brgya la/_/g.yas la reg nas 'bab pa ni/_/me yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod do/_/g.yon nas reg nas 'bab pa ni/_/
[\[340a.6\]]rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod do/_/g.yas g.yon mtshungs par reg pa ni/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/de nyid 'dir ni dal 'bab pa/_/chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/la lA na ni g.yon gyi dal/_/ras nA g.yas rnam par gnas/_/a pa d+hU tI dbus phyogs nas/_/lhan cig 
[\[340a.7\]]skyes dga' skad cig 'bab/_/'byung dang 'jug pa gnyis gyur pa/_/mi g.yo'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas/_/ji srid srog ni rab 'jug pa'i/_/rlung gi 'gro 'ong nyams pas so/_/'jug pa kum b+ha ka ra shes bya/_/pU ra ka ni gzung bar bya/_/re tsa ka ni dbyung bar shes/_/mi g.yo ba ni rengs 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]par 'dod/_/gtum po khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/shes rab dang bcas brtsam par bya/_/rlung gi 'jug pa bgrang bya ste/_/brgya stong la sogs grangs rnams kyis/_/skad cig nyid la 'grub 'gyur te/_/mgon po sangs rgyas gsung ji bzhin/_/'bad pas shes rab la 'khyud nas/_/rlung gcig 
[\[340b.2\]]pu ni bgrang bar bya/_/gtum po khro bo'i gzugs kyis ni/_/zla ba phyed tsam gyis 'grub byed/_/lha yi ye shes yang dag ldan/_/mngon par shes pa skye bar 'gyur/_/gtum po khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rang gi bud med nges 'khyud nas/_/snying ga dang ni snying ga dang /_/gsang ba dang ni 
[\[340b.3\]]gsang ba dang /_/zhal dang zhel ni yang dag sbyar/_/sems med bde ba'i mchog de nyid/_/zla ba snying gi nang du son/_/de ni nyi ma'i mthu yis so/_/de nyid brtan pa'i stobs de las/_/mi yis kun mkhyen thob par 'gyur/_/bsams pa tsam gyur nyid kyis ni/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar 
[\[340b.4\]]yang /_/pha rol sems ni shes 'gyur te/_/bdag gi 'di ni bden par smras/_/de bzhin de nyid sbyor ba yis/_/rna ba'i nang du bsgom byas na/_/phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa'i sgra/_/drung na mo ni ji bzhin thos/_/de bzhin mig gi mthu yis ni/_/'jig rten gsum po mthong bar byed/_/de 
[\[340b.5\]]bzhin sna yis bsnams pas kyang /_/dri rnams thams cad shes par 'gyur/_/de bzhin lce yis myangs pas kyang /_/ring gnas ro yang rab tu skye/_/de bzhin rang rtags rtser bsams pas/_/reg bya ma lus shes par 'gyur/_/de bzhin mgo yi dbus bsams pas/_/kun gyi nus mthu 
[\[340b.6\]]'phel bar 'gyur/_/gang du sems ni gnas de la/_/rlung gis ro ni yang dag mnyam/_/de dang de las de 'gog pas/_/de nyid 'dir ni gzugs brnyan 'gyur/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/_/dgug dang de bzhin gsad pa dang /_/bskrad dang thams cad shin tu bsgom/_/de nyid gang bsgoms 
[\[340b.7\]]rab tu 'grub/_/ku ma b+ha ga sogs rab sbyor bas/_/lta stangs bzhi po dang sbyor bya/_/g.yon du lta ba'i lta stangs kyis/_/bum pa can gyi dbang du byed/_/pUr ka ni nges sbyor bas/_/g.yas kyi dgug par shes par bya/_/gang zhig dpral gnas lta stangs kyis/_/de ni re tsag yis gsad/_/
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]sna rtser gnas nyid lta stangs kyis/_/rengs pa nyid kyis rengs pa can/_/nas kyi me tog ku ma b+ha ka/_/sna hI pr-ik+Sha pUr ka/_/rlan bcas shing ni re tsa ka/_/mig de yang ni stam b+ha ga/_/kun gyi lta stangs nges sbyor las/_/zla ba drug tu bsam par bya/_/kun gyi nus pa dang ldan par/_/sems 
[\[341a.2\]]ni 'gog pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems ni 'gags pas rlung 'gag go/_/rlung 'gags pas kyang sems kyang 'gag_/phan tshun 'gag par 'gyur ba yi/_/gnas la sems ni gnas pa'o/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/_/thabs dang shes rab gcig tu sbyor/_/'gog pa'i bde la longs spyod pas/_/
[\[341a.3\]]khyab bdag mi g.yo de 'grub bo/_/rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas rnams/_/sngags pa de yi lhan cig na/_/bde byed la sogs grags pa yi/_/'jig rten lha rnams smos ci dgos/_/rgyud rnams kun du rab sbas pa/_/bdag gis de nyid mi g.yo gtso/_/gang zhig de nyid brten byas pas/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i 
[\[341a.4\]]sangs rgyas gyur/_/gang gA'i bye ma dang mtshungs pa'i/_/chen po rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar gyi yang rnam sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dang ldan nyid/_/de phyir rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/_/khyab bdag mi g.yo bsam par bya/_/gang zhig mi g.yo mi shes pa/_/de yi skye ba 'bras med yin/_/de 
[\[341a.5\]]nyid med la dngos grub ni/_/phra mo tsam yang thob pa med/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las rlung gi rnal 'byor gyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang mthil lte bar 'bugs byed na/_/zhag 
[\[341a.6\]]gsum nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rkang pa'i mthil du 'bugs pa dang /_/mig tu zug rngus zla gsum na/_/rkang pa'i mthil du 'bugs pa dang /_/sna yi zug rngus zla gsum na/_/bshang ba 'dzag pa'i dus su ni/_/sbrid pa mnyam byung zla ba na/_/lte ba dang lto ba'i zug ju yis lo ldana'o/_/mdzod spu'i zug rngu yis nyi ma 
[\[341a.7\]]gcig na'o/_/lce yi rtse mo ma mthong na zla ba phyed na'o/_/sna'i rtse mo'i zug rngu yis zla ba bzhin bo/_/'khrig pa'i dus kyi sbrid pa yis zla ba na'o/_/mthe'u chung thams cad mnyam du zug rngur gyur na zla ba na'o/_/mnyam du snying ga dang mgrin par zug rngur gyur na zla ba phyed pa gsum na'o/_/mnyam du tA lu ka gsum 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]du zug rngur gyur na nyi ma gsum na'o/_/su ra b+he'i rna ba'i dril bu'i sgra yis zla ba gsum na'o/_/rna ba'i rtsa ba dang /_smin ma'i dbus dang /_mgo'i dang po rnams su zug rngur gyur na nyi ma gcig na'o/_/rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams nas lte ba'i mthar drug pa'i zug rngus zla ba drug na'o/_/sna rtse'i sha zhum na zhag bdun 
[\[341b.2\]]na'o/_/'gram pa'i sha'i mtshams byen zla ba ldana'o/_/mig 'dzag pa ma mthong na zla ba ldana'o/_/sna'i 'khor lo las zhag bdun na'o/_/snying ga zhom na zla ba phyed na'o/_/lce'i dkyil du ri mo nag po byung na zhag gnyis na'o/_/sen mo la khrag ma mthong na zla ba drug na'o/_/so skams na zla ba drug na'o/_/a ru Na ma 
[\[341b.3\]]mthong na zla ba drug na'o/_/grang mo la sogs pa'i dus phyin ci log pa las thams cad du bug par mthong na zla ba phyed na'o/_/ha yig brjod pas grang ba dang /_phuHyig brjod pas dro bar gyur na nyi ma bcu na'o/_/mid med kyi rtsa bar ri mo nag po mthong na nyi ma bco brgyad na'o/_/lus mnyes pas sgra thos pa dang /_
[\[341b.4\]]lus thams cad las klu nyid kyang nyi ma bcu tham pa na'o/_/khrus byas pa tsam gyis snying ga dang rkang pa sgam na/_rta d+hi ma ni lus la dri ngan pa byung na zhag gsum na'o/_/lus staHnyi ma gcig na'o/_/dri chu g.yon du 'khor na zla ba drug na'o/_/lte ba phyin ci log na nyi ma lnga na'o/_/sna'i rtse mo ma mthong na de zla ba 
[\[341b.5\]]lnga na'o/_/mig sor mos mnan pas 'od ma mthong na nyi ma brgya na'o/_/rna ba'i d+han+ya thos na lo gcig na'o/_/pha rol gyi mig la gzugs brnyan ma mthong na zla ba phyed na'o/_/de nyid shes phyi rang chib slu dang /_/'jig rten pha rol bsam par bya/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal 
[\[341b.6\]]gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las 'chi ltas kyi mtshan nyid rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pha dang ma yi mnyam sbyor las/_/'byung lnga'i bdag can zla ba dang /_/'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid can/_/nyi ma'i sbyor ba 'dzom pa las/_/de la 
[\[341b.7\]]sems can skye bar 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/_/slar yang rus tshigs zla ba las/_/nyi mas sha la sogs par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid stong pa'i lus gyur la/_/sems can rnams ni las kyis sprul/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'di/_/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_/dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]pa 'di/_/chu nang zla ba lta bur 'dod/_/ces pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las lus kyi rang bzhin gyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/_shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba/_/gzhan yang 
[\[342a.2\]]bdag gis mnyan par 'tshal/_/shin tu rgyas min mdor bsdus pas/_/mgon po bdag la bka' drin mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/_/bcu drug lo yi gzugs can ma/_/lha mo sems dpa'i skyil krung 
[\[342a.3\]]mdzad/_/sku mdog sngon mo skal chen ma/_/mi bskyod pa yis dbu la brgyan/_/phyag g.yas pad+ma dmar po bsnams/_/g.yon pa'i phyag ni rol pa'i stabs/_/pad+ma zla ba'i steng du bzhugs/_/nu ma rgyas shing lta bas tshim/_/spyan yangs dga' ma khyod la smras/_/lhan 
[\[342a.4\]]skyes mi g.yo'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/lha mo 'di ni bsgom par gyis/_/hU~M yig ye shes las byung ba'i/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma/_/rnal 'byor 'khyud pas bsgom byas na/_/dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/_/yang na d+hIHyig las byung ba'i/_/kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/_/rtag pa yi ni dbu brgyan 
[\[342a.5\]]cing /_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/sor mo rin dbang dbu brgyan dang /_/dmar po ku ru kul+li kA/_/lha mo dbu rgyan 'od dpag med/_/hri yig ye shes las byung ma/_/ta~M yig ye shes las byung ba'i/_/sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu ni/_/don yod grub pa'i dbu brgyan ma/_/sngon mo'i gzugs kyis skyes bu rnams/_/
[\[342a.6\]]sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas nas/_/zhi ba'i gzugs kyis yang dag zhugs/_/dpal ldan ral gri zhags pa bsnams/_/mngon par 'khyud pa'i tshul mdzad ma/_/rang rigs yang na gzhan rigs kyis/_/bu mo bzung nas bsgom par bya/_/phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pas/_/the tshom med par dngos grub 
[\[342a.7\]]'gyur/_/yang nas sogs las 'gyis pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan byas nas bsgrub par bya/_/ldan skyes gtum po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/rtse gcig yid kyis bzlas par bya/_/de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di/_o~M bi shwa badzrI A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hU~M swA hA/_o~M badzra sar swa tI A gats+tsha A gats+tsha d+hIHswA hA/_o~M badzra d+hA twi 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]shwa rI A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ba~M swA hA/_o~M ku ru kul+le A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hrIM swA hA/_o~M tA re A gats+tsha A gats+tsha tA~M swA hA/_de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa la/_/kha dog ser por byas pa la/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi 
[\[342b.2\]]la/_/de yang me yi 'dab ma dkar/_/bden bral du ni dmar por mtshungs/_/rlung du kha dog ser po ste/_/dbang ldan mtshams su ljang gu'o/_/dbus su kha dog nag po ste/_/de la mi g.yo brtag par bya/_/yang na nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i/_/dkar po ser po dmar po'am/_/ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyi/_/sku ru 
[\[342b.3\]]rnam par bsam par bya/_/me yi mtshams su spyan ma ste/_/ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/g.yon dang g.yas pa'i phyag dag gis/_/zla ba mya ngan med shing bsnams/_/bden bral lha mo gos dkar mo/_/gzhu dang mda' ni phyag bsnams sa ser/_/rlung gi mtshams su mA ma kI/_/sku mdog dmar mor gyur pa ni/_/bum 
[\[342b.4\]]pa 'bras kyi snye ma phyag_/dbang ldan mtshams su sgrol ma ste/_/ljang gu g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang /_/g.yon pa ut+pa la sngon po bsnams/_/de rnams zla ba'i gdan la ni/_/thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs/_/shar sgo brgya byin gdan la ni/_/'dod chags rdo rje dgod par bya/_/ral gri thod bsnams sku 
[\[342b.5\]]mdog dmar/_/lho ru gshin rje'i gdan la ni/_/zhe sdang rdo rje sku mdog nag_/gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub phyag_/nub tu rma bya'i gos can gyi/_/chu bdag steng gnas ljang gu yi/_/nga rgyal rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/rdo rje rgyas pa phyag na bsnams/_/byang du gti mug rdo rje ni/_/sdigs mdzub a sho ka bsnams pa/_/
[\[342b.6\]]lus ngan ser po la gnas pa'i/_/nyi ma'i gdan la dgod par bya/_/thams cad g.yon brkyang rkang stabs can/_/khro zhing skra ni gyen du brjes/_/kha dog ser por mtshungs pa yi/_/mtshams bzhi la ni bum pa dgod/_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad dang ldan pa/_/'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/'jig rten gsum gnas 
[\[342b.7\]]bud med kyi/_/bdag po dbang phyug dam par bcas/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/gtum po khro bos sgom pa ni/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du lha/_/gtum po khro bo brtag par bya/_/rA ma de ba kha dog dmar/_/ma ste bden bral mtshams su ni/_/'dod pa'i lha ste kha dog ser/_/ma hI Ni zhes kha dog ljang /_/rlung ste lha 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]min ko ki la/_/zhes pa gri gug thod pa'i lag_/nag po dbang ldan mtshams su gnas/_/thams cad g.yas brkyang stabs kyis so/_/lha mo par Na sha ba ri/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs gnas/_/'di nyid bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/_/nya sogs bsregs pas mchod par bya/_/lha rnams kun 
[\[343a.2\]]kyang 'chi byed na/_/mi rnams gzhan pa smos ci dgos/_/de la 'di'i sngags ni/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ban+d+ha ban+d+ha che ge mo hU~M phaT/_shes rab dang ldan bsgom par bya/_/g.yon pa'i phyag na pad+ma dkar/_/gtum po khro bo sngon po'am/_/dmar po yang na nag pos kyang /_/rnal 'byor bsgom pa yongs bstan pas/_/
[\[343a.3\]]skad cig gis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ltar mi g.yo dkar po sogs/_/'bad pa drag pos sgom byed na/_/sems ni rtse gcig mnyam bzhag pas/_/sa bon dang bral nyid kyang bsgom/_/za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang /_/'dug dang 'gro dang 'chag par yang /_/gnas skabs kun du rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[343a.4\]]lha yi rnam par bsgom par bya/_/yang na bde ba 'ba' zhig ni/_/phan tshun bde ba'i rnal 'byor ma/_/ji srid rab tu gsal gyur pa/_/de srid bar du 'bad pas bsgom/_/rab gsal gyur na rnal 'byor pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo/_/zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum 
[\[343a.5\]]po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/dpal gtum 
[\[343a.6\]]po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dang phrin las dpag tu med pa mnga' ba bla ma chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi sku drin la brten nas bla ma dus 'khor ba chen po shes rab seng ges bskul zhing sbyin 
[\[343a.7\]]bdag mdzad pa la brten nas dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta rat+na shrI'i zhal snga nas lo ts+tsha ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbrul gyi lo smin drug gi zla ba'i dkar po'i tshes bcu la rdzogs par bsgyur ro//_//_
